user_reviews:
[{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-Qz_zR8NAjeqpRnuANXJcQGSLJzNuS-ETk_THk3z82H5rG6U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall a solid place. I ordered a cup of latte. While I feel the flavour and milk steaming could've been better, it was still a decent cup. I like that they have no tip as a default so you don't need to press anything if you don't want to tip. I'm sure people are feeling more fatigued these days with tips and would appreciate it. The bathroom could be cleaner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjOouTPehfuOKCJ5QRuWCOalChnKTdQnz5-PCi&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Conor Whyte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMdI4_ZGUMJFwplOdkinu1I_usGONki2DpQ6wr_spSbc4yhe2F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent cafe with a strategic location nearby Brentwood Shopping Centre.
Food was expertly prepared, and coffee was super freshly roasted. Highly recommend this cafe! Today was our first time to visit.

맛있는 치킨브리샌드위치와 모카였습니다.

Note for the previous commenter: It is important to open seating for customers that are coming in to eat. If you are spending excessive time in the cafe, it hurts their business as it limits available seating for arriving customers. This is not a large cafe!
There are signs everywhere explaining the 2hr limit. This is more than fair in my opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuA-marRZTavANuOGqkJ3naD1qW0n8VpZk89yo&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Lin Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-AOGsPLTQGmNweeMhJKvZ5lorslTGkT0xLfg-fKE2grd81A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have this weird policy going on: 2 hours limit on weekend and holidays. One of the servers just dropped this tag on my table and I hadn't even finished my cup of coffee (dine in and tips paid). Understandable, but still feel it's a rude policy and make the customer feel bad. Never saw this kind of policy in any cafe I have been, just a warning to those who want a place longer than 2 hrs to study /work. It's a good spot in brentwood, but will never come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxArbsw15FxaRyST2ulNHhnatYFMb6gTwvGJ_g&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Maxim Borzenkov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5du_PkAVH4Z1D5yn5ceof8nx4Vb5Gh-oa_Y_0G13tOUKmBqAiog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent coffee and tasty sandwiches, the chicken brie being a standout favorite. Cheesecake is absolutely delicious, though I wish the slices were a bit larger. I miss being able to order the sandwiches on DoorDash. Overall, a great spot for a tasty meal and dessert!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeaVVfDOeEwlk_63rdT45vESLd8iugZh1J-uoB&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Vic Yung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjSUFpvFSwHsCrywPzGZzN7WDhV8Ljlj3YECw07iwjqMR_leW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went on a weekday afternoon and most of the tables were occupied. Ordered an iced matcha latte and the staff made sure to ask if I wanted it sweetened or unsweetened. The ice melted a little quickly but the flavor was strong and not too sweet. Started about an hour and staff didn't rush anybody out.

Would recommend for a casual coffee meet up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp4AKcSCITqptgpgL6kivA1850i6Hr18B-e7x3&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Joey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl9szXFCvkqiDIj8ffgxhpU02VBcZUaH8smB2SMyI4TIXdsaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious matcha latte, refreshing iced tea, and perfect Basque cheesecake. sesame tiramisu surprised me! Cozy and delightful cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr2FtWRPH8lg9ErCfR3Tmz6rKb-yKeT4wTSdAR&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Marcus Molina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0VJnjNpbeDzNmeiSJg9kR2Htb5wEtrtRAu317vPzeMfxaeoo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cream puffs were great but what they're really known for is their basque style cheesecake. It was incredibly creamy and the perfect balance of not too sweet but not too bland. In my opinion, this is one of the best cheesecakes in all of Metro Vancouver.

Also tried the apple grapefruit sparkling lemonade and that was so refreshing and good.

If you're looking for some high quality desserts in the Brentwood area this is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSiv_KihY1Fe3T4ViIhGFkf_0-15QP8wJgewP_&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2023-1-16"},{"Name":"Nur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1DGcXSlt3DOKh1OYTYqaVlGYlWM6GjkdmrWGlG1XOHSx5g-8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a nice place. We tried Tiramisu and cheesecake and velvet cake. Everything was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdRmI1Eauv8WyMEZWWZV-eJmU1aUJFYABa_Z-F&fid=0x0:0x778986f5635d3347"],"When":"2024-11-18"}]

I thought the aesthetic of the place was so cute 🥰 will definitely be coming here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6OGz81EDj__KOR4YumMq5TaRzkpFBBKiNqDwa&fid=0x0:0xf275b925d8b47431"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Nara Hahn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw_4Fr8SJQGbTyjFMUfeH5XFv1MyNvsziUDxFbrUNmFjMU_eJIIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the lychee green tea with pearls and bunny mango smoothie with pink pearls! The bunny is made of coconut pudding.
The workers that greeted and served us were pleasant and polite. Would go again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eoin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-BxKWgR-905Sx1W7wVMOrYc-E-hc6mqEy8A-XTkIA4Km0fIi8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Irish live and die by the quality of someone's tea, and this place is exceptional! My favourite bubble tea place 🌞🇮🇪","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaeyoon Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsvBLvxcZ94aUtGCpCDE38ozcDfcW4P7RicD0zPQzYgKtniw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly the best bubble tea place in Vancouver! I recently moved to gilmore area and I've been coming here continuously. I have tried their signature brown sugar pearl milk, milk tea with fresh taro and grapefruit with yogurt and they were all sooooo goooood. All of them were superior in taste compared to other bubble tea places I've been to. Highly recommended!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ankita Sehgal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHnWE6OMtG46MSdMyc5ZYyCnJUmbpWRzq8-DGls3pBH_jqYUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! Highly recommend this place…","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nate D. Suppanade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT5GIFT3fWisDu-ffUjuVaDyKrj5NqWSJjl9Ok7m5pMmYxWgpmJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great coffee spot! I came here one morning the line was 7-8 people long but it moved quickly with 2 cash registers open. I ordered an iced latte and the double smoked bacon & egg breakfast bagel. Order came up quickly. There were plenty of tables available despite being the morning rush. The latte was prefect, not too sweet. The sandwich was exactly what I wanted, nice and toasted. They are very efficient and move through the crowds very quickly. Overall very happy with this place, would definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpSteKEI2pggmWzHYZy-DQjcYasIseOSQ8Qnd6&fid=0x0:0x6a09e91dfc4e8e22"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"eyup tunc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrtzpD3MBavlYkqs3CO6hRXMhruzBfZ-lAQJz-enOjNpKXo_yRJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This morning, I went to JJ Bean with my family to buy coffee and snacks. We bought 2 Americana misto and a blue barriers capcake. There was a long rope for the capcake and when I showed the rope to the officer, I received the answer "Let's give you a free coffee". Neither an apology nor an explanation. no. Good luck in your service and business life at JJ Bean, which we visit twice a week.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHFT1DuzxY1pgqe4nWMCfyD9oml9D1OgmJE0qU&fid=0x0:0x6a09e91dfc4e8e22"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looking for a down to earth, minimal fuss and true grass roots coffee joint? Then look no further. One thing of many I love about this chain, is that they don't charge extra for dairy free milk options, have a huge bunch widely available to help yourself.
JJ Bean is awesome and totally underrated, this is my new go to coffee house around Hastings. All their locations are aesthetically well decorated, have yummy baked goods and talented baristas whipping up tasty drinks! A great selection of Espresso ranges for any kind of tastebuds. This was an awesome soy cold brew to go on a hot day.
This specific Roasters also has a phenomenal plethora of both indoor and outdoor comfortable seating. Full honesty, this is one of the sweetest coffee joints you'll witness for a long time and is dope.
I just wish they'd setup a loyalty scheme reward program would be awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvf5s0S45j6_T5-eH4YusHJmvn8AT9rNN8nTh-&fid=0x0:0x6a09e91dfc4e8e22"],"When":"2023-7-9"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A good location for good coffee and some baked goods. The staff are friendly and helpful. The place is well keep and tidy.  There are lots of parking around.
I'm so glad that they still offer mugs and plates for eat in. It has a good patio outside too.
If you visit this area, this is the right one for a break.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlXqJPMRj9Gajim9uXVLV02HaMm_N9ubr0cUHO&fid=0x0:0x6a09e91dfc4e8e22"],"When":"2022-9-21"},{"Name":"Julian Tu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUccbSC4ghmImblBXURerAc5in7hUNzwjywsW9q13-eiHpFJ49c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at this JJ Bean location ⚠️ 📢
Went for late night with boyfriend and family.

Couple notes:

- Very large open concept coffee shop.
- I enjoy there design and the lamps looked interesting with fabric material.
- Lots of selection for bakery/breakfast/snacks
- Many tables where this could be a study spot along with outside patio to enjoy coffee
- Be nice if they had more than 1 menu. The menu is just at the front where you pay though if there's a line up be hard to walk in to take a look.
- The coffee shop did feel quite cold though so many temperature adjustment in the evening is needed
- The lady taking our order was very nice and offered us some snacks since they were about to close up shop and it would be thrown out.
- Staff was great felt like a good environment
- I has the Blended Vanillla Shiver and enjoyed it. Can definitely taste the espressoo~

Would recommend others to come to try it.👍👍 J approved ~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP99xDzjbvpkx3ZrLqiucqz-3HW1vphi7nDWMq1&fid=0x0:0x6a09e91dfc4e8e22"],"When":"2022-10-9"},{"Name":"Coshiela Bote","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnR1wEd2-LKD6S_sbHbohcbHkNlg8IBHyRGFP-Xh6kx8lMXFlG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"my boyfriend mentioned that this is one of his favourite jjbeans to study at. i came by tonight to do some work, and he was not wrong. interior is really lovely, and very clean. good music and lovely service. variety of seating areas. glad i live close by i will be coming more often. bonus points for long hours.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jodine Morehouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkI3ILmstAY-XeAWqv2CETEpjWiJVODW602jRpnYogrvfslqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best coffee shop in the North Burnaby area. You walk in to see clean and beautiful decor, and a great display case. I ordered the Spinach and Feta breakfast sandwich and a cappuccino. The sandwich was very flavourful and felt homemade. The cappuccino was extremely smooth with zero bitter taste (just the way I like it). I liked the coffee cup lid - easy to drink out of and you can see the latte art! 5 star service as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeZ6L8mWDTk3HX1YvUiOultmghHiCdw6isk0Tw&fid=0x0:0x6a09e91dfc4e8e22"],"When":"2021-1-22"},{"Name":"Kit Yee Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy4hyLjXryzPjKJf4N3DUJBAsHtZSSuk76pvxFtVmwfHSV1Gtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I chose to come here with my family, so I could sit outside, meet with them and enjoy a cup of coffee. I found that JJ Bean here has a big outdoor seating area. It was awesome!

I had coffee or latte at other JJ Bean locations. I loved their beverages in general. Before I visited this location, I hoped for the same good experience and having good quality of beverages here as well!

The size or interior of this branch is very big! After the pandemic or when the restrictions were lifted, customers could enjoy indoor seating. That would be awesome! I love their interior design. It’s very modern, contemporary, white and clean. The outdoor seating areas has got many tables and chairs comparing to other coffee places. That’s why I said it was awesome!

I ordered latte with soy, milk and almond milk as well as a cup of black coffee and two cheese muffins. All of them were very delicious. Pricing was reasonable considering the good quality, presentation of everything and the environment.

I would love to come back here and enjoy dining inside the coffee shop one day. There is lots of street parking right on Hastings or small streets. Don’t need to worry about looking for a parking spot. It’s still free parking in this neighbourhood and I am hoping city of Burnaby will change the rules and laws here 😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTelPMsDYcIJHnbB-lrymlwdc-Z5wk25okOia4&fid=0x0:0x6a09e91dfc4e8e22"],"When":"2021-5-25"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Annia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCmNf-6kVgoV3z2v1rhLUKPIXQtdwZxPsOxdlb6pZhbXP-BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Typical food court service just with unexperienced and unprofessional staff at front counter.  It was the only boba/bubble tea option kind of decent.  Nothing fancy.  If one still is training or don't like people they should be making the drinks and not at till or counter in my opinion","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkztQK-6BIyfxpIYEKTDuIsufPHm1F-PYWjMSP\u0026fid=0x0:0x719ccfd1a7b24f1d"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Bill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN9zwp7xv0imGZck91UiXUA_5sub2NWtj0XbXLIIDzsUyGLI6_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm extremely disappointed by the lack of customer service professionalism at Chatime Brentwood. On December 19 at 3pm, I was ordering some milk tea and saw their Thursday $2 drink poster. There were 2 staff taking my order, I asked them some questions to clarify because I wasn't sure how the deal works. While I was asking my questions, the 2 staff looked at each other and started laughing at my questions. I'm very disappointed in the customer service and would not recommend anyone going to this Chatime location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODXUNpfjtm9PAE4VHw4u8e2yZlU0pjquv1WlZ9\u0026fid=0x0:0x719ccfd1a7b24f1d"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Kelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVePuoaXXyM0dJKn-ODUhhmFE4_3a2_ph2wNm5FbgL2HboE4I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a very mango slush and noticed the employees making it kept looking at the mango chunks and talking to each other in Mandarin. It looks like one of the workers was inquiring to their co-worker about it but they just decided to go ahead and make it without really caring if it was spoiled. I found that interaction suspicious and to my surprise I was right, the mango chunks were indeed old and not edible at all. I knew the taste was off as soon as I ate it since it was way too mushy so I took a piece out and it was brown meaning the mango chunks had rotten. I contacted chatime customer support the same day of purchase and it says they reply within 10 business days. However, is been over a month since the incident and all I got is dead silence. I have both proof of purchase and pictures of the mango being brown and gone bad but no reply. I had gotten sick from consuming just a few sips fortunately I threw away the drink otherwise I would have probably ended up with a bad case of food poisoning. However, the lack of reply and accountability of Chatime has soured my experience with ever going back there as someone who used to buy it once a week for $10 each time I expected at least something edible and if the employees knew something was up they should of spoken up and asked to change my order. And still waiting for a reply for customer service but got nothing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHYMLtSTmJRijuElaMt4_y-FMKNr9NA-n1ueSA\u0026fid=0x0:0x719ccfd1a7b24f1d"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chatime is a chain located within the Tables food court and serves bubble tea and other fruit beverages. I ordered the pearl milk tea and it was very typical with less milk flavour and more tea flavour. Service was ok but they didn’t provide a straw for my drink and I had to reach over to grab it. Lots of tables and seats\nnearby to drink your beverage on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmHqBPaUChw-7NydEfvz-btgwAPJytVzOwy2-G\u0026fid=0x0:0x719ccfd1a7b24f1d"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"joey dai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7bJJzMZHUu9DY_uckxy80NObPKXoK4JkITvzIewsfcupqT2E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The matcha milk tea here is absolutely delicious—rich, smooth, and perfectly balanced. The staff are friendly and provide excellent service, making the whole experience delightful. Highly recommend this place for any milk tea lover!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5tVqcuHwMoYSsDUNLiok6NQrqhQ0QxiYZDc3c\u0026fid=0x0:0x719ccfd1a7b24f1d"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Panda Paw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0Ug2xYBGS0Dokq2ocby3rrBMBNp1ieVmKFLBuDIrNHmNX-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered QQ Lychee, watched the staff made this drink with syrup + water, which I'm fine with, BUT it tasted awfu! It tasted like bad tap water or water that went through dirty filter, had a bit of pool water taste too.  I was super thirsty so I still drank 1/4 cup, then I threw it away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkmf58wgCDq1kXJ6z9fJBMD7hl-fygjiQ8n1_Q\u0026fid=0x0:0x719ccfd1a7b24f1d"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Kieran Purewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpsPXqRQa5lSQQbUcJ-pLRyGzdXE2MzyreRO2yhH26kI4Ucg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered a taro smoothie and she mentioned how they use the fake Taro. It was indeed the real one when we mentioned that we did not want that. We went back to complain and we were denied the opportunity to get a new drink or a refund. Don’t waste your money or time coming here because the people are clueless.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paludarium Terrarium Aquarium love","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISoh6osPDwcCz5V8SxeYnxsZCuyibAPKvdm-8ik1PkJhHspg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I bought 3 drinks but wanted one more. The front girl was really nice and helped me out and told me that there is a current promotion of 5 CAD off if spending 25CAD. She cancelled my transaction and reordered it for me with promotion despite of the long lineup after me. I really appreciate that customer service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The lady who worked there that day I was there was super friendly and very courteous.  She offered samples of ice cream and tea.  In the end we bought couple tea.  Next time we will buy the ice cream.  I tried the ice cream with subtle jasmine flavour and not sweet which is good.  The drinks were good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8nZkK-FFCzF7VRis26t-US6SuAhMo96201ffI&fid=0x0:0x2b5ad9bacdffa7f2"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Alice Ka Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxckHK3XmM0V5fIfGDT4FdqsZ0PDnaF-Y0FM770iUUOU5Rm0M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not good at all

Firstly, the staff not even say 1 word to me in the whole process, not even Hi/ thank you/ repeat my order/ or anything. That is so bad, why don’t they just put a POS there instead?

Secondly, I arrived at 11am, suppose the pearl is fresh, but the texture is not chewy at all.

Finally, no flavour for milk powder or tea, basically just like milky water with sugar.

Will not buy again when there are lots of option in crystal mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8TEQV4ij1H6pHSmoTHvZ567z8gYx8qX527Kfo&fid=0x0:0x2b5ad9bacdffa7f2"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"In addition to tea and ice cream, they have a yogurt drink series which is pretty tasty :) we tried the strawberry yogurt with lychee jelly which was good but a little too sweet and we would get it with 0% sugar in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlQ0rNJvXlz02oaLMVyfHtqGQD-6ZkGijscmgd&fid=0x0:0x2b5ad9bacdffa7f2"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Vince Thai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURc2nFEEYAJnuPg8kGGpioCYYpDRxIrHGPshMLi39EfXbZhb1VyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I love this place.  Variety of flavors.

Edited.  Actually they gave free bbt when you put positive reviews.  However the bbt given was awful! The bubbles were old.

The one I purchased was okay.

The service was lousy.  No smiles. They looked like they just came back from the funeral.

If you look at all my reviews, most of them are positives. I do like shiny tea, but not this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caroline Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpZxNY5vPU2OtjkSJ7yOvBOjRoQ-fEyb0FzZWRZwKtu1-_FQGs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a tealato there, and there wss totally no tea flavor in it. Surprisingly, a chocolate flavor in a tealato, I went back and double check with them, they pretty sure that was what I ordered. My friend also said that was definitely a chocolate taste in it. Hope people who allergic to chocolate don't go!
btw the servers were not friendly, and was talking and laughing when I was ordering food.
BAD EXPERIENCE, will not go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNcOpvyvMqMoUtk4emoCyW7eIThMqeaSPPW7oX&fid=0x0:0x2b5ad9bacdffa7f2"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Akil Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK94xz1CvnPb4UsRO-tTdg8k6tUP5kFDmqF5IR1yWlLsoGEPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This shiny tea location was absolutely gorgeous the environment was clean and the employees were respectful. The drinks look absolutely amazing today there is a mango cheese cake which is what I want to try next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHH420oKCa85tKT4ga6JBmFm2LSti2s5_y4wIh&fid=0x0:0x2b5ad9bacdffa7f2"],"When":"2022-3-20"},{"Name":"Dorothy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhuAYPo7TuJIpUBighZN-f8S5J3_2TndABkpYalsa1WQX9I3M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice service. Pretty fair price, would recommend to come grab a drink if nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaQqb4WGroBGG8bygxOx7s0bj95SYThrObDZaF&fid=0x0:0x2b5ad9bacdffa7f2"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Yohan J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqztXsZXBwnMUt9Haopsj_9G0CE-KtJnmI54p311dxDNn7BPI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this storeand had an amazing experience! The ambiance is cozy and inviting, making it a perfect spot to relax with friends. The staff are incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring a pleasant visit every time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ButaSan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXypAqEE69hGoOMQiS_kGrfeEUBR0gidL7vbw8SbEZMGww0-8bd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My girlfriend was mad on me and left the house. I ended up found her in this store. This store serves some decent drinks and mango stuff. We will def come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnqT87NPs7139ycRKuHVbgfjZ5xvffOPgJgtc5&fid=0x0:0xfa370f4a2cae9cf"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Kai L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtQzOi2mOJVVI3XKIUsuCYEYsY00ETOg07uP8t4i3fkx0MX4K3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down best boba/bubble tea place in Vancouver, price and quality-wise.

Boba is always cooked well and the offerings are always on point with endless customizability.

Highly recommend making your way here if in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrIqXSQbY8lvvUS7Gp32h9BNTV0iTyZ1plk8Hs&fid=0x0:0xfa370f4a2cae9cf"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice little hidden gem in burnaby for great pearl teas and fantastic smoothies.

They are known for their mango drinks and it did not disappoint one bit! We ordered the Creamy Mango slush, and it was fantastic. Surely it gives Macu in Richmond a run for its money. It was not overly sweet and the flavour of the mango really comes out. The teas and slushies are fresh, they are good.

Blossoms has good pricing, excellent service and great drinks. I’ve been coming over the years and will continue to. A lovely hidden iykyk spot in burnaby.

Update:
Their new watermelon slush drinks are really tasty, and it really hits the spot on a hot day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtqexp0jKEEnjuERUNg09hpi-L5tjfWnPKPMsD&fid=0x0:0xfa370f4a2cae9cf"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came to this small boba place well on my way home and it was surprisingly pretty good. I only got the jasmine milk tea though, which had a very strong tea flavor (which I enjoy) unlike your usual boba
places but was kinda watery. Boba was unexpectedly solid too , though maybe cooked a little bit undercooked. Anyways the drink was really good for 6 dollars like usually you will be paying 7.5 to 8 for boba these days .
People coming in only bought the mango drinks so I'm prolly gunna come back and try the jasmine mango","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6woD6yvjVs2Rx-g4b1OWw2pOnDkSx6g2Y8VI3&fid=0x0:0xfa370f4a2cae9cf"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a cool little bubble tea spot in North Burnaby with fresh made drinks and decent portion sizes.

The drinks are a little bit more on the expensive side when it comes to bubble tea but they’re generous with the ingredients and everything tastes fresh.

Cool spot to stop by if you’re in the area and looking for either a warm or cold drink, or some snacks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbGKq35giuxltY_3x0E5YO8posXYQVEoKwxTiD&fid=0x0:0xfa370f4a2cae9cf"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"Katherine Harland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMgoZ3wZsLlzBG6C1lDW7F9GaaV9gMqrQ3d11V4LjpsQWYHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably their most popular, the mango creamy drink with pearls is INCREDIBLE! Their taiyaki was also delicious and freshly made to order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPU4vyWxcJwX62wpHDx54wskElpPcstNpEADURq&fid=0x0:0xfa370f4a2cae9cf"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Maxwell_Logan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX789UsupX-h_U_c8RPL26qLLebBrSnzL0NecZGOANwc4HCTQmOog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I dealt with a Barista named Michaela and she was amazing, very helpful and very considerate of my allergies and has suggested wonderful drinks. I heard that she is moving away on Friday night and encourages all to go and see her on her last hoorah!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD2d1cafE_YAAs0qWSF6kXxFrZQA4AmP8SvCce&fid=0x0:0xfa370f4a2cae9cf"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Angela Bach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnc0tw88t4LdRhH0mzV_dUxsGgDb3LCjWxA9q2HXGkUJSdaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Picked up a surprise bag from here on the Too Good to Go app. The drinks were fresh, delicious, and generous. Staff was friendly too. Its an unpretentious, clean little cafe in a residential neighborhood so you have to look for it, but would recommend the drive there.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Chatime Bubble Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"V P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxj8yENCKwdvGgfIR4uDA0bh65erhq2TGJESneOu_P2sA-HA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered 2 Grass Jelly Roasted Milk tea through DoorDash. Neither had sugar and one looked and tasted like they used water. Just disgusting!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBbhyeqhf-0HQAIBgeojvjYZt2HzCcSVGNNOiV&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Roshni Sarath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_Mhsw0X5KywwYv3vY8x0c2kA5Hbqo3Y1IIXwrT4V3UMjYiKgr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"UPDATE [Aug 29,2024] : The Manager / Owner , Hugh reached out  to me . Hugh seems to be very sensible person . He collected all the information and acted on it and assured staffs will be re trained on customer service. They gave me a refund for the affected drinks. This gives me a hope that they might not kill the experience for another customer next time. I understand how google reviews affect business. Based on Hugh's response and action , I am updating the rating to 3 starts from 1.

[ORIGINAL REVIEW , AUG 25 ] : Service is way below average! They messed up 2 out  of my 4 orders.

They missed out on an add on for me in my drink, despite taking the order correctly and confirming on it.
I realized something was off right after I took a sip of the drink outside the store.
I went back and informed the staff that it appears that they missed an add on in my drink.

I got no response.Customer service is simply unacceptable!
One of the girls just took my drink , transferred to another cup, put the missing add on, giggled something in their language and put the cup in front of me. No apology/ acknowledgment, nothing!
Very rude staff.

This time they missed adding ice. Which when I pointed out, I got a stare from one of the girls and she said it is there.
I could not stand this attitude and decided to just leave the store.
I stepped out and opened the drink and there was no ice !

The second instance is I ordered for a mango smoothie for my daughter and they gave her a mango slushie!

Staffs are rude and kills the experience of going to this store again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am a regular customer of Chatime and was pretty stoked about seeing this new branch open so close to home, but I was kinda skeptical about visiting when I saw its a newly established joint and the reviews showed the quality wasn't good because of the lack of experience etc. Unfortunately its true, this is the worst bubble tea I have ever had and will not be visiting here again and really put off Chatime now.
I feel awful for saying this as it's clearly a new chain and the staff are in training. However, I don't think staff should be training on the fly and surely they could organize some offline training and tasting sessions or something surely?..
I ordered my go to Large Matcha Roasted Milk Tea which tasted like bath water with the smallest hint of matcha, it was so gross and I felt sick so I couldn't even finish it.
As all Chatime branches, they do offer Oat milk alternatives which is great and the regular menu although I don't trust ordering any drinks from here.
Also the restrooms are not available at this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv-V2k95ovDIWdRsOELP226v5CpvXG9RYHXrsn&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-3-29"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chatime for me for the most part has been hit and miss. However my experience at this specific location has been great and consistent. The owner is kind and genuinely tries to accommodate customer requests.

Quality- ordered their new limited time TRIO cup drink (dragon fruit bits with grape in one part of the cup, mango peach in the other and the last part of the cup was guava) the flavours overall were refreshing. Although I did not have toppings, I'd definitely grab it again next time but with coconut jelly.

Service- the owner is super helpful and was very nice to my wife and my kid. The staff looks like they are still in training but they were still nice during our interactions.

Cleanliness - although the dining room is still not yet open, the space it self is quite clean, they have plexi glass up and PPE worn by staff.

Overall a good experience and will definitely return if I am ever craving chatime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3J-EMWiATDtkk_ce88yc7ceU1-eutvMYiMovl&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-6-19"},{"Name":"Ashley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5kCzc7eRb4jfW7949WUTBpVquxs5hCBGMbV9VKX7WizSYJao=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great experience at this Chatime location. It wasn’t busy when I visited as I was the only customer inside. The staff was patient with me while I was deciding what drinks to get.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQJ3UeoNt_Eb4VSBqSkCdPQCl5RTmtGE8rhK30&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-4-20"},{"Name":"Jemma Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXCHgsvEOda8Euj2F1UAraubpKMT6WV7yVIZRrlelmuyGL9zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Expensive just for the regular size which is smaller than a standard regular size bubble tea elsewhere. They are lacking milky slush options. But the flavours are good :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtKrs8uJoc2ybxiHJgsyaehcg1pMk_m0ZDt_Xk&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2022-6-12"},{"Name":"Bob Seymour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0fRtxv4CszHn4EcW7G0G4cbSaQfULwvKaBFoESMUbanu_Vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great environment, staff and quality milk tea. Same owner as previous Zenq. I was not familiar with new selections and the owner was very patient to introduce the new drinks to me.

Will be coming back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb1L34NkBnO4FqfgHhh5Gr1gvKgy5DlI218yw6&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-3-14"},{"Name":"Jess Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDBzh8dbkC1LzSd7XrpM8gWZ5VmXx8K9kvQQxVQanMubn1WEvT3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great staff and good tasting drinks (better tasting than the chatime closer to my home). Clean and nice looking inside and hope one day after Covid people can come inside to enjoy the space","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXZFoMiwiBJ7VM83GX2yUVqz3VMh_eq_LJ1qaP&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-3-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Atheena Lynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHcdqtceqgFM62rfczRF05jX4AALmvYQ7wQcKDO3beIwRafEOG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My absolute favourite spot specifically for a strawberry slush! This might be because this place has been here since I was a little kid and the drink is nostalgic, BUT I’ve gotten friends to try it and they also agree it’s the best strawberry slush they’ve had so maybe I’m not being dramatic and this place actually is that good. The workers are also always so kind whenever I go so that’s a big plus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp83OXDZPK8CCUwf4lJ3qugEJpAdMLpYYYOJYv&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Angie Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU90ropqRseI9nmgWGmde-PsfvI6-S9yrT2M_EGufGZXh0GIjSl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Convenient location and they've been here since I was kid, although not sure about ownership changes. The roasted oolong is quite nice but definitely go less sugar. Giving them a 5 stars for no auto tip prompt!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwh63V2MDXceVihnIdyjxDig8kJyXOIZQK_ZBp&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Neha Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOAFVq8Z0ZGxqdcHyQUNR3mUQfrl34aqa6y4TgqK9UdFHM4ko3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have bought tea from here several times. Today, i just needed a straw since i accidentally dropped it on another floor. The attendant was not peofessional because she gave me a lame excuse that * they are currently short of straws*. I said okay and left. Deepdown, i felt bad because they should know how to attend customers being professional at the same time.
If you are short of straws just buy enough inventory. Again, i know she lied. I will never return. Anyways, i found a straw from presotea where i was welcomed. Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbbe0aCWaUlSR_TBYh8SjZoARcZYzf5rhWVT9p&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Teegan Langis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFHArCy8TRoXEj8W8PrPheFX4EiW2cF2mRsDqsUWefqQ8MKqn5NA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered Thai Milk Tea today with grass jelly... and wasn't happy with the overall taste. The tea part was subpar, but the grass jelly was the downfall... it's like they watered it down and added another cup of water. It's not a great first taste.. little Tea House. It's not worth my money and I mostly won't order anything again... at least for a while....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBBo41UhkCQUP7RKXSpqRKywiyNHuI5_hntE0s&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2023-4-14"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got the Roasted Matcha Milk Tea which unfortunately was a bit of a disappointment as it was super sweet and clearly a pre-mixed powder rather than actual matcha which by itself, is how it should be as it's super good when done properly! The only recommendation I can make is to combo this with some Coffee Jelly which was pretty yummy itself and the bitterness complimented out the sweet in a nice tastebud-like balance. My partner also got the Jasmine Green Milk Tea with Grass Jelly which was also very weak tasting to be honest.
However, the staff were super friendly and kind, and they offer coconut, almond, Oat and soy milk alternatives which is awesome.
All drinks are one size, not bad value for money.
Support local businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRaRYwJjsSRQwWJxBMMHtKyIbIcJe8YwsBVROn&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2021-10-1"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast and efficient service on a busy Saturday (whoever was making the drinks made drinks back to back in an orderly manner by whoever ordered the drinks first). There was a line but went by really fast. You can choose sugar and ice level of some of the drinks. I ordered the pearl milk tea and customized with 25% sugar and 50% ice. It was good as the drink was not overly sweet and the pearls were chewy. Would definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVmXS-10orhBJxbRtPMrxg4GGPYrnTfgdONElD&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2023-1-29"},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sigh, I don’t think you can get a good BBT at Metrotown except for the big chains. I was greeted by a lovely young lady, but it took forever to get my tea (there were others waiting and the drinks were coming out slowly one at a time) and the tea had no flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcRUrp6RmWP71ucF7J710K0jpWeRA8kl3iNwLU&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Alx Kingston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOX2C0XBFH8eRYBvN3-RcHSs4k1xMll4nwu7plEjKnL9pvXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good 👍

My friend and I ordered two drinks (mango slush, brown sugar fresh milk) from here. Owner and staff are very friendly and nice to help us . 100% recommend here","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Dave Munday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaNS1DZd97spwQGogwfE06SDoDiGtYHmZ-fIsxivv-iLxnAtq3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This business is a wonderful place to take a break. The staff are adorably friendly and as an even more delightful surprise, randomly deciding to try out their chocolate syrup waffles ended up proving to be a deliciously unexpected bonus factor I would definitely recommend.

If you're in this area, don't even give it a second thought.  Take 20 minutes and stop in here to treat yourself.
I'm sure you won't regret doing so.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgtJ8-PoPE_OkO2R1YESoWbdv_gETXpPfkMJGs&fid=0x0:0x844acb6955e8473c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Viena Bajic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdi91GoxwP9yFVcNNB0Tzapbiyob2wrd2PZVKhJUUjrwtSA8y9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven’t been here in awhile, but as I was scrolling amongst photos in my camera roll, I’ve realized the most consistent thing in my life has been Tealips. I’m a senior in high school graduating this year, but scrolling back, you’ll find I’ve been going here since I still went to elementary school. In all these years, I cannot recall a single bad experience. My friend who lives next door told me her entire life’s story at the table by the window. I’ve stared at the same cabinet full off bubble-tea related gifts for years. I’ve watched as their decor changed slightly, adding plushes and cactuses, and the small changes in their menu. I’ve genuinely saved money through their student deals, and the amount of toppings they offer is top tier. I don’t know where I would be without a small, comforting place nuzzled in my life like Tealips. Coco’s mass produced pearls got nothing on my love like Tealips. I’ve sat at those tables as a child, with a mask on during COVID, and even now as a struggling student. In the grand scheme of all things of life, so much is moving, but not Tealips. Tealips understands you. Tealips welcomes you. Tealips is you. Not sponsored.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUAGt19q0htQKNIblnURKVozUunhdcg_arpi5h&fid=0x0:0x844acb6955e8473c"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Mina Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoNAB2Isfin8N0jYjVW-M4q31NlZ9H-TQZeTegsCy6YwExT74jTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lost Wallet, Found Hope

Last night, panic set in when I realized I’d lost my wallet. Thankfully, my partner used the AirTag inside to track its location. I rushed to Tealips and, to my immense relief, the staff had my wallet! A kind-hearted individual had found it and turned it in.

I’m so grateful to the staff at Tealips for their help and to the person who found my wallet. This experience has truly restored my faith in humanity.

Thank you for being such a wonderful cafe.

But I have to say, I will not let the same mistake happen again. Please look after belongings, not everyone willing to keep and return. And the cafe has no obligation to keep other's belonging, or do anything for lost and found.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyKlcBIrKejAFH6-6XW8pXRp4BJb8EW-o7r827&fid=0x0:0x844acb6955e8473c"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Joaquin Ofreneo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrNPnxzQyA7bFu4AlcXFBuPYzU-63dEkarSgw0BNUHG6-MHPo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This sandwich was AMAZING! My mouth watered at the sight of it, and I could tell by the design and beauty of the sandwich that I was in for a wild ride. And boy, what a ride this sandwich took me on. Tealips produces the finest of sandwiches.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtyHiQzv-Ce__FR8317U-Jf45a1UB3dzxoJcaQ&fid=0x0:0x844acb6955e8473c"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Mahak Mithani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIVq4rklNDW7_SN4ilTOdPr2MBnf1pznAUl4g5o3uReAbojEaIOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute spot with a great menu - looking forward to trying their waffles and bingsoo soon! Even their sandwiches sound fun to try! I got an avocado smoothie, which is one of my favorite drinks, but next time I’ll definitely try a milk tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwl6e9hUyVNp5RUsLXfAwfdP4gBfGE-R_e22iy&fid=0x0:0x844acb6955e8473c"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Channing Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW326VL4agCltUTEqgHa6HKz_qvHT6y6Rid0jNN2xdoTQi2u7JT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very scrumptious and yummy, I love Tealips with all my life. Lip smacking, finger licking, and mouth watering sandwiches that turn my frown upside down.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMurcn1gA1QCDA3KudzI9vsMv1ZFjhHOBdCzTF1&fid=0x0:0x844acb6955e8473c"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeBwTB-mC2zEbr3cSipg0EKVXE5emtqSt4j-g23dgZoSyc5lj9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff was really nice. The smells, sounds, visuals and ambience of the cafe were all amazing, cozy, and warm. We got the brown sugar milk tea, had a nice warm flavour, and the mango green tea which was very refreshing and fruity. Would definitely recommend. We were also given a free chocolate waffle as a promotion and that was also amazing!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adora Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVynKgmgyIS62IiZzLAJK84-GRAUPRDHfwquUkUuy_3VhQKmhOi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has the most peaceful and nice ambiance ever! We got the strawberry cloud and the chocoate banana waffle, both were absolutely delish! Highly recommend as they have a wide variety of options that all looks amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwLKtzO7cy9bp_uiutfwyeiSENPBZmwySpf5A9&fid=0x0:0x844acb6955e8473c"],"When":"2024-6-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU013h56BWbSQR2BVcwTIAyp30f7d3_77spZTgxKR0SWt3HMOLM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came for the bubble tea but was also really pleasantly surprised by their tea ice creams! And they have melon pan ice cream sandwiches too. Haven’t seen these unique offerings anywhere else!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaSSA46gVQc1vW9mnAMmYaeuGGSWojI31IL2pS&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Maureen Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJveuMK98eNTFiH47Fc3q63NS_Ymf2pm_8GByP3XP5IYJAxNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are super lucky to have a bubble tea shop of this quality and price point in Burnaby. They use their own brand of microground tea powders and it makes a huge difference. Hands down my fave bubble tea shop. Don't skip out on their daily deals, especially the $5 milk tea ice cream floats on Wednesdays. I also enjoy all their fruit tea lattes (e.g. matcha strawberry, matcha guava). I get oat milk - it's an upcharge but worth it. I don't adjust the sweetness levels in any of the drinks - they're the perfect amount of sweetness for me and my kids (we usually get half sweet at regular chain bbt stores).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOobSe-t59YeERxwFBfezSnrGhgcTY8zhpnssfJ&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Mina Go","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjQGl-uPkA5TdD-5LQLwibR14sOPPqEz16J3m81TNE6ThpOxW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg I have been living nearby for 5 years, but we just noticed this awesome milk tea place.. after we found this place, we keep saying, i want to drink that milk tea 🧋  lol. Best milk tea place in my life!!! Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGrP2r8t1mPsSctSSFit2rMLYXX0obNed7YKAE&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Amy Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0vY_bbxBdOXTgSKqd-VBiokRu7okdrNGfRrGXrd_XTN8ia1bz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Teaspoons is my go-to spot for amazing drinks! Their bubble tea is delicious, and the Japanese stone-milled tea is so unique and flavorful. Highly recommend for any tea lover!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5GFfAuRTsvxQdg_uy3N75eNnJqcqaAn6Sy0f2&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJShSgCHbmme6GLETHZczdb6MWGsJKCwpKUqZlkj3SXYWukfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Teaspoons & Co. started off selling DIY bubble tea kits. Besides BBT, they also have ice cream, melon pans and milled tea. The inside is cute but only two tables (four chairs). Drinks are in the $6.25 to $6.95 range.

- Guava matcha ($6.70) - subbed for oat milk ($0.70). Way too much ice. Guava was prominent, balanced well with the matcha.
- Hojicha milk tea latte ($6.40) - roasted note was nice, but again too much ice.
- Strawberry jasmine ($6.70) - not much jasmine flavour. Our least favourite.
- Oasis slush ($6.70) with pearls ($0.70) and lychee jelly ($0.70) - standard fruit slush but on the sweet side. Would get half sweet.

Decent BBT at T&C. 3.5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlYQrXMC3639wnvorM7iHAxwu0LfE0er7pjC_i&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Cynthia S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxcChp-HWyxv_b0AyWqKEdRXph6ely8kALSP_Ith1JqQIJkdHT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my fav bubble tea spots in the city! The drinks are always fresh and staff is super friendly! My fav drink to get in the summer is the passion mango ❤️ looking forward to trying some of their new mochis!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXx1d9h_IgaagRU3ATDC2_P3rlnGxvTWJN3Qjh&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little hole in the wall bubble tea place on Hastings. The have their own branded matcha powders and their drinks overall are quite yummy as well.

They are currently doing $5 drink deals as well :) so a good time to give them a try","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnvhNsHioPB14A_2xrQbxnuIZA8xIykZW6reTI&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"flip fast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTSYHcuTmWXErziueLsgjxb7Z3l6hZoJoKKROlb6SZnYqA5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The only place in Metro Vancouver that gives me the authentic bubble fruit tea flavor. I love it and highly recommend it, always satisfying with every visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONKma3OUir2X1AuZDWpCKNofcBgfsiDXgdzSr7&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-9-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Milangic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVopPvYZNMyoMCZnSPr3vsLdqdKB7J9OKjxv4He0cY0RManHvU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A comfy and great place to enjoy a delicious cup of coffee. Good selection of bakery items. New maple pecan latte and carrot cake is so so good. If you love matcha this place is to go for, its delicious. Service is spectacular. Always felt welcoming. Little quote on the mirror to fall cushion covers to tiny Halloween candles during Halloween season. Worth checking out the cup and bun cafe. ☕️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMerqDL5Fun32SXcK5IpIftBhXXoOUsheqd1dVN&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love Cup and Bun Cafe! The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, making it the perfect spot to relax or catch up with friends. The service is exceptional, and staff are friendly and attentive, ensuring a delightful experience every time. Their coffee is top-notch, rich, and perfectly brewed, and the pastries are simply divine. Every bite is fresh and flavorful. This cafe is a true gem, and I can't recommend it enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt1qN1BG3FpU7VwWED2euVA17apyHCaU-hd_hA&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited with my family for a quick walking break, enticed by the promise of aromatic coffee and sweet treats. Our order comprised an Americana, a cappuccino, a lemon cake, and an apricot jam roll.

The coffee and pastries were decent but nothing extraordinary. The cakes seemed a bit overcooked and past their prime, which was a bit disappointing. However, the staff's warmth and friendliness more than made up for it. Their welcoming attitude added a pleasant touch to our visit and made us feel right at home.

The atmosphere of the coffee shop was inviting, with tasteful decorations that added to the overall ambiance. Despite the minor shortcomings in the food, the overall experience was enjoyable, thanks to the cozy environment and the lovely staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDtPhcoFMVMKqz4bQaUvvZp6YQbwKeHIqYUrjr&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Phyllis Tee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtHTl5JLpAHiaGIa8m_bWtHrZ84dJMWFq9MtMaT4ZwV6hFBwY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chicken pesto sandwich was good. Happy with the side salad - made it a balanced dish. Tuna melt was an interesting one - loaded with pickled flavour, which sort of overpowered the tuna taste. Overall, nice little stop for a quick bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDRXU-RI9XUweIlPu9xwP3JLaK0VejGRNJHRel&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place, quiet on a Sunday afternoon. Great atmosphere, very bright with comfortable seats. Good options of snacks and pastries. Coffee beans are from Agro. I’m yet to find a coffee shop that doesn’t have a monstera in it somewhere hahaha I guess they bring good luck or something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH9c5WUSWHRbUPl5GU16JSLF2-fXDnQQU99hS3&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Ishant Mithrani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhOwijOlZKDgzqi0RziPmIhKNCbsPTT_D_03xMnvfxtbc8X3nk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place, perfect brews and warm ambiance. Don’t skip the pastries, especially the croissant and the cake slices. It’s a cozy spot for coffee lovers who appreciate quality and a friendly atmosphere. Highly recommended for a top-notch coffee experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnaLLXyrehKJEhrPDxyNpOoJrSuVJkdGYn0fc5&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Ryan M. Rad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfBUNblWOkfhuZ7eOom2I6QeDxjIPkmldUrIixQCHkYaA3j6L-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere and the variety of seating options is great and the staff is friendly. Prices are reasonable too and you have quite some options form pastries to sandwiches. The food and drinks although are decent but nothing really special. Overall, we will be back for sure and I’d rate this as a 4.5/5!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0IFIFaftvdFn-GJ2O0pwOSxNwgTPdxipdyYGy&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Maya Florey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWsd7ZlvUoZqLpY-itDvhiZhkJ33_uzwGASGl_tvJHxJbLky4r=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly high quality house made baked goods, sandwiches and traditional coffee! Had a salmon sandwich and a Macchiato, the sourdough bread was fresh and soft and the salad and salmon was very flavourful and lemony. The coffee was very smooth, rich and fruity, with notes of pomegranate and sage. I didn’t try any of their baked goods, but wish I had! They looked incredible and handcrafted, unlike a lot of cafes that resell from Costco! My only complaint is that we went on Sunday afternoon and it was so busy that we could not find a seat! Staff were very helpful and friendly! Seems like a really wonderful community hub!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service was great. The drinks tasted good as well. The brown sugar milk with pearls and the lychee tea slush were both quite refreshing. They add dragonfruit to make the lychee tea slush naturally pink. There is a bit of a wait though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwqTHRTTD9uVsKT0GZnR-3jOF2y0SpcD-WlrwV&fid=0x0:0x8cf64d17aea41edb"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"The Power of Now","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg4bl83sQ_CAwn_ouznYDMdSLpDh9Vaw6YRcIh508csnoNjyjU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Money Tea and unfortunately had a very unpleasant experience. While the bubble tea tasted fine initially, my husband and I soon experienced severe digestive issues, including bad diarrhea, shortly after finishing my drink. This was very concerning and uncomfortable.

I understand that food and beverages can sometimes cause reactions, but I think it's important for places to ensure the quality and safety of their products, especially when it comes to ingredients or hygiene. I wanted to bring this to the attention of others who might be considering a visit.

I hope the business looks into this issue and makes improvements to avoid this kind of problem in the future. For now, I won't be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandy Loo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQmuireU353CqrKqv07Q9vnLseenf20wD1j3BWWifZsRDnmC0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The vibes was very cute and Chinese which I really like. I got my drink in a Yulkult bottle which cost an extra $1. My mom really liked the rice wine drink. She said it tastes really good and couldn’t stop complementing it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQpd_UxnpPzVB6LrV5PNv25iCTAUmjLoeGo5BD&fid=0x0:0x8cf64d17aea41edb"],"When":"2023-7-9"},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tbh I like this BBT place the most compared to all the other ones in Crystal mall 🤫. But then again, they have much to improve.

The price is a bit mehh because other bubble tea places have much much cheaper items. The quality is nice though. I can tell they mimic other franchise's specialties.

The only thing that actually made me lower a star was their yakult drink. I bought it thinking I would get the cute cup but I was given the normal cup. At least change the menu picture or you will mislead other customers. That's potentially false advertising. You can do better than that!

Besides that, I'm pretty excited to try the other items. But please do bring back the cup, or change the menu picture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPJL76LknsgCWzsKCIeoUz_HQGXcTm6JrY8Lg1&fid=0x0:0x8cf64d17aea41edb"],"When":"2022-9-28"},{"Name":"Love2eat Blues","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImZuPy7HhbVixrQcb1Ekk3SK4yEylEsrt15M6EfayR94w82g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Drinks are in cute packaging and price are on the higher side.

I got strawberry orange green tea with jelly boba ($6.99+tax). The tea itself is refreshing and not too sweet. The boba jelly didn't disappointed me. I love the chewy texture of it. However,  the strawberry tastes a bit strange as it doesn't taste like strawberry...maybe they use syrup or strawberry jam.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy9wlxcfprcUpe6hd_tSpJ9xZsTOs4wqdoqttx&fid=0x0:0x8cf64d17aea41edb"],"When":"2021-9-28"},{"Name":"A C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3z0-7uQXz4fUOTzpifqXdxVpuBsYWJzd_lSvoRUWc0jhq7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Didn't realize this place was cash and debit only until we ordered. We had neither on us so we wanted to cancel it instead. The clerk said something about leaving it on hold for us until we could get cash and wouldn't let me cancel the order. I managed to find $10 to cover one drink and all of a sudden she was able to cancel the other drink. They took another 5 minutes to actually start making it..why couldn't we just cancel it then since obviously the order hadn't gone through.
Their drinks are ridiculously expensive and not that special. This one drink cost $9.20?!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsRMPub_L57sD9yB_kFKDLdVEXB4eJKy3XbtF3&fid=0x0:0x8cf64d17aea41edb"],"When":"2022-1-20"},{"Name":"Rita W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX3G4ecdEgDtqUEp9fsF3quoqJt8tc9UWnXYOProFqcY_UHjTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Money tea is the best!  The drinks are freshly made with fresh seasonal ingredients and staffs are all friendly and helpful.  What impressed me the most is their packaging, they uses paper straws and recycle plastic bottles!  I will definitely go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL-9mhVhc-JoCWSvSOnJhX5zMMfrjoQkZWjrUz&fid=0x0:0x8cf64d17aea41edb"],"When":"2021-3-8"},{"Name":"Vero Vero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJqM6z3NvGgp8fOHPNYXy_sxK1l4a3Acl0A1wGDJ4i1AfuQXig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Even a star is wasteful for this peach yakurt. Over-priced. Not environmentally friendly. The size of it is so small, not even close to medium size of other places. And the portion of bubble was not enough too. And I ordered half sweet but it was way too sweet. What is worse, their package is so against nature. Plastics and aluminum that they used for a cup of tea is too bad for nature.
I would not go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK3sXntIbDtSOLpxp_54UbDfmGYzlVpg6pdP0t&fid=0x0:0x8cf64d17aea41edb"],"When":"2021-1-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food are solid. The price is about the same as other similarly popular cafes.  Coffee tasted pretty good and barista was friendly and informative. Only complaint I have is cleanliness of washroom when I was there. Plenty of seats and fancy lightings provide welcoming vibe for a small sized cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMab82X-Q0gOXATGt2iYsoGPS9QlEejoF8ZuU12&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Jordana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJvxqFr8nGL8vok-SCRwxhp2_EJmOiFDFc3qAUH70xw1rrHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great. Had the Ham and Cheese Criossant and Japanese Hot Dog, and both were delicious. The dough wad flakey and baked just right, and the price was reasonable for what you get. The Rooibos Latte is delectable, highly recommend if you are a tea drinker. The only thing I didnt like is that it was busy but only 1 person behind the counter taking orders and making the orders, so we had to wait quite a bit, otherwise, lovely place. Clean and cozy, great place to catch up with friends and hang out over coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSx2yuz7LPmqpdYXNlzXTgK4YAfZ5YQVxoAvxD&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Angelica Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs8Rl6i0PRUB6_vIudko9K2nv_lt0A7oW9FSvOVZiLCVaSWMgL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice cafe with a large variety of baked goods. Their staff is always so kind and the ambiance is nice. I enjoyed my matcha, I just wish they didn’t charge so much for oat milk when dairy is a dietary restriction for many people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHDm0mjUXAu8QYUpecGd-bswC6Z9U0ZUEp85cL&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Naved Quaiyumi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfaJqW_7xDMkt7owQPld9jTBvQCckh2hsX_7RQEdqPvMD2bHPc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jonathan and Rona both provided great service to us. We ordered the cake n coffee ( Spanish latte). Coffee was the best I have tasted in Vancouver however the cafe need to work on its ambience more ...it's not fitting to it's delicious pastries cakes n coffee...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPatezFk2kKnvNs6A9euxNrLACMRHN1XF5NdeFb&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cute little cafe, gets pretty busy in the evenings because of the icecream/ gelato they carry which is cute. I wanted to try a few drinks but they were out of so many options which was pretty disappointing. So I just went with a latte (which tasted like a straight espresso shot ) and my friend had a green tea latte! Which was very delicious. I tried their Nutella swirl and it was also very delicious! Highly recommend! Next time I think I’ll asked for it warmed up though so it melts more in your mouth ! Will definitely come back to try out the gelato","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2_97X8nACU7-mm8sElw4ea4VFrYs3podIWTih&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Jackie Fiedler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrH5-QVsgBWyB1jTrOwnjnmXPjBownlPqvtu2BmzJx6OHq1yuItQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Charming bakery with a ton of options!

The sausage croissant was fantastic - buttery and flakey croissant was delicious warmed.

The chocolate supreme croissant wasn’t my favorite - very heavily filled and the dough was a little tough.

The mango royal croissant was also heavily filled, but tasty and the dough was excellent.

Friendly service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCimW-EJ95TwikSqB8QYmW8j_ChmO0u_H2Px53&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Both my husband and I love this cafe. Their baked good are fantastics in taste and great in variety. The downside of it is that it makes us very difficult to choose (joking!)
There is a see-through bakery area. I was sitting next to it and really enjoyed watching the chef working on the dough.
The vibes are very chill there. We just love everything about this cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4tXVMtR9mDLcEsPaQFSIY2kyY9ZWQqHPaoOsw&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Lạc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpO8370_7RDhjsqnPt6c35t5mMarMGN54u0eeSrhk9ZwWK5CU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Fior De Latte. They have a crazy pastry selection. Their drinks are decent. All the time I’ve been there, it’s always so busy so sometimes you can’t find a seat. But it’s a very nice cafe and it’s local.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNO-QvZDaTUmIXk-xywn3dL1_WnkUBB7lYh3Ry&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-11-28"}]

title: CoCo Bubble Tea（Brentwood）
