user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ruby Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcYgWpK_cs0nl_vCNDxLKXhdEMvrij6PLMGFBLksh5xesyew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The price is quite generous compared to other bubble tea places. Yet I prefer softer boba texture, what i had today was a bit chewier than my preference, but was still good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv1D5INyEWfAcvFAAipmRe68ozU7rBYr6LRdQ&fid=0x0:0x7024f106aad77300"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Ruby Esmundo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA9WnUbdR0sy9PRxptKaUyLmTPRH3OvB996GbWqawCIVyva1Vt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The drinks are good. We ordered Taro Slush with pearls and Chocolate Dream with Brown Sugar Pearls. There is also an ongoing promo of Buy One Get One 50% off. You get the 2nd drink at 50% off. It is between 11am to 2pm.

Staff are okay but they don’t seem to be happy. We waited for our drink for nearly 10mins. It was all packed and done but the staff was not as attentive, it was sitting out for 5mins or so (because the other staff is busy making drinks and the other staff is attending to get orders).

There is quite a number of seats. There is not enough parking though, and very tight. But if it is just a drop by and go, then parking should not be a problem.

Hope this helps.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuMGpvCzv443IDdXm1cRSEqqmcr9ApUEj_-lHG&fid=0x0:0x7024f106aad77300"],"When":"2024-3-15"},{"Name":"Sarah Love","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW10_PKOS624ix13nj8YKTo4TAQBtxqwAyn-GvxxaJgFFQ6c7ib5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hopped on the trend.

The pin blossom drink was the bomb, bubble poppers are delish. All about this drink if amazingly good. And for value of $6 I got the thermal bag barbie bag that can be reused whenever I circle back for more bbt plus some cutest stickers, gave them to my niece and she loved it.

Recommended to try this drink!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBSRUkDK8bnT5byhdjTMtRCYigsNXn9j3BQ9oh&fid=0x0:0x7024f106aad77300"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Colin Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKsZm0dxkoaNVpT_U5MSz6Hu71-aJgYtlTkTneFejPbF30OZkbOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s August 24, 2024.Are unsolicited and plastic bags still a thing?!

Nice store. Drink was great.  Mango flavours are yum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfCpkM2wFhMDuW0gXKybO7Um7pSqDGMuNGfpKn&fid=0x0:0x7024f106aad77300"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Grace K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmjRfsBofBXiuPb7F1xKfAxtCcjH71FHFlNq61usT4wASKtFZT5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My son and I visited this place last Friday night. The bright and lovely cashier kindly helped us with our order and even recommended a new menu item. We had an amazing bubble tea experience there👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Avelino Santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEJHSk1R5pWN_LtlgS7dTbTqtWxg-jslaGz3nEyqXOxs6pQY3P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Normally visit Coco with the girlfriend, She orders her usual which i also like, the product is very good.

Service seems to on average be ok, just ok, not a lot of warmth or welcoming.

Ambience is pretty stale, seems no one take the time to make the place more inviting.

Based on popular they are i think the experience should be a bit better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIpnLb6tmjukPye1_Qr43hfyFBlil89dmQ9xyE&fid=0x0:0x7024f106aad77300"],"When":"2023-12-4"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 stars every single day.
Coco is awesome and the number one bubble tea chain in Greater Vancouver! This joint is one of their incredibly awesome stores and what sets CoCo above all competitors..
This time I tried something new and got The Two Sisters which was INCREDIBLE and super yummy! A new second favorite go-to bubble tea drink option for sure.
The joint itself is very modern, new and stylish with excellent upkeep and in a sweet location just next to Brentwood skytrain station whilst offering plenty of parking facilities with no meters.
The staff are super friendly, approachable and phenomenal at making delicious bubble teas!!
Love me a CoCo! So stoked about this location which is one of the few, but for sure the best in the local area and other joints don't even come close.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2HFrNAS40dFeYvY7d5gdQay83QzCisVSo3PqC&fid=0x0:0x7024f106aad77300"],"When":"2021-4-2"},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There are several of these chain beverage locations throughout Vancouver. We went to the location off Willingdon & Lougheed. Great selection of drinks – macchiato, tees, milk teas, slushes, & fruit teas. You have the choice of how sugary you want your drink and how much ice you prefer. You can also add on various toppings. Average price for a large drink is $7.50. We tried the chocolate milk tea (tasted like chocolate milk shake) & matcha Macchiato (a bit too much froth to my liking).

Parking is a challenge especially on a busy intersection. It’s okay if you’re on foot. There are seats available to enjoy your drinks. When ordering, make sure you repeat your order. I almost ended up with taro milk tea instead of matcha Macchiato. They mostly serve ‘milk’ beverages. Not so good if you’re lactose intolerant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4mSfDsS6gur4o5fhhC9P7Mpzi4kM-NGy1DFw2&fid=0x0:0x7024f106aad77300"],"When":"2023-7-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Baran N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV690FKFDp0EHgvd_0nO_MEYR9KLQIZeacWyvn1HPe5B_AKGsWY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Right off the bat, the tiktok’s we’ve seen didn’t match the vibe of the place the way we imagined. Service was definitely lacklustre, however when we ran into issues with the cream glue, the person working did do his best to help.

Prices aren’t posted online, but are much higher than expected. The amount of rules and restrictions were definitely a buzz kill! Not to mention the width of the picture frames are significantly smaller than those shown on social media which is giving shrink-flation to the MAX. In the end, we did have fun making a custom frame though :)

As for bbt, pearls were flavoured well and tea was lovely. Just don’t order the lychee tea if you don’t like MASSIVE chunks of lychee in your drink 🥲🥲 other than that very yum yum","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmIsUcqGB0Gxsifcg5i5mxl4OvtVYTG1FHGxqW&fid=0x0:0x7bb68fcc47a94035"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Mojan Talashan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxrWl1YIvtmqGZTtKvDDE1soZT6w-gKi9wdihUyOFhLtvvwQU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve given this place a 3-star rating because the drinks are generally good. However, my recent visit was marred by poor customer service. The staff member was quite rude and unprofessional.  I ordered Oreo latter with jelly coconut. He made my order and he said he forgot to add jelly and I said I want jelly he told me I need to drink some of the drink first so he can add jelly. This approach was not only confusing but also unreasonable. If a mistake is made, it should be rectified without inconveniencing the customer. The staff member's attitude and handling of the situation were unacceptable, and I hope they improve their customer service skills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8_HpSpe7-Idk2MyxoH8vEitZeI_pv3jx2YT63&fid=0x0:0x7bb68fcc47a94035"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Shadan Sargent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhBEtMeJm-HeUzdWHQTDEVTUwIPbFX13loTpdKwY065-VkzOg7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was a bit put off by the low reviews but we decided to come anyway. Despite the atmosphere being subpar, we had a grand old time making our little designs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7rcWcK4fdM1lDfXBDbognjGyt1keL5d1hfuU3&fid=0x0:0x7bb68fcc47a94035"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Earl Flormata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHEYR5crfzT5mFZF5yY6PmVwTawXCmDPm3U8WVZUqH5mb8rOP9MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service here was downright abysmal. No explanations as to what things were. No labels on the items in the shelf. I wanted to try a dessert and they didn’t even say it was a creme brûlée. They didn’t say that our drinks were fixed sweetness and we were trying to ask for less sugar less ice etc. only reason I’m giving them a 3 on atmosphere was because of the decor and the Totoro mirror. Our drinks were up for awhile - they didn’t call our order numbers or anything while we were literally LOOKING AT THEM. Doubtful that this place will last much longer if the service is this poor. The passion sparkling was just syrup and Walmart sparkling water. At least the passion fruit was real.

I’m a pretty generous reviewer and it takes a lot to get a one star review from me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5FF3rdNtvMkUJfnfbNpwhxahMxwmQDvhYfEf6&fid=0x0:0x7bb68fcc47a94035"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"jelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP4oWfxty73n6wsuQ0GF4eeq3xzaM1QiR3hawN0IjsvKvloBwL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very fun experience! Was wary about the negative reviews, but the customer service was amazing, drinks were delicious (and not watered down at all like others have mentioned..), and we had a fantastic time there. The staffs were understanding and very helpful at explaining what to do. It gets crowded quick, so I recommend going in a bit early. (We arrived near opening time) Otherwise, super fun and great for adults and kids. Will comeback again when we’re in Canada! 💗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGfNNslHmhCULWwmr0P65ZeHfe_Gb4o9nA6wb7&fid=0x0:0x7bb68fcc47a94035"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Michele Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzRUpd_i2dGZ7gIeVryYZ9tXyqxjFq2rvBz5jdjwClYJWy2VpF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"There was minimal food selection so we didn’t get a bite to eat. I ordered the strawberry coffee latte and it was mediocre. Main purpose of the visit was to decorate a phone case. Price was too much for the quality. The whipped glue available to use were low in quantity and the tips kept falling off. The service was bad and no attention was given to any of their customers. I would not recommend this place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Azrah Dhamani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8c1aK3b4KhLDeJmfubngM_JnmSxCnetXiXWRediZjDI9m=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I took my niece there for bubble tea and phone case decorating. The guy working was super helpful and nice and explained everything. I was a little taken aback by the cost (40$ each). My niece has a Samsung phone, they only provide iPhone cases. Even after bringing her own case we were still told the price was the same for each (40$).
The reason my review 4/5 was the phone case charms stayed on for maybe a day before all falling off. We waited for about 12hrs before actually putting them on our phones allowing it to dry fully as the guy working suggested, but the glue I guess isn’t very good. I would recommend maybe doing the other activities they have such as painting and bracelet making. Phone case decorating isn’t going to last you long enough to justify spending 40$ just for it to all fall off the next day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taranpreet Badesha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHxnw4Vt71qn7odcG-ZfTsuJ75tZHsrM1xbuiyBa1Z6Ycx8h0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The prices were from $12 to $45, it was pretty pricey. I spent about $150 here, I got two phone cases, and one hair brush, one drink. I took one of my own item and they said it will still be $40 so I didn't do. I got the MATCHA MATCHA drink, it was so good. One of the best matcha drinks I have ever had. For the DIY, You can have unlimited charms, the glue was so hard to squeeze out, half done. The guy worker was really kind, but the girl that was working there had so much attitude. She was really rude, she should learn how to respect the customers. When we were looking at more charms, and grabbing some more, she was asking if we gonna use them all?","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Tea Plus
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place was solid for bubble tea. The taro slush with lychee jelly was bursting with creamy taro flavour. No complaints. It came with a matching purple straw too. The service was good. It’s conveniently located in the Crystal mall food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZqoAgKNWe6Idp0e18j_HOdE1UnD1BdDMh_01S&fid=0x0:0xdf0cc7a185ce39f7"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Watch out, guys!  This store is terrible. Very slow service, waiting for 20 minutes?  They increased the price unreasonably and downgraded the quality of drink ( barely can taste the taro, food color to look good?) Last month, their taro milk tea was $4.75 with pearls and a lot better taste. This Sunday, the price increases to $5.75 without pearls and extra $0.75 with pearls. That’s a rip-off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0HZdrfArQWVsyN8tKXeXemCp5u5EUY4mXqOVd&fid=0x0:0xdf0cc7a185ce39f7"],"When":"2022-7-18"},{"Name":"Auston Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFAZ8v9T_R1FzC3RdqLHM1fFs1aop_u4JijnO4yyaz8ygqDsFG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At noon, the bustling sounds of bubble tea shakers and flashy screens showing inventive topping combinations are an integral part of the Crystal Mall landscape. Having tried a plethora of bubble tea vendors here at Crystal Mall for over a decade, no stall has surpassed Tea Plus. Simple yet classic offerings have kept me looking forward to ordering the same drink (Lychee Green Bubble Tea) every time at the mall’s Food Court. The timeless flavours of Tea Plus have been a staple to the history of Crystal Mall, and its owner is a wonderful person who has—in my opinion—perfected the recipe for bubble tea and offered many options to suit varied tastes. After more than two decades, it is sad to see Tea Plus closed at Crystal Mall, but I would love to see it reopen sometime in the future.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hedy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2weV0qv-pzjyRM54aiVUKW_NzAUsl7OGugCF_OrBflmNgxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We order "fresh made"  hot black tea and green tea. It is turn out the tea were already sitting in the fridge who knows how long. Not matched their sign  And the staff heatted it up on the stove. We waited for over 15 minutes. And when we got our green tea, it is already fermented. ( Sitting in the fridge too long)
This was my first experience ever in Canada, order fresh hot tea and the tea is already premade and sitting in the fridge.
I guess this kind of shop only can order cold drinks with sugar and milk then you never can tell the tea is fresh or not.
Not recommended at all for people like hot drinks with original favour.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Justin Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY6JTuuZRAHh_uUJBCNUxnQMcDRY_8FAQ2cf5wFdQXHxGcXXtxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Slow service and low quality. Got the bubble waffle and jasmine green milk tea combo, and the waffle was too cakey and oily instead of light and crispy. The tea was pretty average, seems like they compensate for the tea bitterness with too much creamer or something. The pearls were also way too soft. Yes it’s a bit cheaper than other places, but not by much and I would rather spend a tiny bit more to get significantly better quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Logan Sobati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQUsWqaRgqGRmsLPJLAm-oLCvLZSG87IlY2byUzUVWF4yhIXGb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By brother and dad and I are hardcore bubble tea drinkers. We know the best and cheapest places everywhere near us and we agree that tea plus is the best or tied for number one.
When you drink the tea you can actually taste the uniqueness of each tea and it is sublime.
Also the pearls are amazing too, chewy and soft, not too sweet either.
I would lay down my life for tea plus.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel “SonicGhost”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJM1THyZjQ5IT1nl1WnRbPJkAen9WD9QQKo0jUqMuXBKRshil5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rating: 5/5, mostly for the nostalgia
Highlights: Boba milk tea, egg waffle
____________
The first time I came here was probably in 2006. It was only my second time in Vancouver and, at the time, boba tea was still in its infancy compared to today. This was probably the first time I had ever tasted milk tea, but ever since then, Tea Plus has been the standard to which I hold all other milk tea places.

This isn't to say that Tea Plus is better than all other milk tea places, far from it. The tea tastes very different from most other places--- I suspect it's a combination of the type of creamer and the type of tea they use. The milk tea here tastes almost creamy; the sweetener in combination with the creaminess always made the tea taste a little like cake. In 2021, however, that combination of flavors definitely tastes a little dated, but, nonetheless, I still hold that this is my favorite boba shop.

Also the egg waffles here are really good! They are crispy on the outside, soft and moist on the inside. You really should get one with your boba.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwbIVWnhkgkW1vVSPc7Hi7rNeih1-rfkmik-FZ0TEby-aDTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Nothing special about the drinks here. I went here for a bbt, because Shiny Tea ran out of some drinks on the menu. I had milk tea for $4.25 it was just a mediocre drink. Black tea had a bitter after taste and it tasted cheap. I didn't take any photos of it though.

I just realized I should have gone to T&T for cheap drinks.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX11ANDfpnFU7GmCeaVtU5cBwuWRqquWAK3F9_AUyciKpah0H5L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After how many years of wishing and hoping, Tealips has finally opened up a second location. They have wisely chosen to open this location at Metrotown, which should pretty much guarantee its success.

Absolutely beloved for their incomparable waffles, I was thrilled that I could now make my way over there whenever I pleased. Their Highgate location is really out of the way, especially for someone who doesn't drive.

I assume that the owners must have struck up a bargain with the former tenants, as Tealips was displaying the exact same miniature desserts as Mr. Mustache.

More spacious than their flagship store, this Metrotown location offers up more charm in the way of quirky knick knacks for you to ponder, as well as a fair amount of vegetation.

The quality of the food and drinks is on par with the Highgate location, which is a huge relief.

If you're looking for a cute off to the side Café where you can have your fill of bubble tea, iced desserts, and sinfully delicious waffles, detour over here and make your lips happy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcVPCCImMRKhLwj9owblAzWq8DTkNfWfPVzmxb&fid=0x0:0x8e619ade2d75b38f"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A tad overpriced for what It is, I paid $4 for like 2 strawberries… But the cake and the waffle here is absolutely delicious, would definitely recommend. I did not love their bubble waffle though, it sounded interesting but is not much different from a regular bubble waffle.
Service is standard, cafe is not very big.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmlZ_5mayX1TIRHi0dRAKpx2-YBqr0bzKtT5z4&fid=0x0:0x8e619ade2d75b38f"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Used to visit the Edmonds location frequently years ago. Their new spot close to Metrotown was fairly quiet when we visited.

Had the mango slush and passionfruit green tea along with the chocolate waffle pop. Pretty standard stuff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHsGfESkbPy1WYpsxO2FUJQ8RufOpw2DOR5w7E&fid=0x0:0x8e619ade2d75b38f"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Matthew Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqEC97UBlOW8ksbjeGIzyTGP5HoUSJ2msd1UoNVDokj0KiMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cozy cafe is the perfect study spot on a rainy day! The food is amazing and the workers are very kind as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwodLuRYjyhTT8HjkxHY7Vpa-0ZaYXYqQrAwYb&fid=0x0:0x8e619ade2d75b38f"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"ann bc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViaOsh3TXlBEKoJMyDpdVLP8Ypi4uozX-MbqTb8FC4tJO81Tc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t say enough about how much I love this cafe! The sandwiches? Absolutely delicious—so full of flavor and just perfect! But the real standout is the service. The staff are incredibly friendly and welcoming, like they’re genuinely happy to see you. The whole atmosphere feels light and joyful, and the space… wow!
It’s rare to find such a spacious cafe in Burnaby. I was thrilled to find a cozy spot to snap pictures when I met up with friends I hadn’t seen in ages—it was the perfect reunion spot! I also love the overall vibe—sipping tea, relaxing, and chatting without feeling rushed.
My first visit was on a rainy Vancouver day, but as soon as I stepped inside, it felt like a burst of sunshine! This cafe gives me such a peaceful, happy feeling, like a little escape from the hustle and bustle outside. Now, I visit all the time and would definitely recommend it to anyone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY_qIX-Alu7CtPDFDUtTkSlRT1hVzcFbm9j9HEOogCz6HKZgzElw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently tried the oolong tea latte at Tealips Cafe and was disappointed with the flavor profile. The drink was incredibly light, almost like drinking diluted milk with a hint of tea. It was so subtle that it was difficult to detect any distinct oolong flavor.

While it's possible that the oolong tea used in this latte is simply not a good match for milk, I've never encountered this issue with other oolong tea lattes. I'm willing to give the benefit of the doubt and assume that this particular combination just didn't work.

Unfortunately, based on this experience, I won't be ordering the oolong tea latte again at Tealips Cafe. If you're looking for a strong, flavorful tea latte, I recommend exploring other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrnQE4RK7KNfEoHYN2PTgEq6Bh0NtsVfBoWvZr&fid=0x0:0x8e619ade2d75b38f"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Betty Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkHKO0FNXUjcVpSdEmjVpTrBPRFq89QuZ-Z5xXnZc-tQBI6ZrG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3.5, rounded up.

the service was great, the cashier was very nice and explained the drink menu options clearly. I ordered a hojicha milk tea with coconut jelly, but I felt that it was way too sweet (it might've been because of the jelly), and the hojicha flavour was not very present. however, the atmosphere was cozy and pleasant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tina Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGNz6BMlXQZVg2D_Ca3s8J_KgA4K4jfm3cCr_4ej6TgbqsYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited the shop with my friend today to try the new promotion menu. Unfortunately, the cashier hurriedly informed us that the jasmine flavor was unavailable and only the original was offered. She also mentioned that the dessert waffle promotion would start next week. Her rushed and unfriendly demeanor, without even a hint of a smile, made us feel quite unwelcome. We decided not to place an order and left, which is quite a shame considering it was your grand opening. We were looking forward to supporting your new shop, but it seems like customer service isn't much of a priority. Hopefully, things will improve for other customers in the future.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wong Irene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7sp41wGQuueC1lDn3CqM9IATBJFCPj_h7E-EhyDPVkJBCmw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An exceptional dining experience! Rita provided service that was nothing short of perfection—attentive, professional, and genuinely warm. She ensured every detail of our visit was taken care of with precision, making us feel truly valued. The food was another highlight: each dish was expertly prepared with fresh ingredients and full of flavor. Whether you’re looking for great service or memorable cuisine, this restaurant delivers on all fronts. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKhxEiYRaNvgCE2sZTdbIorfj2gKpcLESbXR4O&fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Ana Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB7MTy6hJzRER5Lw64do3j-FVTSb3sI3u-0kGStMwjecZMBBKwWg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great meal here! Lovely service from Rita and the food was amazing. We got the Tom yum fish hot pot, pad Thai, and an appetizer platter with a couple of Thai milk teas. Everything was so good! Would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3TatcypZevqgetWe3bso1LZkajBt8Y11Ohi6H&fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Ann Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvn-xEzewwzi5MnaSg9fqfqC8GocNLnb-uO3tOtU-odVbwqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loved the atmosphere and the dish presentation was great!  One of the coolest attractions was definitely the coffee robot, which manually pours your coffee, adding to the experience. We ordered the coconut chicken soup, pad Thai and beef green coconut curry. Loved their coconut based dishes, especially the soup. Very clear winner for us! For drinks we got their pour over coffee and Thai green tea. Ruby was our server and she was very kind! Overall, it was fun and tasted good. We will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZQq6fHRD1tAg75Za1jSxA3pD3d6IE6UpaK77z&fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"马尔柯","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4syA-Xl9wGd2fBI-MP9Hvp_Amxw0QMFGRxMFKAtkG4OfWZE1JQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly staff, food quality was great. Tom yum soup was delicious, not that 🌶️, suitable for most of guests who would like to try out. Seafood was fresh. Seafood pineapple fried rice was okay, fried rice was not too surprising me, however the quality was matched with the price. Mango sticky rice was the taste that I have in Thailand which was a great after meal dessert. Recommend whoever is interested in Thai food.
Parking was easy, back of the restaurant or side street parking is available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyw-XO-FZnfBT7th4oCsBzhi_yyftgEiRKV9nQ&fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Paola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4XrimCFm4PtK_mrrS16PbwFF6YoSh4YLs5FG7yP-UkHhGyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"MJ was our waitress. She was very fast and efficient. Our food came so fast and everything was absolutely delicious! Absolute perfection! We ordered: pad Thai with chicken, a platter that had chicken satay skewers, tofu skewers, papaya salad, pork spring roll, taro chips with a side of different dipping sauces; green curry chicken, and vermicelli soup. Everything was fresh and savoury. Will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt7sMClTRPsRudqgBbS-1wFXRXRHKmLXQfgIgG&fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"CLARA LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0ILRTJhVLrSGhNhbP7yLnUG5OOKMdOcp0BMxOGRysjByVFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"“Today I went to RENS, which many people have praised, but I was very disappointed 🥲.
1.	Ordered the Tom Yum fish hotpot, but the soup wasn’t hot enough. I asked the waiter why there was no flame, and he said the soup was already drinkable and didn’t need to be heated 😪.
2.	The curry soft-shell crab was okay.
3.	Stir-fried kale with shrimp paste didn’t taste like shrimp paste, and the vegetables were tough 😢.
4.	Mango sticky rice with coconut milk was very ordinary.

The bill, including tips, was $142. After eating, I had diarrhea twice.”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUEyNsDjBA1-893gKFMlSmJwKiikJ2hgClf4s_&fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Michelle Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVIvGyONprhS-fV2IjnaoygalX1P8-qAn8vawz8ML1gD0fJBE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this Thai restaurant, appetizers are a good portion and not oily, Tom yum fish hotpot is fresh, soft shell crabs are well marinated with lots of flavours. Additionally,  I was also super amazed by the coffee making robot. 10/10 experience. Huge thanks to our server Ruby and Simon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfl0vWP_7dSysX9l5IlFUJ6P-bzI9KMG8L0hIY&fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Daniela Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMB4YUQU0RvmyKQwqA9boDszayPHnBhKRgH704hw0ct-9BCx-l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a lovely dinner at RENS with family tonight! Simon was a great server providing us with excellent recommendations. The curry grilled fish hotpot was incredible! Super aromatic and flavourful. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO55DT5iiXQWqCzjriKH6GB3jqcklNAk1vETTjH&fid=0x0:0x28438971892ecfbf"],"When":"2024-11-17"}]

title: No. 1 Beef Noodle
descriptions: Relaxed cafe offering Taiwanese fare & a dim sum menu, plus teas & smoothies, with delivery.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Innsbruck A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfBHpT0Z4m7H2I3G0xUSha_BPZ0NBXCI6vqj7nINfjcFSQPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional dining experience! The customer service is outstanding—warm, friendly, and highly attentive without delay. The food is absolutely delicious, bursting with authentic flavors, and served in generous portions. It’s a fantastic value for the quality provided. A must-visit restaurant—highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXgpY1hm4aE9Vo8o-YqUUEw4hkLaFo2qUIHGOD&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"● Taste ★★★★★
● Price ★★★★☆
● Kindness ★★★★☆
● Comfort ★★★☆☆
● Cleanliness ★★★★★

On Sunday, the restaurant seemed very busy, and there was a wait to be seated.
Once we sat down and ordered, our food arrived in about 10 minutes.

The taste was excellent, and the food was truly delicious.

As for service, there wasn’t anything particularly notable beyond the essentials. The server brought us hot tea and cups when we sat down, took our order, and delivered our food—there wasn’t much else needed.

However, the manager stood out. He asked if we were enjoying our meal and greeted customers warmly, managing the busy crowd with care.

The prices seemed a bit high, even considering the quality of the beef. Almost all ingredients were pre-prepared; after ordering, the noodles were boiled, and the ready-made ingredients and broth were added.

Parking is very limited.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsCttMiYuDwwVHq0Dbj7qfvQWNkp_xxKVzsPU&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We've dined at No. 1 Beef Noodle for dinner several times, but this was our first time trying their breakfast, and it was quite a pleasant surprise! Normally, the dinner crowd and long queues deter us, especially with kids who aren’t keen on waiting. Opting for breakfast turned out to be a delightful decision.

The breakfast menu is impressive, offering a wide variety of choices and different combinations that cater to diverse tastes. We tried the pork chop with black pepper sauce, and it was excellent—perfectly cooked with a flavorful sauce that really hit the spot. The highlight of our visit was the special 11% discount offered in celebration of November 11, which was an unexpected bonus that made our meal even more enjoyable.

If you're a fan of their dinner menu, I highly recommend giving No. 1 Beef Noodle’s breakfast a try for a tasty and more relaxed experience. The ample choices and great food are sure to start your day off right!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ3pPIwcLh8sCdawZeJ2ZMwZLwfhF74WXbed7r&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Sip Somp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwgL5vmiYKzVQ7BKwYO70yLRJwmbgUmpttU-CcoTZiuB_KS0AS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a good place to eat reminds me of when I was in Taiwan I ordered z2 and made it a combo I shared everything with my wife . They give you so much food the portion is huge and it’s so yummy it was worth the drive from Surrey. Everyone here made you feel like at home always asking if you need anything the price is reasonable. And the stinky tofu is so good if they had a place like this is Surrey I will be there often this place did not disappoint us at all. And the bubble tea is so good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNORcZuwyDcgPPbCX6AUD3kBfn5u-N4U_s11cbC&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and service is very good for an Asian style restaurant. I would even say it competes with some of the fine dining restaurants.

The price point of their main menu is a little on the higher end though and they don’t accept credit card

They have happy hour bbt after 9pm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkftMPbskufEMx_rC9S-zHhLECH2ohGqjm_CSF&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Kevin (KC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrZpzDcm4xbgvb_oOynyP_bQvwIe7l-wMoPIs8L4UeVZ-waBkO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious Taiwanese Beef Noodles! 😋

Had dinner here for a friend's birthday and the food came fast and hot! So fast in fact, that another friend and myself started sipping on our broth before we could even pray over it! (oops, sorry Jesus) 🙏

Anyways, the beef noodle soup I ordered was excellent! I went with their house special with wontons and hand sliced noodles. The broth was hot and didn’t taste too artificial. Portions were good as well.

We also ordered several fried baskets like chicken baskets and squid baskets to share amongst ourselves. The portions were so large that we couldn’t finish it even though there were quite a bit of us there. They were hot and crispy and really complemented the soup. 🦑

Service was also great, they allowed us to combine the tables together so everyone can eat and enjoy staring at each other while we celebrated our friend’s special day. They even played the 'happy birthday' song which was great!

The interior and lighting was also nice. It was modern and brightly lit and seating was comfy.

The only con I would say is the parking. I would advise to park at the BCIT parking lot nearby and just walk here during busy hours because it's a nightmare finding parking here when every Asian person is parked on a lane with their hazard lights on.

Overall, this was a great establishment to have a birthday dinner with lots of people. Food and service was good! 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwD8ndTdSs4UEKHhQCj-K-mi0jEg69yZR7BZXm&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Nita Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUhGTdmBM9jecfEcbpSqwrLDk0DxAV7yZiQfjEnrY15rN22_Ml3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was a friend's gathering, so we ordered a lot. I came here for Taiwanese-style deep-fried stinky tofu, which tasted very similar to what I had in Taiwan!
Other than that, other foods are nothing special. Some are too salty, and some are too dry to eat.

There was an event that followed their Instagram account to get honey green tea. It’s way too much sweet to drink😵‍💫","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCprK8cuhHCk6AhEk9QLydiPc0GcjN7GudJ_5M&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"annika c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8_ev36h_VFaGPY3EJZcCdDLkhZuxa-k6E5onyQouuGXJ9O65f2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"During my recent visit to No. 1 Beef Noodle, I had the pleasure of trying a few dishes that truly showcased the restaurant’s attention to quality and authentic flavors. Here’s a rundown of what I experienced:

The first dish was a beautifully presented plate of clams paired with slices of sponge gourd, all nestled in a light, flavorful broth. The clams were fresh, and the subtle sweetness of the sponge gourd complemented them perfectly. The lightness of this dish made it a refreshing starter, ideal for those who enjoy delicate flavors.

I also had clams in black bean sauce. This dish had a rich, savory profile with a slight hint of heat. The black bean sauce was robust, yet it didn't overpower the natural taste of the clams. Topped with fresh green onions, this dish was a delightful contrast to the lighter first course.

Finally, I tried their beef noodle soup with pickled greens, I think it was A2. The broth was deeply flavorful, likely from hours of simmering, and had a wonderful depth that was both comforting and satisfying. The addition of pickled greens brought a tangy, slightly spicy element to the dish, balancing out the richness of the beef and broth. The noodles were perfectly cooked, and the beef was tender, making each spoonful a perfect bite.

The service at No. 1 Noodle House was equally impressive. Stone, Lucy, and Lily were attentive, friendly, and made sure that every aspect of the dining experience was seamless. Their recommendations were spot-on, and they truly went out of their way to ensure we had a great meal. It’s clear that they take pride in their work, which added a personal touch to our visit.

No. 1 Beef Noodle offers a great selection of well-prepared dishes that cater to a variety of tastes. Whether you’re in the mood for something light and refreshing or rich and savory, there’s something here for everyone. The food presentation is also noteworthy, with each dish arriving at the table looking as good as it tastes. Combined with the excellent service from Stone, Lucy, and Lily, I highly recommend giving this place a try if you’re in the area and craving some quality Asian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ_QiwvhZe0gBoNEfgehVEjSmDfO-mTYXGzvOs&fid=0x0:0x6a548458c192f1e6"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]

title: MACU TEA- Burnaby
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at a Macu Tea now that they have a location closer to home! I believe they're still in their soft opening phase, but they didn't have any noticeable issues when I stopped in (around 5 pm on a Tuesday). There was an orderly line, but I only waited around 5 minutes for my 2 drinks. Staff were promptly filling orders behind the counter!

The seasonal King of Mango Smoothie was great! The mango was sweet and easily able to consume through the straws! The grapefruit added a nice tartness. I wish there was a bit more green tea jelly in the drink, however. Also, the straw I was given just barely cleared the lid on the cup, which made it a tad difficult to drink. I'd return for the smoothie or to try another drink on their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW95RghpM9SUtuGpQn9HiXNcxIhVzyZxd6H6_z&fid=0x0:0x6370eb879fbad9d0"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice spot to hit up after hotpot in the Metrotown burnaby area. Has an excellent selection and variety of drinks. They are currently switching their menus so mango isn’t readily available anymore.

Ordered the chi chi strawberry smoothie. It was superb and I highly recommend getting it. Has a nice cheese foam and excellent sweet tasting strawberries. Looking forward to their grape menu coming up in the fall.

Service a bit slow at this location compared to Richmond but they recently opened up so I’d come back again and try other smoothies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXXRxLrHQkhER4X_WnHG0YdPMnmvNNyeXbxgon&fid=0x0:0x6370eb879fbad9d0"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Clara Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoMWRC0cDGP4nCpQ1_Zdm86daXS0A0KJbVAa9QczqqbfD7fWIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A new MACU just opened in Burnaby today so expect slower service compared to the other locations for the first while. Got the King of Mango Smoothie and it is so refreshing on a hot summer's day. It's filled with mango puree, mango chunks, pomelo pulp, green tea jelly and coconut milk. This drink is seasonal compared to their other drinks on the menu. Can't wait to try some of the other items once mango season is over.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOv-2QfEvuzQMdKYOKJwe6oGD5s7o6dBnJlwvX&fid=0x0:0x6370eb879fbad9d0"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Wing Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3CwQO9cN_VmYBk6QsIpDB_ChUQLMcdHTqcHBMFHLumtEVmGxm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy a location in Burnaby has finally opened up, I love MACU TEA, specifically the King of Mango smoothie, but could only previously pick one up in Richmond or downtown Vancouver. This location is much closer to me, and the drinks are just as great as they are in the other locations!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_31w92mESCDFS5vJupEfdNpktFpehFDeUpDJe&fid=0x0:0x6370eb879fbad9d0"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A friend referred me to Macu Tea in Burnaby and it did not disappoint. I tried the ceylon milk tea. Prices were decent and it took about 10mins for my order to be done. I like how you can order on the large screen. Only down side is that my order did not print a ticket like it said it would. Luckily there were only 3 ppl ahead of me and they were able to keep track of the orders.

I'll need to go back and maybe add an extra star for another drink or consistency or printed tickets.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUd3VNtC8MbGbQMYrBFgZfdcRS9Z1KhzWSeznx&fid=0x0:0x6370eb879fbad9d0"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Yuyi Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9mKhVdqGTy72WgGX2-Invie3tHIzhMPoViFvQjRpYf96CgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wow I was so impressed with this shop - we waited for 20 minutes for this drink. People who ordered after us got the drinks before us. We asked for no ice, but the drink came with ice. And guess what? The best part was it tasted like water. Never had this kind of experience at any bubble tea shops that we have gone before. Definitely the most deserved one star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbxBHv13F_HvgOl5VxmcbHrJtWHFVcMEZYvRny&fid=0x0:0x6370eb879fbad9d0"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A new kid on the block.  It was the soft opening and it was a pretty long lineup at 730 in the evening.   I have never been to the Macu chain before, but now I understand what the hype is all about.

They have a very extensive menu and it takes a few minutes to look through, if you haven't been there before,  so be prepared.   🤣

No human to take your order, but the computer system is pretty self explanatory.  Order, take your number and wait.   They had 8 people to make my drinks, so the wait was not long at all.  Their system works well.  They are like a well oiled machine, in a assembly line.

Very flavorful drinks, not adjustable.  So what you order, is what you get.  No fancy half sweet, less ice, blah blah blah.  Although their default is very good already.  Not too sweet at all.

King of Mango Smoothie had a lot of stuff in it, but would have preferred more coconut milk and grapefruit bits, but overall, still very good.

Bo-Bo Mango Smoothie had a lot of mango in it as well.  Also not too sweet.

Parking was okay, except there was a lot of very "special" drivers in the parking lot.  So be very careful driving and also when trying to park.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkf7YyKox-VdLgbZnnCS2l-AUSY8dQzob78toO&fid=0x0:0x6370eb879fbad9d0"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Anito Pookino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqEDkp5ONz5PA7ODrupm52ENAJzIJ740hTdqZPeHgzTmxC7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I wasn’t able to try their summer mango smoothie which is disappointing since they’re always sold out. The grape smoothie has always been delicious and worth the wait. However I tried to be adventurous and tried their yalkut passionfruit tea and it was the absolute worst drink I’ve ever gotten. It was so sour. Makes me a little nervous to try anything new besides their featured item. I wished they’d turn down the music a bit cause it makes it harder to hear the clerk call out the numbers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdp1rNuL0F477ZXB54ruccz57K_rXp1f16pPQo&fid=0x0:0x6370eb879fbad9d0"],"When":"2024-10-6"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andrea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRpTtHq9q5PjsSCaRqowcpzS-f_BGlzipUUe-JY0ZdDRuJhUM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Bubble tea:
In the beginning, I liked it a lot, but over the years, I found their bubble teas are basic as many bubble tea shops opened up. Visited many times at this location. Overall, it is an average.

A big selection to choose, sometimes they have new ones. Sugar, ice and toppings adjustable with two different sizes for cold.

I love their salted egg yolk sesame drink. It was not overly sweet and not too rich, but with both flavours present. I think this is the best creation I had at Chatime.

Favourite flavour:
Roasted oat milk tea with half grass jelly and pearls. (30% sugar, 0% ice)

Service:
It's not too bad, but not great.

Environment:
Order and pick up counter. It's not an actual establishment that

Other Comments:
They do have a loyal membership program - also with a free birthday drink.

Recommend:
Just for a quick bubble tea fix.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTij8MMTLywZpcPr9WECI9rYppU4OV4W0KhphN&fid=0x0:0xf863ac8ebdf7dbf4"],"When":"2023-8-12"},{"Name":"Julia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcxGHfF_tSiCf-bjz2oQgQj2z4avB_49K__goFPUPe_9jPpm-uvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always get the same drink at all the bubble tea places. I been to many. A few of them were chatime. I always judge a place based on the softness of the pearl. I don’t know if this place is always like this as I been here once. But the regular pearls were so soft and an absolute joy to eat/drink. I will come back to try it again soon. All the stars for the boba. The staff was friendly and very quick. Attentive as well- yes I will take the bowl so I can stab properly thank you very much.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cha time location is really consistent, their pearls have been superb almost every time I have gone.  I really enjoy their cha time triple and mango qq. If your looking to satisfy a bubble tea craving then this is the place to go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1bX8ZiXVcYyUejEnN91xLAMeUlWsb99nFBO6C&fid=0x0:0xf863ac8ebdf7dbf4"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I must admit, usually I always go for a milk-based bubble tea since fruit Teas seem a waste of money in comparison. However, after a whim on a warm day I was totally blown away at the Peachy Lychee Green Tea series, super yummy!! I recommend partnering this with Coconut Jelly for the perfect fresging combo of taste bud heaven on a warm afternoon or evening.
To say this is a new Chatime joint in Greater Van, the staff were knowledgeable and on this occasion made delicious drinks in comparison to others I have visited.
A great location nestled in the mall not far from the food court, would definitely revisit and has improved my perspective on the Chatime franchise.
They offer oat-milk dairy alternative and a loyalty reward scheme which is awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrdhJUjHIej9ECkIapuREjRL1dAuLr55euuBWW&fid=0x0:0xf863ac8ebdf7dbf4"],"When":"2021-4-25"},{"Name":"C. A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnpVvZiJxkAiIrvB6hvzuvxlpUz2HPnDjx554Cl3eSFRE2eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Frequent customer who will never return again. They have no issues charging $8 for a drink (and I ordered 3 drinks so do the math), but wanted $0.75 for an extra cup if I wanted to divide one of the large drinks up into two small cups for my young kids. Yeah, no thanks, I’m not paying that for a cup—your toppings cost even less than that. The other locations have never declined or tried to charge me for this; they’re always happy to do it, and I’ve always returned. It’s been done at this location before, but today’s experience has ruined it for me and I will no longer come back. Nickel-and-diming your customers is never a good idea.

Edited to respond: I was clearly told $0.75, not $0.25.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gere S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqg5iiwcPLFABCnta-bE0o6WJWTF0cQAHZp_bdevujRHfNXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went in to redeem my birthday drink, was told the program has been changed so the customer must make a purchase within the seven days leading up to their birthday. The cashier told me to “contact Chatime in Toronto” to ask for an explanation. How does this make sense? I’ve been loyal to Chatime since 2013, had an Ontario Chatime Elite card and have been consistently unimpressed with the service and policies at their BC locations. Hoped it would get better when the Ontario master franchisee took over BC but it has only gotten worse.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yuan-Che Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLS8NsVsooaNByQlRlOGFhWZM4xZoEoCCqY0VF9pj75HjQ3PQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hi David, I’m store manager of the Chatime in Metrotown. Thank you for your review, we are so sorry about you had such an experience.
We take every issue very seriously, but this cup of Golden Aged Black tea is definitely not from Metrotown Chatime cuz we checked the orders in the last two weeks 9/25-10/6 and did not find this drink.
Could you let me know when to come to Metrotown Chatime.
Thank you again David for leaving us a comment. We will work hard to improve our service and quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhT6MGQW-IKxVXawqF2fOVCGSihP3lngz86CsC&fid=0x0:0xf863ac8ebdf7dbf4"],"When":"2023-10-8"},{"Name":"Jinchen Cai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAkTaGuIBaKsnqPWu-_2v9e15t_xkadDsddRx-i0U3GTJUait-Fw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent Chatime🧋

Most drinks are good, I come here a lot when I want bbt and I'm  shopping at Metro. Better than the little tea house beside Superstore, but now in 2022 is sub-par compared to the Coco's near The Bay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUtnfEHFoS1Vs5ZseDUAgbiGHyYI9MBa8zHEbj&fid=0x0:0xf863ac8ebdf7dbf4"],"When":"2022-9-2"}]

I ordered 4 drinks and there are 2 drinks leaking cups are broken. No wonder you guys need buy one get one free promotion. Sucks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmsAd7i9QkxCMdjeD2YsuPd6k-XUlmvvmhAwSE&fid=0x0:0x9a37f3305fc282f3"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"VVitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqMxih1XfAF_WQrph5bnMipJY4xoPnVDzNiNojijwKwtpO4zCG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The mango slush was disgusting. No mango flavor at all and it was totally runny and watered down. The whole thing looked curdled as well which is weird since it wasn't made with milk (subbed water for milk). The color was also like a really weird light orange and wasn't yellow at all like mango should be. The pearls were also old and hard.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cristina Soares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLF4BdluC0ElyC1yreMB4MINo84Wrry5puxHIXZimwpf3ulZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The attendant ,an Asian lady slim and about 5'4" tall, dark hair pulled up and wearing glasses, was not friendly at all !
My grandson (who is not a regular customer at bubbletea places)placed his order and forgot to mention to add pearls in the beverage and she made a rudely comment by saying next time tell me if you want pearls...seriously?
You are the server and you are supposed to help the customer building their beverages!
She made the drink and it was made to standard. After it was made, instead of calling out the drink she just placed it in front of me and didn't say anything and walked away to do her dishes! I had to read the label if ut was my beverage.

I hope the owner gives her a chance to retrain her especially with customer service.
I posted the receipt so the owner gets to know who was working on that day and shift.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5btx0419PhGrPe64ksdgahZoY54nQ5DlON7EW&fid=0x0:0x9a37f3305fc282f3"],"When":"2024-1-3"}]

title: Chatime Bubble Tea
address: British Columbia, Burnaby, Kingsway, Chatime Bubble Tea邮政编码: V5H 3P4
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice spacious location! Stopped by when there was a 2 for $10 special and ordered the Grass Jelly Roasted Milk Tea, which is a usual favourite. Staff were friendly and helpful, and the drinks tasted great with the modifications on ice and sugar level. I substituted oat milk to one of the drinks and it's a $1.20 add-on (not cheap for non-dairy drinkers)! But I appreciated the option!

In-store, they had a sign about complimentary parking after 5 pm, but when questioned, the staff couldn't answer how to get to the parking area (off which street, etc.). I forgot to scan my rewards card as I wasn't asked at payment, but I contacted Chatime and they were able to rectify as it couldn't be added after-the-fact in-store. Would recommend! I came mid-day around 3 pm but imagine it gets busier in the evenings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP594W33FJp_Flw1gQ62VV4wrDn9O8C7vyj3W4a&fid=0x0:0x8c70221f79a065ea"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Daniel Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNELh4nxWIYmCD_wQixxB062R7RTF6AaWqqKhsY-OTE3Q_Jd5f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yeah, Chatime is a Chatime, but this was the biggest one I've ever been in! All of them have such a great '3rd space' type of vibe - tons of students and people on their laptops, getting more than one drink as they are there for prolonged periods of time. The best way to do business as a cafe!

The 'barista' was kind enough to point out that there was a 2-for-$10 deal going on when I ordered one of them, and it made our decision to order much easier. Would highly recommend stopping by here if you are ever craving bubble tea in this area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Z Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs-pJ1HJcJcEs9CvV5lP2Uh95o0TMQA_oMLKcGyRZlHrF1s475OA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Average beverage, pretty good vibe. The fruit drink only taste like fruit, but contains no fruit. It’s all addictive, definitely worth nothing.

The overall atmosphere is no bad, lots of seats and you can comfortably spend your afternoon here with your friends.

It offer macarons and some other sweats. Didn’t try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjY-uR_uTzEuZbiyliU_IboU-KGpYs6BH42K6j&fid=0x0:0x8c70221f79a065ea"],"When":"2023-5-17"},{"Name":"Mimi So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTzU94uoxrnXt0Fgj4Re0V2eGrn5bqScOB5yV4niw3B9PkOxF7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Busy location. Standard chatime bubble tea deliciousness. Their sealing machine appeared to be having an issue so they had to take a part of the lid on every drink. That appeared to be slowing down their service. Other than that no complaints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHYosUmzigLv2CzvwVfu46fa_nVccycH0A0W_R&fid=0x0:0x8c70221f79a065ea"],"When":"2022-3-26"},{"Name":"Elaheh Mahraban","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM7Oi6ZA5Fr6MkruIzoopb-zB6aVtEKxKffUhhlHzjMxNIqDrL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried Chatime in Burnaby at the Kingsway location. Its a very clean and new place with Big seating area!!!
Very friendly and helpful staff. Good service.
I ordered Brown Sugar Pearl with Iron goddess Oolong tea. Added sea salt creme, pudding with oat milk. Normal Ice snd 100% sugar level. Best combination👌👌👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLBBPCEQU1HYM72uWy67EKcW_YVz9E1iPRVRRW&fid=0x0:0x8c70221f79a065ea"],"When":"2023-2-25"},{"Name":"Patrick T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjeEStwGBBYDVfjE6G8mIEmqCUPQN06go2xtOUmjv8zfwzIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place is tidy and clean. The staff are extremely helpful and polite. Great location and staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNadt0hPcgemRgM11wWqBHUoDAQhNYyaSqVI9JB&fid=0x0:0x8c70221f79a065ea"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Peter Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr0VtxYWL_1hzqRKVbnWoHq8x04Iqx72RF9Y2igxgc1xItxY1HPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been to Chatime many times since it opened from the first day. The drinks are always tasty and delicious. I like to taro milk tea and pudding. The black sugar bubble with milk is also my favorite drink. Sometimes it's really crowded,  so we need to line up and wait for awhile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEipB-kwGSVt8ytcg3SM8k1mqemb-w7VQkCRBb&fid=0x0:0x8c70221f79a065ea"],"When":"2020-10-28"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like this bubble tea joint as they make a conscious effort to upsell the reusable metal straws in effort to reduce waste. I chose to bring my reusable bamboo straw with me.
I wish they would alternatively not provide single use straws or move to the alternative cold cups that have a wider mouth lid with nowhere to insert straws (like some other chains) or provide customers incentives for bringing their own.
I also got given a Lunar New Years gift with a special coupon for my next visit including a bubble tea drinks carrier which is pretty rad!
Unfortunately no restroom currently available to customers in this place or indoor seating.
However, staff are helpful and make very yummy bubble tea options.
Menu is vast, tasty and caters for everyone and is also easy to tailor or customize a predefined menu item to your own tastebuds liking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlyT5pUEmf1YLejANEi-6bcAvVauD9CaQ3AxY1&fid=0x0:0x8c70221f79a065ea"],"When":"2021-2-8"}]

[{"Name":"Tom Schattenzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNBgUYLqScE7c667k4G72POIFWapf46ZBkxyk_OI8bu3uKrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They gave me pearls instead of coconut jelly.

The staff was busy so it’s okay for mistakes. It just sucks because I opened it a few hours after…. It would’ve been fine if the OWNER USED **PLASTIC CUPS** because I can **SEE THE TOPPINGS**","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVa2UCRFCN4nyJHU6hIUZNP6bY4MAZM_czXS_I&fid=0x0:0xd19a21c9a8947d7e"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Jasmine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXgc0NOR79CDmvPsLKZReac22lUGX2znMvh4Y_Frb4eFiFYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came by today and only one employee working while managing a lot of drinks and delivery apps order.
The owner should do better and manage his staff.

Also there is a GST tax break and the owner didn’t change the taxes yet","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coco is always on point! Love this place, my favorite Bubble Tea joint on the West Coast and now the fifth different branch j have visited.
Coco seems to be dominating the west coast and I'm so stoked/there is no wonder why. Consistency is key and where most Bubble Tea joints fail. However Coco, even as a franchise maintains that consistency no matter of drink, menu, location or if it's a soft open such as this joint.
Great service, efficiency of drinks and location where you can go and enjoy slurping your BBT in one of the nearby parks.
I wish Coco would expand their mobile app to BC and the West Coast, rather than just Ontario and offer us loyal west-coast customers reward schemes and loyalty points. However, I do appreciate and love how they do reoccurring monthly specials on drinks promotions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXSRF-oWUVonTCOHTbzbzWLR72lFaH0hZbPQBG&fid=0x0:0xd19a21c9a8947d7e"],"When":"2021-5-31"},{"Name":"Tuan Vo Anh (Antony)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRKENneMlV4jvW9mpDkEcbXtSCrMEj5HXGjM0dOgDvz4uY5Qc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited here many times to buy milk tea.  As one of my favorite Coco branches. In addition to milk tea, you guys can try tea and other drinks such as Strawberry Slush, Sago Mango Green Tea with Crystal Pearls or Pudding, Bubble Gaga is also very delicious. However there is one thing I wish that all teas could increase or decrease the sweetness. I and my friends find that things like passion fruit green tea should be a little sweeter","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCt1a3ysCsGHLFQso99EiQoYL7Y1UsZ1Ap2MpM&fid=0x0:0xd19a21c9a8947d7e"],"When":"2023-3-2"},{"Name":"Arthur Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2r9CejDMfFaVq66-4RzY2OwfMifnwHPOCZPZZ32eEFdzzOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mango green tea is my go to and they make it amazingly! Quick service and having the coco bc app is really convenient to order ahead of time + collect rewards","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nora V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDH7qNm7XfFTfwn1WJYhPi7P1bg4CfpIaR0HbRci5iblqGEyYd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great prompt service and clean store. I would recommend this location to anyone who has a bubble tea craving. My favourite drink is the 3 guys. Give it a try and you won’t regret your decision!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wing L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE-EYWW1IDlf0Cd6b4Lem8srbuJlPKaxK6jZqbwPNtu_xTng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is newly opened so I decided to try it as I always love Coco bubble teas. I ordered the dragon fruit FRESH SMOOTHIE but what I got was a drink with MANY SLICES OF ORANGE in there😰 The orange slices are not fresh at all which makes the drink taste horrible 🤮  There’s a drink called dragon fruit yogurt with fresh orange on the menu and they give me the wrong drink💔. Please check the drink before giving it to your customer‼️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPscDBi1U-zONc-cQlL6llYkiZIn2STwKsPr_dj&fid=0x0:0xd19a21c9a8947d7e"],"When":"2021-5-31"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWriCnYIjUEPUBgoWEzmhOpTyufnz4hJbbcEl1Mc7JWNG8rltqF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There were a bunch of orders ahead of me, but I still got my bubble tea in a reasonable time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time visiting and noticed how cute it is inside. I ordered the melon melon. The shaved ice on top was so fluffy. We also ordered a milk tea that was yummy.

I can’t wait to try other flavours.

We felt sorry for the girl working there as she was by herself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5MG3ClZSWnMIGEJWpsgdlmPuxAWegg08NEqxz&fid=0x0:0x5014e6215407e2d"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Esther W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ44_CjQ6-wehLPc33Ng17kPOWOSFrXqo3jg5WgP7CtwNUYUeR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place to come for dessert, bubble tea, interesting flavours of ice cream. The snow machine was broken so unfortunately, I did not get to try. There are no checks. Cute decorations, fun machine to play.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODpg7LpiGgV1Q8dw_KGIp44yjMjCZXmj5b7fjm&fid=0x0:0x5014e6215407e2d"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Fiona Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwu3yg9yL1FWRef7UsCOoIr9DCSXjnRL2i6w6ryuLF-t4yvow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The mango milkshake was fluorescent yellow and tasted just as artificial. Would not recommend! Ended up tossing it out after a couple of sips.

The dirty milk tea was decent but the pearls are extremely sugary.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9XOQw7lwbBTUBiwCUzyYG1EHTy-7s0zletY7Z&fid=0x0:0x5014e6215407e2d"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the interior design of this place! There was such a large variety of different desserts to get I didn’t know if I wanted to try the ice cream or the bubble tea so I definitely have to go back to visit.

This time I tried the creamy mango ice cream and it was really good. I would highly recommend it. It’s one of the best mango ice creams I have tried.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhchdE0JfP2tlhtUxPCCBKNpCMkOQ_D8_YtxtA&fid=0x0:0x5014e6215407e2d"],"When":"2024-4-10"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have been here once when they were called Teapressu, recommended by someone who grew up in the area. I have fond memories of their Teapressu, so I wanted to visit again while in the area.

I did not know they were rebranded, so I almost thought they must have been closed. I was glad that I decided to go and check it out anyway.

I could not figure out what drinks were made by the teapressu machine, so I had to ask. Coming from Hong Kong, I suddenly had the urge to try their lemon 🍋 black tea. I wanted to try 30% sugar, 75% ice, but the staff insisted I should had 75% sugar instead, as she thought that would be too sour otherwise. I admired her persistence, I listened to her.

It turned out to be quite pleasant, although I thought I could take less sugar/ more sour.

The place was pretty big inside surprisingly. It was about 2:30 🕝 to 3:00 🕒 on a Friday afternoon, the place was empty.

Apparently, you can have a small amount of discount if you pay by cash. I did not notice, I would if I knew.

I was interested to try their ice cream next time. So, I came back on a Sunday afternoon 2 days later.

It was quite relaxing and satisfying to look at the ice cream being stirred continuously. We tried Uji Matcha and Hojicha - they were both great.

This time, I wanted to try again their teapressu tea drinks and I forgot which ones, so I had to ask. However, the staff could not understand me. She said all milk teas were made by Teapressu machine, so I picked one, but obviously, it was not the case 🥲.

We were also interested in the VIP program, but she said there was no more VIP program, it was normally available in the winter only. Then, they could wait until winter to display the program.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXHJ7lKX80RqDVsirAQcGY2gT8JDu7AMXp0rxa&fid=0x0:0x5014e6215407e2d"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bbt was average... I wouldn't come back for the bbt. But may come back to try their ice cream or shaved ice. Cute decor inside with about 15 seats total.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfaTDbY2o5tPN4iHBrXUnc1BD_QwXHvMnuTEyk&fid=0x0:0x5014e6215407e2d"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Eliska Elaine Que","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTScSADvaU6QK9Y64VQ5zXabVwPHSKO-p-974mP5-XpAQaGFYC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here on a Saturday afternoon. Place was empty, so service was very quick. It was very clean and cozy. Loved the Hokkaido ice cream with espresso shots 🩷 will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOftmQcizRffyusy2fXqhsT2y3R6LE1eJcPLvA0&fid=0x0:0x5014e6215407e2d"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"LA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIYe_oayH6OJTzByLiSm7h26iq-FwAcQwzCS33Dj5O8yQglrM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The #11 Dirty Milk tea is an absolute delight. The unique texture of the shaved ice combined with the rich, flavorful bubble tea creates a deliciously refreshing experience. This unique beverage hits the spot every time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmAF-xLJ1IRO_PgJpOBd0dybmO0niFOu2HliJv&fid=0x0:0x5014e6215407e2d"],"When":"2024-8-21"}]
