user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had hey tea for the first time in china and am so glad they have one here! Drinks taste super similar to the og ones in china so it’s good :) my go to is the mango coconut one and it comes with toppings and it’s sooo delicious. Their 100% sugar is not sweet at all and the drink tastes good even if it’s not mango season. I also tried the grape one a couple times and I think that’s what they’re known for and it’s also super delicious, even if I’m not a big fan of grape flavoured things :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL9oYymSLFwydHtz60X_MvF4BxuW5eg4cdMt8O&fid=0x0:0xb8907638c7c4754e"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Hornson C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmdCOdf2WkxshuYZj4HJ9-vQ7jEjZprqyHTmAPfOUXSG3SYvc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"《🧋 REAL MILK, REAL FRUIT, REAL TEA 🧋》

- mango grapefruit sago = $8.99 -
- brown sugar bobo oat milk = $9.99 -

It's been over 12 years since Hey Tea served up their first ever cup of cheese tea in Guangdong Province. Now they've brought their top quality drinks to Crystal Mall in Burnaby for you to enjoy!

They boast using only real ingredients in their tea creations, and you can taste the quality with each sip. Of the two drinks I tried, the mango grapefruit sago was definitely the stand out choice. My fiance noted that every ingredient in that drink was cut up to the perfect size so that nothing would get stuck in the straw. Seems basic, but it's a detail that a lot of other stores fail to pay attention to.

The brown sugar in the second drink was strong but not overpowering. I really liked the taste of the roasted cane sugar and soft, but chewy tapioca pearls. I know Hey Tea is known for their real milk, but I am very appreciative for their non-dairy options for lactose-intolerant people like myself 🥹

Don't wait! Make sure to go and check out Hey Tea the next time you're in Burnaby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0m4XaPuFmnP28SDNB943maaVwi6_WxirEhbTH&fid=0x0:0xb8907638c7c4754e"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Cheryl Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvN7OywIOgBdmkk6UAUdj2t4ZnzVkw9A6vE0EpU3lpnajoA4fzGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good quality! Taste good and they use good ingredients. Could drink this regularly without feeling bad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrK4ftedkyQea-zn3agECmUy1HLo4dTAtSpke8&fid=0x0:0xb8907638c7c4754e"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not bad, but did not surprise me in any good ways. Now competing with so many tea shops in Vancouver area, I don’t know how long they would survive. Heytea is better in China with many more choices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-Ol0cNLh6g015Emc3zZomuKT2x6LRKg67y6g5&fid=0x0:0xb8907638c7c4754e"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4NwD3WHKkuCC32KRJYxL65rVHXz6C_MMeVW83zhD6swCLEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks were good but the wait was extremely long on the first grad opening day. It took approximately 30min to line up and order drinks and then another 60min to receive our 4 drinks during their buy 1 get 1 free promotion. The quality of drink was good. Their pick up system was not working as it was stuck on the same screen. I believe they could have improved that to make it more efficiently for people picking up their order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3zaenygGc83NaGWr9ZVq9XM5ixd_bkWyA6xB0&fid=0x0:0xb8907638c7c4754e"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"gabriela reis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOBKemY58IgPosORhIRB3W3KVIoba2dyjWuJDIkQ9qq6LaSTk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The tea was amazing, I think the best experience I had with bubble tea. I am not a big fan of bubble tea, but this took it to a different level.
It took us around 20 min to order and another 50 min to get our drinks. I wouldn’t stop to buy if I see some people waiting already. It was just frustrating.
The place is beautiful, very neat and I love how the drinks looks just like the advertising.
The atmosphere doesn’t fit with the mall, but that’s it. It was just chaos with so many people waiting for the drinks.
Other than this, the drink it is worth a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA4ibLjrLyotrWTUEiXHpYsw2pDS57geO3Dgbb&fid=0x0:0xb8907638c7c4754e"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Zihao Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJts1KPEWXMdTkwsTSfXhyoZW4rvcCXdj436RNqg7a2dRnOsck=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My all time favourite boba tea! Taste is the same as the ones I had in Beijing ☺️ so glad they have a store now in BC! It’s my happy place now","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3UnT_s7JoAFnp6oEpxqouprBro344K3NdVb-g&fid=0x0:0xb8907638c7c4754e"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty decent fruit teas, not your typical bubble tea. Tastes healthier although I'm not sure how true that is.
On the pricy end, but honestly all bubble tea/fruit teas are quite expensive these days so you might as well get some real fruit.

I recommend half sweet for all the drinks, and I got regular ice because they were sort of like slushies.

**Mango Grapefruit Sago ($8.99): I really liked the generous amounts of sago and grapefruit chunks! Nice creamy texture, good mixture of all the toppings (you won't run out of sago before you're done with the drink). This is my second time getting it, probably my fave drink here.

Very Mulberry Heytea ($8.99): This was recommended as a highly popular item, but I'm personally not a fan. It's a dark purple colour, tastes just like grape to me. I don't really like grape generally. Nice slush texture, similar to the mango one.

Pure Regal Aqua Green Jasmine Tea ($4.99): Just a regular ol' jasmine tea. Super light and refreshing for a palate cleanser.

No where to sit! take-out only. You can walk around Crystal Mall or go up to the food court. I came on a Wednesday around 5:30pm, and the wait was about 10min. I saw that they have a QR code if you want to order online.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZmDWOdO7daYY-nGDyociqXW2Ew5HNAedsNhnj&fid=0x0:0xb8907638c7c4754e"],"When":"2024-2-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hockey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsM3nPNdeQIgwEoi0_S1YkfKiyIpLilO5AuWVaTUcTeDjqGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are from the states and did not know what to order. The guy making our drinks had suggestions and was so nice. No bad vibes. It’s all soooooo good. We all loved our drinks. I had the Grapefruit Green tea and my daughters had the coffee and black milk tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVNcVSb63DxdogI62B2990UBJvQPuLl0-XdrFh&fid=0x0:0x4e821067dd77276b"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhlSS7jPz5zCaOBcdduZUQiQLkdoBrNXd3voRg2PZcAC_6HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bright new spot in a convenient location. There is some seating here unlike many of the other bubble tea spots in the area! The teas are good and I'd recommend their tea cremas. They also offer oat milk for anyone looking for a dairy alternative.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYhy4rF2Auj5TOMAtzMictE_8GPvyRQ9IrucyM&fid=0x0:0x4e821067dd77276b"],"When":"2023-6-20"},{"Name":"Christopher Suppa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzvGs8gP888XN9QfjfDACPqWfAi5-8OTC4hXwRRvcSZgqBGlCjTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If your Bubbletea franchise favourite is Sharetea, look no further than this spot. Clean interior, friendly staff, tasty drinks, and ample seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ5747Xu3f5kww-RxACVEyUCi9bdq8RqeZQZqI&fid=0x0:0x4e821067dd77276b"],"When":"2023-4-16"},{"Name":"Navpreet Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-9M4HLBK5GJqHo3af9qUIJKaRWTEjkHQdnZwsHLyWfCbqnfHD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My friend and I were excited to try crema tea for the first time. We were unfamiliar with the menu, so we asked the lady at the counter for help. Unfortunately, she was incredibly rude and unprofessional in her response. she didnt seem interested in explaining the difference between the menu items. We were so put off by her attitude that we decided not to order anything and left the store without trying the tea. Employees in customer service atleast should have smiling approachable expressions to not out off customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keshaw K. Sinha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDoOPSI2yFkI0sHiu8VOg5OiOXgAwfZLpM7j-53c7OnIWc2sc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just love share tea specially Thai perl milk tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5JvnWtoV--o0W-IVAvx6_jYt-13HNs9kOJcFQ&fid=0x0:0x4e821067dd77276b"],"When":"2023-5-6"},{"Name":"Cindi n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBozaEOKuAekLrMqaUvh_JbE1D9CzBWC7wIO5CXzbb7oNmWg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"At first, I was so glad I found this bbt shop. The drinks are usually fantastic!
However one of the male staff never measures the ingredients. When he makes my drink, it tastes flavourless and off. How can drinks taste good when you’re not following the recipe? So when I see him behind the counter I go to another bbt place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lam Swiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcrpABvkrMV2liUkHTaQXa4k5H2O8MO19I-XneWFRvSSbj_h-o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"No pearl available in this bubble tea shop…… how come?

The drinks are awful to drink as well…..cost us $15…….i will never visit sharetea again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEuIjQu1KMcOblp4GTtY7_9_btTn4T0D_ig_5L&fid=0x0:0x4e821067dd77276b"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"Yu W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_GTgtre2LU0hQ6JZu0FxiuxL6mMBf3ENfvhkP9jEy1_kcd73G=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I called to order a pick up. The staff said the owner doesn’t allow it. I have to come in person, order and pay for the drinks first. The staff suggested to order online. Then I checked different apps to try to order online, but online order was not even an option… it’s so ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: SunTea 新作の茶 Kingsway
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Wasn't what I expected. I have heard a lot about this place. I came to try out the giant size bbt.

Coconut Pudding Mango Coconut Milk Large $7.40 - I got it half ice, but I got it lukewarm. The mango part was very good, but I did not taste and coconut at all, not the milk and not the pudding.

Mega Fleshy Mango Slush with coconut milk $10.95 - Was very good, but came with sago (not too sure why), but also with coconut milk that didn't taste like coconut milk.

Mega Watermelon Slush $10.95 - was slushy and very refreshing.

Prices were reasonable for what you get, but I've had better. Next time I might come back for their fruit teas.

Parking was easy. They had a parking lot that's hidden away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOagzLwrf_l1XAb99P2clYpgwVuFyrTX0kxoFvz&fid=0x0:0xd19a2f43dd8602d2"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Melody Yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdZvnWSut6MSrdN0SnmPZ6FNDtME8P0Fu4V7vpKOThcR_3hZeIog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got their orange slush and loved it. Unique refreshing drink that I haven't seen anywhere else before. Their other fresh fruit drinks are awesome too and I also love their milk tea with fresh mochi!!!!

Also note that they're one of the places that opens late until 11pm in burnaby which makes them ever better","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP40ek-OXssg6Whys4x_x5r8ZjG3GscU2QSGPnG&fid=0x0:0xd19a2f43dd8602d2"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Lindzy Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiu_e3ieVMCPClS8zu8LH5Y2TqgFTkHaqXyZRLPuKUjcPcpUkH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was extremely disappointed with the service today. Today Around 8 PM, my husband ordered two bubble teas, and the cashier’s attitude was shockingly rude. From the moment we placed the order, she looked annoyed, didn’t answer any of our questions, and just stared blankly. It wasn’t until we repeated the question that she barely nodded in response.

There was no greeting when we walked in, and while taking the order, she simply barked, “Sugar? Ice?” as if giving commands, which made the whole experience very unpleasant. Although the drinks were good, if this kind of attitude continues, many customers are likely to have a terrible experience. The service definitely needs improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMujxu0tJ9eJB9iiVPHWniw8DinT1qk0GV7897D&fid=0x0:0xd19a2f43dd8602d2"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Alisa B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPn6VvU_ea9vxw3v9nfcAyQnTOJyedWhLmaiucd5m81L7jcfZqgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got the Fleshy Mango Slush with Coconut Milk. Fresh mangos with coconut milk, jelly, pomelo, and sago! What a treat. The mango tastes ripe and balances out the creaminess of the coconut milk. 50% sugar was perfect for me. There's a lot of seating at this location, but be cautious of the street parking and sticky tables inside...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeD324ElM80bPyLOd-l9D34_bHZ4ZRQKpfzPAo&fid=0x0:0xd19a2f43dd8602d2"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I heard about this place through social media.

I decided to try it one day and wow it blew me away. I got the coconut pudding sago. I modified it with no ice and less sugar and it became my new favourite drink. It was so good I had to buy a bunch more for family.
Can’t wait to try their fruit ones. I heard they are great too!

They have a parking lot beside them. Free.
Lots of neighborhood parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuO-e32udVk-cp6_Br0mj44UUa990RNfCAjjh9&fid=0x0:0xd19a2f43dd8602d2"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Lalaine Sampang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUReXx6_XBAgaywkm8F0NbGVnYBG0C0xzhiQN3R2EyLB-BFPw4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I rarely leave reviews, but unfortunately, this is my first negative one. My fiancé and I visited Sun Tea tonight, October 4, 2024, around 7-7:15 PM. We were excited to try this location, smiling as we looked at the menu. However, the experience quickly became disappointing due to the attitude of the cashier.

While I was looking at the menu, I asked the cashier a few questions, but he seemed uninterested and visibly annoyed. I tried to give him the benefit of the doubt, thinking he might be tired so it’s okay.

The first question I asked was which category of drinks could be substituted with a milk alternative. He said "fresh milk" in a tone that made it clear he was irritated. Again, I let it go, understanding he might be having a rough day.

The second question I asked was whether they could make drinks in the fresh milk category hot, since the menu didn't specify, although I saw hot cups available. He simply replied, "No, we don't make hot drinks."

When it came time to order, I asked for a Sago Taro Fresh Milk with oat milk. He said, "No, we don’t have that," and then looked at his co-workers and laughed. They all laughed…. He probably thought we wouldn’t notice… If Drink was not available, I wished they marked it as unavailable or sold out, so I found this reaction inappropriate and upsetting.

Feeling uncomfortable, I decided to order something else and chose the Sugar Pearl Matcha with oat milk. It was clear to me that the cashier noticed my change in tone, as his attitude suddenly improved. He even offered, "Would you like to make that hot?" I replied, "But you said you can't make it hot, right? So no, it's okay."

The Hastings location has far better customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came back after a while, you definitely need to try their fleshy tangerine drink with 50% sugar! Best bubble tea drink I've had in the last 20yrs. Omg, I love the sour & sweet fresh flavor and the great combination of texture from the tangerine pulp to the soft jelly and the crunchy white boba.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvwBm1MipewY0BelDXEPjoIPu6Z6M3t6xGEIs9&fid=0x0:0xd19a2f43dd8602d2"],"When":"2024-1-23"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my fav bubble tea spots! Tried their honey dew promo summer drink and thought it was pretty decent however my go to drink will always be the fleshy peach and strawberry with the","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlFxbF5fX_KBfBZ9AfuiVpBPI8nZFws0uWtw0P&fid=0x0:0xd19a2f43dd8602d2"],"When":"2024-6-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steven Holmes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIY-JtWy-_cTiruogKf8gFrbx0vpu0LSLUjFFRuOXiTXYGsPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I bought their blueberry green tea with coconut jelly. I like mine half sweet with less ice. It was one of the best bubble teas I’ve ever had! The flavour was amazing. The coconut jelly was outstanding and it cost less than six dollars. It was like $5.47.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKQxzygUvp_vhGQl6H5EbHnE1HFHAlHsUdzcM_&fid=0x0:0xd35603bec81e33da"],"When":"2024-4-10"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is neat and quiet.
The service is quick and I am surprised that their original bubble tea is the best I've tasted so far. I would want to try the other teas next time. They have variety of cakes and pastries too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkPHFIBQqwQNM3o45-zhnMBkNe2LvkZfLmHhCs&fid=0x0:0xd35603bec81e33da"],"When":"2019-3-9"},{"Name":"v l","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdZvJxBhGRMKAh6ZoV-1pNG0RsqEMX0Q7xeTmMWZiQ1-rLiRu7Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had the kiwi bbt with coconut jelly.  Refreshing.  Exactly what I needed on a hot July day.  Will note to come back for other drinks, cakes and bubble waffle next time in the area.  A nice shady walkway outside the skytrain, so this a great location for refreshments!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsFz-qbiTScD_vJQOQzH3Nyb9ivkJRS4Qwd8Dq&fid=0x0:0xd35603bec81e33da"],"When":"2022-7-1"},{"Name":"David Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbiMD0IM7H-PsVj9A6sDABz7-Yqp_KPjKZucsyPrt2y8yPlJlB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Avoid at all cost. The price went up for a lot but the quality is terrible. Look at my mango slush and the those 4 years ago in the reviews. The mango taste like fake fruit. Slush taste so bland and I bet there're zero mangoes in it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqINRdH0hP24howD2jzUWOHq_5bCP_CRyC-2no&fid=0x0:0xd35603bec81e33da"],"When":"2022-7-2"},{"Name":"DIANA forlife","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9uOvh2VBI7nti2PTlo-7v4SWavL67OzeaZzFBQsgoufTRYm_6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a hot matcha latte which I recieved lukewarm and it didn't taste like matcha at all. The owners were rude too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aubrey Tecson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYZwoquRMNGNRKLIpoW_E8t5xsqzZm-D4kgddh9ZGWMiKZhiKr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered mango paradise ($5.75) and caramel pudding ($5.50). The caramel pudding taste okay, but the pictures look better. They have wifi, and was pretty empty when we came. Since there's Covid, there's only 3 seating tables inside, spaced well apart.

Don't forget to get a stamp - buy 9, get 10th free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJDwIZdapKZXIygdmh1cHM_Z2L3q-S_QPMLgtN&fid=0x0:0xd35603bec81e33da"],"When":"2020-8-25"},{"Name":"Tania Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4V0kN4-kgDRjEyM0crKMaIaPMR1zd0kjh1jeoqVvGAkeAMSwX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Taste as it looks, but I think too expensive for just one scoop of ice cream. I don’t know why they removed the milk tea or slush option from this cup. Would be worthy with more ice cream, milk tea or slush.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq0OEF977SD1C5Fh6PnSih5q4m9eT9z87OPVNL&fid=0x0:0xd35603bec81e33da"],"When":"2020-8-25"},{"Name":"EDDIE EDDIE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEgdA0mAp_XgZ-QMBFkpJyTRuTYnhXBwJT4fYXbOaaUFXk1aIqtg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"fast and taste good. nice place to stay and will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCtTln6RyBRohkWw8MdsedRBDcT6qS5uIN3JEH&fid=0x0:0xd35603bec81e33da"],"When":"2024-6-13"}]

title: ETEA cafe
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"minnie li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRoQOlIxvrw__7xun_s22_XplGfNg8u2NALefXOOF5MWkjHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I stopped by this cafe for their lunch set, which is pretty affordable at $18. One thing I liked is that you can get a Taiwanese milk tea included, even if it’s cold, without any extra charge.

The food was alright overall, though I had a few issues. The Taiwanese fried chicken was a bit too dry for my taste, and the sandwich I ordered came out burnt—the toast was way too dark. On the bright side, the Singapore fried noodles were really good. The shrimp, in particular, were bigger than what I’ve seen at other places, which was a nice surprise.

In the end, I’d say the café is okay for a quick meal, but they could definitely improve in a few areas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6EkDES0_2Bo5ZMQZWyk5SM7cqqHQmGv8J-XH9&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My middle daughter told me about a deal for back to school. $6.50 for 900ml bubble T plus pearls for extra 50 cents. Got the Mango slush and it's amazing. Perfect for sharing because of the size. I used to go here quite often for lunch and dinner sometimes pre covid.  And then the old plaza got torn down and a new mix use building got developed, I haven't had the chance to eat here. No plaza parking deterred me from coming.

Finally made time to come here for lunch with my partner and we really enjoyed it. Their combo includes a drink. Total bill came to $43 after tax + Tip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4tmZeW9lCCPxGvdaVpUujpVZGlJBk15RVPmaP&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Winnie Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINVHs0fVRiN-0d7zGSqSrnNpRByXZrpp5kLwZJOApEHbaWww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch with my family. Nice bright atmosphere. We enjoyed the food, especially the deep fried squid. The prices are good and portions are big. If you get one of the meals, it comes with a cold drink! Finished off with dessert for the kids which they really enjoyed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn42DWwiF9bvE0JHvx1PmYR79lD255FqZMaNxh&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Francesca Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqFaunME8eO-WTATDIi7j8aUrmEsiM36P0yCe7j-y7U1Adiq3KVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has officially become our favourite comfort food spot! We easily crave this on a weekly basis. Their menu selection is incredibly. Can’t recommend their pearl milk tea and mango paradise bbts, so soooo good! 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI7lSEi1-2JgxMw4aKre8-WQC14U1JboI7MCYh&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Dustin Nikko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT2m3xWph2o7UaISkK1ZsQyhoCtJGnztHj5w5825o0qNd12sb7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like the overall atmosphere of the restaurant. The staff is very helpful and attentive.

They have variety of food and drink options. Their prices are reasonable and great portions for most dishes.

Can’t wait to try more dishes from ETEA!

**RECOMMENDED Dishes and Drinks:
-Thai Chicken Fried Rice
-Deep Fried Squid Tentacles
-Popcorn Chicken
-Shanghai Fried Udon
-Mango Slush / Mango Paradise
-Hong Kong Style Milk Tea","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxMKH5ooqNBuAZUinvKVbAXwew_Jy0oyMis1pr&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2023-11-8"},{"Name":"Alison Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxhjwnoe6YlgwQpLcRVCMJxcpg3KuJyKjgUT2iseiNYBySRxgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After rebuild the whole building, the cafe looks very bright and comfortable! Same staffs and cooks :) I always come here since high school, and it has been more than 10 years already.
Love their Thai chicken fried rice and rice noodle. New menu has more dishes and new drinks available. We had the mango paradise, and it came with an adorable bear shape tea cube. Ofc, the taste is 10/10. Highly recommended.
Thanks again for all the delicious food and the service is always great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-0-i_vC8NEzLPHPqu0Ni9kqzak7n4qvt-zFsb&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2023-3-16"},{"Name":"Kiana L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8B1t6eqS5aov_gnGfP3I8Vpy_cJd-Di2Fn8rnrEnvnWxyK6Z8ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good, portions big enough to share, really good quality of cooking too.

Got the Black bean chicken stone pot and popcorn chicken fried rice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYc4RpnycTAqWnhAFtGK_6ezwITnRzZYRZwMKf&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Jayne Zhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrBDvenlTf8YZz9zlg_3kyFiB6VT-4HD5XqGdf6Ja0I32jQJk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently received a $100 gift card for filling out a survey for my company, so I chose to share my winnings with my team. Although prices at another bubble tea establishment were lower online, I called ETea with my request for 16 bubble teas (a mix of fresh fruit slushies and milk teas) and asked if there was a way they could help me bring the total as close to $100 as possible. ETea was able to throw in a discount so the drinks came out to just under $100, the drinks were ready at the time I was picking up, and my entire team greatly enjoyed the afternoon treat! Thank you for accommodating my team and making all of our bubble tea dreams come true, ETea! 😊

Additionally, we live in the neighborhood and really enjoy going to ETea for snacks or a meal. The staff are friendly and the restaurant is clean. Our kids usually order the popcorn chicken rice or chicken wings, and the adults usually get the garlic scallop fried rice (ask for their hot oil sauce!), laksa, or curry. Their fresh fruit slush bubble teas are refreshing, and when we ask for the toppings on the side (when we dine in), the staff are always happy to accommodate us and bring us extra cups and little spoons for our kids to pick and scoop the various toppings into their individual cups. ETea is a GREAT space for families and friends to gather!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr-zi_uuavqCiSg5tPzaBdArNLfrMBUxMkdXU&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

title: Bengong’s Tea 本宫的茶 (SFU)
address: MBC food court, 8888 University Dr W, Burnaby, BC V5A 1S6

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shen Angela","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdwp3WYjHPQCRMZqjUnO_DkisitQ2D0q4yNk8CtMLWi5QZgRmz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Christina made me 50% boba milk tea with Oolong tea and it was really good! Also she was so incredibly nice and timely in making the drink all alone for the store front! The boba are chewy and sweet~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5MtNAJPys2MQK5DersezPwmZQJxelRSsnn5s-&fid=0x0:0xa24f5b15628e471d"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This boba place is honestly so mid. I really did give it a chance , I really wanted to like it even as I NEED EASY ACCESS BOBA. But even with the chances , the milk tea drinks did not hit hoollyyy, it was sooooo diluted and the toppings might as well not have been there. Like I needed to get another cup of bubble tea somewhere good to clear my mouth from that tea cube milk tea. When I had their fruit teas , I was like you can't mess this up, but they did, it was diluted af and the flavor wasn't there.

TLDR:Guys just don't come here , just ride the 143 to burquitlam and get coco , at least you will be satisfied even if it too more time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-Z0hhNtoJkr6B_T-jKsFHhV4sIRolwYc1dhDE&fid=0x0:0xa24f5b15628e471d"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Katarina Claes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeAi_brwli38VcynmPbq3tSsAb1Zwh_fu9TUZ2DWTSX1KGvRY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"pretty conflicted on what rating to give tbh. on one hand the drinks are actually really tasty -- flavourful, aesthetically pleasing, unique. but also it's incredibly overpriced... yeah the cups are quite large but paying $10+ for bubble tea is pretty absurd. they have no sizes; really wish i could've just bought a size small for like $5. service is also not the best, but the menu design and art is nice","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were at SFU and I decided to try ordering some bubble tea drinks from the Ben Gong's Tea store in the MBC Food Court. They happen to be on the Fantuan App so I ordered our drinks using Fantuan. I ordered a Pu'erh Sparkling Tea for my husband and Pu'erh Milk Tea at 50% sweetness for myself.

Pu'erh Sparkling Tea: A huge disappointment. We couldn't detect any sparkle in it, it wasn't at all sweet, and was very much lacking in flavor.

Pu'erh Milk Tea: This drink was wonderful. It was very tasty and instead of the usual sphere shaped pearls that bubble tea drinks usually contain, it had these cube shaped jellies in it. These cubes seem to be what Ben Gong's Tea is known for as I had seen them in photos many times in the past before we finally tried out this location of Ben Gong's Tea store. I enjoyed the cube shaped jellies. They were fun to chew on and felt lighter in my stomach than pearls, which left more room in my stomach for dinner afterwards. My one complaint about this drink is that while it was tasty, it was...too tasty?! This is the drink that I had ordered at 50% sweetness. We suspect that they mixed up our drinks by making this Pu'erh Milk Tea at 100% sweetness and making the Pu'erh Sparkling Tea at 50% sweetness.

Service: Fair
Our drinks were ready in timely manner; in fact they were ready for pickup ahead of the time that I had selected on Fantuan, and the people working conducted themselves with the average manners that might be expected anywhere else. Yes, we do think they mixed up the sweetness levels of our drinks, but people do mistakes from time to time. So, rather than mark them as "poor" for the mistake, I rate them as Fair.

Parking: Paid parking in the parking lots at SFU.
Location: At the MBC food court inside the Maggie Benson Centre at SFU.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmbUYHh2mstlTq3F72VFSb51D6K0ylsj71IUGk&fid=0x0:0xa24f5b15628e471d"],"When":"2022-12-8"},{"Name":"Katelyn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQIwBxiymLsTGTi8q9SuUfVg6cYF3oto9uF9nYpHXKwqlEK_o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"ordered a green tea boba milk tea and it tasted very diluted. expensive af too","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ian Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRD69bLI6epbo8wWFLN_HxNGw8DOAiqjSEQ72lgsfa3MmR2Jk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered drinks and it took us ten minutes to get to the shop which is inside a building. After we got here the store was closed but they accepted our order. Super confused.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwxXAx75IPNPIVaE_q8ohGj6Wd68W--zNqeAnR&fid=0x0:0xa24f5b15628e471d"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Liza Avdeeva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmwVAG2V2X3TCn_Gr-1o2WPtHLVB6YqjvcJ_txbOSIppP62A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The taste of the drinks CHANGES a lot due to the person who made it. I am a student at SFU so I often come here to grab a drink and unfortunately, it always tastes different.
As a customer, I want to get a high-quality drink and not be surprised it tastes not the same as it was one day ago. Sometimes they have a very rich/strong taste of tea and fresh/chewy pearls, but on another day it can be absolutely garbage with just watery taste and super soft pearls. I would recommend the staff to follow the original recipes provided by an employer or the manager.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"nevzat kavak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNDzWYpxGHdfhIjtW746U46FS0DMp-aVUCY3oHrXAMHe5tHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Personal very slowly. Waiting long time.I am driver.i don't want again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Olha Diachek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKapYGpIaHHL_bYwAq1JBs_HDSsE2Hp1SZ1O_3KZuVv9Zypvs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was surprised by how spacious this place is. On a Saturday afternoon, it was quite busy and noisy, but that’s exactly what gives it its unique vibe. I was particularly impressed that your order is brought to you by waitstaff. The team is very friendly. There’s a huge selection of desserts, which seemed to sell out quickly. I ordered the waffles platter, but the portion was so generous that I couldn’t finish it all. I ended up taking two waffles home with me.

The interior deserves special mention. The abundance of fairy lights brightens up the mood, even on the gloomiest, rainiest day.

This place is definitely worth a visit. I’ll be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5-SdGkXj3GbWivZzbkY_2IlQXOp-GBo11NQ83&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Alysa Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcgTm0ud5IEy5AFweNCtfAx_NW6IUKANq244urxoakJ5YPzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cake shop has a beautiful interior design that makes you feel comfortable as soon as you walk in. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, and the overall vibe of the shop is relaxing. The staff are incredibly friendly, always greeting customers with a smile and making you feel at home. Their warm and attentive service really adds to the experience, making it even more enjoyable. The cleanliness of the shop is also worth mentioning, as everything is spotless and well-maintained, which makes the place even more inviting.

Of course, the highlight is the food itself. The cakes and other treats are absolutely delicious, made with fresh ingredients and a lot of care. Whether you're there for a simple snack or a special occasion, everything on the menu is prepared to perfection. It's clear that a lot of attention goes into both the presentation and taste of their offerings. Overall, this cake shop is a fantastic place to relax, enjoy great food, and be treated with excellent service. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQlkV62UIFpdE8hs2hwu1ckZA2mGJag-ImqovN&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally tried this place out and it did not disappoint! We went on a Sunday around 2pm and it was packed, but there were a couple tables available so we didn’t have to wait. Recommend reserving to avoid the wait during peak hours. I got the bulgolgi sandwich with squid ink buns, and it was so yummy. The food also comes with salad as well. The interior of the place is also super aesthetic and there are a lot of seats, and it’s a great place to study! The pastries are also really delicious and we tried the red velvet Oreo cake :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNip0Qa07f4r-TlKrE6qKhz5mGJwAH1aOqBPNgV&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Minsu Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeQw_YhBoAI2Nw8r0LMwW0nIB7-k0xmL7wVLR2dXlH04ac3BEx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coffee was great, they make it with lots of love.
I had a cookie which was very good, many people in seats around me were having heavier meals and they all looked good as well.
The tables are wide, good for studying or working, but after sunset it’s a bit too dark for reading.
Highly recommend a visit!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBXBYe_LYyLjs7bhCJqvipCXDux8aJl7sDFKZC&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Angeline Rafael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNIjGFt3AwM_dbBlrzN87xEqd8MR6IorQ07Mu1L2X8Ih11nQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is always busy and packed but their service is fast. Once you placed your order, one of their staff will help you get a table. We got their chicken platter but not a fan of their soy&garlic chicken. But their desserts and drinks are really good. We liked the tiramisu roll and their matcha latte. 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtkwPk3bDK3tLOAy1n3F8pNttR_FbsDjRBJjoc&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Elaheh Mahraban","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM7Oi6ZA5Fr6MkruIzoopb-zB6aVtEKxKffUhhlHzjMxNIqDrL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a really nice and relaxing time at this bakery. The mango waffle was delicious, and the high ceilings along with the well-thought-out interior design created such a chill atmosphere. Perfect spot to unwind and enjoy a sweet treat!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmj1dEDAV0h4hXUMfuaOLxsuAcGqL2mpHbS5Nw&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Cap Holz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPyOU4gu8e0VDkbUMnKwJdDhYwFFnSKwX2msPVNIE1ol0wz4i8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is really great looking,  but when it comes to taste, it's just but there.  Waffle is very bland, only toppings are tasty.

Coffee is good! Drip coffee is really strong :)

Service is fast but theyre always very full.

Also, 90 dollars breakfast for 2","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO201plN8k843wl1PqhX3BWdkrO8cjU8MAEvZI&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"AIZY A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW63HuUeCCv9sgK_rgm18cZfVwLP0r1WfmUCdIu1jqRWz_XpAFKzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful ambience, everything look appetizing. We truly had a great time. The croissant is great for sharing. We ordered cakes for take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPziO2zFmOZnE5wNv3vMu6Yt--6MCks-ZqU8qnx&fid=0x0:0xee497c0e629fc581"],"When":"2024-11-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Somewhere Out There","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxyC1orGEQvfd-l7Mx11h63qB1QAGjP_8-pjtC_UJ7TA0EluWn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"love the strawberry yogurt. gotta try the other drinks next time. staff are friendly and the place is clean","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWGAjMFzyTv5K6Uj294jOXcrS7nqIstXXlRirR&fid=0x0:0xd3cf5dae9b4c8362"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered mango pomelo sago and it was delicious. Daily fast service. And u could choose amount of sugar","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOde5jYBAJVejnC2nigmzy30m2x2yMdwZaHyvkV&fid=0x0:0xd3cf5dae9b4c8362"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Bao Khang Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-8hJuZCDFIJePGRD8jZwXpNYujvSOsB6SF-4gtO3ksSLSMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I love Coco but this location is terrible. My friend paid for my drink because she own me money so she didn't tip. The staff purposely made the drink so slow. We ordered 1 simple drink but 5 people came after us got their drink first. I work in the customer service and aware that tip is definitely encourage but absolutely not a requirement as this is considered a fast food place. The drink taste horrible compare to what I had at Joyce's location, the milk taste odd as it was too creamy, least sugar tasted like no sugar at all, the brown sugar pearl tasted old. I can't believe I had such a terrible service for $0.81 tips. Probably never order from this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manizha A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC2amaTPsYhEEr9awVR6ZxKWDqTPxYLLvu7b9SO5vvAOcniJoJSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here today and ordered a large brown sugar milk tea with extra coconut jelly, and it was delicious. The place wasn't too busy and they are well staffed. The interior decorations and vibe is really nice. Definitely coming back to try more items on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2NpemnI3vdxELnwRAiY-f_ZcKJ06Tas-7CRtV&fid=0x0:0xd3cf5dae9b4c8362"],"When":"2022-3-4"},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I usually like coco's but this location is kind of mid. Like the milk tea is fine, be it a little bit less creamy than usual but I did not like the pearls. Like if you come here it will get the job done but I do prefer the cha time in this case.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0lzaGFz-FjRLJK8FUb2z_ZlYIVB20NMPZJlJPWMpgLGmBmds=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unlike the other reviews, my experience at this store was pretty good.
Just before closing time, I had to wait about 5min to receive my order.
Since its relatively new store, the place was very clean.
I liked the guy who took my order. And a lady who gave me the drink seemed nice as well.
But I would definately avoid during busy hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLCnIHJKVSJ-x49ojRvt4Q42cbPdtTrY6hcnfS&fid=0x0:0xd3cf5dae9b4c8362"],"When":"2020-8-26"},{"Name":"Veronica Zayas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk1-w2Raq2PcAb5iN95y_5LwlmQ-l2AwWPcR8t9HUeNOqcdoFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The flavor of the drinks is amazing, the service very fast and kind.
The only reason I’m giving a four stars great is because I wanted to change the tapioca pearls for pudding and they told me it was not posible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_UWebkozHER3YJrKWGTDT6XQMPkttPCq0h5Sy&fid=0x0:0xd3cf5dae9b4c8362"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"Laila Oqaily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwly-HPnqhQGY9dZdPy3BOxN6B3axzJduBcZibEzCm5gRxrs4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite bubble tea place.
The drinks are just yummy.
Try the sweet ones before the coffee or tea because not everyone one is a fan I tried taro drink ones and didn’t like it at all.
The price are somehow not cheap so every once in a while I pamper myself with one of those drinks. I love the Gaga drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNicA1-ypm6-OgMPhAha4LjrJVHwO4_tRljw0VN&fid=0x0:0xd3cf5dae9b4c8362"],"When":"2022-12-20"}]

title: Café Eggstatic
status: Closes soon ⋅ 6:30 p.m. ⋅ Opens 11:30 a.m. Mon
descriptions: Bubble tea drinks & Hong Kong–style bubble waffles doled out at a modern counter-serve nook.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Carlos Ajoy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXj56wBY1xLPQ20bqQNpwgjeSO2V5tNX7g2abXXBavTb3s8Iinv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited Eggstatic and tried their bubble tea and waffles. The bubble tea was delicious and refreshing. The waffles were also quite good, but I found that the flavor can become a bit overwhelming after a while. Because of this, one portion of waffles can easily be shared between two people. The overall experience was pleasant, and the staff were friendly and efficient. I would definitely recommend this place for a nice snack and a drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQZ8QL1bXxltK_NMhZt8wQVN3wQZQeLedgi0py&fid=0x0:0x82e882dec7402aa2"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Bubble waffles lacking flavour. Drinks as well. We ordered the honeydew slush and milk tea as well as regular bubble waffle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJqqFXgzEzN1pYWavO_pVak3N6dMe7YW3qal5k&fid=0x0:0x82e882dec7402aa2"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have the better egg waffle in the Greater Vancouver Area. Their quality is fairly constantly. I think I only had one time that egg waffle was not that great but just okay.

I tried this Christmas special before the Christmas season. It was quite special and tasty. Its price was the high end side, so it was a special treat for myself.

They also offer drink, but I am usually
here just for the egg waffle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoiCCQxjAlR-il0qPt2q7ACeLx7peCkR_L8gEc&fid=0x0:0x82e882dec7402aa2"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Flo Lii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtRnz3GaTcevfTQqnG6soE-sT_V-eROwUBjNwbiFxrdvUuqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As the egg-waffle chef lovingly (I’m assuming) spread the Portuguese egg tart filling into the waffle iron, I was already drooling.

We went to Eggtastic after lunch planning to order the OG egg waffle but the Portuguese waffle caught our eye so we got that along with a Hojicha Milk Tea with pearls ($6.50) - 30% sweet was just right. I liked that they had a non-caffeinated tea option.

After a 5-6 minute wait, the egg waffle was piping hot and ready. I’m glad we got some photos because we inhaled it in about 60 seconds. The outside was crispy while inside each bubble was some sweet (but not too sweet) and hot fresh egg custard. I don’t know much about food trends or if Portuguese egg waffles are a thing but if they aren’t, they should be!

It’s a bit pricey at $7.25 but I’m already planning on when to go again and this time I don’t plan to share!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrFKMw-nyqgTky0JfhmptKqXDEDKaINvQaDCW6&fid=0x0:0x82e882dec7402aa2"],"When":"2023-9-20"},{"Name":"angel lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1IzL3-IELA7R7E3oFObEFF5jKqUJ8mIkFOIr338r21pBTPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is rare to go to Crystal Mall, and found out this on the lower level, and it has bubble tea and Hong Kong Style Egg Crepes.

The crepes are in Heart shapes, it was very nice and delicious.

The bubble tea was very good as well.

They have daily special too, remember to look for the sign in front of the store.

They have couple combos that have the hong kong style crepes with bubble tea.

It is very nice and would recommended to everyone to have a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM27w_2bYrrscdIIO6WxPBupM4l1-TiP3C8E0Ze&fid=0x0:0x82e882dec7402aa2"],"When":"2023-10-9"},{"Name":"Winnie ThePooh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb2RrdHMIPUzUgI4nwzJWm1ScRCOhwLujq204SDkdRG6DBkgAt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious matcha mochi bubble waffles. Excellent texture. Just the right amount of depth of matcha-ness and a mochi in every bubble.

Also appreciate their hygienic food handling by using a clean glove to place the mochi in the waffle pan.  Probably can be done with a spoon and chopsticks, but at least they did not use a gloved hand that touch everything to touch food, like another place that we tried.

Two thumbs up.  We wanted to try the Portuguese custard bubble waffles, but it was already sold out on the days that we went to get it.  Next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0U0obSVV7gaZg9j6_6ITKqqpKGQ9bUzi_sb8_&fid=0x0:0x82e882dec7402aa2"],"When":"2023-7-4"},{"Name":"Cindy Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6jlJ2-_-6GHAppZsg7B4koHj8fbUdf_fVuTHQwAItU4JSFfPc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Do not order matcha mochi bubble waffle, it’s mostly tasteless with a bit of sugar flour flavour. I am very unimpressed with it. I have not tried their classic Hong Kong flavour yet, but not sure I will give another chance.

When I came in to order the classic bubble tea, the store also ran out of bubble. I’ve never had a bubble tea store run out of bubble before. So again, very unimpressed with their store.

Lastly, the order took much longer than I expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhJpR57VJJ8LiQoHvXfywkAJe98hvElwH0AcRN&fid=0x0:0x82e882dec7402aa2"],"When":"2020-9-26"},{"Name":"J M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_zGAMOi7_Krrx5NX5BJ9UVs_EJI5hzWeZwPdr6_X5_p0_KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This business starts closing their day about 30 mins before closing time so go early or you will experience disappointment. We were there at 6PM (business hours show 6:30 as closing time) and they told us they weren't selling egg waffles because it takes a while to clean.  I think management should schedule them extra time so that the staff can begin cleaning when the store is closed - not when their store is still open. Not cool.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: 101 BoBa - Edmonds
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend and I have been here numerous times since they recently opened.
Food/drink: 4/5 - they brew the teas there. You choose the level of sweetness and how much ice you want. There’s a choice of smoothies, milk tea or regular tea.
Atmosphere: 4/5 - a comfort and cosy area to chill especially when it’s a rainy and cold day.
Service: 4/5 - one of the servers knows our regular drinks selection by heart! Thanks A..! He is friendly and helpful.

Note: if you’re a regular patron like us, sign up for points for future free teas. This location is offering 30% off until Dec 31/24 at this location only. Try one or two boba drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYAjFPVlc9gH5dXU0to9nuuO4aQ4UDztEvg-EU&fid=0x0:0x86af0960b5abce48"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like the milk tea here. However, milk tea/bubble tea is generally expensive. In fact, almost all bubble tea shops in Vancouver are pricey.

If you add pearls or boba to your drink, it already costs $7, and with tax and tip, it comes to $9-10. Honestly, I come here because they currently offer a 30% discount.

This place is still relatively new, so it’s clean. I hope they can maintain this level of cleanliness. There is one restroom inside the shop, and it’s unisex, but it’s clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN95rbqFWrub5b0YCJLF14-UvUqgf9u_jUCyno&fid=0x0:0x86af0960b5abce48"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Janet L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWKHJGaVPtn8RplvUBHBTkTsgAAqKL1DDmJVEUgwoQ2aPHMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great bbt addition to the neighborhood! Delighted that it is a mere seconds walk away from the local community centre as it is perfect for killing time in between lessons. Roasted milk tea and coconut jelly my all time favorite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHbm4EAi4kpf7hwEvknaE32ttKYZaAwBV87-LR&fid=0x0:0x86af0960b5abce48"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Meagan Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkeD0P7aC9itD7RKCsuSCAYeAIQQRXtVjKDeCSHj-p3a3LXV4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A lot of different drink options, decent space.
Unfortunately, the drinks we ordered (grapefruit tea with pearls & mango sorbetto tea chew) both tasted like literal water and left an undesirable aftertaste. The toppings also had no flavour.
Friendliness of the staff could also be improved upon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Felix Jr Chong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFA0tF-FuWzUL9O8CGFiZpoOe9RwfBKWnu86DCaAoSCblfhzc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This store is the best! I love the classic milk tea and the boba is so tasty. Also, the seating area is the perfect place to get some studying done!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImHHzxSS-zAqwZ0c9CSouw4bWICsD6AujQJupXzJ0HiUA3wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like the design of this boba shop. Cozy atmosphere, and really nice chairs and music haha. And most importantly their fruit and banana smoothies are second to none","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEwhSaXShdPl8fH5gC3bTophy6LgaqZAljQXx0nrbtUbWhQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have mini pearls and boba, it tastes good. They also have seating area which is very suitable for reading and working.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fathema Zahra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwvn-2gEpRocZv435CHW62ViPL2N-5pYjujKwjijjS_c1ks6YB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been getting boba from here every day during the BOGO deal, and the quality of the pearls and tea is just spot on every time!

My favourite is the ice cream milk tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0Mkg4qUaIe96_MPLC-ODSL3EgZrnneWwD28x3&fid=0x0:0x86af0960b5abce48"],"When":"2024-11-13"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"JingYi Gao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5Y1E2Gj2kTzMVzFfz3sWFH9IctcE-J9hXfM3DFhcP4KSGoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got a big mango smoothie for 6 dollars, which was cool and delicious.It's done quickly and people are very kind.I heard it was because of a new shop manager。","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPZEzOXPbsK77Tlgi_YwrP3jiKpmwgPltnwmDz\u0026fid=0x0:0x57ebe16a22d25274"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have often seen Big Orange bubble tea when walking through different shopping malls but for some reason have never really had any strong desire to try it. We'd been seeing it on the Too Good to Go app for quite a long time though and finally decided to give it a try. For $6.99 we were given 4 different flavors of drinks in 4 small cups. There was one flavor that we weren't crazy about it but the other three were quite nice. This was a great way for me to finally try Big Orange and I think after this I might actually consider ordering a drink from them sometime!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYvL8pQB5zyl7TF_7E0qvh0INIUOXYXOKh_DZD\u0026fid=0x0:0x57ebe16a22d25274"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Got mango slush for $6. Small granules ice. Slight mango taste. Not overly impressed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXcS2WiyaZmfZI64LM3z-er0cNiv2emIF2OsVL\u0026fid=0x0:0x57ebe16a22d25274"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Ujjwala Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw2puNO1Nm_R3WsqOTjHjKgWn5OZh6qsBrR6IMOS3Cd2kpmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got Mango smoothie Buy 2 each for $3.99 deal. Oh yum yum! It tasted like a real mango with a bit of rawness+sourness to it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr6C429US1PkO9ifl-isDs4T6ExQlGSxWZDcNN\u0026fid=0x0:0x57ebe16a22d25274"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Watermelon bubble tea with milk. It reminded me the taste of faluda. Loved it !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOed7JjC2344Wu52IjnUW-6G3oN5lPwd_bGYANe\u0026fid=0x0:0x57ebe16a22d25274"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Dustin Mulligan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqUE6roNNnOfEuUVQKrKHMNImbFDsEH0kjKf_-JlxIvSpBdPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just grabbed a too good to go order here. I received four small different flavored Frozen drinks. Two bubble tees and two smoothies. They were all really good! The woman working there was very friendly. Overall a good experience and good drinks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anneke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf7QwsWiIv07MZqYNNm4LnrxDYtC3zq514KuP3afwlPyP0KxgKMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The bubble tea was good.  The staff on the other hand, weren't very kind.  One lady there was shouting at some guy because she thought he ordered Milk Tea and not Taro.  That lady talked to me as if I was some brat teenager; and when I asked if a finished bubble tea order was mine or someone else's, she shooed me away as if I didn't matter.  Wow.. Sorry!?  🙄😒👎🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkLM2lY9gHfjWWDN3PAU-81-DWifcJKVBMRgeH\u0026fid=0x0:0x57ebe16a22d25274"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Jenny Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrDXjIsS63IxhOOeqK8teqt_67WSMsrcDkkU3_5slx4WKBzOBV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"worst milk tea i’ve ever had, to be completely honest. thai milk tea was way too sweet and sago pearls were rock hard. first time i’ve had to throw out a drink that’s still mostly full in recent memory. :( and it was overpriced at nearly $8 (!!) such a waste of money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRXi8NEzYOoPZtYkY8kBajBKDuONPiTHiqXhyD\u0026fid=0x0:0x57ebe16a22d25274"],"When":"2023-12-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve been to a few presoteas. I miss the one at Brentwood because they ran very well and was very consistent with their quality of drinks and bubble waffles

This one wasn’t as great at Metrotown. The bubble waffle was very soggy. The drink lacked tea flavour, I noticed the usual “fresh tea” decor was not as present at this location either.

The girl who took the order though was friendly and helpful","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn2hhUX9mDGd5ZLpYA9KTVMlpoIfdsOVV4pyJt&fid=0x0:0x848ac389165c1d5e"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Daniel Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAxFTfz_ZYgM60gsStYArKOb4YgmHuHArMEsVm-TJD2WcKuo33=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a passionfruit green tea with Leche Pearl, the tea is way too sweet, highly recommend half sweetened sweetened or even less.  The pearl is the worsted that I had.  The reason I gave 3 stars is surprisingly good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvExR_sqWBwU5ViR6g9bfdVCmPglaF08P8MjlE&fid=0x0:0x848ac389165c1d5e"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Presotea is conveniently located near the entrance, making it easy to spot and reach. I’ve tried it before but couldn’t remember the experience, so I’m writing this down for future reference.

The pearl milk tea had a mix of boba and, I think, jelly—it was pretty meh. The peach oolong tea with cream cheese on top was one of the more disappointing versions I’ve had. It tasted more like watered-down peach juice with foam, lacking any real tea flavor. The signature fruit tea was also just so-so. It had passion fruit and an orange slice, but I couldn’t identify the other fruits since the cup was sealed and opaque and I didn’t taste the flavour. A transparent cup would’ve been better to see what’s inside. Unfortunately, it also lacked the strength and flavour of the tea.

Overall, the drinks felt a bit overpriced which I wouldn’t mind paying if the quality was great. I only stopped by because I didn’t want to walk over to Coco to satisfy my craving Metrotown was too crowded today, but this will probably be a one-time visit for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7r9ls_5nu37T_cnZ8wNIw_Sp0lZoy4i1FsidX&fid=0x0:0x848ac389165c1d5e"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Melody Tenshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsqN5ua3r0qPdBq12w6XApWiccQoLY0tlFVzhz-B1kJK-To-c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the worst bubble tea, consistently awful. The teas have no taste, just like drinking water with creamer. Didn't even taste any honey. Even last time the drink was terrible (I thought maybe a one off thing) . I'm not picky with my bubble teas at all, but this placed makes me feel scammed. Go to Chatime, Little Tea House, Coco or Boba 101 in the mall for FAR better bubble tea. Never coming here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ice fail.  The ratio was all off and after a few minutes I had no ice left and a cool (not cold) bbt.  Not very refreshing. $7 for basic milk tea is also too high. I didn’t notice the reviews until after but there may just be a reason why the surrounding bbt places had lineups and this one didn’t.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM30nkLKNFgAR4Wd0UdL6TuGy_3zYZ1VJxFCSg4&fid=0x0:0x848ac389165c1d5e"],"When":"2024-3-11"},{"Name":"Johnny G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBbi4rvv-nHDl7H6RXbToA_kk3n9Hj_ierIgyWzQHyZr_63w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have no clue what I drank here. Apparently it was a jasmine honey milk tea. I got a cup of slightly white liquid with a hint of jasmine. I don't know if this was some sort of April fool's joke on me in December but I won't be back here again unless I feel in the mood for misery. Can't even get a refreshing drink after a massive gambling session. I was severely dehydrated after dealing with casino shenanigans and presotea decided to make my night a lot worse. I should have just grabbed the casino honey pack and went to the sink for hot water and mixed it and it would have charged me up better. This place is obviously for people who have no clue about a good bubble tea, YOU THINK I DON'T KNOW A GOOD BUBBLE TEA , I GAMBLED IN TAIWAN. From now on I'll be taking all my gambling profits to Ben Gong, at least they don't treat their customers like FOOLS","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesus Mario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw9EfQQCMzcT2kzd4vT6VNdwHS86pt5SL3ObKHB6HgP1EEqg4Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Despite the many bad reviews there are, I had an okay experience. The tea is good and the service was okay. It feels like they use less boba in their drinks than other places I’ve been. I guess that’s why their containers are not transparent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKBwGkRU7tsoSKnE_br6tPBuhI9Sf_KeQ7ZShm&fid=0x0:0x848ac389165c1d5e"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Maggie Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLYx2g6kEB71ZdRjLBzijZyu3nTLo1WP2sqCdYcqpVoWLjf8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a signature fruit tea with pears and the total is $11. the staff told me pearl need to  add extra $1. But after i got the drink there is not pearls inside the drink. this is not good they charge me extra 1 dollar but i didn't get any pearl for my drink. totally not recommend to buy bubble tea from this store.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"James Inouye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGMUsvXLijMfgZydLJhU2TpG1bqPFbrelq3iJSQAmmOzYoUfG8Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff is very friendly. They make the drinks quickly and accurately. There is also a vast menu to choose from. I enjoy the bubble tea here a lot.

They also have a self-serve ordering kiosk at the front. You can choose different options like the amount of ice and sugar you want in your drink.

It's right next to the food court with many seats. It doesn't usually get busy, so it's easy to find a seat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"argh c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2c34N4-KZC9sfBqKbqJSYJcFxkP3ce_vYTvsj7Y6T7ga6urdW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Just around the side from the main bulk of the food court at Lougheed Mall it is easy to miss Big Orange. My chocolate Oreo smoothie was fine. My companion’s brown sugar milk … surprisingly was not a milk Tea. Also they forgot to specify (and were not prompted about) the $0.50 bubbles add-on.  So, make no assumptions and completely specify your order! 😅","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIyHtdqybC3nwx-DyNQmdUPSuYxN6DKa3VNG39&fid=0x0:0x6efb08acfda87ec6"],"When":"2023-2-27"},{"Name":"Siu Fung Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItKD-WYBKax1ugb1to3bND4OM26THQNmVvaKGSmOO9pdDgEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time at this bubble tea shop was absolutely delightful! We got the brown sugar pearl milk tea and one with oat milk – both were incredibly delicious and satisfying. Their drinks are always so flavorful and refreshing, and the boba pearls are perfectly chewy. The variety of options they offer is fantastic, and the person who works there is super nice and friendly, making my first visit a memorable one. I highly recommend trying their signature drinks – you won't be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin Loh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDBHbWjREW4mJtPfo6soXSqU4vph7_bO1N7Dw3HR4BFnKA3r5R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had SUCH a wonderful experience.  I got to meet the owner/operator, and she was sooo nice.  I missed out a 2G2G order because it was one of my kiddo's birthdays.  Owner said, NO PROBLEM!  Want would you like?  Wow.. Just also had a taste and it was very very nummy.  Big props to the BIG ORANGE!  NOMNOM.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alana Storm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7Zq-phewmqLu0Cb4jrjXoHZNbqrtq3JEHel0kSarFKzpwAB4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful service every time! New owners took over a few months ago (don't know exactly when) but every visit I've had in the past two months has been fantastic. The staff recognize me and have my favourite drink memorized. Service is usually quick and if they're busy they communicate accurate wait times and still are prompt in their drink making. I highly recommend this place if you're in the Lougheed Mall area :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jen S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6yRDu3X2tYRf22dSS2L1HUQ_---VPNFSZyVWrJW6KXuGpfNIHww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Classic bubble tea flavours. Strawberry, taro and coconut along with some fresh fruit slushes. This place used to be cool back in the day. Now they're lagging behind a million of new bubble tea shops that offer lavender and other new funky flavours along side of cool toppings like grass jelly, for about same price. They should at least offer customization (less sweet, half sweet, no ice) as a few times I asked for half sweet, it was still way over-sweetened.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Faizah Ali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2essvISguDNYTN50gMZu6Kk_oZ1cjZimyIdA-yNdPRCMwMWMc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I visited this place twice. The first time they were out of pearls and gave me the wrong flavour drink. The second time they were also out of pearls and forgot to give me my change!!! I had to ask for my change! The good part is the milk teas taste good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marlo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEFgKY9zYX0d9sWop-zO5Hz9Tl_TMp4AjEhL32Pw0iePlL1pWo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible customer service. If I could give them a zero, I would.  Went to order a milk tea with pearls and they ran out. I asked if I could just get my money back and she offered to give me 50% off because she already made my drink. No offence but it makes sense to check your stock if plan on offering a key ingredient in your drinks.","Images":null,"When":""}]
