user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their spanish latte is so good! In the future I’d get it a little less sweet. To be honest, I think this coffee shop is a little on the pricier side. But overall the service and vibes are great🤩

This place is probably one of my favorite places to study and hangout. There are plenty of seats and charging spots.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4xqEZh0djdJFdgYSMpyBmUdblzZ7A1bzScngD&fid=0x0:0xf448061cd198dab3"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Arun & Jayati Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1nRUaNnMhfrJXEHRAsLmucE76xhX7zjbHxTwvQuVl2h1215pD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a delightful place!  Large comfy areas to sit around, chat, read and feel the calm and genuine atmosphere. It feels like home. The baristas have a fabulous sense of humor and always welcoming. The food is clean with vegan options too. Extremely clean and well kept. This is my favorite haunt. I buy my coffee beans from there and they grind it for me with a ready smile. Go and enjoy this friendly place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1dnMFYxdD-9t8xZJzaEDOsCi5bk6BIQCuxDgA&fid=0x0:0xf448061cd198dab3"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"amy s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYgcyWpyGHBvYuOaRvvIYCZkZrtJGCDEvJz1JjzjSgkvyuf1tM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed their caramel macchiato very much,, 9/10! but the lavender latte was pretty bland :( I loved the atmosphere though and their service was nice and quick :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4GslEoNBWvgbbZ6UxqAGDYJ-iATzyVjzA21uD&fid=0x0:0xf448061cd198dab3"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Tsui-Fang Hu (Tracy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ro0txUL1mG25heVUuoyMTMpTlXMMMT4-dXmn5rgUocYrBx5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the atmosphere there! It’s spacious and relaxing, air quality is pretty good (which is my top priority when it comes to a cafe as I usually spend time doing some work). Barista was friendly which made me feel comfortable and welcomed ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkJlKMUr73kT1zcsnPskdBFwO7Mko5TbxidfN-&fid=0x0:0xf448061cd198dab3"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second favorite cafe after Nemesis. The decor is chic, the staff are friendly, coffee is pretty good and the pastries and bread are delicious.

The barista is good with latte art. My friend got a swan in his mocha which was absolutely gorgeous. Sadly I forgot to take a picture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN74gXfZ7x24_tI8Jv-40O0N0gmG5h6iRw-lVL6&fid=0x0:0xf448061cd198dab3"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"tm2cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz_jeSUR-1dFOa4r3dihZ4MBKQB_6kbIY15uMhq9G7Flg1HsA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Freddo’s are nice blended but headsup cofffee are pretty strong. I like strong coffees so I dont mind :). I took pic of menu for update. This is Oct 12, 2024","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN32Xhujs477gcXFNdLXSBOILBwVRbsZdKSNIB&fid=0x0:0xf448061cd198dab3"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice coffee shop in this area. The staff are friendly and helpful. The decorations, seating, washrooms and space are bright and clean.
My wife is so happy with her earl grey tea with pot and cup. They use the loose tea and the quality is good.
My coffee is little cold since it sits in the kettle. It makes me give the 4 stars not the 5 stars.  Anyway it's a nice coffee shop for meeting with friends or just have a drink.
The outdoor chairs are not comfortable enough.  Maybe the busy street sidewalk is not suitable for some bigger chairs there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdL8qWU73XkqWIR9rivlwgbb-YJEJDxVuXkHg-&fid=0x0:0xf448061cd198dab3"],"When":"2022-9-26"},{"Name":"Dhrumit Sheth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9r95Es3YQAlkO6Yw2Yg4R0kNpVi-5oWmckdwTw51wptlXqgTS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing coffee and banana bread! Croisant was one of the best I ever ate. I ordered a drip coffee and my wife ordered hot chocolate. Both tasted delicious! There were vegan option like Banana Bread. It was delicious. I would definitely recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQKX6xkNU6a4hUUrPL0fZ1QqfSkNE7Nh2FZFDi&fid=0x0:0xf448061cd198dab3"],"When":"2023-2-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had passed by 101 Boba before, but was finally introduced to their drinks after winning a gift card. Shoutout to @sadpenguinfoods on Instagram! We had a large Mango Smoothie (with coconut jelly) and a large Roasted Tea Latte with Grass Jelly. Both were refreshing and were August specials! The Mango Smoothie had a small layer of milk foam as well, and while you couldn't adjust sugar and ice levels, it had a good level of sweetness. The cup sizes were a fair size as well for the regular price.

We found the staff to be very friendly and the wait wasn't too long for our drinks. Convenient location beside T&T and near the parkade entrance! Looking forward to returning for my bubble tea fix! Like most bubble tea chains, they also have limited edition drinks and rotating monthly specials at 20% off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFVzSrhDwxgrjOp3NAbje3l6np2G9kqSTtndHK&fid=0x0:0xdf1a5c22b3fe7b9a"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed my ice cream black tea. Too bad did not have mango drink all sold out. Would be nice to have seating like they did before","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm0MGu_APQ_bb_gjf_km-txKoC3MUEk_mrE1-_&fid=0x0:0xdf1a5c22b3fe7b9a"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Nhi Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3mJcYmcoxsPTHbt_qi19dx9edC5Nrq7YxOuPWYZv-dDjrqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered my drink at 5:30pm on June 11, the cashier woman was nice, however, the long hair barista man was the worst that I've ever seen. I don't know if the store has strict hygiene policy or not, but scratching your face and touching your hair while making drinks for customers were untolerable behaviours for barista! I tried drinking the boba but end up at throwing half of the drink to trash bin, not to mention the flavour but the hygiene factor of him which disgusted me. Moreover, saying thank you is a simple courtesy practice at f&b industry, but he handed me the drink like I pegged it for free with his cold face without saying anything? If I could rate 0 star for his service, I would do it voluntarily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ_mmrNROchgB961DHO6rQ7ZIVtl165_TL3qty&fid=0x0:0xdf1a5c22b3fe7b9a"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The bubble tea flavour of the taro smoothie and strawberry smoothie were both good. It’s a bit pricier than preferable and the tipping option when you pay takes place before you get your drink when you are picking up your drink anyways so not a fan of that type of store culture. Tipping for pick up and take out these days seems to be normalized and detached from rewarding good service to becoming a mandatory tax at this point.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxj1LZDB0mSHd33pujRSduR5PTLrPWQfC4YRTS&fid=0x0:0xdf1a5c22b3fe7b9a"],"When":"2023-6-8"},{"Name":"Johnny G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBbi4rvv-nHDl7H6RXbToA_kk3n9Hj_ierIgyWzQHyZr_63w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking all over the mall for the most refreshing tea and I saw 101! I decided to try the lemon black tea and it was amazing! That is the style I like. Finally I can drink something that will help wash away all my negative gambling session thoughts away. I can afford this tea after my gambling sessions. Sometimes I lose my shirt but I have just enough to afford this tea. Thank you. I will be back to try other ones.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKXRLhc_yL--9aJYGAiCCM5HT4dm39HtMS2Tmc&fid=0x0:0xdf1a5c22b3fe7b9a"],"When":"2023-8-12"},{"Name":"Priscilla Yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl3bn5G8NS35bs-ANa90rLmgtf3hjQOsbIo_KxdoMVlLPP2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great interaction with the staff @101BoBA at Metrotown. Efficient, friendly and well staffed, they were able to get our drinks out quickly and they were all delicious. Very generous with the toppings.

My favourite was the Mango Smoothie. Refreshing, not too sweet and perfect for the summer season. They have 20% off deals for July so its the perfect time to check it out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aurora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUltwBVXZGJs21WSY9_zUWTgMlT0BkkgXXjANnYyEWgROAMOQi0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a cup of pearl milk tea, but the tapioca taste like putting in refrige for a while or didn't cook well.
You have to be aware of how to the quality of those pearl please","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"NerdyPeanuts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViVpUfrQw7bn8Mp5MqM4G4OAGHB554PGOoMsXQ9jJl5whTTiLI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's hard to find bubble tea under $6 so their August 20% promotion made me give this place a try. I tried the Ultimate chew with 30% sugar and it had no fruit taste no tea taste with a hint of sugary after taste. Wasn't pleased with the drink but had lots of toppings which were appreciated and conveniently located beside T&T.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Yi Yan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaUnUj66Q-nB9gItMITbhEaURyAzuwiaYvjAuomGD99Wk9mg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent caramel macchiato. The barista got my order wrong the first time, but apologized and quickly made changes once she realized. Good food and service. She also added in a loaf that was on the house when handing me the correct order. Would have given it 5 stars without the loaf, but the loaf was a warm touch
The barista there that day I think deserves a shoutout ! ( was there on the 21st )","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxhdzBgLxS8pmE0jQQDcAzdNjlofJOZ3xHaawErEjpCtXKbd0c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy!!! Located inside lougheed station, a great snack stop. They have everything! They have real boba (real ingredients not artificial syrups), I got their Tuna Gimbap and Banana Taro (requested this combination myself since they are flexible) great price for the size. Friendly service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"To Bi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG9YXknA4Ejwm5uZKeZHNncaXS8JroQrSRlgT3TSuGivkpfI6D=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I often stop here when I’m transiting and need a snack or caffeine boost. Great drinks, lovely staff. Couldn’t recommend more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zafu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSAqNtY0uFFoaVggDCayyzujNHhmDZNEyUSx2Hi78z7E1PbnbHkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I once visited a cafe to buy tea, and as I exited, I tapped my card to pay. To my surprise, the owner chased me down, accusing me of stealing. Confused, I went back to the cafe and discovered that my card had been declined due to issues with my bank.

I apologized to the owner, but he simply said, "Don't do that again," without letting me explain the situation. Feeling uncomfortable and unwelcome, I paid for my tea in cash and left, deciding never to return to that cafe. The owner's rudeness and lack of understanding left a negative impression on me, making me feel unwelcomed and disrespected. For $2.50....","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sylvia M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT4SmzPwvp9N3YriJJxIHeHADgrrZYZByQwiOuqmal1oBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been a customer since they first opened. Have not been there in a while since I moved. Today I was in the area and decided to drop by. I'm happy to see this cafe is still here! I remember being served usually by a kind man. This time it was a kind woman. Have a good day 🙂","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jace Dapat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdveLR53qyaX5piwopdQuhrk3pEoJ3iIvwu-dvd1odOfhcpgI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy cafe situated in the Lougheed town centre station. I bumped into this place by accident after trying a different commute route and now I have changed my commute route just so I can go to this place.
People complain about the prices but as a barista who has worked at 5 different cafes, I think the prices are pretty fair. I always order an iced oat matcha latte and it always hits the spot. The people there are always so polite and nice, and they have tons of food options. Love this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jax Bohlander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF2r1PftniaxRK0JOQ2Ui3fpQ4-WHw0ag0vlP82ee8F0yn3BA8xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful little coffee/tea house. Kind, helpful and pleasant staff. A quaint little tea shop, lots of goodies, fruit, snacks and drinks. Perfect place to stop, take a break from hustle and bustle of the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiKTaP_umjpal3b_2p2m9ZhAdqwAA0VAKxJkcc&fid=0x0:0xa0e25df6ffe639eb"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Kat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9KU6JHMNV2dJVHVeBb2rvEzltNXWG-yaPrGGgPwOBW0ejMgGu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The people here are awesome! Friendliest service I've received like anywhere ever. Their prices are very reasonable as well. I pretty much go out of my way to come here on days that I have class. Gotta get my mango bubble tea with mango jelly lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsIn7xwDTjlMlD8arWjBgoU6OzMUp-xY-Xqc9O&fid=0x0:0xa0e25df6ffe639eb"],"When":"2022-11-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the Cookie Croissant, Earl Grey Scone, and a Mocha Cube Loaf. For drinks we ordered a Spanish Latte.
We are really impressed by the quality of both the food and drinks here. Starting with the Cookie Croissant, slightly difficult to eat since the cookie part was quite crumbly, but the filling was generous and the flavour was rich and delicious. The scone was a big surprise to us - it was served a little warm, and the inside was super moist. The earl grey flavour was also very pleasant and strong. The Mocha Cube Loaf was moist - the texture is quite like a banana bread but mocha flavoured, but this probably has the most subtle flavour out of everything we ordered.
The Spanish Latte came with a very cute bear latte art. Coffee was strong and rich, and is easily one of the best Spanish Latte we have had.
We will definitely revisit this place for the rest of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHsy3VXVWPc0EglzzV1sjQYMnCz-1qh9Jff_8D&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jack Bi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZ4Bsv7wnjfj756aRVvVyi5fPfQhBIMCe6kqNdp4pTbIyytg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Discover this little hidden gem that boasts an incredibly friendly staff ready to make your visit unforgettable! The relaxing atmosphere invites you to unwind, while the quality food, beautifully presented, will tantalize your taste buds. Come experience the magic for yourself!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo3cdEHEaE146TNPhCu_Puo1iHKPtRxhC_8Zts&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Josh Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwN2UTX5SU22zHdtHwOol-T1Tx2CdUZ3GytOPSGZ_wa4QkAjU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to many cafes, but this one really stood out. The macarons were absolutely adorable and tasted amazing—each one was like a little work of art. The sandwiches were fresh and full of flavour, perfect for a light meal. The cozy atmosphere and friendly staff made it a great spot to relax. Definitely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0rPepiaI_U5rtdcULMftT0ij8QcobtQmcnexZ&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Kate Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-qqECY5zyYXmAqCj-k4FLrMuqdLUFPr-e1buJmYYfmvaZsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is like a hidden gem. I found it while searching for a place to have brunch. The mushroom avocado and salmon avocado sandwiches are on another level. The ingredients are so fresh and plentiful that it's hard to take a bite. The balance of the sauces and the crispy bread is excellent. I ordered a combo, which included a fresh salad and tomato soup with the sandwich, and it was a perfect match. My daughter's choice of the ham panini was also delicious. The vanilla latte was smooth and had just the right amount of sweetness. I'll definitely come back when I visit Vancouver again. Thank you to the friendly owner and the staff for creating such wonderful memories for our family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzAIiFiNAlD-yA9l7Okn-Z-V_SbAP9AI3UriNO&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Kenny Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkKTuOESfGudPEm0-BDzQVkIamalgjsSUzE_II9VRplB0iEEX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this cafe in Aug 2024. Fancy little bakery. Good selection of coffee / non-coffee drinks, with small bites available.

We had an "iced latte" and a "real lemon tea" (but there wasn't tea I guess?), a cube loaf (Earl Grey flavour).

Drinks were decent, cube loaf caught us with a bit of a surprise. Warm, moist and rich in flavours.

Good alternative for chained stores like Starbucks or Tim Horton's. Likely to visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMApsVR7WXUTaE8Q_xKvvHp4jLrmmYNMx_k_AHE&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Mattisse Weyler-Hubert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9gJNuDMC-TgqAXQXLf7KWHT1ycRW5rq4CfBrHxm8LTiT_0fjDNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very cute cafe with some delicious looking baked goods that I have yet to try. I had the cranberry chicken sandwich and my partner had the salmon avocado. The presentation is beautiful! My small note would be to cut the tomato into slightly thinner slices and spread them through the sandwich so I don't have to unhinge my jaw like a snake to take a bit. Also my partner mentioned that her's could have used a bit more salmon, but that being said both were delicious!
We also ordered oat vanilla lattes which were very tasty. The service was great despite being busy and we'll both definitely be coming back to try more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-VPi7f563T-CLwYFmWIgklnAoArFHSI0RuXSw&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Jayden Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfxPbqGM6eAJPan1ykBxu1WdZiDSJ5H4jU_Lmw66QM6XcLJ4I0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a cute cafe! You can tell they put a lot of effort and love towards every baked goods and drinks they serve to their customers. They have the cutest looking macaroons, scones, loaves, cookies, and croissants🤍🍪🥐🍞✨ friendly staff and artistic owner🫶🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqEk5Nm5-1PdV-HbjabRHq2f5bM-pbKiZjTMp9&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"BR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKvHcZB7xb4n8CF1jxejOIwoYqPKN4SdZc0qIjcZcbAYMjdkneNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bacon & Avo Grilled Cheese Sandwich is a must-try! I highly recommend this meal. The combination of crispy bacon, creamy avocado, and perfectly melted cheese makes for an unforgettable sandwich. The coffee is always very good as well, making it the perfect complement to the meal. And if you have a sweet tooth, the cafe offers a wide variety of delicious sweet treat options that you won't want to miss.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFN9BgyPk_ssXzmXykwMaoqJVfEUF_ALsbK_4D&fid=0x0:0xbefc4217b6347d6"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fady Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtSa8909Zvb8JHUTGGVcRXnet67ACdiu-ilSLWe7UkrDATPic=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"very nice place they have very good service. I love this place. I come here a lot. They have fresh ingredients. There is lots of parking around it.
Also, very nice music reasonable prices
We've been today with my daughter. She got a hot chocolate. I got iced tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuTfHg6F6bnm06K2PHh-rpx1QsGPSxOn19Qos&fid=0x0:0xa9375dfb83c12bb6"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The vibe is super cool, modern, cozy and laidback. A very new and upcoming chain location and is by far the nicest I have visited beforehand.
Im an avid fan of this fantastic chain and awesome coffee joint so took FULL advantage of grabbing a To Good To Go haul and boy did I get a surprise! A filo'loaded Pastry army equipped to take down anyone, fantastic value and great, fresh products made from natural and minimum ingredients. I managed to pickup:

Spiced Apple Pumpkin Muffin
Candycane Muffins
Cappuccino Loaf
Pumpkin Orange Scone

Everything was super yummy, wholesome and fresh with great flavors of home baking style goodies.
Definetely recommend and will always return!
Support Canadian businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIxg5JbLCzHviJ3cmVLRZPC0dgDkO9PBxREx0W&fid=0x0:0xa9375dfb83c12bb6"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"Jasmine D H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEb4caEP8q51G4Q6FltQZ0tzjgp9nyrYClLo_WuTzcS_aoUd4-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's really cute and spacious place. Nice and bright as well as friendly staff and very clean. The coffee is much better than say other chain coffee places too! More flavor and way more options. 10/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDYFHw1xAxGkOFgdXvjtmNwtlQ5O5eaK85X5kv&fid=0x0:0xa9375dfb83c12bb6"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Al","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJke_H51lEVtqmQ6Mwhj0R5MqDW7L2xLlIdf0sg4kPFJFF0D9I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly people and super cozy location. Treat customers good and look after you.  Place is a clean and welcoming atmosphere. Free parking around and after some shopping close by you can have hot drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwMRsVNoVQshBUM7o0VEj91QaZ_CCpqfocWP5Y&fid=0x0:0xa9375dfb83c12bb6"],"When":"2023-11-27"},{"Name":"Destiny Sloane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaUBiTJOQoYgRBSbpDJgBjbHyLPSrLFsH_OrtvYNZfQDoymA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My recent visit wasn’t okay, especially because the drink tasted very milky and the way the barista handled my feedback. This is probably going to be the last time and maybe it's good for them that they don't have me as their customer. The drinks are okay but there is no customer service at this place, especially this time when they made me walk back with the drinks. The person who made my drinks doesn’t seem to be okay with my feedback based on how he reacted, but I think I’m entitled to give feedback as a customer. The reason I give them 2 stars is because they at least made a new drink and up size for me this time, it’s wed anyway, otherwise I would rate them 1 star. I know that he may think he's very good at his job and probably believes he made the very best drinks, but if he put his ego down and listened to customers, he would understand that the drink tastes different this time. That's all I wanted to say. He wasn’t rude or anything, but his facial expressions and words sounded ironic. He seems upset when his colleague’s asking what’s going on. In the end, I just walked away with the new drinks he made (which actually taste better, saying this with no bias). Though I live a block away and this place is the closest coffee shop to my house, I still consider not revisiting anytime soon, as I think it would be good for both of us not to have bad feelings toward each other.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Molly Boucher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_QcVS348jkCoM0SQ_B1NoeQ2o5lrwZ030Mr1UKH6paS362Qd63g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely LOVE this Waves location. Morad and his team are always so welcoming. I am greeted so wonderfully when I come here. I Cannot recommend this Waves location enough!

I am really grateful to this awesome team!
I wish i could give more than 5stars!

All the best team!
- Molly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pat Waslen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkC-Tyq5Sy6eH64VG6FwtcQj-OJYnSvli4ZLpkEY8S6PBvQxBoIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well in a neighbourhood full of coffee shops Waves at Hastings & Carleton makes the effort to stand out.  Always clean, bright and airy.  It has its own little meeting room for customers to use .  A welcoming environment with a cosmopolitan clientele.  Ash the manager is friendly and kind. Food is your standard coffee shop fare. Lots of options for warm or cold drinks.  A nice place to visit and to stay awhile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTk9Ko7XTOk62HQWBZPgR2_2QprR_4UaBg-tYk&fid=0x0:0xa9375dfb83c12bb6"],"When":"2022-5-10"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Picked up a Too Good To Go order from here! Satisfying bag with 4 coffee house baked goods/treats. The cheesecakes were moist and nicely packaged so they retained their shape individually. The loaf and muffin (white chocolate) were nothing special, but did retain a decent flavour when warmed up. Waves is reliable and quick stop for coffee and simple baked goods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNls6ukrH7Z3ZM3MkSlGuo1E7sRVZc1SnKtqWcs&fid=0x0:0xa9375dfb83c12bb6"],"When":"2023-3-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A super sweet joint offering a very tasty menu of tea and coffee lattes including some yummy baked goodies.
I love the modern, wooden and minimalistic decor with a chilled out mellow vibe and a nice place to chill with a drink. They also have outdoor seating options just outside opposite the mall and a great location.
Unfortunately my coffee was really burnt,  which I think was related to the pretty shabby customer service received which I felt more of a nuisance being there to be honest.
They also have a pretty good loyalty scheme which is also pretty awesome.
Support your local business!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMisUxoHey3N7tlE15PtzesP6WR3kmQC7nahVJH&fid=0x0:0x47b9af8c17f88414"],"When":"2021-5-2"},{"Name":"food.adventures","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeSqRt8YX8AxJ8lMMX7EaGjxjzYDwy3HvwHyW2q2icYn8MFok=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place just recently opened up and I just had to stop by. I went there 2 days in a row and tried their tea (White Peach Oolong), an almond milk latte, and their sandwich. They all tasted amazing! Also, their staff are so friendly and welcoming. The place itself was very spacious and had lots of seating and their aesthetic was on point.

Just note that parking is extremely limited with only 2 spots in their parking lot around the side. However, there is plenty of street parking available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUVJh-4TFywaVWXEtM8bhu2VR2DseDnEiuEc-8&fid=0x0:0x47b9af8c17f88414"],"When":"2019-12-6"},{"Name":"Fatima Mercado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7SlKhwmmrkLOhpt8B2LMTLS7lOOy7_0LAbvZ5pmF9T7PPdwIm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is peaceful. I can enjoy my coffee or tea while I’m working. Highly recommend it to those professionals or students who are looking for a quiet place to chill. It’s just across TD bank near Brentwood Town Centre.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMalwabc2PK3cl2ue2IdnACcUJEX9BR6HdJYiJF&fid=0x0:0x47b9af8c17f88414"],"When":"2022-1-25"},{"Name":"Mike Freedman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqoWfwQb3Uo2mY0s5WmHayDw9gB4X4gDdAbc3SBExs3PgZ33o9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice spot close to Brentwood mall. Service was good. I haven't tried the coffee yet but the tea was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCLicNsrYk1Z_6AR0xKqHVPUKLYADhRHUsPuu8&fid=0x0:0x47b9af8c17f88414"],"When":"2020-12-20"},{"Name":"Ann Marie Hak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBK0eet22AJcjmopqyc9dX_HYXzO-YNTZ4B-k8nsU9mFMkr2FO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute, comfortable, convenient! Staff was extremely friendly, fast, and courteous. The quality of the food and coffee was amazing and delicious. Plenty of outlets to plug in your laptop, fast wifi. A great space to work together on an online project with a friend or study!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhQbkE4FfwF2X_HOxbOLCk5YwWHVVclq7Hhx-p&fid=0x0:0x47b9af8c17f88414"],"When":"2021-8-22"},{"Name":"Yaqi LU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUb5K6KCrnbkbQ1oXiuX3M7xyqUoBjFhdk4FL8Q_MQdl338D-J_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited this lovely place multiple times. Tried the Maycha latte, iced latte, some tea and drinks. They all taste extremely good. I’ll definitely come back to try all the drinks. A good selection of pastries and more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4R95iOT7SXrtN2J2HuuUV3-61lKb-brUe_yt2&fid=0x0:0x47b9af8c17f88414"],"When":"2020-8-11"},{"Name":"Meegin Sullivan Mazloum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLZGcjDBASUVbmZm1ld7VbckLOUf27Gj7nNltbZ9lMTxSKRomG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I noticed the cafe walking by one evening. I walked over on a Sunday morning to get a coffee. A QR code menu is conveniently posted on the windows. The menu has many options for food and drinks. There is a Covid-safe seating area outside to enjoy the sun and your order. Inside there is a friendly and open atmosphere. The barista was friendly and welcoming. My latte was ready in a few minutes and absolutely delicious! I’m very happy to have discovered this place and look forward to many more visits.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlwFwIMLz1fQgsEpFuU7Ltrr_92WWJgtQ50_bt&fid=0x0:0x47b9af8c17f88414"],"When":"2021-4-4"},{"Name":"AYM Zeto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVz5GvKrEg3A0tbZbuO2ffKhkWqqqvubt9jM_ZmqmuBuntJI2W4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The server is really friendly, and my Caramel Cream latte is quite delicious. The place is immaculate and I love the atmosphere of it. There are plenty of plants and soft lighting, as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZSjaz9tCfN4tYkOu0VlXzBWHkX_ntqGuVcfod&fid=0x0:0x47b9af8c17f88414"],"When":"2020-2-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ok like as one of the decent places at university for Asian food I have been here alot. And tldr I have to say this place I would give a 3 if not for there amazing katsu. Like I don't know what they do to their Katsu but it's soooo good for the price. The skin is crispy and pairs great with the rice.😋😋

Anyways now for why it got 3,
Drinks: the boba is garbage ,the pearls have been unappetizing more times than not. I usually don't leave toppings unfinished but I have here.🗑️🗑️ However ❗❗ the fruit teas here a pretty good they put like real fruit bits in their drinks and it SLAPS👌😊👏

The service is fine , never had a bad experience but nothing standout.

The inside of the restaurant is ugly. 😶

Like if you want Asian food this is an option, I crave their Katsu on occasion 🥺🥺( like right now) ALSO DONT GET THE HAMBURG STEAK ITS GENUINELY NOT WORTH IT , THE MEAT WAS SO SMALL.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjiGtKqpjoe6hhTK_4YeViULpa5fREu0nxFJ4g&fid=0x0:0x42567cce41dde3a"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Samantha Reynolds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfkCQ56UenzXB09xvNdKuYL0bMaJnvfOvNbSrwE6v-82Y2IA2s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Bubble tea is fine - I got the charcoal oolong+ pearls. I do taste some charcoal at first.
I also notice that use powder milk+ brewed tea, so if you don't like powder milk, this is not for you
Pearls big and soft, chewy
Pearls are+60¢ due to inflation: ( but otherwise good price compared to their neighbor ( minus the powder milk part lol)
Got a little bit of a sensitive stomach after consumption( which may or may not be due to the drink)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdRBsr1R-5m_fn095aFNiIEIsdY5xBJa7VfDM0&fid=0x0:0x42567cce41dde3a"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Kenneth Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhTrGrBVIM_c2BSFuGNppiiWJiU2tr0F65K0CN3XJaCCYy_8eTSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"2nd time order here. They got the drink wrong again. Boss doesn't speak English.

I had a bizarre experience with this restaurant. I understand that this is a place that most likely is staffed by students. As I got in to pick up my order from the food app, the chef walked out of the kitchen, exclaiming in Japanese, "he is not here?" at the door. He continued outside to look around even as I was leaving.

Upon returning we realized we were missing a drink. I went back to pick it up since I am not too terribly far while my family called ahead to let the restaurant know. The phone number went straight to voicemail.

I walked in to explain myself and the student staff explained to me that they don't do BOGO in the store. I tried to explain that if the food app sold an order of BOGO, they need to make two drinks. She explained again that her manager didn't tell her about it.

Eventually she did make drink for me to take away. She also confirmed that they don't take phone orders or answer phone calls.

Food was good. Kids love the sandwich. Portion was filling. Just a very bizarre ordering experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is delicious, and filled us up quite a lot at a pretty reasonable price! We got their chicken katsu sandwiches, which is a great proportion and ideal for a quick lunch bite. They've got some hotpots too, which are fantastic as well :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm6uHZFSNq2crWBYAAeQLZc6W5qv_858aXbST7&fid=0x0:0x42567cce41dde3a"],"When":"2023-6-14"},{"Name":"Minh Châuu Nguyễn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFz2k-Kxl-tdktgo0CBNWt7JhHNnvAa77JZxsfgh7OVvz7QSyO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I asked for white pearl in my drink and they ran out of it but when I ordered, the cashier didn't tell me that it went out and proceeded as it's normal. Drinks take too long to make (there is 2 people making drinks) and it doesn't taste as good as it use to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwLGBwS-aCUFTLRpy-AtZ5quKY3JnqFtQYa5Uf&fid=0x0:0x42567cce41dde3a"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"sam k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKKLzRW9Po3lL6qiGv8ZHqwLOrGPoi9AtBaWfhusl79DE7UQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Awful cream cheese jasmine tea, worse I've ever had. Watery, bland, not at all smooth. Also not quite sure why the entire drink is white. Not worth the 6 dollars, and I wouldn't get it even if it was on a 50% discount. Drank like a quarter of it and threw the rest away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPopGFlNGxgW0FMrlXMYnsSWoqblz8Jh0sUv3yZ&fid=0x0:0x42567cce41dde3a"],"When":"2023-5-9"},{"Name":"bisesh shakya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxnXe5NqvFDVWn7lXryovdgqZFLpNYnTSv7yNHuX_jKKxrbKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very slow worker, took 20 mins to make one simple brown sugar latte. AND ALSO very rude.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yupeng Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6y6zPfyRVMYG-0ICpchv9_0JGEBAIWXJDHreWSYwcwLx9Xl0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice food. Friendly people. Left with full stomache. So far I have tried the sandwich, tomato beef noodles, and teriyaki chicken rice. Will try one of their stirred noodles next time.
Be careful with their hot sauce. Really spicy. Stunned in my head while I was having their watery chicken rice.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We popped by during Yogost Metrotown’s 1st Birthday and took advantage of their awesome BOGO deal! 🎉 Of course, we had to try their Exclusive Birthday Drink, which did not disappoint!

🌟 What We Tried:
🍇 BLACKBERRY YOGURT SMOOTHIE 酷黑莓莓 (Exclusive Birthday Drink):
Wow!  This one was so cool and unique!  Tangy, creamy, and loaded with fresh blackberries! It’s a perfect way to celebrate their birthday.

🍓 Strawberry Banana Yogurt 蕉原莓莓:
Sweet, fruity, and refreshing! Strawberries and bananas are always a winning combo.

🌸 Rice Wine with Osmanthus Jelly Smoothie 酒酿桂花冻:
Floral with a refreshing twist!  The Osmanthus Jelly is soft and chewy—such a fun combo! It’s definitely for those who love something a little different.

The Metrotown location isn’t inside the shopping mall but is conveniently located across from the Skytrain station.  Perfect for grabbing a drink before heading out to the shopping mall! 🛍️

Seating is limited, so it’s best to grab your drink to go. And let me tell you—their drinks taste fresh and not artificial.  Delicious!  If you haven’t tried a yogurt drink, this is the spot to start!

📝📝

Drink:  🥤🥤🥤🥤🥤 Must Try!
Service: 👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳
Kids: 👶👶👶👶 Yay!
Price: Range between $7-$10 for each drink
Presentation: 📷📷
Parking:  Street parking available in the neighbourhood.
Tips:
📝 have a good selection on their menu.
📝 can check out their IG for promotions.
Would I Return: Yes 👱‍♀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8Uq0P4tGTYExWzQR8rgdFMdl_5wdepAjCSB7U&fid=0x0:0x2bb3e1ff6c233d25"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Sonio#","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgPFUpnzrpEoVvRe59YWZRhcyGwj7p1DpJIMats48g_TpX1SHp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"ITS REALLY YUMMY!! I DRINK IT EVERY DAY!! Thank you for making really yummy drinks and for really nice service I really like how the girl with the dyed ends of her hair provides very good service! She is very nice to everyone! I drink this drinks 1-2-3 times on a day and I really like it!! My favorite flavor is “peach strawberry yogurt slush with a pearls!!” It’s really yummy and also I spend for last mouth 300$ for “HEY IM YOGOST” but I’m not sad because it’s so tasty!! Thank you really much for making it!!!! I think everyone has to try something from there!! Thank you so much!!! 😋😋 非常感謝您的服務和您準備的美味飲料！","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtXK-mIvqiWiYX2JkrYz_irOnBGu5d4OQwfSv_&fid=0x0:0x2bb3e1ff6c233d25"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious yogurt drinks! It’s like sipping bubble tea style flavoured yogurt smoothies! Had the matcha red bean yogurt and it was delicious and healthy tasting. They initially made the wrong order and gave us something we did not order and when we told them, they quickly corrected it and gave us a new one and let us keep the old one.

The yakult series is creamy and very yogurty and the strawberry, mango, and lychee flavours were all good. It came in a cool yakult shaped bottle that is reusable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRou1wrXV5vykk8znfuLM2-qkDhhXqKZYanXU5&fid=0x0:0x2bb3e1ff6c233d25"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Zichang Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINZTqXYW_f4qkv1gfyK7knI5SMTPLyasSpo0MitBsL0_ezxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love this bubble tea shop! The staff is friendly and provides excellent service, making every visit enjoyable. The cozy atmosphere makes it a great place to relax or catch up with friends. Whether you’re a bubble tea enthusiast or trying it for the first time, this place is a must-visit. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmWRgN705RbFsqIGl3PL3XodTdyPDc4yjl02TV&fid=0x0:0x2bb3e1ff6c233d25"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Linda Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbm_M2si7-dsNFtTgBoE8eRYCks0e8XBB8KkK-5UTqWxSb-GHz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Yogost has been my go to drinks place since the day they opened. Addicted to the Mochi Yogurt series, especially the peach and strawberry one. They even gave us a pup cup, and our dog loved it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlBdgXHQoH7Xgrsc9UkcZNnVGjL7isfhz8Xm9L&fid=0x0:0x2bb3e1ff6c233d25"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Honeylet Tamares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV746avHJV9Qsf8DVCUqrtUpQSdQCyU8cLoOAJspf8l3ntuyhnB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I discovered this dessert place from a coworker and the flavours are soo good. I keep coming back over and over again. I personally loved the Matcha Mochi and the Mango Mochi yogurt. I highly recommended it to everyone. The staff are very nice, especially Shin.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl6nNxtlOMnsnSsluZkTb4Ti7pLnLr-_nRRSJF&fid=0x0:0x2bb3e1ff6c233d25"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Sash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsEN8LESXHdVUHALQ4S3DxVR2gfd5knlpOhRGZTjLzMJeMHtuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered Rose Lychee Yogurt and it was delicious. My usual go to order is Strawberry Mochi Yogurt which is super yummy if anyone needs a recommendation. It’s a cute little store, so not a lot of seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUcsS0aXNGzzUb4LlwHutuwoF3T3qmMzP-MSv7&fid=0x0:0x2bb3e1ff6c233d25"],"When":"2024-1-10"},{"Name":"Josh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlmU5Tv4fovZfqaiORtJpG0MMcsYlgwtQnvwyK9A7Bv-Ha1Bz5SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot offers a great variety of drinks, including new special ones that switch up often. Currently, I'm loving the Mango Mochi Yogurt. The staff is super friendly and dedicated. There was this lovely girl who even brought my drink to me outside when I was on a call once. I'd totally suggest this place to anyone in need of a tasty drink. It's right next to Metrotown Skytrain Station, so it's super convenient!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5ia4hMXWTzhB18if63vgiwTm9YEv4jW12s3j3&fid=0x0:0x2bb3e1ff6c233d25"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

[{"Name":"Emily Odermatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUywkRbXYNcuGZN5C1HwyJkPGB4Luik6zyiyABorhQQtOBCtfWP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was so delicious! I ordered a Strawberry Slush with extra pearls- only con is there wasn’t many extra pearls after paying for extra. Other bubble tea places I’ve been fill almost half the cup! They sell instant noodles, cake, macaroons and other snacks too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC9Wo19GZDRBIKJKQjwct0AeOC4w6QeNlJnLUA&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little bubble tea shop. Nice promo 2 bubble teas for 9.99. Will come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3BaGucPHdEUcAWmb1bpYX6jQnJ9-y2mDiLrdC&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Jiwon Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVO9CNC3DzN-rVpntVK_l5Jwv9ew0e1J5rfs9oQXQcwT7dUxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here is so friendly! 💛 Even their mango slush and strawberry ice-cream slush taste so lovely as well! This shop will definitely be my go-to!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpiKwvPLYHznHjp_9bbI6AATDQpHBwadhr4lya&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great bubble tea! There are options to choose fresh, real fruit drinks as well as the classic powdered flavours. There are so many flavours to choose from. Tried the milky red bean slush with real red beans and less sugar and it was just right with lots of red bean flavour. Would go back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPeV9FhGYk2oUlIeofqqNOeFSEjrwyrwUGmQzX&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Wayne Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAqbnATehdCB6LG2128EjISBhwi6X8sr56Ci-l1ZepcZmpvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Drink are so watery no flavour at all. Also the Pearls are rock hard for sure from the night or few nights before. I want my refund or contacting BBB.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr-F8_qYJYkvlVht9bGaghiVdLEI91QIYz-wK8&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"David Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfA-kOU7xliddqeq24f50pbZSzEpPCzW3VfNrEQUVJkz4Qd9Fp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful and delicious experience ar Blue Moon. The shop was extremely clean and inviting. The restroom in particular was pleasant as the restrooms in that neighbourhood is always troubling.

The bubble tea was nothing short of yummy. I had the milky strawberry oreo slush. The service was kind and welcoming. Will be coming back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl2Zx-zSHj-ZqDwui3RZCpkZIUzR3UHV9HyoIz&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2023-4-9"},{"Name":"Zay R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrcv0nbceihjzzaPr2LIIin5v_Tj9YhzMv8cvDTNxNVU0GSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very friendly staff, fast service, and a nice vibe.

We got mango milk tea and mango milky slush. The milk tea tasted a bit too artificial in flavour, but the slush was yummy.

I also tried strawberry yogurt cheesecake, and it was DELICIOUS and very light 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFzrU9JmnJU-SwJVlP5h8wqP7MmJ7dm6qGOdDV&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Teresa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXJzjPvZuazZPaiDpvZUIEnQ8SaqmnckUx-GRckef8lha6d56D=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My sisters and I love this place so much! There’s not a lot of customization in terms of drink size, sweetness or ice levels but the drinks are really good for the price and there’s a wide variety you can choose from. They recently raised their prices; you can get a slush with pearls for around $7. For the same size and order, it’d probably be a $1-2 extra at Chatime.

The owner(?), Jay, is so nice and even greets me when we run by each other outside :’) There’s also free wifi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwxFU9-T6XQVvqnB_84s64o6h1a6X5l6Zmilme&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2023-9-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Remia Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmpY-11b6uW1ElYcP-MQ3nN5fllulzAmTZx7kDqDgJ0KRRYIkH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very nice and warm welcoming cafe. The lady working here was very nice and gave me a wonderful cozy vibe.  As if you’re visiting a caring relative. She was very kind and made sure we all found a drink we would enjoy.

The drinks are very delicious and I was very pleased. They use real fruits for some of their drinks and they were very refreshing.

We got 20% off our drinks. The lady told us for the winter months there is 20% off for the season.

I will definitely be back!

I recommend either of the two drinks we got or something made with real fruits!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhCAL-p93nFT6zGlEASc8nJwztaVAIkamNqQpF&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Sam Shop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL00zVIViQ27vvP18FEhx25H0o_EIIlmqibePozX8gFaroS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Our bubble waffles were nice. Sweet, decent whip cream, but very little fruits. Strawberry was served frozen. Would have been nice if the lady had defrosted it.

Service took a long time even though we were the only ones there.

Taro bbt used jasmine tea so tasted very different. Because she blended the ice, the bubbles became super hard.

Ambiance is not great. It feels like an order to-go place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOF-ZblyBJML0kbOI_6gMjBjqumGsN1NkG2iw&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Allan lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeLeKCCWzGG31UN4u7PVDpcD5nilEIt_OcjsD3MjiLwJogDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a frequent customer at Gathering Cafe. They offer a wide selection of high quality drinks (lattes, milk tea) that are made organically on the spot. The owner uses fresh fruits and ingredients instead of syrup for their drinks, and still maintain a very, very good price. I highly recommend a honeycomb coffee latte and pumpkin latte as they warm you up on a cold day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPE36rzNNT4PbPMRrUYuDUO6HrBpsXCehI019O&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"April Dong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-EJWeyLZl-J46LDopap4-qjdQdaukUBxAWy4qdIzEb8Hgrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute and cozy place to sit and enjoy. The lady is warm and welcoming, just tell her what you want and she can recommend to you. All drinks and food are come in great portion, that are good enough to feed you up. I highly recommend the iced fruit tea and green tea with salty cream cheese foam. They are fresh and delightful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQRU2smTJTxvrDc9phK0e0GiWFbp_tFmL1e0Rq&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-4-4"},{"Name":"Samantha Newbery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMwh1oZxhiPpLD2ehTemDe8UpvHDKim9u6YzgoLrrEJoQrabZz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So glad we stumbled across this super cute cafe while our car was being serviced nearby. It was the perfect place to hang out for an hour. The chocolate bubble waffle and blueberry smoothie with salt milk cover were both freshly made and delicious, and so affordable!
We will definitely be back if we are ever in the area. We were impressed and there are lots of things on the menu we want to try.
Cute place to study or for a quiet hang out with friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came here for bbt and they definitely have affordable options 6-7 dollars for a bbt. Facilities are extremely old - the building interior had an unpleasant smell to it. As for the drinks themselves, pearls were extremely soft as if they’d been sitting around for days. I would not recommend coming here. Sun Tea within the Safeway complex is a much better experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMswmdei6UWklCfmLwISBSmrU2S9MU-u9BJWa9l&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Su Linn Myint","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEH0QETeDUsAuNdaL-G3MXThYHvHFGOtEiMjaO_gQ0TBWXgz0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wanted to try this cafe for a while and finally tried it. I tired the egg and bacon crepe which is really good and full of fillings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAs-LRfmD0Y5j2m7dqt4WZOsm0T3qGmlHwlgvr&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Lucian Nedelcu (Teddy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQWs20vZVv-WjmKExQoFbz4NhIegHkfZEv7UasxD9lUs_8TMWcoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place, quaint, low-key. The food is very tasty and reasonably-priced. They have an interesting selection of both, food and drink, but nothing crazy.

The wifi is 10/10

If you want a quiet afternoon to study this unassuming place is perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfJwwFyQocbbMRpw8TK2wUpj1agA2qrP1o5yuj&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2023-6-24"}]

[{"Name":"Sarah Nia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcFv4A9uA5ZsG9eq_Gz9fGNYN4h1i9JJjGdX0_okvrwULnlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like the store and staff working there. Also the drinks are very delicious and good quality, not too much sugar. My son loves the Burberry and grapes 🍇  too, and I like mango cheese too.... for sure, I recommend 👌 ☺️.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXTRX7j1PcdAhZzuL11t9PrvuVkwMPMa2DP23T&fid=0x0:0x34751812440ab34"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Almondmonkey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmCAddLtbwfXzlPEr_02w2K_5MXD5immgElxXb4rRprALqt8Xb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Super fruit tea, and it’s pretty good :) It’s a little sweet though, I ordered 50%sugar. Other than that, it’s a tasty drink, refreshing for the hot weather. Cup looks nice and the price is not bad considering other places. 💚","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-WMnUUWEIUEsm1Hop7LGbrwl5EFlxzng4t53l&fid=0x0:0x34751812440ab34"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"TIM C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsL9NSrG8jjAVNG-x9rN6XSoaFI_Viwwt29jo0hKnGaLtx37Tb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked past it couple of times, this time was finally open, saw they had a variety of unique drinks so decided to give them a try, we got the yogurt grape saga.

Taste 1/1*
Personally not a big fan of sour drinks, but wife absolutely loved it!
One thing I gotta say though is you sure can taste the difference in high quality ingredients they used.

Value 0.5/1*
Drinks are $1-$2 more expensive than other places, for the quality of ingredients used, debatable, only cause personally I prefer high quality seafood vs high quality yogurt, but that’s just me, wife thought was worth it

Service 1/1*
Fast & friendly

Cleanliness 1/1*
Shop looked new & spotless

Overall/Revisit 1/1*
Yes would return

Paying for ambience? MAYBE as it’s new
Above and beyond? 0/+1*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNN-U46U-mBGXYwAn7ba40iZENAhZNF3P4cBc9&fid=0x0:0x34751812440ab34"],"When":"2023-10-23"},{"Name":"Ivan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7bK0bappyJ1WIHKFRLINWzON0Yz0Hl7-sgPSDVshCh_Si75XYWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've never been the first review before 👀. I happened upon this new little bubble tea spot on their first day open.

It's well decorated inside, located downstairs on the outside of the crystal mall, near the Yi Fang. Very clean interior with the menu easy legible from anywhere in the store.

There were a ton of unique menu options that I've never seen from any other bubble tea spots. Cups were nice rigid, soft touch plastic and came with plastic straws thankfully.

I got the blueberry fuji with half sugar. A touch less sweeter than I expected, so I'll try 70% with my next order. Could use a hit more milk too, but taste was great with fresh blueberries blended in. Will definitely be back to try more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOTCLMRq1ajAJe6ZhBvnR1Mu1QB-qQFjAVyWVu&fid=0x0:0x34751812440ab34"],"When":"2023-8-6"},{"Name":"Alexandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX11ANDfpnFU7GmCeaVtU5cBwuWRqquWAK3F9_AUyciKpah0H5L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Is it just me or do bbt places appear to be cropping up like corn at Crystal Mall? I'm not a frequent flier at this Mall so perhaps these places have been here quite some time, but at the very least, it does seem like there is an inordinate amount of bbt houses all sequestered in this sector.

Tae Tea is a fairly new addition to Crystal Mall. Easily accessible as a place you have to walk past in order to get into the actual Mall, they have as good a chance as any other bbt place for success.

I was in the area with my aunt so we decided to stop in. The 20% off all drinks statement stuck onto the window was very appealing, and even more so were the $6.70 drinks, making this one of the most reasonably priced places around.

I'm not really sure how to describe the decor, as like a lot of bbt places here at Crystal Mall, the shop is so tiny that there really is not much room for anything other than the menu, their logo and the requisite fire alarm. However, they did have an astronaut statue set up in one corner and a gigantic moon slapped onto one of the walls, so let's call this Cute Space Chic.

Took awhile to read through their menu as they certainly played to a little bit of everything in terms of their selections of Milk Teas {made with organic milk in case you're wondering}, Fruits, Slushes and Yogurt.

Every place seems to have a shtick or gimmick and one or two drinks that they are famed for, and here the shtick/gimmick by my estimation would probably be the Blood Rice inclusion in a few drinks which I have to admit that I have not seen anywhere else. Nor am I tempted to try it.

They also have grape themed drinks, Creme Brulee Milk Tea and Caramel Mochi. Honestly who needs to find a dessert place when these bbt houses are basically taking care of the dessert portion and the drink with their 2 in 1 concoctions.

One of the things I found really amusing was that I wanted to pay by cash and the guy told me that while they prefer card they do accept cash, and proceeded to slide open this small section of plastic with an adorable bear etched onto it in order to take said cash. It was like doing a transaction at a bank, which I found vaguely amusing.

They ran out of my first drink choice of Spring Peach Oolong so I tried their Fruit Ceiling while my aunt grabbed a Lychee Crush. I don't know if the name got lost in translation since the Ceiling kind of threw me off, but my aunt joked maybe it was so named because they fill the fruits to the Ceiling... of your cup.

The Lychee Crush was really good, but then again, it's one of those drinks that are hard to screw up. I was in for a shock with my Fruit Ceiling though, because it is the best Fruit Tea I've ever come across. It was the perfect amount of sweet, my preferred watery consistency, made with fresh fruit, and more importantly, there were no seeds floating around to hinder the taste or experience.

I will absolutely be going back and recommending this place to everyone I know, so do yourself a favor and Tae~k a chance with Tae Tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGqR8N-ugvw7kcG8w2okwChRZ1nTuQeSR39RXg&fid=0x0:0x34751812440ab34"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"Steven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnQiOkF5sJ1SPN7-mjrJfpw0uWYTc5vuRtXWGOkGAglcsEiJmP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First, I tried to order the mango pomelo, but was told the mango was out of season which is fair. But then I tried to order the caramel mochi, and they also said it was out of stock. This already left me with a negative feeling because if you don’t have the drinks, why are you advertising them? Why not at least cover them up on your menu?

I ended up ordering the Fancy Grape. I was not expecting it to contain tea because it doesn’t have “tea” in the name (nor 茶 in the Chinese name). The tea flavour was way too strong. I ended up throwing it away because I can’t have caffeine in the evening, and because it tasted disgusting.

I pointed this out to the cashier, but he didn’t even try to provide me any compensation. Complete waste of money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dru Chan (Kitoshi)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtuvq_Crw4DnKEvqJudmbFythLrMkqBRbB1dNAfZL7t2gBzsScMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here with some friends to catch-up at Crystal Mall and to be honest not a bad choice for a boba place. I love the aesthetic of the place but be warned, there isn't really any seating here to hang out as it is classified as a order and take out type of boba place.

Literally the whole ordering area is just a guy behind some glass and that's kind of cool, but it does miss the whole vibe of being welcomed as there no proper seats to hang out.

Their boba quality is not the worst, I know I've had worst before. They do brew their tea fresh and on top of that, their fresh fruits are literally squished and blended fresh as well. It was quite delicious. They have tons of options as well. The menu is the typical Chinese style of Boba with TONS of choices and mixes and matches for your type of drink. On top of that, they have special flavors like Salted Egg and tons of Asian mixings like red rice and tea flavour foam. It really was very different, and I can only see Crystal Mall being a place which has something like this!

I do enjoy such innovations and new flavours and fun things like this, but at the same time, I wish it was more available everywhere else. A drink literally felt like a WHOLE meal, there was so much things in the drink to the point I was full after it. Lets drink instead of eat now!! Anyways, would come back and try the other flavours they have to try new special flavours!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yvonne Sogge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2_Ex9hdK_-qGn_BODuaZERpbYYYc7Ky1hQppyVbo2Vd9F1BgrRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service. Loved both of our drinks...the Fancy Grape was very refreshing and the Creame Brule was so tasty.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pearobearo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJytlYP3krNLbRwHHThbPHsotJR7HIGvSdTdRI-mBoQ7I0EO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Perhaps this is more of an Uber Eats delivery issue, but the fact remained... The cup they used is super thin and they were not packed properly. Plus, 2 of my drinks came with coconut jelly instead of agar jelly with no notice.

My drink came spilled, and delivery guy tried to hide it. Left a sticky trail of dripping drinks from the lobby all the way to my floor where he dropped it off. Uber Eats offered no solution for the delivery guy's mistake.

Bad experience. Some drinks were good, some... Not so much.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7FoN8aEEaBz-beG_97YAoBT9JDeC7JSKiezBz&fid=0x0:0xe1efdd370173ad76"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Cynthia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPSqb87NWW9U9vNp7BatMApz_3TKACtlL1RPxbq3QfEtMMfypj2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i love it here. good bubble tea of course, but also because the smell of the brewing tea is very nostalgic to me and it makes me happy. also i love the pomegranate red tea and this is the last location that still has it on the menu! <3","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM0NG2rdM5FTL346xGle9zS2WbwQUigAi7xJC2J_LnOvbQvOL_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think the experience has to do with the food u order. I was here another time and it wasn’t as pleasant. Glad I gave it a second chance . I’m going to stick to ordering the same thing when I return.

The dishes in the attached photo:
Spicy beef noodles
Squid tentacles (ask for a dipping sauce)
Taro slush with coconut jelly
Passionfruit green tea

The male server gave really good service too. Not sure if it’s because it wasn’t too busy but he was really attentive and didn’t rush us out. We ended up tipping 20% which is considerably high for a casual bubble tea establishment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkpj6VdMdhOJASVLO9diB9b2Ihfd_mwRQChqLw&fid=0x0:0xe1efdd370173ad76"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Kevin Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzHltFaQvZtrPvmv3rpbBqLHG5pCvlOShvTu15wxVa49ieH8ms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would die for this place. Kidding, it is probably the best bubble tea shop in all of BC, and I drink a lot of it. Highly recommend their slush series, no one else comes close to their flavor and quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ellen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOLwp1YuZHFAfe5TfBAETM7Gfw006WNpu6CMM0hXfmB4HVpR97=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the few places that was still open late night. They have an extensive drink menu and soft, fluffy bubble waffle. They don't have a lot of fancy flavour options for the waffle as they did for the drinks. Friendly service. Decent prices. Parking can be a little tricky to find. Solid 4.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnRRXsyF9B0_DuyEAOqrPA6AmmAsYgV6mDM14S&fid=0x0:0xe1efdd370173ad76"],"When":"2020-9-23"},{"Name":"Iris Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlK29O_nQ58eC1py16m6iNxjxEdSTgZskn8dzbtfBYgNE1bk2Ecg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here for late night bubble tea around 11:30pm on a Friday night! We were a group of eight people, and we got a table right away. It wasn’t too busy at all. Overall the vibe is very casual and easy going, not a bad place to socialize with friends!

The menu is very extensive. Everything from milk teas to fruit slushes, and at reasonable prices, especially compared with other places. I ordered the papaya fresh fruit slush. However, I was a disappointed by it - it was much too icy for my liking. I could taste the texture of the individual it’s of ice. It needed to be blended for longer or have more liquid added to it. I was also disappointed by the pearls. They were a great texture and a generous amount, but there was absolutely no flavor to them. Usually, pearls have a subtle sweetness because they’re marinating in sugar before serving. The pearls in my drink were tasteless.

I would come back to try again as this might have been a one-off. Will update when I do!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOieOPobBBaFsBuXfr0uJaJUERjF8PD8383j82D&fid=0x0:0xe1efdd370173ad76"],"When":"2023-2-25"},{"Name":"Sally & Jason Leong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZWOBASSZ71Gx8qO6J40A_hsS5D44pxDmq8grdtU9PC_PxUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been coming here for years and generally receive quality drinks, today however both drinks were garbage and tossed. Milk tea tasted like nothing as if there was no tea used, and the taro was flavourless.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0G5Bpx4zVI6jPA_JKyUBwmv39PC32FXcmhRAzW_ft6o5s9Jadjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Bought a bbt & bubble waffle.After going so many years was disappointed with my bbt.Not sure if they changed the recipe but wasn’t great.Waffle was nothing special.I thought everyone had the same basic recipe.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Arianna Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVic9svNL1EXCtjVOZp0P8zd3LUMxKTNn02oyMBMoNNbRsFfKo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last month I bought a strawberry rice yogurt from them, I've bought from this store many times before that, only that time I was given very hard purple rice not edible at all because it was to be taken away, I didn't give any more feedback on this matter very late that day. Today I went back and bought it again, I was very detailed about what day and time I bought it and they said they had to deal with this on the same day and would not give me any compensation, I dislike this store a lot , they just offer it to their regular customers with already hardened rice and a very negative service attitude, but this drink is really good.

This time I just had diarrhea after drinking it, I don't think I'll order this one again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ1EI_ILoVJCxnKzSIjCXErplyJVaA0uv63_fV&fid=0x0:0xff4a384b97d96dff"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhlSS7jPz5zCaOBcdduZUQiQLkdoBrNXd3voRg2PZcAC_6HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We did have to wait about 15 minutes to order and to receive our drinks, as there was only 1 person working and they were very busy, but the service was still great! There's a bit of seating and a couple tables for dining in, and it's air-conditioned, perfect to stop by for a little while on a hot day.

We tried a Rice Yogurt and their Mango Grapefruit Slush with Yogurt Foam. The Rice Yogurt was a plain yogurt with purple rice. The Mango Grapefruit Slush had decent flavour, but unfortunately had mostly melted and was not really slushy when we got it.

I'd say give this bubble tea place a try for something new, but if you don't particularly like yogurt you might want to skip it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmHkNBZT5c7x7LMdV5aCIXgKpVR4NrXb6JgVqH&fid=0x0:0xff4a384b97d96dff"],"When":"2023-6-7"},{"Name":"Yan Fu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjpzEV2pQK9T4E8izU8ablCcMfInJ-zrXBff6dJyVAtIgxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The $6.5 Gelato with waffle cone is a joke. Look at the portion size. The cashier is really cheap. When I ask her for napkins she was like we are all out. So I asked for two pieces of paper towels. And I literally heard her saying to the other cashier just give her one. I miss the old cashier who worked there last year. She even brought me band aid once when she saw the little cut I had on my finger. This new cashier was nothing compared to her and was very rude and unwelcoming. Also the other day when I paid $5.5 for nothing but a pup cup for my dog, she only gave us half a cup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH7lViwcRAYHkqH3HUwYS1CZEO1_LVzLfnyXv0&fid=0x0:0xff4a384b97d96dff"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little drink store up at SFU. It was my first time trying Yogost and the staff was nice and patient with my choice. I think the drink in general is a bit pricy for what it offers but it was still good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMShUUkZ6Mmj2Ec0DpH567Zc40bvzXCQqOuCYZy&fid=0x0:0xff4a384b97d96dff"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"Rosie Rong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeq5Td26cS63ctQbFflteStrJH8jb1GC459Y5Jfn2ditRRZEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff is very friendly. And the yogurt is yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_fA0J9y10BhEf7dH-jxUxllkDhlBQnGX7DXLH&fid=0x0:0xff4a384b97d96dff"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Tim Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLz5rO122Hj3VAUcwXsC213Uj_5-x3fIFyGdcQJKYGy9Miyzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One person working, but drink was delivered within two minutes. The person also stick with the process and called out my order when it was done, although I was the only one. Interesting concept, I would recommend their fruit slushes and with reduced sweetness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPE-4rwhOxuggBHH00GuEtcpEi1TLubfRQ-ucFl&fid=0x0:0xff4a384b97d96dff"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"MIKAILA KAHN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZrot2ak5TzFuAOupRpsrSrynaJkJcNEXQpLwkCDfgQgaKqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wish I could give 0 stars for this absolute disaster of a “restaurant”. Every single Yogost location is under staffed with 30+min wait times every single day and it’s absolutely ridiculous. Tried to order on Uber for pickup and was told it was too busy. A joke, save the trip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"준면송이","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK8FCu9OjfF6FGoA57r82mJ-pZMwQzkwynQCf3R3I__P0DhM3WuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was so amazing experience to be there since their drink always give more than expectation, always fresh, and staff are really friendly. I ordered rice yogurt last time and I ordered matcha mochi yogurt. I loved both drink. If you are SFU and you are looking for something to drink, then I recommend this place and starbucks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbMzfwCAYBQ1cXRPZ5wcjGJJH1BqIlp2mkF7jO&fid=0x0:0xff4a384b97d96dff"],"When":"2023-5-15"}]
