user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Yui K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp3HCV4DpRLjcnqAeASD3s3A4WGKgCnNbyVQ4WVfzXV-fapuB-FA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No matter what you eat or drink here, you won't regret it. Everything is soooo delicious.
My favorite is the pistachio croissant donut, but the scone I had here the other day was the most delicious scone I've ever had in my life. I think scone is my new favorite.Everyone should try it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbCLDrtxaO5KDtPjBlkRpFhp2ZnD6O0c9exInM&fid=0x0:0x82fb41dc599ae45b"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHTcuSM-4ly1uIP3q2-jgQ_2Vqi7GhBmGO9JykCcOlnN1NYOmqYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly staff helped guide me through the maze that is the line + million pastry options! How does one decide! I could go back a couple dozen times just to try something new. Adorable & delicious, will definitely return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZj5sxsHQOj8DjrcuSEofX52tol_dA9TtqT8Go&fid=0x0:0x82fb41dc599ae45b"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This is a very iconic coffee shop.
It’s great to see this coffee shop at Brentwood Mall.
However, compared to the quality and atmosphere of other locations, I’m slightly disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6Rs1yvD02BtiNqmLsa39bALf3Htj_N1nfwho&fid=0x0:0x82fb41dc599ae45b"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"MeganMoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIqNrocluvebctUWQfv5il3VHeKMDGxr_n3l4nFY1oEA-JBEG8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend the chocolate almond croissant… best I’ve ever had. Flakey dough but soft and chewy alongside the almond and chocolate jam. It’s quite sweet though! I also ordered the iced hojicha latte. Real tea and perfect amount of sweetness— unlike  the matcha latte which always tends to be a bit bitter.  but I guess it’s to enhance the flavour. Pretty cafe interior with a unique barista bar in the middle! Loved this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4TiIshjSo-5_WQb8fSlhtxOyyWNFoOC8C9aeK&fid=0x0:0x82fb41dc599ae45b"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"All the flaky pastries such as croissants are very good… even better, go there at breakfast time and try fresh-out-of-oven ham and cheese croissants. So good!
Cakes and breads are good as well, but scones are not my favorite. My fav today was banana bread with chocolate chips!
Located in Brentwood mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyQRf-BKF85o3Dt9P8tBnpbIu9zhIEQnko-k8u&fid=0x0:0x82fb41dc599ae45b"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Karlee P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKcogQ6RORYiMmSspqCcqCmyIrc0-pWDzMzKeIGrxpNySqDxSl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The SV Almond Croissant is the best Almond Croissant you’ll ever eat within the lower mainland. We recently tried the Birthday Cake and it was seriously a dream, so light and not super sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAs4UHsMLuy3KnU-Ua6sKZC3Ak9pmr8QplwcuL&fid=0x0:0x82fb41dc599ae45b"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When I just need coffee, it is always irresistibly attractive for me to grab a pastry. The croissant was divine. I was blown away by its crispiness and softness, even though I went there about their closing time. The cafe is small though the vibe is good to chill out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTUPcQu-AXbreQ7xiC1G-NtsDO1CevyHPAvoON&fid=0x0:0x82fb41dc599ae45b"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"tl;dr you must try the chicken sausage roll. Also the pastries > the coffee.

Quite a busy location given all the condos that have gone up. The line moves fairly quickly and the drinks come out without having to wait too long.

The chicken sausage roll is my favorite item on the menu, and generally the food seems to be better than the coffee. The sourdough loaves are quick good.

I ordered a bone dry cappuccino but I ended up getting a milky coffee. The baristas seemed like they were in training.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbqM36N67tD5kWSNluoQ5vL6FFwtfdC2F7lwcI&fid=0x0:0x82fb41dc599ae45b"],"When":"2024-4-7"}]

Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"North Burnaby's Starbucks is convenient to park and get to-go orders. Located on busy Hastings Street, it has easy access parking. Friendly staff and good service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT54ePqGEsnmsFebgWP0c-w1B6137DfHDD8jmf\u0026fid=0x0:0x10c7643d3fd0d96"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Alicia Gee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7ztomO0JCACiRLvvrTQWDm1OXsMrkPzur7srCIuUg33Sq6gky=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"disgusting interior with horrible costumer service! from the moment i walked into the store i was greeted with a frown, the cashier didn’t offer to use any of my points scamming me in the process!!! after being scammed when i received my drink the asian one quickly ran from me as if i had a disease when i all i wanted after that experiment was a straw. 0/10 never coming back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly, consistent Starbucks service as well as tasty coffee. A nice coffee joint boasting plentiful outdoor seating area offset from the sidewalk, to enjoy your True North Blend in the sunshine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyY6Rt0ILxgSLB9IlccDqLIXQEQwJ8P-hx3U3j\u0026fid=0x0:0x10c7643d3fd0d96"],"When":"2022-6-19"},{"Name":"Peyton Carrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-b_0AMOteBH7X7Q-QEi78sJ7wm4E1eorW9LO2gEQOBRMuQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love going here. Everyone is always so friendly and helpful and it’s a great place to pick up or sit in","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gizem Dincel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHxVM9sKgaNCtV-pIMqUiMMSJLH9FUfyvoVfQeIcckwfxO2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have bought 2 different coffees just to watch them spill all over our car but thanks to the staff offering clean towels we were able to avert the crisis. They even replaced the spilled drink with a fresh new one. I’ll definitely go back there for more drinks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"El B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1Jp_yyor94dWcxEABRdR-csu7LJ3E6mAmEDdXvZyVkvxhIa10=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Location is good, free street parking. Not the cleanest but the service is good. It can get busy sometimes. Close to the bus station and other restaurants. Sometimes they run out of ingredients too. Whole milk most likely. I've been a couple of times and they didnt have any, so the latte didn't taste as good. So.etjing to consider for the management.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKYKq8js4F2VgA-oF6tcPfHSIF4Dv0mIZslsTZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x10c7643d3fd0d96"],"When":"2021-11-6"},{"Name":"Jennie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfasdelsoNylDA32yEVmpQs7ovI94yHbZp72jMzJprVCfiaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff at this location are always super friendly. I am greeted every morning and my coffee is always made right. The best start to my morning with the staff and coffee","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Lacson Ello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJus38Jm8x4a4FpscwrnNrQTjVBeHPRdqtc6sWQWa80xSZEdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s my second time to order in this location and my first experience was not good but this time it was really good because I got my cafe latte very hot and my request of extra sweet and extra sugar they give that’s this time you deserve to have 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I will comeback again and I definitely recommend your store to have hot and fresh coffees 👍😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTPhdCvcsrHFLBkY2iekQ7ZkuMA9-3obP3kwZ_\u0026fid=0x0:0x10c7643d3fd0d96"],"When":"2021-6-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marcus L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZLCsGchamGOA-Wtg05cndL2yjt6EBGtYR9Y9cWGpcdNb3N09u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paradise Juice, nestled in the bustling Crystal Mall, is a delightful surprise for juice enthusiasts. Upon my visit, the charm of the place was instantly noticeable, with a warm, welcoming atmosphere that felt almost like visiting a beloved grandmother's kitchen. This feeling was further amplified by the owner, a kind-hearted grandma, whose hospitality added a special touch to the experience.

I ordered the pineapple juice, a choice I didn't regret. The juice was served in a generously large cup, priced attractively at only $4.75. What stood out most was the use of real pineapple, offering a freshness that can't be mimicked by concentrates or artificial flavors. Each sip was a burst of tropical bliss, perfectly sweet, and refreshingly tangy, capturing the essence of the fruit wonderfully.

The overall experience at Paradise Juice was delightful. The combination of genuine warmth from the owner, the exceptional quality of the juice, and the reasonable pricing makes it a must-visit spot for anyone in Crystal Mall. It's a small, unassuming place, but it packs a punch with its authentic, homemade-style juices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1Ar410OzNInhj5jyT7wR8S1n3OWWOSIcCEmI&fid=0x0:0xd9ebc3427dc8c85"],"When":"2023-12-23"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing hidden 💎 gem for 100% fresh squeezed juice at a great price! It’s like a mama’s juice kitchen with fresh ingredients and the juices are made to order with fresh produce before your eyes. No fillers or additives, just pure fresh squeezed juice! Tried the fresh squeezed apple, carrot, and celery juice combination and it tasted healthy and refreshing. Will definitely be back. They also sell desserts, snacks, and other drink varieties.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEwpAwiEVFpA7VaQcQ2OK_2VqZ7OzsTQ9357xV&fid=0x0:0xd9ebc3427dc8c85"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Aa Aa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGR-YOfrs42P2VvMps3wWBpZ3R3wvnGZyU2FFwuO2XOcv4EqI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place for fresh juice! A must-have when visiting Crystal Mall. I like to get the strawberry and orange smoothie. The shaved oce is also pretty good in terms of toppings, but the ice can sometimes freeze into a big chunky block. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"F52","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA5hxcDaUg_IcmxK7gW_t5jVMBKXVPVI5gzaMoDUvqo8gvlj_M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super fresh and the owner is very 好.
I had to edit and say that its the best place for drinks. My favorites are watermelon and kiwi fresh smoothies","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlL53MzIRhEVyrGYkcLEPx5VW0NRUydwM_y6Hq&fid=0x0:0xd9ebc3427dc8c85"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"I D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJePVcTLvMpAzx-nv1Jiy6G3BSAT8AXC96M8bp3iDt95AnsQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Someone else ordered the mango slushy. I had a sip and immediately asked the person if she saw how the drink was made because the slushy was made with real mangoes! I wonder how many mangoes were there because the drink was like only $5. It's sad that not many places use real fruits and I became surprised when actually tasted real fruits in my drink. I wish more stores will use real fruits and keep their prices reasonable like this store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tommy Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAAYe1XxxoqwcbOTCRztR0Ko0z-4NgnBOpMCSFfDjHpBalsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never judge a book by its cover.. this place and it's owner looks super unassuming but it serves some of the best FRESH fruit drinks in crystal ball! Not only is the fresh fruit excellent the price just can't be beaten. Cash only but it's definitely worth it. Picture is a red bean coconut milk with sago and it is actual ground red beans!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlLUo0O9Ye9MgCx_tkQmVTkgb37bxrcraQflqi&fid=0x0:0xd9ebc3427dc8c85"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Shrabani Debroy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYL4Gcm8AzzdKrz2I0PGeidVlJwvqCzJCs4bmvn-OmODzCt10=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely not the fanciest or cutest spot, but my friends, for 5$, you get freshly squeezed juice. In this world of inflation and greed, finding smoothies & fresh juices for that price is unbelievable. They event had a happy hour from 3-5 pm (you get one free drink with the purchase of 3!). I will be thinking of Paradise Juice every time a restaurant charges me 16$ to blend up some fruits. This spot is located inside the mall!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ca Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXL3EK0jr4Zk86UNU8ai2U6NqqQQ0LHT3uNSCKG-BsRXiVgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mango grapefruit tapioca with pearls is $4.95 (cash only). Half sweet was perfect for me. There are some chunks of fresh fruit mango and grapefruit mixed into the slush. I liked that it wasn't icy. There are less pearls than other places but it's included in the price so that's fine. Some coconut milk would elevate this drink but otherwise it's pretty good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOby3TydubF12d_JnOPrQCCWd4x6WRA7vEGW9hV&fid=0x0:0xd9ebc3427dc8c85"],"When":"2023-10-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brad Woof","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOikOWWy3FFvrMZb5HocaqSzvdkVEsop6bS7a63EMLwSmSTiHj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I noticed this place a few days prior & made a note to comeback for lunch a few days later when I was back in the area. Neat to find a 'hole in the wall' local restaurant that serves good food for reasonable prices. I checked out their reviews before attending & was happy to see that they have high reviews. Their website lists all their menu items & current prices. Parking is Free in the Parking Lot outfront although a bit busy because there are quite a few business in the corner complex. The restaurant doesn't look like much & the atmosphere could be better, lots of room for more tables etc but the food is really good quality, price is good, & service is quick albiet a bit of a language barrier. They did bring the food to the table & gave glasses of water without even having to ask which was nice. I ordered the Chirashi Don, + a side Miso Soup. For the Chirashi Don was happy with the presentation, size of the peices of sashimi, & number of pieces was pretty good for the price. Basically 10 pieces for $14.50, lots of tasty sushi rice below too. I would order again but next time will probably go for the Deluxe Chirashi Don to see the difference. I grabbed 2 takeout menus on my way out & will tell people to go & try this place when I can.

*

Came back with a Friend on SAT JUL-27 & we both had Bento Box A which for only $11.45 was exceptional all around. I highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvHuVATDU5d3Nw7upe0OD6wFPnkjPILNGFcz-T&fid=0x0:0xe102f9ac29770d63"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! What a pleasant surprise. It’s definitely not gourmet sushi but they get 5 ⭐️ because for the price point to taste ratio, it’s perfect! Their sushi tastes amazing! The sushi rice was the perfect texture and flavour and still fresh and warm tasting. Their BC roll was a true BC roll bursting with salmon skin. Highly recommend their combo C for $16.95 which comes with California rolls, teriyaki chicken, sashimi, assorted tempura, salad, miso soup, and an orange slice. It’s the perfect mix of a bit of everything at a great fixed price. The portions were all generous too and would definitely have sushi from here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvuMdX8hOKTbyzdICifqVoypqPJNiVLySDez-O&fid=0x0:0xe102f9ac29770d63"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Jennie Gaeun Jeong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdBsJcaFPd0UawfEbpKsScTiEnTsmeN_7DVjYHJnuxnO7dvHY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sushi Q used to be my favorite place. I’ve ordered more than 7 times, but I was really disappointed with what I received today. I’ve ordered the aburi sashimidon more than 4 times, but today’s aburi sashimidon was awful. There were 3 tacos, and only 3 pieces of sashimi. Before, there were at least 5 pieces. The quality is getting worse, especially the aburi-don. I recommend ordering the sashimi-don instead of the aburi-don","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrknyAr6H_fATuEwQneJsMxDLnDGV4pBvqX-_k&fid=0x0:0xe102f9ac29770d63"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Lizzie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5qIG1VmBASZQRSYXsIMifm6rtLhZA6xcKTGDs0bvXyJT2pXkmsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Local gem sushi shop 😉 very nice quality sushi with affordable price. I love aburi series, creamy and great aroma. I'll definitely come again when I visit Burnaby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4fYhB6YhXB3qnh4sutOO_j1ujLkgKt5XD_fWA&fid=0x0:0xe102f9ac29770d63"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Dru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcIUWhXu36DJooUJ1lpbYjpqIkYmzEr706B1kzk2ckCpk9YfWe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favourite Japanese restaurant. The photos are from a few of my past orders. I always order bento box A and it comes with delicious miso soup as well. The food is always fresh, affordable, and made with love :))","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFh9sXOG-jhs-IICs1mBQgc4I38AFWIOLu5dOJ&fid=0x0:0xe102f9ac29770d63"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Kalvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYzAZd-0_JeniSNljNxgImCwzlXWbe6PzaDeAXT6_nhg5vP5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Portion were generous, quality of food not there. Sushi, tempura and miso soup had no taste. Good price for what you get.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnERr9NWv2sr26_j-e0lypwJayJmJLFxSnX1Xi&fid=0x0:0xe102f9ac29770d63"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Popular eatery, more so for take out. The interior and ambiance is very simple, with minimal tables and chairs for dining in that felt more like an office setting rather than a restaurant. However, the food was reasonably priced and decent! I had Bento Box A ($10.95), which came with teriyaki chicken on rice, assorted tempura, a side salad, and a California roll. The tempura tasted fresh, the chicken was well flavoured with the teriyaki sauce, and the salad had ample dressing. The California roll came with 8 pieces and had a substantive amount of imitation crab! I may not dine in again, but would be happy to return to take out.

Extensive menu with lots of cooked and raw items! Service was prompt and our food was prepared quite quickly. We had to pay at the front counter. The restaurant is within a commercial complex that has limited complimentary parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzROliJYk6T7MlLhhvNksx7ty1jyLQmL2FHlfF&fid=0x0:0xe102f9ac29770d63"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Chelsea L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeNrEgqwcoT_dQPlVSlYzahJemcNKWPa8MpMYyDTVBOPId1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi is good and the value is amazing. Can’t get over how generous the portions are for the price. Everything tasted great and not low quality or anything. It’s nothing fancy but it’s the perfect lowkey meal that’s fuss free and delicious. Defs will be returning!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Coco Bubble Tea (Kingsway)
descriptions: Cheery cafe chain serving Asian bubble teas in both hot & cold versions alongside juices.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgIvhBRObE8mZXq0-aUB15LbKQSp2HT1oxd3erG1oXl2VtVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Haven’t been to a CoCo in years for BBT. The inside is barren with only a few tables. Drinks come out quick (under 5 minutes). There was a constant flow of people coming in to order.

Went with a grape dream (normally $7.50, August special was 20% off) and dragon fruit coconut splash ($6.90). For the grape dream, you can’t change the sweetness (100%) or add extra toppings. It reminded me of grape soda with jellies. Didn’t love or hate it. Dragon fruit was plain, tasted more of the coconut.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNn3PlZ5iPSBMD8NFwEIRC5zaK6iOw4g0Z4U5Cs&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2023-8-12"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome bubble tea joint! Coco is by far my favorite in all of Greater Vancouver!
The menu isn't huge, but a lot of professionalism is put into making and preparing your drinks and is customizable on sugar and ice for your preference.
Staff are very friendly, a nice comfy joint with a good COVID approach and therefore unfortunately no seating at present indoors.
As a vegan, I also love Coco as they also use a powdered milk and therefore does not contain dairy.
Also try the honey jelly topping on offer, it's super yummy!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNByte1VL00WKCBJWqsYCKdwNOYjceXzb92CtrE&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2021-3-7"},{"Name":"Marcus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVpAqx3Judbzb0iuJXzx52iIPBZjNV225UkWQ26P-4HM5WbcSiFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This bubble tea place is okay. It's a fairly standard menu and flavor of bubble tea, the pearls are also fairly standard as well. I've been here a few times now with different friends, personally I have not found anything on the menu that I really love. That being said his face is not bad and I would recommend people to try it at least once","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1ODVXKu9PVsM_3g_fUUpoZLZK-Vd5A-TUzL1K&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2018-11-6"},{"Name":"Ben Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmgpt-ch-VVaJQP1roOkAUr3Arw7zqItEVK3OzLQ_Jg2ZxmIs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This what mango yakult supposed to look like? This is our regular drink from coco and we have never had it look like this after sitting out let alone receive it this way. The employee offered to make a new one which turned out the same way and separated on the spot. We were then told that it was normal for the drink to separate like this. We believe the yakult was expired or the drink was made incorrectly, but there were no efforts made to figure out the issue and instead our concerns were dismissed. $8 for curdled milk…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfNAPr2xbygwgrsXoIxDGiLJjI6pFwHZAXf87L&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Eric Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlU-3PL5lXr0fnWYaC3MgD7YEA-M3CKuKKccWmbp_HpzGChqE_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love Coco Bubble Tea! Their drinks are consistently fresh, flavorful, and made with high-quality ingredients. The tapioca pearls are always the perfect texture — chewy and delicious. My go-to is the classic Milk Tea with pearls, but they have a wide variety of options, including fruit teas and slushes, so there’s something for everyone.

The staff are friendly and efficient, even during busy times, and the service is quick. The shop is always clean and inviting. If you're craving bubble tea, Coco is the place to go. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC9-7jgHrRnIwFsISGsFLrpStc4ELW_un-82rl&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Soumya B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoc36yEgTVYkCRh6_dbLdsQ5fCdh7tnVjCg_-3MefjbFmD2vU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst experience ever! I have ordered drinks with preferred toppings online. I got the drink with a note stating not to order that drink again. The drink was ordered half sweet, and it was made extra sweet, I had to throw the drink in one sip, never going back to any Coco bubble tea store again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqOX2CteXrejMIwI6zZKbILu9HT6RDT5uscp2_&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2023-8-6"},{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast service and very accommodating staff! I always drop by here whenever I pass by.  Our go-to drinks are matcha and their regular milk tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwhnj9pfXbw-bVOCVEJcdVwvufifR6LRhQtLp1&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Leslie Watts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhVALIpKUXd2Jj9UQkNRFuMmxt7u84QrNJKcNV1wusI99Xnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a Mango Pomelo Sago drink and it arrived containing coconut. My five year old daughter is allergic to coconut. She drank half, as none of us realized and she doesn’t know what coconut tastes like.  Her face is entirely swollen and she is crying. I can’t believe they would add coconut to a drink and not tell us!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEJSuNDo7QTnyij_rRzXkBCVdHg81jyn9AKkE0&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2023-11-24"}]

title: Chatime Bubble Tea
address: 2740 E Hastings St, Vancouver, BC V5K 1Z9
descriptions: Modern, casual Taiwanese bubble-tea outlet specializing in milk teas, fresh juices & smoothies.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Laurie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP32EmmLA7sbp2akuOTnRFXkpvW1Ws_zHiyJT6aKu5oVq7fkbx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been here a few times and the staff have been consistently unwelcoming with bad customer service. The first time the girl got my order wrong. Then she refused to correct my drink and instead insisted that I ordered it. I left unhappy and none of the staff seemed to care.
Yesterday we decided to try it out again. Arrived and there was a BIG sign right in front of the till that said “After school special, 2 large drinks for $10”. So I ordered two of the golden aged milk tea with pearls. The lady said ok and asked what level of sugar and ice I wanted. She tried to enter it into the till. She had troubles applying the special deal and then asked her colleague. They spoke in their own language and tried to figure out how to input the deal. They could not figure it out and looked confused. Then a few minutes later she looks at me and says “The special is no longer available!”. I asked her why would you advertise something on a huge sign that is not available and then told her to take the sign away so as not to confuse customers. She made no eye contact and didn't apologize at all about their false advertising. She should have honoured the deal and then removed the sign. Customer service here is definitely not their priority and their drinks are average at best. Will not be returning as there are many other  bubble tea places around.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tricia C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS8jxdORXKJaAWhct8yqQ3gE8qhWdlJFJL5jsz8u98jLVDfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This bubble tea chain offers a variety of flavours.

Drink:
I had the Jasmine jade green milk tea with grass jelly. The grass jelly had a smooth light texture and there was a lot of it in the cup.

Food:
The lemon macron looked cute but was a bit stale and tasted like it was sitting in the fridge for a while. The lemon jelly filling was on the sweet side so I would not order it again.

Venue:
There is plenty of seating inside the shop at 5pm on a weekday.

Parking:
There a few select spots available in the plaza parking lot and on the street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTjkTEARfe4j-yLcgxmBl3UTqr57hkSpc6-303&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty yummy bubble tea as always from Chatime, AKA the OG, Grass Jelly Roasted Oat Milk Tea with Pudding is great value for money and a dope refreshing dessert for a warm summers afternoon in Van!
First time at this location, a nice chilled out, laid back and cosy vibed joint with plenty of seating. Staff initially made our order wrong, I was quite displeased being dairy intolerant and making the order pretty clear. Nonetheless, a nice BBT bar with minimalistic and comfy decor.
Chatime is awesome that it offers both a good rewards scheme and plant-based milk alternatives which keeps me a regular visitor.
Don't forget to signup for the rewards to save on them slurps! Also, please try bring your own straws and cups so we can reduce single use plastics to save our beautiful earth and save money whilst doing so!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpjPkimIYGpVM2YwQFbv7cj5ydyxSSnG8XByLp&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2022-8-9"},{"Name":"brin078","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjEjudHGDD4lF9sPHMxKJzE0189aq1kMJyUhe37AF1FCoGdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered all 6 bubbles in total and can’t believe not even one is tasty.

I have these drinks in Taiwan and also in Vancouver in different stores . I am never dissatisfied and disappointed with these drinks .

I ordered two roasted milk tea and they taste just like water with pearl and not much of either milk tea and can’t taste tea flavor.

I ordered two milk made of fresh milk for my kinds . They normally would fight over for more . Both of them refused to drink more and ended up in garbage bin. I had a sip and it tasted like water plus water with not so chewy pearls . Also not sure why there’s a tea taste when I ordered fresh milk from Uber .

I ordered grapefruit green tea without sugar. All I can taste is this cheap grapefruit syrup and I can barely taste any green tea .

Don’t usually leave a review especially when bubble tea was invented where I was from . This is such a shame to call yourself bubble tea from Taiwan .

Taste awful !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpUKG22g1LkfysakMlg3JBqOG_LS5GHsmqSQBe&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"George Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsF_25d7mK9wyvvDectasCJYgS7vh1fkq2W_Bc1m35m5Gb6bO8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The male reception on the afternoon of May 4th is extremely rude. He refused to answer my wife’s question about Lychee drinks ingredient and ignored my son saying “thank you” for the macaroon. Drink was good but very disappointed with the service attitude.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtRHcw1Vj4ZARDfcwnUonjHmRgxV_LgM24x_t9&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Triet Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI_HV5MYzTiE_dsokfD8KSRZk7T4sv1leRq6UAQatC8bgBn6SCWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the tea here. The drinks are fresh, even though is quite more expensive than my hometown. Still enjoy it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlZ25oeD677Ey94Jov5cQdoDIX3foysLtkyLzT&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2023-9-17"},{"Name":"Diana L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW2kdRGGLj1j8iotZR8u_6cJvN47azaqWmh-dWmP_2e6mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I really like this location. Easy to find parking. Only thing is the inside seems a bit run down. Same with the quality in the drinks. It was not the same Chatime I’m used to. It didn’t seem the same but we only had two drinks. One was better than the other so perhaps the consistency is not the same. Would come again but prefer others although lots of space to sit unlike Broadway/Granville.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODnBPUy0-x27K1szeeeeiqDK4PbH7vmDV3oi0&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2018-4-24"},{"Name":"Carlos Farias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHRKsSyrR8qrmWHf6dYiB33HYZ-07e_MC5PJLBl0ZM169UE9Ma=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Atmosphere, music and very nice location, on the other hand, the attitude of the staff by other hand so deplorable, with a really gross attitude.
So sad because it’s my 2- time here and it didn’t feel welcoming or any empathy, they just protect that they don’t wanna be there and as a costumer it’s very uncomfortable…
Hopefully this not happens to another costumer

It’s recommended that you guys install a kiosk.

Relocating from 🇺🇸to🇨🇦, I usually feel tired in waiting to talk to a cashier. Also sometimes I had to rush myself in order to response to cashier, and didn’t have much time to think about the topping I want.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurpal Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxGxCUco0HhaolWURGC9coVIw-kqGRg0PxFDMMiSmLDLjpySl86Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jaynar is wonderful host, I went there at 10 pm which is closing time of store they clean all there containers and cups but still they go extra mile and take my order I really appreciate that when host like jaynar goes extra mile to value there customer. Great drink. My favorites are Okinawa pearl milk tea and mango green milk tea.
Loved it clean and amazing ambiance.
Sanitizer available. Over all great place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOhu5hHJ8eEzARABagZqHAk-5Ho4qQg6b1XgHX&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2021-3-2"},{"Name":"Robin Logan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmErXwD9gH3DKGGGeoo_JEqme19csLmfwk5YL1f7TcGvWRMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really nice atmosphere with wooden tables. Friendly staff that is happy to customize drinks. Pretty good drinks, had a mango slush with vanilla ice cream and it get a thumbs up. We mainly come becauae of the nice seating here. We will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx82k_ttN5HP94hbPuwnLig4JwRUOneEM5Np89&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2019-2-18"},{"Name":"Francess Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUevT2cLHewCAgAvgHJfy10N32wUoqX1ZxxHhAN4EUZp7pACuTW2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered the Okinawa Pearl Milk Tea with less sugar and it tasted like brown sugar still, unfortunately. My sister had the Taro with fresh milk but it didn't taste like taro at all either. The place is nice and pink though but it's just not my cup of tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM46C0yIE9H6vVSXSVaCv36e6j8zsHNE-2inKtB&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2018-11-14"},{"Name":"Tn23","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsGxbchcoLrkxVTBgH4SJUR2sfT2zAPoH5rGfegdO_5zjnqEz-eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Another bubble tea joint. However this one has some very unique options and flavors. This location has great seating for  hanging out or just somewhere to browse and hang out for awhile. Nice atmosphere and very well decorated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7ZBaVG87TbqgF_57UFSwdI3gq3vSmxqWrfwpH&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2018-12-25"},{"Name":"Colin Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmj6MhtlSuchjt0rwIhDLL-gfFLCSzn9JjmAgaVo0OShSgXKYS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Customer service needs A LOT of improvement!

Pros:
- Bubbletea is good and seem to be consistent with other Sharetea.

Cons:
- The workers are REALLY slow, I literally watched the new guy move his hands slow-mo, it felt like I was watching a TV show and it was a dramatic scene. I guess he's new, and lost I guess... so I pretended to look at my phone as I wait for 10 minutes for my drink... although I was the only one who ordered at the time.
- I had a free drink to redeem, but it was only for regular size, I was okay to pay the upcharge of $3 but they said cash only because they don't allow card payments at that cost cause it was too low, since I didn't have cash, they didn't allow me to get the upsize. They should have a sign that says that if that is the case.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS1sI7brYM_6pz5FiPa6EIVw-F4-YbISrMg2Ua&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2022-11-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sliman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLCGVuOanB5fZdK4mDXVlNu1FRWwlivE-0dO5Jtxe0XvekGJ21jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Plenty of options and beautiful menu to choose from. As you enter the space it smells amazing like home cooking. I ordered a breakfast wrap. It was very delicious and oozing with sauce (to rich to my liking). I’m glad that I didn’t take it to go because it was dripping. I will try to come back and try something different and experience more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6TRgSSAWe6Gi5i3bP7VpvYn8j6B-_4mlJvQB5&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great spot to hit up for decent good eats and brunch. Decided to give their special of the day a try and it was good, solid and what you would expect from a cafe.

It’s nothing too special but it fill you up well. Came with some chips and soup which was nice. It’s a nice quaint little cafe in an industrial area with decent eats and overall I was quite satisfied. I’d come back again for a decent sandwich. Staff are very friendly and they’re open till 3 most days. I’d give their Benedict a try next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKGgSQEfVitCPRyAUV4ztglT_6YE6HgX0jlLYi&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Mohammad M Islam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuRqeYa0qeQvQy57V-9LRvbVMV5FXbbaQqt8771B7XbII3uUko6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been hearing great things about Oneway Café, and I finally had a chance to try it out. Based on the positive reviews online, I had high expectations, and they were mostly met! This little café is located in what looks like an office block.

The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, with a bohemian vibe that's perfect for a relaxed breakfast, brunch, or lunch. It’s nicely decorated, and the menu offers a handful of delicious options, from classic breakfast dishes to creative lunch plates.

I ordered the avocado toast with a poached egg, and it was okay. Maybe I have different taste buds. I’ll need to give it another try. The presentation was very nice, though.

The service was friendly and attentive, and the staff were happy to answer any questions I had about the menu.

There was plenty of parking around, at least on the weekend when we visited. It might be different on weekdays when the offices are open.

Overall, we had a good experience at Oneway Café and would recommend it to anyone looking for a delicious and cozy brunch or lunch spot in Burnaby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU1q_FYN2Z3CJf-bVxdhOGJ6cMbOI9jrXTe2Q1&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Jessica Aranas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUG8N5f3Wd4GKt8zT_qaGsKHP4OREkobtyE2Xefb2cmdEv-KSHu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best brunch we’ve had so far, it is not as fancy as other restaurants but the food is so delicious. We ordered the Bulgogi Benedict but next time I’m gonna try other food on their menu. Maybe, they can design the place where you would want to stay and relax. Anyway, giving 5 star for good food, good service, and nice ambiance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhqGsOzOFuDa8MJNV7PBEDq-g3GuU3DdX7kJRe&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Kun Ho Yoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7a_TkQUEpAcdGGNy9qU2vuDm2_Ypkj7DPW3ASPBDUd0z4TSse=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is simply amazing, I visited for the first time and I couldn’t have asked for better.
The service was really good and friendly. It was very welcoming. I ordered avocado Benedict and with the lentil soup and it was simply amazing, delicious. I’d love to visit again, you must try it in the cafe instead of take out because the vibe and the environment here is very relaxing and pleasing. I would love to visit again in the future, definitely recommended 10/10. Thank you so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0UPiGNH0-MWY3UI2P1K5KDL_c8aKMY1MNaAk3&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Stephy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV09N9nFBWqArIiOZROODXFgWotqMzNAOWY7bfqNJM_q_rhJ8yu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was excellent! Staff are very friendly and everything is very fairly priced! Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1btgaJ5BIR3VHBGX9Rsrz1iR2BDIRm94BKQ-4&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Fluffy Squirrel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2-eZIWh01U6JMyfsAly6kLgc0p4QySV9zmMG41-1unvk4QA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was introduced to this place by my relatives and I can say I was really impressed. We ordered tomato soup, avocado toast, Wednesday special BLT and veggie bibibop. All dish had fresh ingredients, yummy flavour and no flavours were an overkill. The staff were very friendly and checked in with us a couple times to see how we were doing. Overall, it’s a place where I can comfortably bring anyone for a nice brunch / lunch and have a good warm meal. Highly recommend giving this place a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyCuX0uUpjqF4OOkmesBFJQs0r_hZD6_x-dzGn&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-1-17"},{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking for brunch near Coquitlam and found this place online. It was delicious! We tried the Bulgogi benedict and the shashu grilled panini. Both dishes were filling and very good! The taro slush was not fresh but I liked their pearls. Prices are kinda expensive but it’s worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE2AQvy74mCjiYS3AA3iiRbOmc5ylV3lCW-Ucg&fid=0x0:0x3332f77d0ceb5860"],"When":"2024-7-15"}]

title: Ki Cafe (Ki Tea House)
address: 6888 Royal Oak Ave Unit #105, Burnaby, BC V5J 4J2
descriptions: Hip nook with outdoor seating & a manga library offering sandwiches, waffles & bubble tea.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a cute little Japanese cafe with aesthetic and cozy atmosphere inside. There's not much seating inside so we decided to order take out. The service can really take a bit long so definitely not for the impatient customers. We love the manga comic books by the way. The drinks were good and reasonably priced too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRGD8nYQJidA6DBy5QiDqk6LnV-WiESxVso3S8&fid=0x0:0x254631561f5d7e1f"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Y S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTmtWUtCZcs7qDdNKdjVbtcx5f5BcDfDU3YRp4zcFsXHKu1_WS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I came here on Wednesday morning after my facial next door. The cafe is beautifully decorated and love the atmosphere there. It also looks very clean and tidy.

However, I am disappointed with the staff’s attitude. I have been waiting at the cashier to order but there was nobody so I called out hello but still nobody responded. I had to call out a few times to get someone’s attention. Before I even order, the staff was rolling her eyes at me. The staff’s attitude wasn’t something I would expect at such a beautiful cafe.

I ended up ordering two cheese tarts and a coffee. The coffee wasn’t that good compared to Starbucks. The cheese tarts were okay.

Paid street parking at the front and free 2hr parking down the road but there’s construction at that area so traffic isn’t great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLzQhKdIQPlI59OYds5DRcpBec3oPCjUgRVDzF&fid=0x0:0x254631561f5d7e1f"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"katelynn c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoqcwb_gcSeJsQp6Fk0xxFfLaz6Ca58KOlakGeP011yHdUWdF9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"the desserts were okay, the matcha choco fudge brownie was kind of disappointing because it didn’t really taste like anything?? but the demiglace omurice was really solid and quite yummy !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjAIBE4Qv_jWNVMe_YuqyEwGlYirYNlcn-PLfU&fid=0x0:0x254631561f5d7e1f"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute cafe! The interior of this place is amazing and there’s so many cute studio ghibli / anime / cute decor pieces. There’s also a whole wall of manga that you can borrow and read in the cafe. This place however is a non study area sadly and laptops are not allowed so be mindful of that! We ordered the bubbletea, green tea icecream with redbean and mochi & a coffee pudding. They were all super yummy and the coffee pudding was on the bitter side. They also have food but I never tried and would love to come back to try them as well. If you love studio ghibli / manga I highly recommend checking this out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5BQVF3150rwNfYmE8NRSD-abhpTOQFkzT6HQi&fid=0x0:0x254631561f5d7e1f"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Himaja n.r","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbBcCMElyeR7Qe6sAsxQKowD85vosivAhiDgGY1_qzXvLqPoZg9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ki Cafe at Royal Oak in Burnaby is a cozy spot known for bubble tea, savory dishes, and desserts. Its relaxing "fantasy garden" ambiance, featuring hanging plants and a manga library, makes it a unique experience for comic lovers. A downside is the no-laptop policy, which doesn't allow you to work from cafe, but guests are welcome to stay and read manga for as long as they like","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1rx2ztp7BPqYFm014ccZ9x6JV-K98MHG4KtT3&fid=0x0:0x254631561f5d7e1f"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Brendan Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL52nSnxyb9miikRVKucHP-_jp6e0QVSLP-GB60DwPkT3Hh6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Would not recommend ordering the food or drinks here. The premade desserts are probably ok. The omurice tasted very off and the rice, meat, and eggs within it all had a weird aftertaste. The okonomiyaki waffle was interesting but the waffle was mushy and it did not really work as an okonomiyaki base. The portions are also small for the price. The galaxy drink was a very ice heavy slushy.

The decor is pretty nice and there are manga, but the selection isn’t large and half of them are in Japanese. However, you are better off going to a library and bringing some food/drink with you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4Cp_BBI-2z8zjdmekWpw7SuGc-b7vxmbu8R4Z&fid=0x0:0x254631561f5d7e1f"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Sylvanna Asia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmsWXEHQalvaC5ABrM1q72CnDZ6rI63smroBO-TE7Em0Wndg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little cafe by Royal Oak Station. There are a ton of anime books you can read there. Keep in mind, it is a laptop and study free zone but it is a really nice spot to read. You would need to find street parking if you are driving.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_JvPXb0Jb4SOuHaULfPMgpTdxQFO0v0SZ6Yr_&fid=0x0:0x254631561f5d7e1f"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When searching for the BEST hangout café in Burnaby, Ki Cafe (Ki Tea House) is easily one of the top local favourites! 🎉

This small, cozy spot is perfect for anyone who loves anime and manga.  📚💖  From the epic manga collection to the shelves filled with anime figures, we feel at home geeking out while sipping their colourful, delicious drinks. ☕🎌

What we tried: 😋
✨ CURRY OMURICE カレーオムライス 咖哩蛋包飯 $14.25
✨ ELEGANT STRAWBERRY WAFFLE WITH VANILLA ICE CREAM $15.50
✨ ICY BINGSOO - BROWN SUGAR MILK SLUSH WITH PEARLS $7.25
✨ GALAXY - BLUEBERRY LYCHEE SODA SLUSH WITH MANGO JELLY $7.00
✨ MATCHA PARFAIT 抹茶パフェ $9.25
✨ CHEESE TARTS $8.25 FOR 3 (UBE, MATCHA, ORIGINAL)

We come here regularly to treat ourselves to some tasty desserts 🍰 and soak in the vibes.  Whether catching up with friends or just chilling solo, it's the place to be.  Perfect for anime fans or anyone looking for a fun, laid-back spot.

📝📝

Food: 🍰🍰🍰🍰🍰Must Try!
Service: Eatery
Kids: 👶👶👶👶 Yay!
Price: 💲💲 $30-$40 per person
Presentation: 📷📷📷
Parking:   There are lots of street parking in the residential area.
Tips:
📝 have an hour-staying limit.
📝 have a restricted rule about using laptops and studying.
📝 can be easy to access - only a 2-minute walk from the Royal Oak Skytrain Station.
Would I Return: Yes 👱‍♀️ the royal customer","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEv5CeZv2p2MS5rCA7Sdu-0eEui8EZAR1GV4I3&fid=0x0:0x254631561f5d7e1f"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Juliana Bergstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9z_V4_T4Kb4r0iN3AY1nc4y5c0skm3bc-4FOsN5--jOSweZ2U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here are super knowledgeable about tea and this holiday season they had cute, easy gift sets. They also have great hot and cold tea latte takeaway options.

They support other local businesses such as Pottery Works and indigenous-owned Native Northwest by selling their beautiful teapots and mugs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf_DXKn4KEV2LjBVDMQ7hOBrbeB2r-KQ4eASpF&fid=0x0:0x5cea86fa6419607d"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Gex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbmdVCZ0CjPs9igEnhvHF5vDc-U6HVjr3Q0AtBYcYvhyoqYWXc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Getting gifts for family and friends has always been a challenge, however tea has been a consistent great gift. Having such knowledgeable, kind, and helpful staff, makes the process easy, enriching, and fun. One staff member in particular whose name I sadly am struggling to remember (Christin, Chrisandra, something like that) made the expirence for me even educational, where I feel I walked out of the store not only with tea in hand but with knew knowledge and understanding of the tea making world.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cheryl R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUyTNKmKtKxrSxK7_BciPRnt9sKJ6Cy_S_xPZwu3GJQFpPwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a variety of teas to try and so far am not disappointed. The delivery was quick and arrived with a personal note from Naomi which made my day. The Peach Apricot is so fresh and smooth. The Himalayan Sunrise is a little bolder but equally smooth. Looking forward to trying the Lavender Earl Grey and more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nestor Balce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrAywvoW5m9A1xC29xheHOx2JdxIXdfoif0KOpDymd33tKxi-3Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best hidden gem in Burquitlam. They do Matcha Latté the right way ... With a proper whisk!!! Great alternative to coffee., And good for your heart.  Get the Ginger x Turmeric x Pineapple Tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9JPADfnrr9uviRVpj-_q9GEhKJOb2lv5JtKb8&fid=0x0:0x5cea86fa6419607d"],"When":"2023-1-16"},{"Name":"Moj Noroozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXugascUb1Fko0SBjm9NLiM6IJLmrr73V93pNQAUcsSq60KoCcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is super cute ! Fresh fruity tea taste like heaven
My friend and I had such a great time at this place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8d3YXlTyq7TezBSWsIghtMrIHPjXN4sGcNdDF&fid=0x0:0x5cea86fa6419607d"],"When":"2023-12-2"},{"Name":"Bianca Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLQf55yrLfuQpaVH5_PAPb-xLqdrIrBA83-7_og5_ndyF7MIm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ever since I've discovered this place, I have been coming back as it has become my go-to place to get my teas!
They have such a wide variety of all types of teas, so you will definitely find something you want to try.
You can choose from their menu at the counter. If you don't know what you are looking for, there are samples on the side where you can smell the tea and buy them different sizes.
They also have a small drinks menu where you can buy a drink like lattes and lemonades.
All the staff I've met there are super friendly!

10/10 would recommend to go check it out if you are a tea lover.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darius Kalinauskas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUb1WfNJbyEa3CI36Js2_cI7ESTTaCNmaii_q6S-mEoM-4ECHwb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing staff. Super helpful and friendly. We ended up buying 3 types of teas instead of one. Everything smelled so good and after our first cut, it was definitely worth it.
Coming back for more for sure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vic Yung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjSUFpvFSwHsCrywPzGZzN7WDhV8Ljlj3YECw07iwjqMR_leW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely staff and a wide variety of tea to choose from. As a first-time visitor, they were helpful in explaining the tea they had available and were able to recommend teas to purchase. Even with only two staff members working at a time, they were patient with each customer and ensured that everyone had what they needed.

The space itself is small, but there are a few tables to sit at. Great Wall Tea also offers drinks make from their teas that you can purchase onsite.

Great place to visit if you are looking for loose leaf tea (and some related accessories) and want to try different products.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Xing Fu Tang Burnaby South
about: [{"id":"from_the_business","name":"From the business","options":[{"name":"Identifies as women-owned","enabled":true}]},{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My 10 year old daughter decided she wanted to treat us to some bubble tea out of her own pocket. She's been offering to chip in or even treat us completely with her own money ever since she was about 4 years old. I truly believe that we won the "baby lottery" because our daughter is sweeter, kinder and more generous than I could have ever imagined she might be.

So, when I saw that Xing Fu Tang had an all day, everyday Happy Hour menu, I decided I would stick with that menu and save my sweet girl a few extra dollars since she was being so kind as to treat Mommy out of her own wallet. While she bought herself the ever so fancy Bunny Jelly Mango Smoothie, I ordered a Passionfruit Green Tea with Lychee Coconut Jelly from the Happy Hour menu.

Two thumbs up to both drinks, and I know from previous visits that they do very nice brown sugar pearls for anyone who's a brown sugar pearl fan.The store is clean, bright and spacious with several tables well spaced apart from each other.

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street and side streets
Location: 6271 Kingsway, Burnaby","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRjJbk820_xpu56CJCHjrC7yxuZh8_5SVrTEB7&fid=0x0:0x95697b070e540101"],"When":"2023-4-28"},{"Name":"DK NG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDL3iKzA-KwRBp_QW-T4bxIzouYpU82YVrkKDRjecsEEcAnsE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another new store! First time here, their signature brown sugar pearl got the great taste of brown sugar & chewy which I like. I ordered red tea latte, not bad but I’d prefer a more strong taste of tea flavor. Great environment, bright and clean. Some parking spots are just outside on the road, pretty convenient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb9LidjAN39C2JDFlHy_EsOEsVbYDMbK5KV4_F&fid=0x0:0x95697b070e540101"],"When":"2019-9-25"},{"Name":"H W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiEtu-Pfzzd7vMmnC1lRzmwYGQeuaGu_8hpE004heAd4NBbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really good bubble tea at comparable prices to other places. The space is really clean and bright, and has a cool mix of modern and traditional decor. Staff aren’t friendly but aren’t rude either.

Seating is pretty limited and they’re basically just low riding stools with some table space. Cool thing is that you get to see the bubbles being made in this huge iron pot which is fun. Drinks came quite quickly and the space is pretty open to hangout if you wanted to.

Definitely check out their classic brown sugar bubble tea - instagram worthy indeed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7Ibci7EgDscvN5kuhmTRdJJ8fsNmrJRtxlwZA&fid=0x0:0x95697b070e540101"],"When":"2019-12-8"},{"Name":"Angela Deng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9zyNtFN9D6wocph3CT3Ygx-VwE6xm99CKR6h-oUguH4-kNgZv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried lots of bubble tea places. I came here and ordered their signature brown sugar pearl milk tea. The taste of the milk tea here is definitely the best. The pearls were too chewy for me, but others might like them. Pretty good value for the price. Was a bit disappointed that you can’t adjust the sugar level for this drink but the default sweetness is just right imo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1l4yg2IFtCFfRKoi-EQ3hMUAssf5-GMh0Pd3f&fid=0x0:0x95697b070e540101"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Ember N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOVVSRZSBJ6e5O5jUUtiBAq23q-FcEx-8tVq1hmthlfDRNYcfgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update: March2021
Husband and me found the HAPPY HOUR!!! 2 for $4+.
So far this place is better than the Teaespressu cz all their gels are all softer and if stored it doesn't go stale and harden.

Too pricey but good. It might not be healthy of course.
Bought brown sugar. My husband sipped the first half and when I got to it there was not much left.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuGoFxWh4yTwUzji1whwzVVwveL6euDwFBs1vs&fid=0x0:0x95697b070e540101"],"When":"2021-3-24"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried their lychee bubble tea and found it to be pure average in taste and texture. Didn’t really like the sugar they used as it didn’t taste like pure cane sugar and the drink tasted quite artificial. Meh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTWBHyCfwyLiCx9h5kja3dso1VD8HIDCHc8N2a&fid=0x0:0x95697b070e540101"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Absolut YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAKKuJBhDjQ2yvrY0bCIOExStNeMzrxg1x0ksL6cHk4jqCNjYH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice and clean bubble tea. Newer for this area. Chain from Taiwan. Brown sugar bubble tea. Taste good, very smooth. Bubble were chewy which I like. Bubbie I've cream was good. Short wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM449g8PglPaEyfhUbRiJGUInVNphM1UHbqjGtF&fid=0x0:0x95697b070e540101"],"When":"2019-9-1"},{"Name":"Samuel Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVup_QHKSbyyeNUUrr4rIO4P05naFxbh8_XknX6X8P8tuViCqQS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been a few XFT locations in the lower mainland, this one is by far the best. Friendly staff, quick service and quality drinks every time.

Aside from the consistent quality, I have to say, they have the best mango drink/slush. I’ve order many times either in stores or via Uber, never had one weird tasting or powdery mango-flavoured drinks like other bubble tea stores.

Area of improvement: hot beverages, would be nice to get them in paper cups and have them slightly warmer.

Thanks and keep it up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpUCa5S7s4x8D4uIVnvRd92QQnmnl55JNIYVSW&fid=0x0:0x95697b070e540101"],"When":"2022-3-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden gem. Stumbled upon this place because I had a meeting. The Korean food here is legit as are the sandwiches and fries (they are very addictive!). Everything is made fresh so they can accommodate a variety of dietary needs.

The owners are super friendly and go the extra mile. The seating is basically shared seating with the school and there’s always ample room.

The portions are very good. The spicy pork on rice was especially good and much cheaper than anywhere else.

Definitely not on the beaten path, but if you’re in the mood for lunch and willing to take a quick drive definitely check this place out.

Protip: You have to pay for parking on the street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtlHqahc6sGi7684OYN9hTPX35k9hbPcv-0YUK&fid=0x0:0xe414e2be58e8336b"],"When":"2023-4-28"},{"Name":"Sarah L. Yoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr3nRlvDIVK2aYQLxRLkmQQxOLDFn7TySUcC3TQJDcP8EI6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing!! Had Cafe Namu catering individual lunch kits to our womens group lunch and it was perfect. I had the Chicken BLT and it was delish! Soft bread, tender REAL chicken, not too saucy, it was perfect and it came with a variety of spreads like a charcuterie box! 100% recommend their food and the catering service! Will definitely be ordering again for other events! See pics for reference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj52O-2HtJBPn0uqgk-sZ7vqHnuWIcXVMSF-E&fid=0x0:0xe414e2be58e8336b"],"When":"2023-10-30"},{"Name":"yunny sunny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjBSlJ78ZA9kz6F8Sa256AhoaEG1t83AuvkYjTfmmdN6OPwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"best Korean food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjTeFElR4KJKa5R09HcCd6XbKoBpfUXWegKiEk&fid=0x0:0xe414e2be58e8336b"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Missy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-R5Y5RVdNIR7wVJteBYdVwL8BfDS0v7KThBR-yqFhlYXb6HWsJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this place is so underrated, their sandwiches are so good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vinh Doan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIb6dY-LSdapW5CLcgsRN47CWBY9Xus5EGbs3cpDw_YVoPxEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this hidden gem!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simon Blizzard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3d4fwUCBSt_Mht_8fKEduAFdxHa2yGgbV-a0ZdghLFNvdhwuX1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"very good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnKh6tQxr57KoK45HDIA6uOxt7hqXk-SHULoFj&fid=0x0:0xe414e2be58e8336b"],"When":"2023-11-1"},{"Name":"Katerina Babelo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUubEN3PEjpSrioifuk7j0jpzc0zJwS-_Guv4k4s1Kieze=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Avocado & Cream Cheese sandwich is sooo delicious!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacob Andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtF381cZM8fCt8-gsJP9EZXEzS0zIaRrQv_tagLXzLck6oOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Sushi!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kelly I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXquEahqi64vPbCeET717zYpgegwA8i3NW9-l7MkI7Qwpb7QLT5Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to meet someone and ended up buying some. This was the old location of beard Papa. Same recipe just a different name. They were so good. Had the mango special of the day, green tea and vanilla. There was even vanilla bean pods. Freshly made. Jazzy music ambience. Reason why 4* ambience is washroom didn't have enough hand soap. Would come again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"BR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKvHcZB7xb4n8CF1jxejOIwoYqPKN4SdZc0qIjcZcbAYMjdkneNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee and friendly service. I got the 6 mix and match, which I highly recommend if you can't decide on a filling—this way, you can try them all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiCY7pQ31hP-dU6CaGI5FD3hBjt2sK1RjASnTT\u0026fid=0x0:0x4a508083ece1afbe"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Kind Kafferep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXVMH9eZcFNtMSPxWqq4tXJXNHY91RnVb0IVwa1gusN2VjEi4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice and simple bubble tea and bakery. The cream puff was crunchy on the outside and lots of filling on the inside. The bubble really was good and the pearl texture was pleasant. Great study spot with plenty of chairs and free wifi. The staff were helpful and quick. They even served the food to our table. I also found the location to be continent, with it near a skytrain station.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn1BDhmFCq_8GWL_4G3x6Wi1wmPy_e5XzP_0ij\u0026fid=0x0:0x4a508083ece1afbe"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Jesus Mario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw9EfQQCMzcT2kzd4vT6VNdwHS86pt5SL3ObKHB6HgP1EEqg4Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried the teas and they were good. Atmosphere and service were good too. Prices are not high.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOkqPS3_5gRbIPKmwfDC1qe7lVRAOQh7WU3HZ5\u0026fid=0x0:0x4a508083ece1afbe"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mini puff tastes really good, it’s better to dine in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvnHle4MJFFdJtoMqn9tuKzGqkqJIevwpZYm6w\u0026fid=0x0:0x4a508083ece1afbe"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Danielle Blatchford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjv806xviHvyNBYifsrWvsGdR_b16GdIGUIrFYoYakrQskE1FR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've been coming here for about 3 years and lately I've found that their cream puff are often mostly empty. The filling barely fills up a quarter of the cream puff, so you're mostly eating dry pastry. Super disappointed because I love this place for a quick sweet treat and a drink. Hopefully they make some adjustments soon","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRm654M6WEPKpMVyI_-_CuYSSnZvfd29M3aYNWNqYhiLyRGrBS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fairly priced \u0026 yummy. I did find the cream puffs to be different than beard papas, even though other reviews state differently. Nice place to study as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"abdul aleem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzsYhxSwEyy3BTZr93EaCPZ7Y46uAdEvz87w1MF4Lzjoo9RQ5Maw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little place at the corner. Brilliant cofree everything baked fresh. Absolutely loved the choc eclair with hazelnut filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyZ_RdJIxS-x0cVjBPrL5wpVhKP8Y4y33Idi4A\u0026fid=0x0:0x4a508083ece1afbe"],"When":"2023-10-21"}]

title: Nicetea
