user_reviews:
[{"Name":"veronica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTUlSmraKlGFRiOhHVqg5pJfNYYYqkln6hQOyZuDhN5G_stQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the girl at the counter named valentina was very friendly and polite, we were very pleased with her service and recommend everyone to visit this place :3
(I gave it a 4 for the atmosphere because the floor itself is not air-conditioned and we felt stuffy after a hot day)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhDY-8osZmAY-ZUYjPCabRf0aCJyhfxvL8m63i&fid=0x0:0xfc80395bc8f6808"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Yumi Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy41KmVFVM7okF9qoUH5OueFfCb9OJSU9LxBcs8xofEikAPTU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Does location have the same owner as the Richmond location? Because the quality here is really bad. I’ve ordered many times from this location and the fresh fruits in the sunny Vancouver drink aren’t very fresh at all. All the times I ordered were quite some time apart, so it’s definitely a consistent quality issue.

One time my fruits tasted like towels, like they were wrapped in damp towels and sucked up the smell and taste of the towel. Another time my fruits were straight up rotten tasting, I could not even swallow after taking a bite. Every time I go to the Richmond location, the fruits are always fresh cut and taste fresh. What is up with the Burnaby location? The tea itself tastes fine but when I eat the fruit at the end, it’s not even edible. I am concerned as to how they store their fruits in this place and how long they keep fruits beyond their shelf life if the melons start to smell and taste rotten, and the flesh starts to look a little clear.

Side note, the phone number for this location is out of service, so it’s impossible to reach them by phone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice Tea is a place to go for fruity style bubble teas with real fruit! They give you the option to upsize your drink to a 1L cup for $2.00 more or you can get a mini tasting cup for $2.99. Tried the Pineapple Memory slush and it was very refreshing with a combination of fresh pineapple bits and pineapple flavour  mix that tasted like Taiwanese pineapple cake type pineapple flavour. It was good. Also tried the peach konjac and it was again light and refreshing with real fruit pulp and Konjac jelly to chew on as you sip. A place to go for light, fruity, speciality drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlQud0z87dpczKBD4iZnon0H3KkJ1vcVe1_efA&fid=0x0:0xfc80395bc8f6808"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"D Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4D0pnJRuugp7xtOoI9Okhc1IdtNuzKocuzhsSBj3gUdos57g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Unable to choose ice level on fantuan app. Picked up order and the ice level was like 60% of the drink. Did not want to pay $7 for 60% ice.  🤨.

Otherwise happy with drink combination.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBEYG5cZq3zwNYnyOgDdyJq-9chlry9wDMLZjE&fid=0x0:0xfc80395bc8f6808"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Man Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-Cf14wB_44bFI0bNyxHejkafo20x0z49nNadZ8NTMYzMKFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh kiwi juice with mega size. Best fruit tea ever and suitable for all seasons drink it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzIwEZwxLVEYJv8FXYf3PztW9chtoYGFPQWpFE&fid=0x0:0xfc80395bc8f6808"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Lee Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRBy8Fb06zcv2im4Xq6tGHgqoMAYw4Uo8IGytZI3przH-pSGI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This tea was not “nice” at all.

This place must be the only bubble tea place I ever went to that doesn’t have a hot drink option.

The person taking my order didn’t even ask me what size I want - in the end I got a drink cup that was the size of an army man’s thermos lunchbox.

Also they didn’t have pearls…. There wasn't a single customer in the store - how could a pearl shop not have any pearls?!

Lastly the drink tasted atrocious. It tasted like a protein drink mixed together by a small toddler - just because you combined sugar with milk and tea doesn’t automatically make it a bubble milk tea.

I drank 3 sips and then I found the nearest park garbage can and threw it out. No need to get diabetes from a sub-par milk tea. As a day trader, I treated this experience the same way when I pick the wrong stock - throw it away, take the financial loss, and never do it again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2RGdfUX7oLn55TdkgjI4Ef1v_9MMxFntyKOkd1YIjEY3owV8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Drove a long way, bought a cup, and came home excited to drink this, but then I notice a bug had floated up to the top. Now I’m sad. What a waste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVgzLYdAspmcvwSuT52f5AW0zNnw2taKFVuhVR&fid=0x0:0xfc80395bc8f6808"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Jess Moreau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe8ozlufqR9UcCMNpmoxV2U8cvlU6KDbFs1Mf3rpI5EH2q4qNDfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Unreliable!

I really love this place! Their drinks are amazing. However, it's the third time in a row I try to go during their opening hours only to find the store closed. (Edit: 4th time in a row now. Just so annoying!)

Please please update your hours on Google and display them on your door 🙏","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed my mango pomelo drink. Place is nice and clean with lots of seating. Staff is nice and friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEHOu309D-Jt9tfLSE81oqbDtVdL2hzGxCOU7B&fid=0x0:0xb57a54e6db1dd2bc"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Jayson J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh5xePACHGFMrujGyu-HBmelU_P6fuccz4VSAVxS0935C9YQ3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was fine, but the sago in my drink was not fully cooked, was hard and chewy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRmtfT6pnIsDzzP2IoyJ_PfHt96tg7zVdsXF--&fid=0x0:0xb57a54e6db1dd2bc"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Patrick T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjeEStwGBBYDVfjE6G8mIEmqCUPQN06go2xtOUmjv8zfwzIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've visited this location multiple times and have always had a positive experience. The environment is consistently clean and well-maintained, with an easily accessible and typically spotless bathroom. The only downsides are that they don't accept the CoCo rewards program, and parking is limited to parallel spots directly in front of the store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They make really great fresh tea. I love their passion fruit black tea with pearls. It is very refreshing. I wish this place will open for dine in
customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNyU9KjZuBRVgp4AenYfHQXrdviVTSKT_b76tr&fid=0x0:0xb57a54e6db1dd2bc"],"When":"2021-7-6"},{"Name":"J L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKvo0f9wV45XfYDz9DTk9_qAqjSfvjzw2F3xyU97Va5nrk1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I placed an order through the app and arrived to pick it up, only to discover that the drink I had selected was unavailable. Unfortunately, I wasn't notified ahead of time, which was inconvenient. I modified my order to Mango Pomelo Sago instead, but unfortunately, the sago was undercooked and still hard. Not ideal!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Classic large chain to get bubble tea with pretty consistent quality throughout the franchise locations I’ve been to. This store in particular is quite large, very bright and clean. Staff are quick and efficient. I'd recommend half sweet for all drinks. I personally like less ice/no ice as well.

Pearl Milk Tea: my go-to drink, with powdered milk. It’s nice and creamy.

QQ Milk Tea (potato/taro balls): very tasty and chewy potato/taro balls. Milk tea flavour was great as usual

Bubble Gaga (Passion Fruit): strong passion fruit and tea flavour, with a good amount of toppings, but was a bit too sour for me.

3 Guys (pudding, pearl + grass jelly): super loaded drink, you will not run out of toppings while you drink. Pudding was very soft, without much distinctive pudding flavour though. Grass jelly was also soft and smooth. Pearls were a good consistency. The drink base is just regular milk tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWF3Grr47NSLp4u8djqDtl-sRvsU6jgT6bz83V&fid=0x0:0xb57a54e6db1dd2bc"],"When":"2021-7-1"},{"Name":"Kel C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkIHm61ytxlCshJOJA0YomcRSaap8Jz4z3spo0dnrYdA3z0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered our bubble tea ahead of time on Uber by 10:37 and would be ready at 10:50pm however we were at the store already and waited twenty minute. And they were taking orders however they cancelled our order and were still taking orders. Terrible service and they canceled our order and stated that they can’t make our drinks. And they were serving everyone before 5min of close. Don’t come to this location. Terrible service! And there was two people working. That is very sad! Also they charged us DONT COME HERE THEY WILL RIP U OFF AND WASTE UR TIME!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNUFsFkMtCDj6f-VYgh-tL_VEOyAnOcHI9QYjq&fid=0x0:0xb57a54e6db1dd2bc"],"When":"2023-6-17"},{"Name":"christina sigouin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBvd5sl4V7eZwe-aA8jxeS0IihXlO0cQhJ8xE-il11Ken6ag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Consistently disappointing experience with staff and drinks. Taste, speed, and overall experience are not great.  Staff are unpleasant.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Bengong's Tea Burnaby
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kind Kafferep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXVMH9eZcFNtMSPxWqq4tXJXNHY91RnVb0IVwa1gusN2VjEi4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cool wish tree (I think) in the front entrance. The staff were very good at brewing the tea and the bubble had a deep, roasted flavour. The jelly was consistent in texture and very tasty. One of my new favorite bubble teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc7m3PzPqEFRyIqaJImX0QA2qLN5dNBC4QfwSJ&fid=0x0:0x82600a30d5c6cfd5"],"When":"2023-7-16"},{"Name":"Marcus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVpAqx3Judbzb0iuJXzx52iIPBZjNV225UkWQ26P-4HM5WbcSiFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered their milk tea specials with cubed jelly. I had milk tea oolong, milk tea, and milk green tea. You can taste a clear difference between the drinks. The jelly cubes have a lot of sugar in them. I ordered my drinks with 0% sugar, the drink itself didn't have sugar - just know the jelly cubes are full of sugar. Will likely not order from them again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU2cdDQdvdR6ouzpNeXlQgsslSLo9vI0n1B4UB&fid=0x0:0x82600a30d5c6cfd5"],"When":"2021-8-25"},{"Name":"Just Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpg6JS2aKWvuN_Z_d8Pkn9AopM_PPGT_T955vjyVHZ2841tXh5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What a confusing shop! Three broken, bent and worn out patio chairs greet you at the front door and you walk into a disarray of seating for customers taken up by a giant paper tree and the owners "office". It is so BUSY looking that you feel it's packed standing there waiting for your drink. The person I feel most sorry for is the person who makes the drinks and the management that doesn't understand less is more and maybe you should take your meetings outside of the shop because NO ONE can sit down. For $9 average for a drink, no thanks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Tanner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-8SYe2XMeZaMdEPBImj12917JawEbqEIGpQFMDTKExk_QiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been getting take out from Ben Gong recently and we decided to dine in today because we were in the area.

Overall, the gentleman working this evening was very knowledgeable about the drinks and had great suggestions for what to order. The caramel cheese drink and the taro pudding rice drink both hit the spot. We got them both in the half sweet variety and had both hot and cold versions.

Would totally recommend even in an area / market that is surrounded by neighboring tea shops.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOso23ZfUx-XGIv4zsH3SHY0CSRh-7MG39JFYFT&fid=0x0:0x82600a30d5c6cfd5"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Gloria Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBucSyoIbyOtlp7BqngrekMUeXPKTqVD0sOtkiryIc41s5b51l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This thing is 9 bucks with artificial flavored taro... Which taste super disgusting. Last time I ordered somethinh like that was only 2 bucks. Definitely not worth trying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYwNQiTIRKZOchKBIKoceBRKHqQMRKbXYEJQ30&fid=0x0:0x82600a30d5c6cfd5"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"S T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBDT4t4CmjbeG1_4bxKEc3_bD87k27YAWNghrm5hK--TRj3j-l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I loved their hot tofu pudding with purple rice milk tea during covid take-out only weeks but ever since restaurant reopening phases, they’ve cheaped out on the portion of tofu pudding put into the drinks in the recent 2 different days I purchased from them.  Was very tempted to just quit buying from them and increase my patronage to Tea18 (rose pearls), Taan Char (popping boba) and whichever others instead as I’ve been regularly trying all the new ones popping up while revisiting favourites as well.  I’m still going back to them just less frequently and fewer cups purchased at a time to see when they might get better or worse altogether.  That said, today found new menu items added to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4L6Feb33Z-XMpf3GW_b4ZXJUbhXIs2EPEZ41y&fid=0x0:0x82600a30d5c6cfd5"],"When":"2020-6-20"},{"Name":"Kayley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8rElAm3ZmfcnYFdpKJDDqjT52y_Kif8rj25N9Ou_H5jY948cA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got 2 drinks from here the Dahongpao brown sugar pearl and the Chrysanthemum Pu'er Cheese. I loved the first one because It had a very strong brew and it did not taste water down. The pearls were very chewy and I loved the texture and there were no issues with this drink. The chrysanthemum Pu'er is something I don't see at many shops and it is a unique blend. I enjoy. I got this drink half sweet and for some reason it lacked the same quality. It was very hard to recognize the flavors of this drink. It could be due to the cheese foam but I would have to try more drinks to give this place a better review. I liked their cheese foam but it was still missing something. Overall, I think this place is a bit underrated and I look forward to trying more drinks from here.

They also had a cute wishing tree inside where you could write something to hang up!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk_EPEvLZkDStGqK7FK_0Y2eyolRSnLtUTM8i_&fid=0x0:0x82600a30d5c6cfd5"],"When":"2023-4-6"},{"Name":"Somu Chettiar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYVXWi_2p9diw8m_eSO01HDQOgLvHKx-8VgGFCp1Zjmvkp_Eaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered a “Phoenix Tea” which was on their featured menu and it was basically just milk. 3 of us ordered bubble tea here and it was $8 each for plain milk. No flavour and no sugar even though we asked for regular sugar. To make it worse we asked for no ice and the guy added ice to fill up half the cup.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Tsujiri

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the matcha goodies in one place! I love their matcha daifuku. It is very soft and smooth. The cheesecake is also good but I am obsessed with the daifuku and the ice cream. I always look forward to my trip tonthe grocery because I always stop for my treats here. Guilty pleasures for a foodie like me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNecmxXSWF14u2NrTu5rf3ohObBrw6tf5Fmf9kR&fid=0x0:0xd018ac8be1e46952"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had the Yuzu Citron Parfait (with Houjicha) and a friend had the Shiratama Parfait (with Houjicha). Enjoyed the roasted green tea flavour of the soft serve! Nice contrasting textures in the parfait and refreshing on a summer day. With my parfait, it was supposed to include a sakura monaka. However, I just received a regular monaka wafer instead. I'm not sure if the sakura was only seasonal, but it would've been nice if the staff mentioned the substitution given the change to what's in the menu description!

Price point is a tad high at around $11.25, but Tsujiri does use high quality ingredients with their matcha and Japanese green tea. Unfortunately, no seating in the small location, but the wait was short for our order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAZUr3YALKiY8cWiHLqx7JtzvGh_5ZMGPQYvKq&fid=0x0:0xd018ac8be1e46952"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was not outstanding,  but pretty close.   For a mall quality,  I thought it was very good.  I have gone a few times and feel that the wait for the ice cream was rather long,  especially when there wasn't a whole lot of people, but they were very friendly.  Would go back and try other stuff,  or try their other locations as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaMb968Vv4N3lNqul4_Yv8v_GOJAj1BALDBR8U&fid=0x0:0xd018ac8be1e46952"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The matcha soft serve here slaps so hard, more then any other matcha soft serve nearby. It has the perfect texture and level of sweetness , only thing is the price keeps going up , please stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgwGkj84GQvppMY-UlQihWRYf37VamO9tz-raV&fid=0x0:0xd018ac8be1e46952"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Ellen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOLwp1YuZHFAfe5TfBAETM7Gfw006WNpu6CMM0hXfmB4HVpR97=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Everything is pricey and the portions do not seem to correlate, but somehow everyone, including myself keeps going back. For this location, it's a pretty unique store...you can't really find a similar menu elsewhere in the mall. And when you're feeling stuffy in your winter jacket after a few hours of shopping in a crowded mall, their cold drinks and soft serve seem the most inviting thing in the world. I also appreciate their service. The staff seem genuinely passionate about their menu and happy to patiently explain various items to help you choose a drink of choice. Embarrassed as I am to be consuming a modestly sized $8-9 drink, I might just do it again if the opportunity arises.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrEAqR4qQQEK2yzWMVZZUPy2U5TjT4QSmsdeqS&fid=0x0:0xd018ac8be1e46952"],"When":"2022-12-31"},{"Name":"T L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTjGpJOWlNfflTgg48Q0TQwFIEqYhwqYrycQjwBD2MWV9bYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Hojicha latte had no flavour. The milk was also not frothed properly and the hojicha was not whisked long enough. Not worth the $9 price tag.

I would not recommend getting a drink from here.

However I've tried their parfait before and that was really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX5C9IcYqrTPbK51tseNvnBzXkEk5XO6z4xSrw&fid=0x0:0xd018ac8be1e46952"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Angie D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTl2uG_14A-KzOiwcEdOB4qUiCIiQjMr0sBwCPk2QLQTM3zxxp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"dec 20
~1:30pm
I went here to try a japanese matcha drink. The girl working with long split dye hair was very helpful to help me decide what to get, and I ordered a matcha frappe. I’m a long time lover of drinks like bubble tea and I can see she put a lot of love and effort into making my drink. It’s delicious. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjM4k0COB4xchV3FcU65GC9aYiWw5C0Eg6Ug9-&fid=0x0:0xd018ac8be1e46952"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"S K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA8crG_Kej_AlW0Buxi8inYMaqvIWjPmeH973uES3cM0V9rLnd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The matcha is of good quality, and the service was great. However, the prices are ridiculous. I paid $11.25 for a parfait with barely a cup of ice cream in it. I would come here more if the prices were lower.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyJuPSNYrMDSOnN2G-smiNZiQG7BZ40VnfCX4S&fid=0x0:0xd018ac8be1e46952"],"When":"2024-4-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Taylor Opheim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVywYbpFifLv9mPJDNRXZFM13jVqEyXzhB3tnxWj37oGVJ7om91=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bubble tea drinks offered here are some of the best. If you’re looking for a very unique and delicious bubble tea experience, you need to try Choo tea. I ordered both the Oreo Matcha tea and the Salty Peach Slush. They were both so good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0yjmKlGayvXYaen36cZRrj9OgOxwDXqeCnWsB&fid=0x0:0x9642e08f8813ff2e"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Keep Searching","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxqxQtVkG41e1hoUwrdBrmFSsCDtPlBQJcpJQRy5tvk4_XgzXy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered Peach oolong tea with salted cheese.
The cheese already mixed with the tea.

We threw the drink after a few sips..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvgY51-Z_HgQKGBE9kGaN4ruRHFYUgzKjedH_0&fid=0x0:0x9642e08f8813ff2e"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Effie W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwAS7Gj-rv1jRBJdMba7ERQYQ4ZbnqJ1iC2dKspsC01Dbz2GYL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located in one of the "outside" facing storefronts (it's not indoors in the mall). The drinks I had were meh, but I liked their options and the service was good. Conflicted whether to give three or four stars... it's more of a 3.5 so I will round up.

Ordered the Taro & Purple Potato Milk with Less Ice and the Osmanthus Milk Tea with 30% sugar and less ice. Except the "Taro" drink had no taro because apparently the taro was still cooking. This was fine with me, they offered to make some substitutions with purple yam and more taro balls. The lady working was very nice and helpful.

The Purple Potato Milk turned out way too Purple Potato-y. Like the purple sweet potato was the only thing I could taste and there was no depth of flavour. Taro balls were nice and chewy. Similarly, the Osmanthus Milk Tea mostly tasted like just a milk tea with a very mild osmanthus hint. It does come with the extra chew of the rice bits (osmanthus rice wine) but I wish the osmanthus flavour was a lot stronger.

While the drinks were not great, I'd give it the benefit of the doubt and be willing to come back and try the taro drink again with actual taro instead of the substitutions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrtLz0Sx0UrQ_YPW-MzVJzNkkobDHQLe0AzywY&fid=0x0:0x9642e08f8813ff2e"],"When":"2023-11-9"},{"Name":"silveryfeather208","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIV1DAc6oAZcKGUjDYKQfX3Js6BWSD-KkYIFsB6AYpaKFALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have so many interesting flavors and unlike other stores I love the taste that balances the milk and tea. The milk is nice and creamy. I had their taro and oreo bubble tea. Very interesting. The workers are polite. Sadly no place to sit and drink there. But at least its near crystal mall food court","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaylee Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrnelwesLWszVvjanLNlsfSIxKVIQPnh9SEyYTfIQJ3XkS9yt8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the best cheese foam tea place I have been so far. I love their salty cheese foam, so smooth and creamy. The peach oolong tea is very fresh and just right sweetness for me (50% sugar). Definitely will come back next time to try next drinks and recommended to my friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7yYEvLRqrPnNaqEbJM1uzndKAoGSPO0y4LDGH&fid=0x0:0x9642e08f8813ff2e"],"When":"2023-5-10"},{"Name":"Claudia lubeseder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcg5Laa1HmiByTOmQ7pwOYHm3cN3-c4WcLSHKyfJqPihgnXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was really good. Not to sweet and the cream was just Chefs kiss","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFLvWL0LX1zmzR62nFKP1cQ-QnhBU4HzFB3tXu&fid=0x0:0x9642e08f8813ff2e"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Celic Pérez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPOvauFZWdIE7GW6Vw06Ov7TA6_cK-kY1qUhzl7yArG8Eflg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the taro tea is really really good 😊 if I can put 10 stars I'll.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJEWJd7WGcJyDdntHvewf0_c9jisTDhvGtkJ2A&fid=0x0:0x9642e08f8813ff2e"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Minge Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQPq3gfp1CJQOtaxgfNb8DiY5NuPX8_8Vhy8UBGw2r608rsOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love their specialty drinks! If you’re a fan of thicker milk teas or different textures in a drink you sure would love them too. Service is also great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN92o4rQdkFTTWCra1eLGB5tUjqL4DA25NZtd9h&fid=0x0:0x9642e08f8813ff2e"],"When":"2023-12-2"}]

title: SunTea 新作の茶 Hastings
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was craving for some bbt at 9pm Sunday night so my wife and I went to Sun Tea on Hastings near SFU. I got the peach oolong tea with pearls and my wife got the tofu pudding with pearls and some white jelly balls. Total came to $9.50. My pearls clumped together and was hard to get it through the straw. Maybe the ice was too cold? 🤷‍♂️. My drink was OK. They had alot of selections. My fave is matcha, but didn't see anything on the menu with it. Gotta try something else next time, hope it would be better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDzmwl9IWn50gjLrAZk9dFFOWATZKOttgeBKhb&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Kaman Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTfY1lFx7N7LsexryuKa9Q76pyfiBSBOSe4KZKmNeoZtDKwC8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We tried their signature and #1 favorite Fleshy Mango Slush with coconut milk. It has some real mango pieces - not as many as the amount of grapefruit they put in the cup. Cannot taste any coconut milk at all. Yes the drink looks very yellow (mango) but it tastes more like a grapefruit slush. We ordered both no sugar and half sugar - we all feel no sugar is too sour half sugar is slightly too sweet. Unfortunately they don’t have 1/3 sugar option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmq7K9cZ6wf4J3Ks4JpursOHz-zFtHK8xRWvWN&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Caitlyn Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU23oPs6bp630i4HnRsvlmDM8OHCc6tCmjkktp0TTzRYVRaKdEDRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the 1L mango slush drink! Tasted pretty good but in comparison to other mango drink places, it was average. Love that they offer this option though, and being a mango lover I am not complaining. Would consider returning for another mango fix in the future 🫡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs-a2ny5StYRTwi9ut51iAda6zqFxYx-hCPqN6&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Zahara Lufar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkU0pVrhQmHvgXA7-Qr0g5qJ8e93XJpntiGvRs3OWVhwWGJLU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waste of money. Ordered a honeydew slush and yes slush has ice, but this is literally just water and ice and barely any fruit $8, for just crushed ice, don’t buy slushes from here it’s a scam. Overly priced for what they offer ! Disappointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8p3FiVWqLNjoRKBnp31K_dV3f1JYVCOVQ9Y3y&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Lạc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpO8370_7RDhjsqnPt6c35t5mMarMGN54u0eeSrhk9ZwWK5CU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks here are amazing. I only went there twice but every time I was always 100% satisfied. My favorite order so far is probably the brulee taro coconut milk tea. It’s insanely good. I’ll definitely try out their entire menu.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered through Buy 1 Get 1 Uber Eat, Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea & The Oranges.
Tastes so so, prefer Milk Tea from Coco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFTKLDgsUGNQMGJoEZii5nH7huCpGkL1HbV6uX&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Pederson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxtwQ0gCdIoJG5048luM-MNrVVVP8u7RPRu6zX3jFifFtX120fjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Stopped here on a Saturday afternoon to get my daughter a bubble tea. I ordered a simple mango slush for her and was told the only size I could order was a large. The total came to $8 and when I asked why the only size available was a large I was ignored by the staff.
Drink tasted like mango, but there were barely any fresh mango chunks or white pearls.
Rude service and overpriced for what you get.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Haohan Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2OF2IvtaHPmIv02p13h4xBl3tQ_RzeoVJbqB1gazhcLJJ-0uq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this bubble tea shop and ordered a milk tea for $8.20, specifying that I wanted it with 50% ice. Unfortunately, my request was not honored as the tea I received was nearly 70% filled with ice. This not only diluted the flavor of the milk tea but also reduced the overall value for the price paid. I am quite disappointed with this experience and feel let down by the shop's disregard for customer preferences. Their inability to follow simple instructions has significantly impacted my satisfaction, and I find it difficult to recommend this place to others seeking a quality bubble tea experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL6If7Dm8ex0a6p3fZnzLRpinrT0gfH5aIBxZy&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2023-12-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"YVR Duke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbrjJ5U6gKw7Gn1zE_GlxhUndims9WHlh7sVaHLXVrjOFlYd_B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a Tiramisu Crêpe Cake as a birthday cake for a family member, and it was absolutely fantastic.

The cake was beautifully layered, with the perfect balance of flavors—rich but not overpowering. The texture was light, and the subtle hint of coffee added a delightful depth that really brought out the tiramisu flavor.  Everyone enjoyed the cake!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrUVE94HGo5nBBqgQt04FnGkPH5Z6AgK1Ll69s&fid=0x0:0x7571aedadd904868"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A few of us came here for desserts.

Food: 4/5 - we found the desserts to be fresh and tasty. The layered crepe cake was just right - not too sweet. We tried both the matcha and pistachio crepe cake and I found the pistachio to have a nicer flavor. Someone had the durian slush and they loved it. If you love durian, it’s a must try as it packed a strong smell! The mango fruit was fresh but there were annoying fruit flies buzzing around. Another had the mango with taro mochi ice dessert. The mochi was delicious. Overall we found the prices to on the higher end.

Atmosphere: 4/5 - nice clean place with plenty of seating. It looked new. It was nice to see some of their cakes in the window but the selection was limited. There was seating available without a time limit.

Service: 4/5 - you choose your seat and a server comes over to take your order. You pay when you leave. Note: they only accept credit card payments over $20 otherwise it’s cash. Luckily a friend paid on my behalf.

Parking: paid parking is available out front.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzrX5x9wX_GTSjlaf31pu_Klu2IZcU-jyPjwBv&fid=0x0:0x7571aedadd904868"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Arita V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOGv0gDz9dbjKUDIAxxLnraa4RVZSJPpHyMLgj-V-McnEvIVI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wanted to thank May and the staff there for doing an outstanding job on a custom mango cake for my 30th birthday. My husband really surprised me when he said he had a surprise for me. They went above and beyond my expectations and paid so much attention to detail. She was sending videos and photos of the cake while it was being made to ensure it was the design he was looking for. The packaging for sure felt like a beautiful gift.
Thank you so so much for all the work you all did. I’m beyond grateful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfzCcMmqEtIMNS_XsYlcslqKWHPAMXbASxVL9V&fid=0x0:0x7571aedadd904868"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Avery Carmichael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVCgHf-yv12L3ZHEkVUN55ICZNsuUQkkgZqLca__LapnX-_D88=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I came here after seeing this place posted on social media by a food blogger, and she knew what she was doing. Everything was so good, none of the desserts were heavy, all light and with lots of fruit, made me feel better about eating desserts lol.

We ordered the pistachio crepe cake, mango crepe cake, mango grass jelly, mix fruit sago ice, and strawberry black tea. The pistachio crepe cake was by far the best thing we ate. Can’t wait to come back and try more 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxTXqjhVkw1snv1GGfwOQOkOHPbXoJ-LiMDPc0&fid=0x0:0x7571aedadd904868"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Ronald Retandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiVTWQFKjqXe4UnsBFRIZ7GxF9tGrva9JzQ7uYayyA9RXk6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a great spot for dessert. The Durian pancake, Durian layered cake and Mango & Durian sago w/ coconut milk is always a hit and never a miss!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIliQaTJhvALI2Gf80L1Vo361cMp-aF2bjiTxW&fid=0x0:0x7571aedadd904868"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"S A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJOMOiZKMkVhzEB7ZORr37dwap2afh8DAG6IHDyoctwDav8XVN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We arrived around 9:30 pm, driven by a craving for dessert.

Opting for the pistachio crepe cake was a decision we didn’t regret! Its smooth texture surpassed expectations; each layer of crepe sandwiched a delectable pistachio filling, with just the right balance of sweetness. With over 50 layers, it was a true indulgence.

Can’t wait to return for more cake delights! 💜","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKJu7F7sjImMToKupr9ad9sPZKNcFILRQjgefS&fid=0x0:0x7571aedadd904868"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Chelsea Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHVWaXfVBGL-NRGFFbHN7eiAD3hCGrOaEohFBcpGwJyjbv0CUl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the late hours and the cakes are delicious! Definitely takes a while to get your order if you’re dining in. Just something to note if you’re in a hurry. We had the mango and pistachio cake and both were great, but I highly recommend the pistachio. No vegan options that I could see from the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3WkxfM_ebkx-4bMzZgUblCHeMgV7LLQc3uD0&fid=0x0:0x7571aedadd904868"],"When":"2024-4-5"},{"Name":"Bernadette Mitra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZn2OlhLbzSqNgz4c-amapCPD8Kdb2gPRnggLH160i4qh7YA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for late lunch with my girlfriends for my birthday celebration. The drinks and dessert were definitely worth the money. It's budget friendly. Customer service satisfied 💯 will definitely visit again 🙏🏽I was given a free tiramisu crepe cake slice to take home. Matcha crepe cake was delicious, as well with the mango. I would definitely recommend this bakery place to anyone, it is a low-key area not so busy  and also there will always be an extra tables to ready to order in.  😋😋","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Bubble World Burnaby
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bob Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7gEa-pMXe2SmF7txaDJhxQkROWXYK6GHi_X2z7fLvS6NhAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Uber experience at Bubble World Burnaby:

The sole purpose of this review is to assist and friendly remind the restaurant of their inconsistency with this highly rated dish and their response in handling the situation.

PINEAPPLE SHRIMP BALLS - received has NO SAUCE. Called back the restaurant and inquired if they revised the recipe and/or just missing the sauce (comparing to picture shown)?? The staff responded they are certain there is sauce but if still unsatisfied we can pick-up a "free sauce for our next visit" as a solution for missing in this order. Phone was placed on table while inquiring with packaging/kitchen staff that handled the order. Loud strong vocals in Mandarin argumentatively of certainty in preparation and in no way for error..fighting back with FOH staff via convo on phone. Few months earlier, this same situation occured WITHOUT sauce - and when contacted via app, uber just thanks you for your feedback regarding missing sauce (no refund), and left unable to enjoy the dish properly. This is the second time. This is the 2/2 orders we made for this dish and we find this troublesome, time consuming and distressing over a simple dish.

At the end, drove all the way back to Bubble World Burnaby and they gave a replacement, while showing them the order made incorrectly.

They suggested for next time to ask uber for full refund on entire uber based on this one dish error. That would completely unfair for the business and I don't recommend doing that in response.

Don't recommend ordering this dish/ Recommend ordering Chicken Nuggets & Taro Milk Slush instead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMThQtfoNX2hDtxUoCJa23FdHDbQ16cOcpCc_Vr&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Miss Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwRhjfH5-OHpuQthobphDEGqrTSpZc4Skj0JUJTU7B1tP8bS8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My friend & I was waiting 15mins for seating and I noticed 3 tables available but the girl did not seat anyone. There were other ppl waiting too. Talked to another waitress and she said we have wait to be called. Another 20 mins passed and the 3 tables still had no one seated there. My friend and I got seated finally after another 10mins and we ordered. My hot bbtea came, and I had to ask for a spoon to eat my pearls while my friend had to request utensils for her noodles. Then the girl delivered salt & pepper chicken nuggets & walked away. We had to wave a waitress to get utensils. All of us at the table felt the services were bad. I don't believe in giving tips for bad services.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaeA8EA9aBDx3Dqi-uMDVS7M9wXQboO9xm4ah2&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had a disappointing experience. The service was incredibly slow, and the staff only seemed to attend to certain customers. Even with few people dining, our food took forever to arrive. When it did, the dishes were either too salty or too sweet and overall below average. I wouldn't recommend this place unless you're just desperate to fill your stomach.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSqrzeMIABCAmgZ0CnJxH75uVQkQ9Gqtj-CbHD&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Mimi Arogie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHl22MZ572JfQST8HkjErDxof6OVP4o5MQGs4gcmTzdlm5ddkrDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’ve ordered from this location and other locations since I was in high school and this has never happened. A simple taro slush with ice cream and these were put in it. I started throwing them out but decided to show them after I kept finding more. This is how much liquid was left in it after taking these things out. Maybe we got the wrong order but it literally had our name and what we ordered on the receipt. Even the condensed milk toast was bad this time. These are my go to desserts and it was not satisfying at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9WxAh3XJIUWPDtMVu5GRxht1TWf3pxgihzmv6&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Martino k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjUwm9_tiJtBn8aHq_pf9WAX2R9oGx8j05UKYRPt9Ihw2wfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible, I ordered take out two teriyaki chicken rice bowls. Once I received them it was half the portion it is when dining in. But we payed the same  amount .. $30 something for two bowls just for us to receive a smallll portion in both bowls. As if they took one dish and divided it . At this point places like Big way hot pot are better at least for the price. It’s unfortunate because the bowls are tasty but how can you be this stingy.??.. If I could rate them no stars I would.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9ZJBKGrisKJtikVD1fZ9uddlnberJ_zuCnJ8G&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty and affordable personal hotpot’s here that come in a large portion. The hot pots come with lots of fish balls, tofu, and assorted vegetables as well as dipping sauces and rice. Tried the vegetable and tofu hot pot with sliced lamb and it was light and delicious and not too salty. The portion was large enough that I could pack some home for another meal and it was under 20 dollars.

My friend had the kimchi pot which was equally large and she said it was quite tasty. Solid place for personal hotpot’s and Taiwanese foods at an affordable price. The restaurant is cute with a colorful bubble wall.

Service was humble and nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9RTR-vEKJ-4KxVdw8Iow3HS71nLXF53n93tLR&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Yuting Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnmXIBtCm63FJEjDfp1HYZuLQgkYSDxM_EAY9WHR4fDPSyrzf_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"portion shribked dramatically, and very unbalanced between different meals.

i ordered a beef stew,and this is the only amount of beef that i received out of the whole bowl. and compare to my friend's fried chicken lunch box, we paying pretty much the same but he's meat portion is like triple compare to mine.

havent had them for a while and the shrink in portion really shocked me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIrHtE-qCHkBRta2_pM0vGgsYzXqlhKKron-xl&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"sally baux","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJPyBCWPmca8C7WPWuGnQRRBsNLbLVAzX5a0NDafbTe3baww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had the worst meal at this restaurant. Their customer service is bad and the food is below average. Overly seasoning and over cooked. I had to wait for 30 mins for my appetizer to come. You can get much better food from T&T instead with almost the same price and without having to pay for tips.
Also their tofu dessert or tofu pudding is gross. Is overly sweetened and not authentic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYZ-3SRY212fu9Cu6PF2SMvTbFPyPJNZpv7F3i&fid=0x0:0x554265aac79f232c"],"When":"2024-6-26"}]

title: Standing Egg Coffee
descriptions: Craft coffee drinks & pastries including signature macaroons in rustic digs with pickup & delivery.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoBEa2DpCVgJo-G-26vwXXigumr7-aNIbPobMzYUx6xUys_Niz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This coffee shop is a hidden gem! The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, with a perfect blend of modern decor and a laid-back vibe. The baristas are friendly and knowledgeable, though I was a bit disappointed when I was told they don’t accept cash. Not sure what’s going on there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf18_rmAm_0Cu_eElwI9kg8xnquHVGcMKVk0U4&fid=0x0:0x6c2610ba83a35ef0"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Dan Le-Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIU55nGNO-JQ_VFmndfqCAupJibjN8FSOn_gorfXsMI0N6YxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the strawberry latte, red velvet cake, and a matcha affogato. The latte was quite sweet but overall still good. For the matcha affogato the ice cream was higher quality than expected but what I didn’t like was that the matcha was sweetened so combining with the ice cream made it too sweet. The cake was rich and dense in a good way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfEEaWrA4wlGKppQSI94LAc53YvSh76RDcYss4&fid=0x0:0x6c2610ba83a35ef0"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Maxwell Gawlick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-FQXkip2yse2z3b1RpWO7_R3FWgxjecA_Xas3Rr3fz_mzqOKX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This coffee shop is super cute! Beautiful aesthetic, if a little eclectic (jehova's witnesses bookstore and clock collection?). Lots of space and usually isn't too packed. It's a little hidden in the Hanam Mall area.

Lots of dessert selections. They run out of their few savory items pretty early. Their drinks are really nice, but the prices are quite high--a simple latte is like $8, and if you want a non-dairy milk, that'll set you back another $1.5 or so which is quite a bit. Not sure how much of the food they make in house, but most of it is really nice. Very few vegan options, if any. Service is quite basic and standard, no notes.

Definitely check it out--its one of the nicer shops in the area, and a chill place to hang out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIhLzijInSHeaHacZNLYo6EdqrkNI81LeiSRyT&fid=0x0:0x6c2610ba83a35ef0"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Kyle Mosonyi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxeTGKVkxyzHvcccVuw1tLSYHtK_ptgeMELKf91-fPI7g80CE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really enjoyed this place. The chilled out atmosphere. The tasty pistachio cream lattes. And the friendly customer service :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCBYPk5YBY8RlC86LELjjAb6td1SDRUAK7RCR2&fid=0x0:0x6c2610ba83a35ef0"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Marjan Sodagar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbeUQ7n7qbMJ2OThg_h-Xdq4j4XJUVbpkuCN0QkHtRIcnDrpUJSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Absolutely love this cozy café! The ambiance is so serene and welcoming, perfect for a quiet escape or catching up with friends. The cleanliness and reasonable prices make it a top spot for me. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a relaxed environment and great value!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0C79FAQq19X9Ii9-fEKcnbOi3eEhfp4N7XNH_&fid=0x0:0x6c2610ba83a35ef0"],"When":"2023-11-25"},{"Name":"Geun U. Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6SO8lO72UTrTSg7RsdJk__lqfXqluZHM7hskTVFK1sy0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love Standing Egg Coffee! The coffee is incredibly fresh and full of rich flavor – you can really tell they use high-quality beans. The cafe itself is spotless, with a clean and cozy atmosphere that's perfect for relaxing or getting some work done. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Griffin E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg2Wqa1fy1fYhSFHxSpRb63pjmRObTxWqK25FqTJeees5QOwY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was an absolute surprise! I came later in the evening expecting this location to be one of the more average coffee shops of the region, but the establishment was absolutely fantastic! The staff were incredibly friendly and generous, the coffee was delicious and the sweets were honestly quite immaculate. The music and vibes in the place were very nice and overall I was genuinely surprised at how nice it was, would highly recommend if one needs a place to relax, sit back and either study or work or socialise or simply just to enjoy the coffee!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Girl Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvDfeBJPT1nj16z6EBMTiqkqgT5efrboX5VoxDUlqzwm9wxZOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite cafes to go to in the KTown area. Their coffee is really good, I normally just get an Americano.
However, the sweet potato latte, and matcha latte are very good as well.

Workers are always friendly, the tables are always getting cleaned up quickly, and a very cute/nice ambience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmU1dRIpzxEYBiIE6-exSejqUADHhFMs0eDTdC&fid=0x0:0x6c2610ba83a35ef0"],"When":"2024-3-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenny T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe7zwS5sOu0N7dgULna7sR8kdK1ezF--5qTVCwIZgwgoxHFYu9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Coffee fan and espresso fan here. Tried there Soon Traditional Cappuccino as it's one of their signature drinks.

Taste: 8.5/9 Coffee beans are not as strong but caffeine kick was there.
Texture: 9/10 Creamy and not watered down like other coffee shops out there.
Flavor: Good balance of milk, coffee and texture.

All in all it's a good texture and coffee made with passion and care.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAaO6gj36l2Jns6ZMDJyG11oi0iZy3jto7lLIi&fid=0x0:0xfb43f5ae2eb7942c"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've visited Soon a few times since the opening. The vibe and the design is very cool and the coffee is pretty decent as well. It is located inside the food court so it might get busy sometimes but still one of the best options to grab a coffee in Brentwood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzt0NuZ5C5d5bc1_NRCGwtbtI-3bQitloiPFOf&fid=0x0:0xfb43f5ae2eb7942c"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Nice to think that there's vegan drinks but still hurt my stomach. The roasted green tea slushy was too sweet but coffee slushy was not too sweet so it tasted fine. thankful for the promo from the farmers market today to try it though","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc3dUQDXFp2pSa9VTpxEe9Pp-7n-N5aeZcmRjm&fid=0x0:0xfb43f5ae2eb7942c"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Convenient coffee spot inside Brentwood Mall food court. Friendly staff and great everyday $2 coffee. If you want a fancier coffee there’s also Small Victory nearby, but I enjoy the fact that Soon coffee is in the food court where there’s ample seating and a much more efficient ordering experience vs Small Victory","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abhay Verma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrV_6i4dbcDuraV7ft63f2m_fuGbXlt4ooiSAA_Az5gxTkAzw0Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the hometown favorite latte and an iced Americano and loved both drinks!

The barista was really friendly, great at making coffee and gave us good service when we were not sure about our order. The drinks themselves were unique, the hometown favorite had a great, simple twist on a latte and the spring menu's vanilla cardamon latte sounds incredible too.

It's located in the food court in case anyone has difficulty finding this location, definitely worth trying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq9OW75IttmmWMwaO9l8U5XVzeKKylNHPo4ua4&fid=0x0:0xfb43f5ae2eb7942c"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Anna Galak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-GNMtmtasDEXBqbed64O79xvbj0wj1dwWfO1CrNYc-cF1UA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is hands down the best coffee in town.

Always excited employees, recommending what’s good with passion for coffee and what they do. Not a single staff member is pretentious (like at Nemesis👀). If you need your freshly purchased beans grind - they will do it for free and ask you how exactly you are going to brew your coffee to make sure you get the best flavour.
The green tea slushie - out of this world!
Brand and merch design - absolutely delightful.

They are located on the second floor at the mall’s food court so the community vibe there is hit or miss.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3lBylmGoglvD3qVOBYMvlo7RV2UX6ZEPZKmoj&fid=0x0:0xfb43f5ae2eb7942c"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Shaianne Casasis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVflTGm8iJItU5OIi2vvnAmt0aeNAsLE9-Rruq437_EqjqkFaHH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A quaint little cafe tucked into the Brentwood mall food court, Soon Coffee caught my eye with its charming combination of blue, light pink, and white decor, adorned with adorable illustrations: a visual treat that initially drew me in.

The space, though small, was well-utilized, creating an inviting atmosphere. I opted for an iced americano and a chocolate chip cookie, simple items that were hard to mess up. The staff were warm but seemed slightly uncoordinated. For instance, I ordered a small iced americano but received a larger size instead. This wasn't a problem for me, but it could be concerning if another customer experienced the reverse situation. Although I was the only one waiting, the barista had to call for me from across the counter and ask me what I ordered, which was strange. It seemed like they were new, so I'm inclined to give them the benefit of the doubt. As for the food, the chocolate chip cookie was mediocre. The center was unbaked and it tasted as if it were missing an ingredient. However, the iced americano, which was unexpectedly sweet, balanced the bold, dark flavours of the coffee beautifully.

Overall, Soon Coffee is a really cute spot that I'd like to visit more often should I find myself at Brentwood.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jyoti Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4iOqEqhynUij0PCQiBi1OzMmu6YLmwWZcNK5VEPw9Kgk92w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great, super affordable stop for caffeine! I got their iced americano and it was great. The price to quality of coffee ratio is fantastic, the staff really care about what they do, and the signage is really cute!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can't believe that this cafe is this pretty when we visited the other day for breakfast. I drive past this place almost every week and didn't know it till the other day. Try their Meet Sausage with 2 flavourful sausages, eggs, waffles, fruits, potato tots and green salad with almonds. It was a full plate that's just perfect to make your tummy happy!

Thanks to Olivia for a great dining experience. We'll be here next Sunday Morning again for sure!

Can't wait!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFrtA8YmtifaL7kZ24YBMILFBaHS8xWj-_tmPh&fid=0x0:0xd6f82a5318716098"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Joanna Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWolcjmld9gF3v6DkaAWVH8shgENhbGrrRuqb_2RSUD8H4muTAvMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time here, and it's a cute, cozy restaurant. The food was really good, it was fresh and delicious, and I wanted to eat more. The drinks we had were also good. I had strawberry syrup and ice cream coffee. Haven't seen it before on a menu, but glad I tried. Service was really good as well, they were very nice and kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb9cixLhdHyRQLqj5ycfGJTEHitIZX4nEgVs9J&fid=0x0:0xd6f82a5318716098"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Vem Fell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwkPSV3Go5MeUNG2num_FvOxxkl2soaYDTRAJLJyvuZfHkM2xy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last-minute decision to come here for Sunday brunch (we're visiting from Seattle) and even though we had to wait for 40mins for a table, it's all worth it! Can't go wrong with smoked duck breast and basque cheesecake--made extra special by attentive staff--for a post-bday celebration.  Thank you for extending a positive dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPqKMImmJtvu8kB5l3Xo3jUWIUEWwyRhrGxvoL&fid=0x0:0xd6f82a5318716098"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Heyam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQm9BhjOHMjC7GcWrHn68t1cIzjRHFnDfgXZNgHLdz2uOG85st=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing cafe and staff. Very beautiful cafe.
We were looking for a place to have breakfast on Sunday. Some of the cafes had big lineups, but I didn't want to waste our Sunday morning in line up. I found 1003 on the map, and we headed here. It has very beautiful design and decor. We ordered 2 dishes with coffee and tea. The food was very good. The bread is fresh. I felt like we were in heaven for our breakfast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1xfOay1A6YbrZ3wA7zDzYNv2r_K861bg3wde3&fid=0x0:0xd6f82a5318716098"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Nikki c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEI07jnFTAEaLsFO0c2_mPPfnmG0XKKHuolSSFqT8Xlgj-nIi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The sausage was juicy and delicious, though the waffles were soft and not crunch (which i prefer) it tasted more like pancakes.

The portions are not as big as they look.

The decorations are cute and overall comfortable dining atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpyvGWGINTnl9f3nub4EaJkHMbyvZ3H8uOJ7hG&fid=0x0:0xd6f82a5318716098"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Elle L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA6uiZPrLU9bl4EujMU3r0rYnUtrFGP8wi2uc18VoJ8Udh_FGB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We decided to check out 1003 Brunch and Dessert and ordered the pesto chicken focaccia combo (with a side salad and tater tots), the bacon croissant sandwich, and an Oreo iced latte. Unfortunately, the experience fell short of our expectations.

Starting with the pesto chicken focaccia: the bread itself was disappointing. Focaccia is typically known for its airy, slightly crisp, and flaky texture, but this version was far from it. The bottom bun was soggy, and overall, the sandwich lacked the fresh, well-textured bread that makes focaccia so enjoyable. The chicken itself was even more of a letdown—boiled chicken breast with no seasoning. It felt bland and lifeless, lacking any of the flavors you’d expect from a pesto chicken sandwich. We found ourselves reaching for the ketchup served with the tots, which speaks volumes about how little flavor the sandwich had on its own.

The salad that came with the combo was unremarkable as well. It consisted mostly of plain greens with no standout flavor or dressing that could complement the other parts of the meal.

Service was another area that needed improvement. After our food was brought out, our server didn’t check in with us, and we were left without basic essentials like salt and pepper, which could have helped improve the meal’s flavor. It was surprising that we weren’t offered any, as it seemed obvious we needed some seasoning to bring out the flavors of what we’d ordered.

The bacon croissant sandwich fared slightly better but still wasn’t impressive. The croissant was decent, though it didn’t have the flaky, buttery texture that a well-made croissant should have. While not as bland as the pesto chicken focaccia, it wasn’t memorable either.

Finally, the Oreo iced latte was another disappointment. We had hoped for a drink with a unique twist, but it turned out to be just a standard iced latte with crushed Oreos on top. It tasted like a quick gimmick rather than a thoughtfully crafted beverage. We would have preferred an option to have it as a hot drink, which could have added a nice contrast to the flavors.

Overall, this visit left us underwhelmed. Between the subpar food quality, lack of flavor, and inattentive service, we don’t see ourselves coming back to 1003 Brunch and Dessert. There’s potential here, but for the price, we expected a much better experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUH29NlM-CmBLD_LOmlcSeukanEn_fDcv2d-TP&fid=0x0:0xd6f82a5318716098"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"cat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOpJ0p_oeAe5MdNgkzgRlfQlHruhwSqcfe0RoRC2l6Ja8sIdzz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was great! It’s hard to find places like these for such a cheap price. One of our knives came dirty, and staff replaced it without request. A 3-course meal with drinks included ($10 CAD) was $48. The bathroom was completely clean and had no noticeable spots that were dirty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPORUpC7oMzhcTNjtzX539QuXZ45WalnP-A3t1a&fid=0x0:0xd6f82a5318716098"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Khue N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVhVKylYAtr_zgjEBMuypkuJBrSM3sCJT_8EE6YWBCFfnw53OL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute place for brunch! They don’t take reservation for brunch but no wait line either, we got a table rather quickly. Food was excellent. Will come back to try their high tea. Also really reasonably priced!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLwWA3jBwwJLX1K4BFHx4G9iXUwmaAvG34_j42&fid=0x0:0xd6f82a5318716098"],"When":"2024-7-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A gem! Truly hidden and open very few times a week. It’s more of a grab and go, since there’s no tables. Great options and service (explaining the drinks…), made from coffee lovers to coffee lovers. Very cute merchandise available, adorable decoration and details. The Vienna was so delicious! The espresso con panna also perfection!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR9fsYzQBdVCegw5H_UHMAOMJ_H3VSYfgiG20K&fid=0x0:0xf6fac893c25bc62a"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"Sacha Bourdeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRUh8-imnd3wzM4JOv8PNroQ7FD5h_F6kSDycXfW7bMaPV7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very quaint small location (still found a seat for an hour and there is a couch for a group) that is bursting with character. Soft older music plays, the staff greets you warmly and provide hospitable service during your whole visit. The matcha here is unavailable to buy in North America, it is straight from Japan and it is everything i dreamed matcha could be, no sugar needed with no bitterness, just pure delicate flowery softness. I can't wait to bring my wife here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harrison Ens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy6nnUCtAVE291ykxHAR5AkhEKCNqUnONOVioWeL9fWaUVxpaY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The flavour of the espresso dances on your tongue. The employee measures each ingredient on a digital scale. This is the best Flat White I have found in Burnaby thus far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRsL77zMc_jZBaE71jUNTzsrHfz64EpvunX_YG&fid=0x0:0xf6fac893c25bc62a"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Stacey Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsWi_XXrkXimr1ZHvMUqc6PGN2xnjFgOPSJXuoWLODzVmewj1l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little coffee shop. They choose their own beans, which you can buy as well. Lots of small Japanese goods for purchase as well as organic loose leaf tea. The hojicha latte was delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNydSqAZPzWoag90NV1E8Mpddd8ScVG1eJuJxN&fid=0x0:0xf6fac893c25bc62a"],"When":"2019-6-30"},{"Name":"Catherine Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTkz5822W-4tHOlQW0f2BS3SRckLjhOraB3PjIPXcn_UMUsmbO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe is such a hidden gem! I tried the hojicha latte and was blown away. Even after I had taken my photos of the latte art, capped the latte, and taken it outside, I could smell the decadent wafts of hojicha scent from the drink. It smelled soooo good and tasted so good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMhsqb6LnXOnz-udffWLfkU_XwnclgUrHYRC8e&fid=0x0:0xf6fac893c25bc62a"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"Rose Kiahna Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4Xd6qzkztFC2NElF6RT1ndjILxyYRdBA9nYWxRhqkTa78ajel=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love everything about this place. So the owner roasts the coffee in house and weighs and measures everything to perfection. I love capuccinos and the last few sips were my favourite. Very friendly and a hidden gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_XTJFXDqqE4jhhIroBszr_FoAAnLCd9DrcB1B&fid=0x0:0xf6fac893c25bc62a"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Vic Yung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjSUFpvFSwHsCrywPzGZzN7WDhV8Ljlj3YECw07iwjqMR_leW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went on a Saturday afternoon. The store is tiny, so may be hard to spot just driving by. There is free street parking available in the residential area adjacent, but may be hard to find depending on the time of day.

The storefront is quite charming and has a rustic, home-y feel to it.

Ordered a matcha latte and Japanese latte, both of which were made upon ordering. Both came with latte art, which was a nice touch. The matcha latte has the option of adding sweetener (and how much), which allows for customization. The matcha latte was not overly sweet with 1 pump added, and allowed for the match flavour to come through.

Since the space is so small, there is not really any room to stay and drink. Would recommend for a quick visit, perhaps in the warmer months so that you can take a walk afterwards.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2qlMKBikCLdwrNYQkdE6-0E_EDzeIuE4_yeK5&fid=0x0:0xf6fac893c25bc62a"],"When":"2023-3-14"},{"Name":"Jeong In Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhT-3rLqCUHs0eGs-Cft-r-2PqXROGBbR4quhAB71v-u93HK_t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The male owner was incredibly rude. I was looking forward to trying some new coffee, especially since it was a Japanese café. When I asked him for a recommendation, he just said, “Well, nothing.” I then asked what their signature drink was, and he replied, “It depends on what you like.” Honestly, he could have easily mentioned their best-seller or responded more politely.

The coffee itself was nothing special. I’d rather go to JJ Bean—they have better coffee and much better customer service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Better just go to SB store in Carleton square!
SB never charge PUPpuccinos lol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trang Hà","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUn9xSdmthpbInpcQ9cClHIDZyibD4fmuyuGfUzdnhtVefbhG3UQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been coming to this location many times, their staff were nice, the drinks were good enough. But this time is awful. I’ve never ever been in this worst experience. The girl’s attitude was so bad, don’t wanna say something too negative but I was treated not like a customer. I don’t know if she had something wrong, but I didn’t do anything tho :) i expected to be served properly. If you don’t know how to talk to your customers, please search it up or learn it from your co-workers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"alex morrer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdnPIOVmdg2pRcDMjpXPz3LWZeR_7r-byjQn53Oy9DOSYbIa0D=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the best experience there and my wife and I were helped by this really nice girl named alexis. I would love to leave a good tip but they unfortunately are not allowed to receive tips. Hope they change that soon, the team really deserves it 👏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Flower Foxx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNK3z76Bl_Qsfiat3kwZ4mj08Glhw_k6vXvZs8frnhVD1-Ym0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this Starbucks! Great location & there's always room to sit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Irene To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLA3GDA0vVnALgunPWm9-iTq5nBR63JpPEBVMazax74si5qwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst coffee I have ever had even they changed a new one for me; the coffee tasted so bad 🤮 didn't taste the coffee at all!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raj Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd3T07VrNBiA0qPdHIEb9XDlfj5zfIlI8fTuGDw9PtRzPp_npmRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not up to par with other Starbucks. Leslie and Jackie are the best. Thank you so much","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay Purohit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjxiob8HJi1ZXES9H_QB-fOzmV_BetsbHYmVKAv-G8nOAFhOsLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never disappointed, great quality, professional staff, always get a satisfying cup no matter which location one goes to.","Images":null,"When":""}]
