user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ss W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO2c5mKnbli1BnGAmVNeFTG8cuiptGfaoGASzlUNOFP4ApJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An Aussie bakery serving up a pepper steak pie topped with mashed potato, green peas, and gravy—how could I resist? Even though I’m not much of a meat person, temptation won this time.

It was my first visit, so I asked the staff for a recommendation and decided to give it a shot. The layers of flavor offered a surprisingly complex taste, and to my delight, they balanced everything really well. Definitely worth trying!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcmY5L3hXCwB1fZLyVwa0EkUI5OSglkOUNXgTM&fid=0x0:0x964d742028f61058"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Mona Zad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMR4E2eGeCM0YXIbpTdTSJbxtosgSXZZMVun99jHaxXCgVa1_f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great experience for my first visit to this Australian café! The Lamington cake was excellent—perfect texture with a delightful coconut flavor and whipped cream on top. I also tried their white flat coffee, which paired beautifully with the dessert. Definitely planning to come back and try their famous pies next time. Highly recommend this spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM73zPphxadziv6e0HxBYRErT-1szIzCcVStpCt&fid=0x0:0x964d742028f61058"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Karl Flanagan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhtirzD0mdP9P2x8hQPRsaXU_3_5DCvt1LrUd3FyFx6TUTYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Traditional peaked pie and long black coffee for brunch hit the right place. Couldn't resist trying out the desserts and opted for the lemon meringue. Both were so good. Hightly recommended anyone who's driving by or simply curious. I'll have to return another day for a pie flight lunch. From humble beginnings......","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_-id6_yuatUiG3yk9KNW-rNI71pivbc3-bCVQ&fid=0x0:0x964d742028f61058"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Iced mocha was extremely sweet, would recommend asking half sweet. Bright spot with lots of sitting. Haven’t tried any food since I’m not into pies, just happened to be in the area and wanted something cold to drink in a hot summer day. They also sell beers and have a cute patio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMocOpZLFwutLUEoruSQibXHR57ymR5ewSt0mjT&fid=0x0:0x964d742028f61058"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pie flight!! Came with four mini pies…chicken, veggies, Aussie, and peach coconut. Great way to try different kind of pies though I still liked the peaked Aussie pie the best. We also liked peach coconuts pie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8CDkQlgYr-LmaiUP1wwU3HqqsLvW7lv6zhLy7&fid=0x0:0x964d742028f61058"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Olga O.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeV9paF7MActTa0K4EXEhpSsxLDjI8EhLGL81BDcMklmCzJ_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I don't blame the business for the soaring prices, but $8+tax for a single sausage roll... that's insane.
The food is still delicious, however, $18+ for  barely warm peaked pie where you need to dig for filling (ordered butter chicken and only found a piece of meat when was halfway through it) and $8 roll is a bit too much.
Also, asking for tips that by default start from 15% when you have to wipe the table with napkins, then pick up your own food, then take away your plates, discard leftovers and put empty plates into the trays that are not emptied by staff is not right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFzV9iZuVhujl6I8BHoEAVGSnyN6fGqC9u9V8H&fid=0x0:0x964d742028f61058"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Judy Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFW5Hsaw-gYHcFvxWIOBaJ5LzgvsAUy5D69g2t3bvT5LGqVv8z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't had a good meat pie for awhile and I'm glad I finally tried peaked pies! The savory pies smelled so good and the taste was UNREAL! Not too salty even though the pies were filled with sauce. The black pepper flavor really hits (chunky pepper steak)! Also, it is fresh and hot so be careful when you bite into it! My friend had a cinnamon roll and she was obsessed with it as well! Will visit again soon! And they have a bus stop right outside the door!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSAiMW1jvawKm2dIQmu0uOjjOquu9ZhcU7CCjo&fid=0x0:0x964d742028f61058"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Viona Halim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5PMLEtvgkAwv2IjmL8XXm0-Ly_XpBo5Kd0Hv2pxoQ26_Hfy4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really satisfying savory pies perfect for lunch. They're not cheap pies by any means but they're definitely tasty pies with flaky crusts.

Highly recommend to get them "peaked" which adds mashed potatoes, mushy peas, and gravy on top. The filling themselves are already moist, but gravy makes everything tastes better!

The mini lamington cake on the other hand was alright. It was slightly dry imo, but we'll definitely come back to try their other pies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2BKG-dUSb7AxjUvXy0TK7xyBqtYUKfif8XEoK&fid=0x0:0x964d742028f61058"],"When":"2023-10-2"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kevin (KC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrZpzDcm4xbgvb_oOynyP_bQvwIe7l-wMoPIs8L4UeVZ-waBkO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Korean Dessert Spot!

The portions were pretty big. We ordered 3 shaved ice bowls and it was more than enough to feed 6 people.

We ordered 3 shaved ice bowls:
- cheesecake
- strawberry
- injeolmi (signature bowl)

All of them tasted great. The interior was spacious and cozy and there was plenty of parking in the area.

Overall, I would recommend this place for Korean shaved ice desserts if you’re in the area! 🙂🍧","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYpON4e7oIzSI_GZHejvPpWPIActnfFvRiXAKP&fid=0x0:0xcc03184564a52bb"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Jessy J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHNRFw0Z_JgaU0TxGr1Pv5X-w9V6JzR0bnCuTDlGr_7pfsbx_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here on a weekend afternoon. Line up was acceptable. Looked like a little short on front staff and there’s always an extra few minutes wait between each customer to take their orders.

Wait time was about 10-12 min after we ordered. The taiyaki was small but quite tasty with the whipped cream. The Oreo bingsoo was great too but I agree with some previous comments that the ice was lacking flavour.

All in all it’s a neat place for desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi9ak1wymaGA3-MRY1Jn6NwPuo2xE00KkSS426&fid=0x0:0xcc03184564a52bb"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fresh fruits served at Sulbing Café are delicious! Beautifully ripe, sweet and the perfect accompaniment to their bingsu.

It's hard to pick a flavour, but you really can't go wrong. Mango is my favourite, and strawberry is a very close second. But be forewarned: it's a seasonal fruit. So if you visit in the winter, it's unlikely to be available.

If you like cheesecake, definitely add the cheese! It's not too sweet, and it's a delicious addition to the mango bingsu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWgs_C9z9LK8tFbv7kxrtHw4LSOYd5yEsb3raL&fid=0x0:0xcc03184564a52bb"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Kim L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrsm9uWsgDlJo9sBOfcAbnWwOOYhj1ksL8fCyKWa_9jtKX9dlsTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered Green Tea Bingsu. It looked pretty good but the tastes bland… it comes with red bean rice cake it tastes like bit old.. not soft at all. It was my first time visiting here will be no next time…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgvJiJebs6du7w2De1RW9h07Mo4KtvczYa5WC6&fid=0x0:0xcc03184564a52bb"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This dessert cafe in Burnaby was ok. I enjoyed a mango cheese ice when I visited. I have visited other dessert cafes that seemed friendlier and more comfortable. I didn't notice the tables or floors being cleaned often. Overpriced for what I had but a fun find but I probably won't visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTROJj0vm1hPNIvHp1cmM3_PDO_i5sfxBhgRpn&fid=0x0:0xcc03184564a52bb"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Cyrus Yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwd8GV9_xN2UT6DSuLVl33bJJc7mzj0UQ6J-1qGzgv0MySHfc_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bingsu is one my favourite varieties of shaved ice and Sulbing Cafe is one of my favourite places to get bingsu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOriyHkc9Q3JUOQijvzZaOx3nlCzJDwqbIkzJH8&fid=0x0:0xcc03184564a52bb"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Angela Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmoYI5U5PkD3slb8KXj4_eunuAJ0OQg5lHarEbqHy5ARzTjtmN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Waffle was good. Friends ordered matcha shaved ice which tasted good and surprisingly not too sweet. There was no customer service there. All you have to do is order on the kiosk, wait to be called by your number, and then pick up your foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfxB-yhldWofff1_WrBUx8URQtYHGWlbaaZAq6&fid=0x0:0xcc03184564a52bb"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful, stunning, exactly as the showcase's appearance.

I ordered the green tea ice cream and it was better than the ones I had in Richmond. Though my friend ordered the chocolate brownie one and I thought that it was better than the green tea. The green tea didn't have much of a matcha or green tea taste, as it was covered in chocolate powder. But the brownies on the side were absolutely delicious. My friend's had cheese and whipping cream and I am surprised that they went so well together.

Have to say, the appearance is very instagramable.

Taste: 4/5
Price: ~20$
Washroom: very clean, very girl friendly.

Come back rate: 80%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO03_I_IvxkDQNmVozB1jnypN7RmBy0U-iht0Xg&fid=0x0:0xcc03184564a52bb"],"When":"2023-5-9"}]

title: Cafe 106
address: 6588 Royal Oak Ave Unit 106, Burnaby, BC V5H 2E6
descriptions: Bright cafe serving espresso drinks, pastries & panini in snug digs with a few outdoor tables.

[{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a cute little cozy coffee shop.  There were a lot of students in there with their laptops opened and the seating is quite limited.   We ended up sitting outside, but the had big umbrellas, so it's good for both sunny and rainy days.

We had the Lavender Latte which had a lot of Lavender taste,  but a tad in the sweeter side.  Also, tried our the matcha latte iced and it was pretty good.  One of the better ones I have tried.  Looked like they had a variety of baked goods as well.  Would want to go back to try their food.

Service was great.  Extremely nice servers and very friendly as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsHZU3qF1GFAYpJqZTWB39EFmjDtgVEyPeVNU8&fid=0x0:0xfd728dd054652798"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We live in this neighborhood before but when we moved, my husband and I still come back and go to this cafe.

Their breads are a must try. Love them! My favorite is their caramel machiato, iced and hot. If only I can have more shots of coffee a day! You can ask them to reduce the coffee to make the taste lighter.

Definitely coming back here for sure. Like, now. See ya!

Update:
Note that they do have a coupon/points card, so if you like their coffee, don't forget to ask. It's good to have a delicious free coffee!

I have new photos too! Check it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8DQzzmUz7Sxu3OBoWQmv63DPol4Dd3RNwD1WA&fid=0x0:0xfd728dd054652798"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"M Mark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJh32lM4t_7cX4VsExqacG-T8y6qepgXVVz9NQxEaNR5c4_HHo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited twice during my stay in Burnaby. Had a hot and cold Americano. Good standard drinks. Ordered a croissant that was a regular run of the mill. Nice place to chill and do some work. There is a 2 hour seating limit posted. There’s also two patio tables outside. Staff were super friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuWiHkX1cMqZWZZIxBc8hUvLkyg3KxkEA9uTI5&fid=0x0:0xfd728dd054652798"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"TL:DR Great London fog, normal prices, good service

Their London fog is the best I've had so far, not overly bitter or sweet either. Just right.

Exceptional service, decent prices, and the best part is the outside seating for me.

Interior design is also welcoming. The smell of coffee doesn't suffocate you while you sit inside, because the doors are wide open.

I'll likely come back to try their food next time.

Try this place out if it's on the way!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMj3bC5y5hleGqRMa8UIcoPhcV5IInW1wyLfmj&fid=0x0:0xfd728dd054652798"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"April Veinna Go","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVum0BDGG-WHnkBpgbtrZ10f1GNVAAK7Bd9C4QqA0MQ2NjxFuSi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m a regular at this place for my morning coffee. Their Dark Chocolate Mocha and Croffle have always been my favorites. Plus, they always have fresh bread right out of the oven.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMFkpnJtpQDn6rGY--Fqvwrv2Dus8B4cO17drq&fid=0x0:0xfd728dd054652798"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Mr Clean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmnyBujVHVKCMs9KE_suD2Te_SPSPa32xCuBPgkZkGknne3OzZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the Apple turn over, Parmesan and leak pastry and lavender latter. They were all amazing and overall I’d say this is one of the best cafés I’ve gone to. 10/10 definitely would recommend for anyone stopping in the area. $15 plus tax + tip for two people. 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNA29lReBAO9tL6lvek4s93KwFD3JALLrO-xam-&fid=0x0:0xfd728dd054652798"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Alice R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnNxgS9DX-y3gmgAxmhqj178o3S78D2kd6IJ7JcGENqcpufQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got an iced latte and a chicken breast panini from this cafe. The latte and food were ok, not bad but not super good. The latte was quite sweet. The staff were not rude but not friendly either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAmzey5hhZsooHWGnpQ5zyBiFlRhmD3CJSPH-I&fid=0x0:0xfd728dd054652798"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a cute little cafe with pretty good bakery and beverages.  We were lucky enough to find seatings and enjoy the afternoon here.  However street parking nearby is a hassle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnR6LU4QtGwihX1Nma0Qh5SJTHgkHACOEzTYer&fid=0x0:0xfd728dd054652798"],"When":"2024-5-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marina Shcherbakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyLcc8GZsJdQZpxpX6MKq7M68TDSvo70nMESQn_e-1N4B3YVk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Three stars for this coffee shop. While the food offerings like the chicken pesto sandwich, lemon loaf, and cappuccino were just average, nothing particularly wowed me. The lukewarm cappuccino was a bit of a letdown, and the self-service pickup system could use some improvement—I almost missed my sandwich sitting on the counter. On the bright side, the place has a cozy atmosphere with stylish furniture, fitting well into the community vibe it aims for. Plus, the spacious layout and large tables make it a great spot for group gatherings. However, the parking situation can be a hassle. Although there's a lot in front of the community center, it tends to be busy, so be prepared to circle around to find a spot. Overall, it's a decent place to hang out, but don't expect to be blown away by the food or service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyTeLhpKCdLV7thF7OvpRPe2Yl0R5X2zNHPX3O&fid=0x0:0x442073c957d1721"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One would never guess that you could find such wonderful eats inside a community centre of all places and yet that's where we got this incredible Lobster Melt sandwich and Chocolate Lava Cake! Situated inside Christine Sinclair Community Centre is Bastion Coffee + Kitchen. I couldn't believe it when I read that they served a Lobster Melt sandwich, and that it was only $8.95. At that price, what did we have to lose? Wow, this Lobster Melt was no joke! It was affordable and delicious. My husband and I agreed to share a Lobster Melt sandwich with each other, but it only took about two bites at most for him to decide that he wanted to buy another one so that he could have it all to himself!

The Chocolate Lava Cake was also quite impressive. It's always so satisfying to see that soft, gooey chocolate centre spilling out when I cut through the middle of a molten lava cake. I have had better Chocolate Lava Cakes than this, but for a $5.95 cake from a community centre cafe, this was really nicely done!

Would you come and try out this hidden gem?

Service: Good
Parking: Plentiful and free
Location: 3713 Kensington Ave., Burnaby, BC","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYIkIqejMvzGzV560ES6M95X3OnfCrlnMOIUdj&fid=0x0:0x442073c957d1721"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Indulge in a truly delightful experience at this charming coffee shop, where you'll find the most delicious and aromatic coffee roasted right on-site. Whether you're looking to kickstart your day or take a much-needed break from work, this place has it all. Among their tempting offerings, the sandwiches stand out as the ultimate comfort food. Trust me when I say that the Turkey bacon sandwich is an absolute winner, with its mouthwatering combination of savory turkey, crispy bacon, and delectable ingredients that will leave your taste buds in awe.

What sets this coffee shop apart is its hidden gem status, nestled within the Christian Sinclair Community Centre. It's a place that locals hold dear, a little secret oasis of culinary delights. The warm and friendly staff make you feel right at home from the moment you step through the door, providing excellent service and ensuring your visit is nothing short of fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2DNwfdEUwF2I2IoLoSZd-Wg-lCus0WWOTED7-&fid=0x0:0x442073c957d1721"],"When":"2023-5-13"},{"Name":"JB K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWly2PKypJ4esl-D83GYkWwd-9Yh4K8DViyxJnf76i-vR26b6kW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"quality pastries.  good collection of espresso drinks to order from.  labeling in cups and beans look result great.   space and parking are very nice. how works well.  very much like this cafe!!  service was also excellent.   will return definitely","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWGZc09yR1vstNuaefoTCLYr1ec8F0BpYk-tZM&fid=0x0:0x442073c957d1721"],"When":"2022-8-1"},{"Name":"Abdallah Ouda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDCxH2dBsdWhzi2rHa8CpgxoxKgmmdnEjFmKfe7rf3St_1zWrb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Reasonable prices and delicious food. Oat milk cappuccino was so good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOt304lyenVGppPz1Q2qSadB8ReqyB9loDm7OF0&fid=0x0:0x442073c957d1721"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Vancouverite111","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjCLNB8OHposl1jn_syPr10S-VZ7DlTNmaTgV5nPF1IIbSNwkU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice public place for having a bite and a local delicious coffee.

Pros :

- amble parking.

- drop in activities in the centre for adults and kids.

- nice atmosphere.

- luxurious tables and chairs.

- opens 7 days a week.

- very close to burnaby park facilities

Cons: (hardly found any thing I would complain about)

- they close at 7 pm, would be nice if they stayed a bit longer at night especially on weekends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIH51Lp4htRUAqv5uS0y-84ENbTaVRsNOdcLwL&fid=0x0:0x442073c957d1721"],"When":"2022-5-27"},{"Name":"Elsa Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgBtFYCkWTkjtefII4egxADlhVRhaG7pRnzQoESC-LbjFzCviaGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love this cafe that is located inside the community centre. The coffee is decent (price is a bit high), the pastries are good, the service is not bad. Overall, good cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAbQwS_tm6HIaoEWq4oJmr1ZURrFLJ-HFYe-Cz&fid=0x0:0x442073c957d1721"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"J W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJo-Cmrc1HZduOPETsbTPLkBkL6YnB-OGT_-IXnca5j7zZRJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Unexpected gem for a cafe in a community centre. The vibe is on point for a feeling of something classic from the decor, taste of coffee to the smooth jazz music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYqYuHtWPcj3HB5FVU-w7zBdpphX4QAa_MlugC&fid=0x0:0x442073c957d1721"],"When":"2024-5-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wonhee Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKoCOt5jbxJbvMaUbcfQc3wt3qabbAkIzZYCCUFmiyeVy8J-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New grand opening with a revised menu, items, cost and owners.

Their baked products are made in-house! So it won’t be like Tim’s where you’re out in 30 seconds, but I got 2 drinks and 2 food in <10 minutes. The in-house made cream cheese was to die for, and the servings are huge!! Couldn’t finish my sandwich and packed the rest to-go.

Great atmosphere with cute music, cozy atmosphere, caught up with a friend here and left with full stomachs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb8YiDI1KmVAhjdNqz8M68SHwiSLjCBlTUtuWt&fid=0x0:0x4c562d0a545796e4"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Lucy Ryu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVlYJAwtyCqvzYzo7JOhYj6ms93lt97z37dpv-F5-XKZIKH0YZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has become my favorite bagel spot🥯 They offer a variety of bagel flavors, paired with different kinds of cream cheese. The green onion cream cheese is absolutely the BEST! I also loved the iced matcha latte. The staff is friendly, and the recent renovation creates such a cozy atmosphere. Highly recommend👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk_tBT-Rn8xZjipX_FWaDgsWWKaWyr-jhCHF4-&fid=0x0:0x4c562d0a545796e4"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Esther Kwon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfdpF7dFCtHdwz3oC_GissPgRLED_4eZuTowrIljNcSr1_Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a smoke salmon bagle sandwich with coffee. I can positively say that it was the best coffee ever tasted so far, and the New york style house made bagle was better than the famous bagle shops I ever visited in Canada.
The cafe is very clean and the service was good, too. I packed some bakery goods home, and their blueberry and white chocolate chip scorn were the best, so soft and delicious. Everybody should try!! I got addicted.
I live in Langley, but I will go there often with my friends.
Good luck with new ownership.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVdCHNQgFkA1f7_Yzx12PPEWMJ6WEFw7tTqQ_x&fid=0x0:0x4c562d0a545796e4"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"TJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP67IcecqWmj25EDB9TYR1oWgWdW_kvUh8kXe9Bcllki-tpXa4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We only really come to this little strip mall when we have to pick up a package from the post office, and my goodness do I love those days. BECAUSE OF SEASONS APPLE CAFE. I absolutely love this cafe. It’s a family run business 😍 that serves up fresh, delicious, quality made food and drinks, made with REAL ingredients. Their drinks are what really reeled us in, as they always have seasonal ones (and they’re friken superb), but after finding out they make their own specialty cream cheese for their variety of bagels ~ we were hooked for good. They are such a kind family, I love even just walking into the place. You’re greeted with smiles and hellos, a beautiful quaint seating area, and just overall great vibes. 10/10 I hope this place is in business forever ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erin Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXypNQyfJ0ARQVqfii4fNTfTcMFtMIYWx3dgPbqOiXLt057xhtI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little cafe with the nicest staff! Egg sandwich was super fresh and their brioche bread is so soft and fluffy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWFj668bcrngFu3J838zIZ7wXXHgpZh9dFShjI&fid=0x0:0x4c562d0a545796e4"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Brandon Bae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQ-4cwPUiokO54GNq1abke9LRCH3BSDzh-bt7nmNqcFwNyug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The new owners were sweet and welcoming. I really enjoyed their matcha latte, smoked salmon bagel and COOKIES! Prices are reasonable and scrumptious! I could feel the warmth and love as they prepared my food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Judy Ryu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV68zSh1lxB6HsS7074RKXN2GiMmK-sGj_qtzcG2_-NaTsxnD4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Winter Bagel sandwich was sooo good. All bread, baked goods, and cream cheese is made in-house. You can tell because they constantly remake it throughout the day and it comes out piping hot.

Drinks were really creative and delicious!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3sByrBumaUTi4SsjcCOqzuNL-H25OBzqdKkk5bQB9PSzxRg4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here almost every week, the food is so delicious and the service is very friendly.
The vibe of the cafe is perfect for studying or hanging out with friends, with classic music playing or you can sit outside and they  will bring your food out for you.

I have been trying out their Panini menu and always get it with some soup.
They have great price points for their food at high quality. My favourite Panini so far is the Campanola, but all are so crispy and flavourful. I also like their Italian sodas and have been going through those one by one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhEMyB-fee4tGKzMQURr7KKTiVsyzlRuK-IMiT&fid=0x0:0x4c562d0a545796e4"],"When":"2023-10-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their Hainanese Chicken Rice is just okay. Probably enough for a quick grub given that the store is inside a mall. HK style milktea tastes authentic for me","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9ylrBKIw2lLBf1OHFWPVjDRXBjWikRWewF4f5&fid=0x0:0x45c6ad37c6427e2c"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"YVR Duke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbrjJ5U6gKw7Gn1zE_GlxhUndims9WHlh7sVaHLXVrjOFlYd_B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"bubble waffle is not made after order, it is cold.  Hong Kong style milk tea is surprisingly authentic.

Wonton in soup is average, the hainan chicken isn’t as bad as others mentioned in the review.

Staff are overall friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP45JL0iEEl7uPxpVowgH8_HWVIGzwBTFEnkLRY&fid=0x0:0x45c6ad37c6427e2c"],"When":"2023-2-18"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wife comes for noodle soup with fatty beef and lamb. Also had bubble waffle but not crispy. Came today for bubble waffle to have with my ice Capp but waffle not crispy. Came yesterday and waffle crispy. Had lemon tea and wife had ice coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ1901NYL1IzI50qPyCWX7UiuuIkNsWhc7GvQM&fid=0x0:0x45c6ad37c6427e2c"],"When":"2023-8-24"},{"Name":"Danish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIy4IyITNH8Bt7ydhMz6xxldsQw4tFxyR5kYJ0zIhUhkV1B27c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My expectations were really low given it is a shopping mall food court and their specialty is bubble tea, when I ordered the Hainanese chicken rice.

Turns out they weren’t low enough because that was some of the worst food I have encountered. The taste was awful, the chicken was stringy, and the sauce was better untouched.

They should stick to drinks, which I’m hoping they are better at.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzoKMrRC6HMpPguIm1bXjgZ3kYxgHvikMUlP_M&fid=0x0:0x45c6ad37c6427e2c"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Michael Tantongco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe-D7T3lV_Oi_Xarvc7yoW56hKh5UvtdgiBiOM8uekMXlIgtRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My wife ordered 30 dollars of food and forgot to get me chilli oil. I went to ask for some and they gave me such a hard time. It’s like 5 cents. Terrible service and the food is just ok - nothing worth going back for . Don’t be so cheap to your customers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhmUDppuAjvLj7HYMc4RkAE0ctOIz7J1TaWzf0&fid=0x0:0x45c6ad37c6427e2c"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Selena L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP-t5NiwFC9qHJDY9Z6EjmH1kzmKROMi98tMSbtHNAkxsUfvrn2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Basically, I just ordered a Hong Kong style bubble tea. And I love Hong Kong style coffee and tea so I felt it was pretty good. I also see they have a two topping noodle deal that comes with a drink for $15.95 which seems pretty reasonable. I haven't tried the food, only the bubble tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1LnBxqi9z1wke2oMF345uESZG7dedtvQxks6j&fid=0x0:0x45c6ad37c6427e2c"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Jacinda K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0xoGeCDSw5DVJ3YNgzQb_o4aJOLzQdAQ3syqD9WiYy7lJqCATJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Having been to multiple locations, the Metrotown one is the most challenging:  long lines at peak times, hard to find available seats/table, and the menu is slightly higher than the other locations.  Service was surprisingly quick though!

Drinks are not included in the combos (extra $1 for basic beverages like milk tea or lemon tea).  But it’s still good value for what you get comparatively.  Hainanese chicken with rice $15.95, plus $1 for drink, plus $2.50 for waffle.  The waffle was made to order, hot, fresh, and crispy.  The meal was solid, but the chicken portion seemed smaller.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt76GkDyRJHAjxLKoL2gFmSwv5CMVvNCTxrRSL&fid=0x0:0x45c6ad37c6427e2c"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV32Dl3aDuecVTKkUVDILvrpBYb8ATjyfxIGWGxKJriKTeCzCiJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst bubble waffle, a lot broken tiny rice noodle(half inch length)and only 2 slices of beef inside. Spicy soup was way too spicy! All for $18! What a waste of my money! Never gonna visit here ever!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIkTtNe0cP15yaaAHqz-RpzCqvz6KTHODGa_kA&fid=0x0:0x45c6ad37c6427e2c"],"When":"2024-1-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Little hidden gem in this medical building.  Good amount of parking spots behind the building and underground.

Great tiramisu souffle pancake - very soft and fluffy. You have to wait for 20min because they just make to order.   It's $20 each but it's big enough for 4 people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv4Fa4Xl01ozfMEKtNFzq4C-B0tjp0GJ9yz5Hp&fid=0x0:0x73fb2a980eff29b6"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for some studying time and it has been great. I got a tiramisu to start which was so tasty! I just couldn’t finish it by myself. I also ordered a spicy tuna poke bowl and it was delicious. The service is great, they page you for your food and drinks, they also provide these nice wooden trays with which you can take your items to the table. The seating varies depending which table you sit at. It looks like their soufflé pancakes are where it’s at so i’ll have to come back and try them soon. Great food and tranquil study spot. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ five starts from me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcj03xALUBYH-hOxvs4lVdShmAkDc2k2Kg9BDg&fid=0x0:0x73fb2a980eff29b6"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The highlight here is their jiggly, airy, puffy, soufflé pancakes 🥞. Tried the brown cheese one and the brown cheese was delicious. The only thing is their whipped cream is too sweet and overpowers everything with the taste of sugar as the soufflé already comes drizzled in syrup too. Wish they had an option for unsweetened whipped cream. The matcha latte was great quality with tons of matcha in it and tasted very good. Spinach scrambled eggs with toast was also solid. Great place for brunch and coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKNPsMgoEm0zaOM5gHFckO9OajU-UpIkknCicd&fid=0x0:0x73fb2a980eff29b6"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Seulwon Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-NBijG6OLnoPAXkqZZsyMx973iNOZiaSOgvjp-XTuuw-Uug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this café today, and the atmosphere was absolutely wonderful!

The vanilla latte was smooth and perfectly sweet, making it so easy to enjoy.

The Einspänner was so cute and delicious with its creamy top. This café truly made my day feel even more perfect.

The staff were friendly, and the cozy interior made me want to stay longer. I’ll definitely visit again! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQZMaR7P3Tcdcmwl5JjabjQTWogUhIJ_SrEa4x&fid=0x0:0x73fb2a980eff29b6"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Macho Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWToXpU3H3YB3xkMOp6uUKU5gePr0KH9w6w89u7rGCD3siyx0IX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Both the pancake and the coffee are nice.
The brown cheese favour is special and tastes very nice, the dish even comes with an icecream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYicG37ArDNrJ4_vQdm729p5gsaGvuOtnZc33k&fid=0x0:0x73fb2a980eff29b6"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Selina Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdh_K07G_35WE1XQolPePKtbRPCS7etPd4GO37eQJrOR8PInDd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hiel Cafe’s food taste pretty good, and its portions are quite good, particularly for the salmon poke. The prosciutto panini’s tomatoes are quite thin though, probably smaller than the thickness of cardboard, BUT tastes super good.

That sandwich with smoked salmon and shrimp CHANGED ME. One of the best I’ve ever tasted.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn_n_LNxR-yogsCHytr9D4Rt27kZDf5Edsk860&fid=0x0:0x73fb2a980eff29b6"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Monika Vretenickova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW0wlOSsfKymo-nWbUPI0tmG0BlkhRpJn7wVHjKqLh9HR5WSUD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best breakfast place within a few kilometers of my home. If you’ve never tried soufflé pancakes, you absolutely should. While there’s a bit of a wait for them to be prepared, it’s worth every minute. The only downside is that they’re closed on Sundays. I’ve tried every item on their menu, and each one is a piece of heaven.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnzIUPi7gtfAKL6OQSBsYIoPDazuL2TZQMO-9P&fid=0x0:0x73fb2a980eff29b6"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Joey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl9szXFCvkqiDIj8ffgxhpU02VBcZUaH8smB2SMyI4TIXdsaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hiel Cafe is a gem! The cafe was creamy and rich, topped with perfectly dusted cocoa powder. The matcha souffle pancake was fluffy, light, and beautifully presented with fresh strawberries. The atmosphere is cozy, perfect for enjoying a quiet morning or working on a laptop. Highly recommend for anyone in search of a delightful cafe experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv_3OHUm4LxD5ueMxpaNyFm5_oLwvWCXg8XX8b&fid=0x0:0x73fb2a980eff29b6"],"When":"2024-6-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vanessa Barbosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzoS4LBaJYh3EPBE7NNixFEmFvuKNkp-iz7seO6S-cFIIdEpEHjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome food, awesome desserts and awesome coffee. I enjoyed it! and I'm definitely coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9tx4v9J7XRV6V9IWP2j1GKNuNyMLBB4zcFIXK&fid=0x0:0x9126dc9d4eed48c6"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Allen Bakht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgPoVBGaUgzmRUqHXReJW1JnHL7TdotuxPSKPOAWiZsThJWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What a terrible way to start a day by visiting this so-called cafe.
The breakfast sandwich and wraps were tasteless, and the coffee was terrible.
To make matters worse, the service was equally disappointing. The lady behind the counter was incredibly rude and unwelcoming. She seemed annoyed by any customer's presence and made no effort to be friendly or helpful. It's no wonder the place was empty.
I would strongly advise anyone considering visiting this cafe to think twice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Naomi Kragh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZLUAmyQRHAJJOvAgnTAMFOCBA9leIrpEFbTsp7S0XsUBWx9lRKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wanted to have a good meal with real ingredients. This place definitely provides that "home cooked" feel. They made my order fresh and it was delicious. I would definitely go back again if I was in the neighborhood and hungry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOt4St7H7tw_-aojTPlCP683VjLknTUoMzYgcxp&fid=0x0:0x9126dc9d4eed48c6"],"When":"2019-4-30"},{"Name":"Deirdre Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_Oc8v6QrILyrJI0L83nUelBdCqYYlUlerOucGglpTJbHj3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"love it. I happily  ate the same meal for a week in a row.  Great  food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNAX4IZiHBId_qyHSyeVsfuES2H42U8Lcz98wI&fid=0x0:0x9126dc9d4eed48c6"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Yuri Faenza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIxgHjemJViIUq8LqCJr1gtDtmnsS-uceO0ebfTBKpL0dt2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"You are probably considering having breakfast here if you are staying at the nearby hotel. We did not enjoy our experience, and after the first time we ended up going to the Starbucks at Gilmore station. I always try to shop local and avoid big chains, but here it was not possible. The breakfast combo for hotel guests is very rigid and it is not possible, eg, to upgrade the coffee to a cappuccino by paying extra. We asked for an extra paper cup so that our children could split the glass of milk. They refused it and told us to use the big glasses, which a toddler just can't use (and may quite likely break). All this was communicated to us in a not so nice tone. Food was average.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Convenient location for a quick bite if conducting business close by in this industrial area of Burnaby. Decent coffee, good soup and I enjoyed my Spicy Beef Bulgogi Korean Paninis. Interesting flavours with sweet onion, green pepper and tender bulgogi beef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXYzGtixm72w4fop_z77EKcZ6WzEoVoZMS5euc&fid=0x0:0x9126dc9d4eed48c6"],"When":"2021-10-9"},{"Name":"Marisa Castellano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP_e-6SpCCWpUAwHDWQrxAduKxHge5i2CmcBNDknsEiY6NcY0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Elements Café is a delightful gem for food enthusiasts looking for a unique culinary experience. The café boasts a warm and inviting atmosphere, perfect fr both casual and special occasions. Their menu offers a fusion of traditional and modern flavors, with a focus on fresh, locally sourced ingredients. The standout dishes include their artisanal sandwiches, vibrant salads, and a selection of exquisite pastries that are both visually appealing and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGp4-5zv7GtRDW52hdDlQh10zbNAZ2bDyY4If5&fid=0x0:0x9126dc9d4eed48c6"],"When":"2024-1-9"},{"Name":"Mahmood Naw Rouz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXv5JlLlFL5c8x5Lao81Orts42VO1JtAth2aUb0neJMtl_2Njif=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe is awesome!
The lady was perfect!
I highly recommend it!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Harrison Ens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy6nnUCtAVE291ykxHAR5AkhEKCNqUnONOVioWeL9fWaUVxpaY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An excellent location with hard working staff. The Flat White has espresso with a pronounced taste. The Spanish Caffe Latte contained an amazing sweetness & flavour profile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPULqT7PqJ8lq04vYBiB14qWq2tA2nW5KAOGrWu&fid=0x0:0x6a25d042660e3ed3"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Jisoo Ha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9G43zEyyMhrfjRW_yt_MDkVCcd0wjhioG4aHmlS1NH_9HRY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love coffee here! One of the best in town.
The location is a bit hidden, but I make the trip just to grab a cup from here. They have a rewards program, which is a plus for a regular. The only thing is that it opens at 11am.. wish it opened earlier!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kit Yee Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy4hyLjXryzPjKJf4N3DUJBAsHtZSSuk76pvxFtVmwfHSV1Gtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great coffee! Great quality! Great service! Reasonable price.

My husband and I knew this coffee shop for a while but never had a chance to try their coffee. Finally we could taste it today. We ordered their hot latte and iced Creama. It was so good!!! We had a first sip of each one of them. We were addicted to them.

I give 4 stars, because the coffee shop is quite small. Even if there is no covid, it’s hard to sit inside and relax and enjoy a cup of coffee. We have to order takeout and drink the coffee outside.

There are many parking stalls in this complex, so don’t need to worry about parking. This coffee shop is a bit hidden though. It is on the same level of Mr. Paris Bakery and above Hannam Supermarket.

There is another Korean coffee shop right under this one, so there must be competition going on. I hope this coffee shop keeps their good quality and gets more customers to drink their coffee in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMemHcR2zMXevXIx-iUMmbx7Z21aWtqWJbWUsK&fid=0x0:0x6a25d042660e3ed3"],"When":"2021-1-31"},{"Name":"Vy Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKM7ZmBV1kG3i8K2Uai2VyeuLdx3nkyWTEoy2ZktnPosYf-Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"*i posted the review on my instagram already and I want to repost it here

I just have came back the 2nd time after having two tasty cups of Choco Mocha & Coffee Latte at my first time. My bf and I was totally impressed.

This time, we got Tiger Eye & Crema. Both taste amazing!! If you enjoy Dalgona coffee, Tiger Eye is the best option for you !! Crema has a creamy milky foam on top and it tastes nicely with the espresso part. GO ENJOY THESE SEASONAL DRINKS (Crema, Tiger Eye, Espresso soda) BEFORE SUMMER REALLY ENDS. ^^

The barista was friendly and nice ^^ There’s only 1 person who’s in charge of the café shop during the day.

I really want this cafe shop to be shouted out widely since its hidden location can be the reason why fewer coffee drinkers come & visit. ☺️

Additionally, there is no seat available inside the store also. You have to sit somewhere outside.

Except for that, their drinks are real must-try 💯

Please kindly support this small local business stronger during this pandemic. They really deserve more loves and supports ☺️

Would highly highly recommend 💯⭐️

#supportlocalbusiness

Photo credit: @thegingerlatte (instagram)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8_tTL_pNCBMuJAqIY9p-jPaCmVwFxETW3rlNM&fid=0x0:0x6a25d042660e3ed3"],"When":"2020-10-1"},{"Name":"Vivian Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7lGaNOPkpWTpqjowjqEFuZT3_7uibmWph7_M-U0fFaTpTEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The espresso shot I received this morning had a noticeable bitterness, likely due to being expired. Additionally, it seemed the barista was trying to make several coffees at the same time, which may have contributed to the quality issues.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Loney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhVKtVI_BQxDYH7J6CSEw_I5RbEPGDUzsK9USmRR-WPIXfN9lj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been slade!

First off they have 2 top of the line machines for doing phenomenal pulls of espresso. I forget the first but the second is a Slayer. Simple the best and with a philosophy of keeping new beans coming in all the time they will never leave your palette board.

It's a micro shop with big flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyyrPeHjQ--AIoAF939WThRlhVDCXUEDdFf0aH&fid=0x0:0x6a25d042660e3ed3"],"When":"2017-3-19"},{"Name":"Deborah Aiko Insook Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkrXzRxO3A2OGqiLyPY_PlsYk2B44E-xgPkg6UAgy-1KwY7fkT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"May you can miss this place for outside but just follow the way to inside. There are pretty big space to sit for coffee. The barista was kind and bright. I got a long black and good. Try someday when you get Korean essential spot","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPeMBS_VX2V9viwJHnmBm8qfSWArP4k7Q2UEhQ&fid=0x0:0x6a25d042660e3ed3"],"When":"2021-7-21"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Veroni coffee entrance is very small. It's on the second floor of the Hannam Mart plaza inside the plaza. I had originally come for the Tiger eye coffee but unfortunately they didn't have 3 (out of their Tiger Eye, espressoda and cream) out of the 5 specialty coffees so I had no choice but to try the cloud. The cloud coffee had a strong coffee base. Really liked the flavour of their beans. The cloud on top was a cross between marshmallow and whipping cream. Not too sweet but a bit heavy. The first half of drinking it was nice but afterwards i was left with just cloud. Hopefully next time I'll be able to try the Tiger Eye coffee.

Tip: call ahead to make sure they have the ingredients","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUr21ODJHBU7E4e_64wU4MMONI3mJnfCiETkq5&fid=0x0:0x6a25d042660e3ed3"],"When":"2021-8-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZuen6azAZaeBPQC6XtvXbgUcHlZFPy1xD9wav_8Z186L2bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best new brunch place! Choice of Italian or brunch menu. The food was good and the service was great. Free 2 hour parking across the street and free no limit weekend parking on Albert. Games section if that's your thing. Great patio with treed tables and under a canopy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpPP7IzTza4Ip-JE51GJhuNyO2I34koQyh1zsr&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great spot for breakfast with plenty of options to choose from! The hash browns were especially good—crispy and flavorful. There’s lots of space here, making it perfect for a relaxed meal without feeling crowded. Whether you’re in for a quick bite or a leisurely breakfast, this place has something for everyone. Definitely recommend giving it a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2JVQgCl9OsottKSRyre_Bvdj3SzyQcLZmiJhu&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I would rate Reverie Kitchen 3 stars. The cafe is simple, not fancy. The food was tasty and made with good ingredients, but it wasn't exceptional. The service was just alright; they served our foods (also coffees) separately, which is against basic serving rules. The cutlery wasn't clean, as shown in my pictures. It's worth noting that they have a few tables outside. Overall, the food didn't look amazing, but it was alright. I'm thinking about giving them another chance for a lunch or dinner and will update my review if I have a better experience. I'm very fair when it comes to rating places, and I'm very surprised by their google overal 4.7 review!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpVTirLImVaeFWeZSPzCfl5HHmg837TI4A80Sk&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Renee Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjpu7xvxzQuz7mPhbIfCUN7BEUO3RMAXobynBrvl_suLC61AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Had high expectations after seeing the review but sadly I can only rate this place 2/5. This restaurant is more towards a casual cafe, nothing fancy. Menu has wayyy too many items although some are fair priced.

Food: ⭐️⭐️

🍝Shrimp Carbonara with Homemade Fettuccine ⭐️⭐️

Tastes like something I can cook at home. They kinda overheated the Carbonara sauce, making it clumpy and scrambled, which made the pasta very dry. For it to be $22 (shrimp+fettuccine was additional 💰) was disappointing.

🍝Chicken Alfredo with Homemade Fettuccine ⭐️⭐️⭐️

Definitely tasted better than the carbonara, everything was good. Although I can certainly make the same taste at home.

🍕Margherita Pizza ⭐️⭐️

It was a bit different from we imagined, the crust tastes like those frozen ones, but the topping was good. The tomatoes were fresh and delicious, there was decent amount of cheese. $11 was fair, you get what you pay

🌯Tuscan Chicken Panini ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Honestly the best looking dish out of everything we ordered. It had lots of cheese and meat, $16 was fair

☕️Drinks ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Drinks were surprisingly good! We have ice-frapp and italian soda, both tasted really good, although a small frapp is $6 lol

🍽️Service ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
The service was amazing, staff were very kind and attentive. Willing to make fresh fettuccine when they ran out 🙏🏻 I appreciate that!

Overall:  2/5

A bit pricey for what they served, maybe order their drinks and breakfast. Pasta was disappointing for the price we paid, we might stick to paninis only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpdJcwuLITEB0xEq51prxonrPo3YFDa-VJVefX&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Westie Masks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImIpX9gcj-rBam5pQsTIWhZNmKHdi6lOhnIkMHVwcRXdVlRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Casual fare with solid breakfast options. I had the Salmon Eggs Benedict and my friends ordered The Standard. We aLeo ordered the hash browns. I absolutely loved my meal. Hash browns were so good with hot sauce and ketchup. Service was excellent. What a nice spot! Wish I lived closer!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Val Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXkNc5CFidDvCL6ggfjfAKrG0er-5TyNmVe1yZFGc2n0YAtMVp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seriously best breakfast around. The bread is baked in house and has the nicest crumb. Crispest hash browns. Was blown away by the French toast. Not normally a french toast sweet breakfast kinda person but I crave this now. The savory French toast was topped with dried apple slices and “not too sweet” oatmeal crumble. Best value breakfast especially since there is so much care taken in making the food. The owner always comes out to say hi and the staff is so friendly and work quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMs-S-NsLPnkdIVbkNkCIj7vRIe1zm2Yn6tCpFw&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2023-9-28"},{"Name":"Jackie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvUQ9aJ1wSufelDKgqON2H6lO7iMGLWM2g-QyJYoOznHaBLkrZTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You order off a menu taped on the wall counter-service style and then pay and find a table (inside or on their humongous and comfy patio.)

The furniture is dated but the vibe and staff are all awesome. Very laid back and kind.

Prices can't be beat and honestly the food knocked our socks off. All 3 of us loved every part of our dishes, the bread was so high quality and the shredded hashbrowns are *chefs kiss*. The Italian espresso they use was also bold and delicious.

This place is so unassuming but what a gem for the community. I can't wait to come back and try the homemade pastas and other breakfast/lunch options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5hLWvEss7xua6fjsAugCVuDxJu294LBLId-ey&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2022-9-25"},{"Name":"Justin Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIphX3IVdB6bYFyvRnGuBCpwkqSRxWlxdh1LxRlF-KLcXAbeHmLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Easygoing spot in a nice location… used to be La Fontana. Food at this new Reverie Kitchen is solid, tasty, a little pricier than usual, but not excellent: it’s missing a little bit of “soul”, if that makes sense. Service is a little lacking - long wait times for both drinks and food make it hard to give full marks for this area. The space, though is comfortable, easy to find seating in, and feels homey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAogmnSTCxPJP-DAzCGzbJWHfo62RwHc7dM7hQ&fid=0x0:0xd5fbbe326624ce2d"],"When":"2024-5-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Charmaine H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZsUZPMo_fWyRKGOsCfgoFkzE2WCAA6dK-4Yv43wXpchCV7vCc9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After a road trip, I was craving comfort food, and nothing beats a good bowl of congee. We ordered the house special congee and the mixed beef rice roll pot—everything was absolutely delicious and hit the spot. The service was quick, the food was flavorful, and parking was easy to find. I’ll definitely be back to try more dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ1DVe7fhCWgC8iGo0RxshzIJ_8KTX_wZ-8Iio&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered their chicken and beef roll.
Tbh the chicken and beef were very fatty. The chicken was mostly skin, and the beef was so fatty. I wish it was leaner. I ended up not eating the meat.
The rice roll was incredible though. Big portion and the soy sauce is also amazing🤩
There’s a 25 cent extra if you pay with card and spend below $25.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLsISXk8KoYCP7UTv77mFZGOkhVcFq1Otnpp-K&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Robert L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-9tmacw2d7mEoS9jo6IRNi8WC5iGvlOPyb07RToKkYebkGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice to have a good congee option outside of Richmond, quality of food is fresh and hot, quality of service is quick and accommodating, and dining area is maintained very clean. We enjoyed the old-school chinese music. Very asian local kinda restaurant. Simple menu, congee, rice roll and most importantly instant noodle with spam and eggs. Sometimes the simplicity good. Only con, their hk style lemon tea is Nestea with lemon. Not OG hk lemon tea. But not enough to deserve a drop in rating. Spicy wonton is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhdZEjK_SwHGN0TnvzNAcprcfAhA2NQrjQBOJD&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Tracy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTZ9WS5t-EwmmGYfwb8oxU5Ml1l5GP8QXsDp7QRvBqsNy2-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good place for comfort Chinese food! Had a good assortment of congee, rice noodles and stir fried noodles. It’s a no fuss restaurant and the price is really decent. We ordered 4 dishes and a drink for $50 Including tip!

We ordered congee, shrimp and beef rice roll, Chinese donut and the siu mai and rice roll with peanut and hoisin sauce, and lastly an iced lemon tea which was plenty for 2 adults and 2 kids.

A note is that they do accept credit and debit but it has to be over $20! Overall I enjoyed it and we will probably be coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVun7qNRq5BgA7NwxknEY4An3Kpfk_Fb3gPq3c&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It seems like there are a lot of rice roll places popping up around town and I'm not opposed to it.

Tried the shrimp and beef rice rolls which were petty good. We were intrigued by the shu mai rice rolls and they turned out exactly like you would expect... Mini shu mai dumplings on top of plain mini rice rolls with a hoisin/peanut sauce. While the dumplings themselves weren't anything to write home about, the dish actually worked.

They did forget our spicy wontons order so we had to ask them about it. When it arrived, it didn't seem too spicy. Fortunately, they have spicy chili oil at the table that you can add to your dishes.

Update: March 2024. Revisited for breakfast recently and tried their pan fried radish cake (along with a shrimp and scallop rice roll and a mixed meat rice roll). Love the crispy bottom of the radish cake and the soft inner parts.

Update Jul 2024: Revisited and ordered the shrimp and beef rice roll, bbq pork rice roll,  and potstickers. Really liked the potstickers (and the black vinegar dipping sauce). Liked that the bbq pork was chopped up instead of just being big pieces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKLWDGEvGhFnMAjKWeAxC2C70r7wrvSD3nKM43&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Keekee Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWycy2aaMjXu8DrA0EFyYYbM6_UkdUarXUrCZG-_abxm8QV1jLr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love my neighbourhood cheung fun & congee place!  The best comfort food you’ll need after a long week or on rainy cozy weather, like a warm fuzzy hug!  They also have bomb fried noodles dishes & rice roll hot pot!  & may is the kindest person x","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ-TYXQOi90lbo5lwqboRMVmtUSb5wzATBGN-H&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in for lunch today, I have always wanted to try this place out and I was in the mood for some rice rolls.

Nice little place in Burnaby, I have to say for rice rolls and congee it is just okay, not spectacular but okay and more than decent.

They have a special combo before 11:30, congee and any rice roll for 15$ which is a good deal. Quality of the food is average-good and the congee was okay, nothing too extravagant or anything. This is a good place if you want rice rolls and don’t want to drive all the way to Richmond. I would give it a 4/5, the toppings on the rice roll could use a bit of work! Friendly staff though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3ZZD1TyETtP0NgTh9EbYqbhlq2HCvsmddGisO&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2023-7-26"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It seems like restaurants specializing in Chinese rice rolls are gradually popping up more and more these days. Most of them seem to be in Richmond; when we heard of May Rice Roll & Congee in North Burnaby, we had to go check them out!

Shrimp and Scallop Rice Roll
Doughnut Stick Rice Roll
Sliced Fish Congee
Sliced Fish & Beef Congee
Chinese Doughnut

The rice rolls here were not as smooth, slippery and thin as other rice rolls we've had. These weren't bad though. They're a pretty good option for anyone who lives in Burnaby and doesn't want to drive all the way to Richmond. Chinese Doughnut and Congee were both very nicely done. It's a solid place to go to for these Chinese comfort foods.

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street
Location: 4530 Hastings St., Burnaby","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvSzSvY3lMSeErOCecK2t108E_hDl7vuHcPnTy&fid=0x0:0x80b70cd79853b88"],"When":"2023-5-8"}]

title: Milk & Sugar Cafe
descriptions: Bubble tea shop also offering smoothies, juices & hot drinks, plus breakfast & some Asian food.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Neha Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOAFVq8Z0ZGxqdcHyQUNR3mUQfrl34aqa6y4TgqK9UdFHM4ko3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service, staff was polite. Excellent menu potions. Mango ice cream was good. I cant stop myself to recommend banana chocolate ice cream drink with complimentary coconut jellies. It was delicious and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNakhEZLCLBX6QzqZizFpgZOnJStrnBMrqJal2n&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Qiongyu Chong Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWssGm9ujB4PRrGeL3vqwFdAgcQ2HleVBiKNDuYibWaXLNdm2Dr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is such a neighborhood gem! We had avocado , red bean and mango milkshake, made with fresh ingredient, really tasty and not too sweet , we love it. They also have food options and open until midnight , such a good spot for after dinner desert/drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyJrNHIzOXr8koDqOnyHGJlvxl11kqm1rNE1jR&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite bubble tea places in Vancouver along with Hot Cha Cafe. They usually have special drinks which are pretty good. Prices are very cheap and their pearls are great. Service could be improved, as sometimes the people behind the counter seem annoyed. However, the quality and price make up for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2NjbH7GR9YR3b3dmh1WYl7ZWOX99OxH_ZQpfP&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners are very very hard working. They rarely take a day off and I've been a loyal customer since I was 16 at their original location on Fraser street across from John Oliver high school. They raised 2 kids and work long hours everyday. They also own the laundry mat next door.

They have daily specials posted on their chalk board outside that attracts crowds daily, even during the winter months. But if you’re a fan of ice cream or cheese cake bubble teas this is the place. My personal favourite is their green tea ice cream with coconut jelly.

They have a small dine in area and tv. You’ll see a lot of young students here.
Cash or debit only. Pay cash and get 5% off.
I just noticed they do e-transfer now.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvdZFC-jqLLx2zkvPUw8bXN-MjLewcSBBGmkBP&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Alick Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUqZ-BRlpWhxpGIkligB7NDQbnz-lNKkuIZsGRSdDfseOKcvE5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to this place for years, but tonight I went to grab a drink with a friend  and a snack. The drinks are pretty casual as always. but something caught my eyes on the food menu tonight and   I had to try it!
The creamy durian balls aka “golden durian mochi ball”
I didn’t even know they had it, it’s a must try!
😍explosion of creamy durian on the inside and a light crispy outer shell with a soft mochi middle layer! The sauce top it off and gives it just the right amount of sweetness!
It was perfect the durians treat that hit the spot

definitely going to get them again next time
thank you👍👍

it’s not for the everyone, but for the durian lovers out there it’s definitely going to give you a durian tasty time!🤪","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWoO1aWj3rVXJ7tQTtH88tEkOTFDWX5GrKBkrb&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Bryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgQOyucobzp1WHcgAwkWVFUg6T8jAN7HsnzLG69-m-S2SOVkUy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bubble tea was great. The atmosphere is as expected for an older cafe. It's fine but come for the tea not the atmosphere. My only complaint was they didn't take MasterCard. Without Visa, cash or debit. You are stuck.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Bennet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvYdpdn1NxF637i3RhyQP9PtiVF9jOCdDNyEHmcaA9tMpwkZI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Milk & Sugar Cafe offers a delightful experience for anyone looking for a cozy spot to enjoy a great cup of coffee or a delicious light meal. The cafe's atmosphere is warm and inviting, with a charming decor that blends rustic and modern elements. Their coffee, sourced from high-quality beans, is rich and flavourful, perfect for coffee connoisseurs. The menu, though not extensive, includes a variety of pastries, sandwiches, and salads, all freshly prepared. The standout is their signature vanilla latte and the avocado toast, which is a must-try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSmT3cMxbNrRVm7PyYF2tut6c8D_9L9TMCzbB5&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-1-3"},{"Name":"Liam Rider","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPX4DDrtiUNyDL1r03MV7uHEDVU-v1k00_ry1glHtcrJFAttnq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Worst fried chicken I've had in my entire life. And it was 14 bucks for 2 drumsticks and 2 thighs!!!!! Beware. I'm sure their bubble tea is great but stay away from the fried chicken.","Images":null,"When":""}]
