user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A fun neighborhood spot for ice cream and sundaes. Counter seating and a few tables available. Lots of seasonal flavors available. Takeout pints and ice cream sandwiches are a must try if you’re buying for the road!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWc7P31g7ggOOAvcZPM4yp6I30hRknYcxBztPk&fid=0x0:0x858c5e898fdfa3c"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Yumi Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPFqDkxESWXC88SASBBMb5TodqjqiFWci9IiQVgmoclWTpAqs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love the ice cream and soda at Glennburn. Been here several times now and their ice cream is ALWAYS solid. Whenever I visit Vancouver- Burnaby area this is one of the spots that I must visit. Recently tried the FOG & the fruity loop flavored sodas with vanilla ice cream on the side. Would highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbjvC6eI6T0VMmrZblBOy85imxDCF_L-j0HLoH&fid=0x0:0x858c5e898fdfa3c"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"L Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQvIh5w41NvNm69uuQ6fEFfx4_xCLgbz-lb793dTjac89L3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An old fashioned soda shop in the heart of Burnaby BC.  This place is always a staple and we drop by every year when we are in town.  Wide range of products including ice creams, floats, milkshakes, sundaes and other desserts.  We ordered a chocolate milk shake, hot fudge sundae and scoop of ice cream.  The chocolate milkshake was rich and creamy with whip cream on top,  the sundae came with whip cream, cherry and walnuts.  The single scoop of lemon sunrise was light, zesty and refreshing.  It was a pleasant experience as always.  They have dad’s rootbeer here as well.  Hands down always a great treat for the family","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfuI7ZUkPqTLkLL2VJcvCjqi4i83JjpT-sjJhg&fid=0x0:0x858c5e898fdfa3c"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Amar M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBQWZODVOR5EgW_ud4WGBoPZzS3E7_T_DuyVRfFsnuGSHVIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First timers here.  Tried a bit of everything.  Banana Split was the clear winner - worth the cost - not a drop left.  Lime Rickey was refreshing and as advertised.  Small spot - bar seating is ideal in my opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj-Pr1R0F2YRo5Jwwc4CPR63G2aTXCadvPsiF3&fid=0x0:0x858c5e898fdfa3c"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Spike Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-bYH0S2j8q9mpEz9LWcLeOJc9r39CdWCQQyEHN9RaHr3ZaKJV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A really great place to go for homemade soda's, floats, ice cream, and shakes. They have a great selection of classic and new flavours. There's normally a long line up on a hot day but the line moves fast. The staff are very friendly and very helpful. They also sell doggy ice cream!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbKO_TgQfbezolZzrzr9TG0F6AMLeOR5CCI6xe&fid=0x0:0x858c5e898fdfa3c"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Keith Eastcott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk5BCUEJh42hOpsF-_OoCCbmyygcrHIJcijMiuq6slKML49qmN0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So absolutely beyond amazing. From the time you walk in you can tell this store is gonna be good. They have an old time soda shop vibe with glass containers of candy and old school milk shake machines and other decor to make it feel like the 1950's. They have a large list of flavors and different options like sundays, milkshakes, and 2 different kinds of banana split. The portions are ridiculously huge and could easily be split if you feel like sharing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpSLTLynC6Wr5XQETb2HlmeMa1IObtGMhOJrlk&fid=0x0:0x858c5e898fdfa3c"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Ognjen Stajic (Ozzy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkSSU4eg1VXAeLi1fHS3IroDB794s-Cx1rfGJubYTxg0uZj5k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hear me out. Their ice cream is great, sizes are awesome and the place is really cute and retro.

What's truly great is their cakes. My kid had a birthday party and a lot of parents choose something like DQ for a birthday party - please don't.

Glenburn's ice cream cakes are amazing and comparable in price. Best thing? You get to support a local business and enjoy delicious snacks.

Order it, you won't regret it.

Do I sound like I'm advertising it? You bet, they are great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL2tiRbiyDBZsp-zQrjCiq_AIzFVhR4vc0CFXn&fid=0x0:0x858c5e898fdfa3c"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Jimina Almero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVHqAiyaVguwyrjIKIrFauUQ4ck0nbY7blKjG9gpN9m4eZsl4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Glenburn has been our go to for a delicious treat for the past few years. We always look forward to trying their seasonal flavors","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc55YMu9nydqUykL3KTFAj38FcYhqxlOicNEHv&fid=0x0:0x858c5e898fdfa3c"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kevin P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkDBk3e1Ip_bQRNhdYV04jXqFUg3jOtnLdryylvdelhRMP-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing double espresso macchiato ☕️at a location only nearby locals may know.
I personally didn’t know about this place until recently but wish I had known sooner.
Small area for outdoor seating is also available for those rare sunny days in Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTZWu0PMlHEPgCqcqZkkAs3rbQxQGz5oIUApAe&fid=0x0:0xd88620a72c11dfbe"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Martin Matahari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAn1gLSlBMeGXZBHUnKkSJRx9LUQmHP9VKEpiPVA6PU8EOwPbl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Got a takeout coffee here, latte, and the roast was not too bad, not super bitter. But the quality of the milk wasn’t good. There was a plasticky aftertaste that I could tell it was cheap milk. There was ample seating and the ambiance was nice. Just wish they invested in better dairy products to improve their products. Staff was ok, average.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMttTPnl3bSvZNc1htjegwW_nIGj9l0kFMd6gfG&fid=0x0:0xd88620a72c11dfbe"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"mehrsa kazeroonian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXM1lLEqmMksgol23r92UT7tstgmJXGUfF_daWvZHX2f1OtKqhq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious drinks and sweets, Nice and kind people and clean surrounding🌹🌹
Negin is so friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgc9rDwj0NHbp0z7CbxUKy-Nrpx9HTRqSwFgi4&fid=0x0:0xd88620a72c11dfbe"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Aaron G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKstDhbd58MjtbnCrT08KosG0qF__vGcLbau-yPNhc06Pj5bg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"If you're looking for a spot to grab a coffee and get some work done, I'd think twice. There are other coffee shops within a 5 minute walk that won't:

-Interrupt a work call to ask if you're going to buy a coffee. Yes, I'd love x, can I pay for it when this call is over?

-Have someone else interrupt you 5 minutes later to ask if you're going to buy a coffee. Yes, I'd like x, but I'm stuck on this call -- can you help me out with that please?

-Have the owner come over and tell you this not a restaurant and you can't just sit here using wifi. As I've told your staff, I was late for a call and couldn't wait at the counter to place an order.

Note, this wasn't my first time at CuppaJoe. I've been grabbing a coffee there at least once a week for the past few months.

At the end of the day it's a great way to lose a customer that lives nearby.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esra Kırbaş Kırdı","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcBbZ5SjcOv3S9fKk0tsJLEbWeh-7338zt4bOWFv8nMbg0rTjS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Italian style coffee in Burnaby, awesome breakfast wraps, vegeterian options available. Very friendly staff, calm atmosphere to work or have a casual meeting. We love this place 💕","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"shadi halimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRYBZQgQlPmK_ct0y3jv4kMkuGGimwpNxMsfGCJ_hKd6u5d49U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their coffee is the best around, with a rich aroma that fills the air. You can customize your coffee to your heart's content with as much sugar and cream as you desire. I like their club house sandwich which is both healthy and delicious. The customer service is fantastic, with friendly and polite staff. The cozy vibe makes it a great spot to relax. Don't miss out on this coffee lover's paradise!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaD0ykC1G_bwbpXCHS5vcsXI27K9uWOxC-j0vy&fid=0x0:0xd88620a72c11dfbe"],"When":"2023-6-20"},{"Name":"Eva Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPPFGx0sYIRK0Baf67reSgV-w4TFbL2X_L5aONyrSf6sQk6pCb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is top #5 in Vancouver for excellent coffee and food. Ordered the caramel macchiato and a grilled cheese, both were AMAZING. The owner and staff are very friendly. Totally recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcpokbErHB1kNznyLXOjVw-IrD0ZZV_gQuNlMr&fid=0x0:0xd88620a72c11dfbe"],"When":"2023-11-20"},{"Name":"Esther Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzn-0MHL7hwjPRxLUkqYM-UE2cWjWqifS0YVf-WtKlV3wh5dYB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone is extremely friendly and they serve amazing coffee.  Dog friendly coffee shop. You can bring your dog inside when you are ordering. They also provide free dog treats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlG7udV5xMNwmz8hGvMtD_tzSYZ3OGA2YOyl1h&fid=0x0:0xd88620a72c11dfbe"],"When":"2023-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Scott Gardner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAtcJicC0R9IQuYc_EQKkOcP-sHAeMKi4grD7YdbfSUxo3AB8k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Starbucks and had an excellent experience thanks to the outstanding service provided by Sarah and Igor. They were both incredibly welcoming and attentive, ensuring that my order was perfect and that I felt valued as a customer. Their positive attitudes and professionalism really stood out and made my visit all the more enjoyable. Kudos to Sarah and Igor for going above and beyond to provide exceptional service—I'll definitely be returning!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-NjOqeiKKBIKYuXncVHCxmhgnBrRVCHYU0hgL&fid=0x0:0x6ead6e17f1100b2c"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Agnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyqJcbJDbElC-RwU1sBP46by6tVeVGdJmv6s9B0kjpjwDghjdVVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wish the stars you accumulate didn't disappear.
Busy location right before school start at 830am.
Staff handling the high volume with dedicated staff calling out all the orders including mobile ones.

Red cup day November 16 extra busy. Great day to pick up a free reusable cup with Christmas handcrafted drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFP9QOgQvtpbCflSMlX61DS2X6DOls4ZJLoN_K&fid=0x0:0x6ead6e17f1100b2c"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The last best coffee stop in Burnaby before you hit the Barnett highway. A usual stop for me in rush hour traffic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjC-1Q95cD4c5ZNnvXzHOpPe747O7gZ1HyQXZZ&fid=0x0:0x6ead6e17f1100b2c"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"İskender Pehlivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6VcFI0OW4_Uhp2tRcJmKyywysJgJn2d5ke-6arDdi6Q2W3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Is unhappiness contagious?
I would like to share an incident I experienced at Starbucks 6568 Hastings Street, Kensington Ave, Burnaby, BC V5B 1S2 store, which I have been a happy customer of for years, on October 2, 2024 at around 9 a.m. I decided to write this because of the friendliness and polite attitude of the store employees. Recently, I have seen an employee named Jackie behave in a very disturbing way towards both colleagues and customers. As a psychologist, I can make some guesses from Jackie's perpetually aggressive uncomfortable gaze and perpetually sweaty face. Anyway... In the morning, while he was interfering with a colleague in an unpolite manner, I said with a smile that this was Jackie's rule, not Starbucks'. He angrily kicked me out of the store. I asked him why he was so rude because I hadn't seen other stores charge extra for the milk added to the coffee. When it started to get uglier, I said, why are you so nervous and making people unhappy? From the way people were looking at me and because I wanted the topic to end, I showed him my phone and asked him if he would fire me once again to dissuade him. It started to look even worse because I was calling the police, let alone being quiet or polite. You wouldn't want to see the gaze of employees and customers. I wrote this with the thought that maybe Starbucks officials could save customers and store employees from Jackie. Because I don't like people who aren't kind and make other people unhappy just to be happy themselves.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wall E Bush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsKYOEr-emRnRDMvQb4Fe50cosacwOYlXOeUFcUM1BL-i4pEI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The baristas behind the counter always seem like they’re having a good time & every interaction I’ve had with them has been pleasant. They make the atmosphere of the cafe enjoyable, as it seems they care for what they are doing. It can get quite busy there during rush hours, but they are able to maintain stamina despite sometimes rude customers. It’s free to be nice to service workers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SharonMelissa Shawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIj697oj8NKE8wzKphJ1nB6MrB4S4kNdUYzQf1XRQMR-ueSoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am very disappointed with the recent management changes at this Starbucks location. For two consecutive days, there was no coffee available, which is unacceptable for a coffee shop. If corporate advertises a promotion, such as $5 coffee and pastry, it should be readily available for customers. Under the new manager, the service has significantly declined. They micromanage what customers can order and seem more focused on maximizing profit (even charging for no ice, etc) than providing a good experience. I will not be returning to this location, and it’s no surprise it’s not as busy as it used to be.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Azya Estiqlal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOYBu1npG2EZSM0xMjnJjkp78nuTI2ynw1dM3WINwKVUpRqXf9TA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This morning I went there for get coffee I pay by cash they ask change they don’t have small size money.
and also I order two Cinnamon cake it take almost15 min to bring my order.
bad experience not satisfied.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alessandra Marinkovic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTm6Ln4GHA8MCGhRY6-YLk5FPvhvx6ihvur4dcaB-AfDq9Rca1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hannah is the most professional, kind and helpful worker. She is competent, and provides great service. They need more people like HER. I had a great experience with her.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Durango","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_2PesKmt-cFSjzAWF8ZpvzKFIQfYWeYB7sfNc7YronxWjhwaDKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The burger and fries were good. Menu is alright. However, the offering should be better than this given they have enough people and students around to support the inclusion of higher quality of food in their menu. Nothing but sandwiches and burgers here. Then again the kitchen seems very small so I get it. There is a nice eating area right outside too which is very pleasant in sunny days. Prices are reasonable. Service was quick and good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyAwheQ9t1Ao60qBM-ZrrqTdFPM_c0zVtW_eTG&fid=0x0:0x19f9b8fb8520e293"],"When":"2023-10-12"},{"Name":"meshkat hoseiny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXM57zWMm0vZk-l-96leEq7xy88YmrSkMBKFp6CxsNaLy-u4CVb5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This café is the only option on Floor G for the people of Burnaby, but it’s often crowded during the week with high school students from across the street, leaving little room for others.

The service could be better. On multiple occasions, I’ve gone for coffee around 2:15 PM, only to be told that the machines were already cleaned and they couldn’t take any orders—even though they claim to serve until 3:30 PM.

The food quality also doesn’t compare to the café on the other side near Deer Lake 1. Unfortunately, I can’t recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jimmy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaQe2WLp7herqsSS6Qbb3TdkPTjO2rKeO4tgMEL6Gag0kIT7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bacon Burger: the bread is just right (in my opinion) for the burger. The patty was properly seasoned, and the ingredients were fresh.
Caesar Salad: Good lettuce size, with adequate salad dressing added, and basically what you can expect from a Caesar salad.
My thoughts: portion size was great, and there are specials throughout the week on the menu for a good price. Can be busy during rush hours, but overall the café is well managed. Thank you City Hall Café!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5rSeGpCqVnOrsOexvCz6hJwKFwGLfoYQILCoS&fid=0x0:0x19f9b8fb8520e293"],"When":"2023-9-13"},{"Name":"Zach Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsLTwWkK_Fl6ZtyZLDA-tn1qcA6hBmyVudtUY0B35fijDakONNOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The line up can be long at peak times, even extending beyond the door of the cafeteria. Food offerings are very reasonably priced and affordable. Food is not bad. Staff are helpful, but not out of their way friendly. Very crowded during lunch with no tables left, however, there is seating outdoors. Food is prepared within 5-15 minutes, depending on item and time. Disposable wooden cutlery is available, self-serve.  There is a coffee machine, but it is sometimes out of service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvwlyjB4u92gNs2XkVMCtEEv1bbhznwa-XyALuorQtBg64Yw0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had the chicken burger & fries, not bad for the price. Just tried the bacon burger, that was a huge mistake. First off, the meat smelled of "fish" and tasted like what could only be described as an old tuna  fish type taste. Which is disgusting to say the least, the meat looked like something I could really not describe as actual hamburger meat. Just sad, the kitchen staff reflect the products you get.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"VonosGaming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnR1nRw3YgsCeiYWmvwq_6_wCyhE3U2TiFUi0pItdAKDMU749q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Can't  believe I paid $9.00 for a disgusting chicken burger.

I paid $9.00 for a burger I could've gotten anywhere else with quality and it would actually taste good.

Secondly I was not provided with a seat it's only for adults. I paid a lot of money for their food I should get a seat especially waiting twenty minutes for a chicken burger.

I wanted a Caesar salad but they said they didn't have it but five minutes later a customer asked for it and he got it? What happened to equality in this world.

They kick out students right when they get their food when the whole place is empty.

Lady at cashier provides rude attitude to students even if you're nice to her she'll still give you attitude unless you're an adult.

Never coming here again.

More to add but I won't waste my time on this rubbish cafe.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Connor Tung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlElm5ceiiu07TKDWKhYg9BP84KThPVOpnnHGJdykNdSUlc01v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The cashier is very rude to students even though they constantly buy food from there. Students aren’t allowed to sit down even though there is no one else sitting down. They also hired a security guard that is mean and asks you when you at lining up for food if you are going to buy. He has also harassed people who obviously bought something and waiting for food to leave if they didn’t buy anything. Overall would not recommend going to eat at this poorly ran cafe.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbhd2sAGh6YdWTSnS0ezKbeHKIzRo9oLgml0KIMw6fBXjChK3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good burgers, good fries","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwFHs6eFHwIesXhbVCWrgYNYlRcAGqRzR1rKk3&fid=0x0:0x19f9b8fb8520e293"],"When":"2022-6-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hashan Peiris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQS5tXYmTSP8F6gc8CzViRW9uUkD3rHwc2GCIQJ7tX0r6Ne1oo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The shop is generally well-maintained and organized, making it convenient for customers to collect their mobile orders. The store's operating hours are also accommodating, and the staff members are consistently friendly and helpful. They have consistently fulfilled my orders accurately as per my requests made through the app. Since it is inside the mall, it's convenient to visit while shopping.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZy_XHnSLfD6FEclZwtqzNitb3RstmWaUO67Hl&fid=0x0:0xef2836b8d631efd5"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean, spacious, and modern store on the corner section of the mall with some seating on the side. I ordered a drink on the mobile app and got it within 5 minutes. Staff is efficient and gets the job done. Location is on the second floor right across from the food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3TfM6Uzxk5GHFiF0HmJrx_gZHJlk2llXZnzM4&fid=0x0:0xef2836b8d631efd5"],"When":"2022-2-11"},{"Name":"Veronica N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaEZZcukGThSmHA881UMjlshS09D0BtOAEz9vsdpXKxEW84w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I asked for a refill with the exact same previous order, even showed them the sticker to avoid any mistakes. Of course, there was a mistake—they replaced my oat milk with a CREAMER. Now I'm stuck in the toilet for the rest of the day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mandeep kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5-aAr05P2hI2GAfB2fGoYiVjQycm1ruTfhS13F8mvruplauI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always had my favourite drink on weekends. Always tastes better.

I got chai tea latte with matcha foam on top. But the tea gets cold very easily just after 5 minutes.
I like to enjoy my coffee sip by sip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVaZazr95L3TcaULaTYE3k-dbJF_sTTtfTzug1&fid=0x0:0xef2836b8d631efd5"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"A Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqWf7PP6Ijzi2lzQvv5gHfc8J8mJWT5kt0bKPkTr45FanVBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"often have issues at this coffee shop. They frequently misspell my name, get my coffee order wrong, and when the coffee is finally made, they don’t even call my name to let me know. The service is really frustrating, and it’s disappointing to see the same mistakes repeated without any improvement.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don't understand. I feel cheated.

The app notified me of a BOGO free event for frappucino® products today and I got so excited. I started researching and it was legit.

When it was finally 3pm, I walked a few kilometres to the nearest Starbucks. (lougheed)
It was raining pretty bad too.

While I was ordering, there were only two non-caffeinated Frappucino®: Strawberry Crème and Vanilla Bean Crème. I was let down. To make things worse, whipped cream was mandatory. I couldn't change the setting.

Then I checked the condiment stand. The carafes were all empty except two. The customer support was supposed change them every so often. During my 30 minute stay I didn't see anybody replace them.

When I finally retrieved my 2 items, nobody called my name. Usually they do before they leave it on the tray. And when I took it, nobody even noticed or acknowledged me.

The worst part was that when I walked back home, I realized that there wasn't any BOGO at all. I was charged full price for two frappucinos®.

I feel like I got scammed.

I don't believe Starbucks would do something like this! My heart wants to believe in them. But my wallet doesn't. Those drinks were not cheap.

I'm so crestfallen that I don't think I will buy from Starbucks for a while. A long while.

Until we settle what happened.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD-N1uVaKafR74wPHS0yr7GmcVINSPzzN1-RgL&fid=0x0:0xef2836b8d631efd5"],"When":"2019-3-15"},{"Name":"Shu-Yuan Yi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGyDlWWSl0QxqBP7BMgLBJUPlYaBBAGfJRaXnZRaQGHfhFNHhn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When I got my large coffee it feels pretty light, and after I got home within 3mins and opened the lid it shows 1/3 were bubbles... feel cheated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_UAydN6pInfatIsimWmmjpxkX_HVaw0fsJegC&fid=0x0:0xef2836b8d631efd5"],"When":"2022-11-24"},{"Name":"Joseph Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKl9MhDPy8EY7RScMPhpKoWbPpWdnatgpmX48XB_InHQxZUBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Like most Starbucks, this one does everything pretty well. It's also nice how early they open (6:30am on weekdays as of March 13, 2021). Line gets pretty bad late in the morning though, so try to go either before 9:30am or after 2:00pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6qwAXs3cID_ELTzWJQ5fAa4fF9GLDXkW15uF7&fid=0x0:0xef2836b8d631efd5"],"When":"2021-3-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wholefoods offers a fantastic, wooden-feel, minimalistic and easy going seating area with plenty of options which are mostly sourced from local companies or made in-store. They have a great facilities area with microwave and water refill station as well as compostable water cups.
I opted for the Large Soy Cappucino with some whipped in cinammon, great value (20oz) in size compared to other coffee houses and the Allegro coffee is super yummy from local roasters. They also have an awesome range of all dairy free milks and their bakery contains a plethora of delicious tasty goodies to cater for all tastebuds as well as vegan and gluten-free options.
I wish they would extend their great offer for for coffee and muffin to other baked goods to offer a bit more variety and the fact these things freshly served bad boys literally sell like hot cakes as their so good, but is one my only gripes. Therefore, if your there late morning it's hard to fight for any of the good muffins left.
I always opt for my go-to Banana Bread as it's incredibly scrummy and as most of their stuff is made from wholesome, fresh and locally-sourced ingredients.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYXCMkClpNlXzHafPVARzE66T9tdSh9zKU9-9H&fid=0x0:0xb5bc03ac5aed7fe5"],"When":"2022-2-27"},{"Name":"Darren Michaud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXu366do_xG8Lw5b8D75tAo0g_tIJTZ9UOqpDOvK-QaCUG5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Advertising branded Bulletproof coffee with MCT oil and grassfed butter, what they sell is generic coffee mixed with Bulletproof Brain Octane Blend and Nanak Desi Ghee - clarified butter with a very distinct taste. It’s not grassfed, has no nutrients (boiled down to milk fat), and does not blend. No measurements were used when mixing. Love the rest of the store, just need to correct your ingredients here please!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Spencer K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxeBmVkRYpoUg4BPGwvjRaID79B_HB-klvBsfuzD5gqqYIkTN_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Muffin and coffee deal for 4 bucks is a great deal. The coffee by itself is too expensive for my liking but the combo with the muffin is well priced . Coffee is tasty","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDLNdVaubv2aakSebPOyG_UmGiEWk-Kn9ElvILTaVIxhWZUmU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Way better than the typical chains. Quality. Taste. Amazing cheap combo. Organic for about same price. Starbucks can suck it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah Beads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsple62v2d1C6Xc1kwkmLJA7XKD5BUokeKMTK-1k3AbOKjzGJH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ran out of Stevia and all other sugar-free sweeteners but obviously didn't say anything until I had already paid for my drink. I felt the service here was very cold.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Life of Chuck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyJlwvEI6sgDkanAUTupKuretr4LT0BUZxjS_81V7yeUHmwFxc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great spot in a grocery store food court. Super fast Wi-Fi for studying or working. Pricier coffee but its good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Haruka Kato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJugyM7LJ0oxKcRXzCKi0u4ZE4HEM1Gw00wLDMlPdy1xfyPqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Coffee was pretty bland. Not good quality for the price.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jon L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItRyGIdX-Wd0Y1RYttqUuxDlWIFioFYiXxjWd-h9ycx60jMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very good coffe. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsRQewgvZO4LIIqm85-5WIRYN9cLYgve6MPZktTLEMFrnc7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered a matcha au lait. The matcha was not mixed correctly and I had big lumps of matcha in my drink. Really not enjoyable. I couldn't finish it. For me it's just basic how you should be able to blend the matcha powder as a bubble tea place...
It's a shame because I think the taste could have been so much better if the drink was done correctly.  It cost me 6.80.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcekU3HXjeBI9etxk4HPERE3THlu0ESX_0BTRS&fid=0x0:0xf5c59beaa839488f"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Kelly Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX32eLDLDsOR8mhTbyfvONvWG_W6h-9xpvUdbTvyhwNzZUxax1Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The atmosphere for the crystal mall location is really chill. It was like walking into a busy pharmacy if anything. Not exactly the way to go but it’s better than the rude service mentioned on the other locations reviews. The cashier made it so much easier for me to understand their customization options.

I do have concerns for their product in the grand scheme of things. Most of them aren’t anything unique for the price they’ll be asking for after the grand opening celebration ends. The matcha soy was nice but I can’t see myself spending $6.50 (excluding toppings too!) in the near future.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayson J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh5xePACHGFMrujGyu-HBmelU_P6fuccz4VSAVxS0935C9YQ3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Summary: Bad drinks, somewhat rude service. Cash or debit only.

Got a Mango Pomelo slush and a Black Milk tea from their $2 promo. Both drinks were quite bad. The mango pomelo tasted quite artificial and the milk tea was very watered down.

Person behind the counter didn’t really speak, almost seemed annoyed when I ordered.

Also it’s cash or debit only.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cynthia S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxcChp-HWyxv_b0AyWqKEdRXph6ely8kALSP_Ith1JqQIJkdHT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Tried them out because their drink promo was for $2 so why not. Took 45 mins from arrival to leaving the shop with our drinks. Didn't love that they only took cash or debit but didn't post this at the front entrance. I think some people didn't have either and were disappointed especially after waiting in line so long. Tried the pineapple green tea since I loved it from yifang but it was watered down and the pineapples just felt like an afterthought. Also tried the soy milk black tea latte which tasted like sweetened soy milk with hardly any tea flavour. Then also had the qing green milk tea which was the best of the 3 drinks and had some light tea flavor. Came back another day since there was no line and got the orange guava tea which had so much pulp on the bottom with no guava flavor and the passionfruit pineapple Qing tea was another disappointment because it tasted like soap. Overall thought they might compare to Yifang since they took overall the locations but left feeling underwhelmed and glad the drinks only cost $2","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Issac Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcVslMwi1e1UG1USk6PM2y6pYYExgY5BmB2E-l2WRUCcIuGAu8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had to wait 30 minutes for drink to be ready and bad service.

Drinks were not good would not see myself going back for regular price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwF3_x_3BjmvhEDf8RIh5RN5ucKUM1djOAYanL&fid=0x0:0xf5c59beaa839488f"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Alison Zeng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_R5mgQUQr7N4AJn5Fvjvjbr5f43a3BdSqUZxNOsCpD1__-MPv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Reviews are right. Terrible service, not worth the grand opening deal of $2. Drinks are overly sweet and does not taste good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yuen Tso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGxQe3CGkaLkRsj4mn2zb12RFye96G7s1qoZk2obkll8HdPJM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got the mango pomelo it tasted fine
It only took long because it’s $2 promo
For people complaining about cash or debit when it was yifang they also only accept cash or debit","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJP9wXExL74x0BRqN-l1GGEl6FQjFjM1M9Zu373aAFLWTGTyg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Did not know it was cash or debit only until I was next in line to order after waiting 30 minutes.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Have done takeout a few times at this location and decided to dine in with my daughter our most recent time. The staff are friendly here and when I asked about what pies to avoid with my nut allergy, they were very thorough with their ingredients check.

We ended up ordering two slices of pie. Taste wise, both were great.

Value- I’d say questionable for the dine-in. Mainly because I paid for two full slices of pie and literally got 1.5. My daughter’s pie was completely missing the top portion and as all pie lovers know…the crumble at the top is key.

Might consider takeout again if I’m buying an entire pie as I’d know I’m getting the whole thing. Prob won’t do the by-the-slice dine-in again after this experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJgqt73MPniYPtK5AM154ItF7CZLO6QLNKwonz&fid=0x0:0x610ec75f4210180e"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"YVR Duke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbrjJ5U6gKw7Gn1zE_GlxhUndims9WHlh7sVaHLXVrjOFlYd_B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rare to see good coffee shop and bakery in nearby neighborhood.  Enjoyed the coffee this morning when i was waiting for my dental appointment.

Great atmosphere and friendly staff.  Huge shop but limited seating though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsg7XygzoH6fj_JM34O5TmpNckMi_8BS6nz_G1&fid=0x0:0x610ec75f4210180e"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Unfortunately my first visit to this location was disappointing.  It was a friday morning and found it pretty dead in store.  Chose 2 savory crostadas for take out.  Was shocked to see what state the items were in when I arrived home.  See pics.  As far as we can see this location is subpar in quality control compared to the Port Moody location.  Will not return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFxpEFdVcOCaP8NdCIz3Rb01dJiAAl3eeVVnk2&fid=0x0:0x610ec75f4210180e"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My sour cream coffee cake was great. My husband got a slice of pie but didn’t love it. Nice iced tea and oat milk latte","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCQ1Cw38NmdWLQK4J4SRzLU5BhnHfW7f35mfmU&fid=0x0:0x610ec75f4210180e"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"TJ Harmony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpo3SDHChk5juhkHGFNwkt6PotJMtbI0WdBI4KSOGhEA0NJrJb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hit the reviews looking for  "The best bakery in Burnaby" and saw Gabi & Jules come up on the list.

I was going to a little tea party and wanted to bring something to impress

Having been previously disappointed in 2 other local bakeries, I was hopeful for a better experience.

Let me tell you, Gabi & Jules is OUTSTANDING.

I found free parking out front along Hastings. There is parking along the streets as well.

The outside if the bakery is lovely. Seating and flowers make it feel inviting.  I love the pink and white.

As soon as I entered,  there was this charming vibe. I felt happy just stepping in. It smelled delicious.  I think it was the coffee cakes baking in back.

The displays of treats and granola and pies and mugs and the list goes on. There is great attention to detail in every area of the bakery.

It is spacious and feels real good in there.

Everything was so clean & tidy.

The staff was so friendly and helpful.  I was greeted with a simple hello as soon as I walked in. It was nice to be acknowledged and left to explore.

Everything looked inviting.  I decided to sample 2 savory items & 2 sweet.

The Sourdough Coffee Cake ☆☆☆☆☆
Ham & Brie Croissant ☆☆☆☆☆
A savory Spinach & Artichoke Crostata ☆☆☆☆☆
A sweet Walnut & Peach Crostata ☆☆☆☆☆

They were all so delicious.  Flavourful. Esthetically beautiful.  Felt like quality ingredients and care in the making.

The prices are reasonable as you are getting a quality product.  Corners are not being cut here.

I shared my treats between 4 of us and everyone agreed these were amazing.

I crossed a bridge to check out this place, and I will certainly return.  This is my new favorite bakery.

Next time I'm going for the pie.

Check them out. You will love it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2BdHrbD4gfev3RLBVueBu353Co3qnANiAE3Mx&fid=0x0:0x610ec75f4210180e"],"When":"2023-7-30"},{"Name":"Savannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn2CD0vRivO2-5giVteHZMjb-4fmhyLsD9FrkqVRezsAZo_yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a well decorated bakery!

The inside of the bakery is pink and floral. They have lots of options in term of a variety of baked goods. So there is something for everyone.

The strawberry rhubarb pie is to die for. The pies are pricey, but totally wroth it. They are packed with flavour and filling!

Check out this bakery next time you’re in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMd6_he5Jp4IXcm2hCVD5JSOxG4Zyr0qgk5ttk&fid=0x0:0x610ec75f4210180e"],"When":"2023-8-28"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is very cozy. The coffee and treats a delicious. Few GF options, would be better if they put the GF on a separate block so it is not touching the gluten products. The server was very friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrWa_BvgESDU3Maw-U_j0j1_22CbLohiZhOhjR&fid=0x0:0x610ec75f4210180e"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN7-hmnk4hdZ9IiOLZ6noQnN2VCVuQ0Hw2DKdgZDrjK5zFidfj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New bakery and cafe in the area. They are known for their handcrafted individual sized pies and they got full sized pies as well. Full service cafe with espresso machine, washrooms, tables, and outdoor patio seating with umbrellas. This is not a study/work spot as it’s loud and busy.

The savoury and sweet pies are great (even better when toasted) and the service is good. The individual pies ($7 each) are definitely shareable between two people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUtr6FdgaI3uZllFRRoN8ekyeY6ucaKk45BVlN&fid=0x0:0x610ec75f4210180e"],"When":"2022-6-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not sure if I didn’t get the right drink but I got the Osmanthus Oolong Tea with oat milk and 30% sweet. It didn’t really taste like much, couldn’t taste the osmanthus at all. I’m willing to give this place another shot next time though, the flavours are quite unique and suit my palette lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo1TpNQ-VEXin_95LMc8si-Rxo_FnjDSz8Ro4O&fid=0x0:0xc309be8df355a2cf"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The pearls here are quite unique and the drinks are quite good. Definitely has a Richmond bubble tea vibe. The tea is infused espresso style and they have some fancy looking drinks.

No places to sit inside and some dusty patio furniture on the patio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvbLGrEk1kBoW3dwPl60REikHgC-oInK7edauB&fid=0x0:0xc309be8df355a2cf"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Up4Social","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrYFBSgHXJdgCCOKsiROQm8Dm6iUJVK6VE6bZ2rWmcr7i2t7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice night out to enjoy a bbt at Chicha. Lots of flavours and combinations available.

Great location. Inside decoration is a bit too cold and not as welcoming as other places.

Street paid parking available","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeWaDX3CeahTLgUYE8sePtjmCOdqacCJc5uvXQ&fid=0x0:0xc309be8df355a2cf"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Scott Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHpW7vGME__Zs4wKjXR04Upnw88bkVVyz-H2288JsHocq9vI3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a very small shop with heavy focus on the quality of the tea. The servers were great and the overall atmosphere was good, but the cafe was a bit too cramped so there were no places to really sit and chat.

While I enjoyed the bubble tea, I haven't noticed too much of a difference between this place and other places.

I may not have the best pallet but if you really like high quality tea, you might get more out of it than me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6EJC9Twaibs4iTwa7M54NYJOBrl9rnA-nzqb_&fid=0x0:0xc309be8df355a2cf"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Maureen Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJveuMK98eNTFiH47Fc3q63NS_Ymf2pm_8GByP3XP5IYJAxNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I used to enjoy the drinks here but didn't get a chance to visit as often as I would like based on their location. Came back today as I was in the neighbourhood and was disappointed. My taro queen cost nearly $10 with taxes included and the drink was disappointing. The taro balls were hard and not the enjoyable chewy texture I remembered. While their drink sizes have not changed (small compare to their competitors), it's hard to pay this price for the small amount you get and if quality is going down hill. I still give it a 3 stars based on my previous experiences as I did really enjoy their strong tea flavours and high quality toppings. Hopefully this is just an off visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnE5aPmZIGruv0f-oJTK87ktdWIF3rUiwYIi7E&fid=0x0:0xc309be8df355a2cf"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Alice R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnNxgS9DX-y3gmgAxmhqj178o3S78D2kd6IJ7JcGENqcpufQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A generic oolong milk tea. It was not bad but I expected more from them as they have a famous brand name. The tea taste was not strong and I wish it was stronger. I've tried other chichasanchen shops that had better drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtWv6vVU198Ngg_eB1BrXkBObAERWR2N3NsaGv&fid=0x0:0xc309be8df355a2cf"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"char br","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAnL_8sV_ABc-sKziKe87xo6wE8QlOpKZixFo9Vdc23ouoQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"best bubble tea in greater vancouver. pearls are cooked to perfection, tastes exactly the same as the taiwan shops and hongkong shops. everything is not too sweet and very high quality. they brew the tea immediately and use fresh milk. the shop is very pretty and aesthetic. the only cons are that it’s inconvenient if you are driving and it’s pretty pricy for the portion. been there many times and it tastes the same everytime.

recommendations:
- honey osmanthus oolong tea (light sugar) + pearls
- bubble milk tea (light / no sugar)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaUeZvaX5VK2U0hy_1Le6fBy188xHaEYJmad2b&fid=0x0:0xc309be8df355a2cf"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"If you want your regular run-of-the-milk bubble tea from a large corporate chain, this one isn’t it. I normally drink the pearl milk tea from big chains and although this place had the same thing, the taste was totally different. I believe only one size is available and drinks are around $6-$7 each. They have a fancy machine making the drinks and the drinks come out beautifully. However, I didn’t like the flavour of the tea as it tasted a bit grassy. Pearls were nicely done; however, it was at extra cost. No seating inside, but there is a deck with outside seating. It was wayyy too hot on a sunny day though. Beautiful interior and nice presentation, but the tea wasn’t for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM905uzxVXgtp2BMDnpn6TqgV46p7vTP39J3ey7&fid=0x0:0xc309be8df355a2cf"],"When":"2023-10-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Albert Teng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-nTWIs_AvduA4K0dYLiWKazmh1Q7KIidiI00NDZrUefslOS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I passed by this place the other day and wanted to try it out.   Came here today with a friend to try it and was not disappointed!  The portions are large and delicious.  I got a Chaska platter and my friend got the waffles set.  Also the Masala Chai was really good!  The owner is very friendly and hospitable and it looks like everyone in the family was helping out today.  I love these types of businesses!  Thanks again and will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUYhuOCcrGwLcedTPRGpHOIQbaJxEgyC6-vQmN&fid=0x0:0x3b4243b8ea9e86b7"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Tifa Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUY0a4aza7yCzK5UKhYbMTpb1757qfJGKRWOVn3HwWNXhFB3lbe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great local restaurant with an amazing menu! Highly recommend if you’re looking for a quick breakfast wrap or even a full meal 😊 Good mix of Indian and Canadian food so there’s something for everyone - even vegetarians! Owner is so nice and welcoming. 🎉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwwtAZdQDbVYc6_4HtI8FZfTWSorvh09L345m4&fid=0x0:0x3b4243b8ea9e86b7"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Zain Sattar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFfrSoEFfdUlTAEpaJufTkEEj1Hvgw0Vj7UCpPTI9WC2NtfqXt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing chai and the sausage muffin and sausage bagel were excellent. A completely halal menu is also welcomed!

Update: came back a week later and order the same items. Quality remained high and consistent. Excellent chai!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMekT33dnx-zQysJAAaIZ93p2Z3vyDqchSZKF34&fid=0x0:0x3b4243b8ea9e86b7"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Hassan Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUQjGAmJ4PVWk5E9bHJPOxbmU5vqAkoCRdK6Qav07M1xFn-G-Bsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely hospitable service and the food was simply amazing. We ordered the Chaska platter and chicken pesto panini. They were both amazing. Seating is kind of tight but we went early morning to skip some of the rush. Will definitely be returning again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzTbN1qIguQIVWjqM7lNnMhqGS68xxFdECJRy2&fid=0x0:0x3b4243b8ea9e86b7"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Hina Butt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqqzrEx8HAHzJ9we4YEcA9SwAHWacTYolqXcl0f21tT7u4E_WA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the pleasure of checking this spot out today and it was such a great experience. The food was even better than we thought it would be. We got to try the sausage croissant, avocado BLT, pepperoni pizza pocket, refresher, and matcha frappe and all were delicious - especially the avocado BLT.

We really appreciated the kind service and warm environment - my toddler really enjoyed dining in and getting spoiled with a free cookie. Will definitely be coming back whenever we’re in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYuM2-umzikmPeU5iHIHvVwYWSxnFRODdk-RE&fid=0x0:0x3b4243b8ea9e86b7"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Charlie Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxfQIYfMiKUcM7bkE87BV9W2vRwnWStbft5J_s8_CBViiwklE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Second time coming back in 3 days. We ordered a Coconut Latte, an Americano, a Shami Kebab Panini, a side of fries and a Sausage Bagel. Total was around $38 which is very reasonable for me.

They're all delicious, I really like the bagel here. The chicken sausage tastes good and the panini size/portion is great. The Coconut Latte is a bit sweet for my taste so I'll make sure to adjust it next time.

Would come back again as we love supporting local businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOsV9gSdkfclsxhwLWlGv6pLUoGi_eD5JAEdg&fid=0x0:0x3b4243b8ea9e86b7"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"sahar poloiyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqOweYEv7zIhUU1qcdca8uy8QwBgdPu7vCye5kmcCGwd-KJCCq0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time here, and I needed a customized breakfast in a hurry. The owner was incredibly friendly, asking for details to ensure I’d be happy with the meal. They prepared it quickly, and it tasted delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp6417UEXAg7CT7fhGCDNV8O1-dx49ZWPZDnSb&fid=0x0:0x3b4243b8ea9e86b7"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Shuja Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEBorCT1xB53Ohf-r3sasYNY3f1aLK2cvkUGn0blmUthajlwZj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This newly opened restaurant is a must try. I went for a breakfast on Sunday and wasn’t disappointed. Ordered an All American and chaska platter. All American had 2 eggs, 2 chicken sausages, 2 chicken strips, hash brown with choice of 2 roasts, French toasts or pan cakes, we chose French toast. Chaska had omelette, 2 shami kabab, paratha yogurt and achar, I ordered Karak chai too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ1VZWkG9iK78XUdNzOOPSsUjwU2feoCsQuq6T&fid=0x0:0x3b4243b8ea9e86b7"],"When":"2024-8-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Secret Garden Tea Company offers a delightful slice of tranquility with its charming English tea house vibes.

Celebrating its 29th year, this tea house is beautifully decorated with an array of teacups, creating a quaint and cozy atmosphere. It’s the perfect venue for special occasions like birthdays or bridal showers.

The selection of teas is extensive and impressive, ensuring there’s something for every palate. While the tomato soup was comforting, the scones stole the show despite not being the traditional British style—they were heart-shaped with a sprinkle of sugar on top, adding a whimsical Canadian twist. Absolutely a perfect spot for a relaxing afternoon filled with great conversation and even better tea.

Highly recommended for a girls’ day out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzhlOxcWIrVQ9IwYiUga9bS5zEOvj6MuyIsJC_&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Sherri Motohashi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvRir-qiHqz1peJ0G4WMMQ0hlpOVVItbdXigQEOIAYuIWjUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Charming decor, and i genuinely loved everything I ate! I just have a couple personal preferences that would make it even better for me...1) I found it a bit chilly inside 2) the scones sadly were too sweet and on top of that they were covered in a thick granulated sugar. Other than that, I fully recommend and will go again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjhzyJJgQvxp-6V88nI1fVrb_mZofj42Z_8AJJ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Lucy Animator","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY7brXamElnS01fAQfTXCPF3JSbsNMYZuWBhl1ILRqSsdPDqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoy trying new places for Afternoon tea, and even when Secret Garden didn’t make it to my top list, was a nice experience. It’s a little pricy and the food is just ok. The service, on the other had, is really good and the staff lovely. I like the decoration and how the teapots wear cute clothes.

Another highlight is the tea, we can order different kinds included within the price. I specially enjoyed the Peach one, and their signature blend.
The experience was good overall. 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO54v3jhurud8RXPj5LdhYNRnbl1v6I2eTGlQ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Clarissa Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVr7dmfW3DobMJyEWvg3_sJJkb8e9B-9LKRI5Rw6FsVvA9ks30j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The atmosphere is super cute, the decor and tea cups are exactly what I imagine what I think of high tea. The finger sandwiches were delicious but the desserts are very mid. Pretty expensive for the amount of food you get (over $100 for what’s in the photo) but I suppose if it’s for a special occasion it’s more justified. Would have rated higher if the service was better. The server looked like she didn’t want to be there- wasn’t rude but wasn’t friendly either.
Overall 3/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkeBNsDlVHIBDYrtzgaBpDWiN40UI66p1HQdiO&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Manda Chambers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFohUKYgZGmZEj6lUoEvwO4ebz26UsSIZe6Q3u3tamO6X6hfWxNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here and really enjoyed it with a friend. They provided unlimited tea and you can try other teas at no additional charge. The pastries were nice and fresh. My favorite were the scones. The ambiance was adorable with the Christmas theme.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1usVSSllWtNHnyB1EaM78U9oXuZRCyekVyBDu&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Clinton Large","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3XxS0rHb5EQDNpn1Bi69Rgdxqapx3WvYAx0MWmqfySqKLvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve only been here twice, but every time I’m blown away. Getting a scone and a tea is so amazing here. I love the vibe and Jessica our server was so fun and kind. I will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI0Cc5eje5N3uLKPsH9OVjVn9ne2USdGeYkJs-&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Lin Natalie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqJfDRGhG3ZPhfEnz7_KEBsD0OoRIt3yNrzph8bSHnSOFgZoPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s my first time to have this kind of afternoon tea with my bestie in Vancouver! We really love the vibe and food! The whole interior is so photogenic ~ the service worth a five star review! We really love the tea in the adorable tea pot!! That makes me really miss my grandma🥹","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLdt9B0WEmULx9ECHERkL7QqO_HnytD8whye0B&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Fei B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCSPR4b-Aju_3xzgvNmgK79_SKNPWkqhiQHmMJksqE4GdZMXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely high tea locations, great for special occasions. Definitely make a reservation before - there were a lotttttt of people waiting when I arrived for my 1.30pm reservation on a Sunday.
Great little sandwiches and pasties, and each person in your party gets to pick their own flavour of tea and gets their own individual pot.
Price reflects the experience, in my opinion. It is about $50-60/person but this is cheaper than other high teas in the area.
Will comment that parking is very limited, as it is paid street parking. Parking directly in front of the restaurant is much more expensive than parking around the corner. Not sure why.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmk1r9eqLubdKRbKz7xxBC_bs6-6i8CdRT3CJZ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"W K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdJNlOjH5pgzsg4cV-zOecElvBnwOkSbzkfDp8Px41pc2XTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Inside Burnaby heritage park. Completely renovated. I had ice coffee and mango berry cheesecake. Better than 5* hotel. Soft and light. So yummy !  I will try another one next time.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  No hesitation to come back again for summer ice coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkIvtcT7WeJxrAr-ZoarBv-8sb6L3JTyjP4hZ6\u0026fid=0x0:0x81aa147900723aa3"],"When":"2023-7-11"},{"Name":"Patrick Lloyd (CaptPatrick01)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2waEAIpqS-GjsbSz4kGESgUB98arEpJjERAiE4hRLjIe-CzE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Frankly a modern upscale chic café in a museum themed around the early 1900s is a crime against humanity. It doesn't match the rest of the aesthetic and thus takes you out of the experience completely.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKf1RSg3_-AU0iu6cewVgjwGYoJmZNxdRNJCv62pXrCH7QK-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is terrible. The new renovations removed all the charm, there's no warmth. It's over priced for frozen food, it used to allbe made from scratch. It no longer fits with the museum. It's not inviting visually or staff wise. This was a terrible decision to change it. Frankly the entire \"museum\" is going downhill. The immersion is basically all gone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute and beautiful atmosphere, delicious coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJUj6tMZ93KMzYRoJSGkJWACLzGDcjHWMbJnba\u0026fid=0x0:0x81aa147900723aa3"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Sandra Bao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCFDxhJJiWfK1A7jrtmOnJj84ihz5DRnzbJb1wpxZG21ZEY8Oo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had salmon burger, fries, hotdog and ice cream there. I have to say I like their salmon burger and fries! The ice cream is ok. I would recommend having lunch before going to the museum though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcjJHsJ45ATpEMUpVpw6OYmF3fQnntJWbY6Vgl\u0026fid=0x0:0x81aa147900723aa3"],"When":"2018-8-14"},{"Name":"jlpjon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5ecC4CtSTgybthgXx5WipKpRm_DTS-u_2uLS1r-1qaQuQxQcC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Visited this cafe twice. The first time I was really impressed by the chocolate cake and London Fog I ordered, hence the second visit.\n\nOn return, however, I was disappointed that the staff had closed the cafe approx 40 minutes before their stated closing time. Quite frustrating, as staff were still inside, Burnaby outdoor museum was super busy and I definitely wasn’t the only person waiting around hoping they’d open the doors and let us grab a quick coffee…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ladles ‘n’ Cuddles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3vM6Qw8lFxdJa970JrvVettIx7rWrD83FKELiFJ7dkXJZYxIm3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want to spend time with you family down the streets of 1920’s village just visit it . It’s so much fun today  Father’s Day there’s vintage cars event .we enjoyed a lot. Kids can also have carousel ride.parking lot also have disabled parking.There are so many things to see like royal bank,church,drinking fountain,burnaby post,home bakery etc.There was a restaurant with lots of outdoor seating too.They do have gift-shop,wheelchair accessible washrooms and tram station .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisa Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAdLh8lLh1dgknOZnv6UCzExh4MzbIzW4WArERp1Dpb8mBChzG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good selection of grab and go items and snacks. And of course, ice cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcZKPisPLqPShTmAFbXwjkIuDaH5uUGvtmJBdC\u0026fid=0x0:0x81aa147900723aa3"],"When":"2022-7-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"YVR Duke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbrjJ5U6gKw7Gn1zE_GlxhUndims9WHlh7sVaHLXVrjOFlYd_B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Typical food court’s Hong King style breakfast.  You can get beef rice noodle, Two-egg HAM (choice of luncheon meat, sausage or ham) and toast, and a cup of Hong Kong style milk tea or coffee.

Staff are friendly and very efficient when it is busy.  You can get your breakfast faster than when you are at McDonald’s.

Two-Eggs HAM and Toast

In food court, you cannot really choose how your eggs can be done.  Ham sausage and luncheon meat is not anything particularly high quality and the toast is typical Asian style white toast.

Satay Beef Rice Noodle

There is a expected taste on traditional Hong Kong style satay beef noodles, and it doesn’t really meet that standard.  There are two other healthier choices on menu.

Milk tea

The Hong King style milk tea served here is, i would say, quite average.  Not particularly good or bad.  it is authentic in a way, not the best type of authentic but average.

For under 10 dollars, here you can something somewhat fulfilling.  Somewhat comforting if you are from Hong Kong missing some home-style breakfast.

Nothing more you can ask for when tax is included and there is no tips expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuXjf1i_IA1cKnShEnuKm31NLDO1eg7oQo9xWv&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My go to in crystal for Asian and asianized western.

They have good food here, the ladies are friendly. Kind of.

I think they've been serving with the most consistent food quality and prices over the last decade.

I recommend their salted fish and chicken fried rice, a classic.

I'd likely come back again, because it make a great bite when you're finished buying groceries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrr6mVl0DSzU3S_cZMhazZK0zwtK9K8AzELJu-&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious Chinese food. $13 combo two choices plus rice and soup. Had spicy chicken and chives","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv_lMZo1cf9TIgHxJkByf0vPJ0ke_hbmMHY2Hd&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Daniel Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrVd67d7uU974eU_qTUE2z9HO_CgJZEmwGwQZmsR3nz_Sy-AdO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I considered my self a Cantonese cafe expert and always love trying curry brisket on rice everywhere, this is really disappointing…

The “real deal” has a good portion of brisket and potato, mix with fragrant flavourful curry

The photos you guys see, have significant imbalance of beef brisket! 5 pieces including tendon and a piece of fat, the rest are just chopped bell peppers and onions. Curry is nothing but a yellow sauce

Do not recommend this for $15🥶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXUONtxExyIZ22ZfbjdhkQkkm4e_dOwcyohIOY&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2023-3-3"},{"Name":"Phone suzanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIovxXGSBbpRujzl74kbCvFOzJp7e0ULCdZBLR9HoOP6p92ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible attitude from the older waitress. Had sweet sauce chicken noodles, got a small portion of meat with lots of noodles that tastes incredibly bland. It's obvious that they are trying to lower the cost. I would strongly recommend against eating here. NO THANK YOU!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cyrus Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdRQimrQeVWgdU6NaWMloGGT9KPecvYQutRiBNNLVEWoWjyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service was largely subpar, in the sense that they speak to you as though you owe them something. But what really concerned me was the food : the food was also rather disappointing. The curry chicken wasn't spicy and as someone who grew up with that dish in Hong Kong, I know for a fact that it wasn't suppose to taste like that. I really do hope this is just a separate instance, but the chicken I had that day was bland. The curry was the main source of flavor in the dish and unfortunately, the curry simply wasn't up to standard, whether in Vancouver or in Hong Kong.

As a redeeming quality, the portions were big for the price and you can split them into two meals, but I personally didn't do that cuz I think one meal like that was more than enough.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John lender","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkcpQ1MYMsPpPJ3JDffI_rwr5iRvTie5E35hqQo57LwH2qf8Dv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I usually love this place but getting more expensive for breakfast now day. I bought combo A & B total $24.00 include cold drink

But for lunch item still ok $15.75 come with cold drink","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI_D0SGN0sBsaQhJH3ppY1Tvd_n9oY7J9-sxcN&fid=0x0:0xd18f33afebe493d6"],"When":"2023-5-14"},{"Name":"Jade Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJWSVoZW1CCY-_xhdgdeWOnL28P_e39FAE_t38PKZ_hYo17g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered take out. Beef brisket with glass noodles. The noodles are transparent and thick (not like Korean japchae). It was alright. But the disappointment is only 4 pieces of beef and one of them is utter fat and inedible. Also ordered the soy sauce rice noodles with beef. The noodles was good. A bit salty. But beef was so tough and inedible and few pieces. Giving 2 stars for the cold drinks, added 75c each. Had the milk tea and "Ying Yong". The drinks are good.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"On a rainy day, I found myself seeking shelter at the Café at Mandeville, and what a delightful discovery it was! The café exudes a cozy vibe that made me feel right at home, especially with a fireplace near our table which added a touch of warmth to the dreary weather outside.

The food and drinks were a hit. I had the picnic, which was great, and an iced Americano that was certainly above average—robust and refreshing. The daily soup was another highlight for me; it was rich, comforting, and exactly what I needed on a chilly day.

The café also boasts a charming outdoor seating area that I took note of for future visits. It seems like the perfect spot to enjoy a coffee and meal outdoors, especially with kids. The ambiance of the café, combined with its tasty offerings, makes it a fantastic place to chill with friends or enjoy a family outing.

I’m already looking forward to my next visit to Café at Mandeville, to enjoy not just the ambiance and company but also to relish their food and drinks in the lovely outdoor setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCucD3E4Z1C6Q9i-NFQJr961PEfp_wyO9KrYiQ&fid=0x0:0xf13d8715535fd701"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Shirley Ann Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTufZ1O7YNqmevegFQNEbK68BixarB9ooeJyWD92O9OkSBiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been to Mandeville gardens multiple times but have never eaten at their cafe! Initially I found it pricey but today I decided I would go ahead and have something there. For the price you get a lot of food and it's very delicious! I had brie and turkey breast panini with a cranberry mayo. To my surprise it came with a lovely fresh salad and the most amazing dressing on the side. It was so much food. I had the rest for dinner. The atmosphere is quaint, the outdoor space was beautiful. The service was pleasant and quick. They have a selection of decadent treats, drinks, and a lunch and breakfast menu. I would highly recommend this little cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8hLB8EGZuAVnVfTiScV0BB4hnHs8E1_z5CdBq&fid=0x0:0xf13d8715535fd701"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A cozy cafe in GardenWorks. The food was not outstanding but the beautiful sunshine made everything look better. We had an enjoyable breakfast under the relaxing vibes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6yUUXV2zMEjiKMblzI8g-sfn4leqaKtBKeN3_&fid=0x0:0xf13d8715535fd701"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Agnes K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlACFBOxAwIK9p5cFkOHFik2vVrT3D26L4whxKFJwcdFUtLb7U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing eggs benedict, good coffee. Really enjoyed very calm and relaxed brunch in the patio. Good prices, plenty of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1eviwwFwk3SCneY7aiEOz-IGC0IuAQWIRUivx&fid=0x0:0xf13d8715535fd701"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Kayla Ok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2ZPW-HOTvhKWxZVs_tiGZng-PPQOf1u70Mg0ytQnqF8DWQ4ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I came here for lunch the other day with some friends. I ordered the chicken and waffles which my food came out very late and the waffles were undercooked… this cafe was nothing to write home about food wise but the atmosphere was nice as it is located in the Garden Works.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5e8-dJbs8CuzGyOQYQRzLmwbKu25jyE5RiJNM&fid=0x0:0xf13d8715535fd701"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Chelmeda Nidhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYwVJJmtKtLPsuxSuNB1Sn_QaYLUkUUW8uyt9KVhvgH2EQmwyO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loveeeee visiting here. Great great ambience, lots of flowers and plants in the dining area as well since it is combines with a nursery store. And lots of home decor, plants to buy. My favourite place in Burnaby neighbourhoods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuAHRzYXT952-5fMwID9TL_BGNjDdqrA0y53Jx&fid=0x0:0xf13d8715535fd701"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been to Gardenworks a couple times, but this time I finally had time to enjoy the cafe.
The lovely sunshine made everything look much more beautiful I must say. The spacious indoor area was lit up by the sun coming from the skylight. The terrace was radiating under the sun and  has such a relaxing vibes.  All customers were enjoying themselves in their own ways.
We ordered a BLT and turkey meat panini with coffee. I loved my BLT as I could taste the freshness of the veggies from their crunch. The bacon was crisp like chips. While munching his panini, my husband kept praising how much turkey meat it was in the panini. He complemented that he has never had such a "generous" panini before. Lol.
I think we will soon become regulars to this cafe. It's one of the best activities to us on a sunny day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfF9RlVOnzVofo3T-PvIuR9ZCHV2Mh3kXYXBXC&fid=0x0:0xf13d8715535fd701"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Hed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUcEJ_YnqWzTiAa8-5IAPYFK-uDFbxXkSKxsPhKg8FnmJCsH0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a fantastic experience!
The staffs, food, decoration, and the peace of the atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjdqTru3xpEK2VI9HSSLxvN_7571zEiuDxgS7L&fid=0x0:0xf13d8715535fd701"],"When":"2024-12-16"}]
