title: Lai Lai Tea Store (台灣茶）
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ilya Meerovich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMb0Yn-Fx1t0S2Qwa6f0VgKaIVigpWrYJVKpo4HmLJJcSjxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this shop to anyone looking to stock up on high quality teas. The owners are fantastic, extremely knowledgeable people and were very generous with their time and energy. They made tea for us, talked to us about the various origins they sourced from, made casual recommendations, and shared their tea journey with us. Although they specialize in high mountain tea from Taiwan, they carry a range of phenomenal teas of different processes and origins. You won't regret getting tea from Lai Lai!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEBFtu9RtLC_5Lp0UNkHEw6zxCwaNvnWzPqtgB6C34VTSCW71s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a tea fanatic, as much as I’d like to gatekeep this little gem, I truly feel they deserve the 5 stars!\n\nThe quality of the tea, and their passion for conducting tea ceremonies, I would absolutely come here for all my tea refills!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe0oP7QLQzSh_KmkEjx6VsFPTio0e4zhgLebiGuPPWQ3gzIo8Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best part of my experience at this shop is not the product my wife purchased (although the product quality is great!), but the educational course the shop owner gave to us about the Taiwanese green tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgRJ5uh1IYhxKQwcF_9ravpC0OGUhQROQD5vMfPTkVp7-uhLh3yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I bought green tea 🍵 from this place a week ago. Bought organic, and two other varieties of green tea. All of them are simply amazing. The quality is top class. The organic is the one with the strongest flavour. Highly recommended this tea store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kay Ton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv7RuNbq1M1zxBiXgtosaz92b_2WXJXwOUKiDtAhup_HQiIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"had some tea and it was really good, very friendly staff!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Franken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzBBKBGkBQYJkAu79TgkARo96QD5LYtuxdmOgCCRo8BkVa-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great people. Hooked me up with allot of tea equipment and explained how tea culture worked. Enjoyed the tea they served. Spent a hour just chatting with them. If your looking for tea or tea equipment. These are the people to talk to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barnabas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUt0GRkD9CoDte9z1WrkzQURWEFGJ15STKYpGSP2cS57wienvvHsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic organic green tea. Very high quality, fresh and aromatic. The owner is also very friendly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nic Jas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQZ0xtsSsKZFV6o1hXTh9kxjrdnTUPhJJ0rdpazECofITUZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High Quality teas and the owners are very kind and passionate.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Naked Goddess","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFZizsVTahqvdNu3tQCAd60XwPE-WBIE39PNRupGeP2BYS8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every single tea that I have tried in the collection is absolutely divine! The rose chamomile is lovely when you just want a delicate cup of tea, the green teas are flavourful without any hint of bitterness, the lavender lemongrass mint perks you up in the morning, and the yuzi pineapple black somehow blends a unique yet traditional profile into one delicious steaming mug. Don't forget the accessories - no tea lover's kitchen is complete without the perfect steeper and copper scoop!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katie Linley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_9cSeoOl-KqtCqDmjVo4eN_OIB0pwPasOgt_k4qJ-qDDK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Garden to Cup is an amazing company, we have been working with them for the past 5+ years and have always had great communication, service and organic tea! Would very much so recommend their services.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Antonio Velazquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBWrDqIBs0fWotA08In2iFhXEhaTYUDj0AYr8OgMWNZkkcCI9y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have some of the best tea in the world. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"damanpreet singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGPfy_mVg1Vr2ejgkkdAoGKdIS4zV6nFJVU7nUKxx4-uGHpklS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time at Coffee Loft and it was delightful.

Staff is very courteous and friendly and greet you with smiles.

I ordered the egg and cheese on English muffin without bacon and they made a delicious sandwich and made some excellent replacements.

The coffee is good as well and will try some other items next time I am in the neighborhood.

Much better experience than other chain coffee shop places which are in Metrotown.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1AKRYTelSRj2QJSiXTUayGcfhVly83jJlNyfv&fid=0x0:0xf85963ff3c587445"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"y sa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFngQqa2F90OIpbxkUL3vQVcASx5xoE2gyFjE4kMR1ydjk_2M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered a chestnut latte and a chocolate hazelnut croissant. The latte was great, but the croissant felt a bit too moist and heavy, possibly because of the oil. The atmosphere can vary depending on the time of day, but the vibe is calm (when it's not too busy).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa7EPoE-9raa8vm-YyzXTZs2hrRhE_yZa0ox64&fid=0x0:0xf85963ff3c587445"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Shaianne Casasis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVflTGm8iJItU5OIi2vvnAmt0aeNAsLE9-Rruq437_EqjqkFaHH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm enchanted by this place.

The atmosphere was incredibly cozy and inviting. The soft indie music playing in the background enhanced the ambiance, playing loud enough to be enjoyable yet quiet enough not to disturb my reading. This place offers various seating options including standard chairs and tables, high stools, and a comfortable sofa. I ordered an iced brown sugar latte, which had the perfect balance of ice to avoid dilution and was not overly sweet. Both the cashier and the barista were exceptionally pleasant and quickly prepared my order.

I would definitely recommend this spot to a friend looking for a great place to unwind!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abhay Verma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrV_6i4dbcDuraV7ft63f2m_fuGbXlt4ooiSAA_Az5gxTkAzw0Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried their Spanish latte on the way to metropolis mall and was very happy with the product. The coffee was perfect and what I expected in a Spanish latte, my only minor complaint was the coffee could be a little stronger (not sure if it was the beans or # of espresso shots in a 16oz coffee).

Was completely packed when we came here, it's a popular place for students to get a coffee or pastries and study. They have a lot of seating.

Recommended if you live nearby and like good coffee!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLzx64GRbgWYD_RhLumeDdVHabN3WnJ_SoN890&fid=0x0:0xf85963ff3c587445"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Matt K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbsZ43tiHJA5LPIasgCFxc-_Vmad6SXxBlx2Vc4G6V_jKEHJbR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe is amazing, the coffee is excellent and full of flavor. The pastries are always fresh and delicious. The staff are super friendly and make you feel welcome. The cozy atmosphere makes it the perfect spot for relaxing with your buddies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDM2Q_8a7oa_BcoC8rhH-pqCeeEqnZ8VEm9v47&fid=0x0:0xf85963ff3c587445"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Kelly L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLX9T8NjUEkpLRVZ79xh3zOY94cv5DeZoWU5Jr6AQRHOuuC0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their sandwiches are amazing ! Good portions, and it comes with chips, which i like 👍  but there are so many studying people (always) , it's hard to find a table to sit and enjoy coffee.
The staff, she's friendly, but the lady( i think the owner) is not, though ...
Overall, it's a cozy cafe in Metrotown !

They have a washroom and also some tables outside(2 tables).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcF-JeKp3K2bOy58bi4PMqi6fPwWVoeiOmBNLK&fid=0x0:0xf85963ff3c587445"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Leah Kloeble","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyDWKAUYa5KA0SGP07rwL6ye3Xptn57rUEru5oqAWQw274UalgiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really good dark chocolate peppermint mocha, London fog wasn't very milky (more like a tea with milk). Overall it's a good cafe. 3.5/5 stars Nice atmosphere with high ceiling and cute coffee shop vibes in an easily accessible area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vicky G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbWjpLgBln8DnFCHZy58YMKyUW1zX1_ln-Kz0kxGh5SneXRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They are great! But always busy, students just kind of sit and stay there forever. There should really be a table rule during busy times where people can only stay for 1 hour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkXn4db9CRQkSkGql2ZJDJhTLDbXJo04-hsns&fid=0x0:0xf85963ff3c587445"],"When":"2024-11-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ayon Rayhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk1t0mMEnXcBwA4oO2vbDly8NCDTs72Gk7ZzS-nvuFcnUdEkL8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is nice little cafe where the owner Mr. Yasser welcomes you with a warm smile. He solely does everything and from scratch. The menu is limited consisting of sandwich salads soup and drink. The service is homely so is the food. The best thing is it's very cheap and the quality is top notch. I tried the roast beef sandwich and the turkey sandwich and added soup in the side. The quantity along with the quality was really good. I really enjoyed it and would totally recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI4TEvgtDwZkGIH8x2Vh2AyOlviZxJ1cI_JBo&fid=0x0:0x4f540f85a76e3a80"],"When":"2023-9-26"},{"Name":"Samra Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIswPeFCVvLsO9ejGTyiRV0cerwlzJ6_2Wy1oMFekFq3_UE00M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem. Love uncle yaser and his smiling face and personality. His lentil and chicken noodle soups are the best. Tried His rice with salmon and that was top notch. Don't forget to try their corn beef and chicken sandwiches. Everything was just amazing. Did I mention it was reasonable too!! Highly recommended halal spot in town.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elan Hollander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnIlVLclphuHwqKMxUF9McwyEgadvGeftskP8rgiFSS8Jcxeaj_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My gf and I were looking for a soup and sandwich and chose Yassers Cafe because we saw the great google reviews and we were not disappointed! A cozy, cheap eats diner, Yasser was welcoming and friendly from the moment we walked in. The sandwiches were $6 and they were just what we were looking for. Yasser is a gracious and wonderful owner who gave us free chocolates and made us feel like a part of his community. Definitely recommend if you’re in the Burnaby area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNifgAZba-fZta0cfCreZ_VHtSdQXG4NuHR2ceJ&fid=0x0:0x4f540f85a76e3a80"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"starfinder1234","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuJA6PrxL3Yh7DTk7a8nlD0e2diwxYtLvXKrhUJ5UoxzS4Iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visit today. Hard working owner and so down to earth. Food is great and unbelievably cheap considering the high quality. I wish this type of business all the success in the world","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Avril Metcalfe-Roach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYGU1Ys5Qyc5eCX8FcN5yk2cuQlc_xMGZCyUKu8z6nL3BA4-Lo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, what an amazing gem! Very affordable, excellent atmosphere, and delicious food. I got a soup, sandwich, and latte for $9, and it's all homemade in the best way. I plan on coming here a lot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tristan Dellazizzo Toth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVZJymYfvZrIq0AjRoxrr2A4It6JQn8Vs4-DrN8tPvYDYOKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got a coffee and some lunch there.  Tasty home-cooked food and an excellent coffee.  Very friendly owner who takes pride in charging very affordable prices.  Tax included in all the postings too.  Definitely would recommend to anyone in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Noorain Fareed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4rcqgzd6GmpbSObgU-qk1NtARKFswmS5LUkqIRn2ehzmFgA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yasser’s Café is more than just a place to grab a bite—it's an experience crafted with heart and soul. This cozy little spot offers a level of warmth and personal attention that’s hard to find anywhere else.
Each dish is prepared fresh and with care, reflecting Yasser’s passion for good food.

With no other staff, Yasser handles everything himself, and yet, he never makes you feel like he’s too busy. He welcomes you as if you’re an old friend, taking time to chat, share a laugh, and make sure you’re enjoying your meal. It’s this personal touch that turns a simple visit into a memorable experience. You feel less like a customer and more like a guest in Yasser’s home.

If you’re in the area and looking for a spot that offers great taste with even better hospitality, Yasser’s Café is the place to go. It may be small and simple, but the warmth and care you’ll receive here are truly unmatched.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhGjy80CTfRvhVu68W48jKztX73xZkk29Zgnse6nPEawcoaawB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing dining experience and vibes. Service was excellent and the food was such good value. Make sure you get the soup + sandwich combo

Will be sure to come back again! Great neighborhood gem and so charming","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME8Vfr03eW4kjyoH7iFkfKSsfvVreHrrTFCiI&fid=0x0:0x4f540f85a76e3a80"],"When":"2022-2-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elena C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLWvhC8NfRU3QylQ94X3PurnSoIrF71X2xVPm04do91PU8-tlNHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This tea shop is a hidden gem with an amazing selection of high-quality teas from around the world. They have unique flavours that you can’t find anywhere else.  The staff is knowledgeable and friendly, always ready to recommend the perfect blend. The teas are fragrant, flavorful, and beautifully packaged—great for gifts! I’ve placed an order online and it was delivered quickly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yuki Tanaka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCsSmRqvagAmB0dhP2IDybl9Z0iQGjgqAxxlgkRikQLU1RqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I happened by this lovely tea shop when I was online looking for an item for my baby which the store also happened to be in here. I walked around and found this place and it is incredible.

The staff is so nice and so incredibly helpful

And I ended up buying lavender tea and oh my God it is beautiful. It’s to die for it’s by far the best lavender tea that I’ve ever had the flavour the aroma you don’t need to use a ton of it.

And I only got like the 5 to 8 cup bag which is like five dollars so it’s also affordable. I’m so excited for my next trip here so that I can buy a big bag and check out some of their other teas because the qualities is impeccable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanvi Kundliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRR8aAU5-568ZqJOBY17s06qXZGmoAto18xfZJfzNByP0_BoOY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is literally my favourite tea shop ever. Even though I live in Ontario, my tea has always been purchased from the Great Wall with dedication over the past few years. Great selection. Can’t go wrong with Cream Earl Grey. I look forward to my next visit to BC!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhN_MxPUndYCgR3nZh4qu1PY5rmkw8q1-pIcQV&fid=0x0:0x659adb71ce0bd34c"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Jellina Duncan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfNLtJohY1nkhVlerONygsaAvrLjuFw8dP4QVTg0_MfM7GZDSJwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I definitely recommend checking this placeout. The lovely and knowledgeable staff helped me pick out tea for a gift and it was all very well priced! I thoroughly enjoy heading out to New West to buy their tea and sample their seasonal blends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlZv7_BS76hKZVl0Wb4gyyjBqUyJq5wa407QgwWRTbVcuuHoaG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their tea wall originally caught my eye and I stopped to get a cup. It was probably some of the best I’ve ever had! The Vanilla Almond Rooibos is so delicious. Sweet, nutty and creamy. I got it with oat milk and I think she might’ve added vanilla sweetener, plus lots of  honey on my behalf 😅. She also
frothed the milk and now I can’t imagine a tea latte without doing so! I also got the seasonal flavour of Fall for Nuts (herbal) and Toast (green) and cannot wait to try them. Everything was so graciously gifted ☺️. I will definitely be back to support this business and hope to visit their Lougheed location as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNotAqgyMM3nvYCIm0hVufoUUB8RUeBE5mTnUpN&fid=0x0:0x659adb71ce0bd34c"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Jessa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMB53VMi0H2wSkRFrQo7KxfZPXUyJSrcxddMheGODzs2072A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just received my package from an order I placed online for Great Wall Tea, so many lovely personal touches! They had top notch customer service when I messed up a part of the order. Their blends seem very thoughtfully put together with high quality tea that have fun additions without any synthetic flavourings. My favourite loose leaf tea in the lower mainland by far, very excited I don't have to wait until going out to New West to get more!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQA0VSAQAHUE3XI9VLeu2jYSOKkWEaCdlCTshD&fid=0x0:0x659adb71ce0bd34c"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"Martha Villa Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV5GedHNPiOE2jyQTN8yIoUE_UzKI59nWHbri2cyVqBLNmS_HM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Teas are amazing. I offer them to people and my mom who lives in Europe loves them so I bring some yearly for her. The staff and the owner are very kind. I also love to support local businesses.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Narissara Su","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe70ZvjGEEixjtV-j44bvA16PHEjvK4E2nilwo3v1E9qBvv-l-2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stumbled into this tea shop when we first moved to new Westminster 3 years ago, we saw the tea options on the walls and decided to stop by and give it a try and my wife and have visited the tea shop almost every month ever since. All our experiences have been nothing but pleasant, recently decided to order the tea online and have recieved the tea package today, not only did they came nicely packaged, our tea packager (Sam) have left us a cute note along with 3 tea sample bag for us to try! Highly recommended, great service, great staff, great tea, and great price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXDzuVUGsdkeIkJyy3kepGEGpC5UH3TClCnbRH&fid=0x0:0x659adb71ce0bd34c"],"When":"2023-11-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited Single V Coffee and was a bit disappointed. To start off parking was so difficult to find. There is a huge pay parking lot but everything was so full, I drove around for 5 minutes trying to find a spot. While the atmosphere was nice, I found that their coffee options were quite basic, lacking variety. The food selection was also limited, with only four pastries and a croissant available. I was hoping for more “lunch” choices to enjoy with my coffee. Overall, it was an okay experience, but I wish there were more options to choose from.
Customer service was great and efficient","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Ym-wFZWLA_4qRH9L9bE_571XY84J6Iv7rv2f&fid=0x0:0xda7ea3a05cbeab79"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Rajwant Minhas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhLrVtRe3AjcYdFMzuxUzJYT9GZYipB1ZOxjqlnJU7Sq_TSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time at the cafe. Flat white was amazing - the taste was great as the coffee was not bitter at all. The service was good..loved their cute mugs..so glad they have that option for sustainability. I would encourage the business to have signs up for customers to encourage customers to bring their own coffee cups/mugs for take out coffee to promote sustainability especially if they offer discount for the same. Good ambience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtqZig9vbMqvI92yUbcta-P8NvakrlKRzI7XD-&fid=0x0:0xda7ea3a05cbeab79"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here on a Sunday afternoon, they were out of brew coffee so I got an Americano with Oat Milk (Americano $4.5 + $1 for Oat Milk).
I also tried the Chocolate Cream Cheese muffin ($5), it was pretty good but a tad dry. The outside is like a dry Japanese-style cheesecake, and the inside is a regular chocolate cake, but the combo together is quite interesting.
I'm not a coffee connoisseur, but I do enjoy coffee and need my daily dose, so I did find their coffee overall a bit acidic for my tastes. To each their own.

There's a small Specialty Menu on the side that I didn't realize until after I paid, I  would want to dry the Espresso Tonic or Orange Espresso. They also sell beans by the cashier. You pay at the cashier, and there's no screen to tip which I appreciate. I personally rather pay for a more expensive cup of coffee than tip, as I usually only sit for 15-30min, and take my own cup/plates away before leaving.

Small cafe, about 4 small seats and a few by the bar so it does fill up fast. There's a large parking lot for the plaza, but it's paid parking only. Prices are pretty standard for a small local coffee shop. Overall, I'd recommend this place in Burnaby, walkable for both Royal Oak or Metrotown Skytrain station. It's a cute place to check out if you're ever craving a non-chain coffee shop in Burnaby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbOuj3gbTcj9acCPqWdnx3kX2STza0i0QMdfPd&fid=0x0:0xda7ea3a05cbeab79"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Cindy Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkWnRcqRwVg_mpqM7f4VioaCJHawOmYOsqXy6htya5AhFjkbgY1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Hojicha tea latte has a very smooth taste and was served by Diana, who is so friendly to customers coming into this corner coffee shop. Their shop also has a good selection of coffee and pastries that could be worth checking out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqj5bQ4JRkc8ORZOhP6Q5OWH0VFpVMJBihjXMi&fid=0x0:0xda7ea3a05cbeab79"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Pour over and the Latte were superior! And the Strawberry cake was a good surprise. I decided to get their whole beans package home after that. It would be great if they had more brunch options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR7nhKEycTfno6YAhUigxdZPQkkZ8AANrQNhNL&fid=0x0:0xda7ea3a05cbeab79"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Nara Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhvqYviVmNRdUs4hBsTj9aEeMEUIUtVFXoe8f3rZFhfWT27yat=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A small cafe with around 16 seats. The matcha 🍵latte was very authentic and smooth. Would definitely come back to try other drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7PnyCEUHZr76xHLODN2s8VCbMPVuNw-n2Y9WU&fid=0x0:0xda7ea3a05cbeab79"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Anthony Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXljEKK4QPlqb0LvSutuMH9-Ibtf8vhPBv3YlPTlMYvh2tczTL3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean and pleasing aesthetic. We were lucky to see the croissants come out of the oven - very tasty! Espresso was slightly tart but with medium body. Overall enjoyed my experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxt2fR0lUS546Z60aThaYT2VA-0e-s2bwa-3Ve&fid=0x0:0xda7ea3a05cbeab79"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Both the drip coffee and the iced passion fruit coffee were absolutely fire. Single V is sophisticated without being stuck up, a beautiful gem with probably the cutest mugs I have ever seen (all made by a local artist, one of a kind). Very attentive service from the barista (arigato!), indeed a place to go back to. Quality coffee either character.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpZYcEQeCPeyskb43zn8Sb-Brm_ouVi80f3coq&fid=0x0:0xda7ea3a05cbeab79"],"When":"2024-8-6"}]

descriptions: Salon with a big tea list serving high tea, pastries, sandwiches & cocktails amid fanciful decor.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Scott West","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhGT1_orycVoF4jqLWxKP4q9TwkGenf-4wlet08fT68DEVaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went with my daughter today, and I must say, the experience was truly excellent! We just relaxed in a wonderful atmosphere for over 2 hours, enjoying an endless variety of teas, eating cute little sandwiches, and an assortment of very good desserts! We chatted and enjoyed the treats and had the most relaxing visit. Quality time with family.  It doesn't get better than this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI9qUmbrgwyIyzxIjTNSFjGRKyOEpZAz1F5Enn&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Chanin Kelly-Rae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8iCrhvs116_lhINjHe3jBHfTHbj4fFkluCaYLiPIPZkvP7ncY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an absolutely delightful experience at Neverland Tea Salon in Vancouver, BC!

The service was exceptional, catering to every need with a smile. I was particularly impressed by their diverse menu options, offering something for everyone – whether you're looking for dairy-free, vegan, or traditional delights, they've got you covered!

The tea room itself is beautifully decorated, creating a charming and relaxing atmosphere perfect for any occasion. The staff were wonderful, attentive, and made the experience truly special.

Highly recommend visiting Neverland Tea Salon for a unique and memorable tea time experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPd8-Xrmmn-ZcwcssXV9ufSqf2Gio65VH0Lb-C&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Sofia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3DifFwDMTB58GBwUcG7HSGccjUCVlplE2gzWFv3JhMyR4mjDT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"UPDATE:

Neverland's high tea experience was truly enchanting from start to finish.

I have to update my previous review with more photos and better comments.

The management, under the leadership of Roxanne, demonstrated exceptional attention to detail, ensuring that every guest felt welcomed and attended to with warmth and professionalism. The entire team also contributed to making the experience feel personalized with their tea recommendations. The waitresses may need to work on their soft skills but they were doing an amazing job in a busy time!

From delicate pastries to savory sandwiches, every bite demonstrated the chef's culinary expertise.

Moreover, the atmosphere transported guests to a world of elegance and charm, enhancing the overall experience.

In summary, Neverland's high tea experience is nothing short of magical.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXNN1QzGSp8rk60kc5lbQka4INzXYY8GNhKtkn&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I enjoyed high tea here a few years ago and was keen to come back with my partner. The interior is beautiful and I love the attention to detail. There is a wide selection of tea to choose from and I enjoyed the Mumbai chai. I was surprised to see our teapot arrived with no tea bag or tea leaves inside. I don't order tea often but when I do, the tea is left to brew which is great for those of us who enjoy a stronger cup of tea.

I ordered the vegetarian high tea and my partner had the standard. There was little difference between the two. His arrived with one chicken sandwich and my alternative was a tofu sandwich which unfortunately I didn't enjoy. The sweets were good but again, for the most part, my partner and I did not enjoy them. I appreciate that this is about individual taste rather than the actual quality of the sweets. It is not possible to order anything else from the menu on the weekend other than high tea.

The website lists a spring and a summer high tea amongst others. When our bill arrived, I was under the impression, given that we are still in spring, we would be charged for the spring high tea however this was not the case. When I asked, I was informed that the spring high tea menu ended on mother's day and that they are on the summer high tea menu. This surprised me as we are still very much in spring.

Over the years I've tried several different high tea options both here in Canada and overseas and unfortunately this high tea wasn't as enjoyable as I had hoped.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG-IuC0ze63cWkMnbZ8VLCG7_Jjxi5E8-xq15M&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Andrea Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpuVBU8Cr4kuXCWAkWLm8v5JbEFLyz07AUAoxz_KpO9adA0u7P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to the Wicked themed high tea and it was fantastic! Treats looked and tasted delicious. Well worth the money","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW-ATvIhqz3ZHDhfxn3nbZU3ajBS6rihgtIysw&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My first high tea in Vancouver. Very nice ambience and cute decor, way too noisy to chat with your friends though. Honestly food was so-so but they were pretty generous with the sizes (we had to pack some for leftovers).  Taste wise honestly they were pretty dry and felt like something you got from grocery store.

I’m also feeling torn about the tea. On one hand I’m happy they have so many varieties (not quite TWG level but more than 50 for sure), however upon talking to the team I realised the teas were pre-made and not brewed fresh for you. I understand it from business perspective in terms of being efficient, but it does reduce the authentic experience of the afternoon tea a bit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcayYaa6OB6odZFhiqU0Ecsl3yaKV_cIwmLFc&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Alexandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX11ANDfpnFU7GmCeaVtU5cBwuWRqquWAK3F9_AUyciKpah0H5L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are a handful of High Tea salons around town, and they all share the same exorbitant prices. Upwards of $60 for a three tiered delight of sweets and savouries, you are paying for the "experience".

This includes being surrounded by a medley of disparate but charming decor that somehow manages to look like it all belongs together, the use of fine china dishes, delicate teacups, and usually an actual bowl of sugar complete with a tiny metal spoon. A rounded pot filled with aromatic loose leaf tea rounds out this teaparty, a decidedly more adult affair than the one we used to have as kids using stuffies as guests.

High Tea is a luxury to be sure, not an everyday event. The Secret Garden was my go to, but I was persuaded to try Neverland. I wasn't expecting anything different in terms of the novelty, but I was pleasantly surprised at how much better the service and overall encounter was.

At Secret Garden, you choose one tea and are stuck with it for the duration of your stay. It is also up to you to steep it for however long you see fit. Neverland is unique in that you are encouraged to try different teas after each teapot is drained. I think that I sampled at least four. Not only that, but they actually brew and steep the tea for you so that the guesswork is taken out of the equation. A great marketing strategy on their part, as if you happen to fall in love with a particular tea, it is available for purchase.

Foodwise, the items at Secret Garden are laughably smaller than Neverland's. And the famed lemon tart and egg salad on a pink bun
that are constant fixtures on the Secret Garden High Tea menu have long since lost their appeal.

I am a carnivore at heart and usually give vegetarian items a hard pass, but I found myself tentatively nibbling on the vegan savouries and finding them to be surprisingly delicious. That alone has ingratiated Neverland to me, because trust me, I'm the first one to decline any vegetable that crosses my path.

Our server at Neverland was constantly checking up on us and ensuring that our table always had a steady stream of filled teapots for my party and I to mix and match. Once the server delivers your three tiered meal at Secret Garden they seem to disappear and only reappear to hand you the bill.

Suffice to say you never need to settle for a merely passable High Tea service again. Head over to Neverland for a few hours of enchantment, where everyone is indeed mad as their sign implies, but in the best way possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTxNHm8VjDgHJRg-xkfdnVcN0KjdEhoJI3GqBo&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVijg2B2FKhHEO0daffmmkqtpWCzt3aDQdnZOIHflF7afjJd1G7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"2023: Mad Hatter's high tea. Desserts whimsical. Scone and breads ultra fresh, still warm. Sandwiches creative. Love the inclusion of the coronation sandwich, though my fave was the apple cheddar croissant. Service super fast and friendly. Mad Hatter decor fun.

2024: Holiday high tea. Excellent mushroom mini quiche, turkey sandwich, fig brie croissant, cranberry chocolate tart, london fog chou, holiday scone with candied fruit, amuse bouche herbed butter on toasted bread thins. Meh: stuffing scone, beet marscapone sandwich, apple cake, chocolate cake.

Fun, festive, happy atmosphere with fabulous decor. Still $55 after one year. Thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCuBFDR7JLeZe3qNpSA9tsRdy2fehxLoaXiuXH&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2023-10-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This matcha shop is an absolute gem! If you’re a fan of matcha or hojicha, this place will blow your mind. I popped in when they were featuring a black sesame latte (yes, it was as dreamy as it sounds), and it quickly became my go-to drink—smooth, rich, and just the right balance of flavors.

Now, let’s talk about the hojicha mochi bubble waffle. OMG, it was perfection! The hojicha flavor was subtle yet distinct, and not too sweet, which I loved. It’s seriously one of the best bubble waffles I’ve ever had—crispy on the outside, chewy mochi on the inside, and full of flavor.

The shop itself? Adorable! It’s got that cute, cozy vibe that makes you want to stay forever. The minimalist interior is super welcoming—whether you’re chilling with friends, enjoying some “me time,” or bringing your laptop to get some work done, it’s the perfect spot. And can we talk about the customer service? They’re so patient and friendly, always ready to walk you through their menu and make sure you get exactly what you’re craving.

It’s become my must-visit whenever I’m in Vancouver, and trust me, you’ll want to keep coming back too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEHA6YJVhoceFj6end3lccfCIjcq2JsFKRrlrP&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Clare Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk8vaI8odicOm4apSk77_C5_lBI2gd1LxngMFranmQFokEsPvD-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The fall special hojicha with the black sesame/salt (?) rim was nice. I liked the hojicha itself though next time probably will forgo the salt rim as this was quite heavy. Will be back to try more of their drinks!

Also bought a bag their dark roast hojicha and the flavor profile definitely came through when i brewed jt at home. Strong and chocolatety on its own hence their recommendation to add milk.

Not much seating though inside","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPdzNU1O5C31s8OqpzflonWlwAs807-kgMBNDR&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"CHAN256 Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNqzBCXUvFYQA3YSmfJ_Vr7L6z3p03v_VYUa3Nh9nZ5zWGdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t find same quality tea latte elsewhere. The genmaicha tea latte + jasmine jelly was so good! Bubble waffles were super good too, even better than most I could find in Hong Kong. I tried chocolate chip & cheese mochi and they were gone within minutes. Hope we can try all other flavors next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzhYyGImC_w-Ch6lP8HDzZTR38n2e-POnmmFRr&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Eugene Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmM27LVAwUnjsRBLpVGHAAi1QmWt1PlTco9Nls_u7lduyoXIjq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic no frills matcha shop. I got both the matcha latte and mango hojicha and both were made to order with the utmost care. Drinking both you could tell the quality of the matcha power and hojicha are top notch. Both had oat milk as the default, tastes great! Some tea shops that have oat milk result in the oat overpowering the tea but this was definitely not the case here. Worth a visit if around the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqrRu0ATLHsKBGoM1QXHHPgcE7cGHk2MQhHP5x&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXclLzFOZebBq0D1P6DXbTNuAdCFzeYlMZFVvgi1A5VbWvym50Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"saw this beautiful store on tiktok a while ago and always wanted to check it out. I've never had hojicha oat tea before, so I didn't know what to expect but it was amazing! the flavor was perfect; not overly sweet, yet it had a very nice flavor. the pearls were also perfectly chewy!  we also got the matcha chocolate, and it was delicious.
another thing about this place that I love is how beautiful and aesthetic the interior is inside, and how nice the overall presentation of their food is!!
i love this place, it's definitely worth coming back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKykzQkyK1LglVH4_8XgmdKtOxFCbTYI24LaKn&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ting-Yu Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlodVKIQ8_dmfGPXSY9bPBrYe1KhcRgWKeM1WOBzrhDpGlDdnb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to tea place😍here’s my top 3
1. Thai Tea Oat (cold)
Best Thai milk tea I’ve had, usually it tastes more milky, but this one has strong tea flavor! I asked for 3 pumps of sugar only.
2. Hojicha Oat (hot)
Not many places in Canada has hojicha. You can find it here. Hot hojicha tastes stronger than cold one.
3. Matcha Oat (cold)
It tastes good but standard.

I personally don’t recommend to get pearls, they’re too soft. Also don’t get the croissants if you don’t like too sweet. Thought their bubble waffles with mochi are worth to get🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONGFVJntsSTaPXCr6yZM2SsxOzNe8-ofLO2zh8&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2023-7-6"},{"Name":"Chloe Chloe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIb0YSa6wZyDpN6F0vZFHOWjsTJMmhw-oInA8MulhfzrZVG9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this is my go to place whenever I have a crave for matcha latte. wish they had an option for dairy milk bc I'm not quite a fan of matcha with oat/soy milk. maybe they do, I was just lazy to ask🤷🏻‍♀️ I personally prefer their iced matcha than the hot one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwlQRsNe2kvoJW88K7ECTF5mi7LD_75VtqNxWh&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Dahlia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQgMiJgQQUWXUpX_vLBTDbbMkB1XyhSnpGj8rW2JxPqajVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the Thai oat milk tea with pearls and the black sesame mochi bubble waffle. Very yummy! I don't see many places that have Thai tea so as soon as I saw it I had to get it. The flavor was great and the pearls were good. I got less sweet and less ice which is nice to have adjustments. The waffle was crispy and then the chewy mochi. But not too crispy or chewy, a nice balance of both that was not overwhelming. The black sesame was also good.

Staff are super friendly and not long to wait at all. Atmosphere is cute, limited seating but cozy. I will come back here again to try their matcha!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq5fyMbAH7jv4KHKkTSPwO-UL-HekI-viQNK2e&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-7-19"}]

But not many pearls/bobas in it. And for me personally, I get bubble tea because of the pearls, and  unfortunately this did not fully satisfy my craving for,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKXyu5iquPj3dXWcTynnwbPxmgLjHTOqPgYxlU\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Cameron Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvS-f-O0MRuLC2BOzMXh4HEsp_g5tfJImUPaBHRf9jM766L6620A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They put 4 bubble teas in a small paper bag.\nWho thought that’d be fine? Use a mesh bag or multiple bags. I know this is partly because of that stupid law against plastic bags but seriously I can’t even reorder because they are closed now. The tea is legitimately good, but I cannot adequately express my frustration at watching $30 of bubble tea spilled on the floor because the packaging.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcRZ-9YIhMZJIkwSHb54mDHE_cNCxA6X8WJUqk\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Tn23","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsGxbchcoLrkxVTBgH4SJUR2sfT2zAPoH5rGfegdO_5zjnqEz-eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great service, friendly staff. Area is abit small however their drinks are super flavorful. Pearls are cooked to perfection. The price is pretty standard. Soft opening at the time I went but I would definitely go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNEab_wS2S475UyNp7Vy5c96D8hSTHAp2thtrj\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2020-2-23"},{"Name":"lisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJa8ZY-xKSm63Sb_s1rnSrdBl0C33DO2cuyR_KTiTzOdnpHtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a brown sugar Malik smoothie with pearl and grass jelly, the price in their system was different from the menu. Be aware of over charging !!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNosJ9KfZQRZB6j26cKQqYHNgMw7zpcrPa1QuGj\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really liked Thai milk tea slush with glass jelly I had. It had good tea flavour and good match with the jelly. Pineapple slush we also had was pretty good with lots of real fruits chunks, too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn-h4Q7scCv4wZnRXzJfOywyPnybbtmrBn5UA5\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2023-8-9"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A pretty small boba shop, with some pretty decorations. The pricing is average, and the parking is easy to come by. Their drinks are fantastic too, as their Thai tea latte is quite unique, a great twist on a classic Thai milk tea! I highly recommend it :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUCK2MAPR3uvhkPT78hu2pyx8nU6B_O4GGoLf5\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2023-5-28"},{"Name":"Dan Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_loHxFw9Mihbf9uqvgAbdxSKHHaZehD7KKAyYY-DNqnYXW4zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried this last night, nice little bubble tea shop. Was recommended by a friend and was not disappointed. They made my order very fast and price seems reasonable. I tried the Thai Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea and it was great. The pearls are better than most other places. I look forward to trying other drinks here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfjlneBHvz5d69Fgj0HT-cIHVclgAHoZYUOo62\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2021-1-15"},{"Name":"Vivian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5oIohR4fUBBrbBee_LLq3WUW8Q6ENGMJVFgSz8SVr8PH9Ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven't been able to visit their store physically, but using food delivery service I was able to finally try their drink. I ordered the Thai Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea and it was so bomb!!! The pearls tasted so delicious and chewy, I haven't have good quality of bbt for a while now. I picked 30% sugar level and it was absolutely perfect!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhzCJZ3i_MGhh1D37zsZ0ZNo3Pa5MQdtesXNJI\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2020-5-27"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Island Beach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEviG-KO8taWCmkxx1UKw0R0xXXQmKaXPn4g7lO7NLXpWs-UXa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You had me at Chocolate Croissant… What a wonderful spot!! Everything from coffee, breakfast and delicious pastries. The customer service is top notch and all the food/drinks are so yummy! You must stop here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNseGx7NiGG2lyI0FdJYEuYm8Mb2FcERP6euo04\u0026fid=0x0:0x798dbaeca30f0b9b"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"El B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1Jp_yyor94dWcxEABRdR-csu7LJ3E6mAmEDdXvZyVkvxhIa10=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee place. On of my favorite. The croissant was fresh and flaky. Service was great. People who work here were all in good mood and friendly. They all deserve a raise.☺️. Plenty of seating. The place was clean and not super busy in the morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTgcUmqAgNARa2ROk7uIm_BSYtt7Tsv01_v9Bh\u0026fid=0x0:0x798dbaeca30f0b9b"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Jorge Enrique Marciales Acosta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs9G5ZpQ_qTBOsbd8J0VpmKWERzXHqzAq0CocOXlhPv9vZOWo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee here is absolutely delicious! They could improve the quality of their pastries, but I keep coming back thanks to the amazing coffee and the friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhcUBboucO9qCdafpIwlE8o5l56MZafeAZLQsd\u0026fid=0x0:0x798dbaeca30f0b9b"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here at any JJ Bean! I usually go to Starbucks cause they have so many locations and it's more convenient.  So glad they offer Matcha Latte since I don't drink coffee! My latte and friends coffee came out within 2 min so quite efficient.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kalkidan Berhanu (Kali)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwG91QfSOTlmWxrAuB_p_OYFEJGLPgwgdqAlCklQT3xXMLtELr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute cafe by Metrotown! I love their Cajun chicken sandwich and London fog. Their bakery items are delicious also. Fair bit of space if you wanna do some work, but it gets quite busy and seats can be limited during peak hours as expected. Dining in gives you a discount also :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG9slvN5nJi18pYpn5aPVYZeuOO4UdWpIjO-mx\u0026fid=0x0:0x798dbaeca30f0b9b"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today, my friend invited me to meet at this branch of JJ Bean. This particular location is situated at the corner and has a wider space, with much more beautiful interior design compared to other branches. It is very modern, especially with those lovely hanging lights. Perhaps because it's already evening, the pastries didn't look very fresh. I ordered a cup of espresso, which was very aromatic and rich. My favorite thing about this company is that every branch provides oat milk or soy milk for you to add to your coffee at the counter. Overall, I highly recommend this place as it's a great space to meet and chat with good friends or enjoy some alone time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0tIDYk0hV1hC7ztFdEzGfyc1CobSVMyNQZiQT\u0026fid=0x0:0x798dbaeca30f0b9b"],"When":"2023-6-2"},{"Name":"Y S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTmtWUtCZcs7qDdNKdjVbtcx5f5BcDfDU3YRp4zcFsXHKu1_WS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location is convenient and busy. I came on a weekday morning and it’s already busy with people working or meeting. There’s a small lineup but the line moved quickly. Their coffee was better than Starbucks, not as watered down.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKDP_aT8aDudlfq4C6zUo4IsLQpL4n85RYTPKe\u0026fid=0x0:0x798dbaeca30f0b9b"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Larry YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuTv093wbMx-W_HREHfZgp4qwBRPVQElu44Abax3eT7gG680u3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Much much better now than when it first opened years ago .. staff are very friend and their systems are now in place … the single origin coffee they had (I am an Ethiopian coffee geek), Ethiopia ACACIA was very good and the peanut butter cookie :-) well done to the manager and staff .. give them a raise Mr. John Neate!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfPwMo8hAVbk_o2mtKBIGdYkMM-ZD5qWfNMl4S\u0026fid=0x0:0x798dbaeca30f0b9b"],"When":"2024-4-6"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Flora Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNs7etU0kW9GGBfwVoaBiTm6FX8c0FLo0Qg-rOeDW1bMeuJ0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ben Gong has a lot of unique flavours and their tea cube topping isn’t something I’ve seen anywhere else. I tried the passion fruit tea; it was not bad, but quite pricy as is most of the menu. Waited around 20 minutes for two drinks even though there was only one person in front of us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxm4D6gj9rKEKnxrDH0TRzNR-R2SIKXOe7LOjE\u0026fid=0x0:0xccdb27f8c01c2f46"],"When":"2022-2-21"},{"Name":"May H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkmbwTMj2rjBvdcAxUeGNl04-SkWREKHjV-Ua8W22gHFSvgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for the first time because a friend recommended the place to me. All the staff that I interacted with were really welcoming and helpful. I ordered a Mango and Coconut Pudding Milk Tea which tasted absolutely fantastic. It had a great fresh mango sweetness that mixed perfectly with a rich coconut milk flavour, and there were tons of pieces of freeze dried mango, coconut pudding, and mini tapioca pearls all throughout the drink, so they don't cheap out on their ingredient portions and you definitely get bang for your buck. My drink was ready really quickly too, it took less than 2 minutes for me to be in and out! I'll be ordering it again next time I come here. The price was a little high at almost $10 for the drink after taxes and tipping but I think it's worth it as an occasional treat. It was overall a great experience and drink!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRhMbP-U-8COzjxHf-2dKFKKgrmjf0WYy5QpKyMHBzYfaa5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It had been pretty annoying that they keep messing up the sugar level of my drinks.It happens to me more than 50% of the time and I feel like it’s completely unacceptable for a bubble place to repeat this mistake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkvVy46d5Yjjc9SIE3HucUi2aY-181sbTdV2tJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xccdb27f8c01c2f46"],"When":"2022-8-11"},{"Name":"john jiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIV-uf1sv2gLESAVXHcy5zyUXz6-qjdp0BxFK6_lG5Fno7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately, my recent visit to this bubble tea shop left me quite dissatisfied. Despite purchasing an expansive bubble tea on UberEats, the reality was far from expectations. The staff exhibited impatience and a bad temper, making the overall atmosphere unpleasant. To add to the disappointment, the bubble tea itself did not match the description provided on UberEats. Avoid if you can.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Felix Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWxNDDut6mhalKwU58YSTtvqDjyHtbqzHXAbb-YdyZMlVVTEWNdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered the Dahongpao tea yesterday with my gf but unfortunately the pearls were significantly undercooked as they were hard to chew.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJN0gcYMUmhYvdxv23U6ygy45XnPz8ncF8SFHH\u0026fid=0x0:0xccdb27f8c01c2f46"],"When":"2021-5-27"},{"Name":"W Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqK9MwJHN8M3Ktw6U_7FA-gldy2i2nhRT2sRl8XnPz2e9Jvs0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Shame on you. Bad service. High price but no flexibility. Default toppings are not indicated. It’s easy and cheap to change or refill if they do a wrong one but they just don’t want to. Don’t call yourselves a Chinese brand.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW61VLEof_7tdYdBPJGWcCbuBW1EBf1hehye9bn1kVuFcyTOdw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Brown sugar milk tea =no brown sugar at all and undercooked pearls. Overpriced for such low quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiVKYM7mQ9iWqk1fJaR602NxgBxxNHa_rykF0j\u0026fid=0x0:0xccdb27f8c01c2f46"],"When":"2021-9-28"},{"Name":"Roger James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJC8GvoXyFsxWGANYhPgXuSqO3ZzTz7k3blHP3wt7w1s2OMdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ridiculous pricing for sub-par drinks. Coco, ShareTea and even Chatime are within vicinity, better and cheaper. The decor and shop was nice, and I had heard good things about this bubble tea brand, but was ultimately disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Prado Cafe is a great spot with plenty of breakfast options to choose from. The iced Americano is strong and flavorful, not too light like in many other cafes, which I really appreciated. The best part is the spacious and comfortable seating area, with power sockets available at most seats—perfect for working or relaxing. It’s a great place to unwind and enjoy a relaxing morning with good coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5KBShskJE8amnw-zX4YOI8G8bl33PQJVaW3Yj&fid=0x0:0x2aeccdc42f75902"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Marvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOUB9fqPRyAnJAGsLqhyOV_Bp81x_bJC8wIyyATYNP2vGJzmc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really liked Prado, coffee was great, food was great albeit a little expensive. Atmosphere is amazing, my only gripe is the limited parking time, 15m is not the longest especially if you want to study. However, other then that I will be back definitely— if they could get longer parking it would be easily one of the best cafes to go to in Burnaby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaGew5ZIHmaGGxO7kCkwdD4KZfiP1c6EEm5WuY&fid=0x0:0x2aeccdc42f75902"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Mory M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPs8avgpY6Oe_Ytsg4rqTPRpKj-6YZ9I59NE5Wd6hmPPMEz98=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow!
I was blown away by the expansive space and professional ambiance at this coffee shop. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed by the sleek and modern decor. The spacious layout provides the perfect environment for both productivity and relaxation. The staff's professionalism and attention to detail truly elevate the experience. And let's not forget the coffee - it's exceptional! Whether you're looking for a quiet spot to work or a stylish setting to catch up with friends, this coffee shop exceeds expectations on every level.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5NttlC5uvOzFpPNO6uunO05lU75BHgNEewRI&fid=0x0:0x2aeccdc42f75902"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came to Prado with my husband based on the reviews on Google, despite its costly pay parking. Why? I'd like to experience the quietness and spaciousness praised by the reviewers.

Indeed, Prado is quiet and spacious to say the least. I can easily spend a whole afternoon or day here with a coffee and a book if I'm willing to pay the expensive parking fee, LoL. The coffee and sandwiches tasted good, and the sitting area is very comfortable with lounge chairs and work chairs. Electric sockets are also conveniently located everywhere for laptop users.

I would have given Prado a higher rating if it has free parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbhEgi31PmmWQ-7dU1BN1zjok4CC8BVn_xgNev&fid=0x0:0x2aeccdc42f75902"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Pearl Rose von Euw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBzQjzzGHsxkUQyewt440jrpJ1s9xIXESPk355K3n1sZzmjq2Suw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unexpected place to find a Prado but glad it's here! On the first floor of a large, new office building. We visited after an appointment at the hospital because I already know I love Prado's vegan baked goods! Had the apricot cookie and an oat milk cappuccino. The seating area is for the whole building, and is very spacious and comfortable, similar to a fancy hotel lobby. Big windows, outlets and lots of different kinds of seating. Would be the perfect place to study or work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa_uudXYbz0iwv1yCyW2bg3-wLAl_I0f6qnRct&fid=0x0:0x2aeccdc42f75902"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Kingramen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU35K9K-3WDR1LhMOarmobzfUiY3qJQT45Dn4vfHiWAkp32qFPGKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nicely tucked in the foyer of an office building, spacious and plenty of seats. Bake goods and coffee were reliable. Only 15mins free parking, wish the paid parking is cheaper so that I could enjoy my coffee longer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZynVEzg7nEgkSykIuphyE3PMc7gD2KVSUfOI-&fid=0x0:0x2aeccdc42f75902"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Varsha Nageshkar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh8UYpVWUHsqi7LMicpGtUyq9iH1BXWFJXG5AdxKyzvCufqscf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has to be my favourite Prado Cafe of all locations! That feeling of space, luxury, architecture and divine coffee when you enter and that first sip (there were also some firemen getting their to-go’s - so believe me when I say it was a complete experience - LOL 😉).
Expertly pulled coffee shots with it’s silky oat milk texture! Their ham and cheese croissant was a winner too - it had a very unique sauce inside that made it apart from the rest!
Would love to come here everyday 🤍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRftOd4d-tzH0CfTbFP1FBYZdTBrm8XwZH8vtb&fid=0x0:0x2aeccdc42f75902"],"When":"2023-4-7"},{"Name":"Abhay Verma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrV_6i4dbcDuraV7ft63f2m_fuGbXlt4ooiSAA_Az5gxTkAzw0Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Discovered this one almost by accident.

In a building with a bunch of offices, Prado cafe has a huge area for sitting, well spaced and colorful, creative spaces. They have a individual rooms for teams to sit and talk and work while getting coffee ☕, and it seems like a great atmosphere.

The cookie with no name seems to be made entirely of bran / coconut, which can be shocking if you're not prepared for it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhTPi-_uhDfYYcHNjNXOrczEpCKd1Nz0sA4uAf&fid=0x0:0x2aeccdc42f75902"],"When":"2023-3-9"}]
