user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danyel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUE5ZF8OphBDpmDCDFc5cI0TUnyedNGB1AE1LhAU_kO9h3rA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Expensive. Lovely to have a Chinese tea house amidst so many bubble tea and high tea shops. The atmosphere and music were very nice and the host was very sweet.

What to expect:
The tea menu offers tea by the pot, and yes, the less expensive teas are sold out. You can expect several steepings and a to-go tea if you like. The host also served some tasty Chinese crackers. Plan to sit in for an hour at a minimum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN32Z7iBfMoDnhsmc7QrZuPDk-tWZMO8Swa2DOd&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2024-12-27"},{"Name":"Sharzi BD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW288MzwFkWlfN4-hmCJwoI28tpVq0hWMFg6JZzbb5p0qpMwt_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the coziest spot in downtown vancouver to have a tea and get be relaxing with the atmosphere and the music 🧘🏻‍♀️😍
I met Chuyi there ! She was so nice and friendly. I will definitely go here again 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsGCQPjsxWYJuzJ2LjetEO85OVV2nZytQnuLes&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Rebekkah Niles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_FS2XEzJu4lb584_OFzkrv2x8Yu3ieHmbHJLdfxhsy-snNvXt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Vancouver must-do if you're a lover of Chinese teas. Try to a pot of premium tea from 1000-year-old trees to savor the complex, woody notes of Old Growth Imperial, or sip the smooth beauty of a raw aged pu-erh. Some of the best tea I've ever had! It's a tea bar, so you can order it by the pot, and re-steep for as long as you like. You can also buy a brick to take home with you, or a part of brick if you can't afford a whole one. We met two of the owners, and they were both friendly and passionate about tea, and about making premium tea accessible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCNVUcWpWUAgkWL947MhqKdh2iIbyIkrOmoYen&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2017-7-12"},{"Name":"Rose Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh18Pw8wJ2KXFkFYsNvV4pzNF85xbDxwmLxO1DyxHOePQuNMZV6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As a tea lover I’ve always enjoyed discovering places that respects the culture and knowledge of tea. After my experience at Van Cha I can tell you that this place does neither.

First of all the tea is very overpriced you can only order by pot ( but the volume is more of a cup)  and the most affordable are ~ $20+ and those are marked as sold out to up sell you. They set the minimum spending and will try to push you to get food. The dessert cookies are tiny and tastes stale. There was minimal explanation for the tea or attempt at showing you the brewing or sharing knowledge about the tea other than saying “this is good tea, it’s expensive”.

Then the argument is that you are here for the ambience , well not so much. When I was there I overheard the tea brewer talking loudly about indigestion, bowel movements and Chinese politics with a friend. Thinking that I didn’t understand Chinese they then started to complaint that another customer who had just been in had only purchased a small bag of tea.

I’m sorry if this is peoples introduction to tea culture and should not be representative of the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFnocE0rsfb6qKnAF1O0T6ne9sCtFOjT9FXGui&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2022-10-27"},{"Name":"Melanie Brideau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9hjJgXbahlVsP8ZY7GFes8UBJd9LfBUNeeSVDO-BiFKAd2yYTLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very much enjoyed my authentic Chinese Tea Ceremony! Had a lovely time chatting with lovely Doris who shared her tea expertise with me.
I definitely recommend you try it! Cheers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3eWSUCPzUuEs7d3kNjA923DeV02y7KbsEw0v9&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2021-10-31"},{"Name":"James Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRasAxQzLh23oYUjtUmT5l_rd2dW_rjeg4kQBz1_n6lstQJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Vancha Downtown Shop and was thoroughly impressed by the experience. From the moment I walked in, the aromatic scent of freshly brewed tea enveloped me, instantly transporting me to a serene oasis. The staff were incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to explain the nuances of each tea variety, ensuring I made the perfect selection. I settled on a cup of their signature black tea “Fei Zi Xiao”, and it was nothing short of exquisite. The ambiance of the shop, with its traditional decor and soft background music, made for a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of the city. I highly recommend Vancha tea house to anyone looking for a genuine tea experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBlsfskTNjBh0le475sxvd83jrGkzeoYM71Z1t&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Sheen Betty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzRO-WAm7OV-yGGTTTJ_K3T3KNUDXe-YgHbtHDsPhgi4N_oGcMUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was really an excellent experience for tasting traditional Chinese tea in here. Just a few minutes walk for the Canada conference center! The clerk in here was really nice, they explained so detail about the difference between each teas category! Recommend to everyone visit here experience the wonderful tea in China!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0OAaKGZVq7YOWQ1udNIJEYZBbCOUiwGO2-NmF&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2018-8-23"},{"Name":"Emilie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjZdu1A0N35H5fUqnmDCaNzhdw_Q5xQR_-D4kYpezyNJMOvV05Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely tea shop with a great variety of unique teas. We went with a pu'er and pineapple desserts, everything was great. Very attentive service. I would absolutely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrNYdUEEUG3m6Pv9VD5j0Ek_VZXNk1QF4YrNed&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2023-12-16"}]

title: Paragon Tea Room
address: 4328 Number 3 Rd Unit 140, Richmond, BC V6X 2C2
open_hours: {"Friday":["10 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Monday":["10 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Saturday":["10 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Sunday":["10 a.m.–6 p.m."],"Thursday":["10 a.m.–7 p.m."],"Tuesday":["10 a.m.–4 p.m."],"Wednesday":["10 a.m.–5 p.m."]}
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenny Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyruovd3E8Tx5MBsyO8-Dd-DpYOIPX1sg-Vx1hyvwyVYuQTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy that Paragon opened another location 😊. I love their hot genmaicha oat. The matcha coconut refresher is great if you want something light especially after working out. Their tea infused baked goods are so yummy. They are collaboration with other local small businesses. The space is super cute and cozy. It can get pretty busy on the weekends but the line moves quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNfrVeRYvhR4gzIuWdocYRnXtwu_Q9Oc1RFR7v&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paragon Tea Room has opened a shop in Richmond!

This new shop shares the same welcoming and warm atmosphere as the Vancouver W. shop. It also offers dine in and take out, although seats are limited inhouse. We came in a Monday late afternoon and managed to grab the two final seats.

It was absolutely pleasing to watch the lady gracefully hand-whisked the green tea to make my Matcha Black Sesame Oat. The matcha and the black sesame complemented each other so well with a good balance between each flavor and yet without losing their uniqueness. The seasalt chocolate cookie further  enhanced the taste of my drink by adding a little bit of saltiness.

I was very tempted to try their mochi muffins and bubble waffle, both of which were highly rated on Google, but I had to leave them for next time.

We will be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmd61c1vTAYdTnMiHerNThP0V_pRGeaaYsX6yn&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Nikka Adrias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGi6Gz_tMMFxsiHqVtyo9UQujDLj1XNHKkomkhpjbqVuxkYAZ79Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My visit to the Paragon Tea Room Richmond location was perfect! I highly recommend their Classic Matcha Oat. It's the perfect amount of earthiness and it's not too sweet. You can definitely tell it's high quality matcha. The exclusive mochi muffins at this location are a great lil' sweet treat when you're on the go.

If you're lucky enough to come across them, maybe you'll have Jasmin or Tiffany as your baristas – they were so warm and welcoming and their service was very smooth.

Will definitely be coming back for more soon!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEbCQsvLOXYcOoDoC45FW05VPUVBgB9WAS_2_w&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Aaron Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxKZ7-UTFQni0mrdKYzhez4Ll3vvr5m_nxy9gIdPj06QAW9g8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Paragon Tea Room in Richmond, and it was a wonderful experience!

The comfortable environment and convenient location makes it perfect for a quick refreshment.

The drink selection is fantastic—my favorite is the Obsidian Hojicha, rich and flavorful. They serve a variety of teas, plant-based bubble teas, and delicious bubble waffles. The staff were friendly and efficient, especially with managing the line ups, and ensuring orders came out in a timely manner.

Whether you're looking to hang out with friends or just enjoy a tasty treat, Paragon Tea Room is a must-visit while in the neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH8RnzTWaAxIUPLiThqUlHZCGN9rkNFBImPPwG&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excited to see they have opened up their Richmond location. Their green tea beverages and tea powders set the bar high for its competitors in the GVA.

If you have never tried, it’s worth trying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4J9iBTQenxjICBDqxeI3RdKXv-8kh-YfOoyAK&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As good as the Vancouver store. Interior is clean and modern. Barista is a bit slow making everything. Bubble waffle and tea drinks are good. Lots of space for parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3RjHWGMP8v2hH9Vxk7OIAgFvA-MrKVfQiadED&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a cold morning, my wife and I needed hot beverage to warm us up. We came to this tea room as we visited their main shop in Cambie Street before.

This tea room has a similar theme of interior and there are several tables and single person seats opposite to the cashier.

We ordered matcha latte and tea misto. They both had a bold taste of tea and silky milk foam on top. The taste was satisfactorily rich.

This is one of the best tea rooms to go in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXODY0Mjx2P3GkHfxbOSjMgCWlzpTn4I6nmO8&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Belva See","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKA0yW8ovdsF8RER5QKnV7faGXhFRY_rCpDJLu01gM6B7onuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I like their drinks and have been a long time customer for both locations but I just want to share an experience about making sure to pay attention to their holiday hours.
I ordered their Santa shortbread collection on Dec 23 for pick up the next day on Dec 24. I remembered clearly at the time of ordering to check for their closing hours to be sure that I can pick it up on time and that they weren't closing early for X'mas (both the Google hours and their main website said at the time of ordering that their store closes at 7 pm/ regular hours so I proceeded with ordering).
When I got to the Richmond store on Dec 24th at 4:15 pm, I then realized from the sign posted outside their door that they actually closed at 4 pm. I want to thank the staff that they still opened the doors after hours when I knocked, thank you to one of the ladies who called her manager to let her know about the situation and thankfully, in the end, I was able to still pick up the order but I want to raise a few concerns here:
1) I would not have ordered from Paragon if I knew ahead of time that they were closing early or I would have arranged someone to pick up for me. I have done my due diligence to check for their holiday hours on the day of placing the order. Their holiday hours should have been posted on their main website given that they have an online ordering system on this site and they have order pick up available on xmas Eve (even until today, Dec 24th, the holiday hours aren't posted). The hours on google were not updated until the day of. The receipt also does not indicate pick up deadline. I raised this concern to the staff at pickup that their hours aren't updated and her response was that this is posted on Instagram. There shouldn't be an assumption that all their customers follow  their Instagram or that their go-to would be to check Instagram for their hours, especially when there is a store website and the Instagram account is not the first link that is attached the Google business page. I could not find a phone number to call either to give them a heads up or inquire what to do in this case.
2) It would be appreciative if the staff could have called the customers who did not pick up their orders (or even called 30 min before closing which some other stores would have done) or sent an email regarding this which will highlight more professionalism here. When asked about this, the staff answered that they have too many orders to call the customers (which is interesting because do they have many orders left behind by customers who do not pick up their order for the day they ordered for).
In summary, I still want to thank the staff for taking their time for helping me but I hope the store understands the frustration for a customer who is trying to rush from work and hoping to gift the cookies for an X'mas dinner. This could be handled with better customer service and professionalism.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp2nBWzmJi7dbcF5UHsZFQaWmDwVsqNjavRLr3&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-12-25"}]

[{"Name":"Alyssa Alexandera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV95VpKh_Tdijxwf_FmdOEYfNLTLHWEG3UIMyC3BunlgTP-0qg-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Zekei was so helpful, I was unsure of what was on the new seasonal menu and he was really patient telling me what is around this fall/winter for drinks. He had great customer service skills and an overall friendly and positive demeanour :) thanks again and I hope I spelled your name right! Have a great rest of your year.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mini butalia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU5d99kHIVqJcJtG39peK3K7cT3mwv8nLQY4mPb-cgd2FijQIn0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They make my drink perfect and one boy was working on orders he listen carefully and giving the answers politely","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEClvlxXSROENEJCdZXZVd4tixkq13zRQMBtck&fid=0x0:0x9f4debb7713a672"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Luc Bedard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc8fLot_ylHLbnTMQromao-Cm7rrWbFaKKADM9zKszmXprww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Music way too loud. This isn't a nite club","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXftGFeH_N47wrw1Q8m2ouQJ1vSjhE35T9KCOBDRBZHM-SruWp2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were only there to buy milk and saw Starbucks so we wanted to get some coffee as well. Ana who was working there gave us an exceptional service. She was professional, kind and cheerful. We left feeling respected.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a kiosk,  located in the food court.   Although it's not a very big place,  they have quite a few baristas and exceptionally quick.  Although there was a long line up,  they went through it very quickly.   I decided to do a mobile order,  when I saw the long line up and it was extremely fast as well.  Kudos to them!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K Day","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEZTlctZ7GsbqTa1Fl-OAw34HHUYyIBEANb8cTbXC7ELWIjJXADg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Located in a grocery store, I wasn't expecting much other than the basic drinks.
The 1st few days of our stay (@ the hotel across the street) were pretty good. A shorter lady with long brown hair was the barista. She took and made orders quickly and was friendly. Her drinks tasted good, like other Starbucks and she was thoughtful.
The last 2 days the barista has been a tall thin girl. Can't remember her name but it starts with an M. She's nice enough but so unsanitary. She handles the money then goes straight to making the drinks. She puts her entire thumb inside the silver pitcher the milk goes into for frothing, instead of holding it by the handle. She also grabs all of the cups and lids by the top smearing whatever is on her hands directly on the cups and lids. Oh and the drinks she makes are so bad. Today's Frap isn't even blended. There are big white patches in the drink where it wasn't blended. It's all supposed to be brown...
Overall it seems like it's hit or miss here, depending on which barista you get b/c there is only ever 1.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ricardo Cordero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnKuquOzPvw3TLmnC6oDZ-xmaF2sPw050glZZe1yWDH6smLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got this hot chocolate that was very smelly and tasted very bad and not even after 15 minutes when I arrived home I opened the lid and found some gross mold things on it, 100% would not recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKKSQ6spBco27FeFSaPqAfPOdyHYJhLwayS-oY&fid=0x0:0x9f4debb7713a672"],"When":"2022-1-29"},{"Name":"Jimmy Toungate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ4JglMqepw_UddqbsHZbowmE0Y0dQvBBqs1YEDYEhKHfKIMcS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service and coffee. I ordered my Mexican Mocha which is a mocha with cinnamon steamed into it. Earlier in the day had been to Tim Horton's and tried to order the same and the lady looked at me like I was from another planet. I'll just stick to Starbucks when traveling in Canada!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Crissy Geco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuJ3S3izzKvCA0KHhbGxhqv1Pfwi-klzp3LuC46IS8Eck67vNB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Usually stop by there for the earl grey tea and the spinach feta bistro pastry!

Today i tried the black rose garden tea and (despite how long I’ve been going here, this visit was the only time I’ve been ever asked if i wanted my tea steeped or a tea bag be given).

I prefer to have steeped tea always!

This visit they also ran out of the chocolate ganache cake which is my favourite so feeling a bit sad they ran out (it’s only early afternoon in the week when I visited).

Met someone on a scooter and they mentioned it was nice there’s ample street parking on Kingsway (in front of the café) and specially on the side streets as there are trees for shade 🌳","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb2M9wN17nzcpghHtLYPv9cwZryRkLJnWvjxwJ&fid=0x0:0x466206b57e209b12"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Alyssa Alexandera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV95VpKh_Tdijxwf_FmdOEYfNLTLHWEG3UIMyC3BunlgTP-0qg-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We come in almost daily but the South Asian girl (her name escapes me at this time but I will update!) often gets the order incorrectly. Each time we order the same thing, Waves size medium roast coffee with cream and 2packets sugar (they recently began withholding sugar packets and changed the drink making station to be on a weird small ledge that only one person can stand at compared to the actual counter right behind it.. incredibly uncomfortable and inconvenient).

She keeps giving the regular size instead of the Waves size, and this time when we called out the mistake, charged us an extra 50 cents for the cup change?? Even though it was not our mistake. Just seems silly as a long line was forming if impatient customers as she couldn’t figure out how to charge us just for the cup..

Coffee is great, love it, but service has recently gone down a bit since the newer hires happened. Still love waves and still support them! And despite what I wrote above they’re very friendly. We can’t imagine going anywhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blue Grandsport","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLk7UWkL-LuISkgeYx5QrsWrqDGyL4SrrqyIOe2gPa-OKIfCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a long time customer (10+ years) I offered up my congrats to this particular Waves store for being the top cafe in Burnaby. I've been going to this same location since 2014. Seen so many staff come and go. And now Dennie the current team lead is doing an excellent job with everything here as well!

I have even been around during its renovation period when they completely changed the floor tiling and rearranged the kitchen / front counter location within the store.

So congratz to my favorite Waves store for the win!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6zExCS7O4N86DgzhrCMEd3KfATOC5sPUcBaly&fid=0x0:0x466206b57e209b12"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Jas Chauhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5uDW42XKiVzbO61dFqJZ8mAnhNnpL6GW8UuwZVgntI4gopg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there today around 3:30. It’s a really great and nice coffee shop for everyone to visit. The girl in the front was super friendly and she helped me with the menu as I have never been to waves coffee before and the coffee tasted really good as well. Will recommend again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mohammed Danish Shaikh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL_2EBKbS3tzuR33VUJ70dWWQIVmaIikBg5e3McHnfzvmltQQr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried their Vegetarian Samosa and Nanaimo Bar. The samosa was okay, Nanaimo Bar was better. Lots of seating inside, lots of street parking around and in a very good location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNx87D4V0Iff3Vx8v2nzpsjKK-jT-O0laxQuyYY&fid=0x0:0x466206b57e209b12"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Sash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsEN8LESXHdVUHALQ4S3DxVR2gfd5knlpOhRGZTjLzMJeMHtuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a nice location with plenty of street parking available nearby.  My favourite go to drinks are : milk hot chocolate and dark hot chocolate. (Apart from their regular coffee)
They have a lot of dessert options available as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJdBKD4G6kbZqxOtslI4HCIr9E4SzYPcq2oSVe&fid=0x0:0x466206b57e209b12"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"Riya Negi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlRtMgYfhEe4Evzg3lqCZhfhhuBUs_joQ7qjut3Z2AkGIBcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Waves Kingsway this evening.I accidentally spilled my drink but the staff was very nice and they cleaned it up without any complaints.The drink was very tempting and tasty.Would highly recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good amount of both indoor and outdoor seating at this location, lots of light, and a full menu offered at this Waves location. Nearby to Patterson skytrain station, Metrotown, and Central Park, it’s a very convenient location to go and grab a coffee with a friend or date. On street parking only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnsXRUnlLZg1-URYk0gU9MsMcJP-nzLAgwmuGt&fid=0x0:0x466206b57e209b12"],"When":"2023-7-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Barbara Mead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCVzrkFr3sg_X2TBIbvgMb5-l4OZbko6IBwBSo7-AAS5CVoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simply, Amazing! None better for allergy support.

I ordered the Benifuuki Green Tea in December, 2023 and began consuming it faithfully well before the start of the spring allergy season 2024. I followed the packet instructions to a "T", as well.
Virginia's spring allergy season commences by mid-March and extends into early May. I have had no allergy related issues since then and have not used any OTC products normally consumed for the allergy season. I would definitely encourage anyone to give this tea a try and toss the meds. Besides feeling better. I have been able to get outdoors and enjoy living without any allergic response.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm9HxJ37wilz9ge7Te1vj6T-_GYphzD4N1tij2LBnIDcETcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a very avid tea drinker since I visited Japan in 1998, so I was very excited when I discovered Chado Tea House around 2015. Since then I have made a purchase on average once a month, and in that time I have never been disappointed. The consistent quality, freshness, and value of these Japanese teas has been second to none. And the diverse selection and wonderful service is what keeps me going back for more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deviprasad Zy*","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0Mxxg2xUV3a0Vxi7NYDc-1iIBMwlOMLK29dz4yyeHXpkVp3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The selection of teas at Chado Tea House is really extensive.  They have many organic offerings, which is great.  The team is very knowledgeable and customer service is always friendly and informative.  They are also happy to recommend teas to the novice tea enthusiast, and they are patient with any questions.  So glad we found this company!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Newton Siao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQlNbdU35it-opgiD_Q7WlZYgaRWH1ssEVX2yV1624J3MCAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed the delicious Gyokuro Yame Gokujyo!   Chado TeaHouse was very professional and timely in responding to my queries about Japanese Gyokuro.   I also appreciate the sample on Winter Sencha which is equally delicious!  Arigatou Gozaimasu Chado Tea House!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"agnesstreet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1-p0tIh2anA1EWIqyxsqxFBLf2cQSGkYncaU1ZjwvmIl7zDov=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can get all my favorite teas from Chado, always prompt and good service. Fumi knows her teas and she always is open with advice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbsht9S19PNHQOYrdpPZN-8IGjh9JGTzMGvYGRSx_Pq-OaAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been buying tea online from them for many years and it is always good. They also stock some of their teas at honey shop so that is handy if you are having a walk around main street area in vancouver","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Margaux Seeley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjL6p7iPq_cnFJrej61Zfj551Vrv_AFUBEwEywonVWorznnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chado’s tea arrives quickly, is beautifully packaged, and always fresh.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ann Cannon-Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzd88hw_Bo3BeJETZlkBJL-4gUrM1O_3FjXCJn-WSIXL7aUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chado sales support and tea knowledge is top notch!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nina Sound","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYQTTl1OUoEfYxAd7_EZGpQHJbjbDQIITtXcowNIlFfrK5rca8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a dark ice chocolate there today and the barista gave me a full cup of ice with some chocolate stuff. I asked her to remove that full cup of ice(nicely) cuz I didn’t know they’d gave me extra extra extra ice, after removing most ice cubes it looks like there’s much less portion of the drink, I supposed she’d fill it but she just retuned it back to me lol, she said cuz they’ve got every drink measured for the taste.

BUT the drink she gave me doesn’t even look it’s the right color for their “right measurement”. And I’ve no idea what she put at the bottom.

First time ever I was treated like this in a Blenz.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJEpjcIgjcHRCaaOAxedQMfjBBD-JlHkPHk36n&fid=0x0:0xa1b50b597a7352e1"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"In all honesty my purchase and my sister‘s purchase was a bit expensive for what it was, but the staff interaction that we had was very kind, calm, and concise. unfortunately we could not remember his name which was our fault however he was a Japanese staff and I really wanted to give some kudos to his customer service. We hadn’t been to Blenz in a while So we were taking our time with the menu and he was very patient and explaining some of the fan favourites and different alternatives to get. The interior was clean and nicely decorated with some holiday items. I had ordered the bacon and egg sandwich but it tasted pretty bland and dry in my opinion. I also ordered the turmeric latte which was fine. And my sister had ordered a cranberry mocha drink which she really liked. In general I do not know how quickly I have to go back to a blend however if I had to recommend a nice place to grab a coffee, sit down, and relax from shopping while having nice customer service I would come back to this location and it is located right across from Winners.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFNTCVa-0_7gDO6yTtVYg8XrOR6KwoPYhszCX1&fid=0x0:0xa1b50b597a7352e1"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite coffee shop. I love all their chocolate drinks but their dark chocolate ones are the best. I like to pair it with their famous chocolate hazelnut bignet. I just wish the rewards app is more worth collecting like points redemption is as easy as the other popular coffee shop chains.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8lT7GtxmI0BKqJ4-FTOx9RHx2mphk9DZtJrL8&fid=0x0:0xa1b50b597a7352e1"],"When":"2023-4-25"},{"Name":"Cheshan Jayathilaka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZnrVCAI3Y_puq6ZNh8ssXubtO30jQ6uoEfxcRtUDQU7GV8WQU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately, my experience at Blenz Coffee was far from satisfactory. The staff's rudeness and lack of friendliness left a sour taste in my mouth. As a first-time customer, I expected a warm welcome and guidance on ordering, but instead, I was met with indifference and impatience. Even when I mistakenly understood their promotions, their response was less helpful.

To add to the disappointment, my parents' order was also mishandled. Despite specifying two sugars and no cream, their coffee arrived without sugar, and when we requested some, we were only given one pack.

Overall, Blenz Coffee failed to meet even the basic standards of customer service and quality control. It's a shame to see such a renowned brand fail to deliver a positive experience. I would not recommend this place, especially on a busy day when patience and efficiency are paramount.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqVo89zHwnNmL6-R3N92ooLlre7v0ItQ2HnSU&fid=0x0:0xa1b50b597a7352e1"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Its a small   coffee shop too small for such a big mall . Its right inside the mall at the entrance of the mall on lower level  were the bus/skytrain transportation  area .  Its has some seating but 98 %  always full hard to get a seat . Staff is decent  . Coffee is good etc . The seats are comfortable and there are tables  too .  Its very busy this boxing week","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUIVfbxkeAH9sT_VmknhXFih6zZLDNBAR6-jKm&fid=0x0:0xa1b50b597a7352e1"],"When":"2022-12-30"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Blenz ain't half bad! Grabbed a Large Soy Decaf Latte which was pretty yummy, I like their plant based milk alternatives and house coffee blends.
Whilst the service wasn't exactly with a smile, this is a nice joint to chill and pretty much the only place you can sit and chill in a relaxed and comfortable vibe within Metropolis.
The rewards are super useful and a great option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2jL4br3ykgOShTf09R_hTRf_hIXC8sl_J1sNf&fid=0x0:0xa1b50b597a7352e1"],"When":"2022-7-19"},{"Name":"A. T.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDPNdOkM5E2lrC8VtQDHpS8O3UNg0sOaVobrSHrMLcsHst7sVSHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Since I always order a Matchachillo at Metrotown's Blenz Coffee in front of Winners, I really liked this coffee store. However, today, I ordered the same drink but there was something wrong with it. There were bits of plastic pieces in the drink and was confused on what it was. It was until I reached the end of the drink that there was actually a whole. Plastic. Lid. In my cup. Blended. I was baffled honestly.
I just want to warn future customers to look out for what they have in their drinks even though I know it can be difficult.
Also, I want to inform the workers there to look out for and be careful of what they blend in the drinks before serving them to their customers. Because we all know that plastic is highly harmful to a person's body if consumed so please be more aware of these potential harms.

Thanks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW2cL3Oc6i0DbkkpKDXvlMlKCCa19pgpHHkp-n&fid=0x0:0xa1b50b597a7352e1"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"sri harsha reddy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ8st-jAWWTB1wYuSv8MLrDGfhlPtnBRoTeFes744mRp1EX7Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Blenz Coffee and had a disappointing experience due to their poor customer service. The staff seemed disinterested and unapproachable, offering no greeting or smile upon my arrival. The barista was rude and dismissive, barely making eye contact or acknowledging my order. Her name was Franchiska.

To make matters worse, my coffee was prepared incorrectly, and when I pointed this out, the staff's response was unprofessional and lacking in courtesy. There was no apology or effort to rectify the mistake promptly. The overall lack of friendliness and attention to customer satisfaction was disappointing and made me feel unwelcome.

I hope the management addresses these issues and trains their staff to be more attentive and courteous. A little kindness and professionalism can go a long way in making customers feel valued and encouraging repeat visits.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Teadot
open_hours: {"Friday":["Closed"],"Monday":["Closed"],"Saturday":["Closed"],"Sunday":["Closed"],"Thursday":["Closed"],"Tuesday":["Closed"],"Wednesday":["Closed"]}

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kayla Ok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2ZPW-HOTvhKWxZVs_tiGZng-PPQOf1u70Mg0ytQnqF8DWQ4ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the ube Thai milk tea (50% sugar\u0026ice) and sparkling butterfly (50% sugar and ice). The ube Thai milk tea was still very sweet so I recommend getting 30% sugar but the sparkling butterfly is very good. I believe it is made with one slice of lemon, butterfly pea tea, and sparkling water. Overall good! Would come back to try again if I’m ever in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtv4dD7YYI5XGldYpKp3ei90BKFBJs5wKpaJKr\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Jessie Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7rY5GXYrgnFWWGhclB7nRZyXnC6KBTjFUnyAMrKowsAQmSrk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service here is excellent and very prompt. I absolutely love their variety of fruit teas, which contain real fresh fruits. Every time I visit, there's always a line of students, and I often see Teadot cups in classrooms, indicating its popularity and great taste. I always opt for a half-sweetness fruit tea when passing by; it's not overly sweet, which makes me feel healthier. Next time, I'm excited to try their coconut and milk tea series. Can't wait!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCF0u8PwYmpU3XGGjDs9trdwX0gT0-RPqaPQlf\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered a Thai milk tea with oat milk and pearls. The drink was really good, although the pearls weren’t terrible, they definitely weren’t as fresh as they should be. The service was just average… the young lady there had a resting b**** face and seemed like she was just annoyed with customers. Something I want to mention is that I paid almost $8 for the large Thai milk tea which make sense with todays inflation, but just a heads up in case some people aren’t willing to pay that much. Overall I will still give it a 4 star because the milk tea was delicious and it wasn’t that the lady said something rude it’s just more the way she looked at people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGj1OEWdArCgSPachUqgGo2erqW601ArCmPaC5\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"r Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXb4SBG5_lbtiUh3LaeK2KSrEoMrsyS9788E4VMzVO1x9E6x1Bxsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The amount of waiting is absolutely horrendous. Half an hour???? It's bubble tea, not fine dining. Even the wait time for the appetizer at a steak house is shorter than this. Also made a 50% sugar drink a no sugar drink. Absolutely would highly recommend steering away from this place, unless you are comfortable drinking a no sugar bubble tea with no tapioca and have plenty of time sitting around, which I imagine is quite uncommon in a university environment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melanie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuTvnujTiuCld6dzTIrNj0n-AZw6u2CPxxw_mM9poKt-FaeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was good. It wasn't busy, and I was able to order and receive my drink quickly. And lots of unique drinks available. However, the drink I ordered was mediocre and on the expensive side. I ordered a Thai milk tea, half ice \u0026 sugar. At most BBT places, half ice \u0026 sugar is a good spot for me. Their Thai milk tea was very bland, with a slight grassy note. No creaminess that would be expected from Thai milk tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkplwCMysftEjlCLPKtP_e66i9X1drxPxjaRiM\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpyR6lW9JHiyXGuG73lo5A19PTb1WXFzVLCnrO84Gv3hfeDE5c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love their strawberry milk tea! I got it at 75% sweetness, which is the perfect amount of sweetness for me. The strawberry flavour doesn’t taste artificial, and the taste kind of resembles oat milk? Sadly, the pearls have always been somewhat hard the few time I’ve gotten them. I also like their matcha latte!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0JmmKS9pDDYI2w8OFq_pD-DLFeg9WS9RK5UFS\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2023-2-8"},{"Name":"Christopher Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6fVhlEYcalwgBboNF8Es3eO0zqfV0XvoR9EcQMcIntJOA4ThM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm not sure why this place is rated so low. They balanced the flavours really well, and they had offerings that I've never seen in other bubble tea places.\n\nWe got the Thai Pumpkin Tea, and it was a unique combination of flavours that made sense.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYXoQ0_umjTpUvyK7psO_kFf1WUYOD9Je5VUHX\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2023-7-8"},{"Name":"AJ R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLo4tIvUrcwNXdNPm8MhPpZgzsQXb-_lGpW8MEceFXJ5buZ1dI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great bubble tea and excellent customer service. I got the matcha strawberry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAHsQuRNbVpgsz2N_OGwdTQgZ7GUF6ouFIMz2W\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2024-10-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leah Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxA3fk78DTixsa2GNxRzxdmxfNnAgtWa3seQ34xLZfQcTiayg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is delicious and the staffs are so nice! My favorite is the mini croissant and their afternoon tea set which comes with so many varieties of dessert and your choice of tea. Highly recommend this place for gatherings or if you just want to enjoy some quality time with yourself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeZOn5ceWad94zjGNefMffDpwnHii1ee2TNt_f&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Yueqian Xin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG8vTpUsS3l3PPYuLUDCGUGEM08f8m7HojlWux8pz_O4W_-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a very cozy place to have some tea and desserts. The store is quit small but the atmosphere is very enjoyable. It offers delicious afternoon tea set, which is seldomly offered by stores here. I would recommend to try it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxGD40YEH50pSbIRoplKe9nmKjOkBapked-2mQ&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Stephanie Lovell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiAuWxiEyuBMkWuTmllufZPwFBpSSXad76pQcjpkZsIs3jyq3y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my mother to partake in the Royal Afternoon Tea experience at Tea Thyme on Main St. Reservations for the tea experience are required but the cafe has a fantastic variety of other drinks and treats on offer.

We each had our own pot of tea - there were a number of types to choose from. I chose the Rose Black Tea which was floral and fragrant. Service was excellent; bringing additional cream for scones and refilling our tea when the pots were getting low.

Onto the food, the Royal Tea is a three tiered tower. Savoury sandwiches and bites at the bottom, fruit scones with cream and jam in the middle, and sweet desserts on top.

My favourites from the savoury were the tuna salad cone and the egg salad sandwich. The scones were warm and delicious. From the sweets, my favourite was the mango tart which had fresh mango on it.

It is definitely an afternoon tea experience that I would recommend to others and one that I thoroughly enjoyed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeQ6rscu09Pj4nauX8PxrxAEmUNQsV8QWQnN8c&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2023-6-24"},{"Name":"Selena L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP-t5NiwFC9qHJDY9Z6EjmH1kzmKROMi98tMSbtHNAkxsUfvrn2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner used to own the place in metrotown called Audrey's moment. I used to love that place! But now he moved to Vancouver and I'm so happy he's still around!  This place is so food friendly, I have a food allergy and I'm also vegetarian. He makes great arrangements for me! In addition, the food is very fresh, he makes it fresh and the smell of the scones is just amazing! I brought my friends here and we all loved it. I absolutely recommend to come here. It's very scrumptious and a lovely experience. They also sell coffees and teas and sandwiches.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAlBVrCS8bxuKi32ZlE8LYUdJBlMq3G8v9fTe0&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2023-12-21"},{"Name":"Martina Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMHF3DTuf7rbIaauRnzokwjW2P7BkE6zs_bAJoatCwLtSubQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best afternoon tea place I have been to! The decoration and ambience is cozy and cute. I love the mermaid tea set. We ordered the 3 tier afternoon tea set. The food is exceptional and nicely presented. My favourite is the scones. It is slightly caramelized and crunchy on the outside. Soft and buttery on the inside. The server goes above and beyond. One of my friends has a strict dietary restriction. They explained each item thoroughly, and made changes to accommodate my friend. I will highly recommend this place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHtjcjaWQzqHOLzQxnithsAhAEbGsw7p50S0nVK1aNY3FFQevV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to have a girls day with my bestie, she picked out the place and i had a very pleasant experience, we had the high tea set and ordered two different types of tea, although the portions were small each bite was very tasty, the tea was wonderful and fragrant full of floral notes. Had a great time, i’ll take my boyfriend here someday","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdjAWHW6Is3AjVVcVFOD2iqcvS6XTjz7i7Tnh-&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Terri Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdHMQamP6ntk6cmD8m9VHj4cLgJWNXVSwfy5Jk1_ks8LpnASP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a great time with my girlfriends while enjoying high tea at Tea Thyme. I suggest make a reservation ahead of time! All the treats were so delicious and the scones were freshly baked so it was piping hot! We ordered a full size afternoon tea for a 8 yo and the server even offered to swap out the tea for any other drinks on the menu to accommodate the kid. Next time I'll need to try their banana 🍌 waffle in a very cute packaging 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTqsoPuy7H-aWb7upo-xpDhO2PXqZue8Pdazc4&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2023-9-19"},{"Name":"Cecil Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-QP7BlCg3Vs84FHfHDUZQY7WWKE9GJOsg9lAeRSwCwSMRig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went here with my partner for the Royal Tea and had a wonderful experience! The tea itself was really excellent and was clearly steeped exactly the right amount of time before they brought it out to us. We didn't think to try two different pots but the Cloud 9 Rooibos we tried had a lot of depth of flavor. Every food item was something you really wanted to enjoy and savor- I especially appreciated how light and fresh some of the sweeter offerings were, like the mango tart and strawberry puff pastry, because we were pretty full by the time we got to the top of that tower! There's great ambience in the cafe, and lots of attention to detail, the chairs and seashell tea cups in particular are very curated design choices. Probably a terrific place to take photos for Instagram if you're into that. Overall highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqG38Tk_MQnYDQcpmttc83bQhk7nFaylTK5_hw&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2023-7-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Czarina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEsMcynZ1Cis9IWYqsqk1EtshOzUGnwmf3mDrKzyRTueWeGyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely Adore this place!
The store itself is amazing, has many different options of different plants and flowers, along with a selection of clothing and any other household amenities. Staff is always very kind and helpful.
The cafe is a great place to have an afternoon coffee or treat, they also offer a lunch menu. During springs or warmer weathers they have a patio to enjoy as well.
Would recommend! Very local.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqiGnWYM0k97jU4pPMGmVjgzkI1zZscJOwMd_f&fid=0x0:0x254ff883164f8a9e"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this location.  There are lots of parking there.
This is a location good for your Christmas decorations.  You will have many ideas for your Christmas tree.
If you want some garden supplies or beautiful flowers,  this is the place for you.  Price may be a little high but the qualities are good.
If you still looking for some flowers for the Thanksgiving, they have a lot there.  The pumpkin flowers pot is so nice.  This piece will be good for a centre piece for your Thanksgiving.
It's a pleasure shopping experience there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2cOY1eq5LgGnj5t24F9-qvoba4erkRlPNMAkG&fid=0x0:0x254ff883164f8a9e"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Mia Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPAUy0Htbh5FTHA7CrcyalmfPE1fNra4l4o1y3j6EQjpz6Sdhn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place because they have a garden patio and their recent cheese pudding was a great surprise. I love their savoury cheddar bacon scone with bits of corn nestled in there. Their iced chai latte had great flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxqQf-QSRgMTLg1APTYjtxoABopNLC4tlut0Lq&fid=0x0:0x254ff883164f8a9e"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Dima Sherepo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEDeR7SKUdf5Lcuso5SVsipHqAna34J9O7Jpbfo9Nq-MQoOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today we visited your store on Mandeville with a friend.
First, we drank coffee, rested in a cozy cafe, were charged with positive energy from green plants and enjoyed the atmosphere. I liked the decor.And I remember I bought some cool sunglasses in that department this spring.
Secondly, I came to get soil for my plants, I needed peat. And I found it.
Thirdly, very helpful staff.As a result, I express my gratitude to the girl at the checkout, I spied on the business card that her name is Bailee. She is a professional in her field, very friendly, knowledgeable, beautiful and responsive. She helped me find the right soil, showed me where and even helped me pack it.Thanks to the store managers for the assortment and well-chosen staff.
I will definitely come back to you again!
Best wishes,
Dmytro.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOT8ZTgh8OPpntN3UbDPuLRjD_MDZdseE5ioruY&fid=0x0:0x254ff883164f8a9e"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Robin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8sWp0XtFTIJsmHEQ6_DPtNSK5x6zr59FT6BKXVNcxdC4MlqQm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The garden works at Mandeville is really spacious and has all sorts of pretty flowers and plants. Definitely surprised me as a first time flower shopper. The staff are super friendly and helpful especially Grace at the botanical. She answered all my naive beginner questions, helped me choose the proper pots for my flowers and planted them so gorgeously! She really went above and beyond and I really enjoyed the “plant it for me” service. It’s a really nice experience and I had a great time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLJ28r5IUXJE04ejNhyN6UZy1TX6aQHeO7FZar&fid=0x0:0x254ff883164f8a9e"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Kelly I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXquEahqi64vPbCeET717zYpgegwA8i3NW9-l7MkI7Qwpb7QLT5Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mandeville has been a Burnaby favorite for many years for many residents. What a great selection of plants. A great sized cafe with a lovely brunch menu.  Very Christmas atmosphere and lots of great gifts for plant lovers. Check it out of you're around.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joe N. (PepitoKabron)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKM2hYVKLnSOxsXDrDXuX-P52ncqy4P4OA8ajhqD9Ah0a073Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a perfect example where you can't improve perfection!
The team is amazing.  I have no knowledge on pottery, plants or anything related to them.
All I did was to save an old used pot from the recycling bag and gave it a new life.  After my artwork was complete (see photos), I came to the team at GARDENWORKS and asked them for ideas and their expertise.  Immediately, the team jumped on the opportunity, provided me about 8 options to choose from and the results speak for themselves (see photo).
The team is so amazing, they also pottered/planted my choices into their new co-habitant pot, and I am only waiting to see my wife's expression when she comes home in 3 days from a work trip.  This will be our new dinning table's centerpiece.
I am sorry that I did not catch the names of each and everyone who helped me, but then, I am making sure I don't leave anyone out, you are all amazing and your ROCK!!
Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-HVEjD6TGnoZUo0HurRVHDBg1CUK800ipU_4t&fid=0x0:0x254ff883164f8a9e"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My wife asks me drive her to the shop since she wants to get some air plants.
It's a little quiet in the late afternoon.  She can enjoy her browse there, choosing the plants and taking pictures.
She says there are lot of plants and decorations items both for fall and Christmas.
The display of  Christmas are set up already but it seems too soon for it.
She find the plants she likes and happy with it.
The staff that she meet in the cashier is super helpful and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgoqlw_0-zcD_z9BuCckzdY6DlvfRf-Io8mpwY&fid=0x0:0x254ff883164f8a9e"],"When":"2022-10-12"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Obvious Channel Name","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpu88IRyHyxa3PZnGjys1sghK02JKQlJiFdbmxOfdr7dbvQ_rk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Genuinely awful. Patty looks and tastes like crap, most likely boiled. Save yourself the pain (and ~$1, go to tripleO's instead)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2tjiUDnsgseU49PPsh9jB-xkw8Q-kgDSVeG9Z\u0026fid=0x0:0x298b4f44a9faafae"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Gary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc8pJjgnUHrpl3rN3HpEOlKrQN0kSB_mYSm1yfce2ViM6MQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to complain about my yam fries I got to the lady working today on. July 18 2024. Fries were cooked for 1 min and 30 seconds ish. Pulled out. Not salted . No chipotle sauce. Costed roughly $6 and I got soggy undercooked fries. I ate one and then brought the whole thing back to her asked if this is how you guys serve yam fries. They said yes. I laughed and threw it all away to the trash.  Look at the video. How soggy it is. I bent it a couple of times to show how undercooked this is.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe8pN3REK-M8tkSXiMZ3EXKikTzOyw0emtYM5v\u0026fid=0x0:0x298b4f44a9faafae"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Colin Tionghoy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWHn52u_uec_pLgHpFaQFQCdP_Owf-e_Ljj7Mf2ODChoPvJc8k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I waited 20 minutes just for the Indian girl to make me the wrong sandwich, while others got their food first? She also tried to over charge me","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nico Lombardi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaLqdTw-aO6PKY7kujz-rJHLeSGsdc5W-hvefqTH-1NdHFYBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fuse Cafe is a must-visit for food enthusiasts looking for a charming and delicious dining experience. Whether you're meeting friends, having a romantic dinner, or simply seeking a cozy place to enjoy a cup of coffee and a book, Fuse Cafe delivers on all fronts. With its delightful ambiance, superb food, and outstanding service, it's no wonder this place has earned a reputation as a local favorite","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"brandon wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM3TnAV1zSX-dMcMe8QiePH8dzhkI4rwp2OlAtYZMhH2R7BaQXGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty decent prices and food compared to many of the other items on campus. Worth the walk over. Sadly does close relatively early because of the class schedule for the building. Okay poutine, actual cheese curds. Good Sandwiches. Sometime the waits are long because this place seem understaffed because of people coming from other parts of the campus.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Spirit G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA5aGSbjNcsLqQnTBLuNPVGLjNOTV6t9zmSXEKBdX3dinaSOE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have gone to bcit for 3 of my four years of apprenticeship, and this cafe used to be great!  They had good food, prices, and fast service.  And while the staff are doing an amazing job pushing the current place to 150%, the management decisions that brought it to where it is now, were clearly awful.  The food prices have gone up on average of two dollars since last year, while also shrinking the portion size by almost a third.  The quality of product has also fallen sharply.  There are two active lines of food here, one for Tim Hortons express, and the other for the grill, but management has apparently closed one of the two tills, forcing everyone to go through the grill checkout from the beginning of the grill line, even if you just wanted a coffee.  This negates the value of an express line, and was not a problem before the \"upgrade\".\nNow the head chef lady, who has been working there forever, doing a great job cooking good food, is tethered to the only till, while her colleagues scramble faithfully to keep up.  This is not a fault of the staff, but rather, the management.  Merciless cost cutting is to blame.  If management were to push the cost cutting any further, this establishment would likely become profit negative.   If you give experienced, dedicated staff low quality products to serve, without the proper tools to succeed, and actually expect high quality food that will create customer satisfaction, you are blind on both sides of the coin.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Axel Galay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJW4X_1eFL5Ne9l9qxkKyX_NP2g2CtUIWPCBopINNILV4oGWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food here is overpriced and pre cooked under a heat lamp. The food here is NOT good only saving grace is coffee but it's already Timmies coffee","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Connor R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdiGt2Hea6RfRjwMquYQMMBahuHfegX1L0VeHIH61OrWE70WgQpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to have great tasting, well priced breakfasts but after they redecorated/changed its terrible.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elephant Bea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmbTkWbvkzq9BEURa4cDUNDp_dqnBpyYXDtKQjP6X4hyrXm3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update  photos on July 24

——

I occasionally visited this place since my friend loved it; the first time, I bought an almond croissant, which was too greasy; the second and third visits, I only ordered a hot beverage; my partner purchased some sweet treat for Christmas, so we went to this place to try what we might want. Overall, the staff hosted great hospitality, but the pastry matched better with hot tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcp4g6jIKBjct3_lnfOTj9mBDxLr-9cTx3N3Dz&fid=0x0:0x868a87276af0dc57"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Maëli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlou5rRFSYskcl--HHWcLCiRJRQwWXer3o2Ymj5vo7r-Ek-THu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you looking for a great French croissant or Pain au chocolat, this is definitely the place to be! The staff is very nice, they have also beverages and a selection of cakes that I will try next time, but I really recommend the croissant (even if the pain au chocolat is really nice)! I’m French and we all know what we're looking for in a good croissant: crispness all around and softness inside, a good buttery taste without too much sugar. Just perfect! Merci beaucoup, belle découverte ✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN9mL3PD3g9d8lYZlFXW3G3Dvf_G_Wazwh-Y2f&fid=0x0:0x868a87276af0dc57"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Dahlia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQgMiJgQQUWXUpX_vLBTDbbMkB1XyhSnpGj8rW2JxPqajVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little place! Got the matcha and sour cherry croissant and it was yummy! I liked that the cherry wasn't sweet with buttery crispy flaky croissant. My mom got a coffee and an apple cinnamon turnover. She loved the coffee and enjoyed the turnover. Then we also wanted chocolates so I got the cassis and a strawberry balsamic one. I would've liked a stronger blackcurrant flavor as I love blackcurrant. I preferred the strawberry balsamic cause I love balsamic vinegar and I have never had it in a dessert. It combined well with the strawberry.

My mom got the mandarin orange one and the dark lemon one and she thought both was very good. Staff are friendly and nice, quick service. Small place with little seating but cute Paris themed. Will come again to try other chocolates and I really wanted to try their entremets but didn't this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8qv-Z2CaqwGQ8OcKF0ssh3N1cMS1BneYYhtbC&fid=0x0:0x868a87276af0dc57"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Will Mackenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtLBVVeAqEE5mFr6pO3NG0KqY39LTEwMcoMbZ6okoKeXBkchVp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An amazing patisserie that created a delicious strawberry mouse cake for my party at short notice. I highly recommend their business!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYLqUb_0CPAJjCkBhAjngetUOKCug4BQb1NcDo&fid=0x0:0x868a87276af0dc57"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just went to mon Paris to try their macaroons and chocolates. They look delectable so bought box of macarons for high tea party and chocolates for birthday party later. Trust taste will shine through. Came again with friends. Had chocolate with raspberry and peach galette. Friends had espresso , cannelle, croissant. Food and drinks delicious in atmosphere Parisienne. Came again today to celebrate a teaching anniversary and enjoyed drinks and strawberry galette am apple croissants. Came again and enjoyed raspberry galette. Very fresh and flaky. Served on plate with real cutlery. Came again for peach galettes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSaWscATB5UGOiUd_tJEYaDekkz0CXzU33g09Y&fid=0x0:0x868a87276af0dc57"],"When":"2023-9-7"},{"Name":"Abhay Verma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrV_6i4dbcDuraV7ft63f2m_fuGbXlt4ooiSAA_Az5gxTkAzw0Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got a chance to try this patisserie after I came across it on the hot chocolate festival participant list and I'm glad I did.

We tried the macarons and a hazelnut croissant and really liked the croissant. Very well done with a unique twist of a biscuit layer on top, would be perfect with a hot drink here.

Can't wait to come back and try a double baked croissant with a Spanish latte.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4n2jaGVWfQbqA6OXoUeMnIEpP3hN6ONOR8M9f&fid=0x0:0x868a87276af0dc57"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Daniel Mendes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWfyNEj2hAlFDhso__VBFi6FvULT81eYCfgh0tEG1hfmmiLO46=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great french pastisserie! We ordered a cappuccino and a triple chocolate croissant, both were delicious! Staff was very friendly and kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOek_mCFqGruxoeFN88CNqnC85RKR-J1HggpcRi&fid=0x0:0x868a87276af0dc57"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Emz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnAuhWPo5zGrAzU9ZygbaC4f0LVCyqKOH7-jWRoBzK7BTWsEdN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far , my favourite place so far! If you want a nice smile , good coffee and a the most friendly atmosphere in Burnaby , Metrotown , you are in the exact most right place to be ! 🤗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcKByypvzqAPE_UIpb0IHpC8RMnhq0hBdHKYqL&fid=0x0:0x868a87276af0dc57"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aaron Prohaska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw38HzT_qbg7YcYih7pU5XRfD3VfJLd4R3SBVZ7qOt5WYahcVhTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"3/20/2024

What a cool venue, so sleek and modern. Our drinks were tasty and we had a sushi roll as a snack, and it was so good. It was the dancing roll. Our server was very friendly and helpful, but as there wasn't much of a crowd, the server would disappear a little too long sometimes, but still very enjoyable. I didn't understand the 3.9 average rating, I think it's probably a tough location for this type of place. It was ultra clean, probably due to the white decor they need to be extra careful. I would for sure go back if we are ever in town again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgw8YyB-gsNb-QNySDmhFAbwzgBRyBcMSEZeMA&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Sheldon Ang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVohw_7d5XzKea59oo3omlBbhHxFO6BD9jL2Ug4no27KrKuyx4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're looking for an Asian twist on afternoon tea, this would be your place.

The shop welcomes you with its openness filled with cute decorations and comforting atmosphere. My friends and I went with Afternoon Tea, as well as the Crab Cake, and the selection of Tea were endless.

I went with a Milk Tea while my friends selected a Fruit Tea, but the joy of Afternoon Tea is trying all of the drinks we could handle. If you haven't filled up on Tea, then the meal itself would require you another stomach.

To be fair, Afternoon Tea consists a lot of Bread, but the fillings were hitting all the right spots. The Crab Cake was also quite good, a bit salty, but a great addition to our meal. We also prdered Sushi, which was also good, but we were so full by the end!

There was a party also happening while we were dining, so keep in mind there is not a lot of privacy in the dining area. Service was great, and hopefully next time I come, I am ready to eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsbfIh6L77AtMrvetusyV4WZLvhXvZ5JiRa_P3&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Ms. Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQaNfblq64oqWShq2FuM-_BC-1ScwkOJu_eYkfqvQy0DjNuPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"For the amount you pay, I feel there could  be more food. My guests and I left hungry. The fruit tea is delicious!
Service was lacking,  although friendly, our server was mostly MIA.
The glass roof is lovely but the concrete, not so welcoming, or cozy, or signature of 'high tea.'
Fair to say, we won't return or recommend. There is potential here, but there's work to be done.

Ms Fancy
Google Reviews
6 million + picture views","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjCwhhj855DEe64FVWCoDGqBnzoGBnPmRbUf-E&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Ari Harnik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFmT2OAhcZr5V8Br7oF-xB8HZBlVZYiv82ez_0wJiizsg_9aFZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food and presentation was delicious. It was all so good and the desserts were enjoyable. The place was very pretty and quiet and because of the location of the tea house, the view is nice in a unique way. The service was a little slow though and that's the only reason I did not rate 5 stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLRrERPFFatqoe0zzAg-voW6u15JYoH37RqJiC&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2023-8-10"},{"Name":"MV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVboMmayUV2W3DG15uUtxXp8UqkBVrxEtIz-c11EwG_BhKRWNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service was great, the server was really nice and attentive. The space inside is nice and bright. We had the afternoon tea menu which was $58 per person. The food we did not enjoy so much but the dessert options were good. I feel like this place is great as an experience but if you are hungry, I would suggest making a reso to a restaurant afterwards as the food is not very filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEmxDZrlBoJvhzX14NurjA0fJLr6KRkjsKLmsL&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Mr. Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZwG5XMb_-3uVsbGueyH2ukInR08HMgar275Yst029j6CdepuW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This high tea lounge is one of the best in Vancouver. Their service was excellent. The vibe and interior setup was romantic and the food was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRaAQpKgCcTX9VdaKf3BvSrxfaEq1BZMB-vFms&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2023-12-2"},{"Name":"Simon S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc7O5cmkic0cJHF7A1yh66Pf98qqrnxEgzTUzwrKRc-lsI9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hy tea lounge catering service provided most of kids ‘ birthday celebration from our school — oakridge Montessori  , the food is exceptional, the price is reasonable, the staffs are super kind. They also do decoration and birthday cakes , which really saved our energy . I would highly recommend them .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNnN2lKTRH2oo32nrY7vc4Mpn_Ak7DoMLnE0jf&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2022-6-18"},{"Name":"Cynthia Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIgJLEixmBFSpcdPUrxPS8B5Ns_vUpaafkJvloW58On3Jj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had their high tea experience for $56. Overall everything tasted really good except the desserts were too sweet for my liking. Also wished the milk tea was kept hot with a tea light candle as it became cold during the meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6ASlY7SjsZkqfuSPYdFhPFzIzZCYYu43Tbes&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2023-4-18"}]
