user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sophia Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxLQXfwQJahPezKI3zYgYADGK8JbtfxdLhB3lBNb80NltDMBh8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You guys made our day😊👍🏻✨
It was special treat for my husband! Solo District Starbucks All Staffs are warmly welcome to us with great taste coffee. I really recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2zitnwGed-w5IzCKATle8kC_ZPYILdhr4mSZ7&fid=0x0:0x34b30f04a9d38c2b"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"HL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSqAWPJXpOlqUn852Q39EE_iHsFkq0EJ_Y83_M8oqs5b0eF2KT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I love visiting Starbucks, especially for your seasonal beverages and oat milk options. However, I’ve noticed that more often than not, the store is out of stock on both the seasonal drinks and oat milk. It can be quite disappointing when you’re excited to try something special, only to find it’s unavailable. I suggest paying closer attention to inventory management, so that customers can enjoy the full range of options you’re known for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyHxisBuRQx5A0DZ5o66_7l1Mt0bIDj1TL4GSF&fid=0x0:0x34b30f04a9d38c2b"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Efficient, no-nonsense and simple ordering in advance delivers cup to hand upon walking through the door with a smile and friendly barista!
Nothing much to report apart from your average Starbucks joint. Very friendly staff, nice cozy coffee house and convenient location near the Skytrain and Whole Foods.
Unfortunately no indoor or outdoor seating at present due to COVID.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRy7Nj_KhSCm3cmo9T36tJNYpSSULTVq5LVZ6f&fid=0x0:0x34b30f04a9d38c2b"],"When":"2021-7-7"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favourite Starbucks location. I frequent this one often which makes it easier for me to get to know the staff, however - the staff themselves make this a delight! Easily one of the nicest workers even when they are slammed with happy hour or morning rush or the afternoon pick me up. They take the time to speak with every guest courteously and have their drink or food ready for them quickly. There is seating inside and some tables outside. They also have a nice variety of merchandise for purchase.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQP0NJshXgxEseWiL36Vql5k6ghh7TbKRnQo9v&fid=0x0:0x34b30f04a9d38c2b"],"When":"2022-10-27"},{"Name":"Kayla Ok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2ZPW-HOTvhKWxZVs_tiGZng-PPQOf1u70Mg0ytQnqF8DWQ4ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is my go to order everyday (Irish cream cold brew) but the presentation is definitely the worst at this location:( also the cream is usually not so foamy. I have gone to this location a few times but I prefer The skytrain station location across the street. That one is the best in this area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzWkcu_p5fPMAZy_z6BQ57BScZ9xFrgsKy84I9&fid=0x0:0x34b30f04a9d38c2b"],"When":"2022-12-2"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Efficient Starbucks location with drinks made as expected. Tried the Iced Trenta Passion Tango tea and it was light and refreshing. No complaints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlT8Z79CjYZ-6NfjgiVxZJLPT7_UcJLee1JqMJ&fid=0x0:0x34b30f04a9d38c2b"],"When":"2024-3-15"},{"Name":"Annie Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL51p-8tvOS30ipWZ1RjfIfghES9nK5xP6AURpBT6uJJTLRLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here on the Thursday. The cashier was unfriendly and hot helpful at all. I can clearly tell she is not in a good mood.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esther Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5fFqj2k8OJy3LIHOZcQRGj7REXm2dBoU9J6KMALzWHYh1bg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst Starbucks experience ever. The woman with glasses first got my order wrong, then gave me a smaller cup than I originally ordered. She insisted it wasn't her fault. Do not recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Kate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqrfK_-RjSXO4yEOOGD6owU7ks8iBu12Mbp21Bv6V8EDa_Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came to this location and was pleasantly surprised by the great customer service I’ve received. People working at this location are very nice and helpful. Best Starbucks location. Thank you for staying so positive and friendly Dexter, Charmie, and Jocelyn!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7MjrK8VhJ5AGBzV_JmPRK1UFEzdifPubzJnF5UnzB76XixyY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their drinks are always good, very easy to park, always enough seats, nice environment but only one bad thing here. Ac is too strong🥶","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shubhajit Laskar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIwOflzxhb-7mJhGGPYnIgGxyjTUHZD5uN1xegNEuCArB4JBDS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's my first time I had experience in Starbucks. It was really good, the employees were really helpful and they took time to explain about Starbucks and how it has a lot of options for customers; they can choose their own beverage so it was pretty good! The first experience was awesome! I would recommend everyone to go for Starbucks if you want to have a coffee as my first time was worth every penny!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfLROfK4B4tOPRrj7IGL956wkGJEPfGH3J7M2e&fid=0x0:0xda8488f7c08cb1e1"],"When":"2022-3-30"},{"Name":"jose azurdia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvEWF4I6ExHoOFTfLLQnv7jri_YFVglQPLxYfRcZy2WpUA-Yeq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to this store for the first and last time. I order a caramel macchiato decaf, the taste was a burn coffee. I came back to change it and the lady who was on the bar pretty upset and with terrible attitude did it again but this time worse than the first one. No caramel, no vanilla pumps, no nothing, just coffee with foam. After she finished the order she just throwed on the table. TERRIBLE ATTITUDE.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHkflNiJArSU9S4SszXuAB0IRNhou6_K0u99VD&fid=0x0:0xda8488f7c08cb1e1"],"When":"2022-3-10"},{"Name":"Kay Ren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfgZL_8y90iMrshfCmhWsVq7vkiiLmOv0Y0jtmLSSv9yc-KYQt3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I absolutely love the app.  Pre-ordering is something that c0v!d brought in and I hope it never goes away. You can also get point which you can redeem for a free drink or food.

My go to is always the cold iced espresso drinks even in winter.  Pictured is the trenta sizes ice coffee.

There's always cheery baristas and the service is very efficient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsIaImHH2YTms9LrT63f2YPEmd8127Ilp5CW76&fid=0x0:0xda8488f7c08cb1e1"],"When":"2023-5-21"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a clean Starbucks with some of the friendliest staff. I always enjoy my pop ins while in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoTvpkJjKy2gQUKUFYm2y1j-jLPkEqS3QZ0DL2&fid=0x0:0xda8488f7c08cb1e1"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly, cozy coffee joint atmosphere with friendly and helpful staff.
Good coffee and good times all round, no complaints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5mVrkqVF2vQ1hNdPa95Wgcm7U8__wbTuHc7Cn&fid=0x0:0xda8488f7c08cb1e1"],"When":"2021-3-3"},{"Name":"Sue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHM0yYl4bHVQ9yeqnOU1L6XNKJyn3c7GCC7g3DCpI6uZE0FZUq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very pleased with the chai latte I ordered. [{"Name":"Hao Jia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3YE00Cf_hNepOiOv4jHg3HYs0vD2d00Cy-FC6WMGXrNKVOOU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I paid for a triple with extra grass jelly and pearl. But they didn't give pudding that should have been in the triple. That means I paid more but got less.

Also, service is bad, no one served for the order in the front for a long time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGUKRQXUT_yNaZsXjBctXme3fHaXwcICUxOD6J&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Tony Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPKcy0N8L_e03kCanD-kbqBYJvghgec1_Wu16Qs-S8YjI-PLg2nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Busy, busy place filled with students on smartphones. Ordered a regular sized taro smoothie at the counter and didn't get a receipt nor a number. Waited to hear my order but never understood what was said. Instead I waited for a regular sized purple drink and there it was. Drink was tasty. Very creamy and lots of pearls too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs053GhYARIlZkEUQOzBj0A9VuWxX9cJbEhTrAv-JU0tcleb_DSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Mango Tango, it was delicious and refreshing would highly reccommend! It was a little sweet with even 80% sugar so I would definitely reccommend half sugar or less from someone that even has a sweet tooth.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKx1lUMjJwmG1oMrZHk2IZV6NFYNNiEeP__qTm&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2022-6-20"},{"Name":"Herbert Camat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKXSkcN5npL56jCqrImwFWlxlBsiSCmQ0Pl7fUB01TSYknRkt_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the Jasmine Jade milk tea with sago! The drink was great, sweet and aromatic! So I definitely enjoyed the drink, the only downside is the wait time but other than that, great place for bubble tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL7WQBv714nyzZl5I5h7Kc1reVFdhfdoe-leUX&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2022-2-22"},{"Name":"Zay R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrcv0nbceihjzzaPr2LIIin5v_Tj9YhzMv8cvDTNxNVU0GSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s my favorite bubbletea store! Offers a variety of tasty and delicious flavors, hazelnut milk tea is one of my favorites. I always have a pleasant experience at this specific location because of the staff (I wish i asked for his name. if I do in the future, I’ll edit my review and mention him). He’s very friendly and always brings up new suggestions for us to try. Love the place and drinks, and their amazing service.

Side note: i did enjoy their Christmas spirit during holiday times, they well demonstrated it in their new style cups for holiday season .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcMG4H31gSZAOcpPkCz25EROggdTN7eQc0kNBK&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2021-2-21"},{"Name":"Tina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAKiC5J1ql1LsLTTfBwgvAj6sVGUusHXghumDKVG9ZTQ8QjcD_1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really great service but my problem is with Chatime’s drink quality.
There used to be a time when Chatime was good.. The drinks are just increasing in pricing and the taste is nothing more than sugary water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQD9IyDo6USwPjt6o1nT0xC6ZSmzkSXZGSMqSP&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"akshata desai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXSK9iNd207mUVBJGLtYtpHF529ifcV5IYuMFcALsPhtvoF8-jKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place! But the chatime employee who was serving us wasn’t in a good mood n kind of rude to us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgL_2fOMj5dFQTyPPraBEAsDAzNB-ALQiPhBH-&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Zoe Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVugLihQu1sa-lPZqQchAx0C3ALlzOLQQDQW7ea7J6LENsNiUE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Made me wait for more than 20 minutes and get my order wrong. I ordered 100% sugar, they gave me 30% , and the tea tasted weird. I worried about their hygienic problem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSWYYqmfXdpZbUs2R9a0_3NwRqz7iy1hXxGq4e&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2022-3-25"}]

title: Sunflower Bubble Tea
descriptions: Cozy, informal venue for Taiwanese comfort grub & bubble/milk tea & fruit slushes in many flavours.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"mickey grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2koY7ZFfBdWpziRjPP5TFVjsrz4r1zt6MPtsM4mBH9nhU6uE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There were a lot of people at the time, but the food was served quickly and tasted better than I expected! The staff were friendly, the portions generous, and it reminded me of home. Highly recommended! I would love to visit again!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0hqq4SC8chLs-fB8kpMAnqapJBr3cPr2UouNb&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"J V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXubf4BA64V16YiH2FLbFkz0cA-ymFySyrMyQMYlXsSONYar4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food:  The Rose Milk Tea and the Chicken Nuggets on Rice were very good, juicy, and fresh.  They were delicious.

Service:  the staff was super friendly and nice.  The person read my mind and gave me the bill right away.

Atmosphere:  the restaurant had a modern decor.  Very spacey and comfortable.  A minor one:  I thought the table can be a tiny bit cleaner.  Overall, it’s a relaxing place to enjoy a meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAZNvavBitPZol4xAn2EW6MMziQ-_VOqmAuYe5&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"JONAH GUTIERREZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDJwsIZcuDpklb2lVoiSHQ3b7_XVq-kzor7O41ogu-0WkvLRqB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've ordered seafoods kimchi and tofu hotpot but they gave me a bowl of noodles with pork. I really want to give them a very bad review but the girl who served me is extra nice. I just hope they'll be mindful of their costumer's order next time. I don't eat pork, just really sad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQvLfA98x1jx3ujuF7pYCk1XRCXx0JSuiRKxE&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2023-6-24"},{"Name":"Sofia Ramírez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5Gv7GhQKTr6wIjsWDgsoxRB5sy8n2zAZsaCjVl9YxsZj8o9GFeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ferrero milkshake and they also sell food, not only bubble tea. This store is great. If you see this on a business way, this idea is better than Starbucks, drink, plus food , plus wifi, plus good location.
I loved it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMitaibHCWIPfygQ_5aYhnf3WcKEwZIehoCKatw&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Sarah Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKe0APUXV93EJQca1UpRUMwngl2-lSt01aqybSz84a0JT9R9dEW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered takeout from here through door dash and on the whole really enjoyed the food. We had Braised Ground Pork in Dry Noodles, Braised Beef Noodles with Soup  Fried Rice with Chicken Nuggets, Deep Fried Fish Cake and Wonton in Chilli Sauce. I really enjoyed all the mains which were tasty and arrived piping hot. The fish cake was a bit soggy and not my favorite though still tasty and the wonton was just in a chilli oil rather than an actual sauce like I'm used to. I think it may have been my husband's first time he had Taiwanese food but he was blown away by all the flavors. I'll definitely order again from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_rdHL5JvVHoK_N7tlp-E_Dn5-EEO5jZxsqUXD&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2021-11-26"},{"Name":"Simran Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8ILWpRNeXGYCVSODIG3nTCRBlxFnf26BAMx24kaLkmFG9uTPU9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my all time go to place since the location is easily accessible from transit. I consider stopping by after work/school after a rough day. Good service and affordable yet yummy food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOohBphWszUmsDkaVFY0GPIcNVczzdcbKbh47AN&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2023-2-26"},{"Name":"Fox Winlock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUXAJ_U7YSM_Ywasu0W86kzahBA8FqafORdPpVgzgSi0x-GA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A wonton soup with 3 soggy wontons. Filling was miniscule. Like a seriously tiny amount of meat filling, noodle wrapping literally falling apart. Bland broth filled with sloppy soggy lettuce/cabbage to give the illusion of being more than just tasteless broth and tiny, gross wontons.

General tsos chicken that tasted like western family frozen from the grocery store. This is not worth 20+ dollars. Seriously what the crap is this?

Won't order again. Can't believe I paid 40 dollars for this trash. Should have cheked the reviews here first.

What a disappointment of 'food'. Save your time, stay away. In an area with so much choice for Asian food, spend your money on something good. Or passable or even just okay. This is none of those.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"hf Tsui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9xTKZmfnh-XclN78dqRTs_xaWhMEitHXFTfVULprsEwaO2dHjuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The three-cup chicken here was disappointing.  Traditionally three-cup chicken must have sesame-oil and basil leaves fried with garlic.
However there's none, the friend ain't deep-fried with skin, and mostly importantly the sauce was too salty.
I was disappointed for this price with such quality.

Fried chicken is ok.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly staff, good drinks, quick service.

Their dragonfruit lemonade was quite enjoyable with the slightly frozen dragonfruit chunks. Although, you can't really sip it in through the tiny opening slot.

The other white chocolate cold brew latte was fantastic. Smooth to drink, sweet but not to a diabetic level.

Overall the environment is nice and there's bathrooms upstairs too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0h6I_cew-gfOb4_o2h2s639_CmtNVrSN_AnOR&fid=0x0:0xefea695ec1f18ed9"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Chris F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5iETqIQBeQI1auEFM0Tc1cLHlBlPg-u_xQZRZgDTvUjh6noO8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good location. Good hours. What you’d expect.  Friendly service.  First time anyone has offered to hear my banana loaf at a Starbucks.  That was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPWz38AawuOX_lWq-sZMwI7FMut1d95_Nrl_6B&fid=0x0:0xefea695ec1f18ed9"],"When":"2022-9-21"},{"Name":"Cathy Knowlton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjKNfxetA-6Nc7Skaku2fo8PLxnVOgSXPafePlBXxx0r-3Alau=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Arrived at 5:30, asked for a sandwich and was denied as was told they were “closing”. It closes at 6. Person after me was served. Maybe they didn’t want to take 2 minutes to heat up a sandwich","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mario Salimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-p4s_ESIV3psypg07TJ-l6iZnZ4tkbky6IGl9Bj-vfdqhsgzv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We arrived 20 minutes before they usually close on Sundays and we were informed that they closed early because they ran out of their stock. The barista however was nice  enough to offer a free coffee since the till was closed. Starbucks employees sometimes go far and beyond to make sure customers" satisfaction is met. That is appreciated. Thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"EMIFA IMMIGRATION","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6kj4ds5jPT16AwZjfIhgd1B3NLj1QsppV-n43lL-TjXQP_90=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very approachable staff. My friend had a birthday and they were very nice and passing him a gift. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Chen (夜典)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzZq9uhq2vR2lG0v1l69cksc_phCGJ-0ErvXA73ElRNLWWuN4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Always closed when I needed it the most. The only time I've managed to catch it when it's open is always when I'm getting off work and heading home to get some sleep. As a result this Starbucks is never there for me. I have only one question for the owner/manager of this location. Why is this Starbucks operating hour so short when it's right next to a 24 hour casino? couldn't this location stay open till 10pm or 12pm at least?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Babak khonsari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOTO13jFuI1-Kg2krvc-IaNUcnjjLBkHnuzyAZXHulvsaZLyZiVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect quiet location. Lots of seats and free internet of course. Good friendly staff. I actually got some work done. Not so many distractions. In a hot day, in a spacious air conditioned Hotel lobby.  Perfect","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Francis Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgfmbUHLwmxF3ATfQGv1RD5eZck6TDnyYt1IZAHB6YDFw4kfEYkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pros: Convenient location with nice sofas to lounge on.
Cons: It's a franchise Starbucks so you can't just "scan" and can't collect points with promotions.
Bottom Line: Starbucks inside the casino and hotel. So it's a nice environment to do some reading or relaxing.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kateryna Konova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXpZ9gT59r8N5Phg4dth6giQHB5KWWU7de2wMWT2rICTrc-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is absolutely amazing! Everything was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The dishes we tried were bursting with authentic flavors, and the attention to detail in the preparation was impressive. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, making it a perfect spot for a relaxing meal. Highly recommend trying their dishes – you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhAloWYNWf-dCAbmF6yU2-oBbPt-f6dIv38suE\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6bbe9e458ecc961"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was here for two meals and didn’t know what to order from the big menu the first time. (They didn’t have chicken knees on both days. 🥺) I tried the grilled pork chops on sticky rice. The meat was very tender 👍 just oversalted, unfortunately; pate with pork floss on turmeric sticky rice. This was good, but didn’t have a strong enough tumeric flavour; creampuffs with custard filling. It was ok; the pastry wasn’t light and flaky as I prefer; salted duck egg spongecake which was very sweet and the salted egg taste was barely noticeable; durian ice cream shake. This was a tad too sweet and didn’t have enough durian; red bean mixed with coconut milk (I didn’t try enough of it to comment on it; Vietnamese calamari. This was so good 👏👏I was surprised; deep fried pho noodles with stir fried beef and greens, another dish that surprised and delighted. 👍; pan-dan tofu with brown sugar pearls in coconut milk. I’d definitely recommend this! 👍👍 This is a very popular Vietnamese restaurant. Dinner time is very busy and reservations aren’t taken. Lunch time, if you get there around opening time (12 pm) is great; all seating is available. Parking is free on the street out front and surrounding. I’ll be back to try more, especially the tofu desserts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmI0465XuFFKN3-dn_EpdbGF1p9fydQSrb6_D3\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6bbe9e458ecc961"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've always had a strong fondness for the desserts at this place. The prices are very reasonable, and the flavors never disappoint. Among the wide variety of offerings, my favorites are the sponge cake, flan, durian sticky rice, and the coconut mix. Each of these desserts has its own unique appeal, and they never fail to satisfy my sweet cravings. The service here is quite standard, and while the environment isn't particularly extraordinary, it’s comfortable and fitting for enjoying a delightful dessert experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAoSc0rrOx7kEAmd29jWvgb3MmPBoTabCMu7Lt\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6bbe9e458ecc961"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Min T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHBCvyhMdMuGm8ISXRxIPWaPtZa7hX9LVxvDW4OOAn-tBBWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had an average experience at this restaurant. While the food was decent, it didn't stand out as exceptional. The place was quite crowded and felt a bit understaffed, making it take some time to get attention from the staff. Additionally, some menu items were not reasonably priced for what you received. However, it’s a great late-night spot! If you’re looking for a place to grab a bite after hours, this restaurant has a lively atmosphere that makes it a fun choice. Must try salted duck egg cake. Overall, not bad, but there's room for improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyQ1ink67GJET37lylHhEUyyXfTrCaJEBEUQb9\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6bbe9e458ecc961"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Robert L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-9tmacw2d7mEoS9jo6IRNi8WC5iGvlOPyb07RToKkYebkGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is good, very authentic Vietnamese dessert place that's well known and very popular in East Van. If you're Vietnamese or has ever been there, it does take you back. They serve dinner as well, but when I went they were super busy, but apparently it's the norm. Nothing fancy, not a high-end restaurant, just authentic food. It use to be a Japanese restaurant location so they kept it rather than fully renovating it. Not important because we ain't there enjoy a view. But, Vietnamese EDM playing as music for was bumping for sure... good for drinks, food, and definitely dessert. If you've had Vietnamese dessert, it's sweet! Don't expect service service, they're busy... There's line ups all the time ok. Not like anyone should go to a place that's empty, there's a reason foe that... 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDi_lcaq17OgRnjK44d6qX25ehZZeYTFcO82il\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6bbe9e458ecc961"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Dominic Ling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9TLZnKngGx2XLsIrFLiNanjwuW-QA60CyuZbYIsfUONjJ0THx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot for late night Vietnamese eats. The menu is huge, there's always something new to try. Had the che thai which was delicious. Cheese bread was slightly sweet. BBQ pork banh mi was flavourful. I'm definitely coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIMDLWiOpQv6PjsckcYmR-X_3Nik_8klyxHt5L\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6bbe9e458ecc961"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Estairia Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmDLygqZ3OT1WagVoz_S7MOF1DNcLc8uEquGumaFc59ZLDHz6l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service here wasn’t very helpful if you aren’t familiar with the food dishes. Also I wanted to order a pate sub but they told me they were out but then several of my friends dishes had pate in it so that was very disappointing. I then ordered a beef stew sub but it came out as a beef stew with a side of plain bread. I didn’t expect that either BUT the beef stew was amazingly good in flavour! The pandan dessert was okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNswyHg7a-2i-XtgvlEUSiOZFOg4xN2M1DYn9C\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6bbe9e458ecc961"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Isabelle Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBjZAJ5N5Vf61U8bAV-vmsfvv8q6XPugQT2Yj1QY3XiGZmEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was my favourite dessert spot I came to during my vacation to Vancouver. Loved the durian desserts. Super refreshing and opened late. Prices were also reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh2wb_bqcLx35fR3Z3cXgK9WiILm7OB6Ok8Qyo\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6bbe9e458ecc961"],"When":"2024-9-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gulbahar Mammetgurbanova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ2P8So5Ugwt-BVdno0AmONX9eDtlEXZfmfVOG_zT8VLu6eNVt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"4 stars because the tapioca balls are not included in the price for the milk tea. You have to add it for extra charge. Not a big deal but disappointing because it’s already over $7.

I got brown sugar milk tea. It was pretty good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdhbBpTkOv74ci93qcEvgCD2Hodx5IfLP2_6VrOW2BSTnVeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was very unsatisfied with the atmosphere, they seemed to have staff who were off work drinking and making a ruckus at a table WHILE customers were ordering.

Their drinks are great, but it’s disturbing that they have a lack of respect for customers and the space, even if they are off shift.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanya Gelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9CtTzxWeKcY-rhYJP54Vs-3mhJ7odpgXdFeE4OARdAq7_6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered strawberry taro milky smoothie and Taro milk smoothie, both with boba. The strawberry taro milk smoothie was absolutely delicious. Never had that flavour before. The taro milk smoothie was good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSkk19xeAZ_7Mx2t52tKoBsDc4wsSAzN_GAjIH&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pearl Fever is a good spot to get your basic bubble tea flavours. They also have a great reward program, which is why I go there the most when I'm at UBC.

With the app/reward program you get a free drink every time you load $40 into the app as well as a free birthday drink. But you also earn points when you spend with your app balance, which can be used to earn MORE free drinks!

My favourite drinks here are the honeydew smoothie with lychee jelly (very sweet) and the Japanese roasted tea/milk tea with pearls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd2aBwApOagMfyLOmRgGIbhBkhSigTOsK_X_TY&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2023-10-19"},{"Name":"H W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiEtu-Pfzzd7vMmnC1lRzmwYGQeuaGu_8hpE004heAd4NBbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good flavours and plenty of seating. Service is quick and efficient, and the place is quite clean and well maintained. Great spot to grab bubble tea nearby UBC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0w4oetl7zFuG88AdcBkChwgQCXXJtU6PvG5KI&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2020-3-21"},{"Name":"EBR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmrgdwHuyw1ojCeFCceHLN9Nahnn19P5GWJ7wJ4iez2uufrprq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The music was too loud, they wouldn’t let my girlfriend use the restroom to wash her hands, the prices are kind of high, but the tables were clean. We came because of the high rating, but just weren’t that impressed :/","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKhvxA19ZD5oRZyDx31GsLGg-lBBwWbGadOejq&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2022-8-5"},{"Name":"Haneul Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSq2DJZGftDd3sBTZ69kYQvP1-9moqG7usfppuTx3bDANtugQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bubble tea doesn’t taste too sweet or anything the pearls are a little weird but overall amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyPUHmlMmAldhknU25GFF2mLme4uokyj2PSBt2&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Vineeth Shankar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyOR0ZUg5adKb4NBcG6CMMRzOEoTL5qRb5vz1uynXMGYsDtHmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good boba tea place. For the uninitiated, they have a very simple short menu (easy to choose) containing the options and the sequence to order. I had the roasted japanese tea with milk and pearls. Ice and sugar were exactly as I expected. I will definitely go again when I am in the area next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4qhQj8vqdNeEmft2ArzSTumOfZx5pn_CP_gXP&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2021-10-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Regina Gentile","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvbaxG6uArU-PM1ZGsBsjSohnDAFHUHmQJ_GJd3YgBGG5EQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had a matcha latte with oat milk and my boyfriend took a caramel macchiato...they were horrible:the milk was steamed really bad.
The brownie that I bought was good but even if I said that I wanted eat in the bar they served me it still in the plastic wrap...and it had a strange white spot on the surface angle...
Despite it all the girl was kind, polite and smiley, and the place was cute.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVHL4bGyLXxUBOfGlFb5N33O4kgltpB_yNTknm&fid=0x0:0xedceefa29ec83173"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Vanessa 貞懿 Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVe4T1KMOhwE494taZRZMpbzjetStEqI_naIm69hoyO07onQrJ1bA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"nice location inside metrotown mall , opposite of winners . service is good . seats got full quickly during busy time. I order a small coffee with oak milk.  Unlike starbucks, Blenze does't charge extra for non dairy milk, which is why I am leaving starbucks ! It is not a cafe if you cannot seat and relax into the aroma of your caffine !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alice TY K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjh-1n-LifIIturHdxk5ABZSWriZjpq2DRCMyp4k_fnyalglYJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"(Update added after BLENZ provided a minor response - scroll down past the line!)

In summary: my drink tasted great but overall impression… I’d spend my money elsewhere.

In detail:
Just stopped in to do some quick work with an accompaniment of a beverage (Honey Oat Hojicha) and to my utter horror and discovery as I was about to pack up, I found a trail of mouse poop and mouse pee along the back seating areas.

I took pictures of my seating area and even zoomed in to make sure I wasn’t mistaking these with sesame seeds…then I brought this up to the girl (Asian in her early 20s wearing glasses) — I had originally asked to speak to a manager but clearly this place is not on the up and up.

This girl… heard me out and she just brushed me off by saying “ya it’s beyond my pay grade and it’s not something we can avoid”.

Listen, I get it, working in the food industry.. especially in THIS mall location (Metrotown) it is something inevitable but as a business is servicing people/consumers with FOOD AND BEVERAGES. Do not lie to my face and say you clean the floors everyday. You can’t lie and say that this amount is accumulated in one single day.

Best course of action is to make sure floors are done both before opening AND after closing…
Please clean the floors… seriously.

This is a food service business not to mention a business franchise. Fraser Health have already been notified about this.

——————
Update 10/16:
Addressing the response received from BLENZ management - it is understandable that being in a mall with a pest issue is inevitable but the responses from that one employee (female, young Asian with glasses) is extremely offsetting and off brand. Overnight accumulation of rodent droppings is something you cannot prevent, I won’t deny that! However if this was something you have already been aware of and not actively trying to do more cleaning makes it very unappealing to consumers who drop in to purchase FOOD and DRINKS. These aren’t products that you can “clean” and “sanitize” after purchase before use.. these are products purchased to be consumed before they go bad.

Again, I know what a single night of rodent droppings accumulation looks like, it is definitely not what I saw and photographed. If cleaning was maintained twice a day, daily.. there wouldn’t be 1 speck visible during operating hours. This tells me and shows me that your staff is not fully and diligently cleaning in the evening as well as not thoughtfully going along the floorboards (if you know rodent activity, which clearly you do not…they tend to scale the walls and leave feces/urine along that trail).

For someone that has dealt with rodent issues both at work and at home for the last decade, please do not brush me off as if I do not know what I am talking about.

Food service businesses need to be extremely diligent and not slacking in any aspects.. this can lead to so much with food borne illnesses etc. oh and yes, Fraser Health was indeed notified and will be having follow ups with them hopefully soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPU7rgPN2OuE1dwe_JaIhuzvnlxi8uY2ZBeO8vX&fid=0x0:0xedceefa29ec83173"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Mich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk4SJkfT35Lr0ZUsPgvMr5zk32J8m9TBN0sQWcp7LTonWmgO0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Prices have definitely skyrocketed, sadly. Mocha went from $4 ish to now $7. Quality is subpar, would’ve been fine if the quality went up too. Anyways that was probably my last visit to the store","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"mini butalia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU5d99kHIVqJcJtG39peK3K7cT3mwv8nLQY4mPb-cgd2FijQIn0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love these cute pretzels with spice I tried first time I love this and thank you shruti for all the explanations you explained all the flavour very well great customer service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2Ki5J3RlYLNGLP58ZcdfyW2l08FmJzLaSUgP_&fid=0x0:0x993dedd70e7d2c6c"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Freshly made pretzels and better to have it right away.
But of the nutella stayed on their paper packaging.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjyyV9WYlaEHv74w4HwW_e9Ho5xOVFYQWzivZc&fid=0x0:0x993dedd70e7d2c6c"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service was good, prices were ok, pretzels were alright but could've been better. I wish they had more varieties. I have a thing for soft pretzels, I travelled all the way from Surrey just for a coupe pretzels. It was the closest location. I wish they'd open one in surrey. I was disappointed by the dip. I was expecting fresh made in store dips like some pretzel stores do. Instead they give you a sealed plastic dip like they have at pizza places. There was another pretzel place in the mall as well but it looked disappointing. My plan was to try each  place but I just skipped the other one as they didn't look tasty at all. I wish they'd add more multi flavors like a pretzel covered in cheese with jalepenos and garlic. Or a pizza pretzel with pepperoni and mozza. Instead of single flavors like garlic OR parmesan OR salt OR sesame seed. It's too simple, needs layers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBY1NrPmN_Ld-TCF-OALes0wrwXkwepdRqi5SH&fid=0x0:0x993dedd70e7d2c6c"],"When":"2020-2-4"},{"Name":"Alisha thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ402s8vzFNRblUcN4rsXKLbx1vqhmiG_HM7xBYKSKNBMWk0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Girl made a mistake with my order. I ordered hotdog n bites but she made regular bites. She looked at me like I was crazy. I did say I don’t mind waiting for the hotdog bites initially.  She looked very unhappy the whole time and acted as if it was my fault and it was a huge bother.  She walked around  Miserable  the whole time.
I’m giving the three stars just because I love the hotdog bites.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J-Anne Aragones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCPH5rV97kx8aqxYzAlBkfIQPpbuNDMnzSc2yBloYdIXrtWvVF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I came back here 2 consecutive days and for some reason they are ALWAYS sold out of the pretzel dog. And most of the time they close earlier than designated closing hours. On the other note, theres a small family business downstairs called little Monk and theyre very delicious. I'd rather go there","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever family comes to town, a trip to Mr Pretzels is a religion.
Doughy, fluffy, light and oh so yummy, these are to die for. An awesome and affordable snack when being dragged round the mall. Totally dig the fall edition Pumpkin Spice bagel which is dope, super yummy I love it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjSLaodHQVZnJYTCBxh5LbKZFgsGpjKQaR_TzT&fid=0x0:0x993dedd70e7d2c6c"],"When":"2022-8-30"},{"Name":"Kim N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbdjDpWyXnvjc80j1Uggeb1c_m_wfTt6lOvg1Z_TeE5AinsEnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got the Italian one and it was really salty. When it was still warm then very soft but once I went outside it wasn't good anymore","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAuMBAvW8qXliihkcEQweE525Zp4x_GTQ_pajn&fid=0x0:0x993dedd70e7d2c6c"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"Jesus Mario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw9EfQQCMzcT2kzd4vT6VNdwHS86pt5SL3ObKHB6HgP1EEqg4Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretzels here are really tasty! Prices are accessible and the people working here is very gentle and kind. There are a considerable amount of pretzels varieties, but to be honest my favourite here are the small bites served in a cup 👌🏼! They are delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe944fNYu9gDv7gNVyRMW1iN1-2KAjwyogIaTH&fid=0x0:0x993dedd70e7d2c6c"],"When":"2022-5-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dalma Bach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8-3XzKDcfXRJW-IpWBSGw4JElCq_5STZQEKjsSi39vyq7Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been going to this location since I was a child, I’ve noticed the food and service the past few years has declined my most recent experience was by far the grossest. I ordered a BLT sandwich which took 10 minutes to make, others who ordered after me with more complex orders and orders with more items came out before mine, when they finally gave me my order the bacon was RAW,  I showed the employees what I was served and they were making up excuses. I’ve worked in the food industry for a long time and would not be proud of serving a meal with RAW bacon. 0/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaRnU0Z4mnrGgCpyBvuOd9Zp_JN_q6jk9Mg42J&fid=0x0:0x77f2ff61c08a5b34"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Is awesome services 👏  good promotion and points 😋I come back because her she is so understanding and patience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPlQE1jBjU2NTiYdfzziHZ5n0lgfjJOmDtGZYq&fid=0x0:0x77f2ff61c08a5b34"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Onkar Soni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnXpnSLlJdNfEKG8uW6dPFVdt_Lp2exx1ij70Zg51BnWM2K-o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location of Tim Hortons is amazing. The staff is really nice and quick. Their customer service also amaze me every time with fresh food and beverages. I have been visiting this location from last couple of months for buying steeped tea and every time they serve freshest. 👍🏻","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"PS Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_g_HTUMcwnap-6Tqsuys0sImUj6xffP3fel-XaM9cPLchwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Orders 2 ice caps & 20 timbits. Cashier was ok. However, the timbits picker was rude. Told her I didn’t want colour-dotted timbits & to pick the bottom ones including the no sugar ones but she picked it anyway. She realized it later when I reminded her, she literally shouted at me saying she got it & took out the coloured dotted ones. When I got back to the office, there were 19 instead of 20, and part of one had broken off into 2. Also, there was no sugarless timbits!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrLkRpBYlisxAlrMd7n8FZiUgFIyoFYCmmnsu6&fid=0x0:0x77f2ff61c08a5b34"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Conner Forseth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuyyAn6tMsFhsn5l6GGfpBkZYCMVcaYNKX_-I0-chy-QMVldjS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today was my last straw with this place. I ordered online and they gave me the wrong order, i go back to exchange it and they offer zero apology and just look annoyed. I ask for light sauce and they still don't listen. 15 mins of my break wasted. I order here once a week and the team here consistently messes up on orders and the customer service is non existent. They just glare at you like you are an inconvenience. This location needs serious help...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv2lCQagJGNS8AgIYCbU5mC_iTObSM6anRNRLQ&fid=0x0:0x77f2ff61c08a5b34"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Aliia Lolieva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRz6jwxUt32yZqWVv8qsVv7NB8upN_oDHsa5DhVBXfApBmVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was disappointed with the donuts I purchased on Saturday, August 3. While cutting one of them in half, I noticed something wrapping around my knife. Upon closer inspection, I realized it was a long piece of plastic. The kids were disgusted by it, and we were just thankful that a child didn’t end up eating it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpbW2iBILuibuqurau5GxbQij858b4Oniu2Oza&fid=0x0:0x77f2ff61c08a5b34"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Pascal Gagnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqkHj9YGg9N-z1gv_gRFjSBKIYi6kus3PBF4HROcZduF7gOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to the Tim Hortons, second floor,  at 7:55 pm on Monday (Dec 9th) ordering coffee for my crew (night shift).
We are from our of town here for the last 4 weeks. Working 6 days a week.

Order our usual 3 large coffees, one medium dark roast coffee and a large tea plus whatever else we get for snacks , to be told that I would have to wait 10 minutes for the coffee!!!!

This is a coffee shop!!!!

Can't we think ahead!?!?!

I was able to get a dark roast once in the last month from that shop!
I lost it to the manager of that shop.

He barred me and I am proud!!

This Tim Hortons doesn't deserve my money nor my crew's money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munim Chowdhury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE8TBJz0hTcBIVBwK1uPUDqd4mCQH8f8v47uBJOZWw27pK1Clk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Your regular Tim Hortons in Metrotown. We had Tim Bits, Chocolate Croissant, and my favorite French Vanilla. The waitresses were very friendly and served us well. The washrooms were out of service, which is a downside. Also, there is a very limited number of seating space and is almost always occupied, therefore if you want to sip on your coffee peacefully, this may not be the place. This is perfect to get your on the go coffee and munchies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX1T6xBK4PoKo0GBOi0nvoegjco0QCyIBVNhLQ&fid=0x0:0x77f2ff61c08a5b34"],"When":"2023-4-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rashmi Sreekumar Roy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHBdmX2c8tDCNofkRcPGqMxu7YOh8-as10Kdbtr-BN6-GMPfuM8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming here. I build terrariums as a hobby and always find  good selection of mini tropicals.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsusRJPVOeVjyjJwR4bgx2x4GAEQx65HAGMkdw&fid=0x0:0xe0d5511d80d8e5e9"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Peter Pi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE5PGU945Veec4SeB9J95Jp77PqoAAraC9q30iKocPjkhJN1kY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff at Gardenworks Burnaby were extremely knowledgeable and nice. All the plants were in tiptop shape. There are a wide range of selection.

We were able to get everything we need to set up our planters with a pair of Mexican Orange Blossoms. Shoutout to Darrell and the kind ladies for helping us out. Super happy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW3ahAJU2XVue9qsoLTfn_FoZUf5_Xt4j7a-Do&fid=0x0:0xe0d5511d80d8e5e9"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Deidrea Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUutwpTcfZUKTs5jf7YxXXOoISr_9o8CMM9MqyCNl6Ehvh_tbyG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such an amazing store, with so many different varieties of beautiful plants for every taste in decor. They even have premade mix plants to purchase or to see for your own creative ideas!!! Lots of unique pots with lots of colors and shapes. Huge outdoor selection of plants for the weather getting nicer. A really great inside store full of beautiful things to decorate your home. My 11 year old son even loves going there to look around!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMiMcvhl0Bqz23F-nfahwswRlYEAUkmafQX_EO&fid=0x0:0xe0d5511d80d8e5e9"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Ryan McLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUPms8M2hY6Qxj68Tle5U0l_wxcvQ9ju2T6HgxIsmvnftNxgp7OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Knowledgeable staff, friendly and always good to their customers. I love shopping here. Always up for a trip to GardenWorks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMQmLPgeRTinjSC05Bwy34mMPrPRF7_0jMLEbA&fid=0x0:0xe0d5511d80d8e5e9"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Stephanie Porter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLP-pZF2oq-RtXkmcwd-pfhpXiNKO0_G0NoGD0zLDsRolosrmIlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paid for repotting my own plants in new pots. Was directed exactly how to take care, what size to get, material, and even diagnosed 2 succulents that were terminally ill and needed to be disposed of outside the store. (Mildew + bugs)
They never ever ever push you to buy the most expensive thing, they steer u in the right direction to buy the right stuff. Ample parking, free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtyJNdM4u-ATH4G-qrEGV26PIuOCm5dkqs9cNr&fid=0x0:0xe0d5511d80d8e5e9"],"When":"2023-11-20"},{"Name":"D Jetfire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfyzLDnqugUB85PLd2XGzzsQ_EfLg-vU-YUi4KwaTyHmKCjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you Gardenworks for organizing and hosting such a festive and fun family event today at the Burnaby Lougheed branch. The kids had so much fun and we also got a chance to pick up some Christmas festive plants to get ready for the holiday. Thank you for all the staff whom made the line up go so smoothly. Kudos to the care staff for pony rides and of course the most lovely Mr and Mrs Clause. Excellent services from staff today and a great experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacqueline Cullimore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKlnPRH8cwIyO0tDI7b2JbyvIMYvQaXVBDyRqRUXJ448GXIrQ9xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My happy place! Easy enough to spend a few hours here if you’re a plant lover! The early summer selection of trees and shrubs in the outside courtyard is unmatched. So many different varieties all well labeled for their preferred environment (shaded, full sun), etc. I went for the Japanese Maples and was blown away by all the choices, as well as variety of price ranges to fit within your budget. I’m looking forward to heading back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7ZUma25t1UoHvD5stTJiBHOC3bzJc42UUOTg9&fid=0x0:0xe0d5511d80d8e5e9"],"When":"2021-6-24"},{"Name":"bartika dutta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxjFpxrYjqtLhAuG4lm-ZcNIBbYGGduA3S5m04EChhzkLwL5L7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot praise this place highly enough. Their selection is very broad and their staff are very helpful. I was looking for Shasta daisies and the staff made sure I got  some although they were quite a walk away from where I was. Some design thinking is already done for the buyers, and they can get an idea of what blooms would look good together. I got some wonderful petunias too! Most combinations of ornamentations and plants are also striking!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNXY55sT5Lc1h5MlufJnjGvGN_d82NK6nrluxf&fid=0x0:0xe0d5511d80d8e5e9"],"When":"2022-7-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kiana (Quxxnie)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbCFwK3qaM68kkeHFuE91LSwAClG5zFekdqie35gm5sjvBumU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Orders being placed after my order have been continuously been served before I even can see my order started.

It apparently takes two baristas to fill the traveller coffee jug.

When I mention I have been waiting for 15mins and have an appointment, it’s brushed aside.

Save your time, go someplace else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rachel Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMbCggxdax3qyjHY545bmL1CIZ9GxPQ6JEsSMZeWpLZXWRIXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Drinks here are a hit or miss!  Most of the time, it turns out too sweet or diluted.  If it's not for the location, I would go to another Starbucks.  I gave a 4 star for service because most of the time if the drink is not acceptable, they would redo the drink.  Overall, ok since it's close to where I live.  I wish they would standardize the drinks a bit more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Haneyya Jameela","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHcWRdK_y2vi68h85HhNPv9K9MxBUW2tpwwwFHjOjugfzgdvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It’s a small kiosk with shoddy customer service at best.  Not a fan of some of the baristas attitudes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devina Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1E7dJvU79ldSPx1U0tZICDNlfPeq1n7o50rPNBoOXAf2-xsI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am very disappointed in this location. I ordered a caramel frappuccino when I received it, the texture of it was liquid as if I ordered an ice coffee of some sort. I went back and showed it to her and she acknowledge it was too liquidy and remade it. However, the second time around was time around was no better than the first. It was still liquidy. If I am paying g $6 for a frappuccino, I am expecting a blended drink, not an iced coffee. I hope that someone will be reaching out to me soon to resolve this issue.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eleanor Palleson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJz3LzWfTMO3ouNcHEkKWZ1wQwjOG0F6UNk5giEbuqnRV8LmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brought my own cup but for some reason used a disposable cup anyways, transferred it and then threw away the cup! Staff were nice but it's obvious management doesn't care about the environment at all
Update: went back and found this policy was changed! Very impressed with their handling of feedback.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LIsa Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdgiWCoXGs-eBH8oe-_AdzLZsWWqnNx_07UYVX_ET1HGHvLcU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to this location today and requested a decaffeinated Americano, repeated decaff when ordered and  confirmed decaff when picked it up and later discovered it was caffeinated. Ugh.  I’m very sensitive to caffeine and this just completely ruined my day.  Won’t go back to this location. Also because they don’t do mobile pick up or use Starbucks rewards.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manreet Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnHCph1CSwjnlUz47H19Snj1SD4LGvP_V_r-mJIkTPFgyCyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sakshi is hands down the best and kindest Starbucks worker I’ve ever encountered.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"shabnam abasi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdWWiofRh2YHk6WguradqniMWuajLa8Kduypo7G9uIp-cl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gurnett made my two drinks even though he had cleaned the machine before the closing. He was super nice.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"guriqbal singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjz358SBu1Ja6V0FiLFLAjYakdaWIa_DblvvJhRp34fv0n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had a fantastic experience with customer service that I just have to share! I was greeted n helped by sandip. She is incredibly friendly and welcoming, making me feel right at home. She was attentive and quick to respond to my questions, which made the whole process smooth and enjoyable. Even when there was a small issue with my order as my coffee was tasting burnt and my sandwich was not made the way i wanted and specifically requested to the cashier about the customization. She handled it wisely and offered a solution promptly. It’s clear that she genuinely care about the customers she interacts and that kind of service really makes a difference. I left feeling valued and happy, and I can’t wait to return! Great job girl","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place was closed for renovations for a while, but now it’s reopened and much updated. However, you still have to wait in long lines just to get a coffee. If you don’t want to wait, make it easier on yourself by ordering with your phone and picking it up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4pYP5zliMEp872R0U3tiDgkZpaNzgGyXNUAw9&fid=0x0:0xf6d6e622f446c203"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"cindy thelittle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPqgQ0j3qXW3Kdt-NBG_A5dKkim-6AtyiHiDggUT-Zi3knkWHPfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come to this location for my quick breakfast, and I have been served by Marietta the past two times. I can say that I love her customer service. Her interactions and responses are very friendly, and I really appreciate her giving such a positive vibe early morning. Would love to see her on my breakfast trip whenever I visit this store again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOrA3rMQwwyZvA5WZw9B4IsXzq0a5c5Ufoh2Jjjk8GsKvBxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I order from here often during work for my break. Service is quick, friendly and always helpful. Even if something is wrong about my order it's corrected with no complaint and swiftly.
Navkiran is often the associate who calls my name and hands me my food with a smile. I wish every Tim's experience is as good as this one.
After the facelift the store got it looks better than ever, and everyone seems to work better too. 5 🌟","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manpreet kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkuInqv_mtU7do6vjE1BAVV6iyiv1Nm6CUv4q1zLJomM6qJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Tim Hortons has one of the best services. Staff is nice and friendly. Coffee is fresh and Sandeep on the sandwich station is amazing. Always make fresh sandwiches as requested Much better than other locations I’ve visited. Overall great location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dhanvi Jariya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL8mY-O7leFrH6n158lgFuzwUljBtY10bHApBzWoVMxVdR0OJj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to give a big shoutout to Navkiran at Tim Hortons for her exceptional customer service. She is always welcoming, polite, and ensures every order is handled with care. Her positive attitude makes the experience even better. Keep up the great work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Kucharek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy9ahucNTJBNWathtl8U4HtwpopSqyr48T0ysu8xozXWEZl4oJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I work across the street and come to this location every morning. I am greeted by Navkiran and I want to compliment her amazing service!

She greets everyone with a smile everyday. She is extremely friendly and you can clearly see her and all the other staff working as quick as they can to get orders out. Thank you Navkiran for your amazing hard work!

Please don't listen to other negative reviews, ANY food court in the afternoon (especially the biggest one in BC) will ALWAYS be busy and one cannot expect an order to be ready as fast as a drive-thru. The staff here are working as hard and fast as they can!

Keep up the amazing work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ramandeep Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKF3pkruLKM3kpPiDeoRSIsArbEslObHzr5VCfUDEBz7FU4iA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I enjoyed my visit here. The service was really fast even it was busy, there was lady her name was Navkiran. She treated me really well. I definitely will come back in this restaurant again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Made my day :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0Jvpc0dQkucx5UeODMIB5I8ppYB9usJ3JoRW6\u0026fid=0x0:0xd83b41074c381574"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Yuu Shinozaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS2Su416he3tvsVQ3WdCEZ0NekOxDVsWwK0Bpg-ksdNjIsB4Wm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had to wait while there was no other customers with 3 baristas and had to ask twice for my mobile order. The cashier barista then took the cookie I ordered and brought it to me without my coffee. I then had to ask again for my drip coffee. Then finally they filled up the cup and and gave me my coffee. It was a horrible experience just to wait for already prepared coffee and cookie.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKslA2q69hoFop1qRNfEj_rUkk_7SDfRbFZXqBcWKZYR3HPcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had such a great experience with the cashier today cannot remember his name, but he had a Spider-Man sticker on his name tag. I wish him success!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4xDiN6UK6poaimdETMqCH9lU5H7my_4vBLyzXlBLPRks6wQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the great pleasure to order with Meghan (with an “h”). Thank you Meghan for the great conversation while I ordered my matcha tea latte.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If your in hurry don’t come to this location, large line ups all the time.. but lots of staff getting out the orders..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODy8uqIfw3KnmDzsFXYwJNwqFqKQPVAmP1kGOZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xd83b41074c381574"],"When":"2024-2-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jade P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvAsgPu7xicHWA-aadTZT1hRCD2encgtCF1M3T4gAIr8oDW3EI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here to get a gift for my friends baby’s first birthday. There was so much selection, we were so impressed! We were specifically looking for a toy attached to a blanket, and we found one! They personalized it with her name embroidered in about 20 minutes, which is so fast for a customized piece. We really appreciated that as we had just got back from a trip and were squeezed for time. The person who helped us was super helpful, and he was very kind too. I will definitely come back in the future and highly recommend!

Also, they had so many jelly cat cute toys!!! 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOt_fwkgnlH7Y0AYWy0CFXng8hB7n4uKYyLYCXx&fid=0x0:0x20b5043f8089c279"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Michelle zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAfFlL7qbdZpn-_D06yU7m4TRhjaYwQecu_kbcWl7oR_BrIUEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Step into super cool baby shop where toy collection is off the charts! Seriously, these plushies are like the best buddies ever—super soft, crazy cute, and made with total love. They've got more than just Jellycat – Bukowski, aka Gabriel, and other cool imported toys are here too. From fun characters to those classics you can't resist, these toys make playtime a blast for kids and even grown-ups can't help but join in on the fun. The doll can also be personalized embroidery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtA6zxQpzZyZWMz4V50o0KFsfMZXHRUTvtFW9S&fid=0x0:0x20b5043f8089c279"],"When":"2023-12-28"},{"Name":"Ellie Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXTZ5Fu6kVEUL7adg2vT_LSE0dxq4FRMFKiqIThqX0YPzlXD0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are a jellycat collector, then this is the stop shop for you!  They always have the most up to date collection, and often I find some very limited editions here as well.  I’ve got a wardrobe full already but I still like to visit here once in a while because there are always new surprises.  Love this little store, highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPwhxms9FYCQ1IsPKXhehjHncd3JNCTzY8sHsz&fid=0x0:0x20b5043f8089c279"],"When":"2022-7-7"},{"Name":"Angela Kim (jelakim)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCGnPlSsBvmkA3wE7va6-eHCK7eSvtvuu9PrhahyDz0E2ydVc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t normally leave Google reviews but I was really pleased by their customer service. I was tracking down an item which only they carried and they made a special accommodation to ship it to me. They went above and beyond to make it a smooth experience for me. Definitely recommend shopping with them!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mozaic z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBymS7Dumo3PTJPLRneEWVOTNcP-mh9f70Mf4XP9FwK64Zlxv-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited babySense boutique, and I must say it was an amazing store. The moment I walked in, I felt welcomed by the warm and inviting atmosphere. The boutique was well-organized, making it easy to navigate and find what I needed.

If you're a fan of Jellycat products, this is the ultimate destination for you. They had an impressive selection of Jellycat stuffed animals in various sizes, colors, and styles. What stood out was the option to customize embroidery on the Jellycats of your choice, adding a unique touch to these adorable companions.

Beyond Jellycat, the boutique offered a wide range of baby&mommy items, including clothes, strollers, toys, books, and more. It truly felt like a one-stop-shop for all things baby-related. The quality of the products was top-notch, and I was pleased with the variety available.

The staff at the boutique were friendly and knowledgeable. They were more than willing to assist me and provided helpful recommendations based on my needs. Their expertise added value to my shopping experience, making it even more enjoyable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFAEok1fDKWRTOTBS15rOXItMCv9vqgIlSp-6d&fid=0x0:0x20b5043f8089c279"],"When":"2023-5-25"},{"Name":"Julia and Luca Maraschi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8wjvERIVZuoTY4yP-sGg2eZJabFhBvGBSQKhMaKJYSZXneA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We bought the Stokke xplory stroller (over $1000) and asked multiple times if the stroller was covered by warranty as it was a floor model and were told multiple times it definitely would be covered by the 3 year Stokke warranty. The wheels started squeaking and we contacted Stokke to get a replacement (should be covered by warranty) and were told that the stroller was discontinued over 3 years ago and therefor no longer covered by warranty! We called the manager who basically said too bad and it was our problem! Please be careful when buying from them as they are selling discontinued items for full price (we got a small discount as it was a floor model but still over $1000)! We are now filing to take them to small claims court as this is absolutely not fair and so deceptive! Such a horrible store and owner/manager!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JI ZHANG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6CQdYr3238Opl-M5CJ000CuPDO0poMXaA9XB2PvYz0y8EFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This store is amazing. You can find variety of jellycats here, as well as other baby accessories and clothes. Definitely recommend for those picking up birthday gifts for kids","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpJdkQyDj4UwD4L3Fk36rG3m3X2opUGqwLYEjH&fid=0x0:0x20b5043f8089c279"],"When":"2022-7-19"},{"Name":"james sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdO2_MxekHZXCyHu1mZnqdpBPxnIz1uCUoupxYIkMmt91yxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best toy store, my daughter buy the same bunny series every year on her birthday 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyDAd68jZKrgaqaSDqtojN0elZ3I0GJBxEmHSt&fid=0x0:0x20b5043f8089c279"],"When":"2024-5-11"}]
