user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Iris and Scott Wedding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjUefdZRNJMcCgmMMfLYQWeR_K3UNo-piHulpCkZYKBV6iOBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sonja, Gen, and the rest of the Hart House team are absolutely amazing. I had my wedding here - specifically inside their event tent - and even with the rain, it was beyond magical. The bartenders were on point, the staff were super friendly and accommodating, everything was set up and in complete sync with my coordination vendors. The food itself was divine. Guests kept complimenting me on the food selections and dessert choices! Overall, Hart House is the perfect place for a lush green and quiet lunch and dinner, for exploring the grounds and Deer Lake, or for a major milestone event like your wedding day. We don’t live in Vancouver, but we can’t wait to keep coming back to Hart House over the years!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFP7vDzX8oIYxooeOgTFgxMEWq_fOdtNlvrGqW&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Megan P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmpi2Cjy1ZUv7EQnoPBoHx8RHeeUNY6hzlrkO_zclHA7Z0LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've loved this place for a long time and have been coming at least once a year for our special events.

The food was even better than before, since the new executive chef joined. We were very impressed by their appetizers, and main dishes. We had seared scallops, mushroom arancchini, ricotta gnocchi with mushrooms, and halibut.  They offered a amuse-bouche that was very tasty and pleasant.
Everything was well seasoned and delicious. Gnocchis melt in your mouth and fish/scallops were perfectly cooked. The scallops and the mushrooms in ricotta gnocchis were AMAZING! We felt the care that was put into cooking the food by the chefs.
Would love to visit again to try other dishes soon.

The server was very nice, friendly and accommodating.
The only thing we missed was the overall service was slightly slow. But the quality of food and great ambiance of this place make up for it.

This is a real gem in Burnaby. You get better food than other casual western restaurant franchises for similar prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXy7i1BpIUiadKaj5xeo8AtN-p0st1PH9_v6TQ&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Alessandro Salaris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrrAFhZ0DWxEznML-_6_HmJZtHRgzEa3bJxENt2tNnWIMlGRMK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location, exceptional service. Dined outdoor, surrounded by plants and flowers everywhere. Our table was facing a giant green yard used by the owners for a wedding party happening at the same time. Lovely atmosphere. Food was great, and service was really top class. A bit too expensive but overall is worth the price. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-vTj-bSHLiFzNYXKnItLYI6MFtistWxOECKWe&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Busy afternoon with a large wedding party on the lawn overlooking the lake. We enjoyed the outdoor dining area. The “happy hour” menu was offered until 5 pm when the dinner menu was available. The happy hour menu was limited but adequate. We had mussels and clams, fish cakes and Caesar salad. All nicely presented and tasty. Desserts were crème brûlée and fruit Pavlova. Both very good. Service would be 5-star except that my wife’s plate arrived more than 5 minutes after my shellfish dish. A couple normally expects to have entrees served to them at the same time. Young woman serving us though was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjJroRJs34SVkyC6BtXuJsBdF3DSweNAFvMRb8&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Edit: we returned for our anniversary. Excellent food and service, and a wonderful night out!

We visited Hart House Restaurant for a work function. We were seated upstairs which offered a cozy meeting room with technology for the PowerPoint. My husband had a view of Deer Lake and commented several times about how pretty it was. Buffet dinner was tasty. I’d love to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlCoBnkkEq4aVMwgRO5YEx4yp0roA9_EC1rJLr&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our dining experience in this restaurant was nothing short of exceptional. This feel-good-and-charming restaurant was a delight from start to finish. The dishes we ordered was really delicious, the plating is beautifully done. It's charming ambience is the cherry on top. You can walk outdoors and if your lucky, there might just be a wedding ceremony going on with all the flowers blooming. It's a great scenery while dining in.

Love, love, love this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfcOig6lBzZReEK-le2YMVUTawL8XutJcU9tHx&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"G C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW20QuW__IfaK4FwuvG_N-_l9xiiBSDQFOta_GyQe9BNR4mDQU3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were greeted by a friendly gentleman as soon as we entered. The fireplace was on; warming guests as they entered. We tried the set menu with wine pairings with each course. We were given a pre appy snack which was a nice surprise. My favourite dish was the steelhead. The fish was perfectly cooked and the flavours worked well together. My husband enjoyed his roasted duck. The servers were attentive and sweet. We were happy and full when we left. We’d definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk1FDX496YJPPsMj-mpi7JFIVMOhXqimacP6AB&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Michelle Kienzle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEPDzRZApZ0TVs_lWHFpNjZ0-OB0yjGNDbbsAlhpoWQYWs0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful lunch. The food was delicious, excellent service and beautiful Christmas decorations. Our group was in a side room so it wasn’t too noisy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQqHqE-1c4hme9ck52j0Uoq-XtlKZUflqDGpPV&fid=0x0:0x373c4eea0847305f"],"When":"2024-12-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mel Cantada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkgqWjDGn03R4bj30M_MvTOJu2PYxoxVStepunkF0vIFy_HA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My nephew and I ordered 2 oreos yesterday Dec. 15th around 6:30pm. When my nephew’s about to finish it he felt something weird in his mouth. He quickly pulled on it and it was a bunch of hair. We were so grossed out and for an $8 drink to have hair on it is soo horrible! Never coming back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu1LRgnOqgK06767h-RbP-tJm0r6GV8UuB8fpi&fid=0x0:0x80d17f29fe798d97"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Satyam Priyadarshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLOlVbLFfo0h8GxZiRJPuUuawUrkBQ4LG7fsLjpJe-6B0rDoMZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Would not recommend. The Handmade Taro with Fresh Milk was horrible. There was hardly any taro in it. Could only taste iced milk, that’s it. That’s disappointing thing cost $8. Very disappointing!

The empty establishment should have been a signal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"2023: my first time coming this year, and i am disgusted 😠 not only were the toppings very little (coco has double the toppings) but there was a piece of debris in my drink. I don't know if it was hair or plastic but it was so gross. I'm scared of coming back now.

2022: I’ve been to place a couple of times now. I think sharetea is much better than 4 years ago. Many things I have previously described are no longer relevant.

The place still has a really nice ambient vibe to it. Not a lot of seats though. But the staff have gotten very nice! No more treating you rude if you don't speak Chinese.

Compared to other bubble tea places in the area, the prices are also very fair. They even have some interesting drinks with ice cream.

Do come here. They are actually authentic. I see this store along with some others in Taiwan. They're good.

...
2018: The customers I see just leave their drinks in the table and never come back. Some are barely even touched. They just leave garbage everywhere in the tables. It’s really gross.

The one factor that made me decide to give this a lower rating was because of the price and their marketing. This is ridiculous! $7 for a drink? That’s a price of a meal at a food court!

We got one of the top 10 drinks from the poster. The toppings and pearls in the pictures looked refreshing. But when we ordered it, not only were there NO toppings or pearls, it was $6!! With no toppings? That is disappointing. They’re lying, with putting the picture of the toppings. If the toppings were included I wouldn’t have complained. He marketing isn’t honest.

As much as I want to go and leave a one star rating, I have to admit that the quality of their drinks are actually decent. The taro drinks are made of real cooked taro roots. I can tell because I’ve had lots of artificial flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7IgD8UPZwTK7g5hWO6oH-cua1EE6tguVlEk1K&fid=0x0:0x80d17f29fe798d97"],"When":"2022-8-10"},{"Name":"Imrahn Remtulla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2MJM_B5TbebiNdg-4f18we2bIG41nW2W965WdcAgDOK3v4_DWDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good bubble tea place. Had the Hokkaido hot bubble tea. Wish they didn't have the clear see through lid for hot drinks. I think they should put more seating. It was full and there was room for more seating. Parking is ample. Prices are ok. Not the best though","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPpKx7dOO6ZxGQK-qCdWAX4_PbDPE0QB7alX6J&fid=0x0:0x80d17f29fe798d97"],"When":"2017-12-3"},{"Name":"Eunjoo Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwqf3iQcug7LuT-j9OBajCiWUxY4n_09frg661kwLA_W1jMGt9hA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered two milk tea. I threw away one of them because it tasted way too bitter. One of them is alsoI've never had this taste before at any shearetea store, but this is so disappointing, and I wasted my money!  I will never go back this place again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnq4U84HfUiIejrD0lzRfSCgrE07lJz2emGl6i&fid=0x0:0x80d17f29fe798d97"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Winnie Richardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFXsKLEgox1OT8E1n5uM1Eff8l7N4HCbqCzEdYPtufDsdFsEYi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Their Okinawa milktea is usually decent, but the lack of customization was off-putting. The drink ended up too sweet for me. And they didn't give me same amount of pearls as other location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_oq5h8aIBZDq2tRalqNsB0U3nVy3ImIj9yy0R&fid=0x0:0x80d17f29fe798d97"],"When":"2021-10-2"},{"Name":"Samantha Pedersen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUirbAQUnLLKA2ZAsK4CUNlowyRbPDPzhY_ydGhpHGP6ZZgvWxS5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been here many times. Overall it's your average Bubble Tea joint. Not really any unique flavors or perks. I find they make the drinks quite sweet, even when I ask for light or no sweetness. Today we had Wintermelon lemon juice, Chai creama, passion fruit and Hokkaido milk tea. They were all good, though the Chai creama tasted like pumpkin pie and nothing like Chai, so fyi on that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq6RldvMbmC0YR4bk4eeZyAj6bQ5wpTYqdweKX&fid=0x0:0x80d17f29fe798d97"],"When":"2020-2-9"},{"Name":"Amar Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKowN3tGXOqBDfEHvl0-4YjOSSJ0dbfPt-HZm4ZXYf8HJSLFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The workers are amazing although they don't have much information about the nutrition and calorie level. The atmosphere isn't all thay good. BUT THE PRODUCTS! I loved the one milk tea they had for about 5$. It's something worth having. Usual wait isn't thay long and average time spent here is about 45 mins","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwkOucw4cANa5Mxv_B5wHbQYKOpS11u6JRRhR5&fid=0x0:0x80d17f29fe798d97"],"When":"2018-11-15"}]

title: It's Tea 乃茶
address: British Columbia, Burnaby, Rumble St, It's Tea 乃茶邮政编码: V5J 2B6
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"zhang tian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUxFRFdpjmevanfjLTOvm1STVgSFp-R5yeHK0c_4Nk3ivdIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Peach cold brew is a fantastic drink! The bright, juicy flavor of peach combines beautifully with the smoothness of cold brew green tea, creating a refreshing and balanced beverage. Each sip offers a perfect blend of sweetness and a hint of bitterness, making it incredibly enjoyable. It’s the ideal choice for a warm day or a cozy afternoon break. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWEeuOFxn9vjtnwlGJFDXbsKs63x4HcE9hUbSo&fid=0x0:0xea9d662cad18fa63"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Shaianne Casasis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVflTGm8iJItU5OIi2vvnAmt0aeNAsLE9-Rruq437_EqjqkFaHH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Underwhelming.

The staff was polite and friendly, and the place was clean, offering ample seating. They had a variety of beverages, yet I opted for what seemed like the safest choice: brown sugar milk tea with pearls. Unfortunately, the drink contained little to no brown sugar and tasted almost like plain milk. The pearls were tough and lacked sweetness. A few weeks later, I decided to give the cafe another chance and chose their fruit tea, intrigued by the inclusion of pop rocks. While the pearls remained bland, the fruit tea itself was a noticeable improvement over the brown sugar milk tea. However, it still wasn't enough to salvage my overall impression.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJShSgCHbmme6GLETHZczdb6MWGsJKCwpKUqZlkj3SXYWukfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We tried It's Tea after dinner, a BBT chain that originated in Changshu, China.

The menu consists of drinks and two desserts (bubble waffle and taiyaki). Drink prices range from $6.00 to $7.80.

- Matcha bubble waffle ($5.50) - decent but several parts were overdone.
- Fruit tea ($7.00) - 50% sugar, easy ice and added taro balls ($1.25). Balls were decent but not too taro-y. Tea flavour was okay. Think YiFang's fruit tea version is better.
- Taro bobo ($7.30) - drink comes with taro balls but J also added pearls ($0.75).

Nothing particularly memorable about It Tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAE7lqsmjdkWebokp-lLxHys1ob3au5QzkbUYa&fid=0x0:0xea9d662cad18fa63"],"When":"2023-2-8"},{"Name":"M. D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGitXm8OKvAE5chPK2xdyqRFObFqpxl72t1AEmmfyyf3sjfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered bubble waffles but received a broken and flat waffle that has clearly been mangled by the store. We ordered bubble tea  with pearls and there was no indication during order that pearls are not available. Only upon pick up we realized that they only had milk tea, NO pearls…
This is far from the usual service and quality we usually get from the store. The store staff tonight (Nov 4) needs better training…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiN0i54oB12GlGnuQC8KW3FyWTDpY3QlyuWXZ4&fid=0x0:0xea9d662cad18fa63"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhlSS7jPz5zCaOBcdduZUQiQLkdoBrNXd3voRg2PZcAC_6HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bubble tea here is pretty good, but the main reason I keep coming back is for their bubble waffles! They're really light and crispy, not too sweet, but you do have to eat them pretty soon after getting it as they don't hold up too well if not consumed immediately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt-xTdVaPqOf1Lr6AInnIS2b0I07bFW1oV4wkV&fid=0x0:0xea9d662cad18fa63"],"When":"2023-7-5"},{"Name":"Anita Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrKjpCHbbgEoMHFGQR9bpYGxjAvml7weUEpSY3XyToZoMD0ExhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soya oolong milk tea, 75% sweet, was very good and had enough tea flavor. However I didn’t really like the barley, next time would just sub it with boba. Cute place and the service was good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWWTVrmLd0AEJZiYJko5AREAlnvgE5fyU5bPdJ&fid=0x0:0xea9d662cad18fa63"],"When":"2023-1-7"},{"Name":"Adriana Ayala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcOkL59_XdKLYKYhUIHii0neTYPZn_tFS3sQPVpSTrnNFSUJ9I6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrid customer service. They he person at the counter was acting like I disturbed him at home and how dare I come to bother him. Was so rude and with an attitude asked if I wanted my receipt when I said yes he almost threw it at me. Great drink but please get better customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPnAaaLFjZaycZQzsGkYKqDFLkgmP-Pd2h4uf4VmS2SPCnyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came by on a Sunday and we were pleasantly surprised with the assortment of teas and bubble waffle choices. I don’t frequent many bubble tea shops and it was my first time having a bubble waffle. It was the perfect crispy light snack that hit the spot. I ordered the mango milk tea with 30% sugar with little ice. I assume all bubble tea shops give you a choice of sugar and ice levels. The one employee was very helpful in explaining the choices to us. This tea shop appears to be a very popular shop for takeout as well. He was very apologetic to a customer who came in to pick up an order that wasn’t quite ready. As we were leaving, the shop became very busy. Kudos to the lone employee working here!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Monica T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfTcr7UpZvrmvtqWfFjBeZIhFRwKW8QZ4OivzWAS6rOFQreQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place used to be good, but I had a different experience today. I ordered seafood and vegetable chow mein, specifying crispy noodles, but the dish arrived with a lot of sauce and soggy noodles. The sauce had soaked into the noodles, and I couldn’t finish them. I’ve had this same dish here a few times before, and it didn’t look like this. It seems like they may have changed management or the chef. The portion was also much smaller than what I had last time. I understand that food costs are rising and don’t mind a smaller portion, but at least maintain the quality and taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_z4cBSY9YT1ABDkdunH1Xa3VpzmouU6Qo45qX&fid=0x0:0xcfda3bd0a6e99e70"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the dinner for 2 and couple of other dishes.. the waiter let its swap one  of the dishes out of the dinner for 2. Which made my wife and o happy they did that.. all in all the meal was very tasty.. the workers are friendly.. can’t say anything bad about the place..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmjzLXNefPSofBkjf-FPr_YohOItvVyB4x_1cG&fid=0x0:0xcfda3bd0a6e99e70"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their honey garlic spareribs and their sautéed greens with garlic and both were pretty solid, fresh, and tasty. The honey garlic spareribs could have been a bit crisper but it still tasted good. The price for the greens wasn’t cheap and a bit high in my opinion but the portions for both dishes were good. Tasted much better than food court Chinese food and up to restaurant type Chinese food standards.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyg8t2rbAMAHjKVX_288aDk6wYA1amQN-TAwYG&fid=0x0:0xcfda3bd0a6e99e70"],"When":"2023-10-20"},{"Name":"Jon Noj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QnxMhGdN39gi_BJd3q4T2iEf3nn8TbjBOu-4vbFHvGKuQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"New management again and they raised all the prices by 2 dollars and got rid of all the lunch specials/dinners for 1 and the specials with rice which were a good cheaper option for one person. They also got rid of a couple of dishes I liked like the Mapo Tofu (although they had changed the recipe to that one and I didn't like so I guess it's for the best)
Probably still good for large group orders of multiple items and for parties but no longer a good option for a quick lunch for one person sadly.  If the recipes didn't change I recommend the Beef Brisket Noodle Soup and their sweet and sour pork.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"PicTsao2","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgSrP8Bsph_CXWaSZ44qGamDFBzT8JaOtpAu46eC9jo2Kzkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't know why there are people giving them bad reviews, seems to me they are just expecting Michelin level service and flavour. This is a family own small restaurant not a fancy restaurant. I love the food here. Always great portion and taste fantastic. I'll come back every week!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Acacia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfZtRyvS02Y-nirNA8KmFkYuuXc-nQka6l-WTTFRPvtHXJYHMv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"it was our first time ordering from this restaurant, so we were hoping it'd be a nice experience and we could make it part of our rotation of favourite restaurants! we ordered take out sunday morning (about 9), scheduled for the same day at 12:05, since we were having people over for lunch, we wanted the food to be ready on time. however, we had to wait a whole 30 minutes after arriving there at 12:05 despite having asked them to prepare the food in advance. as a result, we were late to our own lunch - isn't that ridiculous? when we expressed our disappointment, they didn't even respond with an apology.
we ordered 6 dishes, and the 2 most expensive dishes we ordered they swapped out for random cheap dishes without letting us know - we only found out after we got home. still, the receipt says they made us pay for the dishes we ordered but didn't get! they scammed us.
the food was slightly below average. no one touched the two dishes that they subbed in randomly because it was not what any of us liked or wanted. the 4 dishes we ordered and got, when compared to other chinese restaurants, is mediocre at best.
extremely disappointed in their poor service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terri Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdHMQamP6ntk6cmD8m9VHj4cLgJWNXVSwfy5Jk1_ks8LpnASP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is legit your go to authentic Chinese restaurant! If you know what wok hei is, then you will get it at this restaurant! (If you don't know check out uncle roger haiya 😂) I think it's under new management. The owner works both front and back of the house. I noticed lots of takeouts (10% off pickup) I ordered several classic dishes a d they did not disappoint. I got the scrambled egg and shrimp on ho fun (flat noodles), honeymoon fried rice and deep fried tofu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJE78eZDG-VNOiLsA4u8TugMEW_6R3SRtMr6xB&fid=0x0:0xcfda3bd0a6e99e70"],"When":"2023-9-19"},{"Name":"Cadz0027","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIFUNNJs7scwbkY4PZ16V1bA3H0RJA79HbuipNxcT7YzukKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give six stars for the service That we received today I would. Lady was working alone, but she kept a smile on her face and gave us an amazing service. Amazing food as well.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Deer Lake
descriptions: Set in a leafy park & surrounded by walking trails, the lake offers canoe, kayak & rowboat rentals.
images: [{"title":"All","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipMvv8fTRGjlFCVKIYKjIQWt4PeYQXaJmCscwmgY=w397-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Latest","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipPgeIKX5NvqAzbAdDpVRDoeVrH-_Fs2DN-_vzdq=w447-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Videos","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipNpI1DLaMBc7bJ9V2L-CNlh3z7yxIQE9vGb14Hv=w529-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Burnaby Art Gallery","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipOdSW_qy6OK4U-ibUhTHpt1cq-YknnEJA56Vjl3=w531-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Florence Lane","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipNPFa4Zcennz1u6Z5z-d8_GHIVne_5jejOam3qp=w625-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Shadbolt Centre For The Arts","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipNvnMVkK1ABtB7Nuh-YvWw2mKUbCRmrEkEF-rmg=w224-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Eagles Estate Heritage Garden","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipOMC8Cz2HCo9lUIsMAsXTwytv8GyjM_aji5u5BA=w397-h298-k-no"},{"title":"West Forest Trails","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipM7HRwBFNTaqO4sDQcHB96fWVRGLqnqDZOwkS3M=w224-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Park","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipOfUsDZ50W8nlQFJFtcW6zVnVCg5cgu5klV30Q4=w447-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Century Gardens","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipMTK-_qlhln4nisKcqKt9J8n3aWpQfS1OBb23qf=w224-h298-k-no"},{"title":"Street View \u0026 360°","image":"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipMjxyFxcrp9zipp1Nv139useYX1HyoCk6nmijky=w224-h298-k-no-pi-20-ya0-ro0-fo100"}]
about: null
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jill Panchal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR4h_WfZ0umJRJ12EbtTjT4c21XYgMjf2UsDgA_eBl0Dq90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best to visit in order to enjoy me-time in the lap of nature . Enjoyed kayaking (boating), and the prices are cost-effective.  And it's worth paying.  Not only this, but I'm gonna give 5 out of 5 for a picnic .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyJnfPSGXBNbQ4ycA-8yPsGQF1MeMKVwbS5vi4\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Patrick Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLF-zGQ83z5pjjXkV0kf822DW9RQtMHgVs8ODXBiG0gHzpnaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Without a doubt a gem right in the heart of Burnaby. A great place for a leisure walk, kayaking, running, picnicking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_g_AA67PFK99F5-0qzK6JTJtPDPIly7Q9j-yd\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"John Pozer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe0BvqmYZVSdl8vMzkjfI5nnnXlGPCIuhLYzs9LnFZvwXYyqQh7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great destination for an easy afternoon walk/hike. The loop trail around the lake is 2.7 kilometres (according to signage). Mostly level trails, boardwalks, and paths with a mix of cycling-shared walkways. As usual, the City of Burnaby does a good job of maintaining the park. Enjoy all year round!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrk2a2QH8N62Mgo7Loq7vWIBpvJPey4pnlVnWZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"King Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrz7eSAP4u2IzFwF7xvxADBskZM8H-HIOkAt3qck1OlZh_Y1aZ_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a large beautiful lake in Burnaby. Also, it's a good place to have fun or relax with kid, family, or having a picnic, cycling, water activities and seeing the sunset here. There's couple of path to walk along the lake with beautiful city view. Highly recommended to visit this place. Parking available on site.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvKblxaSLcEZLRjbp-TsbaANFkoEo5_EuqC6VO\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2023-4-4"},{"Name":"Manizha A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC2amaTPsYhEEr9awVR6ZxKWDqTPxYLLvu7b9SO5vvAOcniJoJSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful lake to boat on! We went on one the peak days of the summer, and booked a two person pedal boat for 1.5 hours. Pedaling out from the shore was easy, but pedaling back was  quote a workout. Lots of geese swimming about, Lilly pads, and other boaters. Definitely coming back here again to rent out another pedal boat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2-Ib-a2yOB9wRbq4KDtq1RTZ3uM-AYMeR18bV\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2022-7-31"},{"Name":"Raymond Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV553RsLiHZ376r_cg1t6f6czurhVEFNpCdaEiEdye1imXZUUY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Intricate system of nature Tralee that don’t leave you bored nor overwhelmed. Lots of connects to the urban and suburban areas around the park. Wear shoes though, there is a lot of Goose Poop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrumqfAzVZjb0FI_smHrcXQF8IyETcYtVA3cmw\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2023-9-5"},{"Name":"Lisa T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwStHWH7kO88Zst0q2uRgjrtCwrFaBSFTtBLPK2iypQv9DepSZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a lovely park that holds great memories for me. I first visited with my former coworkers and later came back several times with friends. We had a great time kayaking and using the pedal boat. I’d be excited to return if I’m in Canada again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKG2V5nIQDi2-jVJIfRp3nFpMrcFg1MHRny8KK\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"luke willingdon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhy2vUlE1fLK50Sge_Qb2nCpNlkeJ4VcOtvA5iBdD-sSZgKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite nature spots in the city. It feels like being farther out of town. I like to walk the lake loop, paddle my kayak and go fishing from shore here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzhGG85S_Bu66iGFDKHH7AFzhhZtHThbe-Dhsd\u0026fid=0x0:0xd07159cd01934219"],"When":"2024-4-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"G Az (Joey)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9vWQ_Z44zr2y2Axw1PJrCvSjNgoFBEHJ_rrMAAvf0-82-kOK5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The busy workers here are very busy and don't seem to have time to suggest much to novice bubble tea goers.  Ultimately,  the teas are great,  the ambiance is what you would expect from a space like this. It's quiet but has nice level of music playing in background. Lots of seating for small and mid sized groups of no more than 6.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I don't know if it's just me or them themselves but I didn't have a good as a vibe as I got when I first heard about Pearl Fever.

I mean I do like how it's close to the theatres and right next to the bowling alley (those are huge assets!) but the staff aren't really the

When I came for the 3rd time, there was a staff who was pretty polite. That was a good sign, knowing not everyone there was rough.

Bubble tea wise, it's just too expensive! I have been raving on other reviews on how bubble tea is barely 90 cents in Taiwan while here they are literally $7!

I understand imported items cost more, but for seven dollars you can fill your stomach for more than bubble tea. There are still some stores selling quality bubble tea for less than $5.

Even the toppings here cost more than all the stores I've been to. Sorry, but I might have to skip Pearl Fever next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpDOIfntzkwRLF5YgTNi9oRrJYO62uVrrUFBG3&fid=0x0:0x9f4fa48c993f97d6"],"When":"2018-9-22"},{"Name":"Vanessa Boadu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1_MbfBbfDheTsvRiO4roAPh2HrvIC7JWFws4rRZ_1ChdGkq182A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bubble tea was good. Even though there was only one person behind the counter, he was very efficient and completed all orders as they were ordered","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Kinyua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiivP6qi_imS1Igq-X0Lxul1KjU2-gCPzVQM3Jqso7JI56oS0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good vibe. The mango, taro and lychee was great. Air conditioning was a big plus too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMx_UExtC-T4g5Bf0SuSnzB5lBp9sk7r1CgSMt&fid=0x0:0x9f4fa48c993f97d6"],"When":"2023-7-7"},{"Name":"Anastasia G (Nein)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3RZeZVMeYyJzxWshM-_m8nV-gZDnMZndroiV-wTOtB8GZEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Abby today made the most perfect Peach Ooolong w Aloe Vera and Espresso Latte w pearls...highly recommend this location especially when Abby is working :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Youngjin Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfagh_MoFZTHRMw2gEqH9za2mYbzzztyL0cQdkOOfSrU96hiU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always come here after my volunteer schedule. My fav bbt place by far and they taste way better than the ubc branch. I still cant get over the traumatic experience at ubc where the girl totally messed up with my order. So glad royal rocher here tastes just fine. The services always so great too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcyBvscZ4rZeSwdd6Hm17OMCnRkh1Ln1IiOO8o&fid=0x0:0x9f4fa48c993f97d6"],"When":"2022-11-25"},{"Name":"Jess Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDBzh8dbkC1LzSd7XrpM8gWZ5VmXx8K9kvQQxVQanMubn1WEvT3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Prices are decent! Tape marked on the ground to ensure social distancing! We got the milk tea ice cream with pearls and honestly just tasted like a milk tea slush, didn’t taste ice cream. Wait was not long either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML6ugDdetU4BbJwiDhQGjZiECkOH1Rn1D2KYvl&fid=0x0:0x9f4fa48c993f97d6"],"When":"2020-6-28"},{"Name":"Bryan Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGEaVrxflRTn0TjKxbSkgAWtWOMIXSbjCIC-n3JU0kVQM6gCX4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coffee Oreo, less sweet with Red Bean and Grass Jelly!

First time trying it,  I would recommend getting this one less sweet was a good mix.  By suprise, the red beans werent mushy, Good brew :)

Friendly staff, since it wasnt too busy didnt rush me to decide since there was only the only one menu.

I noticed at the door you can also order online.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN48qErKclQjsC2s68mAKkKZm6ri60i42XFpm_n&fid=0x0:0x9f4fa48c993f97d6"],"When":"2021-2-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a great lake front park in the city.  There are lots of parking while in front of the beach.
There are a boat rental in the beach in summer.
A great place for a long or short walk starting from this beach.
Now you can see many high rises from the beach. It's good for a walk in this area all season.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFLQlG9mUTXbcw4a2cCY84ETNwjme3jcP4lARk&fid=0x0:0x7e66fa8c89ea0258"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"shamsan alammari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoFCFxq5jDr3XEvNwTeyqHduJtrxZ6y5YOQ5f6bg4Nv2dA9oB5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Deer Lake Park is a popular urban park located in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada. It is well-known for its beautiful natural scenery, recreational facilities, and cultural significance. Here are the details about Deer Lake Park:

Features and Amenities:

— Natural Scenery:

— The park is around the picturesque Deer Lake, surrounded by lush forests, walking trails, and gardens. The lake and its surrounding area are home to a variety of wildlife and birds, making it a great spot for nature enthusiasts.

— Walking and Biking Trails:

— There are numerous multi-use trails throughout the park, ideal for walking, jogging, and cycling. The trails provide stunning views of the lake and the surrounding wildlife.

— Recreational Facilities:

— The park contains facilities for various sports and recreational activities, including picnic areas, playgrounds, and fields for soccer and other sports.

— Cultural Institutions:

— Deer Lake Park is home to several cultural venues, including the Burnaby Art Gallery, which showcases contemporary and historical art exhibitions, and the Shadbolt Centre for the Arts, which offers a range of performances and classes in the arts.

— Historical Significance:

— The park's history is intertwined with the Indigenous peoples of the area and has been a site of historical significance over the years. There are often community events and cultural programs that reflect this heritage.

— Events and Activities:

— Throughout the year, Deer Lake Park hosts various events, including festivals, art shows, and outdoor concerts, attracting both locals and visitors. The park is particularly lively during the summer months, with many organized activities.

— Wildlife Watching:

— The park offers opportunities for birdwatching and observing local wildlife. The diverse ecosystem includes numerous bird species, as well as small mammals, making it a popular spot for nature lovers.

Why it is Famous:

— Natural Beauty: Deer Lake Park is celebrated for its stunning natural landscapes, providing a serene escape from the busy urban environment.
— Cultural Hub: Its role as a cultural center, with art galleries and performance venues, makes it a significant location for the arts in the region.
— Community Activities: The variety of events and activities offered in the park fosters community engagement and brings people together.
— Recreational Opportunities: With its extensive trails and facilities, the park attracts outdoor enthusiasts looking for activities ranging from casual walks to sports.

Deer Lake Park serves as an important community space, blending natural beauty with cultural amenities, making it a cherished destination for both residents and visitors to Burnaby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9ytisheTVRKGifr85zgn0m7sXDFIuOX3JE0aJ&fid=0x0:0x7e66fa8c89ea0258"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Karan G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHnaYAUfXLOll-jyGD0cQg8ik5kQPLJ6xZwcucjstoxkvtTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love coming here to walk; the park is really beautiful in the summer and fall especially. Lots of wildlife like different birds and amphibians. The bridge/boardwalk they have is very nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-X3L_JzBHPLqYtXcVz47fqoxkObGBie6aXb1-&fid=0x0:0x7e66fa8c89ea0258"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful park with lovely gardens in the summer.  Just came back from a walk there even though it was cloudy and began to pour. Still can be a nice, quiet place to sit and contemplate when no one around.  A popular place for summer concerts, and arts and crafts lessons, a theatre. So much in this park.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ3yqIItRCUfHknOQfBaw8tilykBW9R18Lnn9o&fid=0x0:0x7e66fa8c89ea0258"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Juan Sebastián Melo Jiménez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoWOtFh-DXfkcb5bu2EjcKj54HN83zCpBAJ3uu4ouTudQk94CX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a big fan of this park, whether I'm going for a run or a walk. The view is fantastic, and there are convenient amenities like parking and restrooms near the waterfront. While it may not be the best spot for swimming, it's perfect for a peaceful and relaxing afternoon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxsTIHmBnEZd0w0GQDqOnGZI12yS62o9h0PNe9&fid=0x0:0x7e66fa8c89ea0258"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"H & A Art Studio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBqKLoqP-loJYoSAWxRzlfJ6vjfpxpeU4zsBIgygIdlePbbFA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite trails in Burnaby not only because we live very close but also that it’s have a big and beautiful trail that you can go with kids and elderly people, they are next to Burnaby Village museum and Art centre where you can find bunch of activities, they have a playground and nice small beach where you can see local ducks and geese and rent a boat to drive in a lake, in summer they always have a bunch of free concerts that you can go with all family and friends, lots of free parking oh and also coffee shop inside the main building of art centre.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxWpC0MI4GmeNCWAbjm0LH166_qRy4gFwrKkz7&fid=0x0:0x7e66fa8c89ea0258"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7Nmp3LTjIJ6rM_ROG6atmG3OUzs9WVuGJWzqlYJ2zXzXnhko=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this park so much! You can walk around the lake and see some ducks, turtles and lots of birds. There are wooden walkways and little beaches for having a break. Also you can rent canoes, kayaks etc.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM776X3cdqmMnwRwWJovwt7nBde2yJNg84RtfCP&fid=0x0:0x7e66fa8c89ea0258"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Craig & Cleofe Proctor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdGQnDDFsT2gTOqbvbVkTO_ouha0GzicuG6MjQVok1M2l73A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Deer lake park has always been a favorite of mine and my husband 😍 to go for a hike around. The lake, the beautiful nature walks so serene.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwoRG7iMDU93uU6nN0baOzJwNOm5cQlm4rTbks&fid=0x0:0x7e66fa8c89ea0258"],"When":"2024-8-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sybil Bulut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5A17qbTOh87CsQkJ0JpYXp0UdKzDGKtjXgWwMdyUlUNGY-wA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I’m paying $15 for TWO venti coffees, I EXPECT TWO venti coffees, both $7 drinks are only 2/3 full. I wouldn’t be upset if it was like an inch from the rim because that’s reasonable, but this is super unacceptable. We hadn’t even drank from them yet- we could feel they were extremely light so we wanted to open them up first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJcmTBKWAhOmug8PW6-cJRiKlk3AKGc9ENj0IX&fid=0x0:0x4348892232f8aef8"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Karen Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXchMPPAN3zqOoag_ixABnvIJMH6A1alhdVdwJdZOdnJvvZotnpUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Grabbed a coffee because my friend was running late. My Barista Shela was exceptional. She was patient and gave me a recommendation to my existing order and it was super yummy!

The reception at this location was a bit wonky so I had a bit of a challenge in getting in to my app. She suggested me to use the public wifi!

Thank you Shela! You were amazing 🙆🏻‍♀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2czJdCeh7Bg8uzG1gnb4KQG70A0BpIjodQ25E&fid=0x0:0x4348892232f8aef8"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Thomas Peake (MynameisTommy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxMJkxu3ap6jMjdmePi_cgqnH61O6h4kmoNmLKsmOUI54z-aXteQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I don’t know man. To pay 3.50 cents for a coffee, ordering the same coffee at other locations perfectly the same order but then come here and notice that not only was worker passive aggressive. But did not apologize or speak the fact that they did not make the coffee properly.

It’s 2024. Why can’t we make our own coffee..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh my word..  I thought I'd go on a whim and try a cold beverage for the first time and so stoked I did. This is now my favorite coffee!! Got a 'Cold Brew with Cinammon Almond Foam' and customized with a splash of soy milk and cinnamon powder topping. Absolutely delicious!
One of my reasons to not hesitate this time was that I saw Starbucks have now ditched the straws and have fully recyclable take out cups! Finally, I'm so glad they're doing their part and changed my decision on cold beverages.
Convenient mobile ordering in advance and pickup from the joint is super easy, convenient and allows a lot of granularity when customizing your order as well as COVID friendly/collect some loyalty points for your troubles. Make sure you check the offers in the app before ordering as you need to activate the offer before committing!
The staff are awesome, skilled baristas and extremely friendly. A fantastic location outside the skytrain station, comfortable, clean and well maintained coffee house with nice restrooms. Unfortunately no indoor seating due to COVID, but there is plenty of outdoor seating available!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5dDJKMQOXW5T9nE2aMjqSlrx-Ffh1-wlm04eh&fid=0x0:0x4348892232f8aef8"],"When":"2021-2-4"},{"Name":"Gurpreet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrR9f7DMrg_iWaySW1y8d_Co_us7ZcQ5OVV8UvdG_iH15zGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst location of Starbucks I’ve ever been to I waited 20 minutes just for my coffee. The Asian girl working there is way too slow and was taking 15 minutes just to make one coffee. If you know there’s rush hour why only 2 employees were working there? Awful service would never go to this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Chambell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5Fq3vWFITYJrrv3a3z6b5jnD94_tq_zMv1IQyt0ffTGvzvw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love their music, but it's wayyy to loud on the east side of the coffee shop. It's blasting everytime I come in, to a point where I actually just leave and don't stay for very long. I absolutely love their choices in music but it's so hard to study/focus when music is blasting so loud. In addition, there's a total black out zone in almost the entire Starbucks; calls don't even go through, and wifi/data don't work. It's been like this for like 3-4 years - don't know how or why they haven't fixed this. It's not just my devices; when I've come here w friends - they've shared the same issue.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"PLAYA PLAYA Studios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6CE1c2sT_o6375D08yi2FTr2T6vkzV4U73QserhJXZnFn7u6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sensed a bit of hostility from the workers, seemed too concerned with my presence in the store. Food and drinks were great though!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sumaiya Hossain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfgMXtqbMn3ZJZSZnczXmBg7n73cK3UZZUFJkpjeYu-k9SrUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to get some coffee for me and my family. I had a fantastic time at Starbucks, and Naimul, the assistant manager, provided exceptional service. He's not only kind but also incredibly efficient in his work. Will definitely revisit the store .","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nelson Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMvSq7-l8Kje4bUGcJFo_gjx31JEZujbDf7RAmASmnqxtIa8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bubble tea. This Coco location addictive, haha

Brown sugar milk tea was spot on. Service was friendly. Cafe clean and accessible by skytrain

Once the new tower goes up. I expect this place to be crawling with new customers

Much better to go here than the bubble tea cafes in the mall","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv2VTPKDjoy4kVGdUDkNMk7OmnfiNH0Kmw5wPW&fid=0x0:0x34a7af58f2aec9b1"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid 4 of a bubble tea. Not too sweet, good size, decent price, just a bit too milky. No seating area, but there is a small area to stand around and have your bubble tea supported by a table. Plaza is small so there is limited parking. Order and service was quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnxDyo141maF5UDkOcErL7gBkB2UQKW9tqejn_&fid=0x0:0x34a7af58f2aec9b1"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"Arjun Tyagi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWopm7CB27Brsn2nZf_ZcGMYA1rC2xZn0gFS2Ev_B4zUk8mX8MoIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has been my go to work from home treat during stressful long work days at the desk. Usually order some for my family to try too. I mostly order via Uber Eats but the experience has been consistently the same in person for take out too. Note the parking lot is often jam packed. You are better off parking nearby and walking.

Love the roasted milk tea with pearls or the standard milk tea with pearls (simple but classic). The bubble gaga is also a hit. Wasn’t super impressed with the mango slush but that’s a personal preference nothing wrong with the drink flat out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-rB0PykgQT5tttAWtrRgI8kYo-s9LBFzM1eD9&fid=0x0:0x34a7af58f2aec9b1"],"When":"2021-3-13"},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place! Lots of others including myself are so excited for a coco to finally open up here.

The staff are SUPER friendly, the washrooms are so cool, and venue is clean and tidy. Too bad the customers aren’t as friendly as the staff though.

The price is actually really good. It definitely beats nearby bubble tea places like Shiny Tea, Share Tea and Bubble World. Plus, all the ingredients are actually real.

Ever since their launch, Coco has failed to disappoint me (except when they're closed). If you're looking for a bubble tea joint, I highly recommend Coco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP230Jgj292Y5w6I48wRdI1jhr6A8-bLcCzk2G&fid=0x0:0x34a7af58f2aec9b1"],"When":"2018-4-17"},{"Name":"小温哥华生活","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsk5Oez3wBhmCP9LB_qFLXoam7lX64eRbhnaZ6rrHCGKGN4Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tea is good , but why put six tea in one bag really heavy and can feel the bag too full","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbPs_xeQoQdoxlu9kPGAx8qpqwfrMYOqq9eYMK&fid=0x0:0x34a7af58f2aec9b1"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Weichu Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVji79paFZcmHacRWpvbCXTAxIKVPRS98s-_sWbY68UXBm9dNlE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I often visit coco, but near the burquitlam station one. Today is the first time I visited this location. But the service is sooooo bad! I ordered coco Mike tea with crystal pearls, but they made me with pearls. And when I drove back, the one who made it was so rude and didn’t say sorry until I asked her to. She also didn’t have a good attitude when I ordered it. I feel really disappointed about her. When I came back, another guy helped me to deal with this problem. She just hide behind him and didn’t say anything at all! She gave me a very rude feeling and her facial expression was weird. I was talking to the other guy the whole time and she didn’t come to the front. The guy was very nice but I want her to say sorry. The guy told her to do so and she said sorry but I still feel she doesn’t think she’s wrong as if she just put the wrong topping and that’s not a big deal. This is not how things worked. I’m not a mean guy to criticize others for their tiny mistakes, but I do think everyone needs to face their mistakes and take the responsibility. If I came back and she treated me very nicely and not hid at the back all the time. I would definitely not be very unhappy about this incident.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCXp0CQ8Oiyg0awuUFTCNRPhhq3hLN34l_LBeJ&fid=0x0:0x34a7af58f2aec9b1"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Arthur Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxlxYPFkvC81vA5tasND7__T2ksVDw4UlwiyGw0M_hn9habTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clean and light floor.  Dinning area with tables, chairs, and music provided.  Drink (tea) taste not bad.  Serve speed is pretty fast.  Employees are nice and friendly.  Public washrooms available (pretty clean).  Free parking lot available, but very limited.  Couple dinning options available at the same plaza.  Skytrain station, small shops, and other shopping plazas are nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_T9vZw3MeYu7vlqyUxqy2qKP0qOXfAfaSvd_1&fid=0x0:0x34a7af58f2aec9b1"],"When":"2019-1-18"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"May 10, 2021 update - I'm updating my review from 2 to 5 stars. I was very impressed with how Coco handled my feedback below. They were receptive to my review and took action to speak to their staff. I've been back twice since and have been greeted by friendly staff.

***

Bubble tea is great. No arguments there. Roasted milk tea and Jasmine milk tea are my favorites - very flavorful. But the customer service is not up to par with other bbt places.

I've been to this Coco location several times and the customer service has been okay. Not the warmest welcome, but hey, its bubble tea, not fine dining. But at my last visit (April 25, 2021), the guy behind the counter was just rude. He huffed and rolled his eyes when I checked my phone for my full order (no other customers were in line and it only took about 20seconds to double check), he didn't repeat my order before I paid, and when I pointed out a mistake on my order (ordered 3 drinks, 1 cold and 2 hot), he didn't say anything, rolled his eyes and spoke to the lady making the drinks. He then walked to the back with another coworker and was out of sight while I waited for the lady to fix my drink.

I may avoid coming to this location and go to the Coco on lougheed near Brentwood instead.

Also, my hot drinks had the sealed plastic on them instead of hot beverage lids like other places. Thought it was weird to use sealed plastic on a hot drink. It could easily break because of the built up pressure whereas removable lids have small vents for this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8jl85_5wmLsu_M9bidY4tiv5THacleh3JjwrC&fid=0x0:0x34a7af58f2aec9b1"],"When":"2021-4-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Katarina Claes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeAi_brwli38VcynmPbq3tSsAb1Zwh_fu9TUZ2DWTSX1KGvRY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pretty average cafe. Stuff was a bit overpriced — but to be fair that’s every cafe nowadays. There are a bunch of unique and cute drink options, but upon actually tasting my drink I was underwhelmed. It basically was just your typical coffee with syrup. There’s a kiosk to place orders at as well, and the interior was cute and clean but nothing to write home about. So overall mid, not terrible but not amazing either. I’ll probably come back and try some of their other lattes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnhhMHtXwgVQqHMaYWFJljq1_NFR9UrrS06WB7&fid=0x0:0x7346b690e992094a"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Vic Yung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjSUFpvFSwHsCrywPzGZzN7WDhV8Ljlj3YECw07iwjqMR_leW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went on a weekend late afternoon and the place had a number of open tables. People that were there seemed to be working/studying.

Prices are reasonable and the menu has a number of standard options and some seasonal drinks. Drinks were made immediately after ordering and were quite flavourful. The tiramisu latte had a good balance of sweet cream and bitter cocoa powder.

Would recommend for a quick visit or as a quiet space to work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMADwH5FiC9HGIBjBqKx8xVrNadMciHNs9nkSB9&fid=0x0:0x7346b690e992094a"],"When":"2023-3-25"},{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"😄👍
-Staffs were nice.
-This cafe use JJbeans bean. So coffee tastes good.
-Near station.
🙂
-Some desserts seem to be bought somewhere and heated up in stores
-They have some parking lots but not many.
☹️
-Some wooden chairs are unstable
-There is a washroom, but there is no gender distinction","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORRIu8NcDB7dj--u72qlAUvYCAjS8Wjdpotfs&fid=0x0:0x7346b690e992094a"],"When":"2023-5-9"},{"Name":"Zahra Tejpar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1CTlu2lI8PQ8gnAmixjyIsCtSXmQKDl1rHjt5y812Oda0Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’ve been to coffeeholic a handful of times. I’ve honestly really enjoyed it every time I’ve good. The pastries are quite delicious and the drinks are well made. The cafe itself is very laid back and relaxed. It’s a perfect spot if you wanna get work done or studying or just come here for casual coffee with friends (or on your own).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlc-wjG3UHdryG3mrS9VB6dCW298XjJhh0cs5Ug_pLF-MmF7TE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very special place, with wonderful people, and a great vibe.

After trying different coffee shops in the area, this is the place I ended up settling into.

Big fan of their Cappuccino and Americano, they have a great selection of specialty/seasonal drinks as well. Highly recommend trying their Macarons. The Banana Loaf, Financiers, and Grilled Cranberry Chicken Panini are also very delicious.

Very pleasant and hardworking staffs, clean space with ample seating, and free parking available outside.

If you are looking to enjoy a nice cup of drink or dig into some tasty food while being around good people, this is the place to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKMz7OhNIQTkJijiUwYr6SHmcpY7zPUdU8mMhX&fid=0x0:0x7346b690e992094a"],"When":"2022-2-9"},{"Name":"Ben Moussadji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIh2TnUqsdxST9Q0C4A7CeIkoB5SygfmYbuvbIplvlFUB2N1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The coffee was good. I placed my order through a terminal, like at McDonalds, which was very impersonal. I was going to order a baked item too, but I didn’t trust the photos on the terminal and there were only photo cards in the display case. All of the ads and pictures on the windows ruin the cosy atmosphere inside and give a bad impression on the outside. The girl who passed me my drink was wearing a mask (no problem) but then slid the coffee towards me by putting her entire hand on the lid, where I was going to drink from. Not great if you are concerned enough about Covid to still have a mask on in late 2024","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rohit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa1AUK8KUSf35qiTiWwRyxDXMPLHjUI-FrIZqmS6UDVePLO0we=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's the perfect place to spend a rainy morning.
The ambience is just what you need for a quiet time by yourself or just catch up on work on your laptop.
Service is fast and the lady was really polite.
Recommended: Tramisu Latte, Maple Macchiato","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlfdjFc9Ki6wFbcJp278RxWgSCtkD5Kit6ANSm&fid=0x0:0x7346b690e992094a"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Mo shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaDex7yryYUe9uR_hXC1zNAMFK5TF8jZMXLcZ7fBkni13tfpjgSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great cafe with a great location in Lougheed area. Coffee was absolutely delicious. They have a great selection of baked goodies and sweets. Their macarons were super fresh.

The atmosphere is nice as well. Lots of windows and open space with distanced tables and seats. Staff is extremely friendly and welcoming. Student-friendly with plenty of plugs available no matter where you sit.

One thing I’d like to potentially see is some cushions added to the wooden seats along the main wall to add more comfort.

Overall, Great. Definitely coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_ZBoyWefIqKgvI7i8VAksomqbEF5-Fkw-EZz9&fid=0x0:0x7346b690e992094a"],"When":"2021-3-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehran bakhtiari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX52_I8QBEvpbwP2DsvccLDQ1hUjTB0qEjwNL_660Q7Wjozcaqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"3 months ago, I gave a 5-star rating to this Tim Hortons branch, because the few times I came here, everything was great, but in these three months, everything has changed and it's not the same anymore, and I had to change my 5-star comment today.
I will delete and replace this comment.

I ordered a pizza today, but after 15 minutes, no one served my food when I asked if my order was ready.
They just realized that they forgot to make it and without saying a word or apologizing, they started preparing the order and laughing.
This is a disaster.
I hope the manager of this branch sees my comment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcV-3a6hA0LrEar-vKdLfjNpjYtw9EqwUkVTZy&fid=0x0:0x3243319e59291cc4"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Mr.J'S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-e8rjz6kQF92n1F1aire7WYQoeTlkimsRuRCMV5xPWerPo6IPuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They never follow instructions… poor service, shelf is always empty…. I ordered double double … taste like nothing .. there is no sugar. They don’t stirred the coffee just fill it and throw it on the table. Customer service is very bad in here… always out of stock especially no pastries. Why to waste the time in here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVH6kwe2wQeqCVBHeASxVOVyvvLfU6-7YRaP93&fid=0x0:0x3243319e59291cc4"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Mariah Pascal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL9JSELKsrgtMS0rHzeE0njrDPLVGqYa0zIuek5QC463CbJdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Staff rushed us to order.
Asked for a cookie, and she broke it when grabbing it, didn't apologize or grab it.

There was also almost no one else there, and she still put the drink on the other side of the counter, instead of where we were clearly waiting.
And none of the foods in the display were labeled correctly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm2pff0n2fb2mLPzm4Z9Pocp86yWtQpF2KeOWT&fid=0x0:0x3243319e59291cc4"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Jarome Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjxpnfunj9zwZNmDYRACMAjnwUM0-I-LHLjX67THEi3Gt7Zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I've been going here for the last 2 months working on the new towers across the street. Service had been fine. But last few times have been drastically worse. Please explain what a dairy intolerance is to your staff. Milk alternatives aren't flavour shots to be added into drinks along with the milk your provide for free. Someone on you staff messed my whole day up yesterday, after I repeatedly told them no milk. On another not also throw away the expired produce, out of last 5 sandwiches I've bought 3 have had mostly black and bruised lettuce on them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KRUSHIL REDDY","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuZXm-MLjAJXTwifm8l_VwHUNttp6PpFfXMPJv1Q9rI6GN6221=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Late service even though the store is not busy for online orders
Staff is also irresponsive and careless.
And finally got handed over the wrong order after 20 mins.
Very disappointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt5BosvykewZrnD0U3SMa6hHMMr7ct_oEtcjCU&fid=0x0:0x3243319e59291cc4"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Jasvindersingh Thind","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNh8FD9BDVtOxi82soPPsmKslynbiX8FXyTyL9UHX1OX-HPywP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a sweet staff and best customer service , they give me fresh coffee and make tasty sandwiche. Just wow. Keep it up guys. Lovely service .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Masoud Namini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyzGNJQKem3ejbb7u6A7OJR42aqVHPF-HqCcyfzncen43eOOY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The washroom at this place is in terrible shape—so much so that even a good cleaning probably wouldn’t help! It’s old, dirty, and really needs some serious attention. On top of that, I ordered a sandwich and a coffee, but neither came as expected. I had requested cream for my coffee but didn’t get any, and the sandwich was made with the wrong type of bread. Very disappointing overall!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yuvi Salana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIZfVoxPAxniUFu35-ooRDNvilZmZ9jA5ey8bmXvzQa0Doiboq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Firstly we ordered 2 mocha icecaps but she gave ice coffees and then she said it was her fault and make us mocha ice caps but very less whipped cream. It was like a simple icecaps. Why the hell the orders were not prepared properly and wasting time","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Boiling Point
descriptions: Counter-serve chain offering Pan-Asian hot-pot soups, desserts & tea in a relaxed, chic setting.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun and unique hot pot establishment on Kingsway. Good value and tasty, with quality ingredients.

One caveat is that this place TRULY embraces the idea that your pot better be hot and STAY hot... there is no dial to change or turn off the heat on the heating element below your bowl so you're in for it once its lit.

That said, some welcome comfort food for the winter, and the portions are quite big. Recommend going for the double meat as it still runs you under $30 with tip which is good value in this day and age.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvRYf3_J50YMONkY_5kxnbHK6rGngYwJsAZhkH&fid=0x0:0xb5e1aba68aa033f2"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Joanna Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWolcjmld9gF3v6DkaAWVH8shgENhbGrrRuqb_2RSUD8H4muTAvMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's been a few years since I've been to boiling point. It did not disappoint.

There was a lineup when I get there, as usual. It went by fast which was good!

The service was great. The food was tasty as I remembered it. And it was nice to see them so busy.

I'll definitely come back more often as it's getting colder.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqako-XpUOxBs6beFXLPGcZ-q9C14j1v6eiK6q&fid=0x0:0xb5e1aba68aa033f2"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This used to be my wife and I's go to place for hot pot for many years. It has been busy for us plus so many new places to try out  so we come here couple times a year. Food quality and amount here has been always good and always consistent.  Their wintrmelon drink that comes with the meal is my favorite, not too sweet and hits the spot after the meal is done. I was surprised that the place was at 30% capacity at 12:30pm on a Tuesday.  It used to be always so busy.  I'm guessing the new Hot Pot places with their all you can eat experience is taking over. I still like Boiling Point overall for that quick service and convenient lunch. $44 before tax for the both of is still considered a good deal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOps7yR__zt3FgKSsOIRwIX7Toue4mRq_vt8Uye&fid=0x0:0xb5e1aba68aa033f2"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"cotton candy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMmoOGXJIlT8jx0uCPFlNxGb2g2JZ9w1U-ngpkfzafqh4mlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Restaurant that I've lived in Vancouver more than 10 times. The hottest level among Koreans is not spicy at all. If there's an ingredient you don't like, it's good to take it out. But I don't recommend the drink because it's too sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgKf-5YshrwvFPSTJPqnUXloajARxuQcWL6j4E&fid=0x0:0xb5e1aba68aa033f2"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Aneesh Vaghadia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWrL7cKUXjPtxgV-J_aqDc0U8QhiCuyIUBtGHmUeqQs8V-GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Boiling Point is a staple of the Vancouver food scene for hot pot, well known for serving over an open flame to keep the soup, as the name says, boiling hot!

The food is great with generous portion sizes. The beef hot pot had a fragrant broth with a healthy amount of meat. You have an option of rice or vermicelli.  With recent price increases, you pay between $22-$26 per dish for dinner before tax. Of note, they do not accept AMEX.

The servers come by often to provide additional broth as needed. The service generally is attentive and pleasant. The atmosphere of this location is a bit drab with minimal decor to go with the concrete floors. Despite the name, it doesn’t exude a warm environment. Overall, this remains a great place to get a hot bowl of your favourite hot pot and spend time with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9u3JJiPu-O3aBhe2hptV9IFGxDUN9fdGxfak&fid=0x0:0xb5e1aba68aa033f2"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Leo Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV78gypnX32r6jQsRuQlRIVFHhAi8zcL_MPZa21vA3sL8jGIkFP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ate here for dinner on a cold rainy day. There was an abundance of fresh vegetables and the soft-boiled egg oozing its yolk over the hearty soup really hit the spot.

Our favourite was the mushroom broth, which was simple, light and easy to eat. There is a generous portion but we found the lighter broth meant we were able to entirely finish both pots.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkBCu5bTbBCXAggN_Jroc4fwGBYy3WC4ahEwK2&fid=0x0:0xb5e1aba68aa033f2"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Stella Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvqyQ2KS_YIN6XYOMkDtQZO2ezjEJLWRODsOzNFIWuIhCYtAL-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Usually I don't see my mom finishing a whole plate or bowl by herself, but here she does! I'm very glad I took my mom here for Mother's Day! We've gone to many fine dining and premium casual restaurants for special occasions, but this time I wanted something different - a venue that's more chill and casual...and not Canadian/European for a change. 😋

She got the seafood hot pot and I had the house special hot pot. The house special never disappoints! It was kept hot all the way to the end. They had a 2-for-1 drink special, and of course we had to get the black tea. For the portions you get, it's very good value.

I did have to signal to the waitress to take our orders because it was taking a while for someone to come, but it was smooth sailing after that. When the restaurant's full and you have to wait for a table, you can grab a number from their iPad at the entrance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwksGfPauNNIe53aTr3COdaEYiyH-A4ir3BEYh&fid=0x0:0xb5e1aba68aa033f2"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Daniel Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ61DoMscspD7FnxbNGw4d3f5Af7KsUdL6bkhk3NlkyiWvRZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Average solo hotpot. The ingredients are pretty simple and are not freshly made. Lots of Chinese like it but it’s a bit overpriced in my opinion. Hence 3 stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIuaQFbOKzwd3D0rFTpmc4TMaOhocLrrMSxYLs&fid=0x0:0xb5e1aba68aa033f2"],"When":"2024-7-20"}]
