user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nelson Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMvSq7-l8Kje4bUGcJFo_gjx31JEZujbDf7RAmASmnqxtIa8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good desserts. Cheesecakes were very affordable. The plain cheesecake does come with a sweet sauce

Lots of seating for groups

Milk tea options were interesting too. Staff were friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTvB1XbzdnYvEUoqstb7AtFanu8TYyUl6gT577&fid=0x0:0x5f36f6d68630b732"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Emily N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpd0Hau1sCPCq8Y6nvDzLMGb8N4MbGzzEVU4yQHiqzCrRul_oonw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great serving of strawberries. Not too sweet and great balance. The cheesecake was a little brittle and hard. A bowl was enough to feed 4 people, maybe 2 or 3 if you're really hungry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-Uut1Zu1bd2m87IOb1N6au-Gdofo_rajqAcJw&fid=0x0:0x5f36f6d68630b732"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"CA Valera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyUoIr2r4xQZaKc0s4l-Ml2XQ6Za6uclwKOeZDLFzAKQJ_UWY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don’t be fooled by the blacked-out windows. If the “Open” light is on, you can go straight inside. Service is relatively fast and their BingSu “bowl” size can be shared by two when you’re having it for dessert after a full meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9Ch6Q3Y7Y_lROPV4DhLjdlwMCBYXWZ3XU8v3M&fid=0x0:0x5f36f6d68630b732"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Irene Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjiUNXVIWw1ng1A7J6iG9R-DCjb8Kl3sVTI_ONxr0fyjNYPpXS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a cake on Uber Eats as a birthday gift for my friend, and the shop was so thoughtful to write a birthday message in chocolate on the cake! It was super delicious too. Thanks so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbBVwqb9_t5-cxl2RGOhxgQlf9soy7x1S01Dms&fid=0x0:0x5f36f6d68630b732"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgIvhBRObE8mZXq0-aUB15LbKQSp2HT1oxd3erG1oXl2VtVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been ages since we’ve had bingsoo at Passion8. They were packed on a Monday evening. Besides Korean shaved ice, they also offer cake slices and macarons.

Shared a honey berry bingsoo ($14.95 single) and chocolate cookie dough cake ($7.25 slice). They still layer the shaved ice, texture is smooth. Cake wasn’t too sweet. 3.5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0ODuaV6R8rZEALvEHBERFHiirT5WHtHzMp4cv&fid=0x0:0x5f36f6d68630b732"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cozy and cute spot for bingsoo with friends! We got the mango and blueberry flavours (single size) which was perfect for sharing. The mangoes were more tart but granted, it’s not always in season. Still delicious!

The service was fairly quick and the space was packed when we went. I recommend claiming your table right away when you get in so you don’t miss out on a seat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVMTUVt9DoEM7LD6MfQUtaMZbIx6t41h7V_l9K&fid=0x0:0x5f36f6d68630b732"],"When":"2023-10-13"},{"Name":"Munim Chowdhury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE8TBJz0hTcBIVBwK1uPUDqd4mCQH8f8v47uBJOZWw27pK1Clk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good desert cafe in Port Coquitlam! We went there as a group of 20 people and we had an amazing time having yummy deserts. The ambience and sitting arrangement is cozy.
Recommended:
1. Cheesecake
2. Tiramisu
3. Latte: Vanilla","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOMNckohWpMCRTdu6KL-2iAcASvaqqC89dkz-h&fid=0x0:0x5f36f6d68630b732"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"John Seong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0htFjeJaWzfoh1Wx3ky51rbanezwWv8SlRvcZ43DjNt3_9Xz8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bowl of bingsoo available for around 20 dollars. Matcha was pretty good with a mix of cheesecake and rice cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMCInVZFzTqikrnucKV19kg_XBdvLyd1dCkOZ3&fid=0x0:0x5f36f6d68630b732"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lisa Hall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFZLErRYeOTAavlFqDGw7i_a8AnnXc6Slji12tOqwEY2XQBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They had no food!  It was 11:30am - barely even lunch time.  The prices were outrageous and the service was meh.  Look up from your laptop, acknowledge customers and have conversation!   Don’t think I would spend $$ here again.  What happened to this cute little place?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqELq_vZiyoP-YTtjCvZ023BM0HMq7aj-KaFZeBSqn4YfZtiVj_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was hesitant in giving a five star not because of their coffee or pastry, but their interior decor doesn't justify their "image." Not sure if it was because of the Cafe's location but inside, it was not what I've expected after visiting their other locations (McArthur Glen & Downtown). I truly thought I was in the wrong cafe at first! 😂

But with all that aside, their coffee is still amazing and their "Pain de Chocolate" was so yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4yFmEQaAv54e6NJDZ4SlQE5CzDkrtqZsFjLap&fid=0x0:0xf3bd561ff3a002b3"],"When":"2021-11-5"},{"Name":"Ahmad Fallah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYf-wJx1un_QduvzbSzJPNGg6vPBLmGDZO1qjv-pZS71mm8709=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible customer service. The barista was careless, inconsiderate, and appeared angry. Avoid this cafe if you value friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL84Fc6D_dC7B1wXsUO5HHMZmjE2R_wEOR7Dgr&fid=0x0:0xf3bd561ff3a002b3"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"KeepinItPG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbHTWkFYu0nhmrOjlNjJHnFrR3dgmIrN6Q0ugwayQ9K8Izi3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Nothing will ruin your day more than a first sip of terrible overpriced coffee. No wonder no one was in this coffee shop when we came in. Overpriced burnt puddle water coffee can’t even get passed 2 sips; save your money go elsewhere","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Leon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVndOYFwwmQ-UqHE_W_8GKWZH4QazMnMojFUZvBAoSUBuZLLcuhRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The place looks nice, heavily understaffed. Customer service could be improved. Coffee is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8qud1gvERgXDzNQbOiIu6YopiGnYwQ3ETB7iv&fid=0x0:0xf3bd561ff3a002b3"],"When":"2019-12-24"},{"Name":"Ryan McLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUPms8M2hY6Qxj68Tle5U0l_wxcvQ9ju2T6HgxIsmvnftNxgp7OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have a problem. I am basically obsessed with the ham and Swiss wrap at @CaffeArtigiano the potato, the red peppers... Mmmmm just so amazing and a very filling breakfast. The staff is super friendly and the tea is always piping hot. Best place to come hang out when you're at work and need a chill moment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP79Mj9hsEqazIC1sXmbT_Wc_ZHmcRkP3i6ThG-&fid=0x0:0xf3bd561ff3a002b3"],"When":"2018-6-28"},{"Name":"Tony Durke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2B-yxtEwsN3VC5I0agH_oArdXi55oh_OiwFVSsJVbk0zRM7sR5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Been here lots but not anymore. The only reason I went there was because I was working nearby. Service was meh, coffee was consistently mid and it's kinda run down and worn out. And the food, if there's any left at 930, is usually dried out served to you as if you asked them to borrow money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blake Vanderheyden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGlmqcVwH7QPhsHY2ED_exjlWnztAquqtp7a3YtRzw8FKOSVw7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"$10 for 2 half full Americano’s.
(I know it’s just hot water on top, but where am I going to top it off, I spent my money here to get a full coffee)
No lids, 20 minute wait, microwaved food.

Not sure when this location went downhill but, not really an Artisan Coffee shop anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_tR3fU-Vt-0YyL7rNtIDNuBMrlI8pEi_aF26X&fid=0x0:0xf3bd561ff3a002b3"],"When":"2019-11-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mike W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlIImTOV3nnD9V7iWkW3eVhXMba-8CAFPBMRprUEsLOepZgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am not sure how the food is because the service made us walk out before we ordered.

We were waiting at the counter for 2-3 minutes to order, and then once the employees finally acknowledged us the cashier told us to step aside so they could take the order of the 6 people that walked in behind us. Absolute BS, we went to the Park Crest Diner instead.

They obviously know where they make their money, off the people who work in the area and have no other options. If you have the option, go somewhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mathieu Youdan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXEuoZHKSGbJGQ2ZyS4stjHw5WfmXQiL083_lG5w4MfbQWhHqjwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The portions and quality of their beef dip was pretty good. Priced a bit on the high end but what isn't nowadays? Overall I was pretty impressed, most of these light industrial area restaurants tend to be pretty good. Self serve plate to table and back. The cooks are impatient and cranky, but they seem to know the regulars pretty well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfq-mpY4NHhptho1J6nNYwb_YeowB4t722X7rs&fid=0x0:0x4b0dc94cee4ba99c"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Melissa Brazil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmXLMQQ9oUGw1SPYv7Kokl2rdTFTHbnwssaRHuEhNAzx2QW0s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We arrived for lunch and waited a few minutes to order which was fine. But as we were about to order 6 people walked into the restaurant from a local business and we were pushed aside to take their order ahead of us. We left and will not be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT8CSSxZNnwa0JLa1bCyCp0sp9ujWayFM_dlh2SoTL2Jd0Dug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice little cafe, but a bit disappointing that there aren’t many vegetarian options, and the specials almost never have a vegetarian option these days. Would be nice to have a vegetarian soup at least once a week or something.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marc Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB1uNpfNLHu9WBRTgIqWySVYIGXymnfeeGQike9UtJF-LmScGfdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you've read the reviews you know I always go for the Traditional Breakfast. This day was no different. I tried Chefs Cafe as I was in the area. Good choice if I may say so myself. It was a big meal that tasted great. Eggs and sausage were the stars of the show.  Price point was a little high for a breakfast. Pro tip: syrup with sausages.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMTbOdHGcCgCY_O15NvPEP4IZodcHEbss8CUY5&fid=0x0:0x4b0dc94cee4ba99c"],"When":"2022-2-21"},{"Name":"Mojgan C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNQdX0o-yiYGAfPntN7LgWcnsDUW0pZ6gq07bo-q0bNGM-MX2TVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered food via Uber for the first time to avail their offer of buy one get one free. Very disappointing! The pork sandwich was very greasy and doesn’t taste good. No salt in fries. I also received a card to leave a 5 star review to get a $5.00 Amazon gift card. Is it even legal to ask for a review in return of a gift card? I got two cheap candies with my order and a thank you note on my food package which was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu4Yit_Burv7qZKbkaIzW_rdbsmROXko3joQSW&fid=0x0:0x4b0dc94cee4ba99c"],"When":"2021-10-5"},{"Name":"Bat Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsHrMF1U97M_AI9bk2xNb41tFGVAPF-s0krNV-O3nZrEGmgtwk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a nice hidden gem. The pricing is good and you get very filling and tasty portions with fresh ingredients. What more can you ask for?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONVN9Ei8CUFPauMEYVq9kLDJHy1Kpxc7ihKBxs&fid=0x0:0x4b0dc94cee4ba99c"],"When":"2020-10-22"},{"Name":"Diego Cortina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJBxC0cJ1Q4wbEz6k2cij82ffRb5IoZx4nhoiMzINR5NsU8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is beautiful, the staff is so friendly and welcoming and they have good prices for the food which is pretty good. Loved the place and will definitely come back soon !!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Jade Palace Chinese Restaurant
descriptions: Down-to-earth establishment offering an extensive menu of Chinese specialties, including dim sum.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Catering","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"TL:DR one or two rude waitress, servers are decent. Rice rolls and buns are good. Fried rice is not bad either. Limited parking and tight seating inside.

Not off to a great start as shortly after we sat down the waitress didn't bring back our paper, so we had to ask them for it.

"I just didn't have time to give it back to you!" Considering she stood there chatting with the other waitress, that was shocking.

Our first dimsum was the beef tendon, and it was beyond disgusting. It tasted like chewing on elastic bands. Too hard and bouncy to bite into.

We told them about this, they offered to replace it. We just wanted to let them know, without replacement. They informed the kitchen of this, and we continued eating.

The fried rice and other dimsum came next, definitely made up for the beef tendon and waitress attitude.

At the end, they also added complimentary custard buns to make up for the beef tendon which was nice.

Overall, I would come back again for the buns.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_FRvGHto9p3Zao_RqXTP3xOfUU771vYGJHmJR&fid=0x0:0xd8c83c02fd833bc"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dim sum always great here.  Dumplings are tasty and above average size.  Typical expected service .. not overly friendly but efficient.  Prices are reasonable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG3R-0GUPSV31ni6TtU_YdOiInQWRoqYiRwvbR&fid=0x0:0xd8c83c02fd833bc"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Cici N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu7mZH8nBSPWe5_6B2A2PSU2g63qgAyuimOI-E5DNsDjTWmKYW6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hosted my daughter baptism party here for 50 people.
Excellent top service! Was very accommodating, easy to book, friendly, and making changes was a breeze. They took care of small things, which made the experience great for us and the guests. For example: taking away dirty plates, putting unfinished dishes in smaller dishes so that there was more room on the table, cutting and serving the cake perfectly.. these are just some examples.

We ordered the family dinner set and added on Peking duck. It was very affordable and every dish was delicious! We also tried the dimsum here, and that was delicious as well. Great portions! And eyecatching! (Decorated each plate beautifully).

As someone who hosts a lot of different events. I highlyyyy recommend this restaurant for your next event.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC3WS0SH_5HuOF3EQabqPcmY5jsL_AHPSV7efZ&fid=0x0:0xd8c83c02fd833bc"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid, family style, Cantonese restaurant. Highly recommend the honey garlic spareribs  and Hainan chicken which were both especially delicious and better than most other Cantonese restaurants. The Hainan chicken comes with homemade sugar sculpture candy garnish. The portions were generous as well. The complimentary soup and dessert were great. The bitter melon and beef, sweet and sour pork, pea shoot tips, and pork jowl were all above average. A delicious dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4JCw3MoeLDBFGx2UCqAXx4VakzYRHFFKYERV5&fid=0x0:0xd8c83c02fd833bc"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Thomas Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITuDRjw9J9Us45xAUXKSfp8lG2sJ2s04TW_lNAi_G6a5d62ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant has changed hands many times over the years. Now it’s called Jade Palace. Overall it’s pretty good. The service is fast and direct. Portion sizes are good however they are not as good if you do take out. The prices are slightly above average but are justified by the portion size. I would come back here again, I just wouldn’t order the fried rice. It was lacking salt and general flavour. The rice that was used to make the fried rice also seemed like it was too fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIYxs-MQx7p1eygdax0Hvws1w3Unv6x4Q8B5RF&fid=0x0:0xd8c83c02fd833bc"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant is definitely a go-to for Cantonese cuisine at reasonable price.
All dishes are well seasoned and cooked. I didn't find any of them not up to standard.
Among the dishes I tried, I like the deep fried pork loins in preserved plum sauce, deep fried pork ribs in garlic and honey sauce and the scrambled eggs with prawns the most. The portion of each dish is super generous as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC9fst85Y0ECCpClnBXFlHWlsZ9WrhUH1BxoOP&fid=0x0:0xd8c83c02fd833bc"],"When":"2023-12-11"},{"Name":"Ricky Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ4fb2X6guFVFiuhC52YjigU7XjCL9UKX76Fjc8hbYj4or5GU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Jade Palace Chinese Restaurant : 4524 Hastings St, Burnaby, BC 🇨🇦
Opened for breakfast at 10am, went for early #dimsum before work.  Nothing fancy, basic service, no elaborate decor, had lots of parking but that might be as if not sleeping people would be working during time went.  Food was ok considering there is not much selection in this part of town.  Some items were bland while other items a little salty for my liking.
There was so many seniors here even if their menu items was quite limited.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf26eMG1F1YzXu4YnDOyu24FJAv5adTa_GjI-5&fid=0x0:0xd8c83c02fd833bc"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here a couple of times and I’m satisfied with the food here. I went with a group for a friends birthday and we order the 12 course dinner. My top 2 favourite dish was the duck with chips and the lobster with chow mein.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4qnQyvt2ML3Xr3Rug4ZFnhJA_JeXsnilJfjpz&fid=0x0:0xd8c83c02fd833bc"],"When":"2024-4-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A lovely and quaint neighbourhood cafe. More places like this should be nestled into every neighbourhood, it’s homey and has lovely calming vibes to it!

Excellent service and very friendly staff! Ordering a coffee here is great. Also tried the carbonara for lunch and it was quite good! Has a good creamy taste and the ham matches perfectly with it. It’s plated really nicely and elegantly. Coffee has good flavour and has strong depth.

Will come back again. It’s a nice nestled neighbourhood cafe in East Vancouver and worth checking out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSi_Z_N5qD4BJkpfBJh5CN05rxbLeLCydGu94c&fid=0x0:0xd592b069ec18dfa2"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy and intimate cafe in a residential area. Unsurprisingly, it wasn't very busy mid-afternoon on a weekday (save for a pair that left shortly after I arrived, I had the place to myself), so it was nice and calm. It was kind of chilly inside because they had the door propped open despite it being cold out, but I can imagine it might have been stuffy for the staff in the kitchen area. The barista was very nice!
I got the Sooyo croissant, an egg tart, and a milk tea. I loved the Sooyo croissant - I'm weak to the brie/fig combo and this had just the right balance of all the ingredients on a warm and soft croissant. The egg tart was also really nice with a hint of cinnamon. It was bite-sized which was good for a small treat. I also loved the milk tea. It was very strong, and the brown sugar syrup enhanced the flavour!
It was worth the trip for me for a relaxing snack stop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdGU7v21ZyjAaMqmB-AdwzvlmYdde2hVURBX4e&fid=0x0:0xd592b069ec18dfa2"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Hondro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdA5EfEJGFE_Wqw6SKvif7X44Sj0EvL6330umFVx4wThQmgqDI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sooyo means “awesome” in Taiwanese and it does not fall short. It’s a cute quiet, and calm coffee shop that reminds you of the lofi girl you used to study to in university. The food is off the charts, staff is lovely, and has views of the downtown skyline. Unreal spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-x0n66_CecYUFyw1S9t_BrspirFAavkP1p-Oi&fid=0x0:0xd592b069ec18dfa2"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Billy Chai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjhTx3gNatyYGIEmlgcisi5HNSS4K7xZ4IsKIZeODtjx3TiMG_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the ham carbonara, mushroom pasta, egg tart, latte and peppermint mocha. All tasted great. I think portions could be a tad bigger for lunch but definitely would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHSl1jZvfm_gY4UOEt92_TPXXHLx3VHQf2OI0L&fid=0x0:0xd592b069ec18dfa2"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Pat Waslen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkC-Tyq5Sy6eH64VG6FwtcQj-OJYnSvli4ZLpkEY8S6PBvQxBoIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every neighbourhood should have their own little place like Sooyo Cafe.  It really is a very welcoming and it has such a varied menu once could visit it every day.  I believe that have had it now for 3 years and it still remains one of my favourite cafes to visit in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk6ZOdxFG3osr3LLugeCVg52eUt0otIQ_kjUwt&fid=0x0:0xd592b069ec18dfa2"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Rachelle Castro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTlI_8fSUkEtqgb_5bBSWzSZp2YkIdHUSFuATMaujZtmSbf34x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quaint little cafe in the middle of a residential area. We ordered the carbonara pasta, egg salad sandwich and a London dog. Everything was delicious. Have been here a few times and never disappoints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7YRR05OgJyrWwamhQU04UCGrTuB4l228Khe6W&fid=0x0:0xd592b069ec18dfa2"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Jordan Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFsjfnS-oiBTX7iRzPhMh-PXM_FEBemeI_C6-8CDhB4SzDFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the carbonara and wow, I was not expecting the depth of flavor that it has. The plating was also great, and definitely gives fancy vibes. With that being said, the location is very homey and down to earth too.

Will 100% be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5gPOUc57dQv7LHkDOZwWmtRgQ6WeDlmcRvQoc&fid=0x0:0xd592b069ec18dfa2"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Josh Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkkyxhPTEpUzQ5foRkJncedrUI9-aKVkl-8bPKd9pTC4acuQRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cafe with homey and calm vibes. Dishes are creative and plating is classy, not something I was expecting but was pleasantly surprised. Seems like they are constantly innovating and improving their game. I definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNW_HxSBJNdZzmakqhmP6LtfyQSZ7Xm2cW6CIFb&fid=0x0:0xd592b069ec18dfa2"],"When":"2024-8-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehran bakhtiari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX52_I8QBEvpbwP2DsvccLDQ1hUjTB0qEjwNL_660Q7Wjozcaqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I congratulate the manager of this Tim Horton's branch, you are the most unworthy manager in the world.👏👎🏻

I came to this branch today and it was a disaster here, both the service and the behavior of the employees and the cleanliness.

I was the only person in line and it took 10 to 15 minutes for them to take my order.
If they were working, it wouldn't be a problem, but they were standing next to each other, talking and laughing, and it didn't matter to them at all that I was on the line.
The health condition was a disaster, everywhere was full of stains and dirt, and the floor was full of paper towels.
I can't explain the state of the toilet at all.
The photo I took seems to be the best explanation that exists.

The sewage is much better and cleaner than here. I took several photos, which unfortunately I cannot upload here, but I will upload the same message on Tim hortons app.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-4r8GkhezNPdi_roGFT_WGcNp7Hd6cWuniFS5&fid=0x0:0x65dd66a30485068e"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Dat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiWNTb2mj1MMD4SDcDWEj8uG6Ow3gj4UB5x5jY320mMnjkv5Zv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was Oct 19 2024 at 3PM PST. Cup cover had some coffee spilt on top when served. I ordered French Vanilla and it tasted like water with some hints of coffee and sugar. There were lots of  tissues around trash bin area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8G8AoH3ZG19-WT7ijh5VG9nhoEA8StakL6PWt&fid=0x0:0x65dd66a30485068e"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Troubleshooter E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKzv0x_1DM_uM4g-tecfDvd0I_OBcI5XoixESy1oAFLNQ6QDFW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I visit here often as it’s the closest to where I live. But man is this location disappointing.

Very short staffed and even when foot traffic was relatively low, I’d expect my baked items to take ~ 10 mins to complete.

Hygiene sucks big time. There was litter almost everywhere and staff couldn’t be bothered. Tables were mostly dirty too. Not uncommon to spot fruit flies and the like.

Food is average.

Honestly Tim’s has really gone downhill. All the stores I visited had been more or less the same.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Akwinder punia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJntwqgmz3tJ1KrZzo_ekWFujb9YF83_zrrMUwsFQKy1MhI9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited this location around 8:00 PM today and had an unsatisfactory experience. The employee ANMOL, was extremely rude when i ordered a bagel and asked for it to be toasted, but she said that they don't toast bagels or croissants in the evening.It felt like an unreasonable policy, and I was disappointed by the lack of flexibility and customer service. I hope the management can look into this and ensure a more consistent experience for all customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sevgi Yurtseven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy2jtPh84jlAwE9lMXPgEJ3y1WVckiKBVKdxsxPJX4kl6LLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tonight, I went to get Timbits, and the male employee was not following hygiene rules. With the same gloves, he touched everything and then placed the Timbits into the box. For the customer before me, who appeared to be of the same ethnicity as him, he used a napkin to place the Timbits, but for me, he didn’t change his gloves. Then, without washing or changing gloves, he used his hand to add ice to my daughter’s drink. I really hope we don’t get sick.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"shapinder Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPSb5wfrVXPA41aCFGJp9kls3YT4SHXjx5x0B4UGo_4PlFlQk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""The service at Tim Hortons is always great, but today stood out thanks to HUSAN. She greeted me with a warm smile and provided quick, efficient service even during the morning rush.Her positive attitude made my day, and I really appreciate her effort!"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4wK-jqnP5hr2Jw0c7g_77Lz-aJ6zM-bkBiYFP60wFwcUxV2NU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food and drinks usually take forever, most of the time the orders are also wrong after waiting. There's no consistency in anything and you never get what you actually pay for. The staff member Kathleen at the register is basically running the place, she's super fast, friendly and directing other staff. Give her a promotion or raise because without her I'm sure this place would go even more down hill if that's possible. Tim Hortons, have some pride in your places, you have enough money to make them better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Derin Geo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbZ9aM_pUYz2yNS_COYstxqJtbGUsUbD6NWXxxh90QeMMACY2N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Regular customer here. I have to acknowledge that this shop has a proportionate degree of employees trying their best and then some doing their worst. I dont know why but i feel extremely unwelcome in this tim hortons most of the time based on one employee’s behaviour. Not the first ive seen this happen and it happened to me last night (dec 12)  between 9 and 10pm. I completely empathize with the fact that your jobs are challenging in its own way but, the bare minimum is be firm with us customers. The lady who worked that shift really needs to work on her attitude. The bare minimum you could do atleast is give me my food just firmly. Stop throwing or smacking the drinks or food when you serve it to the customers on the counter. This even happened the day before when the same person was throwing two little boxes of tim bits on the counter to another customer. Its really disrespectful! And also please be calm and humble with your tone. It really makes me feel guilty for coming there. (Maybe genuinely its just the normal accent and you may not be intending to do that but please atleast try to.)","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lily Ucok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5bzD67Klzn0mRaVAwgkUp1kaai9QEqUXWFBCsHsC3oXbajXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this tea shop in North Shore! It’s one of my favorites, and I’ve been going there for years. They have a great selection of teas. This year, I’m trying their Tea Advent Calendar, and I’m really enjoying the flavors. If you’re in Lonsdale Quay, be sure to check out this little gem!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julie Vaxevanis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJh8Tlrps2PoqyRHHxZ4H5h7Z-4vrG-pSgVL-8xJYLnuLwHTK_7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Blue Teapot is the best tea store ever, we’ve been buying our teas from them for years! Extremely kind owners with an expansive selection of amazing teas (so many Rooibos teas, our favourite). Well worth the drive to visit the Quay, but when we can’t make it to North Van from Langley the free local delivery they offer is so convenient.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nadir Zulqernain (Broker Nadir)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhEJmar-xPGvkChLjdSk0W2wzn9BfvbU7Rx_M524YyfDxob5mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blue Teapot At The Quay is on the main floor inside the Lonsdale Quay. It is a very quaint shop. They sell all things Tea. We regularly purchase English Breakfast tea from the. We buy enough to last about six months. This is the best English Breakfast tea that I have tasted–––and I have tasted a variety from around the world.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtKKlKVqpgM96tPngfR9HycorGrb1udiwLNeVH\u0026fid=0x0:0x387ea51389d10cda"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Patricia Fantillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpSRpiBU0ZFMSvbwUVCK2PTfTZ4BIV4z0ukERgEti9rzTXyy5q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been to the store quite some time ago and recently ordered a fairly large order of teas online last week. Got my order today. SO happy! There was a little “Thank you” note and a small complimentary size of masala chai.\nThank YOU, Blue Teapot! It’s little things like this that show how much a company appreciates their customers. Much love!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNadh2qWtaTgyEF_4CruIVxuHIAjHSXxtVX3RJC\u0026fid=0x0:0x387ea51389d10cda"],"When":"2022-10-18"},{"Name":"Joshua Ji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbxtbf01bFxPNvY_fFS4tse0M94tnEm8IicZkW0JzUkJKMWT8ICA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great tea selection, very helpful employees. Loved being able to smell all the different teas before committing to one. Lots of different types of containers available for purchase. Good vibes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAHzMZJXbOfQ7aQuopiySX8-bhrKI9vVPZ9hLy\u0026fid=0x0:0x387ea51389d10cda"],"When":"2023-4-27"},{"Name":"Tiffany Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXS5YVNgJdfLlXr513CShiIo_prlAVW6badcfVlfKYXPA40a3xELg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner is very kind and the prices are a good deal, especially for some of the teapots and teacups. My friends (who aren't tea drinkers) and I all ended up purchasing something from this store. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8Mdk7ll_gdEapylDWZuyoRP_QHnxsURmJM3KH\u0026fid=0x0:0x387ea51389d10cda"],"When":"2019-3-10"},{"Name":"Robyn Pinkerton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_U5ngF5tbpaT-zKqGh6YGftzBcxCKICZfT9gIjl-1kW9TGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I came across the Blue Tea Pot a couple weeks ago. Wow, what an amazing selection of teas. We returned there this past weekend to enjoy a hot tea of our pick from an extensive menu. My friend purchased an assortment of teas as well. Zophie was extremely helpful. This place is a gem if your a tea drinker.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Torrie De Danann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrGhNZZpN4lpsnt-2tEdLsU8EBg7FRguFydoBmA9F76LKTxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute shop with lots of lovely products at the Lonsdale Quay market. I had to order online due to quarantine and it was an easy, fast, great experience. I really appreciated the $5 local shipping fee and was able to get some of their beautiful blooming teas as Christmas gifts. Customer service was excellent and they did an awesome job of staying in touch the whole time, helping to make sure the delivery time was convenient for me. Will definitely be shopping here again. Thanks Karolina and The Blue Teapot!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service is awesome here.. som of staff know my order.. always clean.. fast service.. food and the coffee is the same as any other Starbucks..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhkjSrkYh8GZ-QmRonQ89zUKTuD5ORSxVMHVqn&fid=0x0:0x408f10147f771ba2"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Alexandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX11ANDfpnFU7GmCeaVtU5cBwuWRqquWAK3F9_AUyciKpah0H5L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was craving Starbucks after having lunch at Happy Lamb and it turns out that there was one located conveniently just down the block. Who knew? Wasn't I just saying in another review how there are so few Starbucks around these days?

I stuck to my usual Java Chip Frappuccino, and it was heavenly.

If you're at Metrotown and don't fancy waiting in line at the food court Starbucks, make a trip out to this one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDnfyvQ7Yu2eDcRdo2GPVPragUzruTjKxIcVAJ&fid=0x0:0x408f10147f771ba2"],"When":"2024-2-28"},{"Name":"Z Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs-pJ1HJcJcEs9CvV5lP2Uh95o0TMQA_oMLKcGyRZlHrF1s475OA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered multiple times from this store, every single person smile like angle/male angle/trans angle, you what I meant. The coffee is just a Starbucks coffee, nothing more and nothing less. The store is clean and very well organized. Appropriately staffed and I always get my coffee super fast. Normally there is a short line in the afternoon, but don’t really have to wait long because everyone is so productive and professional I guess. Love this location! I would recommend everyone order your coffee here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4YfzTkCfbtSmwlgCHN4dnmXo_9hooFpTgn2fZ&fid=0x0:0x408f10147f771ba2"],"When":"2023-3-30"},{"Name":"Sadaf Amiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPHc2xTnS12CBehzwzDFEmwlfSIrGQainQFAOK2JxHKratI7mL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my everyday spot and I love spending time here for studying, setting my meetings and just being here!
The staff are really nice and friendly and welcoming!
I wanna thank all of them for their hard work and their beautiful attitudes🫶🏽","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JV Yiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURaW1e5G2BuTB8BBonhhezWSO1Vc30CBAmArCz-oEdJ4ny_Uf06w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very clean and convenient coffee shop! Employees are friendly and helpful.  Got my drink on time and they taste good. Will definitely go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gandharv Aggarwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8TpLYt0OhIaA972w_Un3iy25qjfpkMkqy6LbH6HAuEi_tV66G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Two words, exceptional service! It’s been quite a while now for me to have my regular morning coffee from this place and all I can say is the service this store provides is phenomenal; especially the young lady who usually works in the mornings, 60 seconds and my coffee and breakfast is ready. Absolutely loved this place and its fast service!! Keep up the good work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keith “Nordicus” Casey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP-FtCH7wQ1ue8xZGc8IHGUkOJs0N6dT-exgT8c_C7mXOiISbS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I could almost accept the price increases over recent years, but this location is not very child friendly. Cashier was fine, barista that made my drink was quite abrupt about my child laughing loudly. No patrons appeared to be bothered, just her. Plenty of other nearby locations to go to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maria Underwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4JX9SxwD59_JFlH3vgU-UwYzjMnMqmXVeq8gIHAPRaf_lbNGG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really love this place. Staff is always nice and kind. My husband and I come here all the time. Coffee here is always yummy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKA-hatTykr-J2MNVnUFmtateNiJu9GclzAlvp&fid=0x0:0x408f10147f771ba2"],"When":"2023-6-14"}]

title: Ding Tea - Renfrew
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kaitlyn Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Z8RTVAtMfrX6uG6JFFOYzsyTXI7YKgjW6WLd73YQIb_urJDkYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered the grass jelly milk tea and a bubble waffle combo (taro slush with pearls and the original waffle). The waffle was pretty good! We did come right when they opened and there was a surprising morning rush so the guy might’ve been swamped but the drinks were very watered down. Slightly disappointing but we’ll come back and give it one more shot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM7q9yQTXzoH8nWRLbGRsw1cnW3YWVQn0Q7EiL&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Evon Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvHujww9uFxgsiZ71CuzdL-Kn-UTJtwb3Erm1KkKgV_QrVSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Owner please read - this is very important! Ordered from Ding Tea a couple of times through Ubereats, and wondered why it always tasted so sweet although we put none or slight for sugar. Seems like either the options were reversed on the Ubereats platform or the person at the store made a mistake when entering the order. It happened to 2 out of 3 of the drinks we ordered. For example, we ordered dalgona coffee milk tea 0% sugar and less ice. The drink came out with 0% ice and 70% sugar.

Please kindly look into it and fix as it may affect your business 🥹. Please refer to photo. Thank you x 3.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnc19Rrpmrb1s3-R4n1GqWOn4tsoM5uodSUjnI&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"deez nutz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeCzTIsutyS5EuSpAo0k_OKxLoKU06V1lPPDCgh4a1-0M0pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here getting bubble tea everyday for the summer and has been my new go to when I’m in the area! Passion fruit all the way! My new lemon ice tea! Love the owners and every one that work here! Free wifi with lots of tables, darts, and old school games to play!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtpKhA6BA9ddE7W-GzNzfVuCtqvFPiqQ-90yVQ&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"An Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF01TBYc3PKsxbdTmX6Nyb3k8CUa16dz0pehTu-KrjeP5-RXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ding Tea offers a wide variety of flavors, and the shop is clean. I tried the milk tea, and it was delicious. I also appreciated the option for clear boba. Plus, they have electric dart games for added fun. recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_zgSIjjmRkkO4rk_kTWVApxBvJuuIIT4PPg8&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Jinchen Cai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAkTaGuIBaKsnqPWu-_2v9e15t_xkadDsddRx-i0U3GTJUait-Fw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quality bubble tea for decent price🧋

I forgot to take photos of my drink and those my friends got, but we enjoyed the interior and hang out space quite a bit. There's 2 darts stations, but Covid so we didn't consider it. 🎯 Other than that, there's plenty of distancing and space to host about 8-10 customers.

Definately worth a try if you're in the area and wanna support individual shops instead of chains!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDsgIkjyBADT3PYBQpN_YhPtBYj-Ofv79tkFo7&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2022-2-9"},{"Name":"Nina T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLt5aVZEBWTwlB9YebMs663-2gJr0YQ1k-gEzpUGQcK_QpWyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their Kiwi Aloe Vera Juice and Bubble Milk Tea. Both were not bad. I ordered mine with Golden pearls and they were nice and chewy. There weren’t any people when we went so it’s a nice quiet place to go to. We didn’t get to try playing but they also had a darts game area there if you’re interested.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7Lcd2gGzG0tKP_a2HlS01-Z5mUkt1WCEld1PM&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2022-1-9"},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love ding tea! I saw that this place had a "top 10 BBT" award in 2018, so we dropped by on the way to spanish banks.

The price was ridiculous cheap, but we realized that everything was from syrup. You get what you pay for lol. But my family rarely sees such BBT places like this nowadays.

Reminds me of the older BBT shops that were around 15~ years ago. The staff were very polite (and speaking Vietnamese 😮) and the interior was beautiful. There were dart boards in the back too.

They had exotic flavors and toppings like green apple / mango stars too. If I'm in the area I will defs come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNdVNHOUG0cBdRM_wLRsdSm817wRqiOEHb4QJb&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2022-7-27"},{"Name":"Colleen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpCCMNp7XzGiCebjsb15h00nLI_s4EZ5DhOTvOot51o9xB6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Looks like I was not the only person who had a bad experience with the male server in the evening - if you don't want to work then just quit.

I did nothing to instigate. The moment I walked in, he did not say hi and just looked miserable and angry. Not expecting a greeting but nobody wants to look at someone who's angry for no apparently reason. He was hostile and passive aggressive when interacting with him, when I had just ordered a normal bubble tea...

Absolutely embarassing and I will never be coming back to this store.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Boketto Tea Bar
address: 3471 W Sawmill Cres, Vancouver, BC V5S 0E3
open_hours: {"Friday":["12–10 p.m."],"Monday":["12–9 p.m."],"Saturday":["12–10 p.m."],"Sunday":["12–10 p.m."],"Thursday":["2–9 p.m."],"Tuesday":["12–6 p.m."],"Wednesday":["Closed"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place to hangout and chill. The place was small but very cozy and clean. The staff were very nice and the service was quick.
They have a lot of selections for sundae, hot and cold tea, waffles and MORE.
I got the Oh Affogato Sundae for 8.50CAD and it was good. It wasn’t too sweet and the espresso wasn’t too strong, just perfect.
I love that I was able to stay longer and enjoy the place. They don’t rush you to leave which made it a great place to relax. Will definitely go back again in","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAeGmy_zeCaduq3x-xgu9sPHkXSGXJVzx0mcpT&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Maureen Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJveuMK98eNTFiH47Fc3q63NS_Ymf2pm_8GByP3XP5IYJAxNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Checked out Boketto for the first time last night. Tried their seasonal Sundae for the Mid-Autumn festival and then a jasmine/blueberry twist cone. Both were great and I especially liked the tea soft serve (strong flavour and not too sweet). The staff member working last night (9/21/2024) around 9:30pm was awesome! Super friendly and upbeat despite it being close to the end of their shift. The interior space is very nice and I could easily spend time in there catching up with a friend or reading a book. I'll definitely be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFftQemY55f5S3C3sHOiRt5s4uvM8zxV6rwwN6&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Eric Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2IdnKl8fKDZ-IMWgaR52oHZ3J0NwXgwu79s88mK_YjvsZV68s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soft serve is super creamy and not too sweet. Ube had a strong coconut flavour. Dubai sundae was amazing, the topping is not very sweet and pairs well with the malt chocolate soft serve. (Picture had double scoop topping)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNegqNWlC9vVMkOzC0uVzCHfSSeOt0bviNtNaaX&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Killer Ice Cream","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEkNhf42d1v32h9n__BfEh6IECerWHyTl1tVwhFIDdjgUJnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been wanting to try this place since the summer and finally made it over! Super yummy bubble tea menu and an assortment of fresh baked goodies - the matcha cookie was so soft, fresh and chewy! I was craving a savoury snack so I had the dill cream cheese on a waffle with smoked salmon and capers - totally divine, highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwvtSCgT2cq7FxsS613OefM4ZdNM8M31wH6_Ya&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a Pineapple Tart Sundae - with Jasmine Tea soft serve, pineapple jam, cookie crumble, with a cookie. The tea flavour from the soft serve was pretty strong and nice, but there was not enough topping in my opinion. The cookie also didn't really have any flavour. And like many other reviews have mentioned, the sundae is hollow in the center.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOokA3Mi0IbZOTQX1bKaLacjNVZVXFc-8Na9rdL&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took a stroll through the river district tonight with the doggo. We drove down here specifically to try this place out. The jasmine ice cream was what gravitated us here.

Both the mid autumn sundae & jasmine twist cones were yummy. But the main highlight of the visit was the service. The girl working tonight was top notch. If she had not mentioned to me that she wasn’t the owner, I would have thought she was. She was well articulative of the menu offerings and was super friendly and smiley the entire time.

The shop was also well maintained and clean. The decor was quite nice as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNn5NAhtFCihXSyjRD7kexQ63Ke9Ve54CgzkJ_Q&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Diamond Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYYVOCh_VDJbYGP5NKDNEOpUCTIK_xydhJ_9MQ64Qh_PDRXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the malt chocolate sundae. Personally for me the dalgona honey comb was not for me. Tasted very burnt and bitter.

Giving food a 2/5 cause I don’t really appreciate the fact that the centre is hallow. $10 for this? Feels steep for such a small size already and it’s hallow in the centre? I do like that they’re open late, great for late night cravings! Their bubble tea is alright. Often tastes watered down. Overly hyped shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqieWw4G9lH5dXd_t-vADzyyGUs8BmJo8-5bD4&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Dahlia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQgMiJgQQUWXUpX_vLBTDbbMkB1XyhSnpGj8rW2JxPqajVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute place. I got the smoked salmon liege waffle and the seasonal fall special matcha pistachio latte. The waffle was great, texture and consistency not too chewy or crispy. It paired well with the smoked salmon, dollops of cream cheese and the capers. The latte was also good with bits of pistachio in it which is nice for a textural component.

I have also tried their mochi mini waffles. They were yummy and toasted. And their butterfly pea lemonade was delicious! The staff are also so friendly when I visit and the interior is cute and cozy. Kinda small with not a lot of seating but has a nice atmosphere. I will come back to try many more things especially the soft serve.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND2avwRnm2Jx9cZdXuOvDc4m9ryju0AdQMvaSo&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-10-28"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Yina Gao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW49Hy6Bp8pgGjMI1XWIH9uReM84LVSL1N5nI7rtyE5exbaPXix=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious cup of coffee, so happy I was able to find a well balanced cup after craving one and going to quite a few meh cafes in the Vancouver area during my stay here :) Very cozy and quiet atmosphere, perfect to do some studying/work :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPat-K8_NpOu-cpiCSAmWZVyLuRMjG-Ec8Euxcb\u0026fid=0x0:0x169f315d6c757c61"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Zelda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYDa9MsXj-ICvwW_hwqh-GHSWiDMqwu8Za_3wuFz1DE9IB99aK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Coffee is superior quality, it’s definitely noticeable. Would recommend that you check out this spot over a typical Starbucks. I got an iced caramel macchiato, way too sweet for my liking but I forgot to say half sweet. The taste of the coffee itself was really good. I got a chocolate croissant and it wasn’t that good, buttery croissant but weird type of mild chocolate drizzle on top. Other bakery goods looked good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq_CCdvmt6ZLdQ18TSKVQE3_c4-cuRiNfMwjeV\u0026fid=0x0:0x169f315d6c757c61"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very nice and cozy, lovely atmosphere. I ordered an iced chai which was so delicious and refreshing. Parking around it is tough, very few spots on the street and all 1h, if you’re not lucky to find one you’ll have to go around and park a bit far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYr0p8YRDFKjOB7f6QndvwJUMpJEdV0kF6O5pk\u0026fid=0x0:0x169f315d6c757c61"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small quiet coffee shop that roasts their own beans. Americano was all right and their baked goods were fresh. The only issue I had was with their service. It gets a bit awkward when you walk in and are standing at the front counter but the baristas see you and don’t address you. We were standing for a good 3-5min before the barista finally came up to serve us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuY8NcxbBBOIeDOgADyPM8gQKaA7vX_dHYzyyK\u0026fid=0x0:0x169f315d6c757c61"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Karen W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZZPfpr3QNA42Rvf5GRma8e9wVZe75RxS8Wiz-RehL8Z3PSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a nice coffee shop. Great atmosphere.  London fog was delicious. Very reasonable prices","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPbfz1KFg3_aYnTQS3Jeksa5XX0nrMEDcR67iD\u0026fid=0x0:0x169f315d6c757c61"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Hamed Soltani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJJZvsAhr4w9D1t84C4qF44R0bN-d5cVp4LaJ8auICZqpChXPs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I found this coffee shop near my work and wanted to try it out. I tried to call, but there was no connection. When I got there, I immediately enjoyed the charming and relaxing interior design. I ordered a couple of the savary pastries and an iced hazelnut late. I usually don't drink flavored coffee, but this one was sooo good I went back for another the next day. The pastries were just okay, had a lot of room for improvement, but the coffee tasted amazing! I could see the coffee is roasted there, so most probably that's why it was so good. I will definitely go back to try their esspresso as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFpVieX_7OQn6q_dhBPDsFtQLq57ZiP4HNGqr4\u0026fid=0x0:0x169f315d6c757c61"],"When":"2023-8-10"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What I love most about this coffee place is the cozy and aesthetic atmosphere. It is very quiet in the mornings and I love to sip my coffee while chilling out watching the beauty of Fall across the street. Their cofee is tasty and tasted like premium blend. I still haven't tried their cookies which I've heard are good. So I will keep on coming back to this place for sure. It is a lovely place to catch up and have a chitchat with someone close.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO47bUzVRxV3LRMAlkVGcnqpEp38s7fpOPvVpPD\u0026fid=0x0:0x169f315d6c757c61"],"When":"2022-11-1"},{"Name":"GREGORY WELLMAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAW-s39raxpX32XWGDc3RqF-M7I0dQKwlbBPlBwLcZxi7lzkq1Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a gem! To be fair, I wasn't quite expecting a city-center quality coffee shop right here, but here it is! The owners were friendly and respectful, the flat white was perfect (no need for an extra shot-always a good sign). I tried a croissant and it was delish- even though it was later in the day. The design and space were also great, and very relaxing. I've been back twice now. Recommend for sure!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP0FBV_ywjtdr_vVRMfw6z7nlKtxIvgwFpwVw_\u0026fid=0x0:0x169f315d6c757c61"],"When":"2023-9-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Asif Ali Rahman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNaegjRmNO50bHqqeLJtzO0MH4x4EfVRHgZ8LaeHetSvlquLkr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is an amazing place with fresh coffee. I start my day by having something from COBS Bakery on Edmonds Street in Burnaby, which Is next door to Waves Coffee. These two shops are side by side and amazing places to spend time each morning. Waves Coffee is strongly recommended. I especially like the story of Muhammad Ali behind the coffee shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM64UWaRfUrOq3LKQukOMGoWf77tqtIDGJMhgLf&fid=0x0:0x686f1b477ef30aee"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"B F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1OW6_5mWq5T5cXzcmpwoGkYLBwInikRzneyVxV3WvtCyYWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"since new owners in 2024, qualiy has gone down alot! I pd $5.85 for a " Waves" size London Fog tea in hse, was lukewarm, diluted, Sent back 2 times, they never put in a new tea bag, she put vanilla syrup in the 2nd one, I sent it back & told them I can't have sugar, 3rd tea was the worst!! on top of it the 3 female staff were laughing loudly behind the wall! new owner is very cheap, I've seen him slowly sweeping the floor, while 1 girl is trying to serve a line up while he's in his own world, NEVER will I go again, really $5.85 for diluted tea, go elsewhere","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6K237hkSt4EjRNa-TsXVTgWbQ1M-lMUMjUX9uzc3E4UbLAAY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Coffee is good, vibe is great.

But I always feel so uncomfortable waiting for take out here. There's nowhere suitable to stand and wait and I always just feel like I'm in someone's way when I'm waiting.

Lovely staff and coffee though","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The staff are super friendly. The selection is good no GF treats to go with you latte. Prices are moderate. The coffee kinda taste like Tim Hortons barely drink able ( decaf with soy) update the Roibas is very nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIz-gv9lDnVRukMGUlNndbXV3ZYFj-qGX6s-g6&fid=0x0:0x686f1b477ef30aee"],"When":"2022-11-13"},{"Name":"Jason K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnDM9NDLOmVFcuNU7ZHUub_sN3XonKLkRXACh_-_JhtcuBz4IHbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Friendly staff, unfortunately understaffed on a Saturday afternoon, coffee was okay. Pastries looked  a bit sad","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkyCN-5oHx-L8mAFu2o6q8piuZ0mzmJ5lAX3SN&fid=0x0:0x686f1b477ef30aee"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Smit Umrethwala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDViVKSJ-JRnbeErNMjno27ST_IqBFc_ELws37AB_MasrdKNNPmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A chill place to have your morning coffee and to get some work done. The music adds well to the serene ambiance. The butter croissant is fresh and the dark roast is decent as well.
The staff is friendly and welcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9RT5TYQ62zjlW6fLaifblHG2f3B9yIxoASPo-&fid=0x0:0x686f1b477ef30aee"],"When":"2022-4-24"},{"Name":"Seulah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDMCub-qygI0RK_Ulcx7q4rbFAKTZOuxjeeGpZMmMnQvlogWtn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner and the staffs are so nice - thank you! The owner welcomes each customer with a smile :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4BmnzV_8wDVTwbPeZIsorJBnn_-cc7-I0JnCV&fid=0x0:0x686f1b477ef30aee"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Sonia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl7v6MCcuQHcrzDLs86Kl5K_ZnGX-w-6vKyRJBWf9GgV9Kxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I decided to try Waves as its very close to my apartment. It was a nice shop inside. Easy menu to read and order from. No complicated menu items. There was one person working who was taking orders and making drinks. It wasn't busy but if a group of people walked in you'd have to wait a bit for your drink. I decided to forgo coffee today and try the rose petal lemonade. Nothing special in my opinion. It tasted like regular lemonade which was lightly sweetened. I do plan on going back to try the coffee or espresso drink. Hopefully its better than the rose petal lemonade.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnWDrb2HekJVnTZuoFCg8vj8kElkrxQKQU9k6_&fid=0x0:0x686f1b477ef30aee"],"When":"2023-4-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Whitney Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWUpCHpQw9t28OfKhr7N_38-v3xiAMq2FEIM7zR2elX7xcEVO6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Picked up take out from Little Cockatoo Cafe. The pljeskavica here is pretty much an open faced burger with a meat patty that is well seasoned - the meat is so tender and juicy. I’m trying not to drool as I write this review. I also tried their cvari which is the Balkan version of pork rinds. I can’t comment on their ambience and restaurant decor but their food is definitely 11/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTouyOsLgIn2wjmYv7BAffM4ljLZ3ZKLWkUsqv&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2019-4-26"},{"Name":"Diego Aviles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd1C9Gr5_19-RtFOj7Ylur0DHPT0rJrP-ewPHbv48LSZei6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great hole in the wall. Owner and cook is very nice. One man show. Worth the wait for our food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYbssIv1GI6JFeRv2e-lnTe-e0NQiU-ya6a1fd&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious! Lots of meat. So if you are in the mood for grilled meats, beer, bread cheese and euro soccer, this is your place to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW9e_kF03RvU7b502gIJGlL7Yhp5yQJAw4BxTD&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2022-12-1"},{"Name":"charlie goff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAoLpdqWD8KtdupT8iXNWlndRPOdbArcOWpEZTbvkI76jV2hOO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Being from Texas and enjoying BBQ this was definitely a different but amazing experience! Great food and great service. There’s a reason they have such a good reviews.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnz9xq_Yap0kTdvGpdhDDr1jum4UpcWVCB90oS&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"Simon Bort","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuruoEPpIaCU8Iph5JQrlDL1FCejWX0z7Y-ZrpMfcbquA7xPMCSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let this amazing man seduce your taste buds. The sausages and meats are made by the grill master/owner himself. Everything we tried was super tasty. Good prices and portions.

More people should know about this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWfC_1cl63qYzDpvGvu3L7aRoNTq7zHi40do0v&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2022-8-11"},{"Name":"Sean C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKle1H3U_yb0rWRIsaUg4PFRlzNPbW3ErM52REVu0iehb-oMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cevapcici (mixed pork and beef) served at Little Cockatoo are tender, juicy, and flavourful. The bread and kajmak which accompanied the cevaps were superior to those served at competing Southeastern European restaurants in Burnaby. This restaurant also offers all-beef cevapcici for those who don't eat pork, or simply prefer beef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-6mym9Bykp1BIsMEnhoYRC3N9JUglDAHFmb-s&fid=0x0:0x1883fee644a6e217"],"When":"2023-2-28"},{"Name":"Sil Knezevic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmC1oMDgcJPYWexS2hvVeWfMHffqzyTfXmne5kYixFylhsyYtp2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place exceeded all my expectations. If I could give them 6 stars I would. We ordered a meat platter, and 6 sides. My goodness, it was like being teleported back to grandma's house. The meats were juicy and packed with flavour. The sides were all perfectly balanced and the salads were fresh and vibrant.
The ordering process was quick and simple, the owner is a pleasure to speak with! I wish I had known of this place earlier as I believe it's the best Balkan food around. Do yourself a favour and try it out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edmond Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhs8-Bq6r9RXlToNM1Zb4RaXApUjRArZ6BuqgjWMteHJSBo252=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is not your normal restaurant. This is more like a casual hangout cafe. Walked in to order because I couldn't find a menu online. 0rdered the platter for one and sausage, it was more than enough for 2 people. Platter comes with lots of different favorful meats served with rice and grilled veggies. Try it! Call ahead to pickup!","Images":null,"When":""}]
