user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Belinda Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn7TTMzcgQmmumaUE-aWmYGctragvugCfl1hNlTJMZXNxjoJwLTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The menu at this Bao shop features a diverse range of handmade Bao, including the fragrant BBQ Pork Bao, the rich and savory Pork Deluxe Bao, the sweet Taro Bao, and the creamy Custard Bao. Each Bao is freshly crafted with the highest quality ingredients, ensuring every bite is delightful. Their friendly and welcoming staff make this place a cornerstone of the community and one of the few spots where you can savor premium Chinese-Filipino cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn-_mu5EYhazwwW3o_WM0nn_9j9z5OhsHhno1G&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Katherine Vasilopoulos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp10ey8BbMxYd-QmzO59Ao3ECwvxfw02LdG19q-Kua9a84DISd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The buns here are 10/10! They are large and fluffy and filled to the brim with incredible fillings. Our personal favourites were the purple yam, the curry beef, and the chicken bun","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPkfrEOMNhXQFAIJk3v9qIV_TkJp28dNinu50r&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"To be honest, I was a bit disappointed.
Staff don’t need to be overly friendly, but there’s no reason to greet customers with unpleasant expressions either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvqR7t6ciSVcRuzLyJC1Yh_d_NxYjapH4nfoA&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Pork Deluxe Bao here is my favourite of their offerings. It is more meaty with an egg inside. The veggie bao is good too with lots of umami mushroom flavour. The curry beef bao is also unique and tasty. All the baos I tried were good but lighter on the filling and more bready compared to some other baos I have had elsewhere. However, their steam bun dough is light and fluffy and very delicious being airy and not too dense.

It’s takes at least three baos to fill you up and they aren’t cheap. Each savoury bun ranges from $4.25 to $5.25 each but if you buy 6 you get 1 free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEixyIw8drAzSSvpTe5UFwKR3dhFM1ki7hKqfQ&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2023-11-22"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am delighted to try this freshly made Buns with its tich flavorful taste. The pork deluxe was highly recommended by a friend and their taro bao which was a best seller. It is a must try for every Asian and Bao lovers out there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1VJr2Gp-xXCVwYIc6hDfHk9hriWlzR_G8Zz3Q&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"Sebastian Busse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyk0sPfSVg60Ym9wEuBcAYPqE5lRs2yUuONQcGbMAykDCZjsCY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i love the bao place so much. ever since i started going, which was at their original location across from metrotown a few years ago, i’ve been in love. they’ve been so consistent and reliable the last 3 years. after trying many places that make baos, i can confidently say that ‘the bao place’ has my all time favorite bao’s. the texture and subtle sweetness of their buns, the marinades for their fillings are so tasty (my go to being the bbq pork), and how fresh everything is.  i tried their vegetarian bao and sweet purple potato (ube) today and was so satisfied that i considered going back to purchase more. love love love this place and the people that make it so amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGI2-ObQ_7FIxBbdvIpnZR08X-1lG2DWNKIy1b&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Randy Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPZnX--8tTHY5oPlI_IYUhMDHMRFSkMidEvRu7ibro1a0HmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stumbled upon this delightful family-run steam bun bakery, and I can't rave enough about the deliciousness they serve! The taro bun is so delicious, bursting with the goodness of freshly made taro chunks.

The pork deluxe bun is a must-try – the filling is incredibly tasty. The reasonable prices make it an unbeatable deal for the quality you receive.

Whether you're a steam bun connoisseur or a casual fan, you need to check this place out. The warmth of the family running the bakery adds an extra layer of charm. I'm already planning my next visit because I know I'll be coming back for more of these delightful buns. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIEcfQHuYZtz83TOrKdhdK3bo3Msbb6FZ_Pter&fid=0x0:0xbd009cff3ace3484"],"When":"2023-12-2"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1-7ac9tpfBUECShkHhhDkfvpQSpPBpZeAQMG_5DxSwKALpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Turned off by the expensive prices, Boa bakery beside Joyce station and in Chinatown are way better and cheaper. Only cheap bakeries would use boiled eggs inside the deluxe bao.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Macao Imperial Tea Burnaby
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tanya Gelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9CtTzxWeKcY-rhYJP54Vs-3mhJ7odpgXdFeE4OARdAq7_6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered pearl Cheesecake milk tea and black sugar taro milk tea! The cheesecake milk tea is definitely over rated, tasted so bad. I’m not sure if what I received was an exception or it’s just the general taste. Not really worth for $7-8","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPepxedXgpl7KkuZz3phE5il-eoAa7gLv_lYRwd&fid=0x0:0x4fb926eb0d644f34"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have tried so many bubble tea places and this place is one of the best by far. The atmosphere is great and it's not very busy. I am always a fan of brown sugar milk teas. I have tried their cheesecake variety and it was good as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUstGBN11TWrjQbn-KYc2dtCBSoS-P_eigeGcl&fid=0x0:0x4fb926eb0d644f34"],"When":"2023-4-5"},{"Name":"aljig adona","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJIZxvybGbvPZip6s418nz81YI3s7gGFYBZw8iJbW5RoEp8p1V=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Gave me the wrong drink and they don’t want to replace my order. The Filipina lady is EXTREMELY RUDE If there’s a score lower than 1 I would’ve give it DEFINITELY NOT RECOMMENDED should be closed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8AScyDlp6OsHDhFTQkyRXtaxZmxCCbx59aESn&fid=0x0:0x4fb926eb0d644f34"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Esther W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ44_CjQ6-wehLPc33Ng17kPOWOSFrXqo3jg5WgP7CtwNUYUeR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the glass tea bottles. Wish they let you choose what drink goes in it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwhK3FaNaOQtOwuw1vone0GemEB9yYVkVC6Tub&fid=0x0:0x4fb926eb0d644f34"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried the Halo Halo drink and it was good. Quite liked the jellies that were mild in flavour but quite nice in texture and pretty in colour. Good assortment of things in the halo halo like pearls, red bean, sago, flan/pudding etc. However, it took like 15-20 minutes to make one drink! Didn’t think it would take that long and for the taste, almost $10.00 a drink is a bit steep cuz after tip it was over $11 dollars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSEjpzIhPHkqZsvETJroWBdvXvNfB5wpiJLs17&fid=0x0:0x4fb926eb0d644f34"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Eliza Bauden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNfw6T7zqfle-DntbOYzUP8cyD2d3WEoahcf10ir1ifVWNZi_S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Out of all bubble tea places that I have gone to, and tried out
Macao Imperial Tea is my favourite and my go to, to satisfy my cravings
It’s just something about their bubble tea that is so refreshing and i’ve never had that “feeling” before about milk tea Macao hits that spot!

I have tried many drinks here, because my cravings are always different at times. (Just gonna list down some because it would take me a while😅)

Just wanted to share on here my favourite drinks

Caramel Mpresso: a blended coffee slush with caramel drizzle around the cup topped with whip cream and a caramel drizzle on top (perfect amount of sweetness and is such a perfect Caramel like frappe)

Blue Curacao: a Blue fizzy Virgin like cocktail 🍸 💙

Taro Cheesecake Pearl Milk Tea💜: like who doesn’t love a taro x cheesecake combo?! This is not too sweet and hits the spot

Oreo Cheesecake Pearl MilkTea🍪: For you Oreo and cheesecake lovers this is a perfect drink for you! just love when i’m drinking it the cheesecake gives a “creamy” vibe and the bits of Oreo in my mouth just melt (perfect amount of sweetness)

White Mocha Mpresso: is a white chocolate and coffee blended drink and it’s bomb 💣

Star Taro Slush: Might I say, out of all taro bubble tea’s I have had. This one takes a place in my heart💜

Halo halo MilkTea 🍧: Halo Halo is a popular shaved ice dessert from the Philippines🇵🇭 and has all of the toppings in milk tea form😍 (try it for yourself you’ll be mind blown😉)

When you’re here you should also try the Ube Mamon💜: it’s very fluffy, and light and is the best Mamon I have ever had! Surprisingly not too sweet😍

Service🤝:is fast and friendly
Location📍:is perfect, has convenience stores near by, near restaurants, and Buy Low Foods across from it
Great place to hang out and grab a drink and sit down with your friends
Has a cute bench with two big teddy bears🧸 to take pictures for that “Instagram esthetic”
The managers are amazing❤️

Thank you Macao Imperial Tea for always bringing a smile on my face when i’m feeling down, and for the consistency, and bringing joy to others🥰

Keep up with the amazing work!❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrvk8DP0rBDmgMxsjhfeIgo4ZK6JhWCQGuzaHp&fid=0x0:0x4fb926eb0d644f34"],"When":"2022-10-29"},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyed my watermelon lemonade with lychee pearls. Pretty quiet for Wednesday afternoon. They should make bubble waffles","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiTZwdydHZPitgOJrvCYyvu_BTZih1Amm11PWc&fid=0x0:0x4fb926eb0d644f34"],"When":"2024-8-1"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Emily Ashford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7LB4yOHF_72ma5pIKSuDxDxmiYN96TzjjxiXBwBwIs2QedNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just had them cater our wedding, and it was amazing! They went way above and beyond--the dishware was beautiful and they even brought decorations to make everything look gorgeous! They were very communicative, checking in just the right amount to make sure that they were giving us what we wanted. And their food is such an incredible taste; our guests ate it up and gave us so many compliments about how beautiful it looked and how good it tasted. Would absolutely recommend to anyone who's planning an event!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGQdyaYeyIlWYtaubLrtL-K5kQO6AK760e6IqV\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Erika Marumoto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcHNwQOGV9AoUyHloKogKSxG21mHHw4DIAuDC5f0ObFNTR5ys=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an excellent afternoon tea with all the Sistas!  This would not have been possible without the excellent tea service provided by Kevin and crew of Bon Moment Bakeshop and catering on Still Creek!  Kevin made my Mom’s day seeing all her girls together.  Thank you!\nErika","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRpfPRVfPtdiekxfUakf39JMwsY-Za1a-FFZy3\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Alicia Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcQ3bYtGzlCdQM8jft4p1gqPYLE_q603xIMevrU64nqOGlqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful!  The chef was kindly able to accommodate our order at the last minute for Mother's Day.  We were able to have a lovely little picnic in our backyard.  Everything was very tasty and enjoyable.  We loved the tea pairings as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY-4H3MhLaGYBPA5ucJp_rJs5RKjle2WLOrDez\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"E Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtIzjFTdoaBecBrdLqu7u1u8o7N_0B_jWw-7NnI18wW81cww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was delighted when I had my first bite. The pastries were delicate and very tasty. The mint Minted Melon Tisane tea was the perfect pairing with my savory and sweet treats. I had preordered this high tea to go set to celebrate my birthday. The white chocolate waffle was incredible! Kevin was awesome, he checked on us beforehand. Must try for all occasions! I will definitely order from Bon Moment again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxrB8RlW3NfbzjgqGD2NIeNT-lTKaatm05HOkO\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2023-2-24"},{"Name":"tyna m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8WTU2xhplv4UtFc5OQC3-N-EsLVWAjLEZMUsxOTzvKTbxKGFjGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have had a 'few' of the Afternoon Tea sets + thoroughly enjoy them all! The deserts were amazing with so much care a detail to each item from visually to taste. My fav this time was the salmon!\nIt's is a pleasure taste explosion along with excellent + responsive service! Highly recommend this experience! Support local!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtMa-DMqIxJg-UwEUfUy4Oe7U8s6qkNb-jBo78\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2023-5-3"},{"Name":"Dani Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4h6JdtCVeOdxz7DDBNVjw1TdjvNFX4DTcchsVkt24wNvi34k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing afternoon tea prepared with love by red seal chef, Kevin. Hotel quality with the most affordable price you can find in Vancouver. High quality ingredients like caviar and foie gras are used in each set and items get changed out frequently so you won’t get bored. Highly highly recommend - I’ve ordered from them 3 times already and it never disappoints!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH9DupfzNvmKz0wfUscLQtqDXVRO8kBkFtqa79\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2023-3-4"},{"Name":"V P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdwSFMB2Ew_keK6StwkYO1dELAFHt7DlEJLkOucELkeS8ABe4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered an afternoon tea set to enjoy with my family over Thanksgiving weekend, the set was very nicely presented with a handwritten card from Kevin, which is very thoughtful in my opinion. The set has both savoury and sweet items, for someone who is not crazy about dessert, this is great! The price is reasonable and I like having the option of having high tea at home. Definitely give it a try :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAVrJjt-egNHE_pUJ9t1ALLtlKfHc36LKac3yA\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2022-10-25"},{"Name":"Howie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYIL_jR4p0ikBve6Ikrj7MV5upiolZVMtwy7HE-V6FNibaCuNd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bon Moment has highest quality of the dessert you can get in the greater Vancouver. The dessert is delicious and unique. Their menu changes frequently. I always try to order every 2 months to enjoy different type of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtUJBK5NyTDHRr8RyI6rhqvcHvPtG1gAZCbdku\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2022-11-8"}]

Nikki ignored that I’m there at the cashier. When another customer came, she helped her instead.  When i ordered, she rudely said they are out of dark &  didn’t even let me know pike was still brewing & didn’t ask if I wanted sugar or milk & it was Not busy. I’m have been using the app for the longest time & I always get great service from All the other Starbucks:  avoid Brentwood mall location","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nina Nina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZbhZJX3HEueZZLpxqPXabLicizPKFLrhaJLmmuYYZ0h2qxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They refused service several times and did not sell me a donut and coffee.They  excused themselves that they don't have a change from 100 cad bill. I brought a 100 dollar bill, I went with this 100 bill to another place (not Sturbucks), and I've got excellent service there. The worst service in the world that I received at this Brentwood Starbucks location. I'll never go there again till the rest of my life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cinematic Street","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCp2f1A-In1bpp3loogksA-Xwpv81Z3SBe1YH0vraCE77A3vdn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This area of Burnaby is called the Brentwood District and this Starbucks Coffe Shop is part of a mall called the Amazing Brentwood.  The name is appropriate because the architecture is stunning in every direction.  The Starbucks itself is no exception, because it has a fabulous design and is perched majestically on the edge of a plaza that overlooks the Brentwood Town Centre Skytrain and the Lougheed Highway.  The views at this Starbucks are amazing, inside and out.  It’s a photographers dream coffee shop.

The mall was formerly called the Brentwood Towne Centre.  The entire neighbourhood is a huge development in Burnaby.  It’s a very popular place to live and work.  There are tons of stores nearby so you can shop till you drop.  Then come to Starbucks for some R&R.  The location is perfect for access or a meetup, because it’s literally right beside the Skytrain.  You can’t miss it.  It usually has a water fountain out front which adds to the experience, but sadly it wasn’t working on the day I visited.

This Starbucks sits on top of a McDonalds, and both places have large windows to sit beside and watch the world go by.  Starbucks has a unique wrap around corridor with ample seating so that you can get a good view, no matter where you sit.  Lots of light to say the least.  Perfect for the long Vancouver winters where light is the most valuable commodity.  Even the McDonalds below the Starbucks appears to have a very interesting open concept design.

I was working on a tower nearby so I had to be at work early, and thankfully the Starbucks was open.  Their hours are amazing.  5:30AM-10:30PM on most days.  Great for construction workers or anyone with unusual  work hours.  Shooting the Starbucks at night was almost more interesting than the daytime because the light is so dramatic.  I also came to Starbucks during the day for coffee, and also took more pictures.  My day ended at 8:30PM so I was able to snap a few more night pictures at Starbucks, grab some of their delicious Avocado spread which I'm kind of addicted too, before hopping on the train.

As usual, wifi, food, ambiance, and coffee was great.  I know what I’m getting at Starbucks and I love that predictability.  Also, the staff were excellent.  Very friendly and helpful.  I was so surprised to see the option to tip the staff with a card.  Usually most Starbucks require a manual cash tip.  The nice barista said that this new tipping method “may” be rolled out to all Starbucks.  That would be great, as cash isn’t the most convenient thing to carry around.

All around great coffee shop in a very attractive mall that sits in a very attractive part of Burnaby.  Brentwood is popular and appears to be thriving.  Lots of towers going up around here, for good reason.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXrPk4nn0x2hbUaNye5kS4vjhFfnblTAolt3uZ&fid=0x0:0xd0051032d291910b"],"When":"2023-4-6"},{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good location along Brentwood district with ample amount of seating inside the shop. They offer outside seats with their outdoor patio overlooking the beautiful view outside like the water fountain and others. Service was great but they needed more staff to accommodate the sudden influx of people making the que with longer wait time. My total amount of time spent from ordering to getting my order is about 34 minutes on my estimate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEb8dXnA8t5jszbnfm3wcCRmmAJQdkefENmDX-&fid=0x0:0xd0051032d291910b"],"When":"2023-8-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kimi Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmGcf79-dtKD3mqW2FhkIlnFicRE1wE9HVbysDOFNCUkT9CLE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came for a bubble waffle and she gave me a cold one. I’ve had them in the past and if it’s fresh, it comes out hot. The point of these bubble waffles is to have them hot and crunchy. She told me that it’s cold because they move it over to cool down. It was ready right after I paid which leads me to believe it was already made and NOT fresh!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5_01voTVpSIMy4RXpMAR8768FSpLJQ89cFuWZ&fid=0x0:0x7198d2bb4bb10f49"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Adam Bauman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfaGVPFirvJH5TTW0hpJUDtsQIvJc1wzx5QTvb4pIXxvFP7dQJ-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered the Szechuan duck noodle combo #18. The images on the menu were completely different from the meal. The images showed broccoli, tomato, and few other ingredients. I got 1 rubbery peppercorn covered duck breast and cabbage with seemingly some tofu skins or something. The broth was decent but could be better.
I also would prefer if they had those buzzer units like every other store in the food court. Their order ready screen is not updated and I had to check back often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoeNQXIa_kBqWYkKC32xQVQShcgXkvny7JhV4z&fid=0x0:0x7198d2bb4bb10f49"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"A M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWvg88cxFi-Whpi-QZRwC_wprIJbtdrq1L_DgKg19Cb1WnKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered at counter few times in the past.  But this time, ordered half chicken by UBER.
I knew it is boneless, but it was skinless as well.  70% of the chicken had no skin and tasteless.  And it is so small and no wing.  So much space left for a 6" takeout container.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKJML4VDLHOX6hDVfUJP3_bAgis-NfBMgcfc9z&fid=0x0:0x7198d2bb4bb10f49"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"James Inouye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGMUsvXLijMfgZydLJhU2TpG1bqPFbrelq3iJSQAmmOzYoUfG8Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for noodle soup and rice dishes. And a very great deal since it also comes with a drink. The staff are friendly and accommodating, and they are consistently excellent.

It's good to go when they open. During lunchtime, the food court can get pretty busy. There are a lot of seats around. And it's very clean.

I recommend coming here if you want noodle soup.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvqrv-ZBYJxMHDwrUosrcKfGVoNjYFLr5EHs-jn5iLo41Zmw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great price and good portion for lunch. We purchased lunch and ate at the mall. The place was busy so we had to wait but it was quick for customized noodle dish and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpy18wV_cv5qp668qjkc1_GxIjf7wnQILin_-R&fid=0x0:0x7198d2bb4bb10f49"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Frank-E S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQqGrhmSMvK5d6i8DZca-5U01rmiJHXM6e3jvV56tTRuvGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"As this location is situated in a food court, the atmosphere is good. I've ordered their Salty Nuggets with Rice dish in the past with no issues but today was something else! It felt like it was reheated and toaster oven-ed as the texture was off; the chicken pieces had a hard exterior and the inside was dry. It must've been from the day before or something...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsKxdmbVz9766ZztDJnsgFAAvTegG4aVO7d-qG&fid=0x0:0x7198d2bb4bb10f49"],"When":"2023-12-1"},{"Name":"AVRIL SWIFT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRvQ0rnf0weuFVtehTeOvTJk0mIQSuYAF9GhuU8TZzAegLoo3u=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered the Hainanese Chicken from this restaurant and the rice they gave me was fully burned. I believe the staff notes about it, and they try to hide the burned rice in the middle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2jelzYysMtfanQQsTWiAMSc3BAROxQc0yABqD&fid=0x0:0x7198d2bb4bb10f49"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"D Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4D0pnJRuugp7xtOoI9Okhc1IdtNuzKocuzhsSBj3gUdos57g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Feeling like something soupy? This is a new bubble waffle location inside the brentwood mall food court. Staff is friend and organized. Menu is very extensive.

I think the bubble waffles chain does really well for people who want to have a really complete combo (food, drink, snack) at a reasonable price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY59yCahcb2K5MkLIZ3JBL_ngKmwmb_4HOe2Rr&fid=0x0:0x7198d2bb4bb10f49"],"When":"2022-2-1"}]

[{"Name":"Katie Chaplin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgGt21v0tA0-rfo7KAJHHHR0zsactkoce6WhtYZOD6xcvgapRT4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Signs inside are always fun and festive. Hard working employees who are very kind and considerate. Secret recipe drinks and lots of free sample days!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPap0XklnOGlqXcwfY75GYsy_WpOIH8ENQLNnnr&fid=0x0:0x207f8f135a2c4c2d"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was actually pretty stoked about this! For the average Save on Foods Starbucks, this was a delightful experience and tasty Soy Decaf Latte. I mean.. what's not to like, pretty simple but believe it or not, sometimes it's hard to get a consistent good service at the low key chains in grocery stores.
Friendly staff, yummy drinks and good service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNW-cXPQaGvRTUiAC41M1Hr8q6QA90yuOxlKjMH&fid=0x0:0x207f8f135a2c4c2d"],"When":"2022-12-28"},{"Name":"Josee Rugge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUShGSY1jcYdZTBHahRFEitS6X7X0NltRoSvMSi-U7EP5AvuQg2EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie and Sara are the friendliest baristas, they work well under pressure and make amazing drinks consistently. Starbucks is lucky to have them","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sunshine R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmBq-vH672PNgunu5-hqzLHWS3eOIQdFKljX4uInov8xpiYwDU_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dear Starbucks,

I’m writing to express my appreciation for the excellent service I received from a member of your staff on 12/23/22.
Although I don’t remember his name, the boy who served me was extremely kind and patient, and he made a difficult day much easier for me.

I had come into the store to order a tea, and I mentioned to him that my daughter was feeling sick. He listened to my concerns and provided me with helpful information and recommendations with a smile, which meant a lot to me at the time.

I just wanted to take a moment to thank him and to let you know that he is a valuable asset to your team. Please pass along my gratitude to him and to the rest of your staff for their hard work and dedication.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ekta Jassu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIlITNNt00Ak8A9MPzVynO2i3ZNkWqKAWqkUgV3tmu2wZ-mVs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best drink service and great customer service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lexie Arellano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKN_aswGxUe9kXhkC2mgvxhI8VzeZckPaB-LgdLneBYVZZy2VQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Girls are super friendly, even under pressure the service is always great :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN70wNoBiriJ9SuIwJWtKNus0OxkdNz3li6Z99z&fid=0x0:0x207f8f135a2c4c2d"],"When":"2022-3-21"},{"Name":"Lisa V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcml9rZKlYEVaT3FpgYj8R5N6aYmItCEAddOhlJHNYGRuF5A2l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie is literally one of the nicest and kindest barista at Starbucks. 10/10 would recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristine Baril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNvvc_yQ7LurbtxlQTwx-5LkZMSLDsJzAd1js9OFDcGYvxXu8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Was really disappointed to see no one wearing masks behind the counter, as they handle food and drink during the Covid-19 pandemic.

Otherwise, service is decent but can be slow as quite often there's only one person working to take orders and make the drinks. I'd stick to buying from one of the other numerous nearby Starbucks instead.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bill Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrLDUKCB9KhwKlqIkCcXUiASMuWECjsxURVB66vsZhnoGGXEJCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, it looks like something from Singapore or some other amazing city. Truly a spectacle. Nothing of the old Brentwood Town Hall from the south is recognizable. You just see amazing...... They even have a elevated Ecar dealership. The food court is spectacular, very modern and sleek. Upscale dining choices and comfortable seating. Everyone will be impressed. As you walk through to the old original section it was nice that they keep the old roofing as it is like the sails at Canada Place and the cast iron supports are timeless. However all the shops look 60's very tired and sad. There are in a neighbourhood of 50% vacant spaces right now. It'll be interesting to see how they modernize it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJCtkYPPY2J0Xzi6NzFSgYptytZAix2_vtc2hy&fid=0x0:0xa9a6f1bb9a10b040"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Jerry Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzcwAbf8_tnSAivbPavx6Qp0oAb2ANZwbv-A8Wr8ztzPwQLDkJYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went there for lunch. First time there since they renovated the mall years ago. The newer part of the mall looks great but the older area needs more stores. 5 stars for the food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaq7XOaUaH27y9Y2aMVyB7bRffa7dXyXjlIPm0&fid=0x0:0xa9a6f1bb9a10b040"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you never been to this new mall,  you should visit there.
The buildings and the high rises around the mall look entire different than before.
The food court is nice with good seating environment.  The food court has many different choices for all.
The plaza outside the mall is a really nice spot especially in summer. They offered free concerts last year.
Many restaurants are in the plaza.  The younger people like it for sure.  Check it out in warm days.
The live music concerts are back on July 6, 2024.  It will not last for long. Please check their website.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1CRaTqyBvia4I6byhNNqZW-B2v-4M4agjwb6f&fid=0x0:0xa9a6f1bb9a10b040"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":""Brentwood is a relatively new shopping center, with most stores still empty. It's not great for shopping, but it's good for dining, outdoor activities, and visiting cafes. It’s conveniently located next to a SkyTrain station for easy access."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfMHt2FbzB6FAKJzfdJtl3u0KQbJhZY_NiJ0R1&fid=0x0:0xa9a6f1bb9a10b040"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Dayane L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-aVnBCjKWasiLYcwLUWwkm8MSQ2AzxjHXz_ufjrsjEZAUStCq4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Brentwood Plaza so much! It has everything you need—VIP movies, entertainment, excellent restaurants, and great coffee shops, all in a modern and vibrant atmosphere. It’s the best area I’ve ever lived in!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEumH_3tHYbtiaB1qTEDIrLtA2u6acDblWJzkB&fid=0x0:0xa9a6f1bb9a10b040"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Paola Del Valle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmqnuG-QXDsWeccBgp7Mm73jQVhEDdTuNq-0bKLlTnxrzIhFFC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like to go and just relax there during the weekend if no plan comes up, me and my family or friends come here most of the time, either for shopping, to grab lunch or just to hang out. It would be better if they had more chairs and tables outside during summer, as there are many people trying to get a table during the weekends. Great to watch important events, hockey or soccer games, people gathers here to watch them and create a great atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3O8k4sEq75f4ZpalIRdLb1E3g1VXW8v2aBhDv&fid=0x0:0xa9a6f1bb9a10b040"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"AWAIS THE BOSS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFR2cYPf0wPxYiA1s-uSEkyon-hcTMvm8LJq6BY3cw9K_NYCzp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brentwood holds a special place in my heart as a town where I’ve experienced both moments of serenity and unexpected intrigue. Living there has been like stepping into a storybook, with its tree-lined streets, charming shops, and a community that seems to know everything about everyone. But beneath the picturesque surface lies a complexity I’ve come to appreciate over the years.

One of the things I cherish most about Brentwood is the sense of belonging. The neighbors are warm and inviting, always ready to lend a hand or share a story. However, this closeness also comes with its challenges—gossip travels fast, and privacy can feel elusive. There’s a strange mix of comfort and tension in knowing that while people care deeply about each other, secrets rarely stay hidden for long.

The town’s beauty is undeniable. Early morning walks through its parks or evenings spent at local cafes have been some of my most peaceful moments. Yet, Brentwood isn’t just about charm; it’s also about resilience. I’ve seen the community come together during tough times, whether it’s rallying around a struggling neighbor or organizing events to support local causes.

For me, Brentwood isn’t just a place—it’s a feeling. It’s taught me the value of connection, the importance of community, and the complexity of human relationships. My experience here has shaped me in ways I never expected, making it a chapter of my life I’ll always treasure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOytb9dmZF-Xi7n1Z8HORDwQxAmNCUlaPjE88aQ&fid=0x0:0xa9a6f1bb9a10b040"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Brady Elliott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi1pj4abmRBJQ1ixuQcdi42JGVfbXcdJyhbFynVEdAbRi5RA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you like peace and quiet and a super outrageously uniquely designed mall that virtually is empty. Them go here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV0yCFza5FWiwzeZnV70AithkU7ZRocZeDgmbs&fid=0x0:0xa9a6f1bb9a10b040"],"When":"2024-10-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Soner Kalayci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyFA9nFJv5HZ_bIMNLk9Z9eDkiKHwZPIyuAppLzuVMKInn_oSR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Environment: Pretty decent, clean and spacious. They have outside seating which I appreciate a lot!

Food: Just tried their Jupiter sandwich. I had high hopes but it wasn’t able to deliver. It lacks any and all texture, a mostly haphazard construction of very mushy ingredients. A well soaked beef dip is still more interesting. The taste is not for my liking but it is not bad. There is not enough harmony between flavours, and zero texture is making it even more apparent. I believe having a better roasted beef that has a bite to it would elevate the sandwich at least one star!

Cost: It is not a cheap place, and with the lackluster sandwich, it is quite low value.

Overall, this is a nice looking place with nice people working inside. If they improve their sandwiches, it’s well worth a visit. For now, I will not try again for a while :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Filia Kumala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIovBEwl6PBaxcHXI6oAWL3Fe_Z80KMUMDVq-6oVkti2S1wAdxa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy cafe to chill, free parking as well !
And the sandwiches really good. A lot of desserts as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiqZo5KABeYVYqlPVle2JJUxmP3QP7AescBDE_&fid=0x0:0x6d04a162b9761b1a"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Jack Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhRPpXHdrFGpSfFPj2Llvg9rACCkMWbpnKawexr7OBRxKhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After checking the doctor next door, we dropped by the cafe and try having some breakfast. The portion is quite large and taste is good. I loved the onion pickle right next to my sandwich. Bread is also fresh and crispy. Belgian chocolate that my kid have also taste very good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM433fRhlsNQsCyYahjxae2ahlXGrDFvuPnIwdN&fid=0x0:0x6d04a162b9761b1a"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Anita Rahman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbYGrDbp0-pEtutp2LMOGSJJItl9mWCgkE4IHACE4014Vmc94=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful place for a hearty meal. Already visited 3 times in couple of months. Everyone working there is super nice and friendly. Their grilled cheese with soup combo is my most favorite and also the lava cake. We visited with our year old son and he was always treated very warmly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jinchen Cai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAkTaGuIBaKsnqPWu-_2v9e15t_xkadDsddRx-i0U3GTJUait-Fw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Cafe, amazing food and drinks! 🥪☕️🍵

Even though this cafe has been open since 2020, I've haven't tried it until today. Interior design and atmosphere is great and welcoming. Food and drinks are great for the price.

The juniper sandwich is amazing. It taste just as good as the all the Italian sandwiches I've had in Italy! I'm quite shocked. The deli cuts was juicy and tender, and the bread used is perfect. 🥰

I ordered the caramel macchiato and it's so much better than the Starbucks one that's my go-to. Idk what it is about the caramel that was so tasty with a smokey flavour. Unfortunately, the espresso in the latte cannot be compared to expresso in Italy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMROyzs-D1V-_3dtGCiFhJWmQVMYD0Xij26812L&fid=0x0:0x6d04a162b9761b1a"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Vienna Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1Ta4lwNnbpbXRflsTPdhZ5BFLfHHNLQU8CNBUiA018milklt7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute study spot. I spot an outlet! Food is decent but the latte was extremely bitter. Calm in the morning :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhUKgVff1MphEC5VvK9QRmDOF6T3EPYMnKhANM&fid=0x0:0x6d04a162b9761b1a"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Stefan Rees","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVygWTOmYHF6xzlHi-VSEPhK4QTFBEMEA4EzI875uDMDccdlZ-d-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Breakfast sandwich was tasty but a little salty and poorly assembled, really slid everywhere. The breakfast wraps eggs were an interesting color of grey. Blueberry balsamic pastry was wonderful and I enjoyed my black coffee although the iced coffee lacked punch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtJYHzBYn5t06aVvU0MF1errgNlg8i1ko4m68i&fid=0x0:0x6d04a162b9761b1a"],"When":"2022-6-21"},{"Name":"kristina harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEiYWpqVelO0tFIKk8FvQvgQXtUL5ZH3j1tq-L7jd9piQsTybW7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time eating here. The Jupiter sandwich was tasty and just the right size for me. My friend needed 2 sandwiches. The London Fog was well made. I'll come back next time to try the desserts which looked amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOW-y2bYtdiFnGVI08AuaocpAGJMw41A35w721&fid=0x0:0x6d04a162b9761b1a"],"When":"2023-3-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Solid, albeit slightly salty food, but not the friendliest of service. We went for the happy hour dim sum over the weekend. We made a reservation for 2:15 but since the dim sum happy hour doesn’t begin until 2:30, we were only seated around that time. Whether it was because we came for the happy hour, it was not very clear. Just as we were seating, they asked us whether we wanted tea and walked away without hearing our response which was really rude.

Also when they gave us the menu, it wasn’t clear which ones were included in the promotion on the menu provided and the server left so quickly we didn’t get a chance to ask. It was 2:40 pm at this point and we were hungry so we just ordered as is from the non-crossed off items.

The dessert was the first to arrive at the table, before any of the other food, which was unacceptable. Then we got most of the dishes within a five minute span except for one. They didn’t even realize until we asked for it and there was no apologies or anything when we received the dish and that was while we were having dessert.

They charge for tea and for any take out boxes. I didn’t check our bill well enough to see whether there was a 15% discount accounted for the happy hour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSDABhR6r9GCyJAJjq7rnOgGofYR-cP3oZaRdP&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Victor Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpnZPh7heLHnvp3JcjErTq9VzUaFB6LA67FBNyLyGHNyq0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a higher priced Chinese restaurant, but the quality and proportions make them worthy.

Every meal that we have had here has been fantastic. The flavors are always on point, and there is plenty to go around.

Our favorite dishes are the Peking Duck 2-way with Lettuce Wrap, the Salted Fish & Chicken Fried Rice, the Roasted Chicken half, and my little ones love the Crab Claws with Shrimp Paste.

Since we do not live here, the price is worth it for the few opportunities we get to enjoy the amazing Chinese food in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjnKBho6YRS6ZWocZBbqrkpYeF6QqChT1wodfa&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"HX Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlYYhpD9JHfzL6pBbvHaEDo2KwU_rwj_gqucPvsBKa_qy6gJr5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dined in this restaurant several times.  No disappointment any time.  Restaurant is nicely renovated and seating is comfortable.  Waiters/waitress greeted customers warmly.  Food  tastes good.  Special discounted dishes for weekdays.  I especially like their Peking duck 2 courses, ling cod 2 courses, and the oyster hot pot.  Highly recommend it to friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-sKBhFTxdzSU1ZLwPpvvjs9yylGvY2wjnD-XX&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Mori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzjNclSLYHoLurDMy1z6lBJJfgC1i3gQXUk28JpQQw8EIfuYkF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming to this specific location and luckily we didn't have to wait to be seated, on a Saturday early afternoon!
We had a craving for dim sum and happened to be in the area so we figured we would try this spot and I'm glad we did. The dim sum were a good size and the bean curd rolls and sticky rice had some nice flavors it.
It's on the pricier side of the dim sum spectrum, so expect to see prices in the $12 range for each dish under the dim sum menu.
The service was good, never had to ask for more hot water for the tea and the food came out quickly.
Will definitely come back again if we find ourselves in the area and are craving dim sum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1KYZ0UKYCHV_Zp2htfc4DCeQxSfVwxaL9gROs&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Clara Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoMWRC0cDGP4nCpQ1_Zdm86daXS0A0KJbVAa9QczqqbfD7fWIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for the Tuesday Peking duck two course special and it was delicious! We were a table of 4 with reservations (seated very quickly too) and the reason for the docked star was mainly because service just wasn't there. We weren't asked what tea we wanted and menus were also not given either. It took approximately 10 minutes to get the attention of the servers to place our tea order and ask for menus. The restaurant wasn't empty but it was not at half capacity either so we found it strange it took so long (getting the bill and payment took forever as well). Between 4 of us, we shared the Peking duck course, the egg white fried rice and the sauteed green beans. Food came super quick and everything was tasty! Peking duck was crispy, the lettuce wrap was super fresh and the fried rice was amazing. Definitely recommend coming here on Tuesdays as it's about half price for the Peking duck course.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt6APVQ_474JH0ljL18O2h3fpgR0JQRabT-saG&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Bella Mills","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9Ii_MUe1yBHkf4i7hAtgKoYsTZWvSgOMwOkR9qA3QXh9dyYpPrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Braised Goose Feet with Fish Maw & Mushroom.
Goose feet is not soft enough and fish maw is truly fishy. Chicken and Pekin duck are super crispy and juice. The rest of dishes are delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMITXn9wsIsSWD24Buc01M3ja3XhCvSzLgAW2Fd&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Kelvin L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIKP-AEz_-4OsWq_LkU6jY6VsViU-g2T1snkyr7uxb8Q5hpgcQGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My usual go to spot for dim sum is Sun Sui Wah but I think I found myself a new go to place for dim sim. The prices are on the higher side but the quality and proportions make it worth it. Everything we order was very good and on point with taste.
They have daily specials as well as Happy Hour from 230 - 430 Monday to Friday. The service was good too.
I'll certainly be back again and maybe even for happy hour 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdrwnAOb7YqjAkTv0E31SzBD3X5X8cjj6vz4WQ&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Aneesh Vaghadia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWrL7cKUXjPtxgV-J_aqDc0U8QhiCuyIUBtGHmUeqQs8V-GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Neptune is a great Chinese restaurant located in Brentwood Mall. It is a traditional family style restaurant with round table seating, aquariums for fresh seafood and one wall serving as a TV screen for live sports.

Service at the restaurant is quick and snappy. The servers are professional and polite, efficiently providing great table service and serving dishes amidst the din of the busy restaurant floor.

The food is absolutely delicious. The prices are a bit higher but the quality is top and the portions are large, great for sharing amongst family. The two dishes of Peking duck are a classic! (The dim sum breakfast is also unreal, but we most recently came for dinner.) When purchasing seafood, the server will bring it alive to the table to inspect before preparation.

The restaurant is located on an upper level of Brentwood Mall and is accessible from the main concourse. There is ample parking located on the lower levels. The decor is classic modern and very clean. The bathrooms are located outside the main doors and down the hall, very clean.

Overall, great quality food and service make this one of the best dim sum restaurants in the city. Excellent to take tourists to have a culinary experience to remember!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0XNjdF1yEOXj9awed-r3_8dUwRUMi4JOjas8&fid=0x0:0x7e39e6bd3fc99232"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Took my folks for a quick lunch at the ParkCrest Diner. It’s typical diner style, friendly atmosphere, family run and efficient table service. We had the clubhouse, bacon breakfast and the fish & chips. The food taste was nor scrumptious nor bad. Just okay. The prices were slightly lower than chain restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyNsuhY0A1yKWqhDX0gmu8sbA29Fm4_v6qvl9Q&fid=0x0:0x2a7b38f9b045e4fb"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Kevin Louie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyd1cWI5-K50M1BsfFNavSiBRGYn0MuSSZ4ltVgrMUnHnWWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Peak nostalgia. If you could time capsule a restaurant this would be it. These types of establishments are a dying breed , so if you’re looking for that authentic diner experience to take you back in time this would be it. As for the food , it’s tastes exactly how you remember it. Even if a more modern or fancier restaurant tried to replicate the food they would probably fail. You can only get the taste of diner food from a diner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQTwghgFpsoo3qi_7FfMw6CYhPj15pFUjTN_2i&fid=0x0:0x2a7b38f9b045e4fb"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Amanda Lawrence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrm3ZMxoLF2CG9McrTgRAQudtSzxhvJWcA9JJgJsq1W-v6tmez=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little vintage diner, family run and very friendly. It felt like having breakfast at my grandmas house, we loved visiting here. Prices are super reasonable too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqdFafUNaPNwlMb4pA3eXYA6E_oSQI4Trc8ce8&fid=0x0:0x2a7b38f9b045e4fb"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Johnny Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8kuvggl1b5n8mcnQaYPPw3eDKW2LyleXkOlCYUlDcd0LxcPXH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a gem!  A definite throwback to ol’skool diners of past Vancouver times…but in BBY!   What I say - authentic, value, greasy spoons - so good!   Had the Cafe Hash - awesome, will def be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9MNun2kmVA4D2Cr6jApX3mNlYSmr22eIJ3aMV&fid=0x0:0x2a7b38f9b045e4fb"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Brent Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYSM0_7rmQIvuRgwYvvqbzjo_qKvSImbFN7n8plIZlijT85g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I loved the retro 60s feel of this Chinese Canadian greasy spoon, from the sunburst wall decorations to the green chairs!

I ordered the breaded pork cutlets (14.99). They were very thin, lightly breaded, juicy and crispy. It came swimming in a bath of tasty gravy! It also came with a side of vegetables and a choice of mashed potatoes or fries (I choose mashed potatoes). The mash was chunky how I like it !

They also had daily specials, like a hot beef sandwich, hamburger steak and more. These were the same price as the regular menu item but they came with a small cup of daily soup.

Service was excellent here! Cash and debit only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEivMVSe5R012UsRKbfHUVC1cMJTw0g89Y05ST&fid=0x0:0x2a7b38f9b045e4fb"],"When":"2023-10-19"},{"Name":"Eunice L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQkzUZXfdvXjIof6QNpWT0Clt0HQWO6_tic3KMTC1-MnvOY65-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoyed my experience.  The Cantonese-speaking owners have a really well-run operation for a small team.  The cafe is well-maintained and offers a vintage vibe.  I stopped in for breakfast and my coffee was constantly refilled, condiments
were brought without needing to be requested, food was reasonably priced, quality was so-so with the hash browns.

What really impressed me was the community vibe - there were a lot of local regulars right at opening - one of their regulars helped set up the patio set outside and they were catching up with their friends for a regular meet up.  The lady who was serving everyone remembered multiple orders of her regulars and was very warm and welcoming to everyone in both English & Cantonese.  She never stopped moving - getting coffee prepared, taking orders, delivering orders, checking in, gossiping with her regulars, coordinating with her husband in the kitchen or manning the till.  The husband chef was constantly cooking and also managed to step out for a quick chat with some regulars while grabbing some coffee.

Came for the food but stayed for the positive vibes to kick off a busy weekend.  Overall, well done!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfYe6gT3AjGrpInaPA2AoIzp49Tcms2VCBZsAN&fid=0x0:0x2a7b38f9b045e4fb"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Kerry Blouin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSW2DH-eKrJvoqT2G0RRXWJ8bJjxcIzafk7pVuJ5f2_f1-WV9R=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always enjoy coming to this place. Love that it’s not a chain and is run by some salt of the earth types. Bring cash or your debit card. Keep this place busy! We don’t want it to go away! Now is the time to come; when the weather is cold and dreary it’s a lovely place to spend some time and grab a bite.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LP Suk Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZZWhLTBiNnFdEmOz0oWyNSiMsKoKbYJ0F8gVklQ8QmSRWi9TF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A hidden gem that takes you back to the 50’s, this Chinese Canadian run restaurant is charming and the music is piped over a tinny radio which just adds to the atmosphere. The pricing is reasonable, the owners greet the regulars like family, and it is just a solid place for breakfast, burgers, and other diner fare.
Oh, and the coffee is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVbz5iZxoxYfn_t6TAQs7AhYNtOlJSwzqQd3jg&fid=0x0:0x2a7b38f9b045e4fb"],"When":"2024-5-25"}]

title: Browns Socialhouse Brentwood
descriptions: Chill restaurant & bar with elevated takes on pub fare such as burgers & pizza, plus weekend brunch.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gabriel Souza (Blart)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSnVx7ZTOwrxOmzkyk8g-x4LBtDbZDjqUNRBwPSfW5OfbG78V-Vw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at Brown Social House and left thoroughly impressed by both the cuisine and the service. I ordered the Butcher’s Block Burger, which featured a perfectly cooked, flavorful beef patty topped with crispy, smoky bacon and crisp, fresh lettuce. The attention to detail in the preparation was evident, as each component complemented the others beautifully, making for an incredibly satisfying and well-balanced burger.

What truly set the experience apart, however, was the outstanding service. Erin, our waitress, was attentive and genuinely friendly, making sure our needs were met with efficiency and a warm demeanor. Her professionalism and positive attitude contributed to an inviting and enjoyable atmosphere. It’s clear that Brown Social House prioritizes both the quality of their food and the experience of their guests.

For anyone seeking a combination of excellent service and a delicious, thoughtfully crafted meal, I highly recommend Brown Social House. It’s a standout choice for anyone looking to enjoy a top-notch dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-GTQolz2yVh8m8-O0cuxlHiL_XEtitwMVy7jl&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: Thanks to Sarah and the team for their response to our first review. We returned for brunch and had a wonderful experience. Special mention to our server, Ella, who was very attentive with our food, dietary intolerances, and hot water refills. We had the Angus Beef Hash and Blackened Chicken Wonton Soup. The wonton soup was great, but a tad spicy for my taste buds (in the future, I'd ask for the chili oil on the side). They have large TV screens as well, so it was nice to catch some morning hockey while dining! Looking forward to returning to this location in the future, given the exceptional service.

Came here with a group of 8 for an early dinner. We were sat at a higher table with barstool seats, which were hard to move (as they don't glide on the flooring). Being middle-aged, some in the group needed help from others to be "pushed" closer to the table. The food was good. I had the Crispy Cauliflower and Crispy Yam & Avocado Roll (which was average for the $11 price). The cauliflower had a nice breading and was flavourful, and felt like a slightly smaller portion ("social hour" portion).

We had some concerns with the lack of service. We constantly had to flag down our waitress as we wanted to place part of our order before 6 pm to take advantage of the social hour pricing. My glass of water never was refilled during the meal. For a large group, it would have been nice to get checked in on from time-to-time, as a courtesy. Because of our group size, we still had to pay the automatic 18% gratuity, but we didn't think the service warranted that amount. The food itself did come out in a timely manner and was done correctly with some diners' special requests. When asked, our server was able to take a group photo of our table.

Ample parking in the parkade below with a 3-hour limit, which I was told was a non-factor after 6 pm when I called the restaurant ahead of time. Overall, we had an average experience! While the food was decent, the service for our larger group left a bit to be desired (3 stars).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRMdbceD5gvubL_XIV_xZyV73uBO4uvNPN8nFX&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Chris Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcT6Z40EZW4C3yt0N7VoX3tM1V1mzzAe7xxRrgBiMmtInx7b7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to Brown's Socialhouse Brentwood to celebrate a friend's birthday. We ordered drinks and had dinner. There are multiple TVs to watch sports. There is also outdoor seating available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1r7v6eFGHx_TnjDH5PaLYUNDgz2ep4pV7bVSN&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"chaitanya gupta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP-Cx-tNwiu90cNABgEGrEB8sTBdVTRvK_y-kZN0OvutQ-s073wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Brentwood - Browns Socialhouse, and it was an incredible experience from start to finish. The food was nothing short of amazing. Each dish was prepared with great care and bursting with flavor. The menu offered a fantastic variety of options, ensuring there's something for everyone.

The ambience was equally impressive. The atmosphere is chic and inviting, with a perfect blend of modern design and cozy touches. It’s an ideal spot for a casual lunch, a lively dinner with friends, or a relaxed date night. The staff were friendly and attentive, adding to the overall excellent dining experience.

If you're looking for a place with delicious food and a great vibe, Brentwood - Browns Socialhouse is a must-visit. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO08_3FEcFA7aLMz3TTzE-yN9qQ1G4lgr-Xgjkf&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"virlla devi soothar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ87VSdNOiBHZdFVAOCWbky5_aTwGfKrpQhbWlqGppEwSWfH8BSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently celebrated my husband's birthday at Brown's Social House in Brentwood. The ambiance was pleasant, with just the right level of noise and activity. We thoroughly enjoyed our meal. For starters, we had crispy chicken and pickles, which were incredibly flavorful. Our main dishes included blackened chicken with Alfredo pasta and a crispy chicken sandwich. The Alfredo pasta was my personal favorite. Our server was friendly and even surprised us with a complimentary dessert for the occasion, which was a lovely touch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIllIy92gvjbjUVuQKImk_VX6LjKRVNilTMJGN&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Hembie Ashwe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKO9rJcuK7rmPLT51WDXVZEmLuIpTCZNMBqR345jXFZISUciQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brown’s  is always a hit and today was super awesome because we had a waiter named Jessie who took care of our huge group really well. Food came on time, she was very welcoming and cordial to us. Great Blackened Chicken Alfredo too! I wish they bring back the Butter Chicken though!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maggie M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdc14i8-MYTGVgNkeFp_8cUvOSr08TU9llw-YCHcXvGaMtrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to dine! So peaceful to go sit there and enjoy lunch alone when I have writing or editing that needs to be done. Food is great! The music is on and there are people there but my mission is always accomplished.zero interruption (except to check that *I don’t need anything!) and I can accomplish more in a lunch hour here than in my office with a bowl of cereal. I come back feeling refreshed and accomplished! 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kai Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5heIFDkKoC83IFbA65C6TMLRjWTHbqDpbnlW25A9H1S6DBNo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"You can enjoy a reasonably priced happy hour from 3 p.m. to 6 p.m. There are many big tables and large space, so it's good to go with many friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWhfOrI1XqkBgw-_Pgximn5U6pHeiALjX-MWc&fid=0x0:0x1f96fae1d97e6d13"],"When":"2024-3-16"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Catering","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Groups","enabled":true},{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Transgender safe space","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Cash-only","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thunder Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdSkmsSZNhQgmdDGKl222cUn9wFQ4eo2ZH5ZKJ65CE7S2osss=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very good,highly recommended to check out this place while you in Burnaby! The bubble egg waffle is not too sweet and they have stuffing inside of each bubble. We ordered the Mochi one. They make the waffle fresh to order so they are fluffy and crispy at the same time. Best to eat them straight away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPFfcgVQb5AE3neJtc1_kt4IBiHilN_5WWNv2y&fid=0x0:0xb7eba217bfaa74ff"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Jessica Qian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMPHnv5ykgYQs8zvHb-zflWJP4NabP5GUcTNQF5f9Hl7NQFW1S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute cafe! Love the graphics on the wall and the cute designs. It’s not a bad study spot too. The drinks and food have pretty nice creativity and tastes decently good. Personally I found some of the specialized drinks taste a bit odd. Some drinks you don’t see often at regular cafes but may taste a bit different, totally depends on your preference though. Menu has lots of variety and customer service was acceptable. Washroom could use some cleaning","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1e55xQhgSOBjFerQccVgrA5KynYNErWXb0amt&fid=0x0:0xb7eba217bfaa74ff"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Michelle Trieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRUdLsKoOQIbSFHtkcOmbZuj54calmd_Aq93Oh5d2s-U0bc5dT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute decor on the inside, wasn’t too busy when I went in on Sunday afternoon (2pm).
Ordered the catch on fire and creamy shrimp XL sandwiches, did have to wait a bit (~15min) but was worth it.
Bun was soft and buttery, egg was fluffy and not over cooked. Shrimp sandwich only had three pieces of shrimp but still quite filling.
Catch on fire sandwich was good and spicy, but possibly recommend getting more sauce? And there’s only a bit of noodle just on top to cover the top.
Otherwise not too bad!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBwZjhIDNeknGp681H80T3MMqxuIYU2J9yMLoN&fid=0x0:0xb7eba217bfaa74ff"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Liza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU6psZuYm5issGPqVIywDJmiQmgvYke0cz4aCVVktU9NoaykdJkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is great and the place is pretty spacious compared to others. They have a great selection of desserts and savory food like egg sandwiches and crepes. However, I feel they could improve their selection of drinks, as everything is very sweet and icy. The coffee was also average. Overall, nice spot for a quick and yummy bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtw-TO9LgzZRoWFxZ7Cj4kT6SJ80ueE6qieXri&fid=0x0:0xb7eba217bfaa74ff"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Christopher Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVexNzsO8991iK-9EWX-70Xc57sEkVGaaf84klilDJ3qadcoigBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped in here randomly with friends after eating dinner nearby. Was immediately impressed with the decor. Very whimsical and fun, the kids loved it. The fresh coconut jelly with mango (comes in a fresh coconut) was unique and very refreshing. Our friends got the mango shaved ice (bingsu) and it was also really good. The menu online doesn’t capture everything they offer.. in fact the menu online seems limited. There is a self-serve water station if you want some after all the sweets are consumed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-Add8RJtd9lSyH0fUMG-CilGFCL3fzmuAXF_9&fid=0x0:0xb7eba217bfaa74ff"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last weekend, I happened to be in this area, and the weather was a bit hot. So I wanted to have a cold drink, but there were very few shops around. I chose this one to try. Interestingly, it had a lot of pictures on the walls, and the most special part was the ceiling, which was decorated with many cute hangings, making it feel like stepping into a fairy tale world. I ordered an iced oat milk Earl Grey bubble tea. The pearls were very soft and chewy, and the tea had a rich and fragrant flavor. Since I had my dog with me, I sat at their only outdoor table. Soon, a very friendly staff member came out and asked if they could give my dog some free ice cream. When she brought out a cute little cup, I saw some things that looked like chocolate chips on top. I thought they were chocolate chips, but she explained that they were carob beans, which are safe for dogs, and mentioned that she also had a dog. My dog gulped it down in just a few bites. It was the first time I had heard of carob beans, and she even told me to Google it .Overall, it was an unexpectedly pleasant experience, and I will definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKMvk3pOl48AVc_yFsdwNHTbx76nbjr3OqEKSe&fid=0x0:0xb7eba217bfaa74ff"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Meriel D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdBZiOjd-GeyzGMWsBAXROxAGpgvxnw6omqBMdoCAEl3YzDBX0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a hidden gem in royal oak, this cafe has different variety of drinks and sandwhiches a lot of their items I find very unique!

We were waiting for our car wash to finish so we decided to come here for a quick refreshment we ordered a jumbo mango slush with pearls. Was perfect not too sweet and has the right amount of mango flavour she said she used 2 mangos and I can definitely tell!

I recommend for all your sweets and bubble tea needs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd-dOqb1oK_mHR8SmYnfExn_KcHe_XT1715Zm-&fid=0x0:0xb7eba217bfaa74ff"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"ashley (ash)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVca1AqgmVAUxYl3x1gw4mblzPVNYqkxX-Ca1xloNJPimDcUOmGUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been a customer of theirs for almost a whole year now, and still remains my favourite cafe in royal oak! They always have great food and are changing up the decor from time to time, and the owner is super nice and accommodating 😊

I've also worked with them a couple of times to organize events at their cafe and the process has always been super smooth and fun to organize with Something Sweet, and they have such innovative ideas all the time for new food and drink items! 100% recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC7P1zufhrY2upoI_cF7_v0xsy75uFGjEL7fyi&fid=0x0:0xb7eba217bfaa74ff"],"When":"2024-5-19"}]
