user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehdi Ghobadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfHNO0b-k7QO9Q2QS2SN-_ueD6aoP7VVYbTqvXPxJODh6r8Egs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best customer services I have ever received in addition to the yummy and fresh food. The breakfast was so good that we came back for lunch and the friendly faces. Keep up the great work Suresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkFHlfszlLBw5S4ORb7KL7V5sETkCclq9BuHX3&fid=0x0:0x4f4169a8b2acf57"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Zoeb Manji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlHLmyCNfb4t5qC36983ORb7HQH_4RuUeqTAsAH3JvLExSwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible experience at Taste of Splendour Cafe! The food was freshly prepared with the finest ingredients, and every bite was bursting with flavor. You can really tell that a lot of care goes into crafting each dish. On top of that, the customer service was exceptional. Suresh, in particular, went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed, and his warm, friendly attitude made the experience even better. I highly recommend this cafe for anyone looking for delicious food and a welcoming atmosphere. I'll definitely be back!.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ann Carpio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvKGtyHz7brKg5VAq28ihayhSlxU7P2mRV2qnIcDU5TdezVj3d=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of working with Taste of Splendour Cafe and Catering for our thanksgiving lunch for our team, and I couldn't be more impressed! Despite the short notice, they swiftly prepared a customized menu that perfectly fit our needs. The response time to all of my inquiries was incredibly fast, and their service was outstanding, especially Suresh, who went above and beyond to accommodate every catering request we had. The food was fantastic, and it really elevated the event. We couldn't have pulled off such a perfect gathering without the help of their amazing team. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"L Lachambre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcQeaXtX_voCM_8SqiopJQYNUZpTUgjwLE_AZW0zBvnRsBMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was very impressed with my experience from the first phone call. Excited to be planning my daughter's Baby Shower, Suresh made the process enjoyable, with great recommendations and seamless. The variety of sandwiches and chips were delicious!  Many guests asked for your number!  Thank you for helping to make this celebration a success!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darcy Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVESj4P-ns78Y3FoHaQt0idvwum6QNszDkphCaR9ez9r9biCgI4Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great caterer and had an awesome experience with them for our company picnic. We had a large order with a lot of dietary restrictions and a limited budget. The staff were very accommodating and helped us plan a great event. A small mix-up with the delivery was solved quickly and professionally! The sandwiches and salad we ordered were a hit with staff and I hope we can continue working with a grade A company!

Special shout out to Suresh who is pro and brings a wonderful spirit to his work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Senft","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIROY306o2n1iFk24No_zYCvawBfKWlCgLhAsSu6APBStfAeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Suresh and his team were absolutely fantastic to deal with when I was arranging a lunch for 45 people. They were so accommodating with my requests and quick at replying to questions and changes. Most importantly, the burgers we ordered were amazing. All is so well flavored and thoughtfully delivered to keep things warm and fresh. I highly recommend them for catering events. Thank you Suresh!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marko Cosic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHx2gBb9HDIDij45AALsgx3husZXp7XjgLBZPv9rK64ZJbr5TI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little hidden gem.
Got here close to closing time and they still served me bless Suresh's heart. I got the chicken tandoori sandwich with house chips, it was very tasty! They have a good variety of choices, definitely going to try the breakfast next time I go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNef1X3EGaZyLkeuQ6TJ7ToS0VQnphg2vNBOJf-&fid=0x0:0x4f4169a8b2acf57"],"When":"2023-3-31"},{"Name":"Alycia Guile","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuSFHJcQ7cs1HMLpjI1HozuE_nM5TFlVANuLnBu3qD-_4f5Ck=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and service are incredible! Suresh and his team always do such a great job when we order catering for our events, and the event attendees always comment on how delicious the food is. 10/10 would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Tendon Kohaku - Brentwood
descriptions: Contemporary hub for Japanese fare, including tempura, miso soup & matcha ice-cream.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Yui K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp3HCV4DpRLjcnqAeASD3s3A4WGKgCnNbyVQ4WVfzXV-fapuB-FA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"First of all, the price on the menu and the price they charged are different. I ordered the Anago tendon and paid $22.99, but the menu says $19.95.

I visited the Metrotown location last week and ordered the Kohaku tendon. I paid $16.99, as their menu described, so I just can't figure it out. Did only this location raise the price? Either way, they need to update the menu. I might be overreacting, but I kind of felt scammed.

I visited this location around 9PM, but there was no one at the front, so I waited for a while. When no one came, I called the store, but no one answered. After waiting a bit longer, a server finally appeared and took my takeout order. I was told it would take 10-20 minutes to prepare my food. I got my order after about 20 minutes, which was fine.
The store didn’t seem busy, so I think they may be understaffed. Prices are the same as on third-party platforms, so I think it's more convenient to just order through them.

Lastly, I usually go to the downtown location, and I really enjoy the taste, the crispy tempura, and the delicious sauce there so .. 2stars for the Brentwood lolation but I'd give the downtown location 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbbZ3e6bXK0XGg2HyShtChf8BPjdBw-AxT6yNW&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Nikki Sy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBjATsJMmB41G9yqWFoEPo05_lPP8oOi4rOJgcyxBVDlQkbFzp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My husband and i ordered deluxe omelette curry and beef curry. We both liked our food. However, my only disappointment is that it took us a long time to be seated, even if there were just 3 people eating inside and us waiting to be seated.

It is because there is no person manning the counter where you have to wait to be seated. So imagine, if they are not seeing us, how would they know if there are people waiting.

We also ordered their ice cream  for desert and while having desert, there are flies flying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFXrppwo59OlMtlVSXJhzQeCdNlTrbh3r5qGNb&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Gloria Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXraEdtzs8pFLfqa5aLhzDZSAL1BhMjv_yg1eMqCSd7Gu8eIyoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came at 5 pm on a Friday night and was seated promptly. Loved the ability to order on the screen.

We had the wings, some tendon, and an udon. Food came promptly and was tasty, but just a bit more greasy than we normally like. We prefer the mazesoba next door. Nothing wrong or bad but just not something we enjoy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTHer1V1RYhrKH8cA-KospteypLo2EJZgjRdgS&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This really is the place to get massive bowls of udon. Any size you want and it’s a free upgrade, so for that, I can say there is value. I do think that the bowls get bigger than the portion, but it’s fun to see.

The udon is pretty good, it’s a solid udon joint. They have some interesting flavors to choose from, and their spicy does have a decent kick to it, so be prepared.

It’s one of the better udon places in Vancouver, has a very clean washroom, and nice interior. Good for a quick lunch or bite with the family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4OfiBf9VdabT10Ct3X5NZynA2yMctnOX6PKgo&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Vy Anh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGsNhnbufiQDne1lvQ3McghkbcFI54FxmqaYUzJIihCbDkv9D2gQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dishes at this restaurant are absolutely delicious! The tempura on top of the rice was crunchy and flavorful, and the aroma of the flour mixed with egg was simply delightful. A truly enjoyable dining experience with every bite bursting with flavor and freshness. Highly recommend trying out their dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNGF-Wkb2bXZJM4RKI5N719AxhX3LdUIXfXgMu&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"char br","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAnL_8sV_ABc-sKziKe87xo6wE8QlOpKZixFo9Vdc23ouoQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Order:
- mentaiko cream udon
- spicy rose cream udon
- tempura sashimi bowl

first time i’ve been here was 2022 and we loved it. came here again in 2023 and the food quality wasn’t as good. gave it a last try today and we will never be back again. the mentaiko doesn’t taste like regular
ones and it was really salty. the spicy rose udon had 3 pieces of garlic bread that was really stale. it was spicy which i can usually handle but as i continued eating, i realised it was exactly like the samyang buldak flavour… for this price and such restaurant, it was not worth it, especially considering that there aren’t any protein in the 2
udons we ordered. size of tempura bowl had obviously decreased since the last time we’ve been here and it looked as if it’s been fried for a while. atmosphere was pretty good as it’s in a quiet and clean neighbourhood. we got seated at 1pm on a saturday and the restaurant was completely empty.
overall, we will never visit this location again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMod4K7QxZcct1f9E0gUtIX92x556NzM7b5b9h5&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Thomas Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITuDRjw9J9Us45xAUXKSfp8lG2sJ2s04TW_lNAi_G6a5d62ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The udon noodles were very tasty. Value was solid and the service was interesting. Everything is done via a tablet on your table. I like how the pricing was the same for any size.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlDbZoRVbRv6X3RU7WNROW67uQhNRFzsJS0WeK&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Salicious Kim (Sally)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInfzvmZm95_WrqVSbcEKA0Tgk4zl4fxg9m-xCs8Eo9eA95Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The portions were small, and the food quality was a bit disappointing. It was not well fried and felt a bit dry. Service was excellent but I wouldn't go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGdS14bCRRagzDHx46tUsNCFqYVpff27ybdEgn&fid=0x0:0xee3e26a6ee0d36cd"],"When":"2024-12-13"}]

title: Starbucks

status: Closes soon ⋅ 6:30 p.m. ⋅ Opens 4:30 a.m. Mon
descriptions: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehdi Emamifar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY88Drfz_FNswLf99CbARyK9hbyH5mYT-OVIIdYcWQYUQOoWFG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Starbucks next to Gilmore Station is truly an exceptional place to relax and enjoy a great cup of coffee. It offers a pleasant and tranquil environment for customers, making it an ideal spot for studying, working, or simply meeting up with friends.

One of the standout features of this Starbucks is its friendly and welcoming staff. The baristas are always ready with a smile, providing excellent customer service and making sure every order is just right. Their warm and approachable demeanor adds to the overall positive experience.

Whether you’re looking to take a break from a busy day, need a quiet spot to work, or just want to enjoy some quality time with a good beverage, the Starbucks near Gilmore Station is a perfect choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpGLLoyHjaYLZJWqSZBu8jKX0ZSx0-bB-uAUga&fid=0x0:0xde3d1317dab606a7"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Hamid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZeCAMeEgy6nfEH_q_cdx_kw6M9nQkJXu6z624ESesXG758gNKQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always got great service here. Great people and convenient location. Can accommodate 20 people easily inside and there are some seating areas outside too. Medium Late with a lemon loaf is my usual order which I enjoy the most. I have tried the chicken pesto sandwich before and it was tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG5eRJGXKJR9NF1va0oerYwKbZH4vS5IxxNJut&fid=0x0:0xde3d1317dab606a7"],"When":"2022-6-13"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very convenient location right next to Gilmore skytrain station and very handy to grab a coffee on the go!
This Starbucks unfortunately seems to have a limited menu when ordering via the Starbucks app.
Staff efficiently make great tasting coffee and you get consistent results.
Coffee joint also has outdoor patio seating available which is pretty sweet!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1TXN2nDhZIrBp2MZaQckQU0AqTjkBEpmnIDxd&fid=0x0:0xde3d1317dab606a7"],"When":"2021-5-7"},{"Name":"Zareh Megerdoonian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsbPOIrk2Yl1yDK3I29z7I2dPVaKmhP3xib1VAIDZlyuslZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Doesn’t feel like a cafe walking in, very sterile - like a medical clinic.
Cream is behind the counter, cinnamon is behind the counter, always at least 1 person in a mask.
It resembles nothing to a cafe vibe, and their snacks are never fresh and come from some warehouse. No active conversation between clients and employees, and no customers talk to each other too - just stare at their laptop or phone. Yeah, nothing like Paris or Milan here - lol - zero soul here
Service is ok, employees just doing their job, they are nice, I don’t blame them","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurpreet Thind","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFQfD_dLnMNqrkRe_Ns7EzXbGEFLaqjV62f5GMLazrBlWq_BU2sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty decent Starbucks location. Parking is definitely an issue. Being right across from sky train , should not be an issue. Staff was very courteous and quick in their service. WiFi was little slow but the place being packed and everyone on their internet machines, it was understandable. Overall the place was very reasonably clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWi_1Kj9l97vgArdvJ7x0TkdVVM4eRp0mCfpVi&fid=0x0:0xde3d1317dab606a7"],"When":"2019-11-24"},{"Name":"Angela Shen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLWS0WaWyf2U7mCiVLrIAfqTCkssR3Y-o6KP5Oy_aU5hwUXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have this Nitro Cold brew that richer than normal cold brew the staff is also so incredibly nice and kind. It's a great place to sit and hang out with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJJ2lBRP1ekFrRFLrye_wRX3LQ9dR-wWx2Y45X&fid=0x0:0xde3d1317dab606a7"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Dreaming Day","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu1_3uTnc4J6QMjMJInT2xcanxZtWP7H_9hgzhCFZ0KjHsEO2UCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The Asian woman in her 20s and brown hair is an extreme dog police! I had my small and well trained dog with me to pick up a mobile order - two other baristas were helping me with no issues (said my dog was cute and even gave her a large sized pup cup) and suddenly she pops out from the back and demands that we go outside in an unnecessarily authoritative tone. It’s 5:30am and there was one other guest there who was completely unbothered. WAY too overkill and enforcement-heavy on the dog policy. I just need 2 min to pick up and go. Why would Starbucks have pup cups if not to incentivize dog owners to come? Needs to chill out and use discretion to read the situational context.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Miss Cinz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrAcR0nWLDdtNjX8gao3i1bs8jIVXL168fbuQfyx2lMrg64PuWUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location just feels like closing whenever they want. Second time coming here on a different week and they’ve decided to close before 2 pm with no explanation. I’ve watched others walk by in disappointment when there’s never any warning they’ll be closing earlier.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Gong Cha
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Chi Blondin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0T7dZ-0dEx5oey45aUetEMF0DNqP-Lwf2ytZokXg5H3EK6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love bubble tea and generally i don't go to gongcha (in my city) because i find they're too sweet but this store is very different. The staff are very attentive, listened to my concern regarding the sweetness level and created a drink that i really  enjoyed. The store is very spacious, well decorated with amble seating. I will try to come back before we leave Vancouver. Good job, team Gongcha Renfrew!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzjvLfBAFBuaWbUmUY00KfIJfzrxV0Iu8td-EH\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"JungHyun Son","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwmkNOsWHm7T535R6elqJDQ-hxe7u7CN4op8pbm4rQWQW5kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Gong Cha ever. I come here quite often after my work around 9:45 and I have never felt any annoyance even though I come here often right before closing. Their drink and snack options are also the best among other Gong Cha as well. Thanks team! Y'all are amazing :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqZK4-mjtoBFoqFEM9zTqt-84yIbiAC1JNaKeA\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV3dRExUU6CcyKh7lSLVNfnclkZ3QvSxHjyu6gjmW4Ii5hPUY7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was eagerly anticipating trying Gong Cha in Canada, but unfortunately, my expectations were far too high. The waffle I ordered was disappointingly chewy and doughy, and it lacked the distinct matcha flavor I had been hoping for. Similarly, the drinks failed to impress—I couldn't find anything extraordinary about them either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuZZJw6aH-xsOHRVZB2BhpjAsOTag-sDyhRird\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Sunshine Jack Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLLdP2YGEJQHgdsXaSHpigz5iDbNRq0Tyea10Md89vMwdxNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The bubble tea that I had ordered. It’s not true with what I told to seller. I told him that I wanna order a strawberry milk tea size Large with 30% ice and 50% sugar, but he made a cup full of 70% ice. Moreover, he didn’t giving me napkins as well, so I just want to give this store 1 star. The service is still lacking experience. I hope it will not be  happened again in the next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3iRal_LPmBRcu6ABrzQ1YFX6xFKcH-WJCqmHr\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Mark Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2WtosayPHUWwqfQ-R1f5-iJLYN9Dkvq9kxsgsAUud7w-NIMAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my go to bubble tea spots. They house a good variety of flavors and drink options. I never had an issue with my order and the consistency of the drinks have always been good. All in all a reliable location for me and my friends","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olivia P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX75JodHR8GJUAnqjrVp_u84CMWHywgc77IJwKEgE4isGX_V1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Visited here yesterday afternoon, even though I try to avoid coming here as it’s always a 10+ minute wait after ordering. (They must get a lot of online orders.) But I really wanted their white pearls so I committed to the wait. Was disappointed to realize after I had driven away that I didn’t receive my white pearls. (Low points for service, but they do get points for having ample seating.)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPH4tB4mFrFQ4C8501hXiYKuYRsmgf0McaiM4U\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Moon Phan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWl0M2WJobQfiIF5oT9ii9dNx_rt6oHEk7tJoCdsGVxBDOqTB5i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered it through Uber Eats. I have no problem with the food, it’s good. But the service is not. Firstly, when the app show “ready to pick up”, I enter the shop and they’re still doing the cake. If you’re not finish it yet, just don’t hit the button. Secondly, the order include 2 drinks, 2 waffles, 1 crepe and 1 coin waffle. I ordered same things many times with Uber delivery. They always came with 2 bags, one for the drinks and one for the foods. The waffles have their own bags and one bigger outside. This time I ordered for pick up and they only gave me 1 bag for the drinks and they stapled the waffles bags together. The bags are quite thin and it’s raining so hard. When I came home, one of the bags almost  broken. A male staff comment that “it’s cruel to staple like that” but the girl who’s doing my order ignore that. Thirdly, the staffs here speak their own language about the order in front of the customer. I don’t think that’s an appropriate behavior for doing customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTDWFTdwGHR2w8az3zgOcCUs0l-zmYVZJ-N5qo\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Le Duy Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyyngicJbx_TjA2crextS6LYQLm8V-BQWVEJOYOdEPgeu7K9cb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the best bubble tea ever! I ordered the Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea and the signature Milk Foam Black Tea. Both drinks were increadibly tasty, I feel comfortable and peaceful in mind. Service is also a plus, they are friendly and professional. I'll definitely be coming back for more whenever I get the chance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf8o3Z4cX5cJsePAJRM2wpVorcglF5h9A6SIi2\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-4-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"DAngkols Angkols","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcgBDVEI2yqeK_O0mJ31RJBNFVIfM6-tRdfhwGHgQDuSCwRyU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic Filipino Flavors in Every Sip!

Sagotogo is a true gem! Their drinks capture the essence of Filipino flavors in the most refreshing way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgAaTD8a5ZXvBsIGFXX4ZZeFklK0oahjZWydpH&fid=0x0:0xf6579a1603a522b1"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Samantha Pedersen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUirbAQUnLLKA2ZAsK4CUNlowyRbPDPzhY_ydGhpHGP6ZZgvWxS5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A small and unique bubble tea shop with a focus on the Philippines. The owner was very friendly and helpful with recommendations. They have different things available than what is usually found in bubble tea shops. We got the brown sugar, honeydew and sago gulamon drinks with the Oreo bubble waffle. We found the drinks had an original flavor but were still good. The waffle was okay though not spectacular. Probably would have been better with some ice cream as recommended in other reviews. Overall a nice place to visit if you want a change from the chains.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz3_6r2Tjkegot4kLO2q6xrLoNYrcTc9ZgCDnv&fid=0x0:0xf6579a1603a522b1"],"When":"2020-2-6"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We brought an out of town visitor to one of our absolute favourite Bubble tea shops, Sago Togo. It's a family owned Filipino Bubble tea shop in New Westminster that makes Bubble teas and Bubble waffles in all sorts of wonderful flavors. Highly recommend the Brown Sugar Ice Cream Slush and their warm Taho. (You can have it cold too if you prefer) We'd never tried or even heard of Taho until we discovered Sago Togo. It's a tofu dessert that consists of soft silken tofu with sago pearls. If you've never tried Taho before, this is a great place to try it!

Service: Excellent
Parking: Street parking.
Location: It's a small shop on 12th St. (Kingsway becomes 12th St.) and there's not much signage so you need to keep a sharp lookout for it, or else it can be easy to miss.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQtCxtQcXLYed51si7AdxbNajsHeHgkkEiRIHb&fid=0x0:0xf6579a1603a522b1"],"When":"2022-9-27"},{"Name":"AMANPREET SINGH DHINDSA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAxojW_BDRoUHd3vPQRmTMISKGEGzdjN4KlQmV4nCgdUSkcAX8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sago! Very friendly and good customer service. Lola was so sweet and greeted us with charm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnsGDwzpo8Ttp4enpDNuCttga_vgREWp--thsh&fid=0x0:0xf6579a1603a522b1"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"DeviousWizard GD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHWESfWhBaXGmCbRW9xBGJtQbhpdJodpi5uYu6vqWTn5PEOxRT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hole-in-the-wall bubble tea shop.  Reasonable prices and delicious offerings.  We enjoyed the warm taho as it's not too sweet but the sago/pearls were so gooeey.  The taro and bubble waffle ice cream combo is to-die-for!  The store is currently on soft launch so it is open on certain hours (4 to 9pm) then winter break they open from 12 noon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh84gRcKlen5gp2vatEPpZ7-_1XoDuVYH12aoy&fid=0x0:0xf6579a1603a522b1"],"When":"2019-12-4"},{"Name":"Susan O'Neil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOjNhCsbN5-H4cs163eYrtfy5EBguJvusxxARgwLmxhizRQis=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the Halo Halo with Pandan ice cream & Buko Pandan.  Both delicious & refreshing on a hot summer day.  The woman who made our drinks offered to bring them out to our car. Great service! We’ll be back!  😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSgeRlT_xWKmBLeuiQjuvZVHMV24gABygRcbE9&fid=0x0:0xf6579a1603a522b1"],"When":"2023-7-15"},{"Name":"A Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKk18zZVZmBHvsEMuHfY5waRv6Zl8kDJbB4KEJSvBJGXk6Z_xf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great local spot. The owner was great.   One of the best halo halos I've found in the gvrd. Quality Filipino food is hard to come by especially when it's great value. Also worth noting that there was no pressure to tip here which in this day in age is rare. I had to ask the owner if I could tip. That's service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Lorenzo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI03NR3dMs4lohYnKhWEOXFDmi9fMjXyU3w1S2vVJSe_YuSdA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has been one of my favourite Filipino owned shop!! Not only are their bubble waffles soft and chewy, and their drinks are refreshing but their hospitality has been so on point. They treat you as if you were their family and are always so welcoming! Thank you for serving such wonderful products :) I think you guys should give it a try!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Caylynne T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhtKbMuZFwZMdF29KT4KMNzbKtEHm6REfXS3AyCFDXyexdKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got our passport pictures taken here as well as some bubble tea — amazing photos and delicious tea! He let us look at the photos before printing & print quality was great! Very knowledgeable about all the photo requirements & great set up — come here over London Drugs 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX7J8EzjqlaYTG0b_ikaE_XisJyLafjHPbr5Pn&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Dobes Vandermeer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdxx-6tVvFNMG36x6sOKb384Q1VwkvP5g0ML4FNsgVyZMtmEdo8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bubble tea was tasty.  It would be nice to have fresh milk available.  Exterior looks more like a photo store than a cafe, but when you get inside it's okay.  Definitely a place that's more about grab and go than hanging out inside.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan walton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItcZAMnnkHbucOR2tsRSsmA4ppeef2axkKQYhkRm6j4Nr30A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We needed to get a passport photo for our baby boy. First we went to London Drugs, but they said "ahhh he's pretty small. You guys should go to Angelove Photo Studio." And I'm glad we did!

The owner was super helpful and patient. He spent several minutes trying to get a good photo of our 2 week old boy because he was sleepy and didn't want to wake up. But the owner was determined and had a great attitude and in the end--we got a nice photo!

After that, I got a bubble tea and it was delicious! I'd give Angelove Photo Studio 10 stars if I could!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVZR1U5zDwlLsF4Cs8ubCqcVmC2R9HfDjvWKjU&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2023-9-23"},{"Name":"hvtaske","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv_N8euyWMS5DW5TfoIGxKBK7YRReohAKKxGkVYGUU6cD-9us=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly nice owner! Got my photo here done and I was not sure if I want a copy of electronic ones, he suggested me not to waste my money on something might not come in handy...
Sad I didn't have any bubble tea this time, but I'll definitely come back just for it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan van der Ster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHjqF4kYsN-vh0CQt_uPms0hqJRg1Zbuxo22HB7x0LZqQm8ieFgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shhh, this is the secret spot for the best bubble tea, slushes, smoothies, and passport photos in the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8E2hkZmG6TL51GXitKc5wCLVUQ-mrIjzQWDXc&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Vinci Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3l2uKjezJ_f6jmMGKxzu7GoSKVlmFCO2r3Q1p8d4IjrOja8TF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this bbt tea shop! It’s a classic mom and pop shop that’s attached to a photography shop as well. The owner is very attentive, friendly, and professional! He makes sure to fill up your cup to perfection which is awesome. I got the fresh mango bbt which he makes right in front of you! Will definitely be coming back here to support this local business especially since their rent keeps getting upped :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxgij6aA9ryhOY1gQo5kG3h6rFfSigFji5Hcsl&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2022-11-24"},{"Name":"Walker Adair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoO7KX6SUH-0EBCAh5pjurNMUDV3URb3rypWxu3DEpbWpiLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious mango milk slush bubble tea and very friendly owner. Definitely a wonderful little gem","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRj0cuZA7ucmHQ9paELlFMOxfi7qpEW1sWT-pL&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Melisa Pizzolato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDkvIMn4xQ3KMPjL5eNN3ZV25JpzOgkJebSaH32FJVu5iR59xT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got my 7 week old daughter’s passport photos done here and the owner was awesome!! He was sooo good with her, got all kinds of shots and the final picture was just perfect.
Highly recommend here for your passport photos and bubble tea! Quick turn around and awesome to support a local business.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Al May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURsEKydI6yFDWfeEuJUm_zojUlbRJUnS2y7j3NZKmrARii_3iYLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to La Petite Cuillere several times over the years. I remember celebrating my birthday there years ago and taking my son for his first afternoon tea at this place 7 years ago.
This is the first time I've been back in years and it's still lovely. I really love the ambience and the
food is still very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSBkM9lHHh7JcgYraFpFbtrpulk1cglQUgcUr9&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Ryan Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCc8AUdlVdPZRul5WdYMX0FHqSeVWMZHmY7WxBkqZjkr2adg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was fabulous!

I went during the Halloween set menu and it was fantastic! The atmosphere, food and service was all amazing. Their savories were the best part.Definitely give them a visit when you get the chance!             10/10 would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1qUzI-3feJer8pcRRyTtZ5dCG4ZSoQUy5MonD&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Bruno Gruber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-dXASD-k95RxwlhV03ax1ONlYu6ZaXcUmqZGggyQpD3tmAHVCUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this tea house and left feeling pretty disappointed. The food presentation looked okay at first glance, but the actual bites were low quality. Everything was dry and the portions were really small. The scone was a big letdown—it was hard and crumbly, not the soft and fluffy scone you'd expect.

The prices were outrageous for what we got. I don't mind paying more for quality, but this just wasn't worth it. The spreads were unappealing and uninteresting, barely enough for one person, let alone two. And all this for $60 per person!

The place didn't feel upscale at all, which was a bit of a letdown. I still enjoyed my date, and we made the best of it, but unfortunately, we won't be coming back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlSTE1njvS4fOOkSFxS2n-JnL63FMcxLu180zD&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Maria P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4fjVYjLKf-V4y0mClB_UwNulNo1KWm7xJbjYqt_1PAhQO3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely spot for afternoon tea.  Beautiful decor and atmosphere.  Great place  for girls of all ages to celebrate something special.  The food is delicious and wonderful selection of teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO94ae2hhXlq3UTlCg2qtMp2QyuHv_GlECk-4Yu&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Jodi Malboeuf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpNIdYJI-CsW764O9qNJKlGtObByszOrMk_Z4Cm5EklW0QuA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered two afternoon tea sets/kits for a Bridgerton watch party. I contacted them to see about needing advance notice to prepare. I was pleasantly surprised with 24hrs where other places I had inquired with were asking for 48hrs notice. I dealt with a lovely young lady when ordering and she was very knowledgeable in answering my questions and when I originally was ordering I was asking for only one set thinking it would be enough for two. She recommended getting the two sets/kits which I am very grateful for her advice! When I picked up a very friendly gentleman was the one to help me. He was great as well made sure to give me transportation instructions. Everything arrived safely and perfect! All the treats were beautiful and delicious! Was extremely pleased with the experience from start to finish. Will be a return customer for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGM4sidBCAiCco_TyR7y-3MHEvrPqG1SeI2_F2&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend and I came here for tea and we both had a marvelous time. This place opens at 11am which is the time we arrived so it wasn't busy. The tea was lovely and we also had 2 scones each. Looking forward to coming back and enjoying afternoon tea here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_RfTkX4LSQ3NLoaOAguIwF9saJdKs6e9Whj3y&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2023-12-10"},{"Name":"Me La Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ1-8-I-z4R031HZdfPzYgrLhxbAwfB9XBPkPZgTq5LEnthXv6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service needs a lot of work. The place was empty as we were the first customers. We stood at the door for almost 10 mins. We had reservations. Server was friendly but never explained the menu and did not return after we received our food. Food was nothing special or memorable and did not taste fresh. Desserts were just okay. It took us another 30 minutes to call someone from the back so we can pay for our bill. The place is definitely instagrammable but it’s not tasteful or classy. I would not return for the price we paid. Many other options with better food and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu-mgyTk66MCE_S0AZrCvUjvSFsJYGSCaoEg-6&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2022-6-29"},{"Name":"Roxanne Wiseman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFIJ74eTrTnhe7Ium_k1WXcLBcruZVZIeQchnthR_K87jlM2De=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We really enjoyed our high tea it was beautiful and the atmosphere a hidden surprise! Love the bright pink booths too!
Parking is available underground FYI signage is a bit hard to spot and the price a bit high but they let us take our time and we truly enjoyed it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw0nPfhUXjIdYvZSSf_fR84pxrBB_Afs1fiSX6&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-2-1"}]

title: L & G Bubble Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This milk tea shop is a charming mom-and-pop operation, which really moves me—seeing a senior couple running it together is heartwarming, and I love supporting them. I got a honey green tea and a mango slush with cream. While the drinks might not be the best-tasting, they offer incredible value for money. Seriously, how can you still find a $3.99 freshly brewed tea in Vancouver these days?

The honey green tea was light and refreshing, and the mango slush was creamy and satisfying. It’s not a trendy spot, but there’s something nostalgic and special about its simplicity. For the price and the heart behind it, I’d definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw6-Oiwtp1xHyo1wqI-inXe_fVa5EK3Ylnwt_z&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZLT69rehlvFvDm5qWpfEuJbJS_vlr2aPoBKjZZPBXujTC8I-X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy and not overly sweet mango sago. Seems to be made from real fruit with real mango slices. We also enjoyed the ovaltine drink. Prices are also a huge plus. They also accept credit card now with the ordering machines!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfca0UulGs3nvnOHJEdYtb4f--toaY_sEKU5OA&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"J P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPNOwczxQeYq8Qup51h2PTCgzkWZZqiOeXeOFsoHWK1IWAROM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Polite and efficient service. The place is run by an older couple that have managed to keep their product and service at a high level and compete with the other trendy boba shops in the city.

Prices are very fair and there is so much variety on the menu. The menu can get a little confusing with how many different specials there are around the shop but once you start visiting you get the hang of it.

Please support this business, we need more such small businesses instead of large chains selling lower quality for higher prices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"coshie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUegksSFSk6aD9N3xXU-M2Ou_AwYoRzhwMcgZUzXVtY7LJD9KFQBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never fails. Cheap, good quality, and big juicy pearls. Fresh fruit too. I grew up near L&G , nostalgic spot. My go to if I am in the area! Love love love. I always get a classic mango, or a lemon black tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Molly B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLm5KbLVpGbrM2G2az1MZy7UnO2cuwsGdfIHWeNxvhZd253hQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Is definitely cheap but the pearl is too soft the mango ice cream taste is soso might try other product next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9e96sngY3QGkaDnPue0yFpyJ-fXm4MuixWdK8&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Rico Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMAKmssaUA2iZOXyj4aulrsLzUe1i1SbfcTWdTokBf0poU2y2h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite bubble tea places. It's a small mom and pop shop. They have a wide range of flavours and their prices are low compared to the rest in the market. The taste is also really good although they dont do specialty flavours","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esther MacKenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIud9syQrTrnWdMexjoZOq_NbYrpXfcvCV97-KR5NRTb4BMiG1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Huge selection of endlessly customizable drinks. I heard the person after my order three: fresh dragon fruit, fresh coconut, and jack fruit all with milk and 3/4 sweet slush with pearls. I don’t think the staff said no to any requested combination of flavours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVtNBZAvYP40UzjXQ_fPEz7yowzooiyExt3fmA&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Darlene M. Lee (Tennis Sportygal)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmLkBHFJ4SGra12cNbnLdRIWMLV5DEnaNDRU428eEqQabSn13K=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recommended Mango 🥭 Lychee, Strawberry 🍓 Lychee or make your own, lots of options at a great price 🧋🤤 all fresh fruit 🍉🍓🍍🥭🫐 Raspberry Mango Lychee slush was very tasty 😋 $5.25 with tax, awesome deal 🤤❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkJA30XyrE4py0quGsXSv7FkkK5Tjvk-MPov4M&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2024-8-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"anahita hatami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQ-o6gwcAXOjCJCdPLpBMeXB6iHThpttDoU6zj03rQHgYevw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The store From outside it doesn’t look good or doesn’t have an eye catching interior design but they have the BEST BAKLAVA in whole BC. I tried their Baklava and it was the most amazing the most delicious like the BEST sweet I have ever tasted. I bout two pack to go one small one medium, It was a bit pricy but worth it I would say.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf60IcXDW-T1XoBUTOuz5VwZSAtjpBhCh2pMrV&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Heyam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQm9BhjOHMjC7GcWrHn68t1cIzjRHFnDfgXZNgHLdz2uOG85st=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here with my date to try Baklava. They have very fresh baklavas, lokim, and baked goods. The Turkish coffee is very good. I really liked the Turkish tea.
Staff are extremely friendly and nice people.  I recommend this place to hang out with friends or family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVNjCZhCBhOwqRWefwKeDdeKgOwmw-ZKePyf6J&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the varieties in Baklava that I have never seen anywhere in Vancouver.

They had dry, more juicy and less sweet baklavas.

They had cold baklava that was unique and delicious overloaded.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKQsVnaHrPlaARnSV9OZb9YxRK6KOOe6BmecKq&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our visit was nothing short of a delight. On a sunny weekend, my family and I ventured in, eager to indulge in the array of baklava offerings. From the classic to the exotic, every bite was a journey through Turkish confectionery craftsmanship. Each piece, meticulously layered with nuts and honey, offered a symphony of flavors and textures that left us craving for more. The variety on offer catered to every palate, ensuring there was something for everyone to savor.

Accompanying our sweet treats was the quintessential Turkish tea, a delightful complement to the richness of the baklava. Served with warmth and hospitality, it added an extra layer of authenticity to our culinary experience.

The staff, with their warm smiles and attentive service, elevated our visit to another level. Their genuine hospitality made us feel right at home, contributing to the overall pleasant atmosphere of the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzbes_aknZotcmJM4h5pq-zsHe1XOFT-MQ_2v4&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty products, friendly people, clean place, good price.
I will definitely go back there with my other friends!

The pistachio baklava wasn’t too sweet which I loved! And the aroma of the turkish coffee was fascinating 🫠 they make the coffee in a traditional style using hot sand!

These guys make everything from scratch in the shop, super authentic and delicious!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnGWyQ-ZWmhdYwrxLfIKod5LOc_tZq3oLS5cU-&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here so we had no idea what anything is, so we asked a lot of questions and the staff was really nice and patient and answered everything. The baklavas were super delicious and we really enjoyed it! The place is very spacious and clean as well. Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSRhQkNQOFTNXjZGIgolw0sW2yXqpKzEK4RocI&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Hakim E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKh-iMj-_rDGQN3VCbzbu_kiuv0nHkHesY5lkxIxZFiLe004Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, very friendly. The baklava is fresh and sweet. I have tried Turkish coffee the last time I was here. This time I tried the Turkish Affogato, which is a Turkish coffee with ice cream. Big thanks to the owner and the great staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCgA4Ozc_PqtPRi4j2vBGeOV90aTl0ioUKfeQI&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"M K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbi6LJtKWW_2rjs9UHr5Hby-WcnZyGuhY2NPvJWMqZ_P0zVpzO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven’t had chance to have anything savoury here yet but Baklavas are authentic Turkish. No honey in them like what our lovely neighbour Persians make. So, if you are Turkish and homesick or want some good Baklava, this IS the place to stop by! Best part is you can order by piece or bulk if you talk with store owner. Overall, you won’t regret it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqzPLyRYb1vddccFaG7TklxvTR6S0HoxJ5yhbh&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-5-31"}]

descriptions: Cozy, rustic-chic store & tasting bar providing carefully sourced artisanal teas & kombucha on tap.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store shopping","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Transgender safe space","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Earth Explorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx9WbpYHoWti2M8dulDcVEiSwzq2Is9YdecFV0_EjsI1gR2sUT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful Japanese tea house. Great selection of green,  black,  fermented,  matcha, and other teas. It's rare to find an authentic tea house that isn't an English style  serving high tea with carb loaded biscuits and dessert. 05 Tea is strictly premium tea, although they do have tea infused ice cream. Comfortable, limited seating with low light. Wi-Fi is available and they don't mind if you work. But be cortious and either keep ordering or move out if it gets full. Kitsilano is lucky to have this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzld1a32bIuxJbSk_qGGOkOT4aB_y7WKYINqCA&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"mickey grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2koY7ZFfBdWpziRjPP5TFVjsrz4r1zt6MPtsM4mBH9nhU6uE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It offers such a relaxing atmosphere—sipping tea, enjoying desserts, and chatting with friends feels so delightful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnweX_Z_b9jjKr21twA9S8lD64r26f8fZ393Yp&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Alvin Pang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHzcspRq9zYs02sQw-GRlpcEtcdrsvpnBrdgmJYnEInlXCURVIiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best tea bars I’ve been to anywhere in the world, with well-curated selections of delicious rarities from across Asia, including the Himalayas.  Sample portions are lovingly brewed for tasting (including second steeps).  A refined experience.

I got thrown off by haste and the payment interface, and ended up not leaving a tip, but they deserved one: will make up for it at the next visit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ally T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYgwifZ-PRcY7JBtPSHUPq5OLYhF1GutmOI1fystgfTM-U9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely wonderful experience here -- so glad my husband and I stopped in on a whim. The atmosphere is tranquil and seems to transport you to another time and place. The teas were excellent, and the staff were so friendly, warm, and knowledgeable. I'm trying to learn more about tea and they took the time to answer all my questions and suggest new teas to try. Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1VhZHNmdyhePRPwKXaHK6JIObq6jFKkIURtfi&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2023-3-28"},{"Name":"Lori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm53ImkpPw8OPxMf1q_PC5P_lZsAyuK0vCta5T0Kos7d9pSVe-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a tea tasting with the "Off the Beaten Path" option to try new types of teas! The tearistas were very knowledgeable and we were able to learn a lot from them. We really enjoyed the stick and tundra tea, as they were really thought provoking as to the possibilities of tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4toVkybzV9Q4FAMdpXNL6KcHgKSBpvPra2FMs&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2023-10-29"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good tea, great experience. I think the pricing is fair compared to other coffee & tea places, especially considering this is more unique. It's cute that they serve each steep in a chahai, although a bit awkward to constantly ask for more steeps (you pay for the leaves, not per steep, and green tea can be steeped at least three times).
I do wish this place was more accessible - the staff are frequently busy and don't greet you on entering, and the menu is confusing as a first timer since you can't tell what the difference is between the options. It might help to include a few details such as tasting notes. The staff do give recommendations, as their entire stock of teas is available for serving.
I'd love to see a menu for special drinks such as the iced matcha featured on their Instagram!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgiHZW-qecdQUDRZQakIvrTv6RFHkzzuBjtn4d&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"farzod darzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6S_yag_YL4YiZjd4sFjFB-maQTEZb8UDuM1Z0oL02xjRA8mT7AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here once and I fell in love with it. The tea selection is great and the tea bartenders are knowledgeable and friendly. If you are new to tea I would recommend going with the flights so you can explore the selection. The interface on the tablets is user-friendly and easy to navigate. They also have a good selection of kombucha which you can try and buy cups/growlers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc7XshiyWu3BjjMrSF_mfQszjvpIcj5TFRQ69B&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2020-2-7"},{"Name":"Shahab Mansouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfNsKFTuisHdEjpZevCagGP1uYVxkb9Cy86brACCwv2fvrZR8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great time here. Excellent personnel, wonderful tea selections, and a really peaceful setting. Along with Pu-Reh, we ordered Cherry Leaf tea. Both were truly fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEzCb81KPBlIpWuSuP4QeWHRUjrW0oG-qA4S0&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2023-7-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dr. Tse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1c97-meBhhJqxDvPj4fmZwUaEh_PPmcuc2SOSOUOWDAGqU11h8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time at Adonia salon was perfect and I was celebrating my birthday with a High English Tea! Adorable place, super attentive staff, high quality and fresh finger food! I and my friend ordered the Mini tea which is quite satisfactory, for lunch time. When you call to reserve a table tell the staff if you want the lunch from the menu or the high tea. Recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiNDhqYxP5beeqiMuNJIE46Y1gOXqS2n6gg6Gl&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Nansey Sinclaire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3tQn_fA_BNKIwh3-MYhB8_lgEBNsRFHsENg2dPmK_6vab97g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous! Absolutely Fabulous!
My daughter and I came to Vancouver for a few days as a summer vacation from Vancouver Island.
We researched the options in advance to go have High Tea somewhere.
We booked reservations and inquired if they were wheelchair accessible.

It was a little tricky to get in the door to the table that had been reserved for us because of the size of her power chair.

They were helpful and over the top accommodating to figure out how to get into the space in a stress free manner so that nothing got broken or knocked over as we had to move the table and chairs.

Our server was as sweet as could be, friendly, kind and courteous.

We indulged in the mini tea service which included 8 servings of various sandwiches and treats.

We wouldn’t have had room in our tummies had we ordered 12!

The food was beyond delicious!

The tea delectable. There are an incredible selection of teas.

It would be a fun to take an order to go and pop it into a picnic basket and head to the beach or your favourite park.

Except you would miss the fun of the individual tea pots and the tea cups.

It’s been the highlight of our day and we highly recommend it.

We will come back again on our next excursion to the big city!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM12tOisXgHRrm4ZdGMNsp7QVRr-JZOPgXhXZ8D&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Kiran S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlL8MVaLkTsfsq-e3DjECHREsgUgRlVDc_sZT22tRm2fUnodY0XA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute little tea house that’s totally worth the price. We had a baby sprinkle here for about 16 ladies and they were super accommodating! I had people cancel last minute and they didn’t charge me. The food is delicious and it’s better than most high tea spots here in Vancouver! You get a decent amount of food that will keep you full and the teas are great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR5dj2dJEiNJ7M7yEUlXPLPA7LfhPpzZ67zJea&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Randy Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVReTX3XeSLnmc9YYkKql6ca8nWIdmGUOutTRsu-4F9V-50ASsJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I discovered Adonia by searching for afternoon tea in Vancouver after realizing that another tea house was closed on Mondays. It was an unexpected fortune!

A call was placed just after they opened to ensure space was available and seating time would be sufficient to comfortably anjoy the experience. Not only did they quickly answer our questions but they asked dietary concerns and offered a gluten free scone option. Entirely gluten free service requires at least one day notice.

The service was great with frequent but  nonintrusive checks. Tea was served in glass pots that my wife loved as it allows you to see the tea itself. Savoury and sweet treats were delicious.

Staff surprised us at the end with loose tea to take home with a bag for steeping saying "Happy anniversary!"

We will be sharing Adonia with friends and likely come out from Richmond again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6B5cAdQRDAJ5bZ5YDsEe2oxOT4qGijLb6T2H4&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"lena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnjpv3iXOfYAv2h46Q5Ve_MH2ad6Z_t-LQhDjXjQfKFLQawg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"loved the place, its tiny place, very quiet atmosphere, wide variety of tea options, and their serving portions are more than enough. the staff were very friendly and attentive. overall wonderful experience will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa3MxuzPX7pqZ6ik3JGg-QsVIYllfQLjYO2CVC&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Harveer kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWDBonurxs4oY3OU6nJ9JRlCCUpUp6X1EWWSDYTMnl0a18gr23=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cutest tea house in Vancouver so far I have been to. I ordered there mini high tea which had 8 sweet and savoury items with one pot of tea of choice and free refills. You have to book a reservation a day before you go so that they have plenty of time to prepare food for you. Service was fast and very fairytale environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOciNmrn7pFsv12WoFhBg4IVr5aIblR7ZhQeMxF&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Sandy Fergusson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfDR_AQiytJEEjeH41OivhqNGxMWgwTyp8GpVdTJxjHYb1fdKp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've only been to a few high teas in New Zealand, so this was my first high tea experience in Vancouver! I found this place via Instagram and did not expect to have my own high tea set. The food was lovely, the staff checked on us a few times to refill tea, and they met my friends dietary/allergies and replaced her dessert due to that. I would definitely re-visit in future and recommend if you have always wanted to try a high tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-t9ogSl4it_14mfyNEEtwOW1jdFYkkuYhOxiD&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Adonia Tea House has been around for over 20 years. How has it taken me this long to visit this place? This has got to be one of my favourite tea houses in Vancouver now!

What I love about this place is the variety of options they offer. There are options for omnivores, vegetarians and vegans at this place. Not only do they cater to different dietary restrictions but if you're wanting to spend a little less, or eat a little less they offer Mini Afternoon Tea sets! Regular Afternoon Tea sets are $55 per person and Mini Afternoon Tea sets are $38 per person. Oh, and  you can even order off a regular a la carte menu if Afternoon Tea fare isn't your thing.

The food here was excellent. Quality ingredients were used for our food and they didn't skimp on anything either. While 3 of us had Afternoon Tea, my husband decided to order from the a la carte menu. He had a lobster bisque and a sandwich. One of the best lobster bisques he's ever had. Possibly even the best!

It's a popular place so I do recommend reserving well in advance to get a good table. We reserved only one day in advance and were put on a couch with two very small tables in front of us, and a side table on our left. It took quite a bit of maneuvering to fit our food and drinks on the small tables provided, and I had to turn to my left to pick up the very heavy teapot every time I wanted to pour some more tea for any of us. The lady who took my reservation over the phone did warn in advance that it would be a tight spot. I don't think I realized just how tight it was going to be. Wouldn't take this seat again, but with a bigger table I would absolutely come back to this Tea House sometime!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGepJ-3zwdqTsikLOpbLpdiYS7ml8NzTpTATdO&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-5-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mahsa Safari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUchvWzR219vkKaIpFisPaWM7tup-Txwsp5Pxmxgha5rfxN9fROgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited the Teahouse Restaurant in Stanley Park to celebrate my birthday, and it was a wonderful experience. The location is beautiful, with stunning views that made the day even more special. The food was delicious, and the staff were so friendly and attentive, which added to the celebration. It’s a perfect spot for a memorable occasion!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyzOPwTwjqkt5B7nXIQpicupwOJDd_2x5_Ys17&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Kate Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr0wyxbETF1OIwtaRI7q7gqmb4Gyi3lrLYLvt0zWijOigiOvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is not actually a tea house. It is a higher-end café with delicious options for meals and desserts. The service was outstanding. I called ahead as my group was going to celebrate a special event, and the staff provided us with great indoor seating with a beautiful view the water just outside. They also served a complimentary raspberry centered chocolate mousse cake. It was delicious and very kind and thoughtful of the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdb2mmVSbHa8etcjeiB_h0z08wyuncuiR4hbi2&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Minu Ak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpx6V6dzD6tisu6tWSZcHe3Ev1skK55mygxtuEg2Ryek5VqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I wrote this review based on the prestige and class this restaurant claims and the service and quality we experienced.

The host at the front desk was neither friendly nor welcoming, and he didn’t even offer a smile. Other staff members didn’t seem as professional as those in similar jobs.

The table was set for four people, but in my opinion, it was more suited for two. The waitress walked heavily in heels, causing the floor to shake, which made the people around feel unsteady and left me quite nervous.it was like earth quake.

The mint and lemon garnish on our drinks was wilted and rotten , as shown in the photo.

We ordered the duck and steak. While we enjoyed the steak, the duck was overly salty and had an unpleasant smell, making it far less enjoyable than similar dishes at other restaurants which I experienced before,

A few hours after our meal, I experienced stomach discomfort, which suggests that the vegetables might not have been fresh or properly cleaned. Based on this experience, I wouldn’t recommend this place to friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOhpZw-3A5kzvdBqvjX3WvYvQvDXoE7YjvAPL9&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Mahshad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0WdFZCPDIr9KNIGcPuLDEypkHoHqcCGEG09122Ny-BVJmiU2c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted our Christmas party at [Tea House and couldn’t be happier with the experience. From our very first email, their team was incredibly responsive and welcoming, making the planning process seamless. The venue itself is beautiful, with a warm and inviting atmosphere, and the pricing was very reasonable. The food was absolutely delicious and exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend for any special occasion!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ0VfcRtzgFHN3MvEkijjUB0ti3ObeKai8ljlU&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Min T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHBCvyhMdMuGm8ISXRxIPWaPtZa7hX9LVxvDW4OOAn-tBBWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere at the Tea House in Stanley Park is amazing—such a perfect setting surrounded by nature. The food was delicious, with a great selection of dishes, and the service was excellent. The staff was friendly and attentive, making the whole experience really enjoyable. Whether you're a local or just visiting, it's a great spot for a memorable meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyshT0c3zcXyEiab20u5NumkuEiCRa_7rzu8hd&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Sonja Efford (Efford)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN7pKl5pIStrEkRXfGklOo3Rs-t2EaOTN-YGTqDWjvvwBWLv4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed a family dinner to celebrate one of our children’s graduation from UBC. The location, the quality of the food and service were excellent. I highly recommend to others. A great backdrop for photos too. Friendly service.
No pressure tactics to buy alcohol was much appreciated by us. Meals took a little longer than we expected, but when food arrived it was perfectly cooked, plates warm, fish cooked to perfection. Well worth the small wait time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBzkVTaJHwBG-op1U4t5ilbnisxm7VK0Ko8MSD&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"mina zabihi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVg7Hs1MSdAQleivSWHBilOyl40wKe7OklAWfSx6WyV4KEGppQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated his birthday, and what a night it was! 🥰 The food was good, and even though it was my first time there, it felt like I had been there before. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, and the server was kind and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYdkyZjIbQH_Tc8p75KJiIn4dpJyL5-JSsW3hJ&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Martin Cloutier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXewEsd3TfPjzrJK0iNaYLhE5rKZi6pAlrotmYuVQXV_5m15Fs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience. I mean... Look at the pictures! The ambiance was perfect. Food was fantastic. Highly recommended. Make reservations though as my may not get in otherwise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdQmjxMOOsmtfp77VdSpJ9U0mnGaytt7rkVPe7&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-10-5"}]

I was very happy with the Earl Grey I purchased here. A+","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles Yuet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-JHe3-GWR5bhpwlPP24WZ3EFbKKrsE2SnajklVsaIYBhykA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have no doubt the tea is great but if you serve coffee, you should have cream and restrooms available.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wāsé Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEcx4qA_VgpB8_HoZOohC-moE-RYt8BF5k0tegNyjHXGU4vAE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent selection of fine teas and even better customer service from the staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephen Rees","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyCRehnCWoXXFZlk1NaMMbKSLvHFnHFaeqlBP6ZMvJqjvc0u-HPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Murchie's sells tea - and coffee - and all the supporting hardware that goes with it. They also serve drinks on the premises. Most of these sales must be \"to go\" as the seating is very limited. Just two chairs and a table inside, one chair and a small table outside. That being said the service is excellent, very friendly and the tea is freshly made. Only served in paper cups. Very large choice of teas. I noted on the side board where they keep the sweetners, stir sticks and so on that they also offered free tasting of one iced tea. The music chosen on this occasion was delightful - swing or jazz from the 1920's \u0026 30's I think. Altogether a much nicer experience than the nearby Blenz.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hui Jia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnQMF6uwlziMp_BE2yF-cGDNKEcnwhzn7TlWEwdbR4P38MaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed with my purchase! I bought two sets of tea cups and sauces as birthday gifts for my friend and both of them are defected: one has a stain inside and the other has a bump inside which might hurt your figure when you wash it. I found this out after going back home already. I called in advance to ask whether they can do exchange for the same good ones and she said yes so I brought them back for exchange. However, when I arrived at the store, the same person said there were no extra ones. I asked whether they could order for me, and she said even if they order, the new ones will be the same and the quality of this set is not good! I was shocked! Do make sure to check carefully before you buy. That’s the lesson I learned here. Thought I will not come back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meanz K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY0jWG64amHDW1jLvV-CYOmueC-E7s6g2ECaE3ZqOo7kVzQvbTiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fine selection of teas for reasonable price ($14.95 for one box of 50 teabags) and the shop has a very classy ambiance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert F.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFYCDfsbGLTBrHBdAOFPq9ieS5xeDUTgkNHPj9m8YsVJyo9RC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quiet place to purchase different types of tea, both bagged and loose.  Friendly service.","Images":null,"When":""}]
