user_reviews: [{"Name":"Andrew Duan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVit6zVjwxurhHTfyzlmVHdf7tPh6i4TT5a66FGA0zwI2xss4dz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered winter melon green tea today  on Uber Eats and it was all good until I saw ant in my drink. Although this is high protein and I appreciate it but the food safety shall be my concern. Otherwise, if there were no ant in the melon, I would have offered 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm2yU2zGDUFGTlaKcjMFNKXQT_EM9geo9pW4iO\u0026fid=0x0:0xc38b5c23434d1860"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Adison Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUHVKg_GuRcd0GLUjYbIBqjNX1GBuhBeVgfya2PM_BI6NlqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have been going to this place for 5 years ever since it opened and I'm honestly so disappointed by how it gets worse and worse. When it first opened, it absolutely amazed me and was the best bubble tea I've ever tried. Now it smells disgusting like body odour, my bubble tea tasted like that too with the new menu BBQ smell and couldn't even drink half of it. The sausage I got was overly greasy and had the same disgusting smell. The employee was sweet but smelled awful to be honest and I question the sanitation of this place. It's honestly so sad to see how a business I loved for 5 years starts going downhill. I genuinely hope that they get better, as the smell there was absolutely unacceptable to me. They started becoming understaffed and started hiring people that doesn't care about their job the past 2 years. Some staffs were rude and looked so tired too. Wouldn't come back here.. sadly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Brentder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4hezav1-a18tiDoracxGbcq8BLzAdvjbg0jUqMthsWoFNyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The most recent review for this branch said their drink tasted of BBQ flavor. I ordered a drink in person and can comment further on this “BBQ” flavor. It was very stuffy in the store and there was a pungent odour (I can best describe as BAD body odour). I think the BBQ flavor may be due to the odor in the store. Interesting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alice Tsoi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjK-h6HO-zXPRddS9fWuYsYaoGVdqcrCFofehKc0XYHiMcTF4j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I visited this shop last Sunday, we ordered different kind of drinks. It is unexpected good and delicious. We have chit chat with their staff and learned that they are new opening recently. They have provided variety of HK, Taiwan and local drinks, we like the HK style of drinks, maybe we have home sick reason. Thanks for this special moment and let us go back to our beautiful memories!\nSurely we will visit again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leo Szeto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4WeGgwEN0IZuYCpT599WylmEIY2FNQ7VxOA_ev7sDQIQ1YA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered hot drink, it came cold with ice. When my wife politely told them and asking for replacement.. the girl said they couldn’t remove the ice. This makes zero sense, and we will never go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyHOD3jkenuPwavG3Y62Z_9k_JcLxjE6Pqewlt\u0026fid=0x0:0xc38b5c23434d1860"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Josephine Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8UejeGdlCBXmq9iCj4KAfMFg31koNGe0fK1qhNtiuUpMoa3TL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There weren't any people at the shop, so we were able to order very quickly. The girl at the cashier told us the pancakes would take 5-7 minutes, which was nice since it prepared us for the wait. I ordered the fruit tea without ice and 30% sugar, and it was very good and not too sweet. It was also filled to the top.\nI also ordered the custard pancakes, and they taste exactly like 雞蛋糕 in Taiwan. One of them had a tiny bit of filling (much less compared to the other 4 pieces), but overall it was tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3rGYenel7_s9o8YIDwsjsDFlPK6kANVlk1ave\u0026fid=0x0:0xc38b5c23434d1860"],"When":"2023-2-25"},{"Name":"Eric Yau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8L6_A7LwJGZKpWE2QTnsVC62O_YH8z58Eji0eiYKwzkoFJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This bubble tea place changed hands from the old Yifang store. Went in for a hot red date tea. Waited 15 minutes and when asked they said need another 5 mins. Which I might have believed if not for the very poor and unfriendly service. Walked out. Sad. Won’t be going back but luckily a new place open up a block away on 10th.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vincent Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyHRPyJDPuqHML_1-dD1g7vOygOgIyYWRNiStCJaPoVI6QVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered Mango Pomelo Sage Slush. Not enough mango flavour and mango cubes, if any. Sago was undercooked.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I would come back here for a drink for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEA4ue0ZroCOjmHOBSmSvmXU7WBTyHLOUZYJc5\u0026fid=0x0:0x76c4d5fdac0effac"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Claudia Kraatz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKAYYK0joES9fcvPs0uNACZKb2evWmMd46dQWc7C6yziix0tnP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The girl serving me was very helpful and kind! It wasn’t busy at all. Quick service with 3 people working when we went on Sat evening. Limited seating available, so it is more of a take out place. There is a washroom available. Good sized parking lot for the plaza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2Gu5i3V8yL_mEWHcEUakRVGk17bNAE0bTJBvG\u0026fid=0x0:0x76c4d5fdac0effac"],"When":"2022-12-24"},{"Name":"Vic Yung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjSUFpvFSwHsCrywPzGZzN7WDhV8Ljlj3YECw07iwjqMR_leW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went on a weekday afternoon and there were a couple people already inside. With only two (new) staff it was a little slow but nothing outrageous. Drink quality is good and the matcha latte had a strong matcha flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfecwckYqtzFjnn7QueeGGv9HS-Kop0h2HYnch\u0026fid=0x0:0x76c4d5fdac0effac"],"When":"2022-2-19"},{"Name":"Vernessa Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_HMcx5wd1O28ySlJt9n4oU_hrqSI6Z05JLm6P-8L--a68NBo5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"milk tea is a bit bitter and needs more milk even at normal sugar and boba is rather firm.\nservice is rlly nice and the staff were super friendly. boba was served quickly\nslightly dirty from muddy shoes but good bathroom","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steph P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUVNu2Tr3c8RdUIf7jTZANsPqnm8r5cZ_VYul20z1HEETmlargSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best brown sugar milk tea I've ever had... the pearls were fresh, warm and SO tasty. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Calvin Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5Mit-RWhfYjdblIfRdGphjR6DeeMI5rlC_N1eKGe7_JgzWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"NUT CREAM IS SO GOOD!! I have no idea how they achieve such creamy, velvety textures but the taste is heavenly.

The strawberry tea with nut cream was my favourite. The Earl gray with chocolate nut cream was also delicious. There's a slight powdery taste in the milk tea with pearls, probably from the nuts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp7HfBZa3bxiQ5lRFyYDi8aJYqc6r9i5zyazfE&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very lovely vegan tea shop in Kits. The drinks are yummy and healthy but not overly sweet or heavy. The original nut cream was really impressive and I would definitely recommend getting the drink with that cream!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj5cT9AAikGiOmIKxqgnkl0oFzGqwp9_Uu5mut&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Kimia Abtahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2CE2uN5zYA5-Ne2mDlfB8HQlAxJSeFJKc2I3kIPxW8BoK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently visited NUTTEA Cafe with a friend. Since I have a nut allergy, I was limited in options, but the staff were friendly and helped me choose a strawberry iced tea made with fresh fruit—a refreshing blend of tea and smoothie. My friend ordered the chocolate hazelnut nut "milky," which was creamy and enjoyable, though not groundbreaking. Overall, it’s a nice spot for those who enjoy nut-based drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvUAtWGuqLQWXDb18EzeYoDf6RRZRZS8_qWqY&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Cece Ch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbcgZ6qX05fbBNbrTAirE6Cx1wU1NBdo2me25Ptstplqs3q_0V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love how they are completely vegan so I didn’t have to pay extra $$$ for a dairy-free option.

I tried their Biscoff coffee with nut cream - loved it!

Their lid design is pretty sweet - love the idea of scooping the cream to taste before sipping the coffee itself!

Need more cafes like this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4eeMg1P4bGkUlglDBoxicmkc01iL33SP431YC&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Pearl Rose von Euw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBzQjzzGHsxkUQyewt440jrpJ1s9xIXESPk355K3n1sZzmjq2Suw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wonderful all-vegan cafe with a long list of drink options, warm and cold! They make their nut milk in-house and you can tell they do everything with passion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOkmmUxK1ilp7GYjtzTOBsX8rzs2YBbqXaupkD&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Utopia Colores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo2REOlk2i3P7yOu4CYS2_AUDNwJlgIS0nFPTIUjVHsatiCHGe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in this place and will definitely come back. I love bubble tea and i can’t believe I didn’t try this place before! i always struggle to find good dairy free milk tea options, let alone one with cream! Loved to see they also have To Live For and Bonus Bakery baked goods. My non-vegan boyfriend usually doesn’t love the flavour of plant-based milk but loved his drink too.

Nuttea offers fresh tapioca pearls and real fruit in the smoothies, smooth slightly savory plant-based cream, amazing overall flavour and excellent service. 5/5 for me 🫰🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT2bjYwqUx-o182Wmcrjb2-BDOuMuqbw3sE0Vv&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Finally got a chance to visit NUTTEA thanks to my Plant Curious coupon book (which did save me $7). I had the Black Sesame Nut Mylk and added tapioca pearls. It had a strong nutty flavour in combination with the nut mylk. I really enjoyed it! The pearls had good texture and were quite sweet, so they balanced out the black sesame well. My friend had the Hunny Dream (their entry in Vancouver Foodster's Spring Drink Challenge). Nice flavours between the earl grey, honey and nut cream. We liked how thick the nut cream was as it held well in transit, along with the "hunny crumbs" and almonds. It was $10.20, which is a similar specialty pricing to Hot Chocolate Festival drinks.

Customers can adjust ice and sugar levels in their drinks. It's wonderful to have a "mylk" tea shop focused on vegan options. Unfortunately, it's quite pricey as my nut mylk with pearls is regular $9.45 (before tax). I'm not in the Kitsilano area often and wouldn't make a special trip out, but I'd return if in the area for a treat! The staff were friendly, and they also sell plant-based snacks and small gift items. Limited seating for four inside at the high counter, and a couple of tables outside by the sidewalk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM21361cJFC7MDDV0TDUCuZgpW3K0GB3BA1QAMF&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Mia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm8SG257WZ07l_06tkhi14cSVPOrh1C0B6QdOhlbeT-Zu2_w4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing! The owner and staffs are so nice!

I found out about NutTea in Toronto first and was so happy that they have a location in Vancouver! I was able to recommend to my friends who live in Vancouver and all of them love it! They're so unique compared to the regular bubble tea stores! Their nut cream is so creamy, fresh and so addicting, and the sweetness level is perfect! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_7LfWNnb6dO8p5qwjIljBJLMDiv2gGZH4gIBl&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2023-12-29"}]

title: Sharetea UBC
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX55iUXJ4bcYecYgVMaFXZD8TXtdUhK1-WPf-TY-EVD-OkIhGRj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sharetea UBC makes pretty good boba, but there is room for improvement in terms of service. It took 20 minutes for two staff to make only two teas, and there was nobody else in line. Seemingly, there weren't online orders they were working on, either; the delay was really confusing. I got the wintermelon half sugar with boba, and my friend got brown sugar with boba. Both were delicious, and the boba was great in texture. It's a decent spot to get a bubble tea on campus if you're not in a rush!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo5nLWvlstYyHL_EwRqj8fGunA4YvR_cyHUXpN&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Madhawa Dhasanayaka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYGCUJvy1u-WFY6bfAvJmUDj3j4Ei0hF57SRiactGWxVFGBkdG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sharetea Bubble Drink at UBC: A Tantalizing Bubble Tea Experience

If you're a bubble tea enthusiast like me, then Sharetea Bubble Drink at the University of British Columbia is an absolute must-visit. From its clean and modern ambiance to the wide array of delectable beverage options, this place has firmly secured its spot as one of my favorite spots on campus.

Upon stepping into Sharetea, you're greeted with a vibrant atmosphere that effortlessly blends contemporary aesthetics with an inviting charm. The place is always bustling with activity, a testament to its popularity among students and tea aficionados alike. Despite the constant influx of customers, the staff here is remarkably efficient, working diligently to serve you your coveted cup of bubble tea in a timely manner.

While there might be instances where you find yourself waiting for a brief period, the tantalizing drinks that await you are certainly worth the patience. Sharetea boasts an extensive menu that will leave you spoiled for choice. Whether you're in the mood for a classic milk tea or seeking a burst of fruity flavors with a vibrant fruit tea, this place has it all. Each drink is crafted with care and precision, ensuring a delightful and refreshing experience with every sip.

What sets Sharetea apart is its commitment to quality. Each beverage is meticulously prepared using premium ingredients, resulting in a remarkable balance of flavors. The pearls, or boba, are consistently cooked to perfection, boasting a delightful chewiness that adds a textural element to every sip. Whether you prefer your pearls to be sweet, caramel-infused, or bursting with fruity flavors, Sharetea has got you covered.

While Sharetea focuses solely on beverages, its dedication to perfecting the art of bubble tea shines through. The absence of food options, even as snacks, may seem like a limitation to some, but it only reinforces their commitment to providing an exceptional beverage experience. After all, it's all about the tea here, and Sharetea certainly excels in that regard.

To fellow tea enthusiasts, I cannot recommend Sharetea Bubble Drink at UBC enough. It's a haven for bubble tea lovers, offering a clean and modern space, prompt service, and an array of mouthwatering drink options. So, if you find yourself on campus and craving a delightful bubble tea experience, head over to Sharetea and let your taste buds embark on an extraordinary journey of flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPnxrML75hCtgIyxLvPFtciYusAAPbYMoAAHP8&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"Deborah Aiko Insook Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkrXzRxO3A2OGqiLyPY_PlsYk2B44E-xgPkg6UAgy-1KwY7fkT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for milk tea lover!
I found this place in UBC before and got a chance to sit in!
COVID-19 makes so much different for everythings. I missed sit and sip time.
They keep opend the main door for ventilation.
It was cold but Enjoyable with yummy hot bubble tea named Hokkaido honey milk tea with pearl.. maybe.
Those greeny lovely and transparent chairs are cool. Love it! The staff was friendly and explained well about menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOw5wsmapGdPjnNkjlpP8BX1omkVbEw7pjz0qnK&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2021-1-20"},{"Name":"Anna Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsXGHcBwKZ7LzutjdU3JfHu1sY9JHEaxdHCPEavcWWvq1qrCI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The Wintermelon Tea tastes like beef. Don’t order unless you’re vegan and want to taste meat again. Everything else is good, I would recommend the Classic Bubble Tea. The staff are friendly and patient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNekmQ54c9gCksT9QrFPgWO3MCEy_qfDcuGVXHS&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Kiana s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_GxZFISX_5n0C9rZ4zbfyU7eK-sTgszmwiet1ZSVqoL-Gtt4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered mango match tea with pearls…the taste was awful!! Like I was drinking medicine!! And it was pricy! The only thing that I liked was the spot that you can work and study! Otherwise it’s not worthy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbPiTupwUSFBeGXNVO_oxDmhPt71aaBKtbzvEA&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2023-5-11"},{"Name":"T Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdvbh0bNj4D0S4JOT3PpDBSQStiyf41cRaQTOVpvUVdYmsIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Both two person work there were very friendly. However, we waited for nearly 15 minutes to get our order. Our milk tea didn’t taste as good as we had hoped, and they were watery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLf5oJC9762Bg5jDg6VXjeE12aiobTif6YzSfq&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2021-9-26"},{"Name":"w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVECjtzjKwGGU2yagM5sH2sMNpUPFv0VdGQBZqvehtzvpFlyVDi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good drinks, recommend the peach slush with lychee jelly. Nice atmosphere. Friendly staff. A little on the pricier side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyjmb8mMtnHTYegBTqc4UQRB6ACtYtiw2Vzqiy&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Yang William","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJx3Zwq88wQ7uhMTvOovjs2Weq1xAQwd1T8wKsieTXd12EF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Asked for less pearls. But 1/3 of the bottle is pearls. And I asked for half sugar. But it is so freaking sweet. I doubt it is half sugar. Because it is my go to drink at share tea. It is NOT half sugar. I always leave a note to my order for less pearls. 1/5 times they can remember that. Please teach your staff what is half sugar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfckq9r5frDnESY8wxQ7XJ0EUjwb77Ps7M8qQ&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2021-4-20"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kerri Lynn Read","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTHLpQPBInoVayS8AIz6st9us6NjpsC7kWZVmboCa8v3CUGak=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I stopped by Strongs Café today for an almond flat white, and unfortunately, I was disappointed with the experience. The coffee was priced at $7.30, but after just two sips, I found it undrinkable and had to pour it out. While I appreciate the atmosphere and the friendly staff, the quality of the coffee didn’t match the high price compared to other cafés in the area that charge less for better coffee.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Last","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUehMd67tBEQE-Z3ILQJZE8eZkZpoUS0hYwI6anH7YcNx5wq60AdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place,  they have everything and it's delicious and made well. My sons loves the food. The appearance of the store is always very inviting as well as the staff is considerate and kind to customers. I wish thier were more stores that provide quality products such as Stongs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"farnaz rahnama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEonqzoEfySPBCeMeoUq2t9wG8Fu2I6_tJCZ5NUHZzqZWHTqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Two young girls are working there and they had the worst customer service as a barista !!!\nThey prefer not to ask for mug for here and I really disappointed with them , but I still loves to go there because I am taking my lunch break in that area .\nI hope they will behave better .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erik Lehman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBULFTsc2d2oKnJ2Y41TCgLB0TGqaCteZmnSwosWQYxr8qqYvGvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got some popcorn for movie night. These little things that stong's does are what separate it from the pack. So much better than your average grocery experience. It's actually nice to shop in there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martin Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3fy400c5l1Xz5iqZKbJWeEheKXszuvJf6g4jfbsElqMlv2A_-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great outdoor space, with southern exposure.  Ther is also ample seating inside. The cafe offers great food at reasonable prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYm-ltNetsXHtvdpyYG7NgX0zfHcB0lPG569WI\u0026fid=0x0:0x5e14fae77b62a035"],"When":"2019-12-26"},{"Name":"Bianca Coliopoulos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMQuM8UBdnE5LEd-YJoNDHF9SZGIwRkd4uEmwou-DLFtAmOCS0Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful grocery store with lots of nice hot food items as well","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madison Dunn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkqByZyPiPTQjYQOOzEm5AWFf64Rta_-Mv6vbxT3fshzHFb3RU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good has all the boutique and small company brands","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good coffee and lattes, with great seasonal specials. The desserts are delicious and reasonably priced. My favourites are the tiramisu and matcha parfaits. The prepackaged sushi available in the fridge is edible but not great, the sandwiches are better but still nothing special - I would come for the drinks and snacks, not the food. The staff is usually friendly and quick at making drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKaY80NvBrp9MejmRXGXmZFkt4EuAqiv-HNs4Q\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d82acab1faef3e3"],"When":"2022-11-26"},{"Name":"Manu Goyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZ9bGCnzhlvZbFUtYdBmuIDxw5aGDmnpBiY-LPoM3HSUmqDce-uA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried latte and tiramisu here. I asked for extra hot latte but it was cold when I got it. And tiramisu was good taste wise but it was very watery from the bottom and looked like it was made a few days ago. It would’ve been really delicious if it had been fresh. You wouldn’t want to eat old stuff when you’re paying that much money. Instead of spending 12 bucks on only coffee and tiramisu I’d say it’s better to check out the kitchen next door. It’s just $16 for unlimited food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu2ouFAuJdpws1H7wpXAcuZRoFm0GGWpnBn9RY\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d82acab1faef3e3"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"phoebe chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgGAAqUtg35VI0StSFv5qlfLxxuWpGYhE1ErUcNuvoAqdMRwU-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yum coffee at UBC. We always grab coffee here before starting our grind at McLeod (walking distance).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkx97tqCQMA8q30lW1xq0P86Es7ClQypguo_AC\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d82acab1faef3e3"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Sartaj Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1doLfhIpPIdYO53EoD_63mHYE3jrQc1kxM-CAvFcju93a6Z1xPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing coffee (get the Papa New Guinea pour over). Great snacks too- salted caramel fudge cookie is a favorite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBFxe1oJqZ5WfbWGd3mYUluda70NDFeShPiyDp\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d82acab1faef3e3"],"When":"2020-10-29"},{"Name":"Ethan Thoma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwcBgGM6noQ65Wyp3uc1m_h94BLqBB48JGe2XAM5dT8ocYrJEXEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the best coffee in UBC. Not only does it use flex (which helps some), it also doesn't have that acidic aftertaste that most cafes tend to have. Better than Starbucks for sure. Their cookies are amazing too including the Mexican wedding cookie!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtvkqUTGqKJKZItQ-dpfTy5xGKvVe2IaCtHawVqb-9NXvJNjqP4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Coffee was ok… definitely don’t go there for food. Also couldn’t get my stroller around their display to get to the fridge. Would for sure be difficult if you use a mobility aid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harran Shi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVposYwd6J2dlDeYCSGnh3ME_dZtFZ9u3SjpUExJkrlqu62h0dh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I like their cheesecake and matcha teramisu but they are always out of something in the fridge, especially ice cream. They sometimes have Mochi here and sometimes don’t. Their frozen cheesecakes are also always missing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hash Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLExeuh0C9VNkYa2zON0uFAstj3F0xPIKlp5QJJJRUEiJHWQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst service ever. One female server of an Indonesian ethnicity gave me a bad attitude as she IGNORED me, because I was wearing a cheap hoodie that day. It is certainly concerning how such a snobbish woman can get a job here, and it is appalling to see such disingenuous behavior toward the customers. I am cynical toward the way this place is managed, cynical to the snobs that work there, and downright appalled by the discrimination that occurs here on a day to day basis.\n\nA comment to the owner's response: Yes I do remember when this happened, approximately a year ago. I remember it so vividly because of my disbelief in such an appalling service attitude. It concerns me that unqualified workers such as this person work in UBC's food services, and I find it incompetent of you being oblivious of situations like this.","Images":null,"When":""}]

A must-visit for tea lovers seeking quality and variety. My personal favorite? The Canada 150 blend—it's exceptional!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRAJ7ROrp8ZuI0CPAxdZmYge8eZr-sciE2bQVK\u0026fid=0x0:0x43234cb8ffee1e7a"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"kian kiani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfIcXRbdEg6mWjHSA4hjgaPXgi9AD9xEnAqLzemkMaA5RZyg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"\"I wish they had as good a customer service as they have quality products. The staff at this store do not disrespect customers, but they show no respect for them either at all. If you ask a question about the products, they become extremely upset, as if we have done something wrong by not doing our homework. If you ask a second question, they frown intensely. Everyone (except for one young Russian girl) behaves as if they have been trained to create stress for the customers.\"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ϟ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcq-of5kOnIo_kYHbAsSknHCpOgSDhE2G7CTSk6S7gUn8WvpQ2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I bought samples of Masala Chai and Orange Tea respectively, as well as the white chocolate cranberry biscotti and the 300g coffee! Once I taste all of them I'll have to update this review! Overall the ambience was very nice, employees were patient and store was nicely arranged. Location is a bit obscured as not many people expect a tea shop so close to Sportchek, would recommend! There are tables if you want to sit outside the store too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"natalie shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKl1aTr1bGCE4FmoAvfyok9vdM_DMqdaq8CpF1pOBiTs2GWbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Gave me old burnt coffee. It was cold when I went back they didn’t offer me my money back and I didn’t have time for them to brew a fresh pot. Horrible service coffee was disgusting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elyas Mottaghian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnwaRKYD66KZz8_b7wIw6ewVzcGk06lDhfbPr194ERygUlCftB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Visited the store to purchase a Christmas present.  I selected a basket priced 49.99.  on paying I noticed the cashier charged me 69.99.  when I asked about the discrepancy and if they could honour their price tag, the cashier replied \"*they* must have updated the price in the system.  I just work here sorry\".  Since when is that the customers problem? There was no attempt made to honour the price tag presented to the customer.  I will not return and advise you check pricing on everything before making a purchase.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MI Five","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZi1fK9PY_Std4pWKlA4wB5FGwAfzK3fBWWun3AP-JTbLqelBi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Murchies in West Van Library has a very nice calm longtime owner who serves fresh food and drinks just how I like it with no fuss or attitude. Wish they put one in all libraries! 1 star for simple menu.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alona Panochenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxGXa5G8Kx3rh6RNftkWWrRoNiX0noZR34umbFcRZorMgYeG8E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good tea and coffee to go. But when I was buying loose leaf tea to take home the sales lady was very agitated and really showed her attitude when I asked to smell the tea.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elsa Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgBtFYCkWTkjtefII4egxADlhVRhaG7pRnzQoESC-LbjFzCviaGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What a disappointment. I ordered a 16oz cappuccino to go ($5.50) and it was 50% foam. By the time I got home it was half a cup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcCkYmJ2EsAaKP7NcWgLv2Bn-aMnpuCb73eK89&fid=0x0:0xfe9c9a22c16f0fbe"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty good cappuccino!
As with all the Bean Around The World joints, a nice cozy and laid back vibe coffee house within a nice location. I like the Rustic decor and the mood of these cafes they're great and the snowboard wall decoration is dope love it!
A very nice cappuccino as well as a great selection of baked goods, cookies and snacks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa-TKarfjYtEuAh6scY0rkYkdsk6Jluv7jnzUM&fid=0x0:0xfe9c9a22c16f0fbe"],"When":"2021-8-22"},{"Name":"Will W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ_JhRGYTKs6U1qFUaWfK5PL6iziLWEJr52drWNY0hPTyNh_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t recommend. Went there yesterday around 10:00am. Friend ordered a cappuccino, waited a good 10 minutes after I got mine, when I picked it up, the cup barely had any weight to it.

Tried to dig through the foam with the spoon and after 3/4 of the ways down full of foam, finally saw some liquid. Only 1/4 of the cup was a drink and the rest was foam.

When approaching the baristas to rectify the order, they tried not to make any eye contact with me. When asked about the lack of a drink in a 16oz cup that was full of foam, got told in an obvious manner that cappuccino IS SUPPOSED to be HALF foam and HALF liquid.

Not only is that not true, our drink was only 1/4 of a drink. Truly disappointing about the product and the customer service.

I insisted on them adding more to the drink, and begrudgingly the barista did a quick one ounce pour in the cup. Ended up with a 5oz cappuccino in a 16oz cup.

So ridiculous I will never support this location again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN066A1VxVL2p7EdTQO0UUBWV03WspTQnLOXtjA&fid=0x0:0xfe9c9a22c16f0fbe"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cool place in NV to take a break for good coffee
I recommend it👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYKJDnKF0M84KUbCjI4eEzPM47ZPvzBgKDNkcx&fid=0x0:0xfe9c9a22c16f0fbe"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Yoshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpPaonyN2j0fjtW-IQxzOTLEHVYjy3qvniv_7JborCjXaflA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very relaxing cafe.

The berry muffins were very good and the white chocolate drink was very sweet. Would definitely go back! I wish there were more places like this in Japan.

There is a street piano nearby, and I love the time I spend in this cafe, listening to someone playing the piano.

I want to go back to this cafe when I come back to Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXrrbB2CC7zOA07eLxKAm0B_NmuE1BmlN3VS0_&fid=0x0:0xfe9c9a22c16f0fbe"],"When":"2022-9-17"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The realities of my life sometimes has me drinking coffee that is not the greatest tasting.   The Bean is a place where you get good coffee. Made by people who care about you because they are part of a smaller business in a small community.   Love this place and wish I could say that I come here all the time.   I only come once in a while but have never been disappointed with the service or the coffee.   Long live the Bean!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsKyW6dpmCw_2H_p9XDOBtJDV-qRcnmmTI_mGz&fid=0x0:0xfe9c9a22c16f0fbe"],"When":"2019-10-20"},{"Name":"Selena Tuytel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9HO_TqF9PuUeRDOCG6oJQlYy_d9C_Kpg2LTWdOUuuc0dqhm8f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Please train your baristas better. Long lineup, long wait and then drink was made wrong. Barista was frazzled. We weren't the only ones who got a wrong drink and this isn't the first time. Cold drink somehow turned into a hot one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKA09HYPqZPcWNM9behF7aG5bJEhAVbEyMBfNbLwqV60PQ2Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Good Sandwich but they forgot to take down my order. I had to wait til 5 people after me all got their orders.

Tipped for nothing really","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Agnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyqJcbJDbElC-RwU1sBP46by6tVeVGdJmv6s9B0kjpjwDghjdVVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been to other Sungiven locations and am very excited this is walking distance from my house!

Can't wait to welcome you to the neighborhood! I'll be at the Grand opening tomorrow!

Update:
I went to shop and it was so good to have this store in the neighborhood. It's a perfect fit! The hot food to the seafood to the fresh produce. Seeing all my neighbors shopping in the store is just so wholesome I just had such warm feelings.
My kids love the store and were running around wanting all the amazing snacks and desserts.

Thank you for picking this spot to open!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2nBSRvf6CbaGUDccT-M1napdzH6hiFc1W9JVs&fid=0x0:0x2be8921aaab4e767"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"Sara Watanabe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAh8HWTK3FfHvJLluVSWagbjykYuOhZYvxmSTbG8YO3P3CkiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vegetables are fresh and they have organic options as well. Meats taste pretty good and good deal especially on discount. Nice and clean environment and nice customer service.
We will definitely be a regular customers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_tywzaKp4UbEaf2rV4P3cigNr14gOy6RB9k9h&fid=0x0:0x2be8921aaab4e767"],"When":"2023-10-10"},{"Name":"Kai Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3VR_OrPNo6aF4ar7Kas5spNM9KXMIIAIadoYuG50cxNOXwww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like this store, clean, quiet, people friendly. Lots of Asian choices. And even has a little food court. A better alternative of","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSCOVkFwuYz6EsAoI38Qtl8TGSqrUIrG9Sr-g&fid=0x0:0x2be8921aaab4e767"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Mochaabs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa9VJWhNAh7NqHBv0meHxgIpc1CamRPaTN5EBhh2uHSOW3hjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The first time we were at the store was around Xmas time, the store layout is so far one of the best. As we were exploring the store, 2 staff started arguing about something while other customer looking at them quite surprised)
Today, we got to the counter and somehow the cashier at the counter move on to the next one. Luckily, the other cashier was so kind and helped us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5MR1DBwWefOFZCUCioDYi9UYs1d2p0XJ9D7te&fid=0x0:0x2be8921aaab4e767"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Daisy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu1nxOTin_LouqpMg8SuZhcgesKimL_02BtAAmRSIlR4zjoDPR2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Update: I came back to try their hot food and had to take a star off. You do not get much for $13.99. I was still hungry after and the food actually tastes terrible. T&T does a way better job.

Opening pains. I came here on opening day and left after a 5-minute without a purchase. There were only four cashiers, resulting in a long lineup. There were a lot of supervisor types just standing around doing nothing.

Came back on the second day in the morning and it was much quieter. They serve Western and dim sum breakfast with a little food court area.

My cashier was not trained at all. Barely spoke English and had trouble with items and promos. It was not a smooth checkout.

Lastly, someone here mentioned their products are from Hong Kong and Taiwan - NOT true! Read the labels and you'll notice their in-house brands like Onetrue are made in China. I avoid those in general.

They have some reasonably priced veggies and pantry items but I'm dubious about the quality of items sourced from China.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1bATi7ofWUqSoZBcOVrxj2Cx7YPYZpHO_IMNY&fid=0x0:0x2be8921aaab4e767"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"Fari M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILgGxSrgfwj0iWvTGEBcyH-PpTFBYV4qp5BI5l7UuZV2ArYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This morning, the staff approached the person who entered right after me and guided her to the gift cards, but not me. Then, the cashier asked if I had a gift card. I replied, "No one offered me one." Another cashier turned back, frowned and spoke in their language to her. Then the front door staff or customer service staff showed up, talked in their language, and finally told me, "It was for the first 50 people."
I even didn't ask why I didn't get one,  but their behaviour was saying all the lies.
It was rude and unprofessional. It's not about the $10 gift card, which is not worth it, and I didn't enter the store for that.
I have been living in this area for 12 years and it is the closeby store, but i will never purchase anything from them again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chan Billy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUu0BxMCIoTCPWK6HIYIshh-dAwvI0FeeInetvb8ov1MvcCJvY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really many choices of vegetables and fruits, much more then other super market, prices is much more reasonable, I don't need to go traditional brand supermarket anymore, because they all markup so high. But I suggest can improve a little bit more the vegetables freshness!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Łevi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfVUCddYkb-N0dZmsuXl0kNiRy5oYcV5exhETgT3aaLmc3kxyv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have been anticipating this store's opening for a while now. It's nice to have a smaller, local, Asian market nearby. Hot food selection could be better; especially since the dining area is so cute!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmLJJCgVqrnxS9vLpLZK4jXLf2y4S2fiVf_zxw&fid=0x0:0x2be8921aaab4e767"],"When":"2023-9-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kaitlyn Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Z8RTVAtMfrX6uG6JFFOYzsyTXI7YKgjW6WLd73YQIb_urJDkYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The quality of the food is pretty mid. Super convenient location and good if you’re desperate but there are deffinately better Blenz’s","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN89OSoVPDK37ThrGVnXDY_0oBEx5X0ickbIv9R&fid=0x0:0xe02dd0670cb9f80a"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's at a prime location so I really wanted to like this place but...

Service is terrible , staff sometimes just talk and don't take orders.  Sometimes they also just ignore you.

Drinks are really mid , I usually just drink matcha, and the matcha here sucks. Even when I paid 1.45 for the extra matcha shot I didn't taste it in my drink at all. My drink was just green but it didn't taste green. The only thing saving the place from 1/5 stars is that there shakes fruit teas are decent, so I couldn't give it a one.

The food is mid, they charge alot for the food but the sizes are small and all they do is heat it up. The wrap and the sausage rolls were not worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm2cr6dV2tWdcklnpplO36wqKt7G4Yyhi06vrO&fid=0x0:0xe02dd0670cb9f80a"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Chuck Canucks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbRWbKlhkItSMLbmu_XWJ_3N6hWd-H7fu47hdSIseduke2SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a filtered coffee an hour prior to their closing time. After taking a sip, I realized that coffee was not warm. I went back to the shop and lady told me  they are about to close that's why the coffee might be a bit cold and she offered me to microwave it for me.  That's the most ridiculous thing I heard in a coffee shop. She ended up making up an americano for me. I guess she was a bit keen to turn off everthing to get out of there soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lora H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoZeNEO5L4rrMh6V21br_KmGz9H9-d_fM-TT68UCIwxe-Cga68=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice addition to the university campus. Located next to MBC or diagonally across from the library. The hot chocolate was not as rich as it used to be; a bit foamy too. Cheese scone was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG7JHbI9dVs29wFT6QCVBEUTNdGj8t-8hxHqd6&fid=0x0:0xe02dd0670cb9f80a"],"When":"2021-11-13"},{"Name":"Tori Lhug","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKArI8RLSBSOLgAYi5M5PfE4rnGsokhoomU03zEcXWfVeKUWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Super overpriced!! I paid almost $7 for a medium drink. It's just a cappuccino. The foam was gross just bubbles so it was like a small size in the medium. It's also way to hot to even try to drink for awhile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0_GORmGXTwg_zsuSXvFG7_OMirysSp50fG9kQ&fid=0x0:0xe02dd0670cb9f80a"],"When":"2022-3-22"},{"Name":"Alborz Amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi4_9e0Y3uY5BKBBgw716BhRPcpC0pleu1dqHgBM3aUeKuBM07zA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have been to this location several times in the last 3 years. One good thing about it is its consistency. Their latte is  consistently cold and tasteless.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steffany K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeGO3DKi_9j9DHbxPOu2VswpmzPNglLDfne66TTL65DmluXmb6ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Edit: I’ve realized at other locations that they shake/stir it really well & its only matcha on the top half, and you can stir with the milk on the bottom (no clumps!)- //

Summer 2023:
I think the cold Matcha latte needs more care/attention... because it can sometimes be really clumpy in the final product. But, the reason I write this review is because I am a little ticked that this location often has (some) staff that seem annoyed or indifferent if you have any request/discontent about something (and that's not to say that there's always an issue).

Whereas, when I gently mentioned at SFU Surrey Blenz that the cold matcha latte had some powder lumps, the guy took the drink and re-shook it without me even having to ask - I was surprised, and grateful. All of which probably took 1 minute of his time...

Today, I asked at this location about it + if it could be "re-shaken", .....and was told to get a stir stick + felt hostility... I think that shows a great difference in quality service + friendliness - or lack thereof.

1-2 girls here are really nice, as an aside.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Peng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXHDBew1WmIJR76UIW1tDw-dkMe3b8HYwTmUgTS1nNMNc56cRj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"All due respect, this is one of the worst Blenz locations. Every other Blenz I’ve been to has been fine.

They managed to mess up a black coffee. A BLACK COFFEE!!! How do you mess up a black coffee???? Like I’d understand if it were anything more complex, but it is LITERALLY the easiest drink to make in a cafe. All you need to do is to put the correct amount of grounds inside the coffee filter, and select the correct brew setting. I literally do not know how you mess this up.

My $3 black coffee was watery. Watery to the point where I could taste the water more than the coffee. Not even TH is this bad! And TH is AWFUL.

Two stars because they at least offered to remake the drink.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"William Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVROj5tKGe8MbrrNOhk8-59eVUA_x7_lmH6eRP-mRZLTzD9H6iPlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The new Crave burger is edible. Of course it’s going to cost you $12 but the fries are crispy and tasty and the burger is made with real meat. Brioche bun that has a crispy and butter to it and good warm sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2Ly8Q_d7yIuOsG117wqyeKNaM-EXbZn4A7ovx&fid=0x0:0x982d27a66c66da98"],"When":"2023-11-23"},{"Name":"Max P1991","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD1rg881dkmkTleYjGzl56qGGoPtdSQsukO-lqroFbyO7Tgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best food and staff! The lines move really quick. My whole time at SFU, they made me all day breakfast. They even have waffles and a large omelette selection. Pizza and pasta nights were the best! Big servings and great price. They'll always remember you, I love that. I prefer eating here than at even nicer restaurants.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hashan Peiris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQS5tXYmTSP8F6gc8CzViRW9uUkD3rHwc2GCIQJ7tX0r6Ne1oo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This ia loacted in the 3000 level of the Academic Quadrangle in SFU. There are separate Sandwich, Sushi, Soup, Stir fry, Pizza, breakfast and tea with delis counters which serve different food menu. Some of those have daily special items. They have a good selection from many world wide cusines. A subway is also located inside cafe. And there is a large area of chairs and tables that contains different levels of comfort. It is open for breakfast and lunch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gerardo Mauricio Toledo Acosta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNfDZcijuXJ-JpRJoCJJb73rzrMj5we0VukvCLUNaWHh_J0EaS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Prices are a little too expensive. There are several food stations: sandwich, Japanese, stir fry, Hindi, breakfasts and subway. I've only tried the stir fries and Hindi, they were very good and the staff was really friendly. The staff at the checkouts use to be not very friendly. The place is usually crowded, but it is a nice place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Akkash Jonathan Aruldas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVq34cAODjPcb53lOpQJrHDAEAtUP2x0MVPenUzp8nqkcIDGBIg1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tables arent really cleaned after people use them(even during COVID)
Usually gets busy during lunch.
The food is slightly over priced and below average in taste.
Tables are placed quite close to each other.
The timings are quite disappointing, closes at like 5 pm.
The selection of food available is very limited.
The employees/team  seem pretty friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenn C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk5Yf6AHDRwi3dIcUPOVEE_cYWpGkp8mFuNfU58qgxBGyB9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Good selection of food. They sell sandwiches, soup, stir-fry, wraps, breakfast, etc. Price is okay. Staff are always frowning. Unfriendly.
There is also a Subway located at Mackenzie Cafe. Rude and inattentive staff. Super slow! It takes them ages to make a sandwich.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Phil B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6PwqYIIO6vFuZ-28N_uFfg9Mq-5qdXog_9fAqo49nnyQR8AOwYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The good: the entire staff is amazing.

The mixed: the food. It's all about knowing what's worth getting. The sandwich station is the highlight. Breakfast is usually good. The pizza station is usually good.  Salad bar is hit and miss.

The noodle station has gone way downhill in my limited experience since the changeover from Chartwells to Sodexo.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Generally busy place during school term. Don't bother going during lunch hour as there'll not be any places to sit. Food is generally okay. There's a Subway, Japanese food counter, Western food counter. Salad counter and Pizza counter.

I usually get the Subway or a Breakfast Set

Food:
Average. Nothing amazing. Refer to pictures to make a better judgement.

Price:
Most of the food places on campus are run by Chartwells so it's pretty expensive for students. Expect to spend a minimum of ~CAD8++ on mediocre quality food.

Service:
Staff are always friendly and helpful.

Would I recommend:
Go during non-peak hours. And if you've got a lot of cash to burn.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItqym_b8p4Y-FW9783yYhbbkXgbWq5yo1i3Fyi_bB9_Q1tlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is the best Starbucks place on campus ( the one at univercity is so mid), they haven't messed up my order yet and I go frequently😁😁😁. They can still make The ISOM with isent on the menu anymore ❤️🤝and they have good wood tables. The staff r always nice 🙂👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME6Pka7PWkBH9JszN0gp4gKiy3o1w2Vsg0fM9q&fid=0x0:0xdf9adb9401265646"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Dilbar Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXKxlhPFp6ZmzCASXmTUBpL3rhRQv07MJtf7C-ClGD0hGBCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I saw online they were  hiring barista, I called them and they were saying come tomorrow for interview. I went there and manager was so rude, he doesn’t even have a sense, that how to talk with people. So mannerless and grumpy personality. Definitely don’t suggest anything to go there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gordon Leitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDwMcP1P0nZgpDO4O9RVSY_IXk6Fk1VqecO-lOJKDV71BjQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service is slow and un-trained, food cost is Highly priced swelling nuked. Coffee is great. Strange location in a school building","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvHJKDhOPewch1TfNVGZY3OhVJQdS8pkViP_e6vVTacbSYQ5c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always come here for my usual order (tall blonde coffee & spinach feta egg white wrap). Coffee is made just the way I like (double-double), and food served hot and ready. The crew is polite, accommodating, and keeps cool under pressure; even in the busiest of times when lines of students and faculty are stretched out the front door of the West Mall Complex.

To Starbucks Corporate:
I want to commend Charm, the barista who consistently brightens my day with friendly greetings and fun doodles on my orders. Her cheery personality is contagious, and definitely is key to creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

Cheers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBx2jXkOPcaW9Zik1VKxg5XEGqkxtheM2cxLc-&fid=0x0:0xdf9adb9401265646"],"When":"2023-2-9"},{"Name":"Prabhleen Lotey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0HJpMNG0XV3pxzDbsBb5LJcLNcfXjfPkxJ7E-4Bb4QF1jjqKF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"wanted a cup of water, made me wait 20 mins before I got the water and then yelled at me for not paying for said water….","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"孙博昊","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtXMOU_D5h-97HuWKINc9EKKzyrGY2h5diIKRD1zGd2L3Wdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have ordered the Matcha Frappuccino without syrup at this Starbucks more than ten times before, and it has always been successful. Today, the person who served me was a man with glasses and braided hair. He was really rude and unfriendly. He was extremely impolite and had a very bad attitude. When I asked for no sugar he just said 'No' with a very impatient attitude. And later I requested a spoonful of syrup, he said“No” again. He didn’t give me any explanation. I feel like he did it on purpose. If you don't want to work, please go home and take a break, but don't take it out on customers. This is racist, if not I don’t understand why did he treat me like this.[His name is John.]","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacqui G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrVJHqnJM3Yk3XMpRcizyGHOg4E8AP2PxkhC0mm-7vQZE_XjHi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just got a caramel ribbon crunch frappuccino from this location. The male barista with glasses was unnecessarily rude to both me and another customer. Apparently the crunch topping doesn’t come on a tall drink? No where online does it say that. Asked if he could put some on top since thats what I paid for. He refused and gave me a very non professional answer. Not buying from this location anymore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Benjamin T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA6OVqpoEVfhi0gbEtarpKjUK-DL0pUVYYdWaZBTzgB2jRb8c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast customer service! Could get pretty packed if u wanna study there. Also a great location on campus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMWhR9TjxLGOTqE8zDKfHQdvD4kWZtj6UnCOMz&fid=0x0:0xdf9adb9401265646"],"When":"2019-4-10"}]

[{"Name":"Karen Armstrong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWusur8Ch2pnYBhnBLeIXWWKcDnqPVUPiEe1iFBglszubNx7_x8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"3rd time, my order was wrong. I should have checked. However, orders take long, with only a couple of customers. Muffin order was wrong as well as 2 of the 3 coffee orders. I didn't notice the scribble error on the top until I arrived at the destination. Last time coffee 1 was wrong and donuts wrong.
Previous, sandwich was wrong.
Is this a good store???","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gary H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8GheJPqCEXcY259S-0r8UUe1byAX9fvOwDNtO4xjd15N5WrQG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Mobile ordered 2 bagel belt WITH EXTRA EGG. Got 2 bagel belts with 0 egg on either. And was told by customer service I'd have to go back to the store and it was managers discretion on a refund. Nothing can be done by customer service. Waste of time and money","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K ZM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbQQH12gwY2goqP6VKtbLbGoabpUsQzHxFXsEZVAeSh-CWDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For a gas location, I’m pretty impressed.  Kinda safe too late nite if you know what I mean.

Off the quieter part of Lougheed Hwy.

Ordered online, busy for a Saturday morning.  The Farmers wrap is my go-to with extra chipotle sauce for 30 cents more, sure why not.

Ended up buying a lottery ticket while waiting.  This Esso is a gold mine with the traffic in and out.

So obviously no seating area for those looking to hang with their friends.

For a local gas station it’s pretty big.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raveness Sss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWvT4opHGYIYG4-tYSmgn9RLP7BTF0_G_KYcxxIyYdHnGGfCHWUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Please put donuts on the skip the dishes order menu. Every other tim Hortons has donuts available to order. Will update review when menu is updated","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Hollis Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVy7SC-95bpOtd_Yob7tJ6tDwqaWTOYcUKUse8ZVqyqLZa5CtUB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really bad attitude on all east Indian servers. All the time speaking Hindi or Punjabi, treated the customers like transparent.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kashif Tanveer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEBbE24mq9lSHbeQxI2Mq7tuA2D1iNg955TCJ-0nZuyQemqnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The crew muskrat & the supervisor T Kaur (which her name tag is faded) are very non professional,  rude and disrespectful. I ask for chilli Veggies in a box which it usually comes and they put it in a small cup. I told her that it comes in a box and I've ate like 100 times and this supervisor getting more rude. I wish the restaurant manager can see this, what their stuff are doing here. So pathetic. Fries are hard rock & cold","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ZnW2Ow9f618cJjt5DnKCyzHUcb9UD7Nne-2R&fid=0x0:0xd5717ff45e89efcf"],"When":"2022-6-26"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Convenient Tim's in an Esso gas station just off Lougheed Highway.
They also offer Soy and Almond plant-based milk alternatives and also have cold brew at this branch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUMINSez2OuLS_bk3b24hZA0S5ssG9sid9XP_O&fid=0x0:0xd5717ff45e89efcf"],"When":"2021-5-24"},{"Name":"Naomi Yo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSrPoYGqeMkDlBiGMm4GYZu6wigVfpMZpNXpGfFF7qJv0PRbU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst of all. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Monica Glez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3YU5YCEHOH6RfLDdoBNeAfDdaY-PZ81kFz8bWoGFHRrolSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really bad service and products, I asked for a hot chocolate and the taste was really bad. I asked the lady for change my beverage and she refused (I didn’t ask for refund). Worst money spend in my life. Please support local and not this kind of stores. It isn’t worth it what u pay for what you receive. Give customer service training to your young staff so that they cannot think out of the box.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnencEMBi3fmEEBmBUyG7PAR3WLqbn45R3JITc\u0026fid=0x0:0x91a6dcbc38b72e0d"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"H J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGkTyjT9Az5yeJIkNXs-8-363C23dSdjYVFLoLvHKrqXARoSU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been frequenting this particular Starbucks in the past 8 years to date.  The staff is always great (I think out of all the Starbucks in North Vancouver, they staff especially nice and professional people).  Even today, I ordered 7 venti-/grande-sized drinks with customized details and they not only made the drinks in a wink but one of the staff (Christina) insisted that she would help me carry the drink trays to my car.  The quality of their service is always top-notch and I see why this brand is the standard in its industry.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Barznji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUriTrYQtAOmF4Sa76JZ313rFtfbCffJggnccnnULEX5woKWJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There is no heater for make warme my cake, no fork, nothing to put the cake on and eat. Very, very bad location, very bad service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHcBMfIfKjU0Q9iRzaf99ZHOiyi4dOFwvB29uJ\u0026fid=0x0:0x91a6dcbc38b72e0d"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Pancholak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU5-Cw2X3lihtt9umaxLPicQG2prg6oWNBaclRI7XRZH6qfdmr8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Couple days ago starboucks offered $4.00 ,on iced drink only for one day.\nMy daughter went to get one , but rejected by the employee. I called to see why they don't honor the add. I have been told by the manager \"since we are not corporate we don't have that offer, however if you like please come back to get one with the add price...\"\nWell, I didn't go there just because the manager would like to do that. I was so disappointed that why a franchise don't follow the corporate advertising. I believe consistency in customer service and adherence to corporate promotions are essential for maintaining trust and satisfaction among patrons.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Salena Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw-7ZXkQFncXHspkHgVh0xDwSQIrYtoYyVYuWOWaa_cg85Elg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Exceptionally slow service. The employee did not know how to make the drink that I ordered, even though it is a menu item. After waiting 20 minutes for her to make the iced drink (she made a matcha instead of oat latte) I just left so frustrated that a Starbucks employee doesn’t know that a latte has espresso and isn’t green 🤷🏼‍♀️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ah, the local Starbucks.  If you are looking for a Cove'r from way back and it is too early for the pub, then Starbucks is a likely place to find them.  I have frequented this location since it opened and watched my kids grow up here when we went for treats.    I can honestly say, I have never had bad service here.  The staff are friendly and the store is clean and organized. Come, grab a cup and watch the world go by.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abigail Monterrosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAHHvD2RhzS4cua3lwFTyldmxnny24KlJCgKkIMmSStE6OFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Staff at the Starbucks inside Safeway does not seem to know how to make their own drinks. Always missing something. Not friendly either. They seem to not want to be there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara Pirouz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJF9OHfHUbxOwHXFGR8YZTaNT7BAwIvKx-2pcAezgWmv0tqz7M4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've ordered coffee and other drinks from here before and to be honest it never tastes as good as other locations....not sure why. Like the coffee always tastes watery to me compared to other locations. But they are always fast so that's good!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"anai aguilera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtEITWTEHWPmtgCjnuAJwU-0BRrHiMDHawLY3Dq0HI95Jx2rbU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a large chilli, which normally elsewhere they gave me a whole loaf of bread or a square loaf of bread, as shown in the second photo. If it's a medium loaf, I know it's half the loaf, but I ordered a large loaf and they gave me a loaf that looked like it was bitten, they didn't cut it with a knife. I felt indignant and I had to wait 17 minutes, since they told me to wait 15 minutes while they were heating it up or cleaning it. They should improve and be a little more professional.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqyQ8tJvbn9HcHUW-aXWDEbFDmHanxc7DImdQn&fid=0x0:0xf786f07f77763dc4"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Rohan Ronnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXicpIhLKKsOq1iRhj1zmteJ2CgIy2c1z8kK0_8nPumnqMfc-E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"28/July -

Update- They served me ice cap made with spoiled milk.

Should have brought oreos with me for the Ice Cap. The lady hesitated to put some oreo in it. Felt like asking for free. At this moment, I avoid getting anything from here. The lady is very unwelcoming and rude.

* A great place to waste your money and time *

Placed a mobile order for doughnuts and when i got there they just told they don’t have it. Waited more than 20 minutes for my order just to hear “we don’t have it”. Not the first time they did this. Othertimes, they make me wait up to 40 minutes just to get the potato wedges order. They always start making order after you reach there, specifically if you mobile order. The food is also stale and soggy, catering is the worst. You have to ask every time , when will i get my order even if your mobile order shows it’s ready, atleast expect to waste 1-1.5 hour of your life on traumatising customers service and food. Please just avoid this one. Better to stay hungry than to go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUUjicnu0M6h5Sb8a8EKP3TezrogfUTpnbl0Sa&fid=0x0:0xf786f07f77763dc4"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Cristina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBJB3oEkz-RgaG4g3hEJsm08zIts9WTpyAtuSAZTbtBSJ2zD9n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have come back to renew my review.
Over the last year the staff have had a great turn around and have been absolutely amazing and super friendly. I take my 2 year old daughter here every morning and we are always greeted with a smile. My daughter loves the staff and we appreciate their hard work. Food is always on point. Thank you ladies for all you do and holding up this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCarJaznvEa4h9iDMegNFZBTB1ZeB-i8XuiNAx7KuoGHWJHM7z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always excellent service, especially from Parmisha she is a gem! She is always quick to help even when the doors open at 7am. She is fast and happy, always prepping, training staff and getting the job done in the best possible way. Give that woman a raise!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edina Restas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVU6I-NGvzx0oj6zeO1Fl9-x7XS7eXJgIUttWWpu_ieJPOwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I got a Mocha Ice Cap here. The girl was so meh, so unkind. She should not work in service. Not a smile, no kindness in her voice, just frowning. We got 2 Mocha Ice Cap with 1 spoonful of whipped topping. I asked her kindly to put there more... she started complaining to her coworker and put another spoon of topping there. All messy. I am never going to this place again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlmhnaOuHoJPtl5M1wNl2tIZQ3V9GhEqSbHZGC&fid=0x0:0xf786f07f77763dc4"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"manisha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISF2pGe1aTsBVILWWNVJctaE2QCaMDPPjar0uHBkuAF8jvjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Tim Hortons and had a fantastic experience! The atmosphere was welcoming and cozy, perfect for enjoying a cup of coffee or a snack.The staff were friendly and efficient, making my order quickly and with a smile. I love how Tim Hortons offers a variety of options for different tastes and preferences. Whether you’re grabbing breakfast or a late-night snack, there’s always something satisfying on the menu.I highly recommend visiting your local Tim Hortons for a comforting coffees or food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWG5UnzwuhD602MZdudFlPvbrM23uUjAvNfaWKFNidKV30hMiueBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a couple of times, first time the guy did not understand what chili soup was and almost gave me chai tea. The second time I wanted early grey double double and again, he did not understand what earl grey tea was, gave me a coffee double double. Some workers there don’t understand English and often misunderstood. They also give less portion compared to the other timhortons at west mall centre.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gautam Ghai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3c_LgQVel-ZceEookjzj-9PbXi0jJRVEsy1PQENWkRirwZujU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely terrible experience at this Tim Hortons! I went in to grab a quick bite, but the staff refused to cater to me. They were rude, dismissive, and offered no explanation for why they wouldn't serve me. It is completely unprofessional and disrespectful.","Images":null,"When":""}]
