user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this charming dessert shop with my family for an afternoon tea, and it was a delightful experience. We ordered a double-baked almond tart and a fresh fruit tart, along with a couple of macaroons. Each treat was perfectly prepared – the almond tart had a lovely balance of rich flavors, while the fresh fruit tart was both refreshing and vibrant. The macaroons were light and delicate, with just the right amount of sweetness.

The customer service was excellent; the staff were attentive without being intrusive, and the ambiance of the shop added to the overall pleasant experience. The space was cozy yet elegant, creating a relaxed environment for enjoying our treats. Overall, it was a fantastic afternoon, and I’d highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for delicious desserts and a comfortable setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjONGhj-8H7vS7aCCLhGhe1PM4335TeEZNtohm&fid=0x0:0x803e7646f455f588"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My sister always buys from here so my wife told me she wanted to come here to buy some parties for my teenage daughters. I was a bit disappointed in the service (to be fair, it seemed like couple of staff were in training), but what I was disappointed in was the fact that the presentation was poor. They gave me the pastries in paper bags....we asked could we get a box? Response "oh it will cost extra". We paid $22 for 3 pastries and a small coffee, this is premium price. The service is crucial in these higher end shops. I recommend they say "would you like your order in a paper bag or a box for extra 50 cents" or something like that. They acted surprised when we asked for a box and seemed unwilling to give it...didn't even give a price!? It wasn't even that busy. There was only 1 person infront of us and nobody behind us at 10am.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5LbA7D_TdMjdECuxw8CTfyEgoQ_UXeWTuF29D&fid=0x0:0x803e7646f455f588"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"domenico lo nigro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIthxkY8GLEDZWdzB0mGjzSgvEczz5zcqwU1_uqJorZZswyeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A stylish bar with a wide selection of desserts and bakery items. I had an excellent cassis vanilla and a good Americano—perfect for an afternoon recharge! They also offer a variety of homemade products like chocolates and jams. The packaging is also very elegant. The staff is very friendly and immediately attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiTd5QHr8e7olb0nWaSLyFhCLC_IQbIYLV5Z8P&fid=0x0:0x803e7646f455f588"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Leung Christy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIugErI77_CYrgXY72kpmFZ_fPZXSQohRPN6bCJmlvZVPtLcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was delicious. Service was great! Unfortunately, there’s a gaping hole in the cake:( I think it is not supposed to be like that cause I tried this cake before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXEwJM11spxrHFZU_hkoT9xdZD7jqagRaSOdJ_&fid=0x0:0x803e7646f455f588"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Byron Sheardown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNqxb0c_42J36yKVRNJaOWQgsDJlMUDs94sxLG_b3F9RGXTQ_D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute cafe with high end pastries and desserts. House made. Espresso is a bit bitter like typical Metro Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9pg9TyZ9EHSxIImmoSOrgGoNMe7DdPT-eLK3T&fid=0x0:0x803e7646f455f588"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Harry Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7RIxWu-fDoQShU55QzZ-1rmmeGquZW7YwNkqB7AozHKXH9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The cake I picked up was tasty enough, but it had a gaping hole in it, as if they forgot to put an entire element in it - as you can see in the photo. The croissant I had - hazelnut chocolate - was also very average and rather dry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc0-AuKMvt62WiYmuot-LqhGqvZ-u9MztaKDUL&fid=0x0:0x803e7646f455f588"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried their oniwassant for the first time. I’ve never had a savoury croissant with the crispy croissant outside. The tuna mayo was so smooth and combined so *chef’s kiss*👩‍🍳with the crunchiness of the croissant.

I wonder actually what the croissant would taste in the morning because I came when it’s about to close.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQY4glsiko4jtj_vd-OhbTWbJatKlV-1W0liLL&fid=0x0:0x803e7646f455f588"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Emilia Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5acOod5UgwdHpCTSJmKM5g2J_x4tuKWgJ7KxFwMgrzpJolqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chocolate tiramisu is perfect
Lots of space and seats; attentive staff
The only thing is … it is so cold indoors( not sure if AC is on… especially it is in December now)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZTJ4angelOoxkR0HlWZeN_QiZF3E-d25Vd_H4&fid=0x0:0x803e7646f455f588"],"When":"2024-12-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kassymkhan Amanzholov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2vkwMNs2-wQ4A9matmryou6Uf31SQXUOk2qrhsoTaO3rHbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered Tomato&Mozzarella sandwich. The first time they served me the sandwich the cheese and tomatoes was all over the bag, consequently I asked to change the sandwich. Literally what they did is replaced the same sandwich into another bag. Eventually, you can see by the photo what type of sandwich I got. I tried to prove to the staff that this is not the look that $8 sandwich should have, but I was just told that it is served like that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-RVxjA7OpXxHcTkOoR2ZPRiibN2Xf7C7xGJRk&fid=0x0:0x1e4f5af7b912732f"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Aniza M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBYI0s07CWW05-syDWjgLIro46IGaM81VqFyVp5Znmy0L1oD97jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Starbucks coffee is good as always.
The handsome baristas are very polite and friendly.
But they don’t put names on the orders and they mix up the orders, that’s what I didn’t like about this location.
However the location is really nice, spacious, clean and good to spend some time there.
They have street parking in the front which is limited but there’s a big parking nearby probably like 2 min walking distance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrH8KSa2D677_rTG_LfDlOfDyRZsztxtmQsFfP&fid=0x0:0x1e4f5af7b912732f"],"When":"2023-10-14"},{"Name":"Zuhal Akay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg1GgpOURu6iroxmZvkn1xIHAzW9h3eAvSkLgL5SlOyjxqMwldWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rude staff… She put too much milk in my coffee. When I told her my flat white had way too much milk, she started explaining how a flat white is made (as if I haven’t had it hundreds of times before). She offered no solution, and when I asked if she could at least add an extra shot, she said I had to pay for it. Starbucks staff are usually very polite, but the woman working tonight was very rude.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"idk eco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUErh1H_qxKHIA9TWvrDblt1kk1XbDnbKlCTc8i-uhxUeb6WgU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location never has coffee brewed and you always have to wait for them to make some (or they offer you an americano which does not taste the same and costs more). Every other Starbucks location has either Pike, Blonde, or Dark coffee brewed and ready without any wait. Not sure why each time I’m in here I have to wait for them to brew a black coffee. A coffee shop offering coffee to go that doesn’t have coffee to go.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeannette Chandia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULDVKokqE-WiIjktJ7kIV4OH_iCTTsIuHrigVuI5UvIjNGkfY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When the coffee is this nice no need to cover it with a lid.

Thank you to this Barrista for taking the time to make it special!

#carbonfootprint #flatwhite #coffee #sfu #pupcup #starbucks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI3MONQjnMrAisaXHIDbovS07mMKXHJTiwIDM&fid=0x0:0x1e4f5af7b912732f"],"When":"2024-1-25"},{"Name":"Farnaz Saiedzadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFN8fmes6Zx7eAdcOVBozvKpdvy3AXst6OC3N2ExYy_NCKfn4uUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like the atmosphere of this place, also the food and drinks are good.

Btw, I read one of the recent reviews that mentioned you can't get drinks in reusable cups, i wanted to point out thats not true! You can get drinks in every personal cup including reusable ones. And also they are nice enough to wash the cup you just bought from there and fill in your order for you.
I frequent this place and reading the reviews i can say that people who are satisfied rarely give reviews and more reviews are complains.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAtRtmkaBx3btzbb8vpa3kTFlDLyKlYJTVecwW&fid=0x0:0x1e4f5af7b912732f"],"When":"2023-3-9"},{"Name":"Yulon Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4fhj0BfuJ-1H6Sj5PTymOfMXBAwTVJ_kzlFRdghImsx1M9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They did the trick by giving them a used syrup pump.
I ordered a bottle of syrup and a pump. It was not packaged when I received it, but I believed it.
When I ordered all  times from other Starbucks locations,
I always got a new one in the packaging.

However, when I came home after buying it and grabbed it,
that was sticky and the syrup was still in the pump.there was also a sticker expressing taste.
When I placed my order there was no wrapping  when I saw her taking the pump out from the floor side under the table, but I believed her and didn't check at there, because she put it in paper bag with  syrup.
If they didn't have a new pump, they had to tell the customer.

She didn't say anything to me,
It was very dirty.
It was a very unpleasant experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-slwXLW51qr45MOZhyVCss3o6MxPkFswopGeP&fid=0x0:0x1e4f5af7b912732f"],"When":"2022-9-7"},{"Name":"Elaine Gao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWawik0Rs_AfhMPieYCqgJs82wMJe7Nv7V-i4aMTYuGHl7_HZM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I order a venti cup coffee but they just give me like this and told me: if you want full , you have to order extra ice . that just a venti cup not venti coffee!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn-ByLbDUaGyZ-YCjgRL4f8SsFyHy_1p3Xf08E&fid=0x0:0x1e4f5af7b912732f"],"When":"2024-2-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Moses Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqP9o2Mxh1TbUgGeu8SzUgOoEYSltQvoNI1vKtAa_4jpobxCL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing baked goods! I am very impressed that the vegan and GF muffins are large, have good texture, and lots of flavours to choose from 👍 Also, even my cat seems to like the scones.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbx7PB-wr1q7IhJ04-Yt0yTK7qPtHQNSMcLR9W&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their sandwiches! The atmosphere is great, they have a mini bonfire outdoor sitting which I love. It does get packed during school term tho. The drinks are ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS_Zq_evUK07fQpAswcFGj_GtmlHZX4AUnVmz_&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Jamie Glennon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLOjs5-jqgyQWUX_yOuzgUG9TpUgCo3VZBWVH5vnxr8HdflLs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot close to Chan Centre and Gage Towers for a high quality coffee and baked good in the morning.

Much better than the chain coffee shops!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWllLnH-9j6g8HteXdulm-5IuO4DeupNnsxwGs&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Justbeing Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM9hiJK-AfVP-qSHlK2ogC-KKU9aHv9jB-f8Zpy8fNkox9PG5e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nestled in a cozy corner, this cafe is a warm embrace of delicious coffee and friendly vibes in UBC . Baristas greet you with smiles, crafting your perfect cup with care. Vintage decor and irresistible pastries add to the charm, making it the perfect spot to unwind and connect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIzHKWJ5uIM5OYLtmxcD6VblvJoIt7iesMyagS&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2024-3-22"},{"Name":"Eden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgHIQ66Jm9chZEYySFVv8p0ryPQbWvKkG3vS_9dnDINf-CKCV_ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This beautiful cafe is highly suggested if you ever decide to staycation or study at UBC.

It is a pet-friendly cafe and offers quality products of fresh sandwiches, espressos, delicious homemade pastries [ with options of gluten-free], and spacious atmosphere with an outdoor fireplace! The staff were so welcoming, friendly, and excellent counter-costumer service.

Their business hours may not meet your needs nor expectations but they'll be opening early and close late once school starts in September.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyppoj0m0i95g6EEpfFj7iN4tIukn51d2QckpU&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2021-8-8"},{"Name":"Jessica Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTqZgPj0eXg_JYgAnVgUcTOilpA24BvBnkompjw1nEkEUn2g3_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Only been here once and ordered a matcha latte. It sucks. Tastes like milk and the matcha flavour is absent. My mistake for ordering drinks when this place is known for their sandwiches. The latte art was cute.

Staff are very kind and efficient especially because this place gets super busy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tario Sultan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs5egw4ytTDIua69pxGET59kVTaWgbfGJaRgqyQl37e1dCXZiC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Dane Coffee shop located towards the north side of UBC campus.

The staff is super friendly and helpful. Pretty good quality coffee, the price is definitely reasonable.

Highly recommended!

Keep it up guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYAsbfa3t9q9Juj68FHljEPh0OO5hRwXWah_gi&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2022-12-14"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Iconic coffee shop at UBC. The staff is really chill and friendly so the vibe is great, and the food/drink is good all around. In particular they have some of my favourite scones around. Their veggie sandwich is very very good (as long as you're prepared for your hands to smell like focaccia for the rest of the day). Except for during the summer, they have a daily soup which is always very tasty. The regular dessert pastries (brownie, cookies, dessert bars) are all good but not stand-out good, but they sometimes have fancier cakes which are amazing.
For their drinks, it is also really hard to go wrong. The masala chai latte is amazing - it's sweet but also richly flavoured with spices. The London fog is also very good. Both of these tea lattes use stone ground tea instead of brewed tea which I think contributes to the intensity. They do a great job with the matcha latte too - it's never clumpy at all. I used to be not the biggest fan of their coffee, but it's grown on me a lot. It's a bit on the acidic side, but if you don't mind that, then the flavour is pretty nice. I really like their mocha too (especially the peppermint mocha available in winter) - this is actually the only place where I really get mochas!
They have pizza nights now (7-10 Wed-Fri) where you can get a flatbread pizza big enough to feed two for less than $15. Only the very basic flavours available (margherita, bianca, or pepperoni), but super tasty (and cheesy).
The seating inside is limited and the space is so narrow that I find it very hard to be comfortable inside unless you go during a rare quiet hour, but I love the patio, which is huge and mostly covered. They sometimes turn the fireplace on during the cold season.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWhxuY6zE3pvpsEAp5I-7RS-wKJgHl_8B7qvR0&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2020-10-24"}]

I ordered the cappuccino with croissant which I activated the offer. I used my app to scan and paid. I asked the cashier why it's so much and I activated the offer. She said the system didn't work and there was nothing she could do.  I just let go.

Then, my husband used his app to order the breakfast combo.  When he looked at the receipt, he said hash brown was missing.  The lady with eye glasses preparing beverage yelled at him and said he didn't ordered clearly. My husband said it's not the first time. He even showed the cashier the offer details on the app before he ordered.  That staff yelled him back like he was a beggar asking for free food.

Both your scanner and your staff are total failures. We won't come back and you don't care because your staff said they were too busy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mika C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZqdKjaxWceeTyXiBFj-T7ut_Q8i1oAqJIDmF5yNWG2dyAag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Staff are fine, food is what you expect. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Summer S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDURG6wzjWhMTvq9RHlABiocXnw6JyF1inAP4gbR3gipY_Dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bear latte 🥰🥰 the cutest baristas ever!! I love the vibes here, it’s a great place to hang out and wait for the bus.

By the way…This is not on the staff working at Blenz at all but I am a little shocked that there is an option for 30% tipping from management, I feel that this default is far too high and unaffordable for students. I would be more comfortable tipping between 10-12% regularly and I feel bad that sometimes I have hit skip due to lack of “normal” tipping options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWH3gTrS_ijjZIY5OjALB7d84XEjObE78hhmEd&fid=0x0:0x1a5600e2f38fe0b2"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Christine Pearl Agustin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzXynYpxJLtauuPFz4BuyDmBv2mPUL3JYNi0AHus83F0CzFSzw4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"ah, blenz coffee – where they've truly mastered the art of turning your hard-earned dollars into disappointingly small beverages. for just $8 (practically a bargain!), you too can experience the joy of wondering where the other half of your drink went.

but wait, there's more! their charming staff have perfected the unique skill of making sidewalk patrol their primary duty. heaven forbid you dare to exist in their general vicinity without clutching one of their overpriced beverages. they'll swiftly remind you that even the outdoor air around their establishment is reserved for their $8-cup-holding clientele.

five stars for consistency though. the prices are high, and the hospitality is reliably low. ⭐️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cinematic Street","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCp2f1A-In1bpp3loogksA-Xwpv81Z3SBe1YH0vraCE77A3vdn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I frequent a lot of chain store coffee shops because they're all over the city and I can count on them.  The reliability factor is huge when you’re someone with an active lifestyle.  Blenz is one of those chains I can count on.

I happened to be on a construction site near Wesbrook Village and there weren't many coffee options in the area…but thank god there was a Blenz.  The coffee, wifi, food options, seating, and service were all good…as usual.  The oatmeal cookies are a good choice and pack well if you're on the go.

The Wesbrook Village area is basically right beside the UBC campus so the main clientele at this coffee shop is students.  There are bus stops nearby so the students are also waiting outside for a bus.

This Blenz Coffee is also right beside the amazing Pacific Spirit Park, so it's a very beautiful area.  It was so nice that I came back when I wasn’t working just to visit the park and re-visit this Blenz.

The first time I came here I needed an extra bottle of water for work and they handed me a Blenz branded water, which I didn’t know they carried.  I don’t usually drink water at a coffee shop but it’s still good to be at a coffee shop hat carries important items like bottled water.  The water is good and the bottle is square, which helps it to pack better because it won’t shift around as much.  I took a picture of the water bottle off the top of my construction site with the beautiful Pacific Spirit Park in the background.

I highly recommend a visit to the Wesbrook Village area.  Visit the park and then stop at Blenz Coffee for some rest and relaxation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNchnn7M_rdpI_kaYZAZAzrNS8394mPYKuTl2Kq&fid=0x0:0x1a5600e2f38fe0b2"],"When":"2023-3-21"},{"Name":"R C (KaZZaM)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDGLk1HezKwEexnp3hmN6TJqWYvGwfmDOjDbiYxoSJaLc-gmI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Welcoming environment, with plenty of staff to handle the workload. Very professional and friendly staff. Coffee and protein shakes along with the breakfast sandwich were all great! 2nd time through after visiting Canada!

Must try if your a coffee lover!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmcFPaIejnFC1qMSPq55zJopv9Wfw2b7sb7Y0&fid=0x0:0x1a5600e2f38fe0b2"],"When":"2023-7-23"},{"Name":"Wai Ching","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqfEQ0ShdTDDyM5Opz2fkCktUfTyP_gsXYTiNE00Pkmcu-Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Normally don’t like to complain, but been at this location twice now where this has happened. Gotten some drinks here before and a couple times the milk was completely sour in both drinks. Don’t know if they check their expiry dates properly but felt quite sick later that day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jack Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHnkZfvPI1zvXQAk-ocfd3ioGZ2bmWLtghP5weZ0f9xVwMSSfP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendliest staff in Vancouver, best tasting drinks, nice vibe. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyvR7iD96xrlixmfMK0KljZJUZvyw5KrX6pxmv&fid=0x0:0x1a5600e2f38fe0b2"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Lucy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFmY60tjmzmXSJid-_AniQa8V7Ji6Vjs5wOocZztND97hpm1eO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had meant to order a matcha-ube drink and made the mistake of not saying ube while asking for recommendations at the counter. The girl working there kindly gave me recommendations but I realized my miscommunication and went up to see if I can make changes. To my surprise all the workers started glaring at me like I did something wrong. I don’t recall Blenz’s atmosphere to be like this in the past. I don’t know if the owners changed or what but I felt very alienated. I admit that it’s my fault for the miscommunication but considering I even gave them a tip I didn’t expect such attitude. They seemed to have started talking about the incidence right away too. A lot of stores with kinder employees would simply offer to remake the drink. Anyhow, I won’t be back here again nor would I recommend this place to any of my friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ALLEIA GOLI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocII0-efSxLWsyZiSEamRj92Gfd_KrTnNsUPctRX7unnOJkDuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"went in on my work break to buy an already overpriced coffee, sat down to drink and eat a granola bar purchased elsewhere (cuz I didn't wanna pay another $10 for a small snack) and was told quite rudely to leave. sorry I'm not dropping extra $$ for a stale ass muffin but if your seats aren't for paying customers then who are they for?","Images":null,"When":""}]
